choices: Rebecca and Kate catch up to you.
You get pulled into Claire's limo.
A mob of love crazed girls are heading right to you.
Nothing happens and you continue to school.
You decide.
1.content:
You hear your alarm clock going off on a monday morning and wake up to look at the time. "Its 7:15?!? oh no I'm going to be late." You said.

You get out of bed, get your clothes on but your having trouble putting your pants on. "Come on." You say to yourself. You notice that you've gained a few pounds and your pants barely fit you. You finally put your pants on after a few minutes. "Man if I keep gaining weight like this then I'll have to wear XXXXXL clothes."

You brush your teeth, gather your school stuff, lock the door and make a run for it. Your running as fast as you can and at the sametime you realize you forgot to eat breakfast. Your a few blocks away from the school and when you get to the street crossing the light turned red.

"Oh come on now I've only got ten minutes left." You said. Your waiting impatiently for the light to turn green when..
1.title: I'm going to be late!!

choices: See bunnie needing help with something.
Run into Claire.
See the principal and she asks a favor for you to do.
See miss. kawasaki is wedged in a doorframe and needs help.
Walk into a trap set up by your fanclub.
11.content:
"Morning CJ". said a familiar voice. You turn around to see that it is your two best friends Rebecca and Kate. You've known them ever since first grade, even back then they were little pudge balls. But because of their weight they didn't have a lot of friends and were treated like outsiders. The other kids would usually bully them by making fun of their fat and calling them names like fatso, butterball, and little miss piggy. Kate would just curl up and cry silently and Rebecca would stand up and defend her and Kate from the kid's bullying. This went one until one day you were getting sick and tired of all of this teasing and name calling that you went over there and told the other kids to back off.

You told them to put themselves in their place and see how they like getting picked on. The kids thought about and realized they were going a bit too far and apologized to them. After that you became really good friends with Rebecca and Kate. Plus they managed to make new friends in the class as well and Kate manged to build on her self-esteem.

"Glad to see that I'm not the only one running late today". You said with a smirk on your face. "Hey gives us a break". Rebecca said while catching her breath from all of that fast waddling. "I had trouble finding a uniform that wouldn't rip apart and had issues getting my shirt buttoned." "Then I walked over to Kate's house and she was having trouble because she out grew all of her uniforms and had to wear one of mom's old uniforms and it barely fits her". "Then we had to book it if wanted to make to school on time but I see now that were all going to be late". You then heard grumbling noises and it wasn't coming from your stomach it was coming from their stomachs. "I take it you forgot to eat breakfast as well". You asked. Um..yes, Kate said quietly. "We spent a lot of time trying to find uniform that would fit us by the time we found a decent uniform we didn't have enough time to eat".

While you were talking with your friends you turn your head for a quick second and see that the sign changed to walk. "Come on we can still make, you said in a hurry". Then you run as fast as you pudgy legs could take you. But Rebbecca and Kate were just waddling as fast as they could right behind you due to their immense weight. Minutes later you make it to the front of the school with a couple of minutes to spare. "I haven't moved that fast in a long time". Rebecca said resting on her broad belly. "At least we made it". Kate said laying down with her large belly and breasts cutting her view. "Come on lets go to homeroom". You then got and helped Rebecca and Kate get on their feet and proceeded to go to homeroom. While on the way you...
11.title: Rebecca and Kate catch up to you.

choices: The principal asked her to.
An anonymous group asked her. (The fanclub)
She felt like it.
111.content:
After you, Rebecca, and Kate were done catching your breath you continued on to homeroom. "I sure hope we're not late or Ms. Kawasaki's going to chew are heads off". Rebecca said. "Well mine and Kate's anyway you'll probably just get a warning". "What are you talking about"? You asked. "Oh come on CJ, Ms. Kawasaki is the most serious teacher in the entire school she'll give someone a detention if there a second late to her class". Rebecca remarked. "She's strict with everyone regardless of students or faculty". "She's even strict with what she wears, always wearing those tight clothes that make her look like an elephant wearing kid's clothes". "The only people she doesn't act so strict with are her family, friends, and you". "Don't you think your over exaggerating things a bit Rebecca". You said. "Oh am I"? She remarked.

"Hey guys". Said an energetic and familiar voice. You and Rebecca stopped your argument and turned to see that it was the lunchlady Bunnie Blake running towards you. "Hi Ms. Blake". Kate said. "Oh Kate you don't need to act so formal you can just call me Bunnie". She said. "What's been going on with you". You asked. "Just the usual stuff, anyways can you guys help move some boxes into the cafeteria"? She asked. "Wish we could, but we need to get going to homeroom or we'll in trouble with out teacher". Rebecca said. "You mean Mina"? "Don't worry give you guys late passes so the "Iron gut" won't snap at you, besides it won't take long". She said happily. "Alright we'll help". You said.

Bunnie then lead you, Rebecca, and Kate around the school to the back of the cafeteria where some stacked boxes were laying around. "Just help me bring in these boxes into the kitchen". "Sounds easy enough". Rebecca said confidently. Then you and everyone else started working. You and Bunnie had no trouble with the boxes, Rebecca had a little trouble because her belly got wedged in the doorframe sometimes. Kate had the most trouble. Due to her large weight she had trouble bending down to get boxes and while carrying boxes she felt off balance because of her bust size. After 21 minutes all the boxes were inside.

"Were..finally..done". Kate panted,gasping for breath. "So Bunnie what are these boxes for"? You asked curiously. "There the ingredients for the gut-buster cake". Bunnie replied. "WHAT"?!? You all shouted. Out of all of Bunnie's famous and tasty creations, the gut-buster cake stood out above everything else. It was well known throughout the school even people outside the school have heard of it. The cake could turn a skinny women obese with its high calorie and fat count. Bunnie only makes it at the end of school year or on special occasions due to the time and preparation it takes to make it. She makes it large enough so that everyone in the school gets a slice.

"But its not even near the end of the school year, why are you making it now"? You asked in shock.
111.title: See bunnie needing help with something.

choices: You felt okay, but you've possibly had a concussion!
You had a splitting headache and double vision. (Split personality)
You had partial Amnesia. (You knew who you were but who was everyone else?)
1113.content:
'I just felt like is all" she said with a shrug and a smile. "Plus some of these ingredients are getting close to their expiration date and I just hate to waste food."

"Oh." you said flatly, not that you were complaining. You'd only been able have a slice of the Gut buster cake once during your time at Chubbeso, and it was absolutely positively delicious!

"Thanks again you three, have a seat and I'll write you all a hall pass." said Bunnie pointed to some open chairs. As you took a seat you heard the school bell ring signaling that the first class of the day was over. Had you really been helping Bunnie that long? Oh well, there wasn't anything really important in math class today anyways. Just as the bell finished ringing it was followed by the sound of a stampede of footsteps stomping down the hallway.

"Oh my!" said Bunnie dropping a pen before she could finish your passes. "I hope everyone doesn't think I made the cake already...Lunch isn't for a few more hours and I haven't even started it yet!" That fact did little to turn the tide of titanic footsteps as a large crowd of hungry hungry girls was flooding its way into the cafeteria. The footsteps thundered louder as the got closer to the kitchen area, the vibrations shaking the walls of the back room. The quaking continued, so much so that a jar of pickled peppers on a rather high shelf began to jostle, and then jiggle until...

"CJ! look out!" Rebbecca had shouted a fraction of a second to late. The three women watched as a bulk sized jar of pickled peppers came careening of its shelf and crashing directly onto your head. The sound glass shattering was the last thing you heard before the world around you began to spin, then turn black, and then...things slowly began to swim away.

When you awoke...
1113.title: Pound Cake/A Pack of Pickled Peppers packs a punch

choices: Mrs. Masters assigns you her own assitant the mysterious Abida Idhar
Someone else.
11131.content:
"I'm sorry, but I'm afraid he's had a terrible accident." echoed a stern males voice from somewhere in the inky blackness surrounding you.

"No! ...Isn't there something you can do?" asked another female voice sounding near the point of tears.

"There's...nothing we can do" said the males voice solemnly "Your son has had severe brain trauma...We...we have to pull the plug."

***

"Nooo!" you suddenly shout erupting awake. Blinking , you gazed about and realized that there was in fact nobody around you. Wait a minute, this was the infirmary! Slowly you began to recall the events that had put you here in the first place. The now sickening scent of pickling juice seemed to be coming from every pore on your body. Now though, where was everyone? How long had you been out? And why did your neck feel so-stiff! Feeling with your hands and turning your head downwards as best you could you realized that your neck was now encased in... What was this thing around your neck? Before you could examine yourself further you had your first visitor.

"Oh good! You're up!" said Nurse Young from somewhere behind the four curtain walls, still seated in her reinforced roller chair. "Oh sorry was my t.v. too loud? I was just watching one of my soaps Dial H for Hospital..." she blinked a bit before remembering something, something that from the look on her face was very important. "Oh!" she said quickly before wheeling her chair out of view. "Mrs. Master's he's awake now!"

There was the sound of heavy heavy footsteps pounding their way across the cool linoleum floor, and then with great speed, the furthest most curtain wall was flung open. Behind the dramatic reveal stood Mrs. Masters, panting and sweating up a storm but with a look not of strain, but shock on her face.

"Mr. Dalton!" she exclaimed crossing the room and bringing her large belly bedside. "Are you okay?-How do you feel?-Where does it hurt? Erika!" You had never heard even the tiniest bit of panic in the usually calm and well reserved Mrs. Masters, but right now she was clearly worried!

"I'm fine." you rasp, your throat feeling a bit dry. "My head still hurts a bit and I'm a little confused about why I'm wearing this...neck thing...but other than that..."

At that moment Nurse Young (still chair bound) had just re-rolled back into the room looking a bit calmer than her blonde boss. "See, he's going to be fine. He's been in here plenty of times before and gone out without a scratch. I already looked at the x-ray's and I didn't see anything severe-"

"Severe enough for a neck-brace..." icily added Mrs. Masters while pointing to your Styrofoam encased neck. You were taken aback by this sudden change in tone by Mrs. Masters, she seemingly had just gone from tender to testy in seconds flat.

"Oh right..." sheepishly said Erika Young, blushing a bit. "Well nothing more severe than a torn Trapezius muscle. No broken bones or signs of a concussion." she said correcting herself while holding up a pair of X-rays.

Mrs. Masters seemed to carefully think things over a bit before deciding on what to do next. "Well, there's no harm in another check up, although I do hope your right Nurse Young. Please give Mr. Dalton a once over and fill him in a bit, while I notify Bunnie, and follow up on that call to Mr. Dalton's parents." and with that, the heavy Headmistress waddled her way out of the room in a way that showed she was still clearly in " all business mode."

"What did I do?" you ask innocently as Nurse Young retrieves a pen-light from her uniforms very tightly packed chest pocket.

"Well, you had quite the accident. So I can understand why she's a bit worried" she begins, while shining the light directly into your eyes. (As Erika mentioned before you had been to her infirmary quite a few times before, and so the check-up process had become pretty routine between the two of you.) "And it wasn't just the usually sort of bumps and bruises your usually in here with. It was a neck injury, and it could have been a lot worse. For example, there's no sign of a concussion as far as I can tell." finished, she clicked her small pen-light off before donning a pair of gloves and opening a new tongue depressor. "Say ah. Good." she continues quickly not letting you get a word in edge wise. "Now, what's really dramatic here is that it wasn't the usual group of school girls tackling you, it was the actual school this time."

"Soah?'" you gargle, tongue still depressed.

"Soooo, since it was the schools accident...We'd be held responsible if...you know things really got bad. I'm only a nurse so I can handle almost everything. Almost. And if you did need major surgery I'm pretty sure your parents could wanted sue the school for medical costs...if they wanted to...You can close now." she says with a snap of her gloves and getting you a paper cup full of cold water. You take a small sip and the cool water feels great going down your achy throat.

"But they aren't bad right? I mean this isn't going to be a permanent thing right?" you point to your new neck accessory and turn your head about a bit, the act give you a sharp pain and you immediately stop the motion.

"Oh yes." says Nurse Young quickly. "I mean pretty much. 90% sure. Okay 75. Wait not like that- I mean you're going to be fine, it's just I don't know how long it's going to take to heal. It could be 2 weeks or 2 months depending on how quick it heals." she explains before wheeling herself back to your X-rays to restudy them.

The new news is a bit shocking to you. Wearing a neck brace for two months was definitely not something you were looking forward to. Before you could ask any more questions Mrs. Masters returned to room, now accompanied by her infinitely stone-faced assistant Abida and one very worried looking Bunnie Blake. The pink haired lunch lady's eyes lock with yours and in an instant her face brightens up exponentially.

"Ceej!" she shouts ready to give you the biggest hug ever-only to stop two paces away, noting your new Styrofoam necktie. "Oh...Oh no. Ceej." she brings a hand to her cheek dismayed at the sight of your injury.

"Not to worry Bunnie." said a now standing Nurse Young, her smile doing it's darndest to cheer the three other dour faces in the room. "I've checked Mr. Dalton here over twice now and he's going to be just fine." Then turning to you as an aide "As long as he keeps that neck brace on. No heavy lifting, and no roughhousing understand? You're going to have to take it easy " she says in a mock stern tone.

"So...you feel fine? There won't be any need to leave or press charges then?" said a still rather tense looking Mrs. Masters.

"What? No? Why would I do that?" you rasp.

"Brilliant!" cried the headmistress breathing a deep sigh of relief, the color slowly returning to her face. "Well, we're all certainly glad you currently fell fine. But, for the future, and to be on the safer side of things, I'm assigning you a caretaker."

Throat hurting to much to talk at the moment, the look on your face does all the talking for you.

"Well, we can't let our most popular student lugging himself around campus and injure his neck any further can we?" explains Mrs. Masters the silky cool as a cucumber tone returning to her voice. "Especially if it means going back across the pond for a REALLY serious injury. Claire would be- I mean the students here, would never let me here the end of it. So, I'm insisting that you have someone who could be a pair of eyes to keep a watch on you, and a pair of hands to help you out."

Okay, you think to yourself. A caretaker might not be the worst idea, especially with this neck-brace on, but who did Mrs. Masters have in mind?
11131.title: Having Neck Pain is a Pain in the Neck

choices: The Head Nurse of Chubbeso Academy  Erika Young
The culinary prodigy of her generation Bunnie Blake
111312.content: "Now, at first I instantly thought of my own wonderful assistant Abida." Explained Mrs. Masters, seeming to draw this process out in a methodical manner "but then, the household is so very large and I am ever so busy... If she were not by my side at all times, I feel that the entire school would go right to pot." She gave a small smile and a nod in Abida's direction, "With that said, I feel that the best person to keep an eye on you until you're back at full strength is..."
111312.title: An Anti Abida Answer

choices: Its just you and Bunnie alone. Oh and Food. That too.
Bunnie invites everyone so the can see your okay! A quiter sort of Game Night
1113122.content:
"Bunnie?" you croak. It certainly was an odd choice. Out of everyone in the room she'd certainly been the one who had hung out with you the most, but she already had what was probably the busiest job here at the academy, well other than Headmistress. Bunnie seemed to share in your confusion.

"Me!..But, Mrs. Master's why? C.J doesn't need me to babysit him." argued the pink haired portion purveyor

"Please, Bunnie you wouldn't be a babysitter." said Mrs. Masters with a pshawing wave of her hand. "More like a chaperone or...a bodyguard, just so he or anybody else for that matter doesn't hurt himself any further. And I know for a fact that you've indeed had medical training."

"Yeah, but that was a choking and heimlich maneuver class. I don't think that really-"

"Listen Bunnie, we can't have our #1 nurse on a 24/7 watch for one student now can we? She needs to be here for our other students, and not just in Mr. Dalton's flat." explained Mrs. Masters in a stern voice.

"My flat?" you pipe up once more throat still feeling as red as ever.

"Yes, well, I'd imagine you'd prefer to rest up on your own bed rather than this rather small room." (The sectioned off area was in fact now filled with five people (two of which who were over 300lbs)) "And rather than...er...risk...walking the campus I imagine one of your school mates could fetch your classwork for you. I certainly don't think Claire would mind.

"Oh." you say in short agreement feeling like wearing this neck brace might have some positives.

"Bunnie, you're really the only other qualified person we have!" Said Mrs. Masters her beach ball like belly sliding closer towards the legendary lunch lady and placing a hand onto one of her lithe shoulders as to butter her not only vocally but physically as well. "And, as much as it pains me to take you away from cooking duty, a duty I know you love so much, I have to do it. I'm sure that the other lunch ladies will undoubtedly have a bit of trouble without their leader, but I'll talk to Jen, er Ms. Telleri, and I can only hope that she will help them sort any problems out." The heavy headmistress finished her compliments and turned with baited breath, turning from Bunnie to you, then back to Bunnie again.

"Well when you put it like that.Okay!" said Bunnie, succumbing to the stream of compliments, and figuring if she was to be so quickly replaced, it would be by her own partial mentor Jen Telleri the official teacher of all things gastronomic here at Chubbeso.

"Wonderful!" exclaimed Mrs. Masters face turning into the exact same triple chin sprouting smile that her own daughter gave whenever she got her way. "Now please, do take the utmost care of C.J. here. I think we'd all be rather upset if he had to be flown back home wouldn't we." she explained the girlish giggle in her voice returning once more, now that the stressful situation had been sorted out.

"Don't worry about it Bunnie." said Nurse Young looking thankful she could now retake her seat. "Just make sure he takes it easy. No heavy lifting, no running, no jogging. Nothing more than walking at the most." Then turning towards your direction, "You can come back and see how your neck is healing in two weeks, but until then nothing but rest. Got that?"

You nod preferring to not speak with your scratchy throat when you didn't have to.

"Right well, we're all very happy your okay and will still be staying with us, but as Nurse Young said you do need your rest." said Mrs. Masters, and with a graceful wave of her fingers she and Abida left your sectioned off area of the infirmary, with Nurse Young wheeling herself back in front of her now muted and subtitled soap operas.

"So..." said Bunnie twirling a lock of her calamity pink hair in semi nervous manner. "Hope you don't mind me hangin' around your place for a week or two."

"Not if you don't..." you say in between dry sounding wheezes. "It'll be like game night every night."

Bunnie gave a weak smile at this and moved in closer, "Hey I'm really sorry about this...I feel sort of responsible for putting something like that up so high..." she mutters, now leaning over your bed. "How about a hug to feel better, handsome?" And at that she ever so carefully wrapped her hands around your tender torso. It was brief, but it was very warm and very soft, her own smell of flour and baked goods enveloping and overpowering your own scent of pickled peppers 'juice.'

"Hey...It's not your fault that shelf broke. It's-fine..shelf should go to jail for negligence. Cough cough ...owww..." Your own attempt at a joke doesn't seem to get a laugh out of either of the two of you. Another round of coughs come on again, and you can feel your head going woozy a bit, your eyelids getting heavier by the minute.

"Okay C.J. I'll see you later kid." whispers Bunnie, closing the curtain wall just as your head hits the pillow...

***


"Hey...wake up..." says Bunnie voice, now coming from right beside your bed. You're eyes open instantly and you find that infirmary is now lit in the orange hue of a setting sun. "It's time you get back to your own room, I'm busting you out of here." she says jokingly. She reaches for a table just out of view and returns with a tiny white plate, on which sits a small slice of apple pie. "So...after everything that happened...I didn't end up baking the gut buster cake, but I did manage to sneak you a piece of this." she teases, the warm cinnamon wafting straight up your nostrils causing a goofy grin to spread across your face.

She hands you the plate, and then retrieves a small thermos of milk.

"Thanks." you eek out, throat feeling better but still not 100%. She smiles in return and then says...nothing really. Bunnie simply stays quiet as a sense of peace falls over the room, looking content to just sit and watch you eat, or at least try to eat, it's a little awkward trying to move your head around with this new neck brace..

"Oh," she says suddenly breaking the silence, "I told Becca and Kate by the way! They so glad you're okay! They wanted to come see you right away, but then you were still sleeping so I told them to wait till later...." Her voice trails off a bit, and when it does return it's a bit softer "They both...they both really care about you you know?"

You pause you pie eating for a bit to nod a bit.

"I'm just glad you got your apparent back." she says noting that your plate was already near empty. "Here, have another" she says, tiptoeing the line and between offering and insisting.

You HAD been hungry, missing out on both breakfast and lunch, and so go to take the second piece of delicious pie.

"You need to get your strength back as soon as possible and nothings better than-uh-oh-whoops." The last bit had been uttered just as the piece of pie slid across the tiny plate and landed smack in the middle of her breasts.

Cursing lightly, Bunnie grabbed a few napkins and started to scrub at the hot ooey gooey mess. Your wandering eyes couldn't help but watch as she strained and searched every bit of her cavernous cleavage for crumbs. Your gawking stares went unnoticed, for a bit, as soon as Bunnie realized you were watching her as she brushed off her bosom, she blushed a bit before turning around to finish.

"Sorry about that...guess I'll have to sneak you back something else for tonight...Or hey I could even make a pizza! You got an oven in your room right?" she says excited to finally be talking about the subject of food, and not about how injured someone was.


Bunnie invites everyone over So the can see your okay. Food and fun in a sort of Game Night!
1113122.title: Bunnie the Babysitter or More Like bodyguard

choices: Rebecca
Kate
11132.content:
The world around you was pitch black...in fact you couldn't even feel your body...you were just...here...wherever here was...

Suddenly a voice erupted from the darkness. "Ahhhh! Finally someone let me out of my cage!" The voice was strangely not unlike your own, except there was a hint that it was a little bit deeper, a little bit older sounding, a little bit more...bolder.

"Who?" you think but don't actually say...Somehow this person has read your thoughts as it answered back.

"Who...More like what. Don't worry about me. Let's talk about you...which I guess is also me." The voice gave a short snarky laugh before continuing. Let me explain, I'm the part of you that's you've been keeping contained, your i.d, libido, whatever you want to call me. The fact is that you're dead.

"What! No!" you think in a panic, an emotion of sadness taking you over. "I had so much left to say, so much to do..."

"Oh, right right." said the voice dismissively. "Game night, slumber parties? That's girly stuff man! You know where that gets you? A one way ticket to the "he's nice but he's just a friend zone" Now your dead and haven't gotten to do what you wanted...what you really wanted. Don't worry though I'll take care of everything and make sure they don't end up slapping a bra and panties on you.

Wait...I thought you said I was dead! you think.

"Oh, right I forgot to mention that I'm also in charge of your lying....Reeeeeebbbbboooorrrrn! Deathperate bullet!" shouts the voice so loud it hurts. "Just kidding. I'll be seeing you soon though C.J. Or is it Charity? Another dark laugh and suddenly your eyes were open.

Hovering straight above you was the familiar sterile florescent light of the nurse's office. You sat up realizing that you had been moved from the cafeteria kitchen to the back room of the Nurses office. Of course you were familiar with this room, having been sent here for a multitude of reasons before; none however were quite as severe as the accident that had happened to you today. At least you hoped it was today...there was no way of knowing how long you were out.

Nurse Young must have heard your rustling as she was soon in the room. "Feeling better? You had quite an injury" she asks approaching your bedside.

"Yeah thanks..." you say propping yourself up on your arms. "I had...I had weird dream...I can't remember it but...Ooooow" a sharp headache pierced your skull.

"Oh a headache. Well that's to be expected..." said nurse Young large stomach and breasts bouncing their way closer to you. "You took quite the knock to your noggin." she notes retrieving a small flashlight from her skintight nurses outfit. Shining the light into your eyes she asks..."How many lights do you see?"

"Two?" you say honestly, you had taken this "test" every time you'd woken up in her office but this was the first time you were feeling rather woozy.

Nurse Young gave a noise, not a word, just a noise sounding like that you'd given the wrong answer. "Hmmm, well you have been out for ten minutes. Please, close your eyes and try again..."

You did so, and this time the world seemed a lot clearer. "One." you say feeling as if you'd just cheated on a test.

"Okay, well you have some minor double vision....no sign of a concussion though so that's good. Just a second..." She disappeared behind your sectioned off curtained area (well disappeared as well as a woman her size could) and returned handing you two aspirin and a glass of water. "I'm suggesting you should head straight back to your room and rest for the day. I'll write you a sick note for today, but come back and see me first thing tomorrow for a check up okay?"

"Alright." you say as you swallowed the aspirin and began to drink the crisp refreshing water. The water was cool and felt good on your dry throat.

"Of course you could stay here and watch F.B.I. M.D. It's a soap opera about a secret agent who has to juggle spy missions while working a hectic shift at a hospital." said Nurse Young hands clasped together waiting on your answer.

"Ummm, no thanks..." you decline as you climb out of the hospital bed and make for the door. "Thanks for taking care of me though nurse young..see you tomorrow."

As you traversed the campus the cool wind whipped about your head, a slight sting reminding you of where your skin must have been cut by glass. You were following Nurse's orders and were indeed heading straight back to your room for some rest when you saw...
11132.title: A bold new world?

choices: Bunnie in the cafeteria and let her know you were okay.
Kate over in the science wing of the school and let her know you were okay.
111321.content:
"C.J" shouted Rebbecca huring as fast as she could to you. You knew what was coming next, 3...2...1. Rebbecca wrapped you in her strong chubby arms, this time so hard it was almost as if she was trying to deflate all of the air out of you. "Oh, C.J.! Everyone was soooo worried about you, we thought you went into a COMA or something!" Bunnie could even bake the gut buster cake she was so upset."

"No..urgh..I'm alright" you say still in her very tight squeeze. (Inwardly thinking wouldn't be so alright if she didn't let go of you soon.) "Yeah, nurse young said I should take it easy though for the rest of the...day." you finish, as Rebbecca finally finished her hug.

"Oh of course." said Rebbecca agreeing. "but you should at least go see Kate and Bunnie and let them know you're okay."

"Alright Becca, I'll go do that. See you tom-"

*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANG*

Augh! There was that bell again! The academy had one bell that rang five minutes before first period and another that rang one minute before class started to avoid tardies.It was that damn bells fault you had gotten hurt, it had rang, and all those students had came running. Right now though it seemed to be droning on forever way longer than usual. It was so annoying! It rang and rang and rang and rang shaking your eardrums. Suddenly your head hurt, bad, right behind your eyes. The world was spinning, your eyes rolled into the back of your head, things were going black again.

"C.......J....Are you....okay?" you heard Rebbecca ask in super slow motion. She watched mouth agape as you hit the ground (well grass) for the second time today. She hurried over to where you were laying and came as close as she could to your face...She could feel hot tears coming again, just as your eyes suddenly flipped open. Rebbecca jumped back, startled. And that wasn't all you did, you stood up, standing straight and dusting yourself off as if nothing had happened!

"Wha-what?" asked Rebbecca breathlessly and surprised "Are-are you okay?" she asked eyes as wide as dinner plates.

"Never better, Becky" you said taking a two smooth steps closer to her. You took a finger to her face and wiped a single tear away from her cheek. "You know, I absolutely hate to see a woman cry, but right now your eyes look are sparkling so beautifully. Did I ever tell you how marvelous they look from up close like this?"

Rebbecca's mouth gaped up and down as she searched for what to say, looking like she was chewing an invisible piece of bubblegum. "C....C.J!" was all she could say as she was more caught off guard than caught up in this sudden moment. "How many time have I told you not to call me Becky!" she shouted, not liking that her emotions had been so...exposed. What had happened? Suddenly you looked different somehow, like you were older, even slightly taller from your change in posture.

"Shhhh." you say quietly placing the same finger to her plump lips. "You look even cuter when your angry, you know that?" The two of you were almost nose to nose now and you could feel her warm breath quickening as it washed over your face. You slowly leaned in confident, assured, of what you were about to do, unafraid if anyone was watching. Rebbecca stood paralyzed unbelieving that this was really happening! She closed her eyes and...

*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANG*

That damn bell again! Oh well... you mutter, as slowly your eyes closed and then re-opened, the process much faster than before and with the drastic feinting. You blinked as you were suddenly aware Rebbecca was making a puckering fish face at you. Why? You wondered. Uh oh the last few minutes were suddenly a hazy memory...Was it because of your head injury? You stepped back away from Rebbecca slightly worried about the possibility of brain damage. Well there was no point in making Rebbecca worry too. Quick- say something and play it off like nothing is wrong.

"He-he" you say faking a laugh. "That is a funny face Becca. But that's the tardy bell, you better hurry to class."

Rebeca's face seemed to melt, turning from a pucker, to a mean frown. "What the hell C.J!" she shouts clearly very angry at you.

You had no idea what to say (or what you had just been talking about for that matter,) so you quickly sputtered out something, anything to distract from the fact you were having short term memory loss. "J-just see me after school at my place okay?" you say taking off.

Rebbecca didn't seem too satisfied with this answer, but she answered with a shout of "Fine!" anyways. She looked like she was a mix of angry,and strangely also confused. "You better be there!" was the last thing she said (more like threatened) before turning about and heading for her class. This left you alone and cold on the campus wondering what to do next.

You were supposed to head straight back but there was something you were going to do first...

OH YEAH! You were going to go see...
111321.title: Clock Tease

choices: The same old gentle boy she could never admit her feelings towards.
Another you – seductive, suave and terrifying all at once.
111322.content:
Kate Granden’s eager eyes hid in the special set of glasses she reserved for SCIENCE when she heard you calling her name. No matter how long you seemed to have known the girl, she became so fidgety whenever her emotional peas and carrots touched, like when the complications of outside social interaction invaded her personal safe zones of the laboratory or the pantry – or in particular, whenever you two were finally alone. And still lacking the confidence to finally put her claws into you, the recovering shrinking violet spastically ducked into the closest room she could find.

“I-I’m cleaning up the materials for the next chemistry lab, give me a few minutes, CJ!” You could have almost heard her poor little heart beat through an already overburdened chest if she had allowed you to enter Science Room 204. But securely locked away, Kate tried to compose herself. Thankfully, most of the student body was too lazy to follow even basic proper procedures so there was still much for her to do.

The Bunsen burners weren’t completely cleared of debris after one of the assistants tried to half-ass a lecture out of ‘how things tasted when cooked by different gases’, some of the consumable alcohols were once again missing from the Toxicology worktable and while tasty the day old homemade ice cream soda flavors still left in the volumetric flasks was downright insulting! Why does science always get abused by other, lesser fields of study?! If it isn’t Jocks of her previous school stealing the funding for computers that weren’t retrofitted 80s macs, it was the greedy expanding bulk of the culinary department trying to make everything about stuffing people’s faces! Even if you are the one in a trillion catch that both honestly didn’t care what she looked like it and wasn’t a total creepazoid about it, it was just so aggravating that as usual, everything was out to keep you two from finally hooking up and OH-MY-GOD-SHE-IS-DOING-IT-AGAIN!!!

Kate’s doughy fists bonked at her thick head of curly hair, trying to calm her emotions down. No one cared to hear her ranting, let alone CJ! “Come on girl, boys want sexy – not dorky” she chanted along with breathing heavy enough that you could probably hear it in the bathroom down the hall. However, you and Rebecca learned long ago to give Kitty the time and space she needed during her little freak-outs, so you merely looked at the door with awkward concern.

Despite Granden’s best efforts to not mumble to herself or get lost in her own little world, she panicked at the sound of the next period bells. Whatever moxie she could find would have to do…again. As her anxiety peaked, she opened the door to find:
111322.title: Kate

choices: Young buys it and nearly gives you an entire week of recovery.
You escape today's classes by being detained under "obersvation".
1113221.content:
With one uncharacteristically brave step out the door, Kate wore a nervous smile across her more than chubby face - struggling against the urge to visibly fawn at the same old boring you from a several mile distance. Your consistent docile mannerisms presented a cruel paradox, for they were as easy to approach as they were difficult to confront for such a passive girl like her. However, YOU, as usual, were completely blind to the arguably subtle movements she attempted to make in order to combat the apocalyptic horror of finally asking you out. A cheerful ditzy laugh as she stubbed her right foot on a stationary and visible locker, nearly tripping several times in the hope to get a decent sashay down with her top heavy form; all of Kate’s adorkable tactics and recoveries, wasted on a complete imbecile.

“Hey Katie”, you warmly reply without a care in the world. And after she greets you with friendly body language, she sadly draws a total blank. The pause grows ever more painful as she desperately tries for find one miserable little word to say to you. Anything could break the sudden spell of silence over her, yet all she could come up with was meek dulcet noises. You show concern, but without any knowledge that this is specifically your fault, your actions only set Kate further off. She is nearly brought to tears and YOU STILL CAN NOT TAKE A GODDAMN HINT THAT SHE IS TRYING TO POUR OUT HER OWN HEART TO YOU.

Must I do everything for you?!

A sudden wave of gut-wrenching guilt belched out a succession of phrases that you would accept if it would just keep Kate from crying. “I’m sorry. You look great. Want to catch a movie tonight?” – C.J. was not sure exactly where these lines came from, but when the speckled girl made a severe U-turn towards ecstatic joy and a quiet accepting nod of the offer – well, whatever works, you guessed?

In an emasculating display of your own personal strength it almost takes both hands to lift Kate off the ground, but you are rewarded with a hug that quite literally takes your breath away. When oxygen returned to your lungs, Kate’s beet red face mumbled out what could have been an apology as she immediately retreated to some dark corner of the campus faster than her husky physics should have allowed the marshmallow to travel.

But the several moments of inhalation deprivation left you a little woozy, and honestly, it didn’t help that you apparently subconsciously set yourself up on a date with one of your best friends. The world was in a blur and you weren’t sure if you were up for a regular rigmarole in Chubbesco. You wondered if Nurse Young could arrange a half sick day for you -- or least some time to rest, as you wandered back to her office.
1113221.title: The same old gentle boy she could never admit h...

choices: A rumbling out in the hallway, it’s the next science class. Oh no! Run!
A rumbling from her stomach...Oh right it's lunch period. Let's eat!
1113222.content:
*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANG*

Seconds earlier as you waited outside of the science center door, the schools next period bell had rang. Augh! There was that bell again! The academy had one bell that rang five minutes before first period and another that rang one minute before class started to avoid tardies. It was that damn bells fault you had gotten hurt, it had rang, and all those students had come running. Right now though it seemed to be droning on forever, way longer than usual! It was so annoying! It rang and rang and rang and rang shaking your eardrums. Suddenly your head hurt, bad, right behind your eyes. The world was spinning, your eyes rolled into the back of your head, things were going black again.

"Whoa! All right, I’m in control!" Came the sound of your own voice, only...a bit different, deeper sounding, more rough in tone. Your other half, or more like your inner self, {and for the sake of convenience we’ll call J.C} WAS NOW IN CONTROL, not just a voice in your head!

“All clear C.J!” said Kate opening the science room door and trying to sound as calm as she could. In her brief panic she realized that there were very few chances she was actually alone with you, not in a classroom with teacher and plenty of other girls, and not after school hours as usually it was trio or quartet of C.J, Rebecca, Claire and Kate herself. So, definitely not wanting to mess this up by doing something embarrassing, Kate waddled back to a science lab counter top and tried to look relaxed as she readied herself to talk to you.

Only she wouldn’t exactly be talking to you per se, it would be “The Superior C.J,” well superior-ly in touch with his feelings at least.

As J.C’s eyes fell upon the nerd girl a reaction akin to cupid’s arrow seemed to overtake him. Every single moment that the two of you had shared together seemed to rush into his head into a burst of joy.

It was Kate! Kate! Kate,Kate Kate Kaaaattteee! Kate Granden! Her name was forever written on your heart and mind!

One of the kindest nicest girls there was on Earth! So modest, so soft spoken, so sacrificing, always shying away, willing to let someone else get the attention.… C.J had always been a bit too shy himself to admit his own partial feeling for the shy girl. Well now it was finally her turn to feel special, she was going to get all of your attention.A killer smile flashed crossed your face, as you entered the room slowly, coolly letting the heavy door close behind you without glancing back, your eyes blazing with passion remained gazing upon Kate, almost like a hungry wolf preying upon his next lamb.

“C.J you’re all right! I mean, the way that the jar smashed on your head…for a second I thought..." she turned meekly away from a moment at her own grim thoughts, before returning to face you with a smile. "I’m just really glad you’re okay...”

“Nah, I’ve taken plenty of worse bumps than that here. Nurse Young told me I had to be careful the rest of the day, and to just go home, but I just wanted to stop by and see the smartest girl in school before I did.” said J.C taking his time in approaching Kate, so that he could take her in, all of her in.

Besides brains Kate was sexy! Wow! How had the ordinary C.J. been able to control himself around such a sensual body! You knew what you wanted, and now you were free to admit it: you liked girls, all girls for that matter, but you loved big girls! Kate’s breasts! So round and fat and full! You’d love to give them a gentle squeeze, and feel their weight as you held them in your hand! Oh! And that stomach! Long known as one of Kate’s ticklish spots since you both were younger, C.J was always able to keep a hand off approach as he and Kate grew older when things would have been awkward. Even after bumping into her so many times by accident, there were apologies on both sides a look of embarrassment, and then nothing more. What you wouldn’t give right now to see her fleshy belly right now in all its glory, and perhaps feed it and watch it grow larger! Too bad she insisted on keeping her beautiful body covered under as much clothes as she could, hidden away like layers of chocolate over the sweet caramel center of a candy bar.

J.C had been supercharged with these emotions in matter of nanoseconds, emotions that regular C.J had felt and dealt with for years and could leave a teenager feeling.."confused" about one of his best friends, J.C was without such inhibitions and so was still able to keep his cool.

“Oh-me? Aw geeze CJ. I’m not that smart...” said Kate already feeling herself starting to blush, and regrettably feel herself starting to sweat.

“Sure you are,” said J.C whose slow approach had finally reached the girl, he leaned in closer to whisper the next part close to her ear so that it was barely audible. “and the most beautiful too.”

Kate blinked a bit unsure of what she’d just heard. She had always wanted to hear those words, but had certainly never expected to hear those words coming from you at this moment. Especially after all of the mean teasing she’d gotten back at your old school. There were girls jealous of her blossoming beauty who’d call her mean names like “Kate Weighs-up-to-a-ton.” And “Kate Middle-weighs-a-ton” and Kate would always decide to simply ignore them (at least until her more physically aggressive BFF Rebecca showed up!) Such daily insults though had definitely built up over time and could really cause a girl to clam up! Things had been better since the two of you had started going to Chubbeso, but secretly Kate was still prone to tiny bouts of self-consciousness when it came to the way she looked.

“-Erm w-what? Y-you really think I’m….?” stammered and squeaked Kate, feeling like she was about to melt. Kate was unable to finish her question though as she was interrupted by…
1113222.title: J.C X K.G

choices: Give Kate all the food, and feed it to her then and there.
Then again,all this food...eat a lot yourself, maybe more than her...
11132222.content:
Kate rested a dimpling hand atop her round belly. She blushed, the red traveling down her neck, up to her forehead, and, of course, over her nose. She smiled awkwardly as she mumbled, "Well, maybe we should eat. You--you really think I'm--?"

Food. Come to think of it, your body was pretty starved too. To think that weaker part of you didn't eat today. You patted your own tummy. "I'm hungry too. Want me to get you stuff?" For extra effect, you rested a hand on her love handle, and squeezed. She practically melted in your arms, resting those huge boobies against your chest.

"I--I--sure." Kate was breathing heavier now, a hazy look in her eyes. She wanted you. She needed you.

The two of you walked to the lunch area.. Your fingers touched her hands, hoping she let you hold it. Eventually, she surrendered, her fingers shaking, palm sweaty. She was excited, nervous, even a little turned on. You grinned, glad to have this effect on such a total freaking hottie. You thought about later, once you fed your way into her body, when she'd be willing to let you do her, to hold her down and make sweet love with her until all the pent up desires went away. The old guy must've been an idiot not to embrace this situation. A harem of women, all there for the taking! How could anyone hate this?

Upon reaching the lunch table, you pulled out a chair for Kate. "I'll be back with food."

"I can get it. Don't--"

You pressed a finger to her lips. Her words dried up in her mouth. "I don't want you wasting precious energy. I want the prettiest girl in school to be nice and pampered. Do you like being pampered?"

Kate nodded.

"Good.I'll make sure I pamper you every day.Got it?"

Kate nodded again.

With that, you ran to the food.
11132222.title: A rumbling from her stomach...Oh right it's...

choices: Accepting the terms, roles reverse when J.C. comes out to play.
REJECTING YOUR OFFER, THE GAME OF THE BIG BOY THRONE BEGINS.
111322221.content:
J.C.’s dedication to a selected target was cordial and obsessive. Every bite was carefully crafted by tastes, affectionate complements or comforting conversation, and always asking “ Please, let me give you more ” before the next section of the foodstuff scale model of Olympus Mons was offered to Kate on bended knee. You didn’t want to just fatten her like some hog for market; it was your duty to make sure she was comfortable from start to finish – and you didn’t care who saw you giving Kate’s over-nourishment your undivided all.

If Kate’s gaze settled on the buttered sea food than you would acquire shell hammers and nutcrackers directly out of the Cafeteria’s staff’s own hands to make sure she didn’t have to lift a finger to swallow the most tender parts of the Lobster’s Claws and the sautéed White Wine Spider-Crab. If she was starting to feel more carnivorous there was a legion of Tenderloin, Sirloin and artery exploding Filet Mignon; garnished from Cajun tongue melting spices to gentler peppered Steak au poivre - with deep pools of cream that almost hid the taste of the cured, breaded and roasted Fatback or Pork belly larding. When her formidable stomach started to make her moan in more pained breaths, you would take several minute breaks slowly kneading her expanding flab in gentle rhythmic tides of chilled fingertips dancing on rising, yet yielding flesh.

You wouldn’t stand to let any of Kate’s treats to be defiled, even when greedy outside hands or the forward march of Kate’s stuffing onslaught threatened to topple the remaining horde before it reached its final destination into the later. You’d politely confiscate four more tables and cloth from other dining parties to channel Kate’s belly into a more contained growth, cozy in a lazy makeshift hammock, and thank the envious onlookers for their compliance. You’d also make sure to let Kate know you were still there when her feeding trance occasionally broke and she could no longer see you over her own three mounds. A peck on the head, a gentle yet wolfish grin on your face and – when she was ready – easing back into the meal with supple chocolate dipping saucers ready to give her a truck load of sugar to help the medicine go down. Her absolute favorite maneuver was when you scaled up to personally lip feed the dark chocolate slathered side to Kate’s awaiting mouth.

However, no matter how much you persuaded into her, she always seemed to have just enough room for J.C.’s next attack. And even with the standard wandering 3-6 hour lunch breaks the Academy was notorious for, to Kate this pleasantly seemed to go on forever. She could die right here and now, bloated beyond all reasonable explanation, and her only regret would be that she didn’t show you– or rather, “C.J.” the true extend of her feelings.

To say that the two of you were a spectacle was the understatement of the decade. The typical gluttonous roar of the Chubbesco mini-mall sized eating square, which would have put Nero’s Rotating Banquet Hall to shame, was a mausoleum of hatred as the overfed blob mob around you jealously ate out their hearts in tension filled silence. It was difficult to determine whether more girls were anxiously waiting their turn with you or were eagerly plotting to smother Kate to death wherever she would be sleeping off her oncoming food comatose. However, the ugliness that would have followed if it was regular old C.J. was not happening, as few even dared to call you out, let alone approach you. Your unnatural new charisma and confidence projected an unspoken rule of DO NOT DISTURB ME, rivalling even the authority Claire Masters abused at whim.

And speaking of the Lardy Heiress, she was tittering over the breaking point watching HER C.J. DALTON – “W-WITH THAT LOW BORN SOW! I WILL TEAR OUT HER-”

///*Due to the sheer hateful filth of Claire’s upcoming diatribe towards student Kate Granden, we here at the Chubbesco Academy Management must inform you, the viewer, that the rest of Young Miss Masters’ rant will be redacted for decency. Just know that what followed was a sordid oath of vengeance for the ages. Thank you for your understanding.*////

Daintily wiping the foam from her mouth, Claire viciously grit her fang-like teeth as she bided her time until Dalton finished his mistake of wasting such pleasant food on such an unworthy urchin.

With a final soft burp, Kate tearfully drifted off into a small hibernation that would never match the dream she just lived. For some reason, you had the suspicion that you couldn’t quite roll your work out the doorway without hurting at least someone – and you will not tolerate that possibility to be Kate. Snapping your fingers, you managed to order several freshmen to make sure Kate had the most comfortable nap possible on the heated marble floor. “Please try to round up the more decent pillows and blankets – I’ll make sure Bunnie gives this the okay.”

But before you could even notice how shell-shocked your Favorite Canadian was at the show you just gave, you could hear Masters’ thunderous stomps as she put her weight into the angrily jiggling thighs heading your way. “C.J. DALTON” she cattily screamed, “You and I are going to have a serious talk about what liberties you may have with the rank-and-file plebs of MY Academy! It seems I was far too lenient in educating you on the grounds of OUR relationship, so I will let this incident slide if you come with me right this second!” She smugly expected results after she put the finishing touch of one last table breaking I-am-putting-my-foot-down thump.

As if possessed by some sinister force, your head slowly cocked around until your furious glare locked gazes with Claire.

Turning to face her, your advance startled the spoiled brat, for C.J. never defied her like this before. “Ma’am, listen up, because I will only say this once” you coldly remark in the most American Action Hero way your juvenile mind wished for. “I am sick and tired of running away from your stupid little conspiracy to stuff me silly, and I will not tolerate this fan club nonsense or your commands anymore! I am going to make sure my special friend Kate Granden can safely digest her lunch and will be spending A LOT of time with her from now on”. Pointing a slightly less chubby digit her way J.C. gives her his ultimatum, “ if you try to get involved with MY relationship with HER, I will turn this stupid school of yours against you! Do you understand me, Claire?!

Even with all your bluster, you were slightly amazed that you could go as far as you did. Still, you waited for Miss Masters’ reply.
111322221.title: Give Kate all the food, and feed it to her then...

choices: Kate! Love of your life! The one and only girl J.C will ever love!
You're eyes fall upon a certain other woman in the room and J.C goes after them!
1113222211.content:
Claire’s eyes widened and she gave a soft sputtering sort of sound. Most around thought the pudgy and pampered one had been choking, and in a way they were correct, she was choking, on her own words.

“Fu-Fine.” Were the words when they finally trembled out of her mouth. Claire looked shocked then hurt, then like she might cry, and with good reason too; few had dared to stand up to the demanding primadonna whether for fear of firing or expulsion, Claire had connections very, very powerful ones. Getting talked back to was rare enough for the girl, but by you CJ! Getting told what to do was a shock, it was different…it was kind of exciting…Watching you take command was a complete role reversal of what she was used to, and even if it wasn’t focused on her (at the moment) she’d liked this new take charge C.J in front of her.

“And that goes for all of you!” you say, standing on top of a table and shouting at the top of your lungs to the crowd of girls watching this spectacle. “I love Kate Granden! And nothing’s going to change that so you can all leave!” Most of the crowd seemed to disperse at your order, while a few lookie-loos decided to swoon at your new found attitude before departing with Claire and the rest of her usual posse, and the last few girls grumbled a few grievances wondering what was so special about the “Kate” girl before returning to the other side of the cafeteria.

You looked about you, testosterone still flooding your body your breaths coming deep. That’s when you noticed something…Where was Kate? The last time you had seen her, she had been gently brought to her makeshift bed of blankets and pillows and was resting gently on the cafeteria floor. A blissful smile on her face telling everyone she was the happiest girl in the world at the moment, the lower half of her belly, so round and full with food was exposed for the world to see as it gently rose and fell with her breaths. But now where was she?

“Where is my love?” you ask the nearest freshman one of the few you had ordered to find blankets moments earlier.

“Kate?” asked the freshman who looked as startled at your personality she as any of the other girls. “Bunnie had us move her to the back room, something about lunchroom standards and practices, safety issues that sort of-Hey wait where ya going?”

“No time!” you say already taking off for the cafeteria’s back room. Dashing all the way, you make your way inside and arrive to the sight of Kate, still sleeping, still peacefully unaware of the scene you’d made after she began to sleep. Your eyes satisfied by the sight of your Kate still at peace, you noticed the other features of the room; the smell of pickled peppers still pungent in the air from this morning, all of the higher up shelves were now vacant of any heavy objects, Rebecca Maglen standing in the corner and looking pissed. Wait-

“C.J. Masterson! What the hell is going on!” demanded a very angry Rebecca. In two steps (carefully stepping over Kate) she crossed the room and jutted a finger into your chest. “What were you two doing out there?”

You calmly took Rebbeca’s accusatory finger in your right hand and held it, then slowly moved it to just below one of your mini-man boobs, and right over your heart. “It’s simple… I love her…I love Kate.” You’re eyes are aglow again with intensity as you nod into Rebbeca’s eyes.

Rebbeca isn’t convinced and she peels her eyes in suspicion, freeing her hand from your grasp. “Are you feeling okay…You sound a bit…different. Maybe that bonk on the head-“

“Maybe nothing! I love Kate Rebecca, and nothing and no one is going to come between us now.”

“Yeah, no stuttering, no shy looking away from me, something’s not quite right here…” muttered Rebecca, desperately not wanting to believe what she was hearing. “Come on let’s get you back to Nurse You-"

BRRRRRAAAAAAAANNNNNGGGG

No! Not here! Not Now! Your inner you shouted, only it didn't escape your lips and instead echoed about your brain. A weary woozy feeling taking over your body, a dreadful sense of déjà vu from this morning flooding your senses.

“C.J! C.J! Hey!” Rebecca’s voice was the only thing keeping you from blacking out completely; leaning on a table top for support you manage to stay standing.

A fog seemed to be lifted over your entire presences like you’d just woken up, and all of your senses seem to be working on overdrive playing catch-up to the last few hours of your life…”Augh…My head…Rebecca?"

“…C.J…” asked Rebecca still unsure of what was going on…

“Rebecca…Kate…Oh my gosh.” You gasp a bit realizing you had control again. It wasn’t like you didn’t remember what happened, only that most of it was hazy… “Rebecca, it’s all right. I’m okay now.”

“You are?” asked Rebecca taking a curious step closer.

“Yeah…” you say giving her your ‘good old C.J’ smile. “I feel okay. I’m all right, I mean- I’m sorry. “

Rebecca seems to relax a bit at your calmer sounding words, and an apology, yep this was C.J. “Good.” she begins taking a step back to give you some breathing room. “I was worried for a second. It’s just…well seeing you…with Kate-”

Rebecca doesn’t get to finish her sentence as none other than Bunnie Blake burst into the back room. “C.J! What was that back there?” she asks echoing Rebecca from moments earlier. “I just finished the last lunch service, so I’ve got an hour or so before dinner starts. But right now you’re gonna tell me what the heck you were doing out there and why Kate was sleeping-“

Before she can finish she was interrupted by you quickly jutting in.

“-Guy’s listen! Just give me a sec to explain. I think-”

“I mean it’s good to see Kate being such a good eater but-“

“Seeing you and Kate together, well it made me realize something…C.J. I…”

The voices in the room collided, each one swallowing up parts of the other, so nobody could hear all of what anyone else said. That was until….

BRAAAANNNNGGGGG

The second bell rang signaling to all dawdlers that lunch service at the cafeteria was indeed finally closed for the day, and that this was indeed a school and they ought to be getting back to class now that they’d be officially tardy.

Inside your head a deeper version of your voice laughed from within "Muhaha…Yes! Of course! Saved by the tardy bell! I’d best remember that in the future… See ya C.J, J.C’s back, and he’s feeling large and in charge! Meanwhile, on the outside your body again had gone wobbly, although not as severe as the other two times. You’re hearing faded back in and you caught the tail end of Rebbecca's current conversation with Bunnie.

.“-see! He goes all wobbly like that! He says he’s okay...but I’m still not sure.” she finished, watching you're body slow its spin.

“Oh goodness” said Bunnie as she observed your minor muscle spasm. “I hope it’s not because of that stupid jar of peppers. I swear I won’t eat another pepper as long as I live!"

“Ladies, please…I’m fine… Just a bit woozy still is all… I'm okay.” You're voice reclaiming it's deeper velvet like tone from before. Slowly you opened your eyes to see...
1113222211.title: J.C Jockies for Control

choices: Round rearended Rebbecca who happens to quickly change her opinion on the new CJ
Bubbly breasty Bunnie Blake who loves how much the new CJ likes to help and eat!
11132222112.content:
Like a freight train in a rail yard, your endless boundless train of passion love and lust spun around the room until your eyes finally settled on J.C's next target...

The lucky(?) lady who'd be receiving all of your attention till the end of time, (or at least until the next time you heard the school's bell ring) was none other than...
11132222112.title: Round and Round Looking at Round Women

choices: Rebecca wants an encore performance of the incident and her own private lunch.
Still unsure, Rebecca wants a more traditional kind of date on her terms.
111322221121.content:
You wear a mask of regret and shame, weakly calling out to Rebecca to get her attention. “I’m not sure if I’m ready for the rest of the day, could you please help me to my room?”

It was easy to imitate weakling, apparently far too easy as Rebecca’s protective instincts immediately kick in at the chance to aid her poor little CeJ. “I knew there was something wrong with you!” she huffed, trying to save one of her nagging lectures for after you’ve had a decent siesta “well, I guess it’s good that you finally come clean now so I can make sure you’ll recover.” As Rebecca decided on her own that she needed to help you walk the entire way, slinging your arm over her doughy shoulder, you figured it would at least be fair to slide the other across her invitingly soft belly and to grasp at her rolls as tight as you can. She tried to write off her embarrassment and focus on the situation, “Uh okay, Bunnie, you mind sending up some lunch to his room? I don’t think he actually ate anything during his little episode”.

You always admired her strength, even when you only seemed to increase her burdens.

“Don’t worry that pretty little head, kid. By the time you get him to bed, I’ll have a nice romantic meal for you to steal ol’ Dan Juan there all for yourself”. Of all the times for another helping of classic Blake comedy; this was the absolute last thing the already flustered former softball star needed right now.

“Don’t you think there’s already been enough of that!? C.J. could be seriously hurt right now, a-and you’re making those sorts of dumb jokes at his expense!?”

Furrowing her dyed pink and green brow, your surrogate older sister of a chef was hurt at the accusation that she would ever do anything to harm anyone, let alone inexplicable Academy heartthrob, C.J. Dalton. “Oh so this IS my fault?! Let’s get this straight, squirt I regret ever putting that damn thing in a position that would hurt little C! Okay?!” Bunnie mixed a deeper shade of red to her eyes “I wish it would have just shattered in my face!”

You can’t let this continue. “Ladies, please” fearlessly putting more force into your tone, J.C. no longer cared if the ruse would be blown. “Neither of you are responsible for my actions. Bunnie just wanted to lighten the mood, Rebecca. Please” -- even if it came on command, the tear wasn’t as crocodile as you felt it to be, “please don’t fight”.

And the Academy award for deception goes to you for the role of yourself.

“Oh, C.J., don’t worry. We were just excited!” Rebecca snuggled you closer into her chest and you couldn’t find a reason to complain.

“You didn’t do anything wrong, Sweetie.” The punk cook happily decreed as she pat the still slumbering Kate “She certainly enjoyed it and I did have a kick out of getting to finally watch you stand up to her royal bossy boots”.

As much as you enjoyed their attention, you were glad plans had already been made to become isolated with Miss Maglen. If you stayed in that kitchen any longer, you likely would be doted on until the bell rang.

The three legged waddle was not as strenuous as you expected, especially since Rebby tried to take the blunt of both of your weights in between the gossiping looks and the snide remarks that she must have stolen you from that bloated Titty Nerd Kate. The Cafeteria Event, as it coming to be known, was already being altered into a thousand personalized rumors, from where you supposedly were the sensual cause of any girl’s recent bulging gut, to your spirited proclamation of loving everyone in your personality cult, now and forever. The C.J. Fan Club will always find a way to ignore reality.

However, you only blocked out the more significant distractions from your current target. You could still feel the athletic remnants of Rebecca’s past life pumping blood and enjoying the sweat. It wasn’t a contradiction that you enjoyed her being an incurable glutton, and her now more unfortunately subdued passion for exercise, they both made her a better person in your eyes. But your silent staring only seemed to make her restless.

“H-Hey, C.J., you uh- mind I ask you something?” Without waiting for a chance to respond, she dropped the bomb “did you really mean what you said back there y’know, about Kate?”

I don’t know was the best answer you could find, as you honestly never considered your own motivations for your actions. You clearly remember enjoying what you did to her; you do still more than like Kate, you wouldn’t mind doing it over again and again -- and are pleased that she seemed to reciprocate all of these points back at you. And yet, you could not seem to recall why you were so driven to do exactly what you did. The bittersweet memories of your collective childhood past are there, the pieces of the pathos are all present, but “Whoa, don’t strain yourself too much over this answer, your in even less of a condition for that.” Rebecca attempted to change the subject, but you know why this is so painful to her.

Rebecca deserves happiness!

You apparently have mumbled that last thought out, as her years of Kateology have made Rebecca ears tuned to catch low speech, “What’d you say, C.J.?”

“You deserve so much more, Rebecca” you pronounce without a hint of irony, but she isn’t sure how to take that last remark.

“Where did this come from?” Her resistance is expected, but you easily recount how many times, in how many years, she’s tried to have that talk, only for some sadistic part of the universe to influence causality and fate against her moment from ever arriving. Well no more!

Luckily near your side of the dormitory, you standup straight and use your two inches of height over the girl to your advantage. “For the longest time you’ve been my strength” playfully arching ever so close to her still baby fat face “When I failed to be enough of a man to keep Kate from being bullied, you always picked up my slack without so much as a thanks.”

The unheralded flattery and blatant angle of your words crippled her defenses, but Rebecca still tried to deny that this was actually happening. “C-Ceej, C’mon! Cut this out you’re making me blush.”

“No! I mean everything I say. I’ve shamelessly accumulated a debt that’s gone unchecked for far too long.” Taking one surprised palm to your mouth, you kiss her right hand before continuing your barrage “Read my lips. I Love You Rebecca.”

You patiently waited for her to fully regain conscious while she was still standing there; repeating what thankfully weren’t her last broken words several times in sheer awe. As her pupils stabilized, she made one last desperate attempt to maintain the status-quo “But-But, you’ve said this before C.J.! How can I be sure this isn’t just your medical condition talking nonsense again!?”

Still holding her hands, you kneel before the shade of her wide pear dip “I want to prove myself by becoming a better man for you.”

“C.J., I love – I MEAN LIKE, I ‘like’ you as you are.”

“No, I want to be your strength for a change! I want to follow a work-out regiment you prescribe and be the caliber of man you deserve!”

Finally breaking down, you couldn’t help but enjoy Rebecca making order out of your chaos by laying down ground rules. “Okay” her voice no longer quivered, but her red cheeks, much like her hips, didn’t lie “Let’s say I want to believe you. You want me to personally coach you whenever I feel like it, even though you’ll likely wimp out as always?”

“DON’T TAKE NO FOR AN ANSWER!” your scream, stereotypic of a drill Sargent, sent a shiver up her spine “Especially if I act like I don’t remember any of this. Don’t allow me to be weak anymore, Rebecca. Please, help me be better for you.”

“Alright, enough…even though I don’t think I could do much of a good job these days” she sarcastically patting her belly as you stood to hug her. “I’ll help you as much as I -- oof!”

“Thanks, Rebby. You’re the best!”

“…Rebby? Look, I’m not sure how much just the two of us can do without proper equipment.”

A devious smile crosses your face as Rebecca thought; nothing can get in your way to please her. “You just leave that minor inconvenience to me…So, do we have a deal?”

Letting go of her for only moment, you extend your hand for a simple confirmation; “on one condition, C.J..”
111322221121.title: Round rearended Rebbecca who happens to quickly...

choices: It's the period bell! C.J. is thrust back into world of J.C.'s creation.
Relax! It's only the door. But....is that Claire behind it?
1113222211211.content:
"Ohhhhhhhhh...."

The words drifted lazily out of the mouth of your best, and currently barely conscious friend Rebecca. Currently resting her head on the pillow at the head of your bed, the rotund, pear shaped angel that was currently the object of your desire found herself lost in the blissful afterglow of her glorious gorging session at your hand. And it had been glorious indeed.

One hand rubbing the exposed porcelain mound that was her belly, the other hand drifting through her hair, you look around the room around the two of you, glancing at the disheveled remains of what was, if you do say so yourself, an even better stuffing session than the one that you had graced Kate with earlier.

"Almost too easy. Almost..."

 

Had J.C. not been in control when Rebecca had whispered those magic words earlier, you're sure that the weaker side of yourself would have been flabbergasted, if he had not fainted outright instead. Luckily, you had been in control at this, the true turning point of the relationship you had desired secretly for so long.

"I want you to feed me."

Your insides had quivered as your heard those words, spoken so quietly that you strained to hear them.

Rebecca's face was bright red, her eyes looking downward nervously, hoping that none of the sources of the gossiping voices in the hallway near your room had been close enough to hear.

"I want you to feed me like you did with Kate."

Your outstretched arm, waiting for the handshake that had never come, slowly dropped to your side. Rebecca, sweet little...well, perhaps not so little...Rebecca.

A moment passed.

Your insides leapt with joy.

Another moment.

Bursting into action, you rushed forward, planting the largest, wettest kiss you could muster upon the unsuspecting lips of the girl you loved.

Rebecca was certainly startled at first, attempting to pull away. But you would not relent. Finally, her knees quivering, the once athlete who it seemed had finally turned to the culinary wonders of food, gluttony, and pleasure melted into your embrace. It lasted only a moment, but a moment that seemed to stretch into eternity.

Finally breaking from your kiss after what seemed like a lifetime and grabbing a dazed Rebecca by the hand, you dashed away towards your ever so close room, your enraptured companion following behind, seemingly unaware of anything but the kiss that she had wanted so desperately desired and had finally transpired.




What had followed was a display of hedonism that Dionysus himself would be proud of. You were the perfect gentleman of course. The euphoria from opening up your friend to this new world of pleasure was reward enough. Besides, that could always come later. Situated beside her as she slept off the effects of what you were sure was a experience that may have even surpassed your previous efforts with Kate, you could think of a way this could get any better. The gentle caress of your hand on her belly had been enough to put Rebby to sleep as you looked back upon what had transpired.

You smile to yourself, and the world is at peace. Nothing can possibly go wrong.


BAAAAAAAAAAAAAANG

Oh no.........
1113222211211.title: Rebecca wants an encore performance of the inci...

choices: Accept Claire's invitation to a Masters Turnabout?
Take a raincheck to find out where Rebecca could have slowly wandered off to.
11132222112112.content:
CJ was really beginning to hate these migraines you kept getting from these weird pounding sensations. Droning ringing and something that sounding like a voice that wouldn’t shut up for a few seconds. Like an incoherent dream that wouldn’t get the hint that you're already up and not in any mood for more reasons for your head to hurt more than it already was.

“Ugh -- what time is it?”

Your vision was becoming less fuzzy as you had trouble gaining balance on your own bed. A slight fear that you were already getting too fat to even know how much space you took on you own special Queen Size didn’t help you deal with the situation you were about to land in.

“Did someone find me and take me to my room? Without trying to shove anything down my mouth while I was unconscious or take creepy pictures?” You weren't sure whether you should actually smile as you didn’t feel any painful bulge on your stomach or any weird marks on your mouth or other places. “Lucky day I guess. Wait, what’s this soft thing right—“.

Your instincts immediately broke out into a cold sweat as you realized how familiar the object you was touching felt like. The fact that it was snoring and MOVED almost made CJ shriek in a very masculine, macho voice that would have surely have woken whomever it was up if you didn’t thankfully cover your mouth as quick as you did.

Oh God no. Please don’t tell me someone actually slept with me. The entire female population would riot if not kill me! CJ was almost too afraid to check exactly who it was if your panic didn’t move the bed enough for Rebecca to shift through the covers and moan out a few pleasant thoughts.

“Rebecca?!”

“CJay” she softly cooed “I can barely move as is.”

What followed was a series of gasps and Three Stoogian noises that could almost pass for an actual comprehensible language for a Looney Toon, if you could first figure out what was more shocking. That you actually wound up in this situation at all or if she actually just meant what she could have said.

“Well, I’m just gonna have to roll to the next table and I don’t care who can see~”

Your heart began to slow down as the bloated girl began to try swallowing an arguably small enough to manage pillow in her sleep.

Okay, so one of your best friends sounds like she’s having a very *odd* dream about you. She’s sleeping in your bed, in her skivvies, and very obviously fantasizing about you. Maybe, just maybe, you can lock the door and crawl under the bed and this can just eventually deescalate into something resembling normality.

That can happen, right?!

Unfortunately, a refined series of heavy footsteps stopped at your door before making a very ladylike knock and ring of the buzzer. “CJ, could I please speak to you for a moment?”

No, of course it can’t!

Dalton could only assume the sort of corporal punishment CLAIRE ALONE would inflict if she even saw one pale quiver of the now small planetoid shape of Rebecca’s groaning gut, parked on your bed in the most damning way possible, while her sleep eating urges were trying to deal with the paradox of somehow being unimaginably full well before she was in a deep slumber. Some sort of ancient vault of the Masters Family’s favorite torture tools throughout the ages that would put Vlad Tempest and Mary, Queen of Scots to shame in how vicious they were; A combination of a rack, a force feeding device and guillotine for your di…”Can I please not scare myself into a nervous breakdown?” You whispered under your breath as you shook the more useless ideas out of your head.

“Just a second” you tried to reassure the threat outside the door as you clumsily tripped over an apocalyptic wasteland of wrappers, packaging and plates oddly littered around your floor.

The Masters Heiress grew more worried as she heard the racket and slightly audible swears her hopeful husband to be was making on his way to answer her. “Is this a bad time, I don’t want to bother you or anything” speaking in an uncharacteristically sheepish way.

“No, everything’s fine!” You immediately opened and slipped around the door closing it behind your back. “I’m here. Hello, Claire Masters. How are you?” You both shared a nervous smile briefly trying to suss each other out.
