Claire, eager to go first eventually spoke up. "Listen, I just want to apologize for how I acted earlier today". CJ's brow raised further as she continued on talking "I didn't think you were against the way our relationship went and -- if I've hurt you or displeased you in anyway - please, tell me and let me try and make it better". You weren't sure if this was some sort of trick or if you fell into some Bizarro World, but you didn't have the chance to find out more before Rebecca made a very loud ruckus attempting to forage whatever she could find.

"What was that?" Claire's tone became much more forceful and familiar, much to your dismay. "OH THAT, its just a movie I had on because -- uh -- I kind of had an accident today and I think I went home early".

Claire's overtly maternal side cranked up to 11 as she rushed to hold -- or maybe that should be squeeze her man in her soft embrace. "What?! When was this and why was I NOT INFORMED OF IT AS SOON AS IT TRANSPIRED?!" She blushed both at the feeling of both you and her extra flesh pushing up against one another and as you attempted to worm out of her arms for the air to speak. "I don't know" CJ honestly tried to piece together anything that happened since head injury "Last thing I know is I got hurt, I was eventually told of it and now I'm at my dorm. I thought everyone would know everything about me as usual right now".

"Oh, CJ" Claire carefully considered her options as she pressed CJ in deeper. "You were acting strange only because you got hurt?"

"I guess" CJ muttered out, unsure of what she was going on about.

"Well, I'd still like to apologize for any undo stress I may have caused you, CJ" she diplomatically stated as she let go "I always like spending more time with you anyway, so I wish to invite you over to my estate for the evening all the same".

"Sure, yeah, that sounds great" you desperately try to end the conversation so that Claire would leave your flat. "When should I come by?"

"After the last bell, of course". Tapping her watch, she smiled a proper and self-satisfied grin "We must always be good students at this Academy and it would not do for me to let you spoil yourself the wrong way". As she began to make her way to the dorm elevator, you waited until her face was was finally concealed by posh elevator doors before you quickly rushed to your bed to see if Rebecca was still there. Somehow, however, a very large girl friend just escaped your room without a trace.

What were you going to do now, genius?
11132222112112.title: Relax! It's only the door. But....is that C...

choices: Mix buisness with pleasure, but stick to your goal.
Go wild with Jessica Masters.
111322221121121.content:
You waste a fruitless half hour trying figure out the trick Rebecca Houdini pulled in smuggling some possible 300+ pounds out of your room with neither you nor her Highness ever noticing. Either one of your paranoid fears was true and she somehow Danger prone Daphned her way down a stereotypical Mystery Novel secret passage way the Masters or whomever likely put to your room, the vents of the Chubbesco dorms were big enough to squeeze prize hogs through or she basically waddled down the fire escape in her sleep. Whatever it was, as much as you worried about what kind of nonsense a newly discovered somnambulist could unintentionally wander into, sadly, that wasn’t the most pressing issue on your mind. You just gave your word to Claire Masters that you would meet her at her lavish abode this evening and she would be just as angry about you standing her up as if she discovered an almost naked woman on your bed. Hopefully, you can rush through her likely gigantic dinner or whatever it is and find Rebecca before she can hurt herself.

Of course, you’re not completely heartless. You try to text Kate, Bunnie and Ms. Young hoping they can handle the search for you, but sadly only the staff responds with an assurance they’ll help. Kate, for some reason, is still out cold and hasn’t been on for hours. Not even a dumb emoticon from her. When Rebecca’s squared, you should probably make sure she didn’t get stuck in bathroom trying to hide from a crowd or something.

You fret over whether or not dressing up will matter, but depending on how much food is in your future - "and that always seems to be the only thing on Clarie's mind" you grumble out loud, you'll only end up ruining another dress jacket trying to be nice. Maybe you should finally just tell her no. Maybe.,,

BRRRANG GOES THE EVENING BELL

Maybe you should just sit this one out and let me fix our life.

Stepping into the custom bathroom that is still 10 sizes too big for you, you gaze deeply into the wall sized framed mirror. As your eyes focus, the sleepy and gentile hooded gaze of the idiot sharpens into a calm glare. Your thick s curved brow easily gives off the impression that you're constantly angry and you can appreciate that. After cleaning your teeth with brush, floss and mouthwash, you hold your chin to look at the wild growth of puberty on your face. "Does pantywaist even shave this peach-fuzz? He isn't old enough to pull off a five o clock shadow right". You make quick work with the electric razor, but have trouble trimming some areas around and under your neck due to your weaker self's eating habits forming the basis of double chin.

Next you bathe and you growl at the crap CJ uses. His unique position as a boy in a girl's school meant that many of the onsite facilities, necessities and even some of the outer Lethargis Town goods cater to a heavy female population and in more ways than one. Good for whatever you could need to fulfill the pleasures of your many lady friends, but not exactly equipped for what a boy of age really needs to strut his stuff. Aftershave, body wash, fashion that you pick out and not whatever your girlfriend thinks will look cute on you at the moment. Hell, most of the soap and shampoo he picked out he probably bogarted out from Rebby or Kitty's rooms. Lilac body oils? Does he have no pride or even personal taste? You know damn well that a good seasonal sent for women to smell right now is Cinnamon and Pomegranate. Looks like you need to talk to the Masters about your shipping needs as well as settle your personal business with them. They gave you a personal line of credit for this exact reason, but they tend to favor its use solely on food, snacks and stuffing for "growing" boys.

If you're going to get fat you're going to do it of your own will and desire, not because someone wants to creepily groom you for the family.

You start to put on a nice Chubbeso Varsity Jacket along with whatever you felt like wearing when little miss Masters gave you a ring. "CJ, I hope you didn't forget our little date tonight", came from a relaxed sense of dominance. It'd be cute if she wasn't so used to getting whatever she wanted. "I assume I have a ride arranged", you coldly ask, testing the waters of how best to twist her around your finger for a change. "Indeed I did" overtly smug about everything proceeding exactly how she planned, "our outings should be extravagant and sophisticated, as is custom for a Masters". "Then I'll see you soon", you curtly state. "Wait, I haven't told you about what tonight will-- " you end the call and turn off your smartphone, making sure to grab and pocket a pair of earbuds to block out any unwanted changes.

As you proceed down the lobby, you notice a few turned heads of the rank and file Chubbeso grounds keepers and free to stalk students enjoying your usually sharp attire.Tucked in dress shirts and clean pressed pants. Their boy calls weren't insulting but you had much more bigger fish to go after tonight.

Abida Idhar, the desert jewel of an assistant of the Masters waited at a very modified for carry-weight Hummer V2 Limousine. Usually she wasn't there for Claire and almost exclusively acted as the extra hands of only one woman. The riding window slid down to reveal none other than Mother Dearest herself, "Oh young mister Dalton", Jessica Masters' thick fingers beckons out to you "would you please be my riding companion for a moment?"

"With pleasure, ma'am", you politely respond, as Idhar opens the door for you to have a seat right next to the beyond rubenesque beauty.

She wrapped a massive arm around your shoulder "Oh CJ, please, such formalities shouldn't come between us", her breath was sweet and strong with a mixture of what you assumed was the result of the wine bottles and chocolates stocked around the several bars and delicacy assortments she had already tore into to keep her figure as full as it aught to be. You grab hold of her other wicked hand and looked into her demure yet commanding eyes, "it'd just break my heart if I didn't show you the proper respect every woman deserves, ma'am. Mother's orders". Her smile widened as her full and slightly stained cheeks parted, "Oh my, you've never been this playful before". "Whatever shall I tell my husband if he were to see us like this" she said as wrapped both her arms and drew her lips very close to yours.

"That he is a fool for leaving a woman like you unfulfilled for even a moment".

Your thoughts become less focused as you begin to imagine the things you could do with a woman like Mrs. Masters. Time has taken nothing from her, she has only enjoyed herself and grown more lovely by her own desire. She took her time popping strange chocolate into her mouth, making sure you watched everything go down at a steady pace. Their allure was almost as strong as her own. The black silk of her Two-Piece Custom Embellished suit and skirt could barely contain her, much less buckler her jacket together anymore. One good meal and she could be exposed just for you, and her appetite was making it easier and easier the longer you took her in.

Either she wanted to make you hungry enough to join her or hungry enough for her. Honestly, both wouldn't be bad things to engage in.

However, you also made a promise to someone. it wouldn't be right to have fun with Mrs. Masters now, as inviting as she is, before you keep your word with Rebecca.
111322221121121.title: Accept Claire's invitation to a Masters Tur...

choices: Eat a little, but divert majority of the feast into Claire.
Let Claire have her fun.
1113222211211211.content:
You decide it was easier to still play along, but making a bold move of your own may either cause her to back down or give you some breathing room to concentrate on your promise before you lose yourself to raw passion. So you close the several milometer gap between your lips and kiss Mrs. Masters right then and there. And it wasn't any sugar you'd regulate for family or some quick peck on the cheek. You surprise yourself and apparently even Jessica by how curious your tongue was touching hers. How your hand somehow found its way traveling around the matured crevices of her body.

However, when she closed her deep blue eyes, she took the lead harder than you for a few minutes and reciprocated your affections, and still far beyond your ability to discern whether this was truly genuine or if she was playing a much more dangerous game with you. She seemed to show you how to better move your body and fingers without saying a word, guiding you further across her vast tracks of land while her tremendous thighs explored your legs and seemed to lock around you every now and again. The pressures her overwhelming extra weight pushed upon your frame was exhilarating, if not curious as to whether Mrs. Masters ever studied any sort of yoga or martial art with how she could apply it even at her size.

When your session was over she gave you a comforting gentile smile before the a very rambunctious voice echoed from the speakers in the center of the passenger lounge "I don't know who to call the dog this time, the boy or you, you saucy old cow". You both turned to see a live video screen where a more noticeably drunk and somewhat blushing Professor Jen Telleri of the Chubbeso Culinary class apparently witnessed the show you and Mrs. Masters put on. "Looks like I won the bet this time" the Masters Matriarch's belly laugh was deep and whimsical, even as she quickly clung to you and allowed you to feel how much she could jiggle just from speaking "I finally got CJ to show the caliber of man he could grow to be. I expect our agreed upon payment to be in prime condition and in heavy quantity".

"Like you need any more Hans&Gretta clogging up what's left of your arteries" Telleri snorted as she inhaled an entire bag of H&G chocolate balls between her taunts "or making you even more fatter than all hell". They both started to laugh like like gossiping school girls when Jessica came back at the lazy cook her with her claws "Turn on your monitor before you fling insults. I'm the one wants to weigh a metric ton, remember, you sagging bitch?"

Feigning regret, you interrupt the old couple. "Aw, so all of this was a set up for a wager?"

"Oh my sweet little man", she practically pushed your head deep into her cavernous bosom "our love is very real. But we were just having a boring little conference chat and then I heard you actually set up a date with my little Claire, so I had to come see you and give a little push if you needed it". Not resisting her will for you to rest on her comfortable breasts and belly, her fox like grin bore her sweet fangs. "But then the CJ I met tonight was so very different than the boy my child rightly claimed as hers. Telly though you'd just be too bashful even to hug your poor old mommy-in-law, and yet here you are, suave as the devil himself and still skinny as a rail".

"I thought I made a safe bet on you, Mr. Dalton" Mrs Telleri joined in on the teasing "and now I have to lose half my month's reserve because you had the gall to kiss your headmistress in front of a live camera". "This could be grounds for a very severe punishment."

A thick hand gently pulled your chin up to look at her more openly Inquisitive gaze. "Who is this strange, yet interesting dark horse in my academy and where could you have spirited our CJ away to, I wonder" she asks in a way too coy to tell if she's already onto you or just having fun.

Picking up pieces of the many almost empty chocolate assortments around the two of you, J.C. nimbly begins to pop them into Mrs Masters' many chinned maw. The first once again caught her unaware, but a shameless glutton like Jessica Masters never turned down any morsel of food offered to her ever expanding temple of indulgence. "I guess you finally broke me down. Your charms just too great to resist any longer". The more she allowed you to feed her, the more you felt the culinary chef, and even your driver, Abida, watch your actions very carefully. However, while you could hope that maybe there was some interest from Telleri, the pure hatred angled at you from the rear-view mirror didn't need to be mentioned.

You then see if Mrs Masters would follow your hands if there were these special chocolates involved, and amazingly, she followed your hand like a very obedient (and obese) pet waiting for her treats.

"Ma'am", you begin as you test this obedience further, "could I trouble you to purchase a few odds and ends for me? I promise I won't ask the Taj Mahal of you". She only responds in gulps and moans, but she appears to be listening. "I'm afraid my current attire and necessities aren't befitting of a potential Masters beau", Jessica makes a long mouthful noise and nods her head "and it isn't just extra nutrition".

She opens her eyes for a bit and gives you a curious "mmpfh" as you keep helping her finish her car snacks before her more fitting dinners at the manor. "While I may have difficulty in showing my appreciation for you concerns on my diet, there is more to a man's life than eating. Claire deserves me to be in the latest fashions, the best products, like say a cologne modeled after these chocolate you love so much". Mrs Masters seems to salivate through her already stuffed cheeks at this particular idea and nods before she swallows.

"What a caring young man you are; I'm so very sorry we didn't consider ALL your potential needs may be different than our usual students". Jessica tries to turn this into her idea, but she still seems very pliable and eager for more chocolates as soon as she hears you tear open a fresh box. "Even though you likely were the reason I was enrolled, I don't blame you being unprepared for a boy at a girl's school" you lovingly rub her more open gut as some buttons finally begin to fly off at Telleri's screen and all over the car "accidents happen".

"Careful old girl" Telleri mocks as she writes some notes down "any more to this and I may want to steal him for myself". "Like you'd ever eat enough to woo a stud like CJ", the Matriarch somehow manages to say in a way everyone could comprehend with her mouth practically glued shut with chocolate pulp. "At least then I'd get something out of the figure you ruined by giving me this job" the chef huffed. Jessica viciously pantomimed a crying baby with her hands and moans as you continued to feed her.

"I also have a special request that I need to speak with you alone about tonight" almost running out of ammunition, you try to leave her wondering and interested to hear the rest. "Sure dearest" Mrs Masters playfully winks at you as you arrive at her oh so humble abode "I'd love to continue our conversation, and maybe even continue where we left off in a much more personal environment". As you step out into the courtyard, you hear a very obvious shredding noise as you almost catch enough of a glimpse of the likely cause before Abida triggers the automatic door to shut you out. The window lowers just enough for you to see Jessica Masters barely covering herself. "Too bad, I'm sure you'd love to see this" you smile your own wolfish grin as she continues "and maybe you'll even get to know me with nothing to hide later in my room. AFTER dinner and your play date with Claire, of course".

Her stretch hummer slowly rolls to the back entrance of the Manor while you are escorted by legion of fat maids, each bulging from their proper garb and longingly looking at you while maintaining their professional stance as respectful servants - at least for now anyway. On in particular dark skinned beauty catches your attention before you finally make your way to the front door. It opens to reveal Claire dressed in a fetching green dining gown. The natural Irish emeralds that flowed around her wide hips and stomach perfectly accentuated her size as they shined in the pale moonlight.

She tried to begin a likely prepared speech to greet you, but you cut her off with honest flattery. "You are really beautiful in that dress" you let out a short whistle as you make a quick walk around her "and here I am barely in a presentable jacket. Sorry Claire".

When you lock eyes with her, she seems to get even more subdued and embarrassed. "W-well, thank you for noticing CJ" she blurted out as she twiddled with her finger around one her freshly tussled waves of long hair "I wanted to wait until the Summer Festival before I got you a fetching gentleman's wear, but I suppose I put it off too long. It isn't your fault at all". As she tries to avoid eye contact, you wonder if she already knows the difference between how you look at her and how dipshit does. Cunning as her mother and just as gorgeous.

Your own slight paunch begins to growl and her eager ears quickly picks it up. "R-ready for dinner already, I see". She doesn't hide her desires, she just needs to learn how to compromise and get consent instead of demand it.

Well, you are hungry. Maybe you should let her have her fun. But then again, you always wanted to turn the tables and stuff her for a change.
1113222211211211.title: Buisness and Pleasure.

choices: Go easy on her, popping the princess could hinder further Jessica manipulation.
If she wants it hard, make her wide even if it hurts.
11132222112112111.content:
To say that the décor of the Masters Mansion was obsessed with adipose was the understatement of several centuries the house has stood and grown in influence. While the occasional life size scale Venus Figure or polished marble statue dotted the many gardens occasionally skirted the line between Neoclassical Greco-Roman style through the artistic whims of a Masters’ fancy and common decency -- with the possibility that some were so round, you weren’t sure how much was actually carved so much as they found a reasonably rotund stone and simply chiseled a familiar face on it; the inside was a constant barrage of fat. From the help to the very walls and foundations, there was no escape from a pride that reveled in its own largeness.

The walls and pathways all displayed stone reliefs of very plump people gorging themselves, engaging in sedentary activities or even making love depending on where they lead to. Every portrait on display always depicted someone beyond obese that couldn’t entirely fit more than their face in focus of the picture, though they all had their own distinct personalities. Even the gold-leaf railing that helped the much too stout to walk around the estate curved into humanoid and much more ancient depictions.

Not too gauche of a design, but you knew why weakling didn’t want to step in here unprotected. Everything about this place felt like it wanted to seduce you to consume until you could never leave.

The main lobby that took you in after you stepped into the Versailles of Lethargis comprised of a decadent atrium that illuminated the halls more with the light of the sun and moon than modern electricity, although there were of course secondary and emergency lighting wired. It gave the chamber a wonderful sense of mood that only intensified Claire’s barely held in excitement that you were finally here, in her own home and even on a real dinner date. Like a small child with a new toy she was eager to feed you, but you had other plans for her..

A reinforced mahogany and redwood table stretched about 20 feet long and 7 foot wide, with some chairs so thick it could take several strong men to push, yet some of the maids seemed to have brushed them off easily to make room for you and Claire to sit right next to each other in front of a mountain of food. You were to be positioned by the fire place, with adequate room to lay on extravagantly soft carpets in case you likely couldn't sit any longer and needed a full stomach massage. You made sure to sit Claire down first as the nice thing to do and then took a few bites of soy sauce and garlic roast duck.

"Do you like it", the heavy heiress asked while dreaming of a fatter you with each swallow. "Tender and juicy, but not too sweet nor sour", you calmly imitate a food critic without trying to act like you knew any terminology to throw about "did you prepare this, Claire?"

She turned a deep crimson at idea of being your personal cook "No, silly, I'm no where near ready to give you the banquets you need -- I mean, lunches I would like to make for you". You manage to pick most of the plate clean before you decide to edge the conversation towards an opening. You stick the last bit of meat on your fork and look at it, waiting for Claire to get interested, which doesn't take half of 10 seconds with how she practically scooted so close to you her much more broader love handles were touching your own. "W-what's wrong CJ" her concern wasn't entirely from lust, but you couldn't blame a girl for liking them large. "Is there something wrong with the food? Should I get something else for you?"

This piece seems a little hot, you nonchalantly lie would you mind blowing on it for me?"

"Anything for my CJ" she nervously agrees. As she arcs her head near your hands and you softly shove it into her mouth. "Cjgey, wah" you don't allow her to talk as you snap your fingers and the maids mechanically serve another plate for you to shove into Claire. They were trained for their speed and it showed with how much of a "portion" they could swiftly pile onto the fine china. She already wolfed down three full Baguette loafs, 30 stuffed oysters, a full roasted quail, five entire trays of chocolate Yorkshire Pudding (one of her many sweet weaknesses) and 10 plates of her favorite marbled Beef Bourguignon slathered in pork lardons. This was what she could finish in the time it took you savor one duck half the size of a football (the soccer kind, you Yankee), and it didn't even phase her. However, poor Claire chewed and polished off what you gave her, but you could see she wasn't lost on why you were doing this so much as how she felt.

You really are a greedy little pig, your tone was harsh but you weren't looking to bully the Princess. She bit her lip as you rolled a ridiculously large lump of Squid Ink Tagliatelle pasta. In you or in her, both options were exciting Claire into a heavy breath. She opened wide only when your hand moved to her face and she was far too much of a glutton to take her time with the flavor. "CJ, you really should try some of this with me" her highness hoped she could regain the plan of eventual mutual fattening only on her terms, but you weren't having any more of it.

Taking one of the 20 porcelain gravy boats, you hold her double chin as you pour it all down her gullet slowly. "For an entire year, you and your mother have orchestrated every opportunity you could to force feed me as fat as humanly possible". As soon as the first one is finished you violently hurl the boat to a wall, scaring everyone else in the room even when a heaver maid manages to catch it in time. "I am hounded by growing mob of crazed teenagers every day, that I know you were not only the founding member of their little CJ FAN CLUB, but you have increasingly led them to become more fanatical in their devotion to making me fatter for you AGAINST MY OWN WILL".

A bitter anger erupts as the saucers become quicker, and your voice echoes out from the halls while Claire continues to drink it down in a combination of fear and exhilaration. "You lie to my face, turn even my own friends into pawns to stuff me, grab my life by the throat and drag it into the kitchen, a sumo ring or some other dumb food focused thing!" Your ranting knocks around confections and silverware, some even the help can't get in time, while Claire is now down on her hands and knees. She looks up to see a wrathful CJ and doesn't know what to do except continue to quietly listen as you even stop feeding her.

"BUT YOU WANT TO KNOW WHAT UPSETS ME THE MOST?" you roar out as she meekly asked "what" in a mousey tone. "YOU NEVER--" you sigh as you try to compose yourself. "You never just come out and tell me how you really feel. I know I'm guilty of this too, but it just INFURIATES me to no end how you keep this all a stupid game of tricks and deception instead of just laying out a clear "I get hot at the idea of both of us being the fattest fucks on earth" and then try to date me like a normal human being". Claire gets up to try and hug you but you turn to hold her corpulent arms and look her in the eye "I am sick of these power games, Claire Masters. This - is - not - love!"

"B-but" the Princess interjects "but I -- I kind of" playing with her hair she trails off trying not to cry. "But you actually like this weird little game of ours. You don't just enjoy the weight gain, but also these power-plays and the nonsense it can become". You flatly snark and put your hand on your head as Claire nods. "At first I didn't know how to even introduce myself to you, let alone how to say anything" she sniffs and you hug her back knowing damn well this is your fault. "Mother raised me to love food and what it does to our bodies, and I do. But it isn't because of silly tradition, you know". She smiles as she pats and pokes the fluffy ends of her form "I enjoy being like this and becoming wider and heavier every day, not just for my own naughty pleasures - but to please you". "When I saw you for the first time, I just knew we were two of a kind -- at least in certain ways" you wipe the tears from her chubby face. "But then I didn't know if you felt the same way I do about being fat, and I got scared that maybe we couldn't be together because we weren't the same after all. So I -- I'm sorry, CJ".

You absolutely hated women being driven to tears, especially if you were what made them upset. "Let's just start over from a clean slate here" Claire hugged tighter as you tried to make it better for both of you. "Claire, I really don't care that much about being fat. I like you. I'd love to help you enjoy being as big and as beautiful as you want to be, and we could work something out about how big both of us are if you actually try to have a real relationship with me". You make sure she hears this part as clear as she can, "And a real relationship involves give and take. If I'm going to be fat, I want it to be on my own terms. Okay?"

"Agreed" Claire sniffed as nuzzled your chubby chest. "And if I am going to bulk up, I want your mother to give me access to Silverfish exercise equipment and trainers. I want a lot of core strength to be able to enjoy being fat. To dance, go places and do things with whoever I end up with, even you, to keep life fun." Claire once again bit her lip imagining a new herculean you and considered her options. "Okay, I'm not sure if I'll like the end result" she steps away and playfully puts her hands on her hips "but supporting you as you meet me half way could be fun - for a while."

"But I have my own conditions too" Claire held up a chubby finger and prodded your belly "I'm going to continue our game, and I want you to occasionally feed me. Harder and fuller than anyone else. Starting now!"
11132222112112111.title: What goes around, will become round.

Take Claire to her bedroom to make sure she okay before you leave.
111322221121121112.content:
Your unpracticed cool momentarily cracks as you worry about pushing anything far enough to cause pain. “ You want me{/b]” you stretch your arms and relax your back muscles preparing yourself for a girl like Claire “{b]to make it hurt?

She tut-tuts with one chubby hand while the other strikes her already noticeably occupied and lard blanketed stomach like a full-body drum. “I am Claire Masters; I do not accept limitations with my appetite.” Of course, being an adorkable little perfectionist she strangely fights the very aroused look she triggers seemingly by only touching her taught and soon to be further stretched gut. Still, Claire stands adamant about how this will go. “All the same, Supergirl, I’d be a lot more comfortable if you gave me some sort of safe word or time out trigger as fattening you is all fun and good unless it ruptures something.”

The Princess projects a very high class laugh you thought only existed in anime. “As cute as your needless concern is, CJ, no mere morsel will stop me and I simply must crush all competition for you.” “This is about what I did with Kate” you ask an assured rhetorical question as Claire’s eyes light up with competitive spirit as well as careless voracity. “While I am overjoyed you finally admitted your love for a healthy sized woman I knew was within you”, she makes a brief imitation of both your particular speaking pattern and her mother in likely knowing you’re not exactly him, but being a tease about it; “I must step up my efforts to win your heart - both in my increased consumption, and now in your direct involvement of it.”

She had a very regal pout on her face as she folded her arms between her ample chest and the upper folds of her middle. Claire clearly had deeper questions to ask, but she either wasn’t ready to speak them or wasn’t sure she had a right to bring them up. “You wished for our relationship to be more open and thus I’ve made my demands in a clear manner. Will you accept my terms, CJ?”

You repress the urge to mock her incessant need for formality and grandiose flair about everything in the hopes of finally getting this show on the road. “Very well” you sigh as you take off your jacket and unbutton your slightly tight dress shirt, “let’s see how much you can handle.”

The maids had already apparently restocked the table and rearranged the room before you had the thought to ask. The well-fed machine of the Masters had no difficulty in falling in line under your specifics without being told anything, which you assume was another over calculation of Claire studying the footage of your Cafeteria Incident in preparation of monopolizing your time.

When you began the assault with high calorie Haute French cuisine, with, of course, proportions big enough to choke an elephant with how much they followed the Chubbeso Theoretical Gastronomy of More is More; your black and white forces made sure to pass you a fine balance between an abundance of meat, salads with enough sauce to guarantee possibly 2 pounds with every serving and a seemingly endless supply of creams of everything. The Alastian Baeckeoffe was like a 5 star Turducket in how the potatoes, carrots, marjoram and other herbs and vegetables were all separately stuffed and flavored on the individual layers of fried pork, beef and lamb like a plump pyramid that challenged the edges of the trays to hold it in before either they broke under the weight of the food or Claire practically ripped them open with her eagerness to eat. She was always quicker than gravity, although sometimes the heiress simply sucked the layers out like an obese vampire on a chunky oyster.

When Claire cleaned France from the table she was already past having trouble breathing and became finicky when you offered any sort of massage instead of just tearing the seams her bloating gut was already making in her dress wider to offer less restriction. “Whatever will I do when I am in nothing but my lingerie, CJ?” Her face became a thicker shade of red as time went on, but you weren’t sure if it was just how risqué this was or if she was also becoming tipsy from the amount of alcohol used in the collective dinner for 8 normal people she’d inhaled. “Assuming you don’t bust out of those as well, I’d need to rub your whole stomach to relieve the stress you keep pretending you’re not feeling”, you flatly snide more out of care for her well-being than anything else. Her fatness enters a cute loop of repeating “I keep telling you I’m –urp” before she finally manages a frail “ine” after a particularly long belch. You had already managed to get her on her back next to the fire place, but she only accepted this position “for the wonderful view” more than admitting she wasn’t invincible.

Picking up from the remaining Valley of Deserts, you grab one of the whole Jellied Eels and in hold it in front of Claire. “If you can eat this as quickly as before” you harshly chide “then I’ll stop bringing it up. However, if you show any sign of being too full, I’m going to roll your rolls no matter how much it tickles.” You don’t move your hand at all; Claire has to pick herself up from her already beached position to eat it on her own. The less huge mistress struggles to first rise up on her hands and shift the cargo in her belly enough to sit on her wide bottom. It frustrates you how much Claire puts herself through just to act like nothing’s wrong.

“I’m – hic – almost there” she weakly pants between more hiccups and burps “n-no need to worry, C-erp- J.”

She proceeds to slowly suck the soft, yet firm jelly out of your hand, working on the long edges of the head and the tail that were easiest to reach without much effort on her part. Moving at a glacial pace from those shafts, Claire begins to lick upwards and outwards making a mess out of her face and what was left of her top. "You seem to be getting more on you than in you, Princess." She licks her lips and lowers her lashes into an unintentional bedroom gaze "a momentary - hurp - stay of execution." Her neck widens further like a snake as she attempts to swallow some of the pieces down whole, delicately lowering it down into the gurgling expanse of her too overcrowded belly. You should be stopping this now, but Claire's determination convinces to let her finish her grueling ordeal before you punish her. When there is nothing left but what you cradled in your hand, you open it up to allow her highness to complete her mission. Wobbling on her dimpled knees and thunderous thighs, Claire enjoys putting your jellied caked fingers into her mouth. The feel of her greedy tongue gathering everything they could from the contorts and slight roundness of your palms, around the lower to upper phalanxes, to the sensitive tips of your digits. Claire liked making this as foreplay-like as possible and that was fine with you.

When the last trace of the original globs on your fingers were gone, you wiped the mess from Claire's face which let the princess have another small encore with your right hand. "S-see? All clean and - burap - inside me." Claire gently falls on her back with a heavy thud, her entire body jiggling as it absorbed the impact and let her moan and breathe handling her gut without being able to lift her hands from being so full and exhausted. "It took you twenty minutes", you growl as you look down on the last remnants of her evening gown finally snapping off to show her custom black silk lingerie snugly holding back the rest of her, "to eat one eel."

"I - hicm - sorry" she meekly wheezes out trying to digest. "No, I'm sorry I let you hurt yourself" you yell "and now I'm going to help you feel better whether you like it or not, Claire!"

Before she can even burp out a desist, you touch her taught pale dome of a belly and Claire screams. "What?! Is it worse than I thought?!" "N-no, CJ -- I -- oh god--" she moans in joy as you try to broadly stroke the front of her gut "I'm such a naughty whale!"

And then you stop because you are all sorts of confused.

Waiting for her to breathe and relive herself of digestive pain, and whatever that kind of eroticism came from, Claire cools down enough to explain herself. "S-sorry CJ, I didn't want to - hic- tell you I get very, well, 'sensitive', when I eat a lot even for me." "And what the hell was I supposed to do, wait you out or let you cause yourself some internal injury? What did I say about being open with me and why didn't you tell me this before we began?!" Even you being angry with her didn't stop her from moaning out a bit more before she continued, "I told you - urp - I am a naughty girl that really likes being fat". You gave her an ugly look as she tried to laugh without setting off the critical nuclear reactor that was her digestive tract. "Okay, I'm very s-sorry. I just - hic - wasn't ready to let you know. I was afraid that you'd use that sort of information against me."

You cannot grasp how aggravated and confused you are at that sort of answer. "In what conspiracy world do you live in where I'd abuse the fact your whole body apparently is an erogenous zone when you overeat?" She sheepishly bit her lip, "its one of my favorite dreams involving you." You sigh as you rub your head trying to solve the headache that could be this girl. "Goddamn it, Claire. What am I going to do with you?"

"W-well, if you don't mind me yelling some silly things between burps", she gave you a mischievous grin as she slowly put her hands around her mountain of a middle, "would you please be a gentleman and help me finish dinner?" "Not big enough?" you jokingly sigh. She winks, "There is no such thing. Claire Masters always finishes everything at the table. It is the only way to become a Supermassive black hole for you."
111322221121121112.title: Tryhard Gaining

choices: Your earbuds buy you more time and you make your midnight meeting.
It doesn't block out the clock and CJ awakens over a fat and amorous Claire.
1113222211211211122.content:
"Let's just get you safely full before you move on to becoming an all-consuming object so massive that your light crushing gravity can gather and trap matter to give birth to a galaxy." The Princess takes the moment to savor a musing you could only guess was either her or you actually reaching that level of omnipotent indulgence. "I never knew how erotic science could be until you came along, CJ Sagan", Claire dryly cracks, "would you mind repeating that for a recording?"

As much fun as you have been having with your fat obsessed wannabe wife, however, the night was not infinite and you needed to assure that Mrs. Masters was on-board with your scheme or else you'd likely never be able to contact Sliverfish, use their materials and techniques or likely have the time to use them without some sort of overt sabotage. "Claire{/b]" you kneel down and successfully prop her up to a seating position again after putting enough effort into lifting her that much, "let's continue this some place more private." "Oh, um, I'm afraid that isn't possible." "Moving you somewhere or being alone?" The heir apparent grew rosier at the suggestion. "Oh my, I'm only sure of the second, but I'd love to try both - especially if I could trap you under my girth to make a universe of our own." After letting her finish another one of her giddy spells, the rotund blond draws circles in her flab as she explains. "One of mother's only rules is that the help is always there to treat guests and family. Never wavered on it and, frankly, I'd feel lost without the pampering even with you around to make it even better." Claire smiles as she has a thought, "Oh, CJ, would you mind visiting my room? I've always wanted to take you there and nibble with you."

The maids already start shifting the remaining food into elaborate cloche trays and chafing dishes, assuming you would take her up on this offer, so you went along with it in the hopes that you could pry further information before you stormed the matron's den. As you walked and Claire was carried on jewel encrusted litter throne that took at least 8 servants to move at a decent pace, their mistress certainly made them work for it as she devoured caramel lathered crepes, full cakes and a decadent chocolate baklava. Mostly on her own greedy insistence, but occasionally commanding them to lower her so she could either offer you some or let you offer it to her.

"Clare, do you mind me asking some hopefully not too personal questions?" "CJ, I'd happily tell you my measurements, but sadly, they keep changing every day so much that they're even a mystery to me" she teases shamelessly. You roll your eyes even if that information wouldn't be bad to personally learn every day, "Why would I ask that when I could always just measure you now?" Claire takes this suggestion to heart and has one of the serving girls squeeze measuring times into her schedule. "No, dummy, I meant what's the deal between you and Silverfish?"

"Aunt and Cousin Flounders..." she worryingly mutters "Oh, they're very odd but boring people. You wouldn't like them." "No really, what's their deal? I've heard there's some bad academy blood that people spread rumors about all the time about." Claire sulks her head into her several chins as she really wants to avoid this topic "could we please move to something else? Mother--" "Isn't here, Claire."

She grumbles more from being forced to talk than from the raw sugar being tossed into her exposed gut."Very well, Sonia Flounders and her daughters: Livia, Josephine, Himiko and little Zenobia; are either famished skeletons or muscle-bound neanderthals who are enslaved to a worship of exercise worse than anywhere else in the regular world. We only ever see each other on amicable terms when Grandmother wants to bring the whole family together, yet auntie always gets into a fight with mother over money, reputation, politics or just ceaselessly attacking our harmless hedonism." The Princess rips apart several thick bricks of pound cake to settle down, a sacrifice that seems in vain, even as her still sour face gets an unintentional powdered sugar grin.

"Do you really all hate each other that much?" Exasperated, yet slightly remorseful, Claire continues. "I honestly don't mind my distant cousins as they either are too afraid of upsetting that fascist of a parent by being near an unsolicited crumb without instantly losing their oh so important figures, or are precious darlings that want to be friends, but get ripped away in fear of a few cookies." Your interest is peaked at the idea of meeting them one day, you attempt to pry about the one she seems most favorable of. "I take it Zenobia was the friendly one?" "Zenny and I still keep in contact" the Masters faintly beams "she tells me sometimes she has to change server IDs to keep SF's regulations police from hitting her with a wasted time violation, but she hasn't changed much except threatening to steal you away if she ever visits." "Is there no one who you don't set up to go after me" you joke, trying to lift the mood and thankfully she starts to jiggle - er, giggle again. "Well I wouldn't dream of her missing the wedding, but its your own darn fault for being so -urp- handsome."

Zenobia sounds like a nice Plan B if the Headmistress denies out of principle because she really does absolutely despise this Sonia Flounders.

"Must you really involve them, CJ" Claire asks between bites of figgy pudding. You notice that almost all of her doggy banquet had disappeared into her before you even had a chance to feed it to her, "Weren't you going to involve me in your gluttony or having trouble holding what you already ate in?" The hiccup queen merely pats her upper belly fold, "a growing girl must eat when she can, CJ." "I doubt you will be getting up from wherever they drop you off tonight." You prod her belly button with a full index and middle finger and she squeals with delight. "As long as you're there, I don't care if they roll me out into Mother's personal garden and we sleep under the stars - I have the padding to keep us warm." Claire tussles your hair, enjoying the short moments she had left of being taller than you from the cramped comfort of her throne. "But I'll give you as many opportunities to help me eat as I can as a reward for being so much more amusing than before."

Finally reaching the Princess's room, you notice her section of the estate was made with the idea that a growing whale of wales wanted to gorge herself huge. "Its like a house within a house you let your voice echo to a similar open air glass roofing from the main, lobby illuminating the wide bed Claire Masters used to sleep. You felt the vibrations of Claire's landing and being helped to her feet "W-welcome to my room" she bashfully stated while relying on the maids to help keep her standing straight, "you're the only boy I've let in here." "And what will they say of this" you jeer as you put a hefty flank over your shoulder and help her wobble to the bed. "O-oh CJ" she flusters as she notices how much strain her weight is putting on you trying to move even this far. "I don't want you to h-hurt yourself being a gentleman like this. It's what the help is for!""Don't count on it," you wheeze, "this is part of the reason why I want to get strong. Besides, how else am I going to carry you to our bed if we get hitched?"

You can already feel her poor heart go into overdrive as Claire's luscious curves rise and fall in your grasp. "But" she fights the idea that you could make her kinks weirder "think of how time you'd have to waste just pumping iron or whatever those muscle lovers do. Wouldn't it get tedious instead of just lounging around and eating with me?"

"And if I eventually get bored and let myself go, all that muscle becomes a ton of fat and you win anyway." Its obvious this bomb hits her right in her dirty little pleasures because the Princess is frustrated in how she can't fight against either scenario. "Damn you and your sexy logic, CJ!"

Claire makes a jovial "timber" as you tip her over, she falls and impacts the bed hard enough to quiver out a large BURP that almost drowned out the creaks said furniture made over this abuse. You enjoy the show of her overstuffed body shaking itself back into a calm. Noticing some specialty cocoa butter and moisturizers, you decide to lather the heiress up as you defuse her obese mountain of a belly. She tries to negotiate out a simple "Try to be a little gentle at the start", but you interrupt her with a premature squirt of lavender creme from her lower belly up to the smaller hinterfolds around her left breast. If she already cries out in ecstasy even from that, Claire was a sensitive girl that needed a tender touch if you wanted to keep this from getting lewd.

Slowly making waves, up and down, from her hips to her chest; you follow the healed remains of stretch marks all across the top of her shivering belly peak, down her love handles and further out to almost every extra inch she gained. The Princess' reactions grew louder and more descriptive as you worked your way into covering every corner of her increasing beauty with an even coating. First only calling your name to beseeching any other otherworldly force that struck her synapses, Claire moved on to holding onto you and kissing your potbelly that she loved so much to moving on to your lips. "I'm - urp - glad you ate a little more with me", Claire moaned as she licked the sweat rolling down your torso, "I want more of you! Enough to cover the world in!"

But a sense of dread hits you as you notice the clock next to her night stand. I twas almost midnight, curfew bell was about to ring. You only had one chance to stay in control and this was as good as time as any to test if ear buds could block them out.
