11132222112112111221.content:
With one slippery hand you somehow turn on your phone, rush to your song list, crank up the volume and slap down random in the hopes that music would shield you from that troublesome bell. You successfully put both earplugs in just in time; however, Claire angrily drags you back down into her ravenous expanse for daring to ease up. You manage to only make out “I DIDN’T GIVE YOU PERMISION TO STOP” before your salvation begins to play. The irony of fate’s clichéd selection wasn’t lost on you as you cackle wildly to Queen’s Don’t Stop Me Now building up in your ear.

Tonight, you both were having a good time as every ounce of the young mistress’ corpulence came alive with your kneading caress. Everything else, even your current mission, swiftly lost importance as her pleading eyes, hungry for more, inverted your personal control. You were losing yourself in her ecstasy and you didn’t care.

Don’t stop me now, Time.

You looked back at the clock as little hands met at 12. Slowing down, you were actually scared you miscalculated this gamble. The tremors from the school bell several miles away still shook through your petrified gape noticeably enough to feel their particular vibrations in her flesh.

And yet, you remained at the helm.

You once again picked up steam, knowing that you were disappointing Claire losing momentum for no good reason. Shifting both trunk-like thighs as straight as her cuddly lard could jiggle itself into position, without the Princess wrapping them around your neck to push your in; you roll clumps of cocoa butter around her skin, from the slimmest to thickest part of her lazy fat legs. Her head cocks to the left as the rubbing descends further, taking your time lathering her hidden knee smuggled in folds and practically hugging her juicy flanks to make sure nothing escaped becoming moist. You cheekily lick, from the quivering overlap of flesh disputed between where her massive thighs end, up to her calf, just to set Claire off. Even you can hear the roaring scream of “Oh Please, Yes!” from the chorus of Freddie Mercury. Tasted like white chocolate and peaches.

And speaking of booty, it wouldn’t do to skip out this leg day without applying a healthy coating to her rump. You attempted to ask if she wanted you to explore her bottom, but she made no discernible attempt to communicate anything but give you eager looks and the body language of DO IT YOU NERD. So first, you prodded your fingertips around the already strained fabric of her size 53 panties to feel the kind of butt a Masters can craft sitting down and eating like a senseless hog all the time.

It was an immaculate Gluteus Maximus that was not too long or too wide to shift out of the shape of a giant heart symbol, and Claire made sure to wiggle it around all over your hands to feel the true heft of her hips. You playfully honk both of her lower spheres as you prop her pelvis against your stomach so you can have easy access to her back, while letting your wave evolve into a raunchier soft thrust against the bed without going too far.

God knows both of you probably want to break free to The Act, but no. No way. No stated and clear consent from the start, and every step of the way, till the very end? Not happening. It wouldn’t be fair to Claire.

The rub down that was going to accelerate her jiggling folds like a wild, yet stationary heifer grew from creaks and squeals from both Claire and the Masters custom mattress as you tested how much the latter could take of your collective weight. Her fatness at first wasn’t sure what kind of strange physics you were attempting to apply, but after you retreated back to her legs, and moved onto grabbing the side folds of her waist like reigns; Claire stood on her arms as best as she could and push a sideways cowgirl in sync with your own lurid movements. As you both picked up speed and ferocity, the more the bed shuttered and tore, back and forth, into once clean marble tiles of Claire’s room. Your pace, your actions, your sensitivity, even your own moaning was matching hers as your hands could barely hold onto the flabby Newton’s Cradle you turned her into. It didn’t help that poor piece of furniture that Lemmy Kilmister of Motörhead was growling out Overkill in your brain.

Until you were launched into her stuffed, warm mass after it finally gave up and broke underneath you two. Her welcoming safety cushion of a body jostled from the impact and tickled her fancy as Claire gently removed your earbuds, nibbled on your lobe and then quietly whispered “my turn” as she giggled while rolling on top of you. Her pressure ebbed and flowed from both of your lungs as much as the dominating bulk she held you under. You only had just enough room to inhale when she exhaled, only for her belly to drop back down and shove into your doughy frame when she felt like taking your breath away. “Wouldn’t it be nice to have some extra plush to press back with?” her tone was sweet, yet challenging. “No need to do anything but stay with me and be two hungry piggies together”, she arched her back, squeezing you further against the ground and her sloshing middle.

Her now unruly blond hair, run ragged by your actions and partially stained by her ceaseless consumption, turned white under the haunting glow of the moon. What little you could see, between desperately fighting for air and being lulled to sleep by the metronomic march of Claire Master’s expanding adipose, was eclipsed by the mistress’ vast shadow overlying you. A pressurized lock hissed as it released and obedient black and white hands assembled equipment that she wouldn’t let you see. The porcine cat rubbed and gyrated her hips, twisting and turning the obese knife as it cut into you. Both Heaven and Hell were extensions of her body.

In this moment, you were Claire’s plaything and prey.

“But instead, you wish to sweat and toil for fleeting muscles.” A Cheshire's stare pierced you with an all too familiar urge to give into passion, her wild face a reflection of yourself as much as her endless lust for plumping both of you up. In some ways, you two lunatics really were made for each other. “Well, come on, strong man” the mistress mocked as she slapped her girth just to hear you gasp, “I thought you were the powerful CJ!”

Gritting your teeth, you shove back against the unrelenting force of Claire Masters’ intemperance. Her eyes flushed and her burps returned as she enjoyed the feel of your struggle across the Princess’s bloated extent. “Regretting fe -urp- ding me now, CJ?” You’re too focused on getting her off you more than witty banter at this point, even if you try to smirk back. ”Because if a weakling like you can’t move me we–hic—ll“, she motioned her maids to corner you two, “what’s to stop me from just fattening you here and now to help pry yourself out?”

This wasn't going to end until she's stuffed you beyond the capacity to walk, much less leave whatever pampered prison Claire would keep you in. Tonight, or in some random encounters with you or nimrod, Claire Masters was never going to stop pushing this fatty fate onto you. But then again, what's the harm in seeking your own passions and at least giving Claire a fight?
11132222112112111221.title: Between a Gut and a Hard place.

choices: Jessica is prepared and ready for your little tricks.
Stuffed and cocky, you have the advantage over Mrs Masters.
111322221121121112211.content:
As strangely pleasant as this attention and situation could be, you weren’t in the mood to let Claire win this technically morning and wanted to move on. The first part of this Gordian Gut was shifting your legs out from under a tyrannous use of gravity. She’d positioned herself belly to belly on you, pressing down all over your anatomy in a strategically simple way, and yes, for certain parts this was particularly effective at getting the blood pumping. She titters as more of you squirms and snakes around her grumbling middle, glad you were going to play as much as hoping you’d give in. “Come on, big boy” the princess teased as chubby fingers pushed your cheeks together to form a ugly duck face “you only have maybe –opfh – excuse me, 5 minutes before my little surprise is ready to make you an even bigger boy.”

The remnants of the mattress springs were your surrogate voice as Claire dug in deeper with her gut, lowering her chest down to dangerously dangle a barely held in set of breasts right in front of your eyes, as they slowly rubbed up against you merely from her breathing. Even without the current use of your hands, it wouldn’t take much to pop that top. A simple shift of your face or even a slight jiggle from the Porcine Princess and her overripe melons would reveal what little wasn’t already obvious to you as inquiring pink areolas peeked across the shrinking border of her bra.

Claire enjoyed toying with your gaze as you secretly squeezed your legs into position thanks to the opening her forward tip gave you. “I don’t like sharing you, CJ”, finally bearing her fangs, you could sense the anger she saved for the parts of your social life that didn’t include her. “Not with Mother, those scrawny little fools I use as pawns”, she venomously spat through gritted teeth at the mere visualization of Rebecca, “and especially those low-born harlots you consider friends.”

The Mistress’ chubby arms reached as far as they could over the spilling folds of her inflated stomach to try and wrap you into her body as best as she could. “And when this new CJ bubbles out, starts making all the moves I’ve waited for MY Man to show me,” she huffed in a manner Pillsbury would have already melted into pure obedience to appease, but you were slightly enraptured by. “This other CJ, who I admit I like just as much, maybe even more than the original flavor, SHOWERS HIS AFFECTION ON THE WRONG WOMAN I JUST –“ Claire crushed with her weight and her words as the bloated vice came down around your chest and you couldn’t help but somehow enjoy being the meat of a flab sandwich.

Wrathful tears trickled down her folds, but some managed to drip onto your face. “CJ Dalton, you have no idea how barmy I am for you.” No shit? You could think, but had no intention to mouth out while Claire distracted herself in ranting. “If I have to take a forceful approach, here and now, to make sure you stay mine”, threatening while sniffling, she looked conflicted as a pair of mouth harnesses joined by a shared industrial tube descended, “know that I will never hurt you out of anger.”

Not exactly reassuring bedside manner, especially as she delicately tucked the harness meant for your mouth between her breasts and upper belly. “I was going to save this for something more special, but I just can’t help wanting to spoil you even with an early surprise gift!” Her Heftiness licked her lips as her hose end barely managed to wrap onto her face. Whatever dessert she was going to pump down your throat, she was eager to swallow it down with you. “Don’t worry, darling. I won’t let my boy pop – just maybe get too full to leave my room without assistance.” She yearned to make you helpless. If you’re going to do something, you better make your move before either of you becomes too big to budge.

Both of your knees created a wedge as they curled back to allow your feet to free your arms. When Claire finally caught onto your plan, she somehow both moaned and uncontrollably laughed from the extra tactile contact. “H-hey”, she gasped, “T-that’s not – oh my.“ Her hose fogged up between panting and attempting words as you mostly accidentally brushed around the underflap of rolls by the end of her stomach and what they could easily obscure around her hips as they traveling upwards. However, you are completely guilty of attempting to grab her porcelain belly, poking and rubbing around a deep bellybutton with your toes, before setting up your footing around her center. The Mistress’ composure stumbled back with a belch, yet Claire didn’t have the focus to pull through.

“CJ, it’ll be al-herk-ight”, fearing that she was moments away from choking; you needed to make this surgically precise. “This is my safeword, Claire”, you wheeze back with fresh oxygen while pushing with all your might, “GET OFF!”

With all your wimpy arms and legs, you manage to roll back princess onto her back and snap the tube off her cheeks before collapsing in exhaustion. If she had the intent to try again, you were completely defenseless to pull this miracle off a second time.

And yet, she only cradled you with her limbs. “I took this too far, didn’t I?” She quivered as you slowly confirmed between heavy breaths. “I’m sorry; I tend to lose myself to passion every now and again.” Still unable to fully raise your head, you unintentionally make her giggle as you speak through her belly fat, “You’re not the only one, sister.”

“As I said”, she proudly beamed as she stroked your hair, “two of a kind.”

“Hey – CJ”, her plump smile lowers into a serious sulk, “or whatever I call you.” You give the heiress your undivided attention as she tries to find the words to talk to another Dalton. “Did you mean what you said, y’know” she strains trying to finish the thought. “About loving Kate?” Claire nervously nods as she you pulls you in tighter, scared for the worst. “I do love Kate Granden. Platonically as friend I want to protect and aid whenever she wants my help. And as a woman I wouldn’t mind growing old with.” She looked too devastated by that statement to even cry, however, you, thankfully, can give her a truthful hope. “But the game is still in play, Princess. She immediately lights up, “w-what do you mean?” “You can’t change the past I’ve had with Rebecca or Kate. The time they’ve shared with me is always going to be there. But that doesn’t mean you can’t manipulate the future to win the war.” A devious little grin returns to her face at the use of those particular words, but it feels good to open up to Claire as your own identity and make her happy.

“You may regret being this honest with me, stranger.” She pulls you in with bedroom eyes you couldn’t tear yourself away from.

However, as an intercom rang out, a coy Mrs. Masters summoned you to her room. "Would a Mister Dalton please come see me in my office? I would hate having to give him a curfew violation -- unless it was a certain extracurricular activity under the supervision of one of his instructors."

"Aw", Claire put on the cutest pout, "over already? I was even going to ask if you wanted stay the night. And to go all the way." Dreading that neither of you were ready for that just yet, you nudge her chubby cheek with your own to distract her from that kind of serious step. "Sorry, babe. Not on the first date. She sticks out her tongue jokingly giving a raspberry before embracing you again.

“Well, fine. I’ll just be here, all alone, with my bedtime snacks, thinking of you, while Mother steals you away from me.” Crazy Girl isn’t as convincing with her sarcasm as she usually is, but once she can walk again, Princess is going to be fatter and hungrier for you or doofus come the morning. “Sam, Christine and Margie”, three distinct maids immediately bowed in front of the two of you, “Please escort Mister Dalton to wherever Mother’s wedged herself into for the night.” And before you even realize they’ve stood you on your feet, they all say “Yes, Miss Claire” in perfect harmony as they walk you towards the door.

They have names? And can talk?! Will wonders never cease?

“Oh yes, stranger, you still want to seek out this muscle-bound madness?” Barely able to see Claire’s messy curls, much less her stuffed face over her gurgling middle, you answer back “You better believe it.” She hiccups while wagging a finger to dark corner around a full scale kitchen and clothing department of a wardrobe behind her, “Sam, please give him some of my vintage little Empresses as a present for Mother.” The ebony apple waddles over to a high security door where you can only imagine the majesty of fat girls diving into bank vaults of candies like obese Scrooge McDucks.

"You have a literal chocolate vault in your room? Claire snorts with laughter and you can already hear the gears in her head spin, "Well, it cannot compare to Mother's or the shared Family Larder, but I must remember to give you a tour of them all next time." But that obvious trap was not going to be sprung tonight as Sam waddled back with a weapons crate full of high calorie sugar bombs. You can't decipher the German lettering, but you can notice the weird little fairy tale round boy and girl of their logo. "Hans&Gretta. Mother and I adore their products almost as much as you. If you simply must seek out this lunacy, I'll just have to help you as best as I can."

Before you can even say thanks she blows a kiss as the maids finally shift you out of the room and down the corridor. "Ciao, Love."

Well, here we go. Off to the Lair of Masters Matriarch. What else could go wrong?
111322221121121112211.title: A little too close to an early Honeymoon

choices: Buy your time before you strike. Mrs Masters is experienced in deception.
Push your luck?
1113222211211211122112.content:
Creaking down the hardwood hallway, noticing the ominous shadows cast by candle and moonlight, you couldn’t help but wonder when the Goblin soundtrack would play to really make the horror movie mood as obvious as a knife in your gut. But it wasn’t as creepy as it could have been with your present company, and since you were alone with them, well, what’s the harm in a little momentary socializing?

“So when’s Dracula going to pop out and tell me I’m nothing but a miserable pile of lard?” You attempt to break the ice, but no one but Sam and seems to get the reference even as the other two follow her lead in smirking – or at least, reacting. “Master CJ”, sighed the bi-speckled red haired pear as she adjusted her glasses, “There are no such things as Vampires.” “Don’t sass your potential future employer and current guest of the house, Margaret.” Margie’s blunt bob cut turned with her sharp glare at the tanned Platinum blond hourglass, “And even if there was some creepy crawly around, we’d protect ya from it.”

The redhead gently lets you down to walk over and set off an argument with who you can only assume is Christine. “Oh so he doesn’t want realistic reassurance, but is eager for emasculation and belittlement?” No sooner does the taller blond set you down to return the sentiment; do you finally notice Sam awkwardly try to pacify the situation. “Girls - could both of you please not make a scene in front of Master CJ of all people”, she somehow meekly says, while swinging what sounds like over fifty pounds chocolates on its side with a mighty thud that sends a pleasant ripple around her ample upper body.

“Woah”, both impressed at the sudden burst of personality, but not wanting to set off conflicts you have no idea about, you try to deflect any oncoming strife. “It was just a dumb joke, no one did anything wrong.”

The Red headed maid groaned loudly as her face fell into her palm, “Wonderful, not even five minutes and we’ve already screwed up.” “Nice Job while it lasted”, Christine apathetically teased as she shrugged her taught shoulders.

You quickly grow concerned over messing with their livelihood as you don’t have the faintest understanding in how the Masters handle their servants, much less the norms of the occupation in general, other than apparently letting them fatten up to fit the family’s aesthetics if nothing else.“No, I’m serious, don’t worry about it!”

Even Sam seems to get down on herself over nothing. “I’m really sorry, Master.” Her delicate fingers wiped out teary eyed confession that you couldn’t believe they were making out of this, “All I wanted was please you and I failed.” Are Claire and Jessica really this harsh to these women that they’ll fire them over stupid trivialities like this?!

“Look, I won’t say anything to them”, you’re starting to actually echo out in the halls, “they start talking anything about severance pay or kicking you out – you can shack up in my apartment until you get back on your feet.” Hopefully this was out of earshot of Claire or else you were not sure how many large women even your spacious abode could handle without the floor giving way because everyone else would want in on that.

They all simultaneously gasped a little too perfectly for you to believe this was natural, but you didn’t want to take it back if any of what they insinuated was true. “You really mean it?!” Sam tugged on your arm with a puppy dog love in her face. You try to respond, but are cut off from Christine dipping over to plant a quick kiss on your lips. “Oh you won’t even know we’re there -- unless ya want us to do something extra special”, not missing a beat, she draws a heart in your little chubby tummy “just for you.”

“Wait, was this just to get me to let you all stay at my place?” There was a varying menagerie of devious faces, from Sam’s more innocent fat girl caught in the cookie jar, Christine’s smug nonchalance to Margaret’s wicked grin. “We have a recorded confirmation of your agreement”; the glare from her glasses partially hid her legitimately terrifying sneer, “We could use this in a variety of painful ways if you suddenly feel the need to go back on your word.” More confused than upset, you can’t help but blurt out “You could have just asked?”

“Where’s the fun in that” they all replied before laughing hopefully not at you. “We saw your little drama with Miss Claire” the blond cooed as the ebony brunette finished, “where’s our heart-wrenching romance and advanced cuddling, Master?”

You barely stumble out a “I just met you three” as you wonder if you were too quick to call Princess crazy. They quickly corner and grab you, carrying you off to a gilded elevator. “That’s no excuse to deny us our right to serve you!” As you climbed up, you didn’t mind being trapped in a four-way risqué hug between the three weird maids prodding and rubbing up against you, although you almost pitied the wake up nimrod will likely face with them suddenly showing up. “I am surrounded by beautiful lunatics.

When you finally reached your destination it was beginning to look more like some fat obsessed secret society than just an eccentric rich woman’s obese paradise. The architecture took on a much more antediluvian, yet disturbingly familiar twist on the prominent display of indulgence that greeted you at the entrance. In the dim dancing light, the statues almost looked like they writhed in pain and joyful ecstasy as if they were alive, but that couldn’t be possible. Your hands stroked the surface of the walls and the effigies, and other than having a texture that didn’t exactly feel like any stone you’ve ever touched, they should be just regular carved figures.

“The Mistress has a love for artifacts, particularly pertaining to old or forgotten times.” You followed Margie as she soaked in an ancient splendor of little mixtures of apparently everything remotely proto-celtic, like possibly Hallstatt gold jewelry to strange Urnfield - well - ash urns, to something even your late night history surfing with Mom and Kate couldn't even remotely identify. And yet they all shared a very obvious and much less so connection in them all. Round caricatures of people, but with what looked like a strange woman that the round people either worshiped or were maybe even sacrificed to?! You definitely needed a plan of attack here depending on whatever nonsense she likely has stuffed to the brim in more ways than one here.

"Hey girls, you really want to please me?" The maids eagerly surround you again, willing for a command "Ooo! Master's first order!" Sam kept slightly shaking the ground jumping up and down asking "what is it" until you grab her by her plump arms, which only seems to make her more giddy even if stationary. "We're going to play a game with Mrs Masters - but I'm going to need you to do exactly what I say when the time comes." While they seem interested in what sounds mischievous, Sam seems to want to get in on the joke ahead of time "Do what, Master?" You put a finger to her lips and make a quick shush noise, "That would ruin the surprise. But can I trust you to play along when I need you three?"

They all nodded in agreement and you all casually entered the Master Study with puppy slightly trailing behind with the crate. Between the bookshelves modeled after bellies, tasteful purple and black velvet drapes curving around paintings and walls, extra reinforced black leather lounge chairs and other furniture that could probably seat you and both Mistresses of the house; and, of course, the dulcet sounds of Mrs. Masters gorging herself behind a desk as she waits for you. Almost everything you were expecting was here except for the oddly attractive centerpiece of the room.

As you walk across the dark marble floor to the center, Jessica gives off an impressive belch as a greeting. "A-burp-out time you arrived, my boy. I was beginning to wonder if you actually took up my little girl's offer." She projected herself well for a woman facing a wall of monitors instead of looking at you, "Spying on us the whole time, Ma'am? Did you at least enjoy the show?" Her deep chuckle made the flesh clinging to the confines of her chair quake, "Not much escapes my attention when it comes to you two, darling", she teasingly played with a large cup of wine in one obese hand before taking another sip. "Your technique is still very sloppy", her saccharine voice purrs in your ear even from this far away, "but I will take great satisfaction in personally training you, every step of the way, onto being the perfect man."

As she finally turned to face you, she cunningly smiled at your reaction to her new outfit. "Oh - do you like my lounge wear, love?" She didn't get out of the chair, but one creaking shift of her massive legs to cross her vast thigh only excited you more as who knows how much purple cashmere barely contained her body's bounty in the form of a simple toga, both revealed the contours of her shape yet technically concealed them. The Matriarch's thick blond curls cascaded around her round shoulders and triple chin bulged by breath or another treat from greedy fingers, "What's the matter precious? Where's your witty remark?"

"I'm sorry ma'am", you honestly reply as you take a bow, "I can't think of a word that could do your radiance justice." She politely giggled with another inhale of wine, "Not the worst save. But I'd try something a little more eloquent like there is no word in any language to describe your beauty next time I captivate you." Before you can even finish a sigh, Jessica impishly continues "Oh don't worry about being unprepared for me, darling. The willingness to learn is the important part." And then she gives you a more powerful come hither look "Well, what was it you wanted to talk to me about?"
1113222211211211122112.title: Privacy invasions and Plotting.

choices: You are unable to subdue the secretary and behold her twisted side.
Jessica will do anything for quality H&G, especially if its kept from her.
11132222112112111221121.content:
Your hand wanders to the idol you are standing next to; even when you’re more interested for it to once again explore the ever growing surface of Jessica Masters. As you caresses the wide dip of the church bell of a belly, circling the curvature of the breasts, and follow all the way up to the eyes, Mrs. Masters made judgmental, yet appeased murmurs at your choice selection of points of the figure’s body. “Dirty buggar”, your spine tingled at another agonized groan from the chair she tortured under her glutted blob of a body, “you’d rather play with rocks than your lonely Mommy Dearest?” You gazed upwards to the angled articulate face of the idol and some part of you needed to know "What is this?".

“Ah, a fellow lover of history” the Matriarch prods and you can feel the predatory leer she pierces you with, hungry for more details. “A prize piece of our family’s collection and one of my personal treasures –“Jessica must be lurching forward, as now there’s another set of creaking coming from maybe the table or even the floor as she shifts into all sorts of positions your imagination could picture “—and it just makes my heart soar watching my crown jewel get so interested in it.” Finally turning your head back, you can’t help but enjoy the feline stare the fattened tigress gave you, leaning her puffy elbows on the black mahogany table and holding her head, or rather neck folds. She had every intention to toy with her food whether it was another morsel she snuck into her bottomless stomach or whatever she finally decided to do with you.

"Ma’am, please."

She bubbled out a smooth laughter at your naked insistence, “So eager to learn. How can I resist when my favorite pupil asks so nicely?”

“Very well, there is tasty bit of cultural flavor in our wonderful corner of the world.” She savors the last éclair by slowly draining the crème only with her mouth, steadily sucking it all down, until finally deflated Jessica swallows the rest and winks at you. “Have you ever heard of Máthair Neart?” Not even waiting for you to finish raising your brow, she grabs a hand full of caramel bon-bons and begins to spread them out in a circle. “Mother of Plenty, or if you’re a direct translational literalist between what has been found and the remaining inferred theories”, she stops naturally to only eat the rest of the set that aren’t on the table without a hint of shame, “Mother of Power.”

You stop yourself from going full Solid Snake and repeating the headmistress out loud or else you’d be here till period bells start to ring, however, you could easily see the name in the idol as she mixed invitingly soft excess with cold stern angles and points from her commanding face.

"And what’s so special about her?" Mrs. Masters wags her finger as she tut-tuts your interruption, “Let me get to that, young man. Good history and legend are like good gossip.” Finally running her goblet dry, Jessica simply sets it down and bluntly polishes off the rest of the bottle until all the medicine goes down and she rumbles out a lush’s burp. She doesn’t betray any potential weakness even as she looks at you noticing her rising blush, “You have to let me get to the juicy part before you develop it further.”

Long ago, in a time possibly before or around the age of the Druids, before the invasions of maybe even The Celts, The Romans, The Gaels, The Saxons, The Normans and Danes. There are traces of a people history has forgotten - buried deep within the earth or scatted and assimilated across the cultures of the isles. Many names have been born from many scholars, political propagandists, pagan spiritual appropriators or humble curious minds; all attempting to piece together fractured splinters so small they haven’t the faintest idea what goes to where. However, there is one complete link they all tie to, one fierce and indomitable figure that shapes the myths and true history around her rubenesque physique.

"Máthair Neart", you assume as you advance towards the Matriarch. “Gold Star Lunch for my sharp little Cherub” praised the Queen as she dug her fingers into her belly, “especially since you were naughty enough to skip what should be mandatory seconds.” She didn’t hide her lascivious ogle taking in the small ripples of your bare torso jiggling as you moved, “Is she a Goddess or some sort of hero?”

“A temptress, a jilted lover, a force of nature, a gentle protector and provider – but the specific Lethargis one is the most interesting of all.” When you finally reach her desk, her flabby arm stretches out to stroke your chin, “something about a chosen son if I remember right.” You don’t like that insinuation at all; however, Jessica swiftly starts the ball rolling again. “But Mommy knows that’s not why her sweetness is here right now.” One chocolate stained finger slides across your lips before it travels down your chest, where her right palm rubs against your small gut, whilst the left accidentally undoes one of the gold rings pinning her toga together to rub her gurgling middle. “Be a good boy and come out with it already.”

"If you’ve seen it all, what’s the point in ask-", you were cut off as something sweet went down your throat on Jessica’s forceful insistence. You tried to ignore how good it tasted so you could focus on blocking any further sneaky moves from Mrs. Masters, but she only just gave you another hungry chuckle, “Men who don’t go after what they want in life don’t get it, dearest.” “Very well, I want access to Silverfish equipment and training. I need you to play nice with Sonia Flounders.”

For once, the frisky veils of Matriarch left for a serious grimace at that woman’s name, “You have no idea what sort of devil you’re wishing to deal with, precious. You may not believe it, but I love you more than like my own flesh and blood.” Jessica’s unnatural physical prowess exploded to the surface as squishy fists rose and slammed into the table, leaving round cracked imprints into the hardwood without the slightest hint of pain on her face. “Letting you anywhere near that self-absorbed, muscle obsessed, lord chasing Slag Bitch is ABSOLUTELY UNACCEPTABLE!”

Both you and the maids just stare with a frightened gape as the Wide Queen takes a moment to realize what she’d just done and then surprise you even further with a short apologetic panic. “O-oh, silly me, m-mommy’s gotten so plump, the poor table couldn’t even take a little tap from a harmless butterball like me! W-what a wild lark Jessica Masters has played on herself by eating like a senseless adorable hog, right lovelies?” The Mistress instinctively tries to get up and laugh. Unfortunately for her, however, she really has crammed her bloated ass and distended gut between the chair and the desk and you're treated to the rarest sight of all -- a defenseless piggy monarch shaking every inch of sublime lard all over her mass without trying to ask for aid. That was just a tap to her?! Still, the fact that she can’t get out of there is just the sort of angle you could use.

"Ma'am", you reach out and grab warm handfuls of Jessica's belly to get her attention, "Is something wrong?" Mrs. Masters' composure still isn't fully there, yet she seems to give you a different kind of longing burble as you clutch down harder on as much as you could hold, advancing closer into her titillated fog of excited breaths. Your rough mixing and probing of her body goes deeper as you are egged on by louder moans praising more forceful dives, only slowing down when you unthinkingly go for an area that would only unleash your basest urges. Yet, even if you try to not reach for nerve clusters, or even brush against the most tender part of her breasts, butt or thighs, Jessica guides your hands back to those lewd locations and makes sure you can feel exactly what only a soft layer of wool stands between you and aroused massive woman.

Does she actually want you like this? Everything, even the kiss in her car, Mrs. Masters eventually claimed all were some elaborate 9th dimensional chess played with your raging hormones for her amusement or part of a grander scheme you always discovered after the fact. And yet there was always some trace of plausible sensuality behind her actions that felt too genuine to be completely faked. And the Mistress always wanted your inner carnivore to come out by always tempting you harder with her own predatory impulses. What reason could this whole year of seduction be about if she didn't at least feel for you like you do for her right now?

Of course, something always comes between you and headway into that mystery when the angry heels of Abida Idhar kick the door open and for her to scream wrathful words in some unknown, yet pretty language.

Jessica's commanding presence immediately returned as she swiftly loosened your grasp and made it look like she was leading the dirty dance instead of you. The anger that she had Sonia roared out again as her thick curves sheltered you from Idhar's gaze, "What right do you think you have to interrupt my desire?!" Abida's usually emotionless face went from a confused fury to a wounded retreat in a servant's bow as her thick face framing black bangs slid to hide the tears welling in her dark eyes. "Hazrat -- I", you've never heard the desert rose speak much of anything, let alone enough to notice how light and birdsong like her natural soprano sounded. However, Mrs. Masters wasn't going to have any excuse. "My -- precious boy was about to make a significant breakthrough. And your useless feelings not only shattered that wonderful moment, but could have jeopardized everything! You will stay there and wait until I am done with CJ before I give you the punishment you deserve for this impudence!"

"Yes, Mrs. Masters." Idhar complicates things, but this is likely the ideal time to make your move - if the maids can be trusted to play their part.
11132222112112111221121.title: A long con for a large lady.

choices: Go over to Silverfish itself and meet at the Heart of Thin Evil.
Invite the Muscle Queen and her children over to meet you at Chubbeso.
111322221121121112211212.content:
Vague Old Gods, new stalker roommates, the perpetual food and sexual tension hurricane of the Masters. Is this really what a guy has to go through to secure an exercise machine for a girl? Rebecca seems so far and away now, but your promise still burns in your brain to finish this, if only to see her hopefully pleased face when you give her the good stuff.

You aren’t sure whether Mrs. Masters is still in whatever foul mood that fended off Idhar, so you decide to force back more amours attitude while working your way out of her embrace. It is amazing her expensive looking executive chair hasn’t broken its top, let alone cracked in half, with how far back Jessica has been leaning to give you access to as much of her figure in, around and partially under the desk as you could reach. However, your exit needed to be gentle and on her omission if you were to have the time to get the maids to somehow incapacitate Abida so she doesn’t ruin this.

At first you merely nibbled and blew on her neck folds, still having a little height over the Matriarch while you were practically laying on her and the table. The Queen’s sneer cracked with snickering as her mass started to quiver to your actions, “What –hng—are you doing –fff-angle?” Jessica’s giggling only grew as your fingers also started wriggle and tickle across her gigantic sides, even if some nervous sweat broke out at the thought of the Headmistress’s mighty strength accidentally giving you a head injury or something worse. “P-precious ple-ase a-haha-” was all she could get out before her jelly like expanse quaked around you and her arms tried several times to grab hold of you before her wild swings hit something. As she effortlessly lifted you into the air with her hands, her smile thankfully never left her cheeks while she inflated her already bloated frame to catch her breath.

“Okay, *huff* you saucy little devil”, her teasing was nowhere near as threatening as with Abida, but she did furrow her brow with a wide Cheshire grin, “That’s enough out of you. Mommy doesn’t want to harm her sweet boy when she can’t move like she should under better conditions.” Setting you down to her right, you made sure to at least not make this look intentional to the desert rose, “But you are so much more beautiful happy than angry, Ma’am.”

You could feel the secretary’s vicious gaze follow your movements as you walked around her side of the table, but you needed to get closer to the maids and your weapon. “Touching as that sentiment is, I believe we needed to finish our conversation from earlier, young man.” Back to business at the drop of a hat, Mrs. Masters soon lays down her point. “I will purchase whatever you want darling, but I will not involve you with that horrid woman or her military school under any means.”

You give one last chance to some sort of emotional pull before you play dirty, “But Ma’am, Claire told me about her cousins. Surely asking Zenobia or her sisters for help couldn’t be that bad.” Jessica actually let’s out a soft sigh at the thought of her little nieces, “Well – yes, they are all good girls, even if they have all been partially influenced by a bad mother.”

“However”, a stern look crossed back directly to you, “involving them would soon bring about that woman, some way or another, and I cannot allow her to corrupt you. You will meet them one day, but it cannot be for this, sweetheart.”

Welp, diplomacy has failed, so it’s time for exaction. “That’s too bad. I was really hoping you could make everything better, Ma’am.” You sulk back to the idol as Mrs. Masters either believes you or plays along to see where this is going, “Oh baby, don’t cry. Mommy will make it better if you just tell her how.” The three maids seem to be enjoying this latest soap opera you’ve been giving them, yet Margaret and Christine’s instincts seem to comprehend where your punchline could go as they give you enthusiastic looks. Without moving your head, you give a quick eye roll to the right before staring back at them and they both give a small affirmation in their own ways. Returning to character, you continue “No, Ma’am. I’ve wasted your time and I apologize for that. But I do remember I was fortunate enough to have a gift for you.”

“My little angle actually got me something?!” ”Oh no, this was mostly Claire’s generosity, I’m just a delivery boy”; you momentarily turn around and notice she’s actually beaming at this, which almost makes you sorry for what you’re about to do. “I don’t see her here now, love. So this is just you spoiling me as far as I can tell.”

You snap your fingers and gently ask, “Sam, would you please bring the trunk over here?” You couldn’t think of anything more adorable than watching her waddle over as fast as her round thighs could rub together to give you your payload and pop the lock open. “Here you go, Master!” She pleasantly smiles and you sneak her a kiss on her luscious lips just to make the brunette blush, “How did I live with you?”

You can’t even unearth the first one from the protective packaging before you hear the slavering tongue of Jessica Masters audibly salivate several feet behind you, “IS THAT HANS & GRETTA LITTLE EMPRESSES I SMELL?!” You gingerly take one by its wide little tush and hold it up to reveal these things to be over 10 pounds of decadent chocolate, vanilla, mint and who knows how many other flavorings crafted into its cute little dress, shaped like a fat queen the size of your whole hand. And it certainly sounded like Jessica had padded her own adipose layer out by devouring hundreds of these gut bombs as she screamed “GIMMIE” like she was going to die. "You want it? Come and get it, Ma’am."

The Porcine Queen claws at her desk, groans as she tries to slide back and forth from the chair and tries to even lift the table from the floor; however, unfortunately for her, when their carpenters made something Jessica Masters proof, they weren’t fooling around. Don’t you want this? She whimpers out “yes”, but you act as if she didn’t. "Maybe this one’s bad”, you dryly remark as you turn to pat Sam’s frilly protruding belly, “Would you like to be my Taste Tester?” Puppy twitters as she obediently opens her mouth and gives the Chocoholic Wet Dream a nice solid bite in its lower middle, moaning with her mouthful as its gooey white chocolate filling flows over her rosy face while she quickly goes for another. Jess agonizes as the figure shrinks into Sam’s noticeably growing stomach until she finally packs away what isn’t still around her lips, melted on your fingers or staining her dress. She rubs her tummy as her green eyes beg for more, “Oof- That was divine, Master.”

"And you deserve another for being such a good piggy", you wink as you pull the next sacrifice out. When Mrs. Masters screams in primal gluttony, Abida attempts to charge after you - only for Christine to casually trip Jessica's Right Hand over and for both maids to pin Idhar down with their heavy posteriors. "I always thought she'd make a nice cushion" Margaret mocked as she shifted her thick ass into the position that made the flower painfully swear the most. While this was going on, puppy was already in the middle of her third and the buttons around her apron were popping as she achingly hiccuped "more" between occasionally soughed out soft oinks and constant chewing. Sam veraciously licked your hands, but you couldn't fetch for a fourth without giving her some belly rubs to make her feel better. And just when you didn't have enough tasks, the other two bellowed out "Where's our treats, Master?!"

"Chocolates for everyone except Mrs. Masters I guess", you teased as the supply quickly dwindled between now three ravenous black and white sows. The Mistress was still somewhere around denial and pleading as you rushed back and forth fattening one maid to the next. Margie and Chrissy soon gave a pre-stuffed Sam belly a run for its money in size, but their ballooning trunks were nothing compared to a real belly girl's girth, especially when she cheated and got more than they ever did - but, it wouldn't be wise to mention that now. Yet by the amount they were eating, apparently some of it was even starting to digest and be absorbed elsewhere. Legs jiggled and shredded fishnet lace, busts ripened and tore straps, arms stretched and seared poofy shoulder threading, Abida was not having a good time. Until, at last, "Looks like there's only one empress left, Ma'am."

Jessica was devastated, and honestly, you didn't feel right pushing it this far that she was actually crying about chocolates of all things. But one last push could clench this, so you made your way to the secretary. Your expanding servants did an odd number on Abida as she seemed a mixture of silent fury, yet aroused prisoner underneath the bloated maids. You couldn't blame her for liking em big, yet you wondered "Excuse me, Miss Idhar? You seem to really like Mrs. Masters, so why don't you ever - you know, blimp out for her like she likes seeing from me?" Abida gave you a look worth a thousand words as she quietly debated with herself, despite slightly hating that the question came from you. "C'mon", you twist the knife as you lower the confection in front of her twitching mouth, "Try it, maybe you'll actually win her over." In an instant, she snaps the strawberry crowned head and gulped it down, only to noiselessly cower as the heavens thundered "AAAAAAABBIIIIDAAA, I LIKED EATING THE HEADS BEST" from Jessica's jowled throat.

"FINE, YOU WIN! You win." As she admits defeat you couldn't help but apologize, "I'm sorry I went this far, Ma'am."

"You can make it up to me by giving me the rest of that Empress! I don't care anymore! I'll even let you -"
111322221121121112211212.title: No More Mr. Nice Fatboy.

choices: JC remains for the rest of the night
CJ awakens to a very awkward randevú with Rebecca.
1113222211211211122112122.content:
"-Personally invite - ugh - Sonia Flounders and her daughters to arrive with your machines, trainers and whatever else those Neanderthals do to be enslaved by exercise. Bleaugh!" As much of an Out and Proud Fatty Jessica Masters is, you feel it’s a safe bet that most of her disgust is coming from the idea that she'll have to not only talk to, but come into contact with her most hated distant relative. With her strange superhuman strength and her patronage of the Sumo, Kendo and, at least for a time the Swim clubs, she couldn't be completely opposed to exercise. Especially since, like you pointed out to Claire, there was a far greater satisfaction for people like us to watch all that effort to stay thin and healthy, slowly become defiled by constant eating and sloth until they grow into a fattening Chubbeso inevitability. Okay, you're thinking way too much like them for your own good now.

Back in reality; as you defensively flatten your hand out in front of Jessica, your intuition seemed to be on the money as the Matriarch’s feverish fangs swiftly tore into the confection, chomping down what it could and somehow nearly missing fingers you were sure she could easily bite through if she felt like it. In a hunger only a woman of her size could feel, and denied in the way you inflicted on her, savoring tastes took a back seat. Right now, there was only the maddening impulse to feed, and as soon as the larger remnants of the ball of sugar went down into the lioness’s vast belly, she pulled you in, back over the desk, to lick up any trace or crumb she could find.

Melted smears over your hands and arms weren’t enough, Jessica’s soft tongue and lips followed her chocoholic cravings as the Queen lapped up the smudges the maids left in their attempts to hold, toy or just be the messiest eaters they could as you fed them. Whether it was a now hardened kiss mark in the center of your chest or white drips around your paunch that Jessica took a special pleasure in tasting, she was going to have her tickling revenge with the interest of driving your teenaged lust bonkers even while on subconscious auto-piolet. You have to admit, it was a fun ride until she snapped out of it after suddenly becoming inhibited when she unzipped your pants rooting around for possibly sub-atomic chocolate particles. It seems even The Headmistress has trouble with self-control as she looks away while you fix your jeans back up to adequately snug, yet decent, “E-excuse me, precious. Mommy gets a bit grouchy when she’s ignored.”

You swear one of Christine’s pained wails sounded almost like a wolf whistle, but you needed to make sure there wasn’t any bad blood between you and Mrs. Masters. “Ma’am” you gulp looking at Jessica in possibly her real natural state for once, “I really am sorry if I hurt you.” The Headmistress shakes her head as she solemnly remarks; “Looks like I was wrong about you. You only mostly need my protection and guidance instead of completely.” The Queen’s spacious, yet strong drooping arms wrapped around your love handles as she tugged you down to sit on her plush gut. She knowingly chuckled as she looked up to you your confused face, yet the return of Jessica’s more subdued flirtation gives you a strange sense of comfort - aside from having no idea what to expect from her in this position.

“I never knew my sweet boy could be so cruel” she teasingly pouted as Jessica rubbed her neck rolls and obese cheeks against your soon-to-be pot-belly like she was cuddling a teddy bear, “Subtle manipulation of my love of familial bonds, then withholding one of mommy’s many favorite indulgence foods until she agreed to your demands?” Her fingers crawl up your back, fondling together body fat to make temporary rolls for her hands to admire, “Are my lessons taking root that quickly – or was I right, and you were born a Masters before we ever found you, I wonder. It definitely seems like you’ll need more advanced subject material in the immediate future if I am to best nurture this new potential you keep showing, Dark Horse.” And here comes the uncertainty as she takes a long several minutes to play with your body while your silence is only punctuated by her curious exploration of your tender points and her giggling at your reactions if she struck gold. You finally try to look down and start up a conversation, but Mrs. Masters won’t let you, “Don’t worry, love. I won’t take anything back or even treat you any differently. Your desire to seek out the Flounders simply must be like your strange arrivals, another happy slice of providence I haven’t had the experience yet of trying to enjoy how good it really is.”

However, when she pets your pudgy gut, her wicked side comes out, “You do owe me a heavy show of good faith by striving to take bigger portions though, precious. I’ll make sure to even visit and join your meals now to make sure my boy grows Big and Strong.” It doesn’t take a genius to understand her innuendoes here, but these women always seem to know how to make you feel both scared and excited for their plans, “Yes, Ma’am.” She coyly pulls down your head to hers, “And stop with this ma’am business in our private moments, baby. Here -- and soon elsewhere, it’s just Jessica or Dearest – understood?” When you nervously reply “Yes, M—Jessica, the Queen lovingly hugs all of her squishy upper half around your middle, “Good boy.”

But when she lets go, the Matriarch gives you a stern look, “You will show none of that sweetness to that Woman. She will chew you up and spit you out if you don’t stay cunning and detached like you were with me, because she will not return such mercy or apology to you, darling.” Your brows sharpen and rise with concern, but Jessica hides a sense of worry well around her show of authority while taking your hands into hers. “Promise me, precious. Be ruthless in engaging her. I will make sure to be there and support you on the day she arrives, but I need to know you will harden your heart enough to be protected from that woman.”

You manage to make out a “I promise to take this seriously, Jessica” before you are hit by a wave exhaustion, you really want to take a nice rest at home to be prepared for another day of flirtation, weirdness and melodrama. The Mistress titters as she rubs your tired face, “I can see your point in wanting to exercise if you are this lacking in stamina, love. But then again, how many meals have you skipped?” You don’t even have the juice to work up some sarcasm, so Mrs. Masters just gives you honest paternal care as she sets you down again. “Alright, let’s get you to bed, sleepyhead. You do have classes tomorrow, but mommy will make sure everyone gives her baby some leeway because he was such a studious night owl tonight.”

As a flock of servants begin to carry you and your piggies out, the last thing you can hear before you black out is Jessica’s vindictive deep cackle as she watches you drift away. “I was afraid you were still too soft for our affairs. That involving her would just ruin you. But now, I wonder if it’ll be you that corrupts her, precious.”

A bump in the road unceremoniously awakens you to find yourself back in the passenger seat of the Hummer, still in control and surrounded by maids gleefully watching your personal staff cling to you in their food comas. “Oh shoot, they looked so cute sleeping together like that.” A pink highlighted maid with very large chest assets was busy taking her last picture of you all that you guess was going to start a whole host of other rumors as soon as it goes online. “I’m Emily, by the way, but I wouldn’t bother going through introductions right now. You should just go back to sleep, Master, and let us take good care of you.” A beach tanned, wide thighed girl to the left suggested “Maybe he needs some more ‘pillows’ to help him sleep with”, to which a sassier girl in the far back replied “Yeah, let’s all keep each other warm, Master. Why should those three get all the fun?”

“That sounds nice”, you drop without any intentional lewd interest, but looking at Emily’s phone gave you the urge to check your own. You are immediately barraged with several texts from Bunnie.

WHERE ARE YOU, CJ?! We found Becca, but she is in the Cafeteria Kitchen, hanging around a lot of pointy knives and other dangerous things, and won’t wake up no matter what we try! PLZ GET DOWN HERE NOW!

Adrenaline rouses you up as you tightly grasp your phone, fight instincts throwing subtly to the curb if Rebby’s actually in trouble. "SHIT! WHO’S DRIVING THIS THING?!” The help still conscious get flustered by this sudden outburst, Emily, being a more levelheaded operator, attempts to calm you down "Whoa, where's the fire, handsome? I thought you wanted to go home?" You lean in with an unthinking anger, "Change of plans! School Cafeteria! STEP ON IT!" The multicolored punk gets a little kick out of this excitement, "Okay, Riggs. MIA!" Emily bangs on the seat paneling for a goggled, short haired motor-head at the wheel to scream back, "WHAT?!" A wild grin hits Mia's face when Emily tells her to "Floor it to the Teria'", and you have just put all of their lives in danger as she's allowed to put her lead foot down. "LET ME HEAR YOU ROAR, BIG GIRL!"

The modified 6.3-liter, V12 engine bellows out exhaust and ear drum shattering hellfire as you speed up to a nerve wracking 70 MPH down a thankfully smooth and unused private stretch of road. Why the hell does a goddamn Stretch Hummer have the horsepower to ram through a building doesn't matter to you right now, Becca needs you.
1113222211211211122112122.title: Let's not get too crazy. Keep it Hometeam, JC.

choices: Sure, nothing too weird about a friend becoming a roomate, right?
I dunno about this...
11132222112112111221121222.content:
While you wish you had the time to beat yourself up for forgetting about Rebecca’s condition like an idiot, you must focus on keeping Rebby from eating until she explodes or causing any unwilling harm to herself in this state. You are the one with the complete memory, you see from both nimrod and your own perspectives. You were aware when he discovered her sleep eating tendencies, so there must be only one reason why she’s there. Appeasing an imaginary Dalton scarfing down anything she can find. Well, even if it’s working, you’d much rather have her small and alive than the alternative.

However, the occasional shaking of the car and Emily’s chubby hands waving across your face brought you back from your mind. “Welcome back to Earth, John Matrix. The Grimace you were giving the floor looked like you were picking out who you were going to kill last.” You embarrassingly scratched the back of your head as you gazed back down, “Oh…sorry if I scared anyone, I’m just really worried”, you almost mumble out. The movie loving maid tries to deflect any barbs to her words, “Oh no, I was just joking that you looked really mad for a case of the munches-”, but she joins a host of envious eyes watching you momentarily pet and brush the indigestion and odd twists you’re giving your personal servants deep slumber. “Lucky dogs” you faintly hear among the small crowd.

Sam’s is the simplest and cutest to decipher, “mmMaster – are we going swimming? Wait for piggy.” Even if you wonder how big all your lady friends could be around swimsuit season, you should hang out with these three outside of their work hours. Christine’s is trickier, although you get a sense she’s going to not only be teasing whenever she can, but will be the most easygoing. “Oops, you did all the house work again? Well – what can I do to make it up to ya, Hoss?” That grin of hers just leaves so much to imagination when she starts to breathe heavy.

But while the other two responded positively to soft touches, Margaret – well she’s a little bit different. “Master – urp – did I eat everyone’s food? Well I don’t care if they’re starving, what are you going to do about it?!” Yet when a very long pothole sends a loose seat belt strap to slap her giant ass, “Oh Yes -- Punish your greedy hog!” You won’t judge as there are parts that don’t sound that bad, but you don’t want to kiss with a fist or cuddle with a riding crop, even if she asks nicely. Then again, you get the feeling you won’t have a choice in the matter when it involves her.

“Looks like you’ve got your hands full with that one” Emily motioned like she was going to rib you, even if she was too far away to reach, “sure you don’t want to trade out with someone else-“. She was interrupted by a sudden weightless sensation you all shared, before the car came crashing down and finally slides into a parked position, sending the whole host of servants rolling on top of you, as Mia proudly proclaims “UNDER 10 MINUTES, FUCK YES!”

Among the tangled pile of padded flesh, there is an angry scream of “ARE YOU TRYING TO KILL US, MIA”, but you aren’t sure who is saying what between the grunting and ranting. But if you’re at the Campus, you needed to move; even if someone’s ample body was blocking your vision. Apologizing as you prodded and picked up a very soft and abashed Emily by her hips, she timidly squeaked “thanks” as you let her stand upright on her own volition and give you an exit from the fat cave. "Think you can hold down the fort here as I take care of something?” You don’t exactly wait to hear Emily’s reply as you rush to the nearest door and frantically run as fast as you can.

The side entrance doors you’re nearest to have thankfully been left unlocked, but you aren’t sure if that’s a sign of Bunnie or Miss Young’s competence or the lax security of Chubbeso. No, that’s unimportant, what’s the quickest way to the Cafeteria from here? Is she even still there at this point?! You begin to holler out “REBECCA” in the quiet hallways, locked rooms and dark corners of the school. Your panicked panting and reverberating shouts were your only company as you cursed an entire year of overeating slowing your progress with an out-of-shape mess that tugged and jiggled against you.

When you finally reached the marble pillars and strange mix of Art Deco and Neo Classical structure, you knew you were in The Hall of Fattening itself, Chubbeso Cafeteria. You didn’t even need to shout for Ms. Blake to poke her head out of a doorway and signal you over, “THERE YOU ARE! Get over here quick, Romeo!” As you wheezily jog over to the cooking “Bunker” – a snaking series of world class kitchens and stacked to the brim pantries that could feed an entire city, let alone the constantly growing student body and facility that was rumored to be a repurposed Fallout Shelter; you could already hear the wild foraging of Rebecca Maglen randomly tearing through cast iron pots and pans, breaking containers and who knows what else. When you reach the Wonder Chef and Head Nurse, their likely reprisal at your tardiness quickly melted away to flushed gapes. Bunnie, having more backbone, is the one to actually ask “Uh – CJ? Where’s your shirt?” ”Doesn’t matter…“ you puff out as you lean forward with your hands on your knees, desperately gasping for air, ”Where – Where is Becca?”

Your question was soon answered by the labored footfalls of your best friend waddling into view; her creaking belly wobbles and gurgles with an ominous loud groan as it hangs heavy and undeniably inviting for your touch. Rebecca’s peaceful glaze from her baby blue eyes had a haunting beauty as they ignored her strained movements in a childlike search for more treats to stuff herself with, “All…for…Cejey.” Her once taught XXXL T-shirt flapped as a tattered and stained curtain hovering around her nearly exposed breasts that were shielded by long Auburn hair, both articles of clothing were destroyed by a gut that is possibly larger than Claire’s at this point. Her black sweat shorts were a series of open holes, rubbing and wiggling around their uncontrollable thighs and an indomitable bottom, with the largest opening barely covering her pink frilly boxers that weren’t fairing too well either.

But when Rebby’s somnambulic instincts cornered another tasty treat, this time a particularly large Cinnamon Crumb Cake, the glutton next door's already debris encrusted digits mercilessly dug chunks out for her to happily swallow down, no matter how much her already aching stomach begged her for no more. The already fragile Streuselkuchen rained sweet gore around her protruding girth, a strangle pleasant hum mashed with her already broken English as she mumbled while she gorged. As the pieces shrank, Rebecca licked her fingers, her belly, even the plate and some of the floor clean of pieces before she let off a loud Bruuap and patted her glutted sphere. "Tubbeh" she faintly smiled, but then it soured into a painful frown "Neh...Tubbeh...Enouh."

You must have said your remorseful Becka out loud, because one thick thigh slowly rippled around the other until she faced you, "Cejey?" Hopefully, she'll listen to you in this state, "That's right, it's me. The real CJ Dalton. Come to me, Becca." Rebby's bright blues worryingly scanned around her as she grew scared, "Wher...Cjey?!" You make a loud shush, which thankfully slows her movements back to a relaxed slouch, before you continue, "Becca, concentrate on nothing but my voice." She begins to repeat a fair assessment of your words in her dream speak, so you hope this first attempt at hypnotism works. "You have eaten enough for now and are the most beautiful woman and greatest friend I have. I couldn't be prouder to have you in my life."

Rebecca actually breaks out into sniffle as she listens in, yet somehow says a very articulate "Dork" that you'll gladly take if this is successful. "That's right, your Dork misses you", you shamelessly state while Bunnie and Erika snicker amidst outwardly thinking this is absolutely adorable, "and I want you to follow my voice and come to me." Maglen obeys as she slowly waddles closer to you, "And when you reach and hold me, you'll wake up and we'll be together." Her lumber speeds up to a heavy stomp as Rebby's dreamlike grin widens across her messy face, "Ferver?!" You hold out your hands in a dramatic fashion as who knows how much fat girl comes stampeding your way, "Forever."

It'd certainly be a touching scene, if it wasn't for Rebecca's massive hips hitting the side of a table right next to you and setting off a call bell with sharp little ring, that switches back the original CJ Dalton just in time to be hugged by a now awake and agonizingly full Best Bud. You both traded whys, whats and wheres before the staff came in to try and explain the situation to everyone involved. "I'm a som-what", Rebecca spikes before she winces back to try and deal with the sore mound of sugar in her gut, which you also try to help soothe. "Well, technically you're a sleepeater, which is a similar sort of parasomnia event like sleep walking except - well, you consume a lot." The Nurse tries to both be gentle and matter-of-fact, but Becca's clearly shaken by this. "Am I - hic - am I going to keep doing this?!" "Well, I won't know the possible cause until I run some tests, but-", Ms. Young is cut off by your now softball resembling friend clinging to you and desperately begging, "Cej, please - you gotta help me through this!"

"W-what do you want me to do?" Rebecca nervously shakes you as she tries to come up with something "I dunno, spend the night with me until I get this is under control? C'mon, man!"
11132222112112111221121222.title: Oh right, there's another personality. Hey CJ.
