Other than Becca and some calls from Claire, nothing too odd so far.
111322221121121112211212221.content:
When your world finally stops shaking around the seismic rhythm of Rebecca’s doughy arms, there is no way you could refuse when her vulnerable frosting and crumb coated lips, along with her pleading blue eyes, push the same emotional buttons that has gotten you into so much trouble over the years your destined acceptance is more of a polite formality than anything else. Of course, you stammer out a few feeble attempts at some sort of alteration; however, the more you try to resist, the closer her billowy belly bounces up to you. As Becka’s bare tanned spare tire brushed against your pudge and nudged you back a few steps, you start to truly understand the size of her girth as she still slowly advances closer, her pleading gaze turning more impassioned along with the tomboy’s walk into a sultrier sashay of utilizing every groaning ounce of her growing form with each step. Your eyes widen in disbelief whilst your longtime friend lowers her lashes as she looks up to you, now fully entrapping you into her vast sloshing abdomen and your back against the white kitchen wall.

“Okay” you whimper out in time for Rebecca to deliver the coup de grâce of a kiss, “See? That wasn’t so hard, was it Ceej?” Bunnie gives out an amazed clap, Erika covers her obese face with her plump hands, but cannot hide a beet-red flush and you are completely dumbfounded. What in the hell just happened?!

“Wow”, Blake coughs and attempts to clear the heavy air with her usual sense of wit, “I didn’t know today’s playboys were the Dorks.” You give her a slightly wounded, but still confused look before Ms. Young recovers her composure and clarifies, “You know – when you said you were her dork to try and wake Miss Maglen up? It was quite a charming speech you gave about how much you cared for her.” Rebecca perks up at this, yet you sink further into a disoriented sitting brood. “Deets, please” the dark-reddish brown beauty insisted as Bunnie prepared to spin a tale.

“It was around late afternoon when Chubbeso Cock-of-the-Walk, CJ Dalton, gave his gal pals a sudden text message of significant importance”, the currently blue and purple short bedhead styled cook shamelessly exaggerated and the Nurse rolled her eyes incredulously. “Now this is nothing new for us, because I’m always waiting for my little stud to dial me up and go I GOTTA EAT SOME MORE OF YOUR COOKIN’, GOOD LOOKIN’. But once again, he needed me for something more difficult than a little TLC for his tum-tum, yet I wasn’t gonna let my little bro down.” Erika, trying to be a more honest source, rested her delicate fingers on a soft belly of her own as she continued, “I was worried CJ had two accidents on the same day, but as you now know, he was warning us about trying to find you.”

“Yeah, thanks for helping me again”, Rebecca bluntly butted in to get to the part she really wanted to hear, “tell me how CJ came to my rescue!” Bunnie put her hands on her slightly plusher hips to this, “Why don’t you ask Lover-Dork himself for an encore?”

A soft big toe prodded your exposed gut handles as you looked up to see a trio of friendly smiles waiting on you to socialize with them. “Hey~”, Rebecca kittenishly rubbed her leg against you, while you took a brief moment scan her voluptuous and very exposed form at this angle before twisting your head back down in embarrassment. “I want to hear that mushy stuff you said about me!” This, like a lot of today, was something absolutely lost to you. All you could reply with was a timid “I don’t know.”

“Oh, come on. I promise I won’t make fun of you too much before I give you give you your reward – depending on what you say that is.” Rebecca’s newfound friskiness tempered with her old teasing self isn’t making this any easier on you, and it only makes you shout out “I said I don’t know” louder, much to everyone’s discomfort. Becca attempts to play this off as if she’s what’s upsetting you with a “Look, CJ, it’s alright if-“, but they still don’t understand you! “I DON’T KNOW. I DON’T KNOW WHERE I’VE BEEN, I DON’T KNOW WHY YOU’RE ACTING LIKE THIS AND I’M SCARED TO FIND OUT JUST HOW MUCH I DON’T KNOW!”

Your friends’ maternal sides kick in with Ms. Young drawing the swiftest conclusion, “CJ, are you suffering worse complications from your head injury?!” Bunnie’s right back to silently agonizing that this is her fault, Rebecca’s holding you not in a new budding love, but in fear; Ms. Young is setting up future appointments and you’re having sudden painful migraines because you couldn’t just fucking take a few gift girlfriends like a normal lonely heart. No, you just had to ruin this because baby wants all the pieces to fit!

However, the sudden entrance of a Masters Maid entourage broke up the strife as Emily proceeded to provide a cover story in a much more formal tone. “Excuse me, but I believe I have the ending you seek. Master CJ was having medical complications at the manner while he was seeking Mrs. Masters’ personal assistance in searching for Miss Maglen. We tried to give him good bedside rest, assuring him that we could handle his affairs for him. But as soon as we unfortunately let him learn of your location, Master CJ wouldn’t hear no for an answer until he personally woke up his sleeping beauty.” Is that how this all went down? You do remember meeting Claire outside your room, but then nothing for several hours until you’re in the Cafeteria, the middle of the night, and just after everything is settled?!

Your migraines relapse to likely tell you to leave well enough alone, but, thankfully, Becca’s ready to cut to the chase. “So CJay just needs some bedrest” your stuffed friend with potential benefits asks as she wraps an arm around you. Emily nods as she takes a short bow, “The doctor at the manner seems to think he is suffering from minor sleep and food deprivation that are not helping him heal from his head trauma naturally.”

“Well I’ll make sure he gets some good bellyfuls starting tomorrow.” Bunnie seems even more enthusiastic than she typically is about sneaking extra helpings your way over this, but there’s nothing malicious about her obvious concern for you. Erika, on the other hand, wants to be a second opinion. “And as Head Nurse, CJ’s health is my responsibility. I will conduct further examinations of him –“but Emily cuts her off, “AFTER he has had sufficient rest and relaxation.” The usually mild mannered woman, but maybe a little too nurturing when you’re involved, as it’s often joked she’s gone Florence Nightingale Effect for you and harder with every visit; gave a very uncharacteristic leer at this convenient and intrusive stonewall likely all the way from her employer. Sensing this, the busty maid tries to calm the waters, even if there’s no chance your tubby angle will stay away if she thinks you’re hurt, “No offense to you or your skills madam, but we’ve only been instructed to try the initial remedy first before we attempt any other cure.” "Oh, I bet you have" coldly snaps out of Ms. Young's still somewhat sweet countenance as she furiously writes something down in a tablet she produces from a pack snugly hanging around her lovely waist.

"So we're free to go now, right?" Becca's still a willing pillar of strength for you when she senses trouble, even if you're slightly fighting the urge to focus on her lack of a shirt and bra rubbing and jiggling next to your own. "Of course", Emily once again bows her vast tracks of land before the host of maids makes a path for you and Rebecca, "Please don't hesitate to ask for our assistance in anything should you need it. Mrs. Masters was very touched by your words and actions this night and has commanded for us to now serve the manner and the Young Master's flat in this time of need." The tomboy's now more willing overeating urges casually licks her lips as she turns to you, "Free and unlimited high quality room-service too? This extended sleepover just keeps getting better - eh, Ceej?" You simply mummer out a fragile "mmm-hmm" that only makes her squeeze you in tighter with her left as her right manages her bubbling cauldron. "Hey, it's okay man. I'll look out for you as you look out for me, like always." Your old personal Three Musketeer credo between Rebecca and Kate is a small comfort - but everything still feels topsy-turvey, like she's hasn't stopped shaking you.

You try one last grasp at a sense of normalcy as you look back to Bunnie and Erika, "N-none of this is against any rules?" Your Canadian over-feeder gives a sly, smug grin as she eyes you up with Becca. "One girl just isn't enough for you? There's nothing against roommates - especially involving opposite genders, seeing as you're the only Big Boy here." "And Mrs. Masters did sign your apartment under your name, Master CJ", Emily adds her own suggestive needling just to make this is even more awkward for you, "Chubbeso Administration will not interfere with any off campus activities occurring on private property you own, sir." A tender finger gingerly rubbing around your chest makes you look down to meet Becca's hungry eyes and you simply give up trying to understand any of this. "Okay - just lemme get to my bed and have a rest" you wearily sigh as you slowly waddle along with your amorous new roomie, "Sure thing, bud. There's always tomorrow - and the days after that to celebrate our new relationship."

Once again, what the hell just happened?!
111322221121121112211212221.title: I'm Alright. Nothing absolutey off about this.

choices: Despite a good effort, both of you get stuffed to a "small" Masters Breakfast.
Becca conquers the sort of first meal of the day.
1113222211211211122112122211.content:
You found yourself planted in a dark leather sofa, it creaks and shifts to your touch and movements, yet you are numb to any sensation that should come from these actions. A dim moody light flows from a series of red curtains that contain the room that you are in, at times depicting shadows of familiar people or shapes before they flicker back into nothingness. As you hear the slashing of ink scrawling to paper, your vision follows a zig-zag of sharp black and white tiled lines in the floor to a tall man scribbling notes in a large black book beside two statues. To the right, a very obese woman with noticeable muscle tone slightly peaking up beneath her expansive flab; while the figure to his left had no head or arms, yet it always seemed to shift around as you tried to study it.

Focusing back to the man, there is a strong sense of envy the longer you survey his features. A powerful series of muscles stretched out the fabric of a deep crimson three-piece suit, strong face structure with skin that puberty apparently forgot about with how pristine and perfect his complexion is; thick and feathered back dark brown hair that bordered on being pitch black, with equally Russian Brown Bear colored eyes that glared back at you as you gazed into them. A fun house reflection of what you could look like – with a lot more effort on your part to achieve any of this and slight differences such as his S curving brow giving the illusion like he was always angry and hair color.

As he closed his book, the man took a wry smile in saying “Kcor S’tel! You must have blinked in a completely lost confusion, as he chuckled while he took a small shrug, ”You were expecting someone shorter?” Suddenly, a jazzy saxophone and double bass duet played along with flashing strobe lights as a very short man, in an equally red suit and flared disco shirt, walked a groovy strut across the room before he exited through a door that vanished and took the music along with him. The Tall Man had a very admiring smile as he watched the other stranger leave. ”Now there’s a cool cat that knows what’s going on”, yet a more noticeable glare returned as he turned his head back, “unlike you.”

The Tall Dude opened his book on his lap as he breathed out an exasperated sigh. “Since I’m killing time either way, let’s see if you can retain any of this. Tell me, Charity, who do you actually have your eye on?” Although you took offense to not calling you by the name you want, you took the bait, “What?” “Quit being stupid”, he growled as he turned a page, “who are you actually going to start hooking up with so you can stop tormenting all of these poor women in an endless feigned ignorance of everyone’s feelings?” Does this guy seriously want to know who you’d want to go out with?! And frighteningly enough, he answers that thought. “Yeah, I do. Why else would I ask the question, Dipshit?”

The Rude Man stretched out his hand to the left statue as it took the shape of the person he described. “How about that freaky, fat and financially secure crazy girl, Claire Masters? She’s got issues in wanting to make everything about her kinky desires, but she doesn’t lie about that-”, Jerkface puts on a sad smile as another page flips; “-yet with a little attention, we could coax her out of that nothing but libido shell to make bonds with people besides us and grow as a person. Y’know, as we make sure her figure grows out as a gigantic fatty.”

You’re not comfortable being so blunt about that subject, especially with an asshole like him, but the man strangely doesn’t grill you about it as you thought he would. ”Oh right, you don’t like broadcasting the fact that we like Fat Girls. Hey, I can respect that as the flag’s yours to wave as high or as low as you’re comfy with – but let’s not bullshit each other here. They all can see it; I enjoy it and I can easily make you show it if you still want to pretend like you can cut it off from love.” You furrow your brows as you look away and he relents, ”Yeah, I didn’t think we’d crack that nut tonight. So let me get back to the point I want to bring up here.”

The Red Goon snaps his fingers and no matter where you look, more statues appear of all the women you’ve ever had a potential interest in, inside the academy and elsewhere. ”There’s always a choice, CJ. We may not like the ones we’re offered, but they exist whether we like them to or not.” You’ve already had enough of this guy’s sermon as you stand up – but unfortunately, you notice you’re kind of huge and completely naked. “Hey”, your panic actually causes a gelatinous wave in your thankfully unmentionable covering belly overhang, “why and when did any of this happen?!” “I don’t know, Tubbo. You tell me, this is your own damn mind!” You focus on yourself and it starts to shift back into a more realistic and decent set of chubby t-shirt and jeans and you calm down into the seat. “Christ, do I have to do everything even in your dreams? Just pick someone so I know who to work on.”

“I don’t know who you are, but I don’t know who I want to go out with yet and it’s none of your damn business when I do it!” Tall Twat gives a bombastically sarcastic howl as he springs out of his seat. “Well look who decided to participate. Except it doesn’t matter if you say that to me, what matters is you finally telling any of these girls, including your so called closest friends, what the score is! Because you sure as shit aren’t being a NICE GUY with anyone by treating this as an anime harem where you don’t pick anyone and a perpetual status-quo of WILL HE OR WON’T HE means everything’s fine and dandy for the ladies involved.” You’re kind of awestruck as he continues to rant. “Hell, I dare you to date or try to go after all of them. Because let me tell you, at least that isn’t as hurtful as just ignoring reality and letting them all wait their whole lives for CJ Dalton to find his balls and even try to have a relationship with anyone!”He wrathfully throws his book at the red curtains and the statues crumbled down. “There’s always a choice, CJ. And when you avoid making any, you only pick the worst option of all!”

You try to get TM to explain what you should do if it’s really this bad, but his words are cut off with you waking up under the curious looming gaze of Rebecca. A suppler, but notably smaller gut isn't the only part of her curvature orbiting around your body as she watched you sleep. "Guess I'm getting too big to do this stealthily anymore." You let out a groggy "do what”, however, Becca's casual glib doesn't seem to care of any social faux pas she'll likely continue to do when it involves you. "How was I supposed to resist when Ceej was mumbling this weird stuff in his sleep?" Your eyes betray a deep seated anxiety you didn't want to come out, yet Rebecca's grin widens. Her long auburn hair brushes your face as she leans in to impishly whisper, "including your dirty secret."

Your breathing becomes erratic as she slowly lumbers on her hands and feet to further spread out her toasty lard over you, "Ceej, what do you like more? A big soft belly or a hard and stuffed one?" Please, Becca, don't push this out - not with you. The folds of the mattress groan and creak as she wobbles and rocks you around under her, with Becca's face oozing with satisfaction as she's finally cornered you into The Question. "Right now, it's so pillowy soft, I bet you could just cuddle with it for hours and do a lot of things someone like you knows all about." You wince as the tomboy rubs her body harder onto you, her sent now inescapably all over your bed. "But Big Girls like me gotta eat. Nibble ourselves fatter and fuller because we just need it so badly, Cej." Becca's eyes pierce you with a longing for an answer as her mouth moans out her plea, "Won't my brave dork please feed me nice and full?" You try to look away, but her rounder hands clench around your jaw. "Or is it neither because you don't like big girls. Am I ugly to you, CJ?!"

The longer the silence intensifies, the sadder she becomes as she waits. You don't want to say it, you don't want love to just be this - but you can't lie to Rebecca and hurt her like this. "It's both!" Her reddened blues give a confused blink as you continue, "I like both soft and hard bellies. And you're really pretty Becca, don't ever think that ugly bullshit again!" She starts to cry and laugh at the same time before she closes in for a long gentle kiss that doesn't feel bad to receive. She gives you a few cop-outs, closing back in for another quick tongue play once you think she's done. But when she finally pulls up for real, she's too peppy to pull of smug seductress, no matter how hard she goes into the act anyway; "Took you long enough to admit it, Fatty Perv!" You're never going to hear the end of this now.

As Rebbeca rises up to sitting on both her and your legs,its good to see her so happy, even if you've just noticed her big soft stomach ruining one of your favorite shirts. She must have heard you groan, "What, the maids haven't brought what little clothes I have left that fit yet." A deep belly growl comes from both of you and Becca starts to get ideas, "I like being a cool girlfriend roaming around in your clothes all day, but how will I make sure you keep getting larger stuff for me to wear?" She starts to pat and rub both of your tummies as she licks her lips, "Maybe I should round you out as well just to be safe, but then, there wouldn't be less food to fatten me up with. Choices."

You instinctively pull her down into the bed as the door opens up, with Sam, Christine and Margaret rolling a large squadron of food carts stuffed to the brim with tantalizing goodies. "Master, Breakfast~" Sam gleefully shouts as Becca shimmies on her back next to you, "Ooo, looks like its both this time."
1113222211211211122112122211.title: Dnim Ruoy ni Ginteem A.

choices: Become Becca’s Boyfriend. Life’s too short to fret over this crap.
No, this feels wrong. Becca’s just a friend.
Rebecca isn’t the one with the problem, it’s you.
11132222112112111221121222111.content:
An Addition written by: MDOCK
You fear you’ve somehow created a monster as Rebecca’s ravenous eyes never show uncertainty in wanting as much as she could eat, no matter how many carts the strangely familiar trinity of maids pushes into your bedroom. The last day of near complete fasting certainly made you hungrier the more types of food you could smell surrounded you; oven fresh bread, warm tea, a variety of meats with likely sausages as big as a quarter pound steak, thankfully some hints of vegetables along with an entire set of dressings. But they still kept coming and you simply had to ask

“I thought you said Breakfast? I don’t know how late I’ve slept, but I’m pretty sure I don’t have time for all of this.” The cuddly dark skinned girl with the even cuddlier belly delicately set a napkin around a not so loose blue shirt you slept in and your blanket covered lap. You got a tingly sense of déjà vu in her too innocent to believe grin;

“But Master-“, the Brunette paused to give a yearning quick study and then corrected herself, “-CJ, we asked the manner chefs to make it as small as they could. However, Bunnie couldn’t bring herself to go lower than 20 if it meant leaving you malnourished.”

20 courses, yeah, that’s around 10 dishes less than Claire usually tries to stuff you with at lunch. You’re really glad Becca forced her way into being a roommate, even if that’s also tempered by a very realistic fear that these three women are trying to make both of you explode with this much Blake cooking. Yet the prelude concluded with Becca’s eager fingers yanking a nearby 10 inch thick slab of French Toast and managing to suck the buttered and heavily syruped fried egg bread down before Sam could stop her, “Hey, this was supposed to be for Master CJ!”

Rebecca, in her desire to ripen in front of you, gave a devious forced burp as she replied, “Then you better get to feeding him before I gobble most of it down.”

The round rump red-head made a frustrated “Tch” through her teeth as she and the tall platinum blond strutted over your way, circling half the stuffing around an easy to reach path to your mouth as they closed in. You attempted a meager distraction of asking for an introduction; however, the maids quickly sliced open a Cinnamon, Chocolate Chip, Lemon and Vanilla Cream Swirl Bundt cake you could probably fit your elbow through to arm the four eyed devil enveloped you in her ominous shadow. “You want introductions again? Boring’s Sam, Dopy Tits is Christine and you can call me Margret.” Her pupils shrank as she shoved large chunk down your lips and strongly tickled your Adam’s apple to make it go down, “Right now your name is Porky – and you’re going to eat.” They giggled in a mechanical unison and your Brunch à la russe commenced.

Somewhere, between the buttermilk, blackberry and Mint Chocolate crumbed pancakes and fried breaded chicken tenders was when your paunch started to peep out of your shirt. And, of course, it caught the attention and teasing of everyone else. ”Uh oh, someone’s getting softer~”, cooed Christine as she drummed her fingers around your tight navel. You groaned more from the increasing pain of your new contents than the mocking, but thankfully, Christine and Sam protected you from Margaret’s claws hard pressing them even further. “Oh no, you don’t”, Sam yelled as she actually cat scratched Margie away with a sudden fury, “Master’s Belly is a wonderful little cinnamon bun of fun and you’re not going to pop it for your dumb kicks!” You erupt an urp of relief as you were able to rub your potbelly in peace while the ensuing rotund ruckus focused on a stuffing food fight amongst each other with the growing mess, weight abusing wrestling moves and really vicious name-calling.

However, you couldn’t even lean back without bumping into the glutting field of Rebecca’s dirty plates, pie tins and marinara and other sauce bowls - discarded and bled dry. Where you’d rather not think about how much you’ve probably swallowed down before it started to hurt, and judging by how far your pudge is sticking out, that’s no small amount; the Tomboy didn’t care to stop until there was no more she could fit in – or at least, until she topped herself off with a ridiculous high- calorie concoction of her own piggy design. Griping and grunting against the resistance her already bloated belly was giving her, Rebecca’s knack of crafting Tombstone concoctions of everything and drinking it down was about to reach a whole new pinnacle of mad science. Pulling in her side of the morning dessert reserve, your fat friend took a few mousses and milkshakes of varying flavors and sent them all down into a cool fondue pot full of gooey caramel. Even if you cannot look away from the oncoming act, both out of concern for her safety and a quiet interest to watch her pull it off; you still try to reach out a hand into her expanding middle, but your touch only encourages her.

The bottom-heavy cast iron pot tipped across Becca’s lips and you could feel every gulp of that sugary slurry cascade down into her gurgling stomach, ripping and tearing through what remained of old dependable Doom Guy into a barely stable stained bra. Further out her gut went, already bigger than even how you found her last night, yet your fingers craved to know this chunky comrade’s circumference chugging itself thicker. Your tips caressed and sunk around her taught bellybutton and Becca billowed out an excited “Mmmgh” that spoke to something primeval within you. Your pulse hastened the more of her you could hold onto, drawing you in closer to explore Rebecca’s form, which in turn caused her to consume faster and lean more your way. The few trickling streams she missed flowed down over her girth and your hands, mixing that still intoxicating sent of hers with a sticky saccharine lotion that travels wherever your mitts roam on her.

Your vision blurs, your actions feel like the movements of a stranger than fully conscious decisions, yet both you and Rebecca moan in harmony as your trunk contacts hers. You both feel each others heartbeat and it grows louder in your ear deafening out everything that isn’t Becca. Closer and fuller she balloons, the fattened athlete setting you off and you her. But this could never last with a finite amount of slop for your Rebby to swill. As the pot falls to the floor with an empty echo, Becca quivers in a helpless bliss as she slowly falls to her back, the impact shifting you on top of her and you both give a slightly irritated burp while settling into place. The Softball’s is the more impressive display, which makes her weakly smile and titter out a frail “I win”, as she gingerly rubs both of your intermingling flesh – however little she could actually do with even her flabby arms. Her blue eyes give you a euphoric haze as she meekly whimpers, “I can’t move CeeJ. What have you done to me?”

You’ve never been this thrilled before in your life. While you’ve always loved Rebecca more than just a mere friend, not even your wildest dreams that included her went this far. Involved those sort of urges, had her this willing and responsive to reciprocate those desires. This couldn’t be real – and yet, who else’s breathing is slowly raising you up and lowering you back down if not Rebecca’s?

However, waves of doubt and guilt came crashing over you as you didn’t want the only reason for you to love her just to be her body fat. You’ve cared for this girl more deeply than most people you’ve ever met, aside for Kate and Mom, and you just did this to Becca. You didn’t ask to touch her like that – you just did it anyway. You took advantage of your best friend. God, what do you even want?!

Should you just let this happen, does she really want you like this? Do you not want to sacrifice the friendship you already have on a gamble like this? Or is CJ Dalton once again completely clueless on whatever he wants in life?! Fuck!
11132222112112111221121222111.title: A Saucer full of Indecision

choices: Abuse the "easy excuse" you probably have to goof off with Becca for the day.
Go Shower and Roll onto whatever you can catch today. Mr. Boring.
111322221121121112211212221113.content:
Watching Becca’s momentary rapture begin to sour as she noticed your obvious inner angst session made it crystal clear your blubbered buddy or any other girl in this academy wasn’t the problem; CJ Dalton is sabotaging his own potential happiness as usual. “What’s the matter, honeybuns”, she huffed in as sultry of a manner as she could with you weighing down on her gargantuan belly, “Girlfriend not fat enough?” You can’t do this. You can’t lead on that cute ice-cream soup smeared mug or hurt her by being such an emotional wreck that you don’t even let yourself feel this shit. But Rebecca’s wounded yet crossed scowl has already read your body language and is on the warpath. “Oh, so this is when the Dalton slip occurs?!”

Your ashamed heavy brow and gritted teeth meet her slightly hiccuping aggravated acceptance that you were going to weasel your way back to square one yet again. “You know, I was actually stupid enough to think this time it was different. You came to me, in this weird – hup – voice, begging me to make you a better man, acting all interested in me and open about who you are. But now you start conveniently forgetting things.” Her accusing blues watch you hold your head trying to recall any of this and she barks, “Let me guess, CJ doesn’t remember any of that either!”

Becca flinches at the knots her rage is adding onto a way too full tummy and your attempt to shift off and help only pisses her off even more, “W-why are you always like this? Why do I have to go after your kink to get you to say I’m pretty? Am I some sort of sick game to you?”

Your legs curl into a semi fetal while your arms just try to hold onto Becca instead of aim anywhere in particular. The emotional combat zone in your head bubbles out in your eyes and snot, “Oh god, is that I how I made you feel?”

The Softball Girl tries to pull up her anger’s rudder, but you’ve easily shot down that Bomber into a mellowing concern for you. “Y-Yeah – you could maybe apologize or something a-and I could forgive you.” Unfortunately for your Big Fat Friend, however, you were about to let it all out instead of just take your bad boy punishment. “I want to love everything about you Becca. I want to enjoy doing anything with you, like it was before we got to this school.” Yet when you look at the now dried slurry trails your hands left on her mountain of a stomach, glistening in the light of the sun, self-contempt hardened your words while your tone cracks between pitches. “However, you were big the day we met, so the fear was always there. Even back then when I was still putting the pieces together.”

Becca’s face grew more protective the more you said, with her pudgy right hand rubbing through your wild bed locks, “Fear of what, Ceej?” You prop your thick chin around her upper belly fold, too embarrassed to notice how close you were to her exposed underboob flesh, so you can look her in the eye without any effort on Rebecca’s part. “Fear that I only care about how fat you are.” A flush brighter than her clay brown hair overtakes your ample amiga’s cheeks while you look away and bashfully move your finger around her bellybutton. “When the portions increase and you and everyone else started to use that to flirt with me – I feel like the biggest creep in the world. I constantly have to catch myself from peeping on every midriff stretched undershirt lifted up by too many snacks, counting all the uniform buttons that pop during class, hearing the sounds of endless gluttony everywhere I go and resist an ever growing horde of girls pushing my buttons every single day. And if I’m able to survive that – suddenly you come in and now almost all of our conversations involve you telling me how full you are or get me to brush up against your amazing body. It drives me crazy every time.” Your hand slaps to your forehead and you go pinker even noticing the kinetic force ripple out on her tight drum, “You’re not some fat pig that exists only for me to fatten whenever I feel like it, Rebecca!”

Still somewhat titillated by your choice of words, Beccy tries to soothe you down with a slightly mocking “Dude, you’re a teenage boy in a girl’s school. Fatty Perv or not, looking at a loose button is nowhere near sleeping around”; but you still worry there’s danger of you treating her as nothing but a disposable mound of lard instead of a person. “I’m just not ready for that kind of relationship now. You’re perfect in every way Becca and I’m just a goddamn mess. I’m sorry I made you feel this way and I’m sorry to ask even more from you, but I’m going to need time to unscrew my head about a lot of things.” Your sentiments put a sad smile on her face, but it was the “You deserve so much better” that finally drove her to pull you up as far as she could and squeeze you tight against her torso. “So this is what was wrong with my poor baby? Why didn’t you say anything before?”

You plant your head on her doughy left shoulder and give a probably too brutally honest answer, “Because I’m a moron.” “Yeah”, she laughs as she hugs you in tighter, “You’re my moron and I don’t like seeing my Ceej be so down on himself.” A serene calm filled the bedroom as you even stopped hearing the rumble of the maid fight below you, which also seems to give you another familiar sense of dread. She cuddles with you a little longer before Rebecca preemptively puts her fingers on your lips as she lays down the law. “Okay CJ, I’ll let you off the hook for now. It’s alright if you want to take your time.”

“However-”, her other hand starts to rip into the last stable strands in what was your shirt and Becca’s ravenous blues enjoy your conflicting instincts of ignore and observe, “-if you think I’m just going to stop when you tell me that all my little attempts at your heart are super effective, well, you’ve got another tight sensation in your pants coming, pal.” Her tan lined arms delicately hold your face as she savors your squirming, “I want you Ceej. So bad, I’m going to help you get over this weird hang up you seem to have over being the Fatty Perv I’ve seen you be – especially if this big belly you’ve fed has anything to say about it.” Becca hums a little tune as she sticks out her gut as far as she can, quivering with whatever slight movements she could make, and you’re too preoccupied to think clearly about what the hell you have been up to during these blackouts.

After some blood comes back to your brain you try to stumble out some words, yet she never gives you the chance. “Don’t worry, man. I’m a Fat Girl – when I make my moves, I’ll go nice and slow.” Her chubby finger edges closer to your nose between every word of “Just for you.” You’re way too hot and bothered to think, gotta get away, and maybe take a cold shower or ten. When you manage to brush off her hands and try to shift towards the door, a doughy pitcher’s hand tightly grabs onto your boxer strap as she makes a more routine Rebecca whine. “No – Please, stay with me, CJ!”

You look back to her oddly desperate mannerisms that you’d expect more from Kate having to deal with any social situation ever without you being her personal cover. “I mean – they already listed us as sick, right? Why not just blow off classes today and play hooky with me? I don’t care what we do, eating, talking, zoning out with some games.” An oddly vulnerable tickle in her words makes you want to help her as she pleads once more, “Let’s just stay together.”
111322221121121112211212221113.title: Waited So Long to Understand

Assume cleanliness transpired and move onto late period catch-up.
1113222211211211122112122211132.content:
As fun as it sounds, someone had to be the responsible one before most of the school learns of a girl being allowed to be your roommate, that you have the authority to decide for her to live with you and that you were apparently skipping class just hanging around there with her. And Rebecca currently looks to enjoy being beached a little too much to neither attempt nor care about moving around anytime soon. “Yeah, I’m gonna have to pass on that”, scooting just enough out of her reach, you brace both for an earful of “BUT CEEEJ” and the likely extra difficulty of navigating through this carbohydrate minefield with your already painfully stretched pot-belly. And when you finally found balance on your feet, the Tomboy, thankfully, merely used her words instead trying to throw things at you to stop.

“Oh come on, man! The Headmistress and her little bitch blimp would roll over to whatever you asked them-“, Becca stopped, noticing the slightly bigger wiggle around your middle and then remembered, “-Oh right. Whatever they agree to, they’d both make sure it involves a lot of food.” You almost burp out a sardonic “No, really”, but continue once your intestines stop trying to interrupt you. “They’re already sending too much as it is. But sure, let’s see what happens when I tell Claire I need a few days off because you’re shacked up with me.” Her sugar coated mug coiled into a several chinned scowl as Becca can already hear The Princess’s shrill, ceaseless yapping over anything and everything. “And let’s not forget about homework”, you continue to make her turn away with work nausea, but cut off her obvious rebuttal. “Even if we force Kate into being our note taker, you think it’s fair that you get to lounge around here when she’s doing all the work for us?”

Rebecca shows a little guilt at the idea you didn’t even let her fully have, but her new quirk shifts the tone in a way you didn’t expect. “Well, what if you let Katie stay here too?” Your eyes slightly twitch with a cold limp stare as you try process this latest bit of madness that could only make the discovery of your new residents even worse. “Hey, I don’t mind sharing you with my other favorite nerd”, she giggles in that a little too snide to really mean exactly what she said way that has turned your arms into her personal punching bag before. “That’s what we’ve already been doing for years at this point. And she really deserves an explanation on why you’re such a moron too.” You try to think about all the reasons why you shouldn’t involve Kate like that at all, yet the only thing that comes out is a defeated “Y-yeah”, to which the Tomboy gives a very knowing smug grin -- with a slight bitterness underneath.

It isn't like you all haven't slept-over with them before, even if Mom and your other friends started to suspect ulterior motives for inviting the girls over the older you all got. And this incredibly spacious High-Rise Penthouse has maybe over 15 rooms you don't really use between where your bed is, the bath, living room - okay, maybe you occasionally like looking at the view from the patio, wondered if you could have a nice BBQ with the outdoor kitchen and wouldn't mind having another dip in either the hot tub or spa pool with Becca and Kate; but that's not too extravagant.

Christ, who are you kidding? You're probably deeply indebted to the Masters for this likely several million dollar luxury flat that makes most of the other students living quarters look like hovels, and that's assuming this place isn't also some sort of shady creative book keeping on Mrs. Masters' part. Bunnie's joked that you could make mad cash renting pieces of "The Dalton Suite" out to the richest members of the student body, but you'd never do that to your gal pals. It's payment enough when they come over and make this gilded cage feel a little less lonely. And if potentially both of them stay here permanently, it wouldn't be so bad. Just two really lovely young women lazing about on their off time, wearing next to nothing because you inadvertently keep leaving around sets of cookies and other treats that they just couldn't help but graze on all the time. You certainly wouldn't judge them poorly for enjoying themselves. And if both of them got the crazy idea of taking a little not-so-skinny dipping float in the pool and just begged for their humble host to join you'd -- oh wow! NO! CJ, what the hell are you even thinking?!

When you finally shake some lewd thoughts involving both of your BFFs at once out of your head, the puritan stick up your ass wished to get some mutual silence from Becca on That Subject before you leave. “Hey…could you please not talk about what we’ve been doing --to other people that is.” Her dreamy blue eyes flux from a mild annoyance to a subtle suspicion. “C-jay”, she inhales as she raises an auburn brow, “I’m pretty sure your weirdo status is now a forgone conclusion since yesterday.” You clench your hands around not so firm shoulders as you nervously blurt out, “I-I don’t care what anyone else knows or says about me liking Fat Girls! My words were just for your ears only, Becca. Please don’t tell anyone else!”

The softball girl’s chubby palm covered her mouth as Rebecca’s gentle gaze desperately tried to hide the snickering you could easily hear. But when she raised her left to point next to you, all you could do was growl out an agitated groan to the suspicious smiles of the three maids, responding in their own ways with a mostly polite, “Hello, Master CJ.” Your anger boils up as you frantically shout “DON’T ANY OF YOU SAY ANYTHING EITHER”, to which they all give a stereotypical salute with their right, while hiding likely crossed left fingers around their ample backsides. “We promise, Master!”

“Poor C-Baby”, Beccy lovingly quips, “nothing ever goes his way in the end.” You start to grumble as you storm off out the door, kicking over trollies in your way and feeling like an imbecile for ever telling her anything. “And don’t keep eating until you can’t fit outside of my bedroom, Becca! You’re going back to class real soon!” You hear a faint “No promises on that, handsome~” that only aggravates you further as you work your way to the shower. But an exited thumping quickly squeezes you from behind and almost makes you trip down the second story stairwell.

The strange pulling sensation around your legs turned out to be Sam. A little disheveled, heavier and sporting a very new, revealing window to exactly how her moderately sized breasts nestle into her welcoming belly; which swerves your head into an erratic U-turn back to the silver hand railing you now cling to for dear life as pools of sweat lubricate your goosebumps. “That wasn’t very nice Master CJ”, her sporty nature follows a tender worshiping touch of all your dimensions that could compete with the Fan Club or even Claire’s CJ obsession. But unlike most Dalton hunters, her wild jade eyes burned with an intense hazel sunburst, fully devoted to some transcendental aspect about you, instead of just raw animalistic lust exploding the moment you arrive. “After I won the right to be Master’s personal attendant for the day, you try and run away!”

Noticing that the ceiling is a lot closer than usual, it dawns on you that Sam is actually lifting you up in the air by your legs. The surprise loosens your grip enough for the plump servant to sling you across for an impromptu piggy-back, with Sam giving a very suggestive chuckle as you unintentionally clutch her folds. “Comfy?” Full lips chide you for jostling about her bumpy ride as you bounce on dusky humps to a soak. Unclean thoughts race through your blood and into your brain, she couldn’t possibly be wanting to – y-you don’t even know her! Your attempts to escape from her grasp become more desperate the closer you get to the wide curtain gateway, yet a titan like hold keeps you buried into your new retainer.

“Don’t you worry your pretty little head, Master CJ”, the maid proudly proclaims as she takes a moment to appreciate your gurgling lump before disrobing your shirt and underwear before you even knew they were off, “I’ll make sure both of us are nice and clean for all the fun we’ll have today!” Your hands cover your unmentionables while Sam shamelessly nudges you under the shower head. One last effort to avert this clumsily came out in an “I can bathe myself just f-fine, Thank you!” However, unfortunately for your dignity, her silhouette immediately flings the tattered dress to the winds, a lacy bra and garter casually thrown on top of the bar holding up the curtains and her bare curvy physique wobbles on over to turn on a burst of cold water.

The high-pitched squeal you give to the frosty downpour was swiftly 180ed to the cream colored wall tiles in front of you when it became evident that Sam really was going to shower with a stranger. Juicy thighs lowered delicate toes into the rising tides, she hummed a sweet nothing tune to herself while pulling the curtain behind and clearly making a yummy sound at the sight of you. The shroud of drips accentuates all of her movements while drowning out any outside noise. It's just you and the crazy girl.

“What’s wrong Master?” How in God’s name can Sam say that in such a pure way as she lumbers on over and presses her warm belly all over your back?!

Your stuttering to the contact from her fingertips feeds the servant’s need to toy with you. “Still a little groggy it seems”, Sam murmurs into your neck as the temperature rises with her kneading the water across the pores of your chest and pudge. When her hands stop, draping themselves under your navel, the maid rests her double chin on your right deltoid, purring out “Does Master need special treatment to wake up for his piggy?”

11132222112112111221121222111321.content:
Acting on your Instincts you immediately slap down Sam’s hands, while you curve your arms around your chest, stimulated, but unwilling for whatever the outrageous olive skinned maiden had in mind.

“Cut it out” you nervously yell at the wall. Her movements were slow after that, with her flabby mitts hovering over gently before the touchy-feely subordinate made very ginger brushes across your shoulders. You didn’t dare to look back and check what she was up to because – well—you know. “Did I take things too fast, Master? I’m sorry; I…I didn’t mean to upset you.”

There was a genuine sympathy to her tone, even if something cynical digesting inside you didn’t trust the servant to be all that altruistic. And that unsettled feeling in the pit of your gut, immediately bore fruit when Sam’s clingy digits began to pet deeper and deeper around you as she picked up something that what was hopefully just soap.

A noticeably cold drip of oil and cream slid down your back and swiftly evaporated into the now cozy fog of the steam and Sam’s lathering embrace. Their mixing fragrances couldn’t hide her tittering as the slippery foam spread around, including onto her own jiggling mass as it pressed and stretched about you. ”Such a messy boy…”, she teased lounging her bulk atop you and enjoying the way you wriggled in feebleness, unable to stop Sam’s fingers from frolicking through your chunk, “Quite frustrating I must admit, the more I try to figure out the right way to rub the genie out of the bottle, the more you trickle onto me.”

With an excited breath huffing at the back of your neck; a sinister shiver runs through your nerves, you could sense her joyful primal moaning spell out her naughty thoughts; “Oh yes, I have a wonderfully Grinchy idea.”

“Master, would you mind if we scrubbed each other?” she asked knowing full well you had little to no say in the matter. The laid-bare maid predicted your reflex to escape from the corner she’s backed you into and easily locked your wrist under her large meaty armpit before proceeding to wash under your own. “Geeze, you really are skittish!” Sam said, snappily and now with her own playful pretense dropped. You could almost make out her still incredibly thick brown hair, slightly straitened by the constant downfall, touching the corner of your vision and face as she reads deeper into your clouded and confused countenance. “I’m impressed Master. I know this whole shy boy thing is an act, but you go above and beyond my ability to deceive.”

It’s been a weird couple of days, and now as one of Claire’s own servants insists to scrub you down, there isn’t any time to question this MASTER what she’s going on about. While you’re lost in your thoughts, Sam decides to firmly grasp your arms and turn you around to “wash that pretty boy face.” Your pathetic best efforts at fighting this fate don’t even make her clench down to keep you from slipping away, and to be honest, there were much more rotund issues slowly orbiting into view that you needed to cover your eyes for. With the last moments you had left you quickly hide your own shame, and slightly bend backwards while closing your eyes much to the girl’s dismay. “Oh come now, there’s no need to be self-conscious”, Sam jests in a tone that suggests she’s already seen the goods -- this possibility doesn’t make you feel any more stress-free. She pats your still packed tummy and lowers her forehead next to yours, “Big man like you ain’t got a thing to be ashamed of for taking a little peak. If you open those handsome eyes of yours up and keep it quiet, I won’t even tell Miss Masters what happens next.”

You question at the way she hints at why Sam would specifically break the rules for you – or even if there is some clause in which this whole situation Princess and her mother may have cooked up that could turn on its head. Sam’s brawny brown body is dangerously close to your own now, there’s no need for sight to feel her middle pushing up to smoosh your navel and her own together in a love lock, your belly buttons smooching together as much as you feel the frisky girl wants to make out this very moment. Sam’s stomach vise is only getting tighter as the servant leans in closer, her hands cradling your chin and gently whispering “Please let me see your eyes, Master.”

Nuh-uh, not going to happen – even if she’s hot, Sam seems more interested in this “sensual” shower than you ever could be in doing this. It just wouldn’t be right…right? She makes soft groans as she prods and pokes about your chest, tickling right around where you’d be able to feel ribs, if you weren’t getting so portly yourself. Sam grew intense the more you resisted, sucking her teeth before spitting out a low whining “come on~” as you continue to stonewall her. The poking you could handle, but your plan couldn’t withstand her dirtiest tactic yet of moving her digits back to your face and finally going in for a kiss, one that felt like it lasted an hour.

She’d obviously had experience with this sort of thing, as her methodical, yet dainty circling of her own tongue, slips in for one electric jolt of your senses, than ducking out for a few minutes of traversing every corner of your mouth. Sam’s pink lower lip never dried between the constant drizzle pouring over both of you and the intermingling body fluids traveling the tonsil river. CJ Dalton never thought himself anywhere close to an expert of kissing, I mean, you’ve always been too embarrassed to even think about possibly dipping in further when any of your gal pals got in just a little too close to avoid mixed signals; however, at this moment something felt natural. You seemed to instantly pick up the rhythm of letting the dark skinned beauty take the lead, but unthinkingly followed suit on your own at times. You don’t even know what a lip lock is, and yet here you are switching through a variety of techniques; complete closed, intertwining, and pouting with perfect lip posture like this isn’t your first rodeo! (WHERE DID YOU EVEN LEARN WHAT THOSE POSITIONS WERE?)

But like a moron, you’ve opened your eyes and are looking at Sam the servant’s smug giggling smirk as it pulls out and teases your lips going for one last spit trade, only for her to dip around your Adam’s apple. “See-”, she says, beaming with a partial pride, but a look that still isn’t satisfied with whatever the girl really wants from you, “You even kiss like Master. And I saw your moves on Miss Maglen’s body earlier, worshiping her growing mass. All I need to hear is the right voice say Sorry I kept you waiting and I’ll know it’s the real deal.” Her lashes lowered for a moment as Sam enjoyed mimicking that strange husky voice a little too much.

A slight pressure needles across your head as for whatever reason, her words weren’t just confusing but giving you a headache. “Sam, what the hell do you want from me? Why do you keep calling me Master?”

The attendant pulls her head back a little for you to notice how she’s almost as tall as you, yet somehow a slight speck shorter. Thick curls twist with drips across her wild green irises as her neck shifts to the right. “I’m talking about the real you, silly. The guy I need to see again and will do anything for.”

The words boomed about your head with a troubling echo, the idea that all these weird things you’ve apparently been doing in your blackouts – they were the real CJ Dalton which you clearly aren’t. You can’t even deny that you aren’t happy with what has recently happened with Rebecca, at least in some ways. And with how this near perfect stranger opens up to you, in this sort of situation, you are already too hoped up on hormones to think clearly about anything, let alone maintain the will power to not have something stand at attention now of all times.

“I’ve heard Claire preach about you for days, but even the wildest rumors about CJ don’t do justice to the Master I’ve found. And even just a small taste’s got me hooked on having even more of you.” Yet the praising, enamored smile quickly fades as she notices how down you must obviously look, your head slightly pushing hers back as it begins to droop down. “Hey,” she worryingly nudges you as you start to notice her heartbeat beating along with your own. “Is something wrong? I’ll back off if you aren’t in the mood right now to p-“.

A loud rapping at your bathroom door along with a muffled, yet clearly agitated yelling shocks Sam into a more sobering personality. “Shoot” she yelps, along with a few other more overt expletives as she quickly pours water and scrubs your hair. “J-Just a minute, we’re almost done!” Whatever may be coming down your face is easily hidden by the rest of the water falling in swift dunks.

Whoever could it be at the door?

The whiplash from wet scrubbing to the dry rubbing of towels was so severe; you didn’t know what was going on until Sam’s panicked clean-up was over. Both of you were instantly draped and dry by the time Margaret’s strict wobbling thighs shook their way over and gave the both of you a scrupulous eye. With most of her weight around her lower body, every step was another ripple across the redhead’s fat inflated legs, with her shanks potentially already forming the basis of cankles and hidden knees; but with the lion’s share of weight going to her glutes that were already dangerous enough to knock over or squeeze all over you as she got close. You were fighting the very idea to give a keen observation of how big she really was due to the severe carnivorous aura that jiggled around classy, yet powerful high heel talons clacking about the floor tiles.

“Oh, whatever could have happed here…I wonder”, she flicked a lone fiery bang from her rectangular rimless glasses as Margie really leaned in on Sam, catching the fellow servant with her hand around the proverbial Doughboy Jar. The long strand rested around her plump double chin, but even with a corporate casual ribbon tie, Margaret rocked a kind of feathery several knotted back tie that made her deep crimson ends curl around her front while making an arguably adorable tail in the back. (Or shark’s dorsal fin depending on how you looked at it.)

The big-bellied girl scratched her still dripping brown locks mostly cocooned in a white towel bun as she pulled out an innocent face, “Just helping Master take a nice hot shower.”

“Helping Master take a shower?” Margaret began to echo Sam in her frantic explanations as her heavy thighs sashayed around the room, both likely to intimidate her colleague and maybe to give you a quiet showing of her more pronounced attributes. The firebrand made an overblown performance of pondering while you were distracted by how the white trim of the Margaret’s dress could barely contain the curvature of her hips, already broken in by her thick waistline and unable to do anything about her gelatinous ass but peacock about the maid’s back shelf as a tantalizing tattered plumage that barely covered her lacey undergarments wobbling between plump cheek folds and fraying fishnet leggings.

“Just, helping Master take a shower?” she said again, this time leaving a pregnant pause as she turned to face the mirror and sink, making sure that she could look at both of you with a cynical smile; “Funny, I only heard the water turn on once. Surely, our perfectly little Sam wouldn’t have done anything untoward with our new Master.” When she turned, you attempted to look away from completely ogling at how far her blue panties sunk into the fissure of her rump and other lewder aspects. Unfortunately for you, however, Margaret always seemed to know what position to display onto the vanity to drag your attention back onto the bottom-heavy Dom.

“Oh – well”, Sam coughed and scratched her barely covered, three towel tied midriff trying to come up with a lie even she wasn’t sure was possible. “Master’s kind of an environmental baby and didn’t want to waste water.” The brunette tugged on your arm hard for you to affirm this, but even after you eventually gave a delayed and half-thinking nod of confirmation from out of your scattered focus, it was clear to all three of you that your role right now was a toy being fought over between two blimps.

Taking advantage of this, Margaret shifted her lumbering axis around you and openly savored you sweating anxiously over how a slight inhale would possibly make contact with her folds. “He doesn’t seem to be as thrilled as he should be, if you really have been acting as stupid as you look, and done what I’ve think you’ve done.” Four eyes’ vile snicker only angered Sam further with an air of repeated hostility you were all too familiar with.

“Back off, Fifty-Shades-Of-Freak”, somehow, Sam’s round face pulled off a menacing glower, despite her already puffy jowls inflating out a little bit further and making you think of fugu for some reason; “Nothing bad happened and besides…he didn’t show up.” Margaret apparently shared some of your confusion, but the peculiar wordless language through expressions the servants gave each other hinted that they were talking about that “real” you – and this subject was really starting to piss you off.

It wasn’t the worst thing that more cute girls were apparently that obsessed about you, but the change in how everyone is treating you as some ancillary limb to the actual imaginary person instead of just some turkey to be stuffed that made this all go from bad to worse. Ah, whatever – it’s not like pissing and moaning about it anymore now will solve anything.

The Redhead seemed shocked, however, you quickly wanted to go back to being uninvolved in the conversation when her interests turned towards your gurgling gut, uncomfortably protruding over the damp cloth you vigilantly had to hold up to make sure it didn’t slip around your growing, overripe hips – or reveal anything other potentially embarrassing thing.

“Well Sam…if Sugar doesn’t work”, her red tinted nails unleashed a slightly painful, but not so violent slap to against your stomach, making it jiggle just enough for you to have some trouble keeping your towel up; “maybe spice will bring ‘him’ out.” Sam’s bountiful physique immediately bounced in front you; the protective instinct radiating from her crackling clenched fist was not as notable as her not so small backside and back fat rubbing up against your thighs.

“Hey! Need another fat lip to know your place or do I gotta move onto your eyes, Marge?”

The Kaiju battle of Corpulence between Shin Gutzilla and Queen Thighorah could be potentially destructive for this too costly to even imagine apartment - if their overripe features would ever let them actually successfully grapple to set off the fight that is. The fatties were struggling first to be able to trade blows, from Sam's gut smooshing into the slightly smaller mean girl's face to her own legs inadvertently trapping the belly bomb's as they try to figure out footing without further colliding their abundant bodies into odder positions. The two of them somehow managed to stay hostile no matter what resistance their crowded location and own forms gave them, and as their lardy bickering continued to jostle around, let's just say neither of the two heifers were going unnoticed by you bearing the brunt of every quivering ounce shaking and wobbling all over you.

God help you if they ever manage to twister themselves over and fall right on top of you.

As the two tubbies threatened one another, you noticed the doorknob between their two meaty flanks; immediately taking the chance to slip around this seemingly endless confrontation so you can make maybe the last period class if you hurry. However, they didn’t seem to care, nor follow after you too quickly, despite how many waves you triggered in their collective chub from trying to tip-toe around Sam’s position, with what felt like 7 pounds of crap hanging inside your stomach. Out the door and on the floor, you nervously laugh at the idea that you’re seriously “stealthily” raiding your own wardrobe in fear that either that last of the trio of servants is just as crazy as the rest of them or Rebecca tries to cram her bulk into the door way to keep you from leaving.

It's amazing how one day is making even your regular class life at this chubby laden 'paradise' now have degrees of sanity. What should be happening is maybe an uncomfortable amount of attention from Princess, a potentially romantically tense situation from your BBFs that you could stumble out of without breaking anyone's heart, a slightly shameful amount of weight being gained and maybe - just maybe - some peaceful learning could happen after you were chased by a wheezing fat mob in the span of a week tops. But most of this all happened in maybe the span of an hour, and your instincts are telling you its only going to escalate?!

How many ways can your weirdo buttons be pushed in one day and could your poor grasp of reality or heart survive it all?

You open the door back to your room, but what you found was – um – an interesting answer to this question to say the least?

Christine the last of the three servants, loomed over an even further engorged Becca, still pinned to the bed and possibly in some semi-conscious state, a funnel in her mouth ready to swallow down the series of cartons, liter bottles, and jugs, most of which your friend had already seemed to have guzzled her way through. For such a sinister looking situation, Christine doesn’t really give off much of an air of menace. In fact, her warm smile and demeanor as she approaches you give the impression that this was more of a minor chore that she happened to get stuck with. One she’d obviously like to ditch and shift her attention onto you if possible. ”Yeah, I know what it looks like…”, her half curly and spike bob, half buzz cut kept clinging around her plump cheek bones no matter how many times she tried to fling or blow it out of her way, “but she ate herself this way until the girl hit a nice food nap – and then she wouldn’t stop trying to crawl around like some obese zombie, mumbling about more. Quieted down when the funnel fed her some heavy cream though.”

Oh, right, Rebecca’s sleep-eating. You instinctively slap your own head which makes the blond break out into a slow, drawl like laugh which sends a pleasant shake across her chest until she catches herself and course corrects her tone. “Yep, that’s where I was a while ago too, but now that you’re here-”, she was close enough to notice maybe the inch or two Christine had over you, widening the dimpled Cheshire grin on her face, “-would you be a real gent and feed me a little to me too?”

Your gaze instinctively droops down to her moderate belly pushing against her loosely buttoned and laced black bodice; but squished under the possible back straining weight of her very large, yet firm breasts and hips that could compete with Margie if she had to same ass width: specifically the size of a water melon. Christine's bronzed, shapely legs held a few faded stretch marks and scar tissue, the latter of which specifically were found around casually bare feet that wrapped one heavy thigh about your own. Her chubby hands squish your cheeks and heats up your already flushed face as she pushes you in a little further into her waist, “See how small and pitiful my poor tummy is? I promise I won’t keep you too long, just a little of your love would be wonderful in there.” Dumbfounded, you watch her drop down and cozy up to a beached and jiggling Becca, snagging the cone and planting it between her lips with an eager pleading gaze begging you to do it.

“S-sure, if that’s what you want, Christine” you shyly obey her whims, grabbing the nearest carton of what seems to be extra milk-fat saturated Heavy Whipping Cream produced by some weird company that started with a Y. Honestly, whoever made whatever chunky, white substance you channeled into the blonde wasn’t as important as the spectacle she made out of steadily inhaling it all down, happily moaning and patting her stomach as it stretched out further, yet nowhere near the current hypnotic girth of Becky’s minor ocean of a belly. The ecstasy of eating in itself set the hourglass off in ways maybe not even Ol’ Claire reached, with her rotund arms exploring her tautness and playing with all excess that became even more gluttonous little Chrissy. And when it finally emptied into her, Christine curled on the bed like a satisfied obese cat, fat toes and fingers tugging at the sheets, apparently enjoying the sheer pressure her new contents filled her with. “Ohh…HURP! Thanks, Boss. That really hit the spot.”

You weren’t sure whether the girl was more of a shameless foodie than another contender for the Drive CJ Dalton Crazy game everyone at this school loves to play, but when the eager eater tugs your right down and gently influences your tips to cradle her breast before you yank it back, her yearning smile sends chills down your spine.

But it didn’t take long for those same pleading browns to hit you with a look that said “Take Me! Right here, right now!” and – no, NO! You don’t have time for this! Yeah, she’s hot as hell, b-but come on. Right there with Becca too?!

“Sorry, I gotta go - like, right now” you rush a red shirt over your head and struggle to find your shoes, inadvertently agreeing to continuing your session with Christine so long as she lets you go NOW. You didn't even care to switch the shirt around so you weren't wearing it back-wards, you needed to leave before you cannot fight this sight anymore!

“Okay, Hoss, I’ll work up a nice appetite for you when you come back~” Christine says hauntingly blissful, as you leave the room of temptation.

First it was Rebbeca trying to coyly let you run wild with feelings you’re still not entirely sure you’re 100% okay with, now the Masters weird maids being even more strangely seductive than usual; is everyone here to trying to set you off like an atomic bomb?!

And speaking of seduction, a now well-dressed Sam and Margaret await you, looking at a tablet screen with worried faces. “Tubby, you need to see this if you want to get out of here” Margaret crudely jests as she grabs and pulls you between the soft embrace of both maids while you look down on the monitor.

“Holy shit, it’s like Night of the Overfed down there!” you bluntly quip as what looks like a sizable mob of CJ Fanclub Zealots banging on the glass doors of your complex’s lobby doors, making a typical ruckus in the ways only those weirdos can. Another clear violation of not only generally known Chubbeso rules yet again, but now going over the line of the promised ‘safe spaces’ Princess set up after the siege of your original dorm was half the reason they locked you away in this tower: to send a clear message that CJ was off limits. Oh, sorry, what they officially stated said was “To encourage proper respect of different students.” Of course, she also used that incident to kick the rest of her co-founders out, seize total control of the club and started to gently remind you that you were always welcome to move in with her – but you thought you were at least done with this nonsense!

"Nice one, Porky”, the red head praised you with her fork tongue and a slap of your own pesterer, “Maybe there is hope for you yet!”

“Don’t be your usual bitchy self to Master, this is serious” Sam punches Margie in the arm, sending a small current of waves between their flesh that crashes and ripples all about you.

“Fine” the firebrand huffs out as she leans her head on your shoulder, “Okay ‘Master’, who’s going to deal with the trash?”
1113222211211211122112122211132121.title: Getting to Know your Help, Part Deux.

choices: The cooking club co advised by Mrs. Blake and Miss. Telleri
The sumo club advised by Mrs. Touya
Something else
114.content:
"Mr. Dalton I need your assistance". Said a familiar voice. While you, Rebecca and Kate were walking to homeroom your homeroom teacher was stuck. Mina Kawasaki had her huge gut wedged in a doorframe and by the looks of it she was stuck pretty tight in their. "Stuck again Mrs. Kawasaki"? You said in annoyed tone. "I'm not playing around Mr.Dalton"! She said in a strict voice. Mina is the most serious teacher in the entire school, she's so serious that some call her the "iron gut". She was so serious to everyone around her weather its friends or students and staff. She was even serious with herself she always wore tight clothing which only hugs her gigantic body and looks like its about to burst at any moment. However she is never as strict with you as she with everyone else. Usually if a person is late to her class by a second after the bell rings she'd give that person detention. But in your case she just gives a warning not to be late again.

"If we help you out, you give us detention right"? You asked. "Of course not this does not count for being late". She said in a more calmer tone. "Alright come guys lets see if we can get her out of there". You said. Then Kate grabbed one arm, you and Rebecca grabbed the other and pulled as hard as you could. "Man she's wedged in there tight". Rebecca said while pulling as with all her might. After a few minutes of pulling and Kate running out of energy a few times you managed to get Mrs. Kawasaki free. Of course as soon as she got free, she lost her balance and fell but you were there to cushion the fall literally. "Thanks for breaking my fall Mr. Dalton". She said trying to get up. "Don't mention it now can you please get off of me". You struggled to say due to her weight crushing your body. After she got up the group continued to homeroom and made it.

After she did role call the announcements were started which were the same as usual but near the end there was an extra announcement. "Just a reminder to everyone that today is club tryout day". "Which means everyone explores the school and finds a club, team, or activity your are interested in and sign up that's all". Said the speaker. "This should be interesting". You thought to yourself. You kept in mind that there are two clubs you should avoid the swim team because chris hates your guts, and your fanclub for obvious reasons. "Hey CJ why don't we all join a club together". Rebecca whispered. "Even Clarie, by the way where is she"? You said curiously. "She was running a bit behind schedule but she said she'd catch up with us shortly..and yes the royal hippo can join with us". She said reluctantly. "This will be fun". Kate said in realy quiet voice. After homeroom you and your friends left to find a club to join. But which one?
114.title: Helping a teacher and finding a club.

choices: Yay! Cooking Club! The first meeting is after school!
Oh yeah! Cooking Club! You sure do bring in a lot of people the next day!
Oh Snap! Cooking Club! So much food!
1141.content:
"Let's try out for the Swim Club!" Kate said energetically.

"Yeah, let's not..." you sulk at the mere thought of even getting even remotely close enough to Chris for her to punch you, forget joining a club with her!

"Kate, that's kind've a sensitive topic..." strokes your shoulder encouragingly

As you and your friends trod down the hall at a snail's pace, none out of the three of you had so much as poked your head into any of the doors left open for potential club-goers all around the school. Being the first day of the second semester, Winter Clubs were open for recruitment and Summer Clubs were closing. As such, both second period and half of third had been cancelled so that students could walk around the school and weigh the options regarding which of the many clubs offered they would like to join. Of course you were no exception, having the only guy in school on a team or in a club was a strange honor in a way! So with that, all of your teachers had strongly encouraged you to pick something worthwhile and fulfilling. Unfortunately, nothing seemed to catch your eyes...

Mainly you were just doing this because you had to. Being part of the "Going Home Club" since early childhood, you weren't that into club activities. But more importantly, you were doing this in hopes of getting to spend more time with your friends; and hopefully make some new ones.

However, making new "friends" didn't seem like it was going to be a real option...

"LET GO!!" a chubby brunette shouted as she tugged at your arm, "CJ's joining the Photography Club!!" on the opposite side, a bulky blond tugged at your other appendage, "No! He's joining the Volleyball team!" you couldn't do much other than just stand there, not much hope of getting out of this hold. Besides, Rebecca was coming to the resuce just like always. She tugged at your middle and used her superior bulk to yank you away from the two feuding fatties, "Alright, break it up, break it up!" she said sternly. "You alright, CJ?"

"I think you made my shoulders pop!"

"Well good, next time don't dawdle." she giggled as she pushed you in the right direction, slapping you on the butt to hurry you up. "So, have any time while you were in there to think about what club you want us to join?" she said cheerfully. "No... and I'm really just thinking about giving up on the whole "club" thing and just going back to my flat..." Becca smiled, "Oh come on CJ, don't be that way, besides I think we've found one that you'll really enjoy."

You look up at her round face, her long brown hair framing those chubby cheeks of hers that bunched up as she smiled at you, "Really, like what?" you ask somewhat meekly, hope rising ever so slowly.

"You'll see in a sec, come on, I left Kate there so I would see it again."
***
"Hey Hey, it's CJ Dalton!" a familiar voice calls to you, instantly you recognize it as the bringer of glorious food, the one who gives you all those delicious meals when it comes lunch time. "Bunnie!" you shout back, rushing up to give her a quick fist pump, "What's up, you running a cooking club this semester?" you ask casually

"Sure am!" she says energetically, her rounded face bearing a big smile like always, "Me and Ms. Telleri got approval to co-sponsor, so we're hoping for a big turnout- and with you signed up we'll be sure to get it!"

She shows you in by sliding back into the wide doorway, her humongous boobs still making a bit of an obstacle of themselves as you try to avoid headbutting her cleavage. And surprisingly, taking in the overall obesity that engulfed the student body (or bodies), and all the delicious goodies laid out, Kate and an unfamiliar (though quite rotund) woman were the only two people in the classroom! "Yeah, sad, huh?" Bunnie said solemnly, "You'd think with how great my food is and how popular Ms. Telleri is, we'd have a way better turnout."

"Yeah, you'd really think so!" Rebbecca said as she made her way over to the confection table, "I know your stuff is good Ms. Telleri, why wouldn't anyone sign up?!" she turned to her teacher, who sighed through her cupcake, "The Culinary Arts are so underappreciated..." she said quietly as she eyed her cupcake in a Hamlet-esque fashion before devouring the poor pastry. "So, what do you say CJ?" Bunnie jumped in front of you, "Ya wanna join my club?"

"W-Well, yeah!" is all you can say, how could you turn down your good ol' buddy Bunnie in her hour of need?! "So long as this doesn't interfere with our Game Night!"
1141.title: The Cooking Club

choices: “Sure!” gaining enthusiasm for gourmet food.
“No thanks!” You suggest someone else for the job. (Rebecca maybe?)
11413.content:
At the academy the next day, posters for the Cooking Club are spread everywhere, all with your face notably plastered on them. You finally make it through the school day, and enter the club’s room. Bunnie Blake is already there and from the looks of it she’s had quite the head start for the club preparing a lot of food.

“Hey CJ thanks so much for coming, please have as much as you want.” she says smiling intently. She happily watches as you chew down on one of your favorite baked goods of hers, those creamy Chocolate Éclairs.

“Delicious” you say breathlessly finishing one of the rather large pastries and quickly helping yourself to a second. Bunnie returns your smile, serenely content watching you stuff yourself on her baked goods. If fact if you didn’t know any better you would think that she’d been trying to fatten you up since your first day here!

“If you think those are good you haven’t tried anything yet.” Claire’s voice suddenly cuts in sharply as the rest of her immediately enters the room, followed by a gaggle of girls, including Rebbecca and Kate with Mrs. Telleri bringing up the rear end of the group. Claire promptly walks up to you and holds up a tray full of the gooey chocolate brownies. “I made these today in cooking class of course with a little help from Mrs, Telleri! I know you’ll simply love them CJ!” She throws a knowing wink at Mrs.Telleri. Trying one you find the chocolate brownies are surprisingly good, additively good!

“Well it seems everyone is ready!" Said Mrs. Telleri. “But before the club can official begins, we need to elect a club representative. Any suggestions?” she asks the room.

“I elect Claire!” a girl’s voice calls from the group, and a round of cheers and aye’s go up.

“Any objections Claire?” asks Bunnie

“No mam” Claire answered pristine, ravishing any chance to be the center of attention.

The club continues normally from there, with the caring Bunnie showing her passion for cooking as well as some of her best tricks of the trade. Bunnie concluded the club session for the day by showing in great detail how to make her famous lasagna baked just right, handing around platefuls for the club to sample.

“Very good everyone!” Mrs.Telleri and I are look forward to seeing everyone's results at the next meeting.” she said happily, and you’re happy for her too now that the club has come off as big success.

“Wait Miss Blake…” said Claire impatiently raising her hand.

“Uhh…yes Claire?” Bunnie asked pointing a finger to her.

“I think we should have an official taste tester don’t you? I know every good cooking club has one”. Claire said using her new club head status to already throw her weight around.

“Really?” said Bunnie who definitely wanted to be a good cooking club.

"Oh yes! And I know just the person to elect for the position, CJ Dalton! All in favor?”

A cheer of “Aye” fills the classroom. You’re surprised to see even Kate and Bunny has their hands raised!
