“Oh!” Bunnie said now fully understanding what Christine had in mind. “What a splendid idea, but you know we can’t force him to be taste tester for all of our food.”

“Awwwww!” moaned the crow of girls unanimously disappointingly.

“It’s up to you, do you want the position?” Bunnie asks eagerly awaiting your response. Her eyes tell you that it would be doing her a big favor if you were a regular, and you’d be bringing in even more supporters to her club. Thinking about it Bunnie Blake was one of the nicest people at the whole school and you'd love to help her out, but on the other hand whoever had the job would defiantly be putting on some weight as a result, not that you would really mind, but maybe it was a task better suited for someone else.

Finally you make up your mind and say...
11413.title: Oh Snap! Cooking Club! So much food! Food for you?

choices: Your first assignment as the taste tester, or
the next day at cooking class
114131.content:
You look around the classroom and see everyone's pleading eyes looking at you. You know if you take the position as tast tester you will most likely gain even more wait, and you already had a hard time buttoning your pants up this morning. You turn to look at Bunnie and she too is giving you a pleading look with her puppy dog eyes. You would be doing her a big favor by agreeing, also you would get to hang out with Bunnie more and get to try more of her delicious food. Now that you think about it, maybe being the taste tester wont be so bad. You have finally made up your mind.
"Sure, I'll be the taste tester"
Everyone in the room starts cheering, while you wonder what you just got yourself into.
114131.title: “Sure!” gaining enthusiasm for gour...

choices: The next cooking meeting, everyone works even harder to make even tastier food
Rebecca is angry you didn't compliment her food
1141311.content:
At the start of the next cooking club meeting you notice there seems to be even more members. No doubt word of your accepting the position of taste tester convinced a few girls on the fence to join in. The possibility that these girls accepted the old maxim about the way to man's heart had already occurred to you, and during the school day a particularly devious idea had come to you. Perhaps there was a way to turn this to your advantage...

“Now then!” Bunnie said, bringing the chatter to a halt, “Why don't we start our meeting with a simple little cook-off? Unofficial, of course, there's nothing at stake here. But it will give those of you who don't take cooking a chance to familiarize yourself with the kitchen and its materials.”

Under Bunnie's direction the club members were divided into pairs – you being put with Claire – and the students were let loose to come up with whatever creation they wanted.

There was no shortage of possibilities: even for a cooking classroom the fridges and pantries were well-stocked, and the different pairings came up with a variety of dishes including appetizers, entrees and desserts.

Claire decided on something simple, Hershey's Kisses wrapped up in balls of dough and baked. At first you were confused why she wasn't trying something a little more... show-offy, but less than half an hour later you understood her game. While all the other pairs were still working on their dishes, Claire's was finished, which meant it was time for you, as taste-tester, to do your job.

They were good. Nothing spectacular, but good nonetheless. And as you sat there, making small talk with Claire, you ended up eating over half the batch of desserts. More than necessary as taste-tester, but as Claire's devious smile told you upon realizing this she couldn't have you sitting around for an hour waiting for something to eat, could she?

When Bunnie called all the pairs together to display their dishes, there were more than a few evil eyes directed at Claire, a sign of things to come. The other students gathered around you two in a circle, the desk you were sitting at filled with dishes ranging from the impressive to the elaborate.

“Well, CJ.” Bunnie began. “It's your first time as taste tester. Make sure to get a couple good bites of each dish, and consider your remarks carefully.”

You have to suppress a grin at that last part. Of course you'd be careful with your words. Your plan, the plan you came up with earlier, hinged on it.

You start with the dish right in front of you, a shrimp po' boy. As you take a large bite and chew it you scan the faces of the women around you, noticing a couple tense and excited. Clearly the ones who prepared this dish. You recognized them from your fan club, but they didn't stand out in any special way. Perfect.

The food's not bad. The mustard they put on it was a bit watery, but that was the only real criticism you could think of. But what you say is

“It's really good.” And you give the two a thumbs up.

You take another couple bites before putting it down, making an act of savoring it. A few of the other girls shoot quick looks at the two, jealousy mounting.

You had seen Kate and Rebecca working on a Cornish game hen, so you pass that over and grab a plate of cannoli. Again you can identify its cooks as the two girls that tense up as you take your first bite and consider your impression. Again they're in your fan club.

“A bit too sweet. Custard filling is a bit simple, don't you think? I understand in Italy they use ricotta. I would have been interested in sampling that. Would have been more daring to try that. The pastry part isn't bad, though.”

The two girls are heart-broken, and those around them turn a little smug. You swallow the first bite and then put it down.

Next is a spinach-and-mushroom omelet, sour cream slathered on top. You go out of your way to moan with your first bite, then shovel in a couple more bites. The duo that prepared this are beaming, the previous couple turning frigid.

And so it goes. All the food is pretty good, at the very least, but you single out a couple dishes as weak or unimaginative, while praising others as particularly exquisite. As you do so, you can see pairs of girls getting smug or gloomy, the seeds of discord being sprinkled among your fan club.

Which is exactly what you want. Sow some division among your fan club, make them treat this as a competition, one against another, and maybe (just maybe) you won't get surged by a bunch of obese girls while going to and from class. It would be easier to avoid them in ones and twos rather than groups.

And if some of the girls decided to get better at cooking, trying to win your favor... Well, that wouldn't be too bad either.

By the end of the meeting there's a pretty good divide between the happy girls and the dejected girls, and it's clear more than a few were turning their frustration against one another. You hope there won't be any truly cross feelings after this, but you are satisfied your plan went so well.

When the meeting adjourns you hang back, ostensibly to help Bunnie and Mrs. Telleri clean up but really you want to grab several of the treats left behind because you didn't get your fill when you were pretending to be disappointed in them. Adjusting the waist of your pants, you notice your belly poking out. But it doesn't dissuade you from polishing off a couple of the dishes. Food this good shouldn't go to waste.
1141311.title: Your first assignment as the taste tester, or

choices: Tell the truth. You loved it.
Lie. Tell her it was awful.
11413112.content:
You leave the clean-up with a very full tummy. You had finished a couple of the dishes you were particularly fond of, but had sampled most of everything else, too. The seeds of discord had been planted, and that was all well and good...but they still tasted so good, too. The warm full feeling settled at the base of your stomach.

Not far away, however, you spotted Rebecca, waiting for you. You felt a tad guilty for bashing her Cornish game hen, but, then again, that was part of his scheme. So why waste too much sleep over it. Still, when she marched over, red faced and humiliated, you didn't know what to think.

"You thought my hen wasn't daring enough, huh?" She looked a little teary eyed. "You complimented everyone else, but not me?" You wanted to tell her that you did insult other people, but that might not help matters. "I thought we're your friends. I mean, was it really bad? I spotted you eating my 'bland' food in the kitchen, so I know you didn't hate it."

Caught red handed. You blushed again, this time both frustrated and a little ashamed.

"Just tell me straight: did you like it or not?"

The truth was you did. You actually finished it. Her dessert settled in the pit of your tummy. Still, if you told her otherwise, that it wasn't very good, then she might not believe you anyway. It might also pit her against the other fan club girls if you told her it was the best. It might make her feel confident about her cooking...or could cause other issues. You weren't sure what answer would lead to what.

In the end...
11413112.title: Rebecca is angry you didn't compliment her ...

choices: The next day, and you notice less activity from your fan club
The next day, and Claire is crowing over Rebecca's 'poor' culinary skills
114131121.content:
Rebecca wasn't just another fan-girl looking for a chance to jump you. She was an old friend, one of the few people here you didn't just get along with but genuinely liked. It wasn't fair to make her an unwitting pawn in your scheme.

“Come with me,” you say. Wanting to make sure there aren't any fan club members hiding around and eavesdropping, you lead Rebecca down one hallway, then a second, and then into an empty classroom.

“OK,” you begin, “I know 'Let me explain' is a really cliched way to start things, but if you hear me out this will make sense.”

You have her attention.

“The truth is I liked your hen. Loved it, actually. I finished the whole thing after everyone had left, it was one of the best dishes.”

Rebecca's mood brightened like a light switch had been turned on, but before she can respond you continue.

“But I had to say it was bad because it was part of a... well, a scheme I'm pulling.”

Elation turns to confusion.

“All those girls in the cooking club joined just because I did. It's not arrogance, it's just a fact.”

“Yeah, I know.” Rebecca said, a little anger seasoning her voice.

“Just like how they're all in that 'fan club' devoted to me, and how they all get together to hunt me down and gang up on me when I'm trying to get to or from class. But what I realized earlier today is this is the perfect opportunity! They all work together to chase after me, but in the cooking club they're suddenly competing with one another, each trying to make the best dish to curry me favor.”

Rebecca arches an eyebrow, a dawning realization can be read in her face.

“Pretty much all the dishes were good, but if I said that each girl would carry on thinking they in particular had a chance with me. So instead I mixed it up, tearing down a few dishes so not only were some girls happy I liked their food, but-”

“The other girls got jealous!” Rebecca finished for you.

“Exactly. And if I can turn the fan club girls against one another, it'll make my life easier when I'm out and about.”

“But why did you say my food wasn't good?”

“Well...” Truth was you had gotten into the swing of switching between praise and criticism, and you had forgotten the Cornish hen was hers. But there was no reason to be completely honest right now, so you say “Because most of the girls here already hate you for being so close to me. I didn't want to give them a fresh reason to zero in on you.”

That seemed to satisfy Rebecca, and you relax as the tension dissipates and she goes back to her usual cheerful demeanor.

“I'm really glad to hear that, CJ. I worked hard on that dish knowing you'd be the one to taste it. And don't worry about badmouthing my cooking in the future; from now on I'm going to hang back and make sure you eat every bite of what I make you.”

And you can't help but detect something a little... wicked in her tone. Was Claire rubbing off on Rebecca? Was she planning to fatten you up, too?
114131121.title: Tell the truth. You loved it.

choices: You talk to Rebecca about what she's doing
Just go with this, and keep messing with your club
1141311211.content:
For the first time in a long while, no one slunk behind you when you walked into the school. No one with cameras taking photos of your butt, no girls attempting to grope you from behind. Just the usual traffic in the halls. Nothing else.

"Looks like your plan is working," Rebecca mumbled, "It looks like the girls are after each other now."

Indeed. You watched as some girls who you criticized were mocked loudly by the girls you gave top marks to. The victims turned the tables later on by pulling pranks, from the mundane to the serious, on the "victors" of their quest. One girl found her chair coated in peanut butter, another had gum snapped in their locks, and yet another--perhaps the strangest of all--found fan-art of a show she hated plastered to her desk in English class.

But this was part of the game. This was to be expected.

Cooking class came and went, and you decided to spice things up a bit. You told different people different things, though you ended up eating almost everything by the end. Rebecca's dish was amazing, and, as you ate it, you decided to give her a middle of the road opinion. Rebecca looked at you with that semi-mischievous glint in her eye.

After class, she lingered. "Do you need help cleaning up?"

You blush. "Well, I should be okay--"

She took a forkful of her dish--a seven-layer cake--and pushed it through your lips. The delicious flavor returned. "Like it?"

You nodded, and accepted another forkful. Then another. By the time you were done, the whole cake had disappeared into your full belly. She patted your bulge, satisfied before pinching your cheek.

"I'm glad you did." She walked out, but not before tickling your overstuffed belly. You almost felt sick.
1141311211.title: The next day, and you notice less activity from...

choices: She accepts the job most heartily.
She declines as well. (Who else can fill the role?)
114132.content:
“I’m sorry, but no thanks I can’t…” you say hoping Bunnie will understand you wanted to be in the club, but you just weren’t built to be taste tester.

A chorus of “Aww!” and “Why’s?” fill the air.

“Uh…beeecaussssseeeee…” you draw out the words searching for an excuse. Then you got a perfect idea! “Because I’m not really the best for the job!” you say matter of fact like matter.

“What?” asks Claire, clearly upset at not getting her way.

“Oh yeah! I’m kind of sick right now, and uh *cough* terrible at tasting things *cough* *cough*.” The crowd still doesn’t look satisfied and isn’t buying your fake coughing. “Um, but I think Rebbecca would be a great substitute!” you quickly add hoping to take the crowd off your back.

Rebbecca suddenly caught off guard, gives you an evil glare reminiscent of those from Christina.
The look disappears quickly as the clubs attention shifts to her and she’s put on the spot. You give a look that said you were sorry you basically putting her in the spotlight but it was all you could think of caught on the spot.

Surprisingly Rebbecca remains calm and thinks it over…This could actually be her big break! She’d have an excuse to stuff herself and put on a lot of weight fast, which, unbeknown to you she’d been trying to do. Thinking that a fatter, fuller body would finally get your attention and believing you to have a thing for fat girls, really fat ones!

Finally she opens her mouth and…
114132.title: A greater Gourmound

choices: Well…ummm….see you at the club tomorrow! She’s too shy yet to say anything.
Want to come over and practice cooking dinner? She asks inviting you inside.
1141321.content:
Rebbecca was in the center of attention of the clubroom as she made her decision

“Well…if CJ wants me to, I guess I’ll do it!” she said, happy to do one of her best friends a favor. Surprisingly, (to you at least) she seemed delighted to take the position. She would keep the real reason she was doing this (gaining for you) a secret for a little bit. There is a few minutes left for club and still plenty of food left uneaten, so the mass of girls disperses back to their plates and Rachael waddles over back to you and Kate.

“Hey, I’m sorry to put you on the spot like that Rebbecca” you begin apologetically.

“No! It’s no problem” she tells you. “It wasn’t your fault anyways; it was Claire’s for trying to sneak that bit in there. Only the first day and already “princess” just has to be club president! You know I think she made up that whole taste tester thing too!” Rebbecca is really getting worked up now, a flustered look coming across her semi-flabby face.

“Hey, don’t let Claire ruin the club for you, she can be O.K… sometimes.” You say trying to calm her down. “Plus, Kate and Bunnie will be here too. I think you’ll be a great assistant taste tester uh, whatever it is they do...”

“Yeah as long as you two don’t stink at cooking, I think taste tester might work out good for me. I did get an A+ from Miss. Telleri in cooking you know.”

“I didn’t know you liked to cook!” you say surprised at this fact.

“What? CJ, I love cooking!” suddenly a loud gurgling comes from her empty stomach "And eating. Which reminds me I’m still starving!” she adds. Helping herself to another plate stacked high with a collection of Bunnie’s baked sweets. It was a dozen or so creme filled doughnuts/brownies/ and muffins later when the club bell rang

“O.k. then, well we both hope to see as big of a turnout next meeting! We’ll be making cupcakes so come hungry!” said Bunnie clasping her hands together in front of her balloon sized breasts in delight. Claire gave a pout towards you for having dodged her latest plan to fatten you up, but then left with a group of girls as they filed out of the room. You stay behind for a bit to say goodbye to Bunnie and Miss. Telleri who were really glad you had come, and felt the club was going to be a big success thanks to you. You leave and catch up with Rebecca and Kate who’re leisurely walking back home, their thighs thundering with each step.

“I already love this club.” Kate says “Bunnie is soooo nice, and she looked really happy so many people had showed up!”

“Yeah, and the fan club sure looked happy you came too CJ!” Rebbecca adds. The three of you laugh at her teasing, and soon you find that you were outside of Kate’s place.

“I have a ton of homework tonight, but I’ll see you two tomorrow.” Kate says as she heads inside. Leaving Rebbecca alone with you. She was thrilled to have you all to herself for a second with no interruptions, but now she could feel herself getting to shy to say what she wanted.

Rebbecca and you trudge along till you reach her room, and you realize now how her hazel eyes were gazing up at yours like she had something to say. Was it something important?

“CJ…” she finally begins as her chubby cheeks redden.
1141321.title: Rebecca Fills the Role

choices: The pizzas are ready
There's a knock at the door
11413212.content:
"Want to come over and practice cooking dinner?" Rebecca asked.

"Sure." You replied. With that the two of you enter her place to unwind and relax. Her room was similar to yours but only a bit more spacious.

"CJ just make your self comfortable, I'm going to put on some different clothes." She said while jiggling her belly. "This uniform is starting to become as tight as a sausage casing."

While you wait for Rebecca to change you watch a little T.V and noticed some pictures on the glass table in front of you. You saw that they were all pictures of you, her and Kate back in elementary school.

"Ah memories." You said.

"I'm back." Rebecca said. You turn around ands saw that Rebecca now has on sweatpants and a large short-sleeve shirt with the academy logo on the front. Then she noticed you discovered the photos.

"Hey CJ, remember that time in 3rd grade when Kate got stuck in the tube slide."

"And you went down slide to push her out and I pulled her legs." "Then when she got out you ended up getting stuck." "Good times."

"Anyway let's get cooking I was planning on making some pizzas, you ready." Rebecca asked.

"Of course."

Then you and Rebecca started working on the pizzas. You prefer cheese pizza while Rebecca likes hers with pepperoni and mushrooms. After ten minutes of pizza making you put them into the oven and you two decide to watch some T.V until their done. Just then..
11413212.title: Cooking practice.

choices: "Have you... erm, noticed how... BIG everyone's getting?" (straightforward)
"Are you gonna... pass me a slice of that? Looks good!" (avoid subject)
114132121.content:
In what seemed like less than two sentences spoken between you two, tonight's dinner had finished cooking and was primed for your satiation! A loud 'ding' and the smell of a warm meat lover's special forces both of your heads to turn slowly towards the oven, a shared look of gluttonous need for satisfaction in your eyes and a unanimous grumbling of greedy bellies. While nowhere near fat yet, your appetite certainly had expanded since the last semester. It wasn't but six months ago that you were splitting a pizza with Rebecca when she found out you had enrolled and you could barely finish your half! But now, an entire course in cooking and half a school year of Bunnie's cooking later, you were right up to speed with your chubby brunette buddy... almost. So, as the most mobile, it was your job to grab the oven mitts and remove the twin pairs of pizza left in the oven to cook and serve both yourself and Rebecca. "Ugh, can't move." the flabby lump on your couch feigned weakness, "Still too stuffed from saving you in Cooking Club."

"I'm already getting up, you don't have to make me feel bad about it!"

Rebecca giggled, "Yeah, but if I didn't where would be the fun in eating all your pizza?"

You rise from the couch rolling your eyes, Rebecca had always been like this; lazy but hungry. "Whatever, you want the soft crust or the-" she cut you off, "You still have to ask; you know I want the crust with the cheese inside!" you can't help but laugh; you actually kinda wanted to try that cheesy crust for once. You walk over to the oven -one of relative luxury thanks to the generous Masters Family who furbished the dorms- slip on Rebecca's oven mitts, grab both pizzas and place them on serving platters. In fact, you never really noticed that since enrolling into Chubbeso Academy your servings had slowly gotten larger and larger... when exactly did you start getting a whole pie to yourself? Anyway, that didn't matter. You carefully balance both platters and walk back over to the living room section of the flat, handing Rebecca her favorite combination of pizza and platter as you plopped back down on the sofa.

"Mmmm... you sure do cook a mean pizza, CJ Dalton." she says, removing a single slice of the pre-cut pie and slowly dropping it into her mouth from above, "Always have, ever since we were kids." after deciding she had a relatively adequate sized amount in her mouth, Rebecca bit off her chunk and chewed slowly- her cheeks rolling with every mastication and lower chins quivering as she sensually enjoyed her meal. In no time, her first piece is gone and she is working on her second, reclining back lazily on the sofa and allowing her big billowing belly to push the hem of her shirt up a bit. As she chewed, the already stuffed taut tummy from earlier today churns and makes slight groans in protest of adding any more weight to its burden, but Rebecca's chubby hand falls down to massage the fleshy dome and rid it of discontent.

All the while, you were juggling trying to keep your eyes on the television and eating your pizza; the wriggling fat girl beside you was a bit of a distraction. That was something else that you'd noticed since enrolling: had Rebecca gotten even bigger? Than before, that is. She was always pretty heavyset, as the earlier trip down memory lane suggested, she had been quite the plumper when she was a child. And granted, as she grew older she grew significantly heavier. But back in middle school, when she got really into softball, she managed to keep a steady pace- even slim down a bit before joining Chubbeso Academy. But now that you look her over... it seemed like she had gained at least 50 pounds since your freshman year began! Was that normal?! Well... considering that you'd gained quite a bit of weight since enrolling yourself... and she did eat a lot.

But that didn't explain Kate's rapid weight gain either. When you all were kids, Kate had been lighter than Becca! Granted she never really got into sports as much as your tomboy friend did and was always just as pudgy, but she still managed to just teeter on the edge of fat and obesity for a good portion of the time you had known her. Now she was the heaviest of your little group (royalty excluded of course) and seemed to eat just as much as you and Becca!

"...Hey, Becca?" you ask in a concerned tone, interrupting your friend's pizza euphoria as she glutted herself. "Mmph... yeah?" she asks through a mouthful of masticated sauce, cheese, and dough...
114132121.title: Sauce and Friendship

choices: Go with it and let her make out with you
Try to change the subject; investigate the weight gain
1141321211.content:
Becca stared at you, mildly perplexed for a moment or two before shrugging. "Well, what d'ya expect when we eat like a bunch of grazing cattle all day long? Of course we'll get larger. That isn't a problem, right?" Becca turned to face you, a determined, yet mildly frantic, glint in her eyes.

"What? No, not at all, it's just bugging me a bit, ya know."

Becca calmed down at this, smirking slightly, "Yeah, I suppose so. Can't blame ya. I mean, we aren't as bloated as that stupid princess or anything, but, still, my uniform had to be replaced four or five times...and it looks like I'm due for another soon." Becca patted her jiggly gut with her pudgy fingers, pressing into it with a mingled look of mild satisfaction and self-disgust.

"Well, actually, did you notice how fast you've gained in particular?"

"Me? How did you--I mean, have you been tracking my girth or something?"

"No, it's just that I haven't really needed to replace my uniform since enrolling," you reply, only for Becca to awkwardly poke your middle, her finger sinking past the first knuckle. She giggled as you squirmed.

"Yeah, I can tell. Gettin' kinda tight there, isn't it?"

"That's not what I'm getting at--"

"Ya know, if you need to wear something looser, I can lend ya a sweatshirt from my skinnier days," Becca replied, giggling, "I mean, it isn't a problem at all."

"Oh, uh, thanks," you replied, unbuttoning your tight attire as Becca tossed a sweatshirt at you. For a moment, your chest was bare, and Becca stared perplexed at it, blush filling her cheeks. However, after pulling the shirt over your belly, she snapped out of it. You felt a little curious. Did she like what she saw? You almost could see her inching toward you, as slowly as possible, her thick fingers tense. Did she want to hold you right then and there? Did she want you now?

What to do?
1141321211.title: "Have you... erm, noticed how... BIG everyo...

choices: The Next Morning...
Post-Feeding
11413212111.content:
Rebecca and you looked each other in the eyes. You both knew that she had just been looking at your little pot belly. So many thoughts were rushing through your head. Did she like my belly? How long had she been waiting for you to like her as something more? Did she want to make out with you? You knew that you liked her huge belly too.. the way it bounced and jiggled, the warmness, the curvature... oh it was all so good! Has she always felt this way toward you ever since you were friends in elementary school? Maybe it was finally time to be something more than friends.

Your mind is blank now, you're still staring at Rebecca. Time to make a move... but before you had a chance, Rebecca was already kissing you!

At first you were surprised that Rebecca made such a sudden move, but then you embraced her as well. You had loved her for years, and were to shy to admit it, maybe she was too.

You had been always attracted to Rebecca for years. That adorable belly that she had was a big turn on for you, and you wouldn't mind seeing it grow. At the same time you think Rebecca wouldn't mind to see you grow a little (a lot) too.

As you make out, you caress her bulbous belly with great pleasure, squeezing, pinching, rubbing, it just felt so good. You move your tongue around her mouth and you realize now how much you love Rebecca. All the teenage hormones that have been building up inside are finally being let out.

At the same time you felt Rebecca moving her hands around your belly, you have to admit the kissing and the belly rub felt amazing. You knew she wanted to fatten you up too.

Rebecca was the first one to break up the kiss. You look at her confused, like she had did it for no reason, but then she gestured at the fridge.

"CJ I know you like fat girls, admit it"

You were blushing heavily, "I--I--I do..." she had figured out your darkest secret.

"Make me into the biggest girl you've ever seen."

That was a huge offer, literally, and you were blushing so much, but you like big girls... You agree and get ready to feed her the remaining pizza as well as all of the cakes, ice cream, pies she had in her kitchen.

She lies down on the couch, her belly out stretched, just waiting for you to fatten it up You grab a slice of pizza and fed her the entire slice at once! She had downed it pretty easily and was ready for the next slice. Rebecca groaned in arousal as she ate every slice of pizza until they were all gone.

When you are getting a cake from the Kitchen, Rebecca stops you.

"Not so fast there skin and bones it's your turn" she elbows you. You knew it! She did want to fatten you up! You were so excited right now and you lay down on the couch awaiting your share of the banquet.

Rebecca had grabbed three cakes! You were not sure if you could down them all, but you were determined to prove yourself to be worthy to Rebecca.

She had began feeding you the cake, a slice at a time! She gave you time to chew and the cakes were so good, Rebecca was such a good cook! Her eyes as she fed you were gorgeous, they sparkled with love and lust. Occasionally she would pat your belly between slices, before you knew it they were gone! You didn't even feel full either!

Throughout the rest of the night you and Rebecca fed each other, until eventually everything from the kitchen was gone!
11413212111.title: The Long Awaited Make Out

choices: You go to breakfast, and eat more...to everyone's shock
You rest around here some more...but don't you have classes?
114132121111.content:
You groggily wake up in Rebecca's bed. You ended up sleeping over her room after she lured you over with promises of a huge batch of cupcakes. Said cupcakes were now packed in your tummy, which, even after hours of digesting, still stuck out a little. You patted it, satisfied and stunned by its solidness. You felt stiff, so you decided to lay back down.

Your backhand brushed against Rebecca's gut.

She looked absolutely stuffed, her face resting against her pudgy forearms. Right now, filling up the blankets as she did, she looked like a goddess. You took grasp of her belly, and felt, while it was far softer, it too was a little bloated.

Very slowly, you pushed yourself up, and drank some water. You both only had your undies on. Part of you wanted to pull a shirt on, but another part, in hopes that Rebecca would wake up, wanted to show off your new tummy.

New.

This wasn't going away any time soon.

Very slowly, Rebecca roused herself up.
114132121111.title: The Next Morning...

choices: Go to Shaunty's! (you end up staying there the whole day!)
Rebecca gets tons of groceries and readies for another feast.
1141321211112.content:
Rebecca slowly gets up next to you, her eyes flutter awake. "Morning Ceej, wait... CJ!? What are you doing in my room?" she said obviously forgetting last nights binge. Then just like that, the confusion washes away, and she looks at you blushing, now remembering.

"Yeah, I had a great time last night" you say, showing off your belly to your new girlfriend.

"Oh CJ..." she reaches over to your belly and starts rubbing it, surprised that it was so firm.

"Do you mind?" she asks, "about getting fatter for me?"

"I was gonna ask the same question" you say blushing.

"You can feel mine if you want too" she says.

You put your hands on top of her belly scouting out each roll, kneading it with pleasure, like some sort of dough. She seems to enjoy it while you're doing it, moaning with each stroke. You then put your face on it, moving it around. Never had you seen such a deity! She was so beautiful, and you wanted her bigger, so much bigger.

At the same time Rebecca was thinking about you and her. She had such a great time last night, feeding each other, rubbing each other's bellies, surely this was heaven. She felt like she was the luckiest girl to have such a guy, willing to help her grow and letting himself grow too. Then she remembered. It's an in-service day! No school! Perhaps this was a good opportunity to fatten you up even further.

"Hey CJ, guess what? We have no school today!" Rebecca said.

"Do you mind if I stay for today?" you ask, hoping to know Rebecca ('s belly) a little better.

"Not at all CJ, but we kind of cleared out the kitchen, so I have to go shopping, or we could go to Shaunty's for breakfast."

You think about it and you decide to...
1141321211112.title: No classes, more feeding.

choices: Rebecca was now slowly scooting closer towards you.
You still had a lot of homework to do! It was time to head home.
1141321212.content:
“Are you gonna…pass me a slice of that? It looks good!” you say in an attempt to avoid the subject of everyone’s growing guts. The both of you had always joked about Rebecca’s weight from time to time, with her even going so far some days as threatening to sit on you as a pretend punishment, but if you were to just bring her ballooning weight out in the open right now…well it would really kill the good time the two of you were having.

Rebecca considers your offer as she finishes chewing her piece of the piping hot pizza.

“Ok, but you’ll have to give me two of the other kind to make it a fair trade.” She insists as she adds one of the cheese stuffed crusts pizza to your plate.

“Fine.” You sigh as you hand trade two of your own pizza slice over to her. Amazed at how much she was eating you watch as she stacked the two together into a sort of sandwich. She catches you staring and gaping at her and raises an eyebrow at you intently before taking a big bite out of her tasty creation. A smile spreads across her face and full food filled cheeks.

You bite into other kind of pizza. Mmmm, the sauce was great! As you work your way to the crust you find that the gooey cheese adds yet another delicious flavor to the pepperoni and mushroom covered pie. The pair of you munch and crunch your way through the two pizzas, perfectly relaxed there in front of the TV. Before you knew it as you reached for another piece both pizzas were completely gone.

Looking toward your partner in crime in the pizza’s disappearance you see Rebecca who was completely focused on the TV. Whoa! Her stomach seemed to have grown even more right before your eyes! Where once her stomach had been merely prodding the hemline of her t-shirt, it now seemed to rise up against the fabric and looked to have grown rounder as it was stuffed with pizza.

You too feel stuffed to the brim, and undoing the top button of your jeans, your stomach surges downwards and outwards incredibly relived now that it was free from its confines. Casually you check what time it was and you find you’d been here alone with Rebecca for over an hour!

That’s when you realized….
1141321212.title: Passing Pieces of Pizza Pie

choices: The next morning, you've got a little time to hang with everyone before class
You get there late and run into...
11413212121.content:
Taking her previous position into consideration, Rebecca seemed a lot closer to you than she really should have been. The evening began with her on the far end of the sofa, you on the right and her on the left as always. However, she slowly managed to wriggle herself closer and closer to your seat on the couch through her shifting. She was so close, in fact, that you could smell the perfume she insisted on using. Not that her apartment reeked of it or anything, it was just that the fruity flagrance was thicker in the atmosphere. And considering how much of one cushion Rebecca's steadily inflating bottom seemed to envelope (a whole one to itself), that there were only three cushions on the couch, and that there was one with a Becca-sized imprint on it left untouched on the other side of the couch, it stood to reason that she had slowly been getting closer and closer to you! The only real question is... why?

Was this a prank? Was she going to smear hot pizza grease on your countenance and call you Pizza Face? Maybe hit you in the arm really really hard? No, those were all childish things that Rebecca... might do. But not after she had just gotten done stuffing herself. She was always really calm after she finished eating; always has been. So, that in mind, what could it have been? Was something wrong with her? Some boy problems maybe? Crap, you didn't really want to be here for that...

Suddenly a pressure overtook your lap as Rebecca lay her head down on your thighs; her long auburn hair brushing up against your steadily growing potbelly. Your portly companion struggled to maneuver her own bulk into a comfortable position and sigh heavily as she finally nestled into a CJ-cushioned recline. Her bright blue eyes looked up at you warmly and her cheeks grew a little rosier. "Ooh, getting soft down here, huh CJ?" she teased, "Spending a little too much time with her Royal Heifferness?" she poked your soft belly with a protruding and much softer finger. You stifled a giggle; your stomach was a little known ticklish point on your body. With an eyebrow raised you questioned the enigma that was Rebecca and her strange behavior as it plopped itself atop your lap like a present awaiting to be opened.

Her large stomach, billowing down and out as it struggled to stand on its own lack of foundation, spread wide and spilled off of the end of the couch; its fleshy contours rolling, rising slightly as she took each labored breath. Her round, innocent face beamed positivity and security as she looked at you and smiled, you could feel her putting more and more pressure down on your lap as she played with you innocently. Flirting? No. That was never really a part of you and Rebecca. It definitely wasn't flirting. She lay one soft arm on top of her belly and massaged it lazily, "Ugh, I've gotta cut back on all that greasy food." she lied, "It really makes my stomach ache."

"Y-Yeah." you stammer incoherently.

"Seriously, Becky plus food does not lead to a pleasant tangent." she joked, raising the hem of her t-shirt with one plump finger and exposing a vast savannah of creamy white belly flesh. "Maybe you could... I don't know... give me a-

Suddenly, the idea hit you. Something that you knew you had been overlooking this entire time. It all made sense now; how could you have been so blindly foolish?!

"Mrs. Kawasaki's homework!! you shouted aloud, rising to your feet hurriedly and knocking the squishy girl to the floor, "Oh crap, I've got so much Trig homework to do tonight!" you fret, only now noticing that you had knocked your best friend into the floor. "Oh, sorry Becca!" you quickly fall down to the floor and heave the poor girl up, "You alright?"

"Yeah, I'm fine..." she says dourly

"Great, I gotta go get this done before I start failing on my first day back!" You shout as you head out the door, "Later Beck!"

"Later..." she laments as you rush out the door, one of her hands falling down to her stomach as she rubbed it in lament. "Same old CJ." she said nostalgically, "Same old oblivious-as-all get out CJ... Damn, I almost had it this time too... oh well. Gotta keep up this girlish figure!" Becca said resoundingly as she headed over to the freezer...
11413212121.title: Almost

choices: Happy for her friend Rebecca! Thinking you and Becca make a great couple.
Not so happy with Rebecca making a move on C.J…DRAMA BOMB!
114132121211.content:
The morning after a hellacious night of math problems and tangent guessing you decided to make an effort to try and get to class earlier, thinking could go over your work before turning it in (and before your entire fan club could glomp you to death but then that’s always the case.) So against your still waking bodies will, you get dressed, and slowly trudge into the academy. Once there you’re rewarded by the sight of an empty hallway, well mostly empty. Overjoyed you see Rebecca (with rather clean looking hair and thoroughly tub-soaked skin) was had heading your way, along with the adorably cute Kate bouncing along beside her.

“G’morning” you greet them still sluggish from waking up so early. “Man, that was some hard homework last night huh?” Digging into your backpack you pull out the crumpled piece of paper that was now your trigonometry homework. The two stare at it for a second before speaking. “CJ, diiid you do this by hand?” Kate asks giving you a puzzled look. “Yeah,why?”

“Because…You were supposed to use a graphing calculator” Rebecca exclaims, her explanatory tone adding a “you dummy” to the end of her sentence. She swung her backpack off of her meaty shoulders and retrieves her own tidy looking sheet of homework. “I’ll let you uh, “study” mine before you turn it in, but just this once.”

“Rebecca that’s cheat-” Kate suddenly interjected before Rebecca gave her a soft elbow to the well padded ribs, “Ooof! Hey! Becca what was tha-Ohhh~” Kate suddenly clams up into a mischievous dimple filled grin as she lets Rebecca work her mojo on you.

Rebecca extended the answer filled papers to you, and you went to take them, when Rebecca quickly yanked them away. “But...You owe me one” she adds as a devilish smile now crossed her face confident that you were at her mercy. Your gaze drifts from her smile to her piercing blue eyes, and finally down to the papers, noting that her strong softball throwing arm still looked like it held plenty of muscle underneath its pudge. Well, what choice did you have? Your math grade really needs the boost. “Okay, sure, yeah.” You answer quickly,if you were going to copy to study from Rebecca’s homework then you had better do it quickly before Ms.Kawasaki arrived.

“Good,” Rebecca says releasing her iron tight grip, “here ya go, just remember you owe me one...” Grateful for your awesome friends; you dashed into the bathroom one of the few Fan Club “safety zones.”

Meanwhile the duo continued their gossiping as they headed to breakfast. “Yeah I know C.J. could use an A on at least one assignment. I mean, I only knew how to do this stuff because you taught me.” Rebbecca said complimenting the ever studious Kate.

“Yeah, that was tutoring. What you did, well it’s still kinda cheating.” Kate said crossing her ample arms underneath her full bosom into an "I'm mildly disappointed in you" pose.

Rebecca shrugged, “Maybe, but it’s just once. Plus it’ll be worth it for what I have planned tonight… ”

“W-what do you mean?” asked Kate immediately dropping her pose,eyes widening.

“He owes me one right?” she hinted with a wink. “Well, that’s not even the best part...Wait let me start over…Okay, so after cooking club, I finally worked up the courage to invite CJ over…you know alone.”

“You did?” Kate shouted excitedly, leaning in and now hanging on Rebecca’s every word. “Yep” Rebecca giggled in confirmation. “So, we make some pizzas, and then we were both lying on the couch. You should have seen him, that cute little soft paunch he’s grown plopped right on his lap.”

“Yeah~” Kate eyes momentarily glazed over at this dreamy image of C.J.

“So I’m thinking to myself, Now’s your chance Becca! CJ’s been clueless for so long about your feelings for him, you gotta ‘Swing the bat’ and make your move.”

“Right, right” Kate said nodding along, even deeper entranced by the story.

“So…I slowly slink over to him…and then, I put my head down on his lap…” Rebecca continued, thriving off her friend’s attention.

“No way!” Kate gasped.

“Yes way!” Rebecca said sending them both into a fit of school girl giggles.

“Well? Then what?” Kate asked after they stopped.

“Uh…Oh…Well, then he had to get up and go, or whatever. But I was this close! I could feel it! That's why I’m going to ask him over again after cooking club today, and he'll have to come, you know, since he owes me big time. And this time I’ll make sure he knows just how I feel.” Rebecca said her blue eyes shining determinedly. (What Rebecca hadn’t known is that you’d probably gone over to her house anyways if she’d just asked, but she wasn’t taking any chance today. Her heart was really set on this.)

Kate nodded knowing Rebecca was the type that did not give up on anything easily and she'd thought up of a plan so quickly…Wait a minute! How exactly did Kate feel about this tumultuous turn of events? (At least for this the rest of this story branch)

Kate is…
114132121211.title: Generously Girthed Girls Gossiping

choices: Claire puts a plan together
Skip to lunchtime
1141321212111.content:
"Well I hope your plan to get CJ goes well." Kate said in a supportive tone.

"So do I." Rebecca added. Unbeknownst to the hefty duo someone overheard the whole conversation coming out from the girl's restroom and was pretty ticked off. It was none other than Clarie, munching angrily on a granola bar and looked at Rebecca with killer intent.

"Why that sneaky little blubber butt." She said angrily. "First she ruins my plan for CJ to be the taste tester for the cooking club, then she has him come over to her place and make pizzas together, now she's going to pop the question to him, UNACCEPTABLE!!!" "The only girl who has the right to be called CJ's girlfriend is me and no one else." "Heed my words Rebecca Maglen, you'll regret the day you crossed paths with Clarice Laura Masters (that's her full name) I swear it!!"

Then Claire stormed off in the opposite direction with devious thoughts floating in her mind and at the sametime you appeared out the guy's restroom just missing Claire's speech of vengeance.

"Was that Claire?" You said curiously "Oh well better get to homeroom before the bell rings."

Then you headed in the same direction that Claire went for homeroom, unaware to you thing were going to get hectic.
1141321212111.title: Ticked off princess

choices: Actually the stuff cleans up pretty quickly, Becca can still invite you over
The bitter batter battle is brutal Claire’s plan works Rebecca's plan is ruined
11413212121111.content:
After handing in your work (uttering another breath of thanks for friends like Rebecca and Kate) the rest of the day passed rather uneventfully. Claire had been eying you all day long but that really wasn’t strange, what was strange was the fact that she’d hardly said a word to you all day, in fact the entire fan club hadn’t made a move today…it was almost as if the school had planned something for you…

Later you, Kate, and Rebecca were wandering into cooking club and were hit with the warm welcoming aromas of cinnamon, bread baking, and icing. Fresh from the oven and placed lovingly on the classrooms / kitchen’s counter top was a fresh loaf of iced cinnamon swirl raisin bread.

“Hey ya’ C.J how’s it going?” asks Bunnie as she puts the finishing touch of icing on the loaf. Setting down her off-set spatula she greets you with the traditional fist bump.

“I’m good, good…” you begin trailing off as your eyes return to the delicious looking bread. “Uh, hey, I’ve never seen you make this before, is it a new recipe?”

“Actually it’s Ms. Telllari’s. You can thank her; after you have a slice, well…have a slice later during club.”

Ms. Tellari turned about on her seat dressed in a very large white chef’s apron. “Well, you can also thank Claire our club representative; she’s the one who suggested the idea that I make my cinnamon swirl bread today.”

“Huh, Claire might actually be taking her job as club rep seriously” Rebecca says as she pulls up a seat at a kitchen station.

“Well in any case she has good taste” Kate adds her mouth watering from the heavenly smell.

The clubroom began to fill; soon Claire had entered giving you a twiddle of her fingers and a wink in your direction as she entered. As soon as she took a seat (well two stools) at her cooking station her face stretches into a wide dimple filled grin. The two girls sitting on her opposite sides leaned in closer as Claire went over her plan to make sure Rebecca’s plans for you this afternoon didn’t happen.

“So, everyone understands the plan right?” Claire asked. “We leave, and leave them stuck here…” the girls nodded in agreement. “We can’t let that little sneak get her hands on my-err-our C.J” the girls nodded in agreement again and went back to their stations, looking as casual and inconspicuous as ever.

*Ahem Prof. Telleri began clearing her throat to signal the club meeting had begun. “Now today class we will be making my own cinnamon raisin loaf bread, just on a smaller scale. You’ll all be free to have some of my own as you begin to bake yours, but for now the first and most important step is too…” What followed was a series of set instructions; so many amounts of certain ingredients, this much dough to this much raisins, eventually it was time to bake.

“Now, in order to make sure your bread probably rises we need to use just a bit of yeast…” Jen Telleri went on to make clear, “Just...a...bit…” As the instructor added the tidbit as she sprinkled in the yeast, she was oblivious to Claire as she began to add yeast to her dough by the handful, peppering it with the powder. The rest of the cooking club placed their mini loafs into one of the clubs several shared ovens and, one explanation on proper icing of raisin bread, and about 30 minutes at 350 degrees later (176 centigrade here in Europe) Claire’s plan went into action.

“Prof. Telleri! Ms. Blake!” Claire said acting as bewildered as she could be. “Is there something wrong with that bread?” she pointed a chubby finger to the oven door which looked to be as full as a Masters' stomach after a giant meal.

“What? Well, let’s take a look…” Prof. Telleri waddled slowly to the strained oven door, drawing the attention of the rest of the classroom, you turn along with the rest of the classroom to see what the matter was as Ms. Telleri began to open the oven door…

PSSShhhwFLLLLAAARRP!

It was a sound unlike any you’ve ever heard! Sort of like a balloon losing its air but mixed with the sound of bubbles being blown through a straw into an extra thick milkshake. You tried to get a better look at what now the whole class was staring at, and you could just manage to see a beige blob of dough oozing forth before a burst of warm air spurts forth from the oven sending a tiny bit of the dough everywhere.

The batter splatter covers part of your face and a few of the other girls’ clothes. Partially blinded by delectable yet right now inedible dough you can only listen as a number of girls give cries of fright and shock as the kitchen/club room is quickly evacuated. You turn to see Rebbecca had been given a direct hit by the stuff knocking her off her chair and flat on to her well cushioned butt. She brushes herself off before pointing and gasping at Kate, you turn to see Kate lying on the floor and her shirt is covered with dough and soaked with blood? You rush to Kate who seems just fine if not just a little confused. You touch the bloody spot on her shirt and realize it wasn't blood, just raspberry jam, one of the jars must have split on her shirt. Breathing a sight of relief for a second time today you see what had happened with the rest of the class.You see Claire who was covered in a bubbly mess, but notice that strangely her face wasn’t one of distress or alarm but (and this may have been the dough in your eyes) she looked more like she was holding in a laugh. Whatever grin you may have glimpsed was gone as she approached the head chef of the day.

“Oh no Ms. Telleri, I don’t know what happened! Who ever did this must have made a big mistake! *sniff* I need to go home and wash up right away or this outfit is ruined, it’s an emergency!” Claire sniffed again.

Ms. Telleri who was now trying to push the rising dough back into the oven had little time to think and just gave a quick immediate response to the principal’s daughter.“Uh, er, I suppose so, if it’s an emergency…” There was a rush to the door as a group of girls followed Claire as she left the clubroom, everyone seemingly prepared to follow her out. Ms. Telleri sunk a flabby arm into the dough and then found it to be stuck there. “Uh Ms. Blake...?”

Craning her head around the now near empty classroom in search of her assistant chef, she spotted a few strands of pink hair hovering just behind a desk. Bunnie Blake raised her head from underneath a desk where she’d ducked down, her supernatural lunch lady reflexes kicking in just quick enough to keep her clean from the dough. Going into action you watch as Bunnie speeds to the club-room's windows and quickly opens them. “I’ll get the vinegar!” Bunnie shouts as she dashes to the ingredient closet. Ms. Telleri watched as the smoke began to flow out the window and with another strong tug she managed to free her elbow deep arm from the the dough. Taking a step back she began to clean her glasses as she took in the remaining members of the cooking club. The room now consisted only of; Ms. Telleri herself, you, Kate, Rebecca, and a still currently busy Bunnie. Oh and a still slowly growing blob of a bread dough she'd need to take care of that too...

“Well, you three are free to go. If you’d like…” she says, her voice and her eyes both pleading for you to help stay.

"We can help!" You say immediately and you turn to your other friends hoping they would agree to stay too.

“Sure, my shirt can’t get any dirtier.” Kate said laughing at this strange situation.

"Of course we'll help" Rebbecca said through gritted teeth. She then cursed just underneath your range of hearing. "Dammit, why do you always have to be such a nice guy C.J.?" Rebbecca wondered if Claire was somehow to blame for this, she didn't doubt it. The ONE NIGHT she'd planned for everything to go perfect was ruined! Or was it? Maybe if she cleaned this stuff up fast enough there would still be time! That thought in mind Rebbecca rolled up her sleeves and got ready to patty-cake this dough as fast as she could.

And with that your trio of friends begin to assist the teacher as the began to battle the dough. You took a side of the blob dough and sink your hands into it trying to push it back. For some strange reason the jiggly feel of the dough, along with it's rising, plumping and stretch marks, reminded you of something you’d seen a lot at the academy but you couldn't put your finger on it…

Anyways, how long does it take to lick the batter? (Metaphorically of course eating raw yeast while it’s rising is a NO-NO!)
11413212121111.title: Yeast Infestation

choices: Or perhaps not: you decide to walk Becca home after clean-up duty...
Claire's creed successful, she starts find more ways to get wedge you and Becca
114132121211112.content:
"This could go a lot faster if we had more hands." you lament as a soft sigh of exhaustion escapes you

"We do have a lot more hands," Becca griped under her breath, "It's just that most of them are currently predisposed."

With a heavy grunt, you pumped the bristles on your brush. Your arms were starting to get pretty tired after an hour of trying to rid the oven's cavity of miscellaneous cooking residue, the sticky mass of yeast and filling having exploded quite some time ago and left its mark all over the once steely walls of Ms. Telleri's oven. A lot like napalm, what was supposed to be a delectable treat was glued to one of the many ovens that littered the Culinary Arts lab. And boy were you getting sick of the smell of raspberry.

Perhaps the only one more dedicated to this mission than you was Becca, who scrubbed away at the quickly-hardening mass with just as much fervor as you did. Possibly more. Her round doubly chinned face was a deep shade of red, salty sweat dampening her brow as she worked the bristles on her own brush down to the nub. She was breathing pretty hard, but her resolution remained strong as she continued to clean up the horrible mess inside the oven. However she had removed her jacket for mobility purposes about twenty minutes ago, and while you wouldn't dare bring it up, her own soft rolls and bulges that resembled so much the yeast you were trying so hard to clean up were slowly creeping out from underneath her blouse.

"Chivvy up the pace, you two." Ms. Telleri said listlessly as a loud crunch was heard behind you, "The custodians lock up this wing at half seven." she mumbled through crumbs of baked dough and raisins.

"Then why don't you have them do this?!" you can't help but question the large woman's reasoning as she sat idly by watching you and Rebecca toil away in her oven while nibbling away on cookies, "They're janitors! It's their job to clean up! And Bunnie, why are you making cookies?! Shouldn't you at least pretend to help us?!"

"I thought it was hotter in here for some reason..." Becca puffed as she rose from the oven, "Kate, I thought you were taking the floors!!"

"Shorry Becca..." Kate mumbled from across Ms. Telleri's seat, having joined the rotund teacher in munching on sweets while the two of you toiled away

Bunnie emerged from behind Ms. Telleri's personal oven in the quarantined zone that made up the heavyset teacher's makeshift office, a fresh tray of cookies in hand, donning an apron and pretty pink oven mitts. "Hey, come on Ceej, don't be such a downer." she chided as she placed her latest batch between her newest taste testers and adjusted her toque, "And they can't clean it up, because of a big strike that happened a few years back. Some girl tried to make a super-souffle (pheh, armature) for every teacher and wrecked the same classroom. Janitors won't go near the Culinary labs."

"Oh Bunnie, you've simply got to tell me what it is you put in these cookies." Ms. Telleri gushed as she grabbed another one, "I mean really, these things are absolute bonkers! I could stuff 'em in my gob all day!"

The Calamity Pink Cook blushed a bit as she drank in her superior's compliments, a wide smile on her face as she tried (futily) to remain modest. "Oh Jen, it's nothing really. I mean, the cookies aren't nothing, obviously." she smiled eagerly as she watched student and teacher both inhale her hard work, "I guess they've just got my special touch is all."

Telleri pat her wobbling stomach, "Well, for what it's worth I'd kill to have that special touch in my classroom more often." she said with another dainty bite of cookie, "If all my girls could cook as well as you do, I'd retire early and move in with Jess knowing that my job was done."

Bunnie held back a squeal, her cheeks growing rosy at all of the praise she was getting. "Oh stop, you're going to make me blush!" she giggled, "I'll go get you some more so you can take them home with you!! Oh, and you too Katie! Becca, Ceej, you want som--

"NO!!" both of you shout in unison, still a little peeved at having to clean up the entire room by yourselves. You turned to face the mess, now an hour and a half into creation with little remedy and lots of room for improvement. Dried, crusty yeast littered the area around the oven as well as certain parts of the walls. At this rate, you were going to have to pull an all nighter... and no one wanted that. Except maybe Ms. Telleri.

When, as if answering your prayers, a knock arrived at the door.

"Hello hello?" came a perky tone, delivering good faith and merriment into your hearts, "Jen? You in there? I've got a package from Jessica... Abida said that if I didn't deliver it I'd get a paycut? Hello?"

"Ah, Elenore!" Jen said happily from her seat, currently firmly wedged between her two titanic buttcheeks, "Come in, we were just sitting down for a snack!"

"Cool--- er,what exactly happened in here?"

"Minor problem with my Cooking Club, not a problem really." Jen said dismissively. Bunnie began subtley waving another cookie in front of Ms. Telleri's nose making an "o" shape with her lips. "Sorry, our club. Not just mine." she corrected, grabbing at the cookie between Bunnie's fingers, "Mr. Dalton, Miss Maglen, and Miss Granden have offered to help clean up for me!"

"Except it's only Mr. Dalton and Miss Maglen doing all the work!!" Becca spat

"Oh, well... um, here's your package!" Ms. Francium said happily, as she avoided the evil glares that the two portly gourmands were inciting from you and Becca, "I'd better get back to my office... it's almost six now, so if I leave then I can probably find my way back before they lock me in... again."

"Oh honestly Elly, you don't know your way around yet?" Telleri griped, "It's been almost six months!" she sighed, rocking her monumental body back and forth as she lurched forward from her stool, "I suppose Bunnie should show you around then--"

Bunnie paused, "O-Oh sure Jen, I've got this one!" she stammered as the heavy woman's feet touched the floor, "You stay here and watch CJ and Becca while I get Elly back to the Science wing. I expect excellent notes on those cookies though!"

"Absolutely." Jen smiled as the two slender women walked out the door, "Kate, could you be a dear and grab the last batch on the ding? I'm going to go resituate myself on the loveseat."

"Oh come on!!" you gripe aloud

Becca sighed, her plans having failed after all...
114132121211112.title: Lazy Bones

choices: Turn on some music and semi-awkwardly shake her groove thang with you
A separate plan for some sensual seduction.
1141321212111121.content:
“There...” you say taking a step back from the oven and wiping a strand of sweat from your forehead. It was now half past six but you'd finally cleaned the last few bits of batter from the cooking lab, even with Kate leaving for the doctors office after getting a small certifiable “owie” of a burn from accidentally touching a still hot tray of cookies as they were set to cool.

“Mmmph...Very (gulp) Good” Ms.Telleri commended through a mouthful of cookie. (Whether it was for the cookie itself or your work you never found out.)

“Hrrumph” Rebbecca bemoaned arms folded unhappily, and feeling that for the hard work the both of you had just done a simple “very good” wasn’t good enough. Worst of all her plans for the night had been ruined by the chauvinistic conniving Claire's literally half baked plan. Without a word more the both of you trotted towards the doorway felling drained.

“Oh! Before you two go...” Ms. Telleri called suddenly. You turn around and watch as she expertly scrolled in her reclining chair making her way to the fridge and pulling out two large Tupperware tubs and a mass of tinfoil. “I saved some of Bunnie’s baked lasagna from yesterday’s club meeting. It’s not much but it’s really the only way I can think to thank you for your hard work.” Setting the tubs down she placed the tinfoil on top of it. “I made some garlic bread to go with it for my dinner tonight but I’m sure I can whip up something else for dinner.”

“Oh... thanks Ms. Telleri.” you say taking the strange gift.

“Yes, well I’ll have to make sure no more accidents like this happen again. Can’t have my new taste tester doing double duty as a janitor all the time.” she notes turning to Rebbecca.

Rebbecca did not return the smile, but she did scoop up her Tupperware and tinfoil “gifts.” There was an awkward pause as Ms. Telleri returned to the cookies and began to scribble some notes on a sheet of paper.

“Well, h-have a good night...” you say as you slowly backpedal towards the door.

“Mhhmm” agreed the teacher, savoring another mouthful of cookie from her pink haired prized portage.

A few steps out of the kitchen and your nose takes in lung-fulls of fresh air, thankful to be away from the sent of anything baked. Rebbecca takes a chest swelling breath too, but strangely it ends up sounding more like a sigh.

“Well...I’m glad that’s over. See you tomorrow C.J” Rebbecca says, glumly resigned to the fact that her plans for the night had been ruined. You too were about to say goodbye, looking forward to just crashing on the couch after eating, when you did some quick thinking.

“Hey, Becca...You want some help reheating that stuff up? You know since we both have some, and you know the homework thing today..I-it’s not pizza but I’m pretty sure it cooks just the same.”

Rebbecca felt her heart fluttering, and you notice her eyes brighten at the idea. “Sure!” she shouts a bit louder than she had meant, then regaining her composure added “Okay, why not?” feigning coolness.

Soon the two of you were outside Rebbecca's familiar abode and for a girl of her...size Rebbecca had practically zipped the entire way there. Her mood was now far from the red faced wreck she'd been while scrubbing muffin mix. As she unlocked her door, Rebbecca remembered that she had in fact just been cleaning. Caked on cupcake mix splattered her shirt and encrusted her hair: not the ideal look when you were about to talk to your crush. She couldn’t just leave you here standing outside, but then again she’d hate to reveal her love of bathing....She winced briefly as she realized the only option left was to invite you in and and clean up as quick as she could which meant...today of all day’s; she’d be taking a shower instead of her luxurious baths.

Rebbecca opened the door and plodded her way inside setting her Tupperware on the table. You do the same, and then nonchalantly head towards her oven, pressing buttons and turning nobs with a sense of familiarity.

“So, I’m thinking we let the lasagna warm up for fifteen minutes, then stick the garlic bread cook in there with it for five more. But if your starving we could just microwave b-but I’m not really sure how long to keep it in there.” You grimace slightly thinking there were few things worse than food that was cooked on the outside, but icy in the middle. Fortunately, Rebbecca didn’t seemed to mind the wait. “Twenty minutes? Okay...Umm, let me take a quick bat-er-shower and put on some clothes that don’t have any frosting on them.”

“Sure, Rebbecca.” you say, still busy with the oven. Rebbecca had been hit by the batter blast a lot more than you had, in fact you most of the dough that had been on you had wiped off rather nicely. “I’ll just chill on the couch.”

“Great-berightback” she spouted quickly, and then just as quickly, she thumped her way to her bathroom and undressed. Carefully, she stepped into her treasured tub. Her hands worked the hot and cold water taps having memorized her desired settings, then twisting the rarely used third knob, she switched from the bath’s tap spout to the shower-head's stream.

Under the warm water, Rebbecca remembered why she preferred baths so much now, scrubbing herself while standing was getting sort of hard, and those hard to reach areas on her back were getting just a little more hard to reach. A few squirts of shampoo and conditioner later and she was out of the shower and completely crumb free. After drying herself off, she quickly crossed the short distance between the bathroom and her bedroom re-dressing in frosting free pj’s.

As she began to dress she caught a glimpse of her naked reflection. Damn she was really starting to get thick....She gave herself a little shake and watched her whole body wobble a little. She tried to picture her stomach at Claire sized or even Claire’s MOM sized. Was that the size C.J really liked? Rebbecca's mind began to wonder, and eventually stopped on one key question: What exactly did you like about big beautiful women?

Was it that you liked watching her eat a lot? She certainly enjoyed food, especially the oh-so-warm feeling she got whenever she truly gorged herself, but that sort of fire in the belly feeling she got was usually a once in a while sort of thing, saved only for something truly tasty. Maybe, it was because you had a thing for stomachs? She certainty had plenty of belly to go around now. She brought her hand to caress it, letting the still warm body fat dribble between her fingertips. Her stomach certainly wasn’t the largest on campus but was large enough now to be considered a full blown gut. She had accepted the round dome as a new part of her now, and even occasionally found it...cute. She imagined it was your hands that were gently massaging it and she certainly liked the idea of that, but what exactly did guys like C.J supposedly get out of it? She added 'belly play' to the growing list of terms to research later on the Internet. Plus, if you were into belly's she’d given you the perfect opportunity yesterday for a belly rub... Was math homework really that distracting? She supposed it was possible, or it was possible that you weren't a guy who was into guts. Well...all that really left was her....

Rebbecca turned around and reflected on her rump. God it looked even bigger today! She wiggled it and it bounced healthy in reaction. There wasn’t much else to say about it other than it was soft and big (and apparently still getting bigger certainly growing faster than her breast (those slackers.)) Her bottom was soft and firm, much like her bicep muscles now.

The sound of the oven being opened and a tin foil being unwrapped interrupted her thoughts. She realized that the sound meant she had about five minutes till dinner was ready. Well belly, breasts, or booty it didn’t really matter; she decided to just keep being her same jiggly self, and she'd find out what you liked eventually. With a nod of confidence to her reflection Rebbecca walked out of her room feeling read for what was about to come next.

Heading towards the main room and kitchen she realized that she had the perfect opportunity to do some flirting. The problem was she was never one for that breathy flirty stuff, but she could never work up the courage to just outright say how she felt. She’d have to improvise a flirty way to get your attention soon, but how?

Rebbecca proceeds to...
1141321212111121.title: Rebbeca's  Repreive and her Reflection(s)

choices: Get flirty! Those tips Becca looked up on the internet should do the trick!
Get eating! That's what CJ likes, isn't it? Well then give it to him!
11413212121111212.content:
...be interrupted.

"And dinner is served!"

The words escape your mouth with exuberant joy, having barely had to "make" anything since enrolling in this academy where so much of what you had ingested was either prepackaged or prepared by those much more talented than you with an oven. Sure all you had really done was re-heat some of Bunnie's cooking, and you'd actually burnt the sides a bit now that you got a closer look at it, but despite joining the cooking club this was the closest thing you'd actually made in quite some time!

On cue, your stomach grumbles with a hearty fervor for Italian. Boy it'd been a while since you'd eaten anything, since about lunchtime. Second helpings on the chicken pot pie with Becca, Kate and Claire. Still, it wasn't much to speak of now that the day had waned away so quickly. And after all that hard work cleaning up Ms. Telleri's classroom, you'd certainly earned a little bit more of Bunnie Blake's fantasmagasmic pasta a'la pink. You'd probably kill for a little bit more of that right about now...

But luckily you didn't have to! Because it's reheated, brown-around-the-edges less than equal was sitting right there, wrapped in bright shiny tin foil just waiting to be devoured! Plus breadsticks!

You hum merrily to yourself as you fumble around Becca's flat in search of the necessary equipment necessary to fully enjoy a meal. Plates, forks, napkins, all disposable of course. You'd long since learned where Becca kept them stashed, having come over to her place quite often since your freshman year. You dutifully place the plates across from each other at the coffee table, the tenants in the cheaper dorms usually lacking a proper dining table, and grant yourself and your gracious hostess a set of silverware each as well as what could only be described as a wad of napkins.


Becca stood in the hallway, trying her best to keep her thoughts in alignment as well as still her beating heart. Like it or not, Becca was pretty inexperienced with this sort of thing. She was pretty prone to bouts of nervousness, sometimes bad enough to make things really awkward if she wasn't careful. Behind her careful stare was a system of organizing her thoughts, trying to keep calm as she sorted out the ones involving you as a friend and you as a potential boyfriend. Should worse come to worst, she could still be your friend by the time you left and try again at another date...

But come Hell or high water, she was gonna at least try to get some flirting done!

So she did her best to saunter over in a manner as sensual as her thick legs would deem possible. For once she tried to accentuate the twins that bulged from her backside as she eagerly made her way towards the lasagna left for her on the counter. Grabbing for the serving spoon you'd left in the foil, she quickly plopped a large amount of the thick cheesy slab onto the flimsy paper plate. And then another before claiming several Bunnie-made breadsticks for decoration.

Satisfied with her serving size (secretly hoping that you would be more satisfied with her portions than she was) Becca hurried her bubble-butt over to the coffee table. As she sat her plate down, she grunted with some audible difficulty, her plaid flannels were getting a little too snug to fit her generous pear shape lately. She'd have to go buy more over the weekend.

Smiling at you, already seated, Becca let out a strained huff in the difficulty it required of her to crouch down these days, before losing her balance and plopping her bubble-butt down on the ground with what seemed to her an apartment-shaking tremor.

"This looks good!" she said ignoring the minor slip, "You did a really good job of cooking, CJ.'

"Awb I rully did wush reheed id." you smack with lips stuffed with lasagna, "Ish doh big deel."

"But you're such a good little domestic lately, Ceej!" Becca teased as she worked her lumpy legs into a cross-legged position. Her stomach flowed generously out from underneath the t-shirt she'd chosen for tonight. Poor Che Guevara looked like a lumpy bobble-head as Becca's breasts bulged against the too-tight fabric of her shirt and distorted his image.

"Ab nod." you finally swallow, having chewed up enough of the delicious saucy ambrosia so that you wouldn't choke on it, "You're the one who's all nuts over cooking club."

"And I suppose you're just there to play with Bunnie?" she added dryly as she tenderly cut off a portion of her first brick of lasagna, "Or is it to stare at Delphine?"

"N-Neither!" you retort back, getting red in the face from a combination of the peppers in the sauce and embarrassment, "I'm there because Bunnie asked me to join and I joined! Then... a whole bunch of other people joined. I can't help it that I'm popular!"

"Oh yeah, because you're just such a ladies' man." Becca giggled. You'd never quite seen Che's face jiggle like that before.

Becca took a bite of her lasagna. Instantly familiar sensations of eating this very same meal freshman year flooded into her taste buds. The warmth, the gooey cheese. The powdery Parmesan and the thick but not too thick layers of it all between the noodles and the meat. It made her drool just thinking about it. Luckily she had much more of it to stuff between her cheeks. Bunnie was such an awesome cook... boy, that cheese.

You take a minute to poke the corpse. "Beck?" you ask, having gotten a little worried about her there for a sec, "You okay?"

"Y-Yeah!" she stammered, "Why?"

"It's been like, two minutes." you say flatly, "And all you've been doing is moaning with your eyes closed while you eat."

Becca turned as red as the pasta she so heartily devoured, her chubby cheeks resembling tomatoes as she grew more and more embarrassed. "Sh-Shut up!" she giggled again, "I was in mid-flavorgasm and you ruined it. Thanks a lot, Ceej."

"Fine, next time I'll just let you stroke out on me then." you laugh

"You better not!"

Becca smiled to herself, quickly stuffing down another bite of heavenly pasta so as to cleverly conceal it from your view. This was going pretty good so far! She hadn't said anything to mess it up yet, so now was the time to really put things into high gear. The only question would be... how exactly to do that. There were plenty of ways to go about it...
11413212121111212.title: Blubber Banter

choices: Well…maybe a few more minutes here couldn’t hurt…
You do head home, you’re tired and ready for bed! (As well as a little confused)
114132121211112122.content:
Okay! Enough playing around, Rebecca had you here and she wasn’t going to waste it! The flirty stuff would just have to come later after she’d done some more research, right now she’d just go with her gut and stuff herself to her limits in front of you. Such gumption for gobbling had arrived at the perfect time as she’d really worked up a healthy appetite from all of the hard work she’d done earlier when cleaning up the kitchen.

Oh! This bread! She clenched her eyes to focus on taste further, her well read taste buds busy checking her almost encyclopedic knowledge of food and flavors, finding hints of garlic and thyme encrusted into the dough. She savored this last mouthful before finally having to breathe, letting forth a peaceful sigh of content after she’d swallowed. Taking up the other halve of the bread she provocatively pressed it between her plump limps with a single finger, letting the bread bulge her cheeks out a bit to make room for a few bites more. Slow and steady, Rebecca began pacing herself to devour as much food as she possibly could that night, and she was going make sure you watched every bite.

Over on the other side of the table, you too were slowly making your way through your lasagna square brick, but not because for lack of trying; the food was excellent, it was that there was something about the way Rebecca was eating tonight that was…distracting you from your own cuisine consumption. Rebecca was definitely hungry tonight; you’d noticed earlier how her plate seemed covered with food certainly much more pasta than porcelain showing. You note that she had been a great choice for cooking club as her love of food, had apparently grown along with the rest of her appetite (and...well...the rest of her). Just then, and much like yesterday, the idea to mention the rising weight and appetite among your group of friends slightly crosses your mind, but, also much like yesterday, the idea of bringing up such an issue at such a relaxing time like now seemed downright rude. So while Rebecca’s mouth continued to engulf and swallow the last bit of her lasagna, your mouth remained shut.

An awkward silence began to fill the room, until it was shattered by another small moan.
