Something between a giggle and a squeal erupted from Rebecca's full mouth, a mouth that from the sound of it was busy having having another flavorgasm burst inside of it. What must have been her third of these sorts of flavorgasams drew your full attention once more; attention that Rebecca quickly made use of.

“What Ceej? Did I get something on my face?” she asks coyly noticing your attentive glances, “Or, did I get something on Mr. Guevara’s?” And in an attempt to spot a stain her fingers pulled at the bottom of her shirt, stretching the fabric tight, perfectly accentuating her t-shirted twins. Her blue eyes, not unaware of your own, traced over her canyon of cleavage for a few seconds, and seeing no stain she let go the tight t-shirt. The hem audibly twanged as it snapped back into a still distorted but much more relaxed position. Her eyes then turned to you, looking for confirmation that she had earned your ogling.

“No…uh…” you fork stabs against your empty plate and the scratching sound it makes shatters the slight spell you were under. Your eyes, still as wide as the dinner plates in front of you, quickly evacuated Rebecca’s cleavage canyon and all surrounding areas, until they ultimately settle on your empty plate. “I...was just getting up for seconds.” You splutter out, giving yourself an excuse to excuse yourself.

That was a close one! You breathe a sigh of relief as you enter the kitchen, having just escaped one of your best friends marking you as a pervert for life. It really wasn’t all your fault though, Rebecca had been the one stretching her shirt out right in front of you. You still weren't used to sights like that, even though it seemed that every time you turned a corner around here you were getting smothered by a mob of fan club girls. It was...there was 'something' about watching Rebecca put away that pasta and tugging on her shirt like that, it made you feel strangely... warm. The feeling was a thousand times more complicated than that, but your warm red ears and cheeks were the only ones you could describe. Really, you didn’t want to think that over now,and so to distract yourself from thoughts of your co-diner and her ‘shapeliness’ you cut one more slice of the rich lasagna. Gazing at the square, you didn’t think you’d be getting up anytime soon if you did manage to actually eat it, which reminded you…

"...Hey, Becca? D-Did you want some more lasagna? W-While I’m still up, that is?” You can’t believe it, you were actually stuttering, you usually felt so at home in Becca’s kitchen, and now your voice was nearly cracking.

Out of your view Rebecca was feeling a bit of the same way as her heart began to flutter. You had offered her more! Was this a sign? A dare? It had to be! Or, maybe you were just being polite? She didn’t know what to expect when you finally spoke up about your love for ‘bigger women,’ it wasn’t like you would just come out and admit it. She decided to just go with the flow and accept your challenge.

“Yeah” Rebecca finally answered back, “Two slices please! Ooh and some more breadsticks!” Let’s see what you thought of that, she thought smiling to herself.

Two! There was only two slices of lasagna left! Not that you were anywhere near hungry, especially when you still had a whole other piece to yourself, but you were still a little shocked that Rebecca still had room for two more of the large lasagna leftovers. You were about to mention how she was bound to get a stomach ache like yesterday with the pizza if she kept eating like this, but then you remember Rebecca’s constant repeating on her love of all things bread and decide such a warning wasn’t worth the telling off you’d get in return...And there was another part of you too… One just below your bounds of awareness that really wanted to see if Rebecca really could eat all of this. Such feasting feats weren’t uncommon here at the academy, but this was certainly more than you’d ever seen Rebecca eat!

Sliding back into your seat you set the plates down in front of their respectful owners and the feasting continued. Slowly you cut into your meal; still warm, a burst of steam erupts from within the dish, hitting you with a welcoming smell and a slight mist upon your face. You can feel yourself slowly reaching your limit, and feel this last mouth-watering piece will definitely be just right for you. Rebecca on the other hand seemed to have gained a second wind (or second stomach) for she seemed to be eating her seconds even faster than her firsts! This time around Rebecca decided she was skipping on the savoring the meal and instead was going for speed. It was a bit of a shame to gobble down the delight so quickly, it was like running through an art gallery without time to stop and admire the work the artists had put into their work, but sometimes sacrifices had to be made in the name of love. She picked up the pace not thinking just eating; feeling like every single bight brought you one step closer to admitting your passion for plumper women. Dead silence again seemed to surround the two of you, occasionally springing back to life with the symphony of gulps and chewing noises being conducted by the girl across from you. Minutes later you’d finished your last helping, but continued staring at the brunette garbage disposal on the other side of the table. Oh sure you had turned the T.V on after you'd finished and pretended you were watching it, but you were much more interested in seeing if Rebbecca was really going to clean her plate rather than whatever was on t.v.. Rebecca’s fork was still shoveling away forkful after forkful but always taking the time to not sloppily sauce up her shirt. She continued to pump pasta into her paunch, remorselessly downing the zesty red sauce, unmeticulously masticating the meat filled middle. Whew! You were getting excited tired just watching her! Yet you never looked away, in fact her eyes darted once from the plate in front of her and caught you with a flabbergasted look on your face, right before you finally excused yourself once more to take care of your plate.

As you returned from the kitchen, you were stunned to see she was almost finished. Rebecca’s face was flushed with satisfaction, and was begging to look as round and red as her stomach. With one almighty gulp she finished off the last of her meal, a grin of satisfaction spreading across her face. “Whew! I was starving!” she gasped leaning back in complete contentment. She stood up very slowly, cradling her swollen stomach that looked large enough to be pregnant with two food baby's if such a term existed. Then taking her plate she slowly waddled to the sink to wash herself up, her stomach audibly sloshing all the way.

You also gasp a sigh of relief now that the dinner was over. For whatever reason, perhaps the lasagna itself, your heart had been pounding pretty hard as you watched Rebecca eat like that, but thankfully whatever was causing it had stopped. Yep, in fact it was getting pretty late too, you should probably think about getting home….
114132121211112122.title: Lovestruck Struck Lasagna

choices: Rebecca busts out the dessert as planned.
You both fall asleep that is until you awake to discover Becca is a sleep eater
1141321212111121221.content:
“ ‘Scuse me Ceej.” came Rebecca’s voice when a massive suddenly shadow eclipses your view of the TV. It’s Rebecca with her full moon like bottom half, wobbling and squeezing around the table in front of you, until it ultimately craters itself beside you on the couch. Cratering was the best word to describe it as Rebecca rump sunk deep into the couch on impact, her stomach gives an audible slosh as it shakes you too could feel the aftershocks of such an impact all the way on your side of the couch.

“What’cha watching?” she asks harmlessly, hoping your answer would in fact be her.

“Oh, uh, nothing…” you mumble as you quickly flick through a few channels. Unlike yesterday Rebecca had a different smell about her not the fruity perfume but one of fresh clean soap. Sitting practically cheek to cheek (in multiple senses of the word) you catch another whiff as you continue to absentmindedly flip channels the lotion like smell makes the word SKIN flash white hot around your brain. But, while your brain was racing, the rest of your body was slowly slowing down. The lasagna and bread churning inside you, was warmly rubbing your stomachs walls like an inside out tummy rub, and if you weren’t careful you might just fall asleep here on this couch.

“I can’t believe I ate that much” Rebecca says noticing the sleepy look in your eyes. She quickly brings her hands to her stomach gently caressing it.

“Yeah….Me too” you dreamily murmur.

“Wait...What’d you just say?” she asks raising and eyebrow and quickly pivoting her head to face you.

Oh crap, what had you just said? Wait. “I-I-I had soo much. And it’s been such a *yawn* long day” you say as you half fake a yawn. And it was true, from the homework fiasco to the cup cake carnage you’d been through a lot in the past twenty-four hours.

“Oh…” Rebecca says frustrated by your ignorance toward her gluttony. Why couldn’t you just come out and admit it? Almost! Almost! Almost! She could hear it in your voice how you had just now been on the tipping point. It had been a rumbling stumbling long path to take to get here but here she was; stuffed to the brink with the finest Italian food, and your crush arms length away from you.

Now, originally she had planned on eating a lighter dinner when she invited you over, and then splitting some dessert afterwards. Right now it was in the fridge/freezer begging to be eaten. Her stomach suddenly churned at the thought of more food. Okay, maybe she could wait a little while and digest a bit, then she’d have room- no plenty of room for dessert. Rebecca knew it was no fun gorging yourself if you got sick and threw it back up!

Right now she had you a mere couch cushion away and even if you weren’t admitting it, she was sure you’d been checking her out tonight and that had to count for something. Yes, she’d just relax and wait a bit right here on this couch that was just so damn comfy! Soon Rebecca had reclined deep into the couch as a magic combination of a day’s hard work, a nice hot shower, and a warm belly, created a perfect storm of relaxation.
1141321212111121221.title: Rebecca’s Chubby Cushions-er her Couch's Cushions

choices: a darkly mischevious grin dimples your cheeks. This was gonna be fun...
Your brow creases and your gaze softens. Better get her back to bed...
11413212121111212212.content:
You weren't quite sure when you had fallen asleep.

It could have been any time, really. From just after Becca finally decided that she was finished and the end of that late-night movie you'd rented but weren't really paying attention to. Whatever the time and however the cause, you had fallen asleep on Rebbecca's couch at some point during the evening. Your position would be just like the one you held in your Becca-centric daze, one where your face was simply propped atop your palm as if showing great interest in the "probably really cheeky" British comedy you'd been zoning in and out of all night. Your eyes closed in a deep slumber, you had been completely oblivious to the apartment around you for quite some time now...

"Ceejie-kins, would you like some more pumpkin pie?"

"Of course I would, thank you very much!"

Your vision pans out somewhat as you go through an out of body experience. There in the lunchroom you sit, in all your glory, as a pink-skinned little plumper. Your hair seems different somehow and your fingers really small. Probably represents your mother somehow, if you'd ask Freud. Your big rosy belly gurgles with the sound of delight as yet another entire pie is placed in front of you. You look down to blink at your belly button in Morse code, silencing its rudeness with repetitive batting of your eyelashes.

Suddenly, out of thin air, is Bunnie. She claims an armistice of hors d'ourves at her disposal and seems rather intent on stuffing you with them. She cuts a slice from the nearmost pie and draws it closer to your mouth. Instinctively you begin to chew, relishing just how close your relationship with Miss Bunnie Blake, centerfold central of the year, was getting!

She pats your stomach proudly and begins speaking to you in Korean. As she speaks, you can't help but notice that her plate keeps disappearing and her hat has now sprouted eyes. "B-Bunnie?" your voice is not your own, but someone of much more... feminine? That's right, you had a woman's voice! Suddenly it seemed so silly of you to have forgotten. Rare birth defect, not many people had it. "Y-Your hat..."

"That sneaky little bastard." she says, now with an accent, "No need to worry about him though, as long as you've got me." she says confidently with a pat of your monumental breasts, "Now, about that pumpkin pie..."

"Oh, yes!" your voice fails to convey just how much you want that pie inside of you, "Feed me, feed me more!"

"Oh-kay!" the Pinkie giggled excitedly, "But just remember Becky, you've got that girlish figure to keep up!" she said with a squeeze of your breasts, "And you've got to eat~ it~ all my little taste tester!!"
`
Becky?

Your hallucinations were shattered at the sound of a metallic clang echoing throughout the apartment. You awoke in a cold sweat, torn from your precious R.E.M's by the mysterious clattering. Where exactly where you? How long had you been asleep? Was this that girl from your fanclub's apartment, and if so were there any of your important body hairs missing- that or sharpie marks over your internal organs. Any new scars?

However, upon realization that you had simply fallen asleep in Becca's apartment- the debris of her unforgettable feasting still left to litter the coffee table before you- there came several more pressing matters. One: where was Becca? A girl her size just doesn't wander off, at least not that easily. Two: Just what had made that noise that woke you up so abruptly from... whatever kind of dream you'd been having. Three... just what was that bright light coming from the corner of your eyes?

Little did you know that all three of these questions would be solved with a simple glance over to your right.

There in the kitchen, eclipsing the light from her refrigerator, stood Becca. Not a cognitive Becca, mind you, but an instinctive one. Her long brunette hair unkept from slumber and her large hips making a mockery out of the overall capacity of her fridge, blocking you from seeing just what it was that she had deemed so important that she had to nibble on it this late at night. You could see the back of her arms moving and slapping against her upper torso, gentle moans filling the apartment which sleep silently if not for the gentle hum of the refrigerator.

"B-Becky?" you ask sleepily, having not called her that since you were children

"Becca?" you hastily correct yourself. There was a reason you hadn't called her that since you were children

Your feet winced in anticipation of the touch of cold hardwood floors until realizing that Becca had carpeting. Touching the shag with your tootsies, you sleepily drag yourself over to the kitchen. "What time is it?" you ask, wiping the sleep from your eyes, "Did I miss curphew?"

No response.

"Hellooo?" you ask, a little agitated due to your lack of proper slumber, "Becca, you hear me? I asked--

You get a better view of her from the front. Her eyes closed, her mouth full, and stomach bloated. In her hands was a mostly-empty Tupperware container that once contained a proud and beautiful cheesecake, what's left of it either in pieces or on Becca's plump fingers. She had a dazed look on her face, mouth hanging agape slightly as she stuffed a handful of cheesecake in her mouth. Che Gueveara's face was now a wrinkled mockery as her stuffed-taut stomach forced the red ensemble up further into her chest.

"Muh..." she grumbled in a husky voice, "... hungreh..." she stumbled over the English language as her hand was brought down to the dome of soft malleable flesh. She jostled it slightly as a track of creamed cheese was left the wake of her hand. At her jostling, it was apparent that some of the occupants in Becca's tummy had been forced to check out a little early.

"BUUUUUUUUUUURAP!!" she belched loudly, a satisfied smile on her face as she made room for the next appetizer. She let out a deep sigh as her body flexed, "Better...." she hissed as the air flew from her mouth like a balloon. Her breathing had become quite labored as her body no doubt struggled to digest God knows how much food she'd crammed into her poor overloaded stomach. She began to rub her stomach again, smearing the dairy on her side, "Tubbeh...." she grunted once more as she leaned past her own swollen middle to get at another dessert.

She mumbled something incoherent, perhaps acknowledging your presence, and then proceeded to get right back to work plowing her way through the remaining desserts in her refrigerator. Of course you were shocked to find your friend, whom you had always deemed more or less in control of every situation at her fingertips, in such a compromising situation. You could only stare dazedly as she dropped the remainder of the cake to the floor, where the source of the clattering had been revealed to be a pie pan discarded in her gluttonous wake. Your gaze travels upwards as...
11413212121111212212.title: Taut Psychology

choices: Fun times over, (try) to get Becca to bed
Press your luck a feed her some more! How many chances like this do you get?
114132121211112122121.content:
This was going to be fun! Slightly peeking as Rebecca gorged herself on lasagna was one thing, but now you were free to watch as with no consciousness to tell herself no, Rebbecca was giving her free access to anything and everything she craved. A fridge full of opportunity seemed to be on the menu tonight (literally) and you only wish you had brought a camera or something to record Rebecca and her somnambular secret. Deli meats, frozen pizza, cheeses, soda, milk, and an entire shelf of cakes and pies were at her fingertips, yet strangely she seemed to only be focused on the sugary sweets. You had to wonder; how had she collected such a collection of pies, cakes, and other desserts? Could she have smuggled a few slices out from the school cafeteria, or had she actually baked them herself at one time or another?

Suddenly, a rustling from inside the fridge brings you back to full attention. Rebecca had nearly broken a perfectly good jar of pickles in her quest for something towards the back of her fridge. A small grimace crosses her face as she sticks her hand into the fridge, seemingly unable to find what she wanted as she searched about the fridge much the same way one searches blindly in the dark for a room’s light switch. Curiosity piqued and definitely not wanting this silly sleep eating to stop so soon, you slowly tip toe towards the fridge to get a better look at what the midnight muncher was after.

As you approached the fridge Rebecca’s rear blocks you from catching a glimpse of what was inside. Her wide hips barred entrance to the door and they swayed as she searched for sweets. Rather than risk waking her, you again try to gently squeeze in alongside her. This does little good, as Rebecca proceeds to back her thang up against you and jostles you aside, working her backside like a wrecking ball of sorts.“Guh…just sit down for a second Becc…” you grumble barely above a whisper. To your surprise Rebecca paused, and then proceeded to sit down, her titanic tush landing with a tremendous thud, as she props her back against the fridge's open door. You’re stunned for a second as she’d actually listened to what you’d said...but then again maybe sleepwalkers were like someone under hypnosis highly susceptible to suggestions. Well, whatever the reason you had your chance. Quickly you reach for the Tupperware in the far corner of the fridge and bring it out.

Finally you see what Rebecca’s been after, and as you open the lid you give a faint gasp of surprise...it was four large neatly sliced pieces of pumpkin pie. Bits and pieces of the dream you’d just had flash in your mind, most of it remained a blur, but you definitely remember pumpkin pie being present. Eyes widening at the sight you take this as a sort of mystical sign, perhaps this was all just another dream? Well dream or not, you slowly supply a hefty slice into Rebecca’s hand.A smile returns to her inattentive face, showing by instinct alone she knew exactly what to do now. Breathless you watch her sink the piece into her mouth, chewing much slower and mechanically than when she was awake. Her cheeks bulge and re-bulge as she easily chomps her way through the heavenly smelling pie, she was clearly beyond content with the taste, and in minutes the piece was gone, leaving nothing but sticky residue around Rebecca’s red lips.

As you watch Rebecca finish the slice, the warm sensation from earlier returns…and then…a wild idea hits you. A reckless, dark, sticky, maleficent idea… Why fumble with putting the next piece in her hand, when you could just feed her a slice yourself? Your breath and heartbeat quicken, as your realize if Rebecca somehow woke up this was going to be beyond explanation. Blood pumping as your heart continues to race, you lean in closer with the next slice at the ready, again you get the feeling of déjà vu as you find yourself whispering the magical commands the came from somewhere in your dream . “Eat…it …all” The words were nothing more than a whisper as they eked out of your mouth but Rebecca in her hyper-aware state seemed to hear them. “Mmmph” she blissfully agrees, as a smile crosses her face. “All…for...Cejmmeh…”the last name word was lost in an ocean of pie filling as Rebecca’s face practically dove into your hand slurping down the slice of pie in a few bites, (and almost taking a bite of your fingers along with it.) Her tongue thrashes wildly against your fingers, and the sensation sends a shiver up and down your spine. Doing this with Rebecca was so bad, so morally wrong, and so…crushingly sinful! It was wild, beyond wild! And yet, you loved every second of it. In the last few hours you had seemingly discovered an ocean of these new…urges...and watching Rebecca eat this piece of pie it was like...like...

You suddenly realize Rebecca has backed away from your pie-less hands and gone back to leaning against the fridge door.“Ooooh...Thrsssty…” she murmurs as she slowly began to turn about. Blindly, she reaches a hand inside the fridge and lifts out a half full two liter of Pepsi. She briefly struggles with the top, but somehow in the course of her fumbling works the lid off. You were unsure whether to act as your jostling might wake her up, but you ultimately decide to wait and let her take a few sips before feeding her another piece of pie. Rebecca began to raise the two liter, pressing it against her plump lips and looking much like a baby with a bottle, she began to guzzle the bubbly fluid. You’re eyes trace the effects of all the glugging (an actual word who knew?) down her throat and ultimate pooling inside an already taught stomach. The bubbles seemed only to balloon her stomach further, jutting it out proudly in victory over the red shirt army commanded by Che Gurrea’s face. Her gut continues to swell and you realize that she was taking more than just a few sips. After a few more seconds she raised her arm even higher in attempt to bring more of the sweet liquid to her faster and now a full on flood of cola begins streaming into her mouth. Soon the pop is coming faster than she can gulp it down, and carbonated cola starts spilling out from the sides of her mouth and down her front, cascading into a sticky mess around her cleavage. It takes her a few seconds for Rebecca to catch up with the fact the bottle is empty but once she does, she dully tosses it aside and it hits the ground with a few hollow plastic bounces.

Well! Now that little scene was over, maybe she’d like another piece of…”Brrrrap” she lets loose another belch, almost loud enough to rattle the nearby dishes. And then...she hiccuped, a short but strong squeak that bounces her entire bottom half into her upper body. This was too much! You start snickering uncontrollably; Rebecca had complained of stomach aches before, even accidently letting a burp or two slide, but you’d never seen Rebecca with the hiccups. Your laughter stops as her hiccupping comes again at short intervals, each one sending her swollen stomach rolling and flopping a bit. Then for just a second, her breathing stops as if she was going to wake up! You, meanwhile can only hold your breath and freeze helplessly… Rebecca smacks her lips and… returns to her scheduled snoozing. You breathe a sigh of relief the situation feeling a bit more dangerous than fun now.
114132121211112122121.title: Frigidairereier
