A nightmare(involving Claire)
1141321212111121221211.content:
"Okay fun time's over." You said quietly as you approach the hibernating Rebecca. "Better get her to bed before she starts eating again."

Then you grab Rebecca's flabby arms and start dragging her across the floor. Which was not easy with her newfound pudge, but your use to fanclub members clinging to your legs and having to drag them so this was nothing new.

"Man if Rebecca gets any bigger she might even give Claire a run for her money." You said while catching your breath.

As you make halfway to the bedroom Rebecca starts hiccuping again causing her whole body to shake like mad.

"*Hic* hic* *hic* *hic*". "Rebecca hiccuped in her sleep.

You help but laugh again at how funny this your friend is shaking like a big plate of jello and she not aware of it. But inspite of the humor you give Rebecca a glass of water to stop the hiccups. But your too tried to continue dragging her so you lay her down on the floor with a throw pillow from the couch and let her sleep here.

"Man she must really deep sleeper to not wake from any of this." You said while catching your breath. "I wonder what's she dreaming about right now?"
1141321212111121221211.title: The key word is try

choices: Lie to Becca about her sleep eating ordeal
Tell her the truth about her sleep eating syndrome
11413212121111212212111.content:
As you returned to sleeping on your nesting place on the couch, Rebbecca continued to snooze in the makeshift bed you had made for her in the hallway, but it wasn't here the Rebbecca's semi-conscious semi-lucid mind began to dream...Her dream had started earlier that night, the moment she had fallen asleep on the couch.

***

Out on a luxurious mansion patio rested a slightly older, slightly taller Rebbecca. The sun warmly kissed her bare skin and her longer hair flowing down her back as she relaxed in a tanning chair. She had become incredibly wealthy as a star pitcher in the World Softball League, and then as world famous food critic, but more importantly she had grown incredibly content with her life, as she relaxed on her mansions veranda in her favorite yellow sundress she let her two chubby hand pat the round mound that was her gut.

Off in the distance she saw another taller figure. It was you, C.J. Dalton, a more muscular and hunky and less chubby and chunky version of you, but your face still retained those gorgeous features she had always loved. Meanwhile she sported all of the hot features she knew you loved. After finally confessing your love for her and her weight gain, it had actually become a sort of sign of your love for her. All of your spoiling and pampering manifesting itself onto her body. She was your perfect flower so to speak and you were there to nurturer her and help her grow.

"Becky?!" his voice seemed a bit puzzled...and when was the last time he had called her Becky? Whatevs. She was way to relaxed to worry about such minor details. However, she did notice that the C.J of her dreams was carrying a sterling silver serving tray stacked with many-a-treat. As her set the tray down he cuddled up beside her, taking one of the cuts of cold cake and delicately serving it to her lips.

"Eat it all....my love." he said in a voice deeper than the real C.J's. As his manly hands began gently caressing her, Rebbecca indeed began to eat...and eat...and eat. Each bite of sweet cakey goodness absolutely perfect almost as if she were eating a cloud, and each pie drizzled with whip cream was baked to crusty a consummation just right for consumption.

A bit later she was begging to felt rather thirsty. Somehow sensing your dream doppelganger reached out and instantly pulled a bottle from a bucket of ice that had certainly not been there moments earlier. "Some, Cristal to wash it down?" he asked, suggestively raising an eyebrow. Loving the fact that she was a truly an adult and could now drink such adult beverages, and giving only a nod for an answer, she took the bottle herself and expertly unscrewed the bottles unique twist top. Rebbecca slowly then began guzzling down the cold drink by hand noting that it was awfully fizzy for an alcoholic beverage, it didn't matter though it was delicious.

Soon the dream began to blur as dawn began to break in the real world. Rebbecca awoke with a start, still a bit delirious. Wait...where was she? This was... the ceiling of her hallway? How had she gotten here? Had that all just been a dream? She frowned disappointingly...Wait, where was C.J?

Rebbecca rolled over, and clumsily rocked herself to her feet. It was no easy task as her still quite full stomach was still distended with the long haul of food she had stashed away inside of it. As she arose Rebbecca ran a hand through her hair it was beyond her normal bedhead, now it matted with...from the smell of it was...frosting? She hoped it was just frosting. As she explored her flat's main room she began to get a bit worried, not only because the kitchen looked like a terrible mess, but she could hardly remember what happened last night; only that you had come over and had even stayed for dinner last night.

That was then she spotted you snoozing away on the couch. With a gentle nudging from her pudgy pointers, you're eyes fluttered as you slowly began to awake.

"Hey Becca..." you mumbled taking a second to take in your surroundings. "I guess there must have been some sleeping powder in that lasagna, huh?" you joke as you gently arise from the couch.

Rebbecca doesn't seem to be in much of a joking mood, in fact from the look on her face she seems a bit worried.
"Um.. Ceej. Remind me what exactly happened last night....I mean after we started the video."

Oh jeez...This was a lot to deal with...What to do? You couldn't exactly tell her that she'd been sleep eating last night could you? Maybe it would be better to just not mention it and save her the embarrassment....Then again you weren't sure if you could think of a reason why her kitchen was such a mess, and even if you did, Rebbecca almost always knew if you were lying...

After a moment of hesitation you eventually.
11413212121111212212111.title: Sweet Dreams

choices: Bake Club is cancelled for the day (Due to certain batter bombs)
Bake club is still a twitter about yesterdays incident
114132121211112122121112.content:
You decide to just tell her the truth, there was no point in trying to lie to Rebbecca when she knew you so well.

"Well, first we had that lasagna and that tasty garlic bread..." you begin listing off events,already sounding a bit hesitant."...and then we were watching t.v....." you trail off your mouth getting a little dry.

"And...?" Rebbecca asked leaning in intensively eyes widened.

"Well...I guess...we both fell asleep. Except..."

"Except...What?"

"Well...Okay, listen this is going to sound crazy but I swear it's was what happened! I must have fallen asleep or something, but the next thing I knew I heard a noise from the kitchen. I go over there and I saw...you. Except, you were.. sleep...erm...eating."

"I What!?" asked Rebbecca sounding shocked.

You shrugged unable to give an answer. "Well I tried to wake you..." Which was true, even if you had changed your mind moments later.

"Oh my gosh that's all, C.J.I though someone had robbed the place or something...." she brought her hands to her jello like cheeks which were again turning the color of two round red tomatoes. "Still...you must think that I'm pretty weird huh?"she muttered bashfully hiding her face away from you.

"It's not weird!" You say, much too quick and loud to not sound defensive. "I-I mean I was surprised sure and it was a little...odd...but I think I've heard of it before and it's not like you could help it..." It was your turn to comfort your friend and you gently place a hand on her shoulder to let her you were being earnest. "Look it was probably a once in a lifetime thing." You say sagely, (although your eyes wistfully fluttered a bit as you savored the memory of last night.)

That was one of the things Rebbecca loved about you, she could have blown up the entire kitchen and you would have still has been there for her...In fact...It was then that a rather ingenious idea began to take hold of Rebbecca, and she smiled to herself for just a brief moment...

"No, we can't risk it!" she shouted suddenly spinning back to face you, a look of alarm upon her face.

"Risk what?"

"Well I can't keepsleep eating can I? I-I could choke on a can of tuna or swallow a spoon or something!" Rebbecca said overacting to make sure you fully understood her point.

"That's true..." you agree. "But Becca, what are you going to do? Tie yourself to the bed?"

"No. But like you said, it's not like it's something I can control it." she announced having perfectly steered the conversation towards her next proclamation. "You'll just have to spend the night again."

You look puzzled, but Rebbecca continued on before you could protest.

"Sure I mean...if it's no problem for you. Just make sure if I start sleep eating again that you, you know wake me up. It would just be nice if you could stay and make sure you know I don't kill myself..."

"Jeeze Becca when you put it like that...I guess we could make it like a game night. I'll call Kate and-"

"No!" Rebbecca shouted quickly. "I mean, I'd rather Kate not know about this, you know?...Let's just keep this between you and me for now....okay?"

You nodded, understanding that it might be a bit embarrassing if anyone else found out. After all you'd be mortified if anyone found out what you had been doing last night...In fact you certainly wouldn't mind another night with Rebbecca...and you especially wouldn't mind if she just happened to start sleep eating again. Sure, you'd wake her up, but only after you helped her with another midnight snack...or two.

"Sure thing Rebbecca! I'll be right over tonight!"

You could feel as a goofy grin began to spread across your face, and oddly Rebbecca seemed to be sharing your same wide smile.

After school that day...
114132121211112122121112.title: The Hard to Swallow Truth

choices: Great you're finally here! I'm starving!
Oh! Your pretty early for dinner...Want to watch a movie or something?
1141321212111121221211121.content:
During school the next day Rebecca Maglen had trouble focusing as she sat through her classes. Had she really become so obsessed with eating during the day, that she'd started to sleep eat as well? The thought scared her a bit... Though she supposed that when you she finally worked up the nerve to ask you out and you two were boyfriend and girlfriend and not just "friends" she could give the bulking up a bit of a break. She did love to eat though, or more specifically to taste and savor flavors of any good food. In fact she couldn't wait to get back to Bake Club this afternoon to see what Ms. Telleri had in store, and she began licking her lips in hungry anticipation...

You meanwhile were having an equally hard time concentrating during school. All throughout the day, your mind began to wander back to the events of last night. Say for example when you and Rebbecca and Kate were heading for your first hour class together, you'd slowly zone out of the conversation and focus on Rebbecca's hips, they way they swayed as she walked reminded you of the way they looked propped up against the fridge door, the touch of her hand as she passed back a set of papers towards you reminding you of the way her fat fingers had been covered in cake hours earlier...Lunch had been the worst offender however. As you watched Rebbecca tear her way into a mini turkey sub sandwich with chocolate milk to wash it down, you felt...almost guilty watching her eat...guilty and...and...aroused.

"-but what do you think? ...Hello? Earth to C.J!" shouted Rebbecca waving a hand in front of your face, and sending her arm fat a jiggling. "You okay?" asked Kate looking a bit concerned. "You look a little pale."

"Yeah...fine...Just...tired." you insist before digging into your own sandwich, unable to explain what you were feeling, even to yourself.

***


A few classes later and school was officially over for the weekend. You're pudgy posse rejoined outside of Ms.Telleri's classroom where a note had been taped to the door.

Sorry students. Bake club has been cancelled for today due to the lunch lady collision rules for safety.

"Well...now what?" asked Rebbecca looking a bit peeved.

"Well, we could-" You began until the bake club's door opened, and from within squeezed the very wide frame figure of Jen Telleri. "Hello! Oh, I see you three haven't found out yet." she said a frown crossing her face quickly. "Yes, it's a bit of a shame. I was surprised too, but safety rules are rules I suppose. And to make sure that no cooking instruments or utensils have been ruined by the..."incident" yesterday we have to cancel bake club closed until Monday."

"Aww that's too bad Ms. Telleri." said Kate just before noting the room in front of her still smelt like burnt batter.

"Well it's not all bad. Bunnie-er-Ms. Blake and I had made some more sample dishes for the whole class today. So we've just been giving them away to students and asking them to recreate the dishes for a little practice." explained Ms. Telleri.

"Really?" said Rebbecca perking up a bit.

"Oh yes. Ms. Blake and I agreed we have to keep thing fresh around here, can't have three day old baked spaghetti going to waste and we agreed to make things never more than a day ahead of time. Still we never miss an opportunity for a lesson. Anyone looking for a little practice can take home a little something and already it seems a lot of club members have taken the offer up. Which is good because it was either that or I bring them over to Mrs. Masters place and she...Oh, but now I'm rambling..." said Ms. Telleri catching herself. "Would you three like some?"

"Sure!" "Yeah!" "Well take some!" Your trio said in agreement, interested in the apparently easy assignment.

"Good good, just a moment." she said doing anything BUT disappear as she waddled her way into the classroom. Fiddling with a piece of paper and a pen at first, and then heading to her large storage fridge, she again pulled out three separate Tupperware. Each one was filled to the top with two brick sized chocolate brownies. "Now, each one inside is a little different. I made one batch and Bunnie made the other. I want to see if you can come back to class with an attempt at either one." again explained Ms. Telleri. "I do expect these back too on Monday...Tupperware isn't cheap you know. Here's some instructions and a basic recipe card, it's up to you to figure out the rest. I'm sure you won't have a problem my little taste tester." said Ms. Telleri handing Rebbecca hers.

A short round of thank you's later and the three of you were heading back to your rooms. You marvel again at the large brownies and how the seemed so perfectly stacked like small bricks inside the clear plastic container, it was almost like a trick ship in a bottle. Without realizing it the two girls ahead of you had stopped outside of Kate's dorm, and you collided into both of their squishy backsides.

"C.J? Are you okay?" asked Kate offering a hand to help you up. "You've been out of it all today." she noted as you got to your feet.

"I'm fine...Really." you insist picking up your thankfully unscathed box-o-brownies.

"Well alright...I'll see you two later then." said Kate sneaking in a short wink at her gal-pal Rebbecca. Rebbecca returned the wink, understanding that Kate had purposely left the two alone.

Realizing the fact she was again alone with you, Rebbecca's heart began to race once more, and her mouth was quickly searching for words, something, anything to say! "So...CJ...Uh..." she paused already feeling a bit warm and flush.

"--See you at your place in a few?" you ask, hoping to finish her sentence for her and remembering your sleep watching duties.

"Right! Uh, we can get out of our uniforms and..." said Rebbecca the words sounding more proactive then she'd really meant too.

"Yeah, I'll probably take a shower first and then head over. And this time I'll bring a pair of pajamas before I fall asleep on your couch." you joke. "Hey, I'll even bring dessert." you add, holding up your own tin of baked delights as a joke.

"Right. Okay then...In a bit." said Rebbecca taking off for her own room. Unaware of your hungry stare as you watched her walk away.

One shower and one change of clothes later, you quickly were made for Becca's place. Not thinking of anything else, but just wanting to see her more, spend some more time with her, at least until you could work out what these strange feelings you were having inside were about. Tupperware in hand, as well as a sleeping bag and a pair of pajama to change into later, you were prepared for tonight; hoping against all unlikely odds that you might get to watch Rebbecca sleep eat once more.

You knocked on the door, and after than sound of weighted footsteps Rebecca was instantly at he door saying...
1141321212111121221211121.title: School's closed due to aids. Lunch aids that is.

choices: "Let's go to the movies!"
"Sure, we can watch a soccer game. (I'm still not calling it football...)"
11413212121111212212111212.content:
"Early? Me? I am?" you splutter still at the doorway. Rebbecca apparently had also showered and dressed, (well bathed unbeknownst to you, but same difference appearance wise.) Smelling of clean soap and a hint of lilacs, this was apparently one of the days she hadn't reached for a hoodie and sweats and simply called it a night. Electing instead to wear a purple leisurewear like spaghetti strapped tank top and a pair of non-dressy pants, casual but not formal, Rebbecca looked more like she was heading out rather than spending the rest of the day inside. Actually from the looks of things it had been a while since she's elected to wear said outfit as the garment looked rather...tight. Especially near her lower half where the fabric now was stretched like onionskin around her barley contained spherical stomach.

"Yeah, it's only what, four o'clock?" she teased removing herself from the doorway to let you inside. "You could have called or texted me a warning..." She was already feeling more comfortable and in control of the conversation now that it was simply in her dorm, rather than out in an open hallway moments earlier.

"I-didn't- I was just" You stammer caught off guard but entering the abode anyways.

"Just kidding, C.J." she says grinning. "I don't care. Hell, I always like having you over. It's just a little early than I was expecting is all." she turns a bit waddling her way around the corner of her couch and she catches another glance at you. "Look at you...look nice when you dress up a bit." she says with a whistle, noting how you were also dressed in more than your usual lay around the house garb.

"Y-you do too." you answer quickly quipping back. The bout of compliments was suddenly turned the conversation into a mess of stammering and stuttering. Rebbecca had blushed a bit before turning away from you, ready to slump her rump right onto the couch and relax.

Well she was about to anyway before an idea struck her, "H-Hey..Let's go out." she said suddenly, moseying back towards you.

"Go. Out?"

"Yeah, you know do something! Off campus" she explained emphatically. "We could go one day without a dinner at the school cafeteria."

"Oh. Uh, well, like what?'" It had been a while since you'd wandered about Lethargis town...

"Like go to the mall or something! Go see a movie! Somewhere where we can just hang out..." In that instant Rebbecca just held back on saying the word alone feeling the word would have been out of place.

"Well...That new action movie is out..." You began tempted by the idea.

"Oh wait even better!" said Rebbecca hurrying into the kitchen and checking her fridge. "The Lethargis football team is playing at the home today! We could go check the new stadium!" (And catch a few of those hunky muscular players thought Rebecca.)

"Wait...When you say football is it like "football football" or-"

"Soccer." she said flatly."What's the difference. Honestly C.J that's like the one thing here, you won't switch too. It's a big sport over here and it'll be fun!"

"I'm never calling soccer football." you said resolutely, although you were happy to see Rebbecca so excited over something. She did love sports back home in the USA, and well at Chubbeso, sports were rarer than a half empty plate.

"Fine." said Rebbecca with a bit of a pout. "But it's still an option. I heard students get a discount. I've never really been there, but I hear it's really cool!"

In her heart, Rebbecca didn't care which. At either place she'd be able to get her grub on in front of you. At the movie's big buttery popcorn (real butter here unlike back in the States), soda, and candy. She might even grab your hand a bit, or hell hopefully you'd be the one to "put the moves" on her! But at the soccer she probably could expect a bit bigger of a dinner, probably had an excellent concession stand. With smoked sausage, warm and gooey cheesy fries, and grilled beef patties, all hot and crispy and fresh off the grill...It made her mouth water. Plus, C.J would still be sleeping over at her place tonight to ensure no sleep eating went on. So either way it was perfect! She practically had you all to herself, and so it didn't matter where she would be spending time with you....

After a moments pause you finally answer...
11413212121111212212111212.title: A Definite Dinner but is it a Date?

choices: Gets a ton of snacks for Rebecca
You get a ton of snacks for yours truly
114132121211112122121112122.content:
"You mean football, right?" Rebecca's eyes narrowed a little.

"I'm calling it what I call it," you mumble, blushing a little. Rebecca's nose scrunched in irritation. The look suited her, for whatever reason. It made her full face look more pinchable and sweet. He tried ignoring the feelings, but they persisted nonetheless. "So when should we go?"

Rebecca smirked. "Well, we can walk, but that requires moving. Let's take one of the carts over. it's right by our campus, anyway."

That ended up being their mode of transportation. You took a side-seat while Rebecca steered the vehicle, soft fingers clasped around the rungs of the steering wheel. After awhile, she casually leaned back, guiding the vehicle with a single hand along the top. "So have you seen football games before?"

"I have," you reply, "but i never saw a soccer game."

Now Rebecca had to laugh a little. You were so impulsively against the word "football" it almost bordered on endearing. It also bordered on irritating, so she wanted to tell you to watch yourself.

Eventually, they arrived at the soccer game. it was by no means elaborate. It was a standard private school stadium--closed off, rich people everywhere. The audience had taken seats already as the teams filed out. "We just made it," you mumble as you breathlessy ascend the stairs--your body bouncing a little along each step.

"Yeah," Rebecca mumbled behind you, slower, "Get me some food. I'll get us seats."

"Anything particular you want?"

"Surprise me. Get something for yourself, too, before you waste away."
114132121211112122121112122.title: "Sure, we can watch a soccer game."

choices: Finish the monstrosity that was the cake!?!?
Defeated by the calorie bomb, but you cant control yourself around Becca/cake
1141321212111121221212.content:
This was a once in a life time opportunity, seeing Rebecca stuff herself to her physical limits was almost like a fantasy turn reality. This fantasy though, wasn’t going to end anytime soon. You were too enthralled in watching this new side of your best friend, to let it slip away would be like the stick of butter she’s eating, you would never have another chance at tasting this strangely erotic feeling.

“Uh, maybe I shouldn’t let eat the rest…” you thought to yourself as you reached the remaining half. You want to see her stuff herself silly, but not make her sick. Mere inches from retrieving calorie laden stick; you were unsuccessful as the rest is consumed in a mighty “GlOMP”. “MMMH” is the first audible response the sleep eating Becca, “sooo busthery” clearly a small coat of butter had remained behind.
”M-MORE” she had said in slightly startling volume. “Need to eat for CEEJAH”, your command earlier to eat all the food had burned itself into her brain. “Might need to watch out for that later on” you thought to yourself. As you looked back to the towering multi doored fridge (Becca’s parents had upgraded her to the largest fridge available through the school furnishing) she had already cleared out the two lower doors of all edible food.

You stepped back to open the larger upper two doors swung open like the gates of heaven. Waiting inside was something of gods looking down on you and your good deeds, or maybe someone wanting to punish poor starving Becca. You could feel your heart pumping so hard against your chubby chest; it felt like the only thing you could concentrate on was the feeling in your chest. So many feeling concentrated there. Your hands sweaty in anticipation of the show that was to begin soon.

“A Bunnie Bomb Cake” you muttered out loud. You couldn’t believe your luck, since you have been here, you haven’t seen Becca even touch one of these. Bunnies’ cakes had many names around campus “gut busters” “bust busters”, and “butt busters” (people around here aren’t creative). The most undisputed name used is “DIET DESTROYER”, anybody that has a taste can’t stop craving for them. As if on cue your stomach let out a loud growl, almost like it knew what was in close proximity. Any sort of occasion called for Bunnie cakes, birthdays, new semesters, passing a class, heck even Fridays were enough for her to make them. But it wasn’t normally done with one cake, EVERYBODY got one. Depending on “what year you were” was the factor for the size of cake.

This one though was on another level; Becca had the largest fridge available, but even this cake made it feel as though the fridge had shrunk to half the size. At eye level, all you could see was cake, as wide as the main fridge, all the way to the back, cake cake CAKE. It took all available space on the main shelf. By just eyeballing it, it was almost square in shape, easily over two feet in length and width, close to nine inches tall. This thing was a monster in size, never had you seen anything remotely close to this one.

Then the smell hit us, you grabbed your stomach in hunger. Becca only response being “mmh red velve cake my favorah”. Finally having a second to think about what she said, you realized that red velvet cake was her favorite. Out of fear of it being used against her, she never once told a soul about what foods made her weak. This indeed was a red velvet cake in front of you. Doing your best to resist, you reached in past the front and grabbed hold of the plate on the sides to hoist this calorie nuke.
Using all your dormant muscle, you lifted the Bunnie cake. To your amazement and dismay, if must have weighed in the range of forty pounds, well over anything heavier you lifted in months. Carefully extracting the cake from its prison, you stepped backwards, avoiding a catastrophe by stepping away from all Tupperware on the ground. You backed up to an opening; you slowly bent over to lay it on the ground, making sure to level out the plate. Once one side made contact, the other soon made a “cling” sound, notifying you that the package had safely been set down.

Next came what could only be said as the most exciting sentence you think you might ever say, EVER. “Okay Becca time for dessert”, what came out was merely a squeak, but to Rebecca, it was call to please the person held most dear. As she made an attempt to rock herself off of her fleshy throne, had she had manage to do was bust a few seams on her pajama pants. Her second attempt was successful as she rolled to the side. Next was almost indescribable, well almost, as she crawled on all fours towards the sound of my voice, her large butt was viewable from the front, hips swinging side to side wobbling like jelly. Bumping into cabinets softly.
Finally arriving at the cake, you could barely speak, as if she had a spell on you to watch what was about to be the best show to ever occur in the existence of the universe. As she slowly lowered herself onto the cold floor, she began to reach for her first hand full. You couldn’t stop yourself even if you wanted to, next came out just as the first time. “No using hands”, it came out before you even had a chance to stop yourself. “Mkay” was the response you needed to hear her say. That exactly what you got.

Dragging her heavy body off the floor, she readied herself by lowering her head to the same level as the cake. As Becca opened her mouth for the first bite, a mouth full of the thing she wanted to avoid most. The feeling you got from watching that first bite, knowing you had just changed the direction of Rebecca’s life. Knowing you just set your friend down the path of gluttony. Seeing her moan in pleasure of the taste, you were unstoppable now as you walked next to Becca, and muttered into her ear one last time. “EAT...IT…All”. Giving her rear end a might slap, a loud “FWAP” emitting from where your chubby hand made contact, “piggy”.

It was too much for her overclocked sleeping brain. Next sight you knew is one that would never see the light of day. She went whole hog on that cake. Diving face first into it, mouthful after mouthful, only taking breaks to breath. Moans could be heard from Rebecca as she consumed the cake, like it was filled with nothing but ecstasy.
Watching this show of utter gluttony eventually had to come to a close as Rebecca had…
1141321212111121221212.title: Unleashing a true GLUTTON unto the world

choices: ...to make you stay and keep her company.
...to thank you for joining and getting everyone else to join.
1141322.content:
...and decides not to. What would the point of catching CJ's eye with new weight be if she needed the CJ Fanclub's help to do it? Suddenly she had a great idea. "Um, well, I can't either, because I'm a student and I need my time to cook too! Why not make Bunnie the taste tester, since she has such a success at cooking anyways?" suggested Rebecca. You personally thought this was a great idea! It made perfect sense! Everyone's eyes turned to Bunny. "Well..." she said. "Sure! This is my club, so I ought to play a major role in it!" said Bunny. Everyone cheered, though the members of the CJ Fanclub were definitely disappointed that you managed to get out of their latest attempt to fatten you.

As you and all of the others made things in the various available microwaves, ovens, blenders, etc. the room had to provide, Bunny grabbed items as they were finished, put the person's name on them, and then placed it on a large table at the end of the room. After the club was over, Bunnie would sample each of the foods and write down a critique of what she thought. At the end of the class, Bunnie calls you over...
1141322.title: She declines as well. (Who else can fill the ro...

choices: Could you finish these off?
Could you give me a belly rub?
11413221.content:
"CJ! Come here for a second!" called Bunnie as everyone else filed out of the room.

"Yes, Bunnie?" you ask.

"Well, I'll probably be here a while taste testing foods, so I was wondering if you could keep me some company."

"Sure thing!" you reply, and smile. Bunnie was a nice woman, and very funny, plus he kinda owed it to her because it was his fault for making her the taste tester. You and Bunnie made small talk as she went down the massive table. She ate a serving of each thing, whether it be a desert, such as a slice of cake, a meal, such as a skewer of marinated grilled shrimp, or an appetizer, such as a tray of nachos. Bunny had to eat the whole meal if it was an appetizer or main course, but only have a sample of the desert. However, any desert Bunnie enjoyed was promptly finished off. Within 20 minutes, Bunnie had finished half of the table, and was sitting down and moaning from the massive amount of food she had consumed. Bunnie looked at CJ and said...
11413221.title: ...to make you stay and keep her company.

choices: Tomorrow morning waking up like usual...
As time passes Bunnie begins resembling the rest of the women at the academy...
114132212.content:
"Hey CJ, could you possibly give my belly a rub?," asked Bunnie. You stared at her in disbelief for a few seconds thinking you had just imagined her somewhat odd request. Had she really just asked you to give her a belly rub you wondered as you looked at her slightly distended, normally flat tummy? "Hello, Earth to CJ, are you gonna help me out here or not?," Bunnie said snapping you out of your deep thoughts. "Huh?," you replied not exactly knowing how to answer her request. "Come on CJ if you don't help me out there's no way I'll be able to finish testing out this food by tomorrow and the girl's will get upset." You stood there weighing your options on the one hand Bunnie was a staff member here at the school and also ten years older than you. If you did this you and Bunnie might get in trouble with the school, and you wouldn't want that. Also, if the fan club had found out you gave Bunnie a belly rub they would all most likely be out for revenge, especially Claire. You shuddered to even think about what Claire might do to you if you gave Bunnie a belly rub and she ever found out. On the other hand Bunnie was easily one of the most beautiful women in the academy, with large perky chest and unlike most of the other staff and students at the academy, a thin waist and no fat belly to speak of. In addition to her good looks she did have a point about disappointing the girls in the cooking club. "Come on CJ, I need a belly rub badly," Bunnie said while pouting and giving you puppy dog eyes. As you thought it over you realized that the positives of giving Bunnie a belly rub out weighed the potential consequences. "Okay," you reply as you begin giving Bunnie a belly rub. "Thanks CJ," Bunnie replies as you rub her small food baby. You rub it for a couple of minutes while making small talk with Bunnie, strangely enjoying every second of it. Eventually Bunnie stopped you saying "Thanks CJ I should be able to finish the rest now." "Alright," you replied as Bunnie began digging into the remaining student's food.
         After another half an hour Bunnie finishes testing the food and writing down the positives and negatives of each dish. As to be expected Bunnie's food baby had gotten bigger after finishing the remaining food projects. "Hey CJ thanks for staying here and keeping me company but can I ask for one more favor?" "Sure," you replied "what do you need?" "Well," Bunnie said blushing, "I was wondering if you could help me back to my living quarters because getting around alone with this," she said poking her distended belly "may be kind of tough." "Sure Bunnie I'll help you out," you reply. So, you help Bunnie up and begin walking her to her apartment. When they arrive at the apartment Bunnie sighs "finally," it was starting to get a bit late by the time they got to the apartment. "Sorry CJ I'd invite you in but I kind of just want to collapse on my bed and let this food digest," Bunnie said. "That's alright," you replied as it was getting kind of late and you too wanted to just crash and fall asleep. "So see you tomorrow," you said as you began to leave Bunnie's door. "Yea see ya tomorrow CJ," Bunnie replied waving as you walked away. Eventually you returned to your living space and eventually fell asleep wondering if tomorrow would be as exciting as today.
114132212.title: Could you give me a belly rub?

choices: ...and you were worried sick. You need to help her cut back!
...and you were benefiting. Big Bunnie Makes Big Portions!
...and you had a new crush. Big Bunnie was Beautiful.
1141322122.content:
As time passed, things continued as normal. Which is to say, as normal as things could get around this whack-job of an academy—as in, not very normal at all. But while you were dodging hormone-addled, boy-crazy girls and managing to avoid awkward situations with your equally hormone-addled, boy-crazy cast of curvy cuties, a very distinct change began to occur in one of them. As her responsibilities slowly shifted from keeping the school, the Masters women, and (most importantly) you increasingly and exceptionally well-fed, Bunnie Blake's newfound responsibility as the official taste-tester of the Cooking Club meant that she was doing an awful lot of eating.

In what had initially been just another half-assed attempt at getting you to up your calorie intake, Claire Masters had inadvertently caused a series of events that would cause everyone's favorite calamity-pink cook to rapidly balloon outwards.

It had started out small, of course. Most things like this did. The Cooking Club's co-sponsor and taste tester was adamant in making sure that her students were getting the most out of their experience under her tutelage, almost oblivious to the real reason that anyone had even joined her club was to get closer to you. She gave everyone her best advice when it came to the fine arts of cuisine, and eagerly awaited the results every Monday, Wednesday and Friday when the club met. So long as you kept showing up, so would the girls (and your friends!), and so long as everyone showed up, that meant Bunnie would get more than her fair share of treats to eat.

"Good job with this one, girls!" Bunnie's belly mushroomed noticeably underneath her chef's smock, "I really like how well you're taking to my criticism!"

Day in and day out, Bunnie was subject to gorging herself. She never seemed to mind—that carefree attitude of hers shone through the whole experience, for sure. The culinary prodigy was just as capable of sucking down meals as she was dishing them out. And as the days passed, what little time she didn't spend in the kitchen was spent partaking in the glorious goodies that came out of it.

"Oh boyyy Claire, you're really learning now." Bunnie smacked her lips lovingly, her belly growling as she snapped the buttons on her increasingly constrictive uniform, "I'm gonna have to eat this allllll up. It's so good I don't wanna leave any leftovers!"

And naturally, with an increase of calories came an increase of... well, Bunnie.

It was hard to really keep a sense of scale when your headmistress weighed five hundred pounds. Or the other teacher in the cooking club also weighed five hundred pounds. Or when both of your friends were nearing three hundred, and your not-friend Claire had surpassed that. All you knew was that Bunnie was getting fat. Quickly and professionally, as she seemed to absorb every calorie passed her way with the expertise of an eating queen.

Her confident bouncy step was replaced with a lumbering waddle in no time as the pounds and inches caught up to her. The lithe, busty chef was buried underneath an avalanche of fat. There was no way that it was just the Cooking Club that was doing this to her—she had to be binging on her off time too. Rebecca, you and Kate had discussed it at length during the party at your place where she'd eaten literally all of the snacks.

You were worried about your friend—it seemed so strange that someone so obsessed with cooking was now equally obsessed with eating everything in sight.

But you didn't know just how worried you should be until one day, you were going to the Cooking Club.

You, Kate, Rebecca, and even Claire had managed to put all of the awkwardness that came with being a walking foursome for your affections aside when you came across the familiar sight of someone incredibly fat getting caught in the doorway.

Now, your initial thought was that it was Mrs. K! This kind of thing happened to her so often that, if she were a side-character in some sort of strange fat-centered erotica story, it'd be a defining character trait. So you weren't too concerned, despite the fact that it was nowhere near Mrs. Kawasaki's hallway and far past time for her to have headed home. It wasn't until you noticed the distinct color pallet, specifically the bright pink hair, that the pieces began to fall into place...

"Ceej?" Bunnie's slow, heavy voice called out helplessly from the other side, "Is that you?"

"Bunnie?!" Rebecca cried out worriedly, "Is that you?"

"Yeah..." Bunnie huffed, "Think you could give me a push? I'm kinda stuck..."

It took the combined weight and force of your friends to get your older friend unwedged from the doorway. And it was only really then that you noticed just how different Bunnie was.

Of course she'd gained weight. That much was obvious. But how much weight she'd been gaining had eluded you until now. Dealing with your own stuff, the fan club and the horny headmistress and your OT3 friends could get to be a lot. But Bunnie was enormous—her hips had checked the doorway, soft fat bulging out from either side of the structure as it fought her pillowy body's resistance. Her face was impossibly round and chinned twice over, her cute pink 'do making it look that much more spherical. Her arms, hammy and doughy beyond recognition, struggled to bend at the elbow as she doubled over to catch her breath. Her belly was so big, her expanded chef's smock rode up in the back to give everyone a nice flash of big round ass crack.

"Thanks babes." Bunnie wheezed, "It'd be a real shame if I couldn't... huff... if I couldn't... puff..."

Bunnie wiped the sweat from her forehead with one meaty arm

"I need to siddown."

Bunnie Blake was fitting right in at Chubbeso Academy, alright...
1141322122.title: Bunnie Gets Big

choices: You get home to see Kate, Rebecca, and a lot of food
Claire pulls you into her limo
The fan-club is waiting outside your apartment building
1142.content:
Fine, i'll join the sumo club, you say reluctantly. "YAY" Becca and Kate yell in unison. They then pull you into the sumo ring/ gymnasium. All of the fattest girls in school were their sweating and jiggly while trying to knock the other out of the ring. But this team is horrible, the girls can barley stand let alone sumo wrestle.

Then Ms. Touya and her daughter entered the room and all the girls went silent. Just then Claire burst into the dojo huffing and puffing then she said "CJ i heard you were gonna be on the team so i ran as fast as i could to sign up". Claire was wearing her own sumo style diaper and tank top, it was a hot pink color with floral print on them. "MMhmm!" said Ms. Touya, obviously her patience was running short. Before she could say anything she notices you, then she proceeds to waddle up to you and then she stared you down and poked and prodded you then said " You to skinny, 300lbs at least or you not on team" she said with a Japanese accent.

After school you were walking home when you begin to think about what just happened. The girls really wanted you to stay on the team and put up a major protest to Ms. Touya, so she decided to give you two months to bulk up to at least 300lbs. You were about to say no but then your trio of girls stepped in and said "He could do it in 1 month". Soooo now here you are, forced to be on the sumo team, forced to get super fat, Forced to do it all in only 30 days. Why am I being told to do this without my consent? Just then......
1142.title: Suuuuummoooooooo Rumble!!!

choices: Lets see some more sumos...
11423.content:
As you continued to gripe about the situation you were so suddenly forced into you were so lost in thought that you failed to notice the crowd of girls crowded outside your dorm room. You quickly realize that the crowd of rambunctious school girls was your fan club, eagerly waiting for you by your dorm room ready to do who knows what with you. You reverse back around the nearest corner to hide, then taking a peek from your position you count more than ten girls in the group. It would be tough, but you think you could just barely muscle your way through them…

You take a deep breath and start to run as quickly as you could towards your front door. “There he is!” a girl shouts from the crowd and the crowd as one shifts their heads from your door (where they thought you were) to where you actually are, running at them like a mini bowling ball. Most of the girls step aside not wanting to get trampled although a few reach their hands out ready to “catch” you. Your hands (trained from video games and maybe the second fastest part of your body) slap away their advances with rapid speed. Batting a fifth hand away you manage to get your key out and pull the door open. Tumbling inside there’s only a few seconds before one of the girls can put their foot in the door. Adrenaline pumping at maximum levels you quickly gets the door closed and lock it tightly, feeling like some sort of survivor of the zombie apocalypse.

Whew! You wipe a bead of sweat from your brow as you collapse on the other side of the door. If this was how it was going to be every afternoon after school, maybe spending time with the sumo club was the better option. You would head back to the sumo arena tomorrow, not to wrestle, but at least to hide from the fan club.

***


After your last class of the day you made sure to be the first one in the arena, hoping to have time to talk Mrs. Touya before sumo practice actually began. Your punctuality pays off as you see Mrs. Touya dressed in her own training mawashi (sumo outfit) a solid red in color, except for the orange training whistle which bounced side to side in front of her wide cleavage. Her top clings to her every curve, not hiding her large size but rather displaying it intimidatingly. You bound over the spongy training mats to meet her, but it takes a second for you to begin to speak, even if she was a retired sumo wrestler she still looked quite fearsome dressed in her full sumo attire.

You open your mouth to talk but before you can she moves to cut you off, a warm smile upon her face as she bows slightly to you, her enormous stomach bunching up like a fold in a beanbag chair. “CJ, I humbly apologize for my behavior yesterday.” She begins as she ends the bow, her voice not in the thick Japanese English she had scolded you with yesterday, but her warmer, smoother English. “You see, I was a little angry because of a big problem I am facing. The school has had one of the greatest sumo teams around, but this year, we are, not so good.” You remember yesterday how you noticed this year’s team looked terrible.

“That is why Dalton-san, I need you for the team! My own daughter truly gifted with the size and strength of a sumo wrestler has decided to do kendo, rather than take after her mother and join the team so you can imagine why I might have been a little upset. But You! You have already brought in a ton of new recruits, even my Sazuka herself expressed some interest the second she heard you would be joining, that is I hope, if you still wish to join.”

You certainly had not expected this…Mrs. Touya’s humble apology had caused your own feelings to do a complete reversal, and how could you possibly say no to a plea like that? “Okay” you consent “I’ll try” you say as your return her bow honorably.

“Excellent.” She says looking like she was about to wrap you in a big hug, catching herself she stopped just sort of sending you to be smothered in her cleavage. “Thank you for very much. CJ-san. I promise to train you with the honor and respect that I give all my students. And from now on it is not Mrs. Touya, it is sensei Touya understood?”

“Yes sensei!” You shout back snapping into a salute.

“Good! Now please follow me…” she stomps across the gym mat leaving deep and heavy footprints in the spongy material as she does so. Stopping just outside the locker room, she gestures for you to have a look inside. “Please find a mawashi that fits and come out ready to train…”

Inside the cold pre-Chubbeso men’s locker-room you find a few shrink wrapped packs of sumo belts. Judging from size alone most of them look like they wouldn’t fit your relatively skinny waist. You take the smallest of the bunch, open it and try it on. It’s a lose fit, but it mercifully covers more than you thought it would. As you tie the belt tightly, you mutter a bit on how unfair it was that women wrestlers had both a top and a bottom to their outfit and you were supposed to wrestle shirtless. You sigh as you look at your semi-pudgy self in the mirror, and then try to put your meanest wrestler face on, but try as you might, you hardly looking threatening. Sighing again, this time at the mess you had gotten yourself into, you slowly left the locker room and headed back to the sumo arena.
11423.title: SUMOothing Things Over

choices: Rebecca vs. Claire! A Grudge Match of Tomboyish Strength vs. Sheer Size
YOU vs. Claire!  (I don’t think she’ll go easy on you…)
114231.content:
Leaving the locker-room you find the arena has begun to fill up with girls all looking to be trained by the all-star Mrs. Touya. You’re caught by surprise as few catcalls and whistles rise up from a crowd of girls obviously energized by your emergence from the locker room. Turning red you quickly search for a place to hide, but instead find the trio of Kate, Rebecca and Claire and that was good enough. You cross half the gym and meet up with them having to walk awkwardly in the new outfit as you got used to it.

“Hey big boy” Claire in her hot pink and floral print garb from yesterday. You blush even harder now, feeling diminutive compared to your generously ample associates. “Don’t be coy; you have no reason to be ashamed in front of the future queen of Chubbeso's sumo wrestling team.” Claire had been thrilled ever since yesterday, not only would she be joining a sport she could really get behind, (figuring she was born for greatness as apparently in sumo the bigger the better and she was all about big) but, you’d also be with her and would apparently be bulking up as well. It was all too perfect!

“Humph!” Rebecca scoffed. “Isn’t that like the princess Kate? We haven’t even started yet and already she wants to be Queen of the team.” In truth Rebecca had wanted to be the queen-er- star-er-captain whatever the top sumo wrestler was called. Ever since she’d came to Chubbeso academy and had stopped playing softball she’d been dying for some sort of rough and tumble activity and apparently sumo wrestling would be it. Plus being the star of the team wouldn’t hurt her chances of trying to get some ‘attention’ from you. Her mawashi had been one of the school's mass produced uniforms and since it was not custom tailored to her size (as Claire's was) she found that it gave her just the slightest bit of a wedgie.

“Please! How many times have I told you about that name?” Claire bemoaned. “I’ll have you know that I’ve already been to quite a few of the school sumo tournaments already with mother, and it doesn’t look hard at all. In fact, mother said that I was born to lead and that I was practically raised to be a team leader.”

“Uh actually, the correct term for the head sumo wrestler is Yokozuna.” piped Kate as she adjusted her glasses. Kate had originally found the sport fascinating with its ancient traditions and customs, but she hadn’t really wanted to actually be a sumo wrestler. But the fact that she was among friends always made things easier and today was no different and so she ignored how the tight fitting green uniform was making her feel, chunkier, than usual.

Mrs. Touya had been doing rounds of all the participating students’ names and she finally makes her way to your group. Getting up you display your new garb for her feeling a bit ridiculous as you did so.

“Perfect! I’m sure you’ll be moving up to the others in no time…” she adds appreciatively before writing your friends names down on her notepad. There was something about her words that just didn’t sit right with you, and then they suddenly remind you that there was one more thing you were going to ask sensei Touya about. “So, uh, sensei… you were just kidding about the whole ‘I have to weigh 300lbs by the end of the month’ thing, right?”

She laughs warmly and squints her hazelnut brown eyes closed before quickly answering with a flat and hollow “No.” The grin that remained on her face was now eerily the opposite of her voice. You eyes bulge slightly as you finally grasp her answer.“CJ-kun,” she began now using the friendlier ‘-kun’ Japanese honorific than the honorable ‘-san’ to address you. “Truly you are still, as I said yesterday…to skinny. But I’ve seen you running from many girls and even carry a few or two as they tried to uh, hug you, and you possess great leg strength, perfect for any sumo wrestler. If were to put on a hundred pounds or so, and with my expert training you could be a champion. But! It’s not enough for me to think so; you have to believe in yourself too!”

You thought it over, you already weighed about 187lbs, well last time you checked, but to get to 300lbs…That would take..113lbs! 113lbs just seemed like such a large number to reach in a month…but maybe some of it would be muscle too not just fat…Yeah! Sumo wrestlers had to be strong right? You could imagine yourself strutting down the hallways; a walking mountain of muscle, able to hold back even the fleshiest of fans, it did seem quite appealing. You decide to take her words as a sign of motivating you. Rebecca and Kate and well Claire too, were already set on this and you couldn’t let them down either. You decide to give bulking up your best shot and hope Mrs. Touya wouldn’t be too angry if you didn’t reach that oh so high goal of 300lbs by the end of the month. But who knew? Maybe bulking up to sumo size would be…fun!

“Wonderful!” Sensei Touya said as she picked up her whistle and blew it loudly.“All right new recruits!” she began proving to posses powerfully large lungs along with everything else. She headed up the stairs and onto the arena’s center ring before continuing. “Our first match against another school is in one month. I want to see what everyone has got today, so let’s have a few matches to start! If you lose today don’t worry there will be plenty of practices later. I have a list with all participants’ names on it, so if your name is called please make you way to the center ring” she closed her eyes and dragged her pen across the notepad, stopping on one of the names.

“Claire Masters!” She announced and a roar of applause goes up as a crimson clad Claire hopped to the stage, blowing kisses towards the crowd, and doing a few short poses as she reached the center. She lifts one leg up and down in a powerful stomp sending shock waves and jiggles across her large doughy midsection. The crowd of girls grew silent at the realization that next name would actually have to sumo against the goliath of a girl.

Mrs. Toruya closed her eyes again and picked the next name, reading it aloud it was…
114231.title: SUMOothing Things Over PT. 2 Some More Sumos

choices: Claire wins
Rebecca wins
1142311.content:
"Rebecca Maglen." Sensei Touya announced again.

Then the girls went from applauding to absolute silence when they heard who she called but Rebecca couldn't help but grin.

"I'm gonna enjoy this." Rebecca said while chuckling. Then rebecca waddled towards the ring and stomped like Claire did (as is tradition in sumo wrestling).

"You don't how long I've been waiting for this chance to kick that pampered behind across the ring princess." Rebecca stated.

"Likewise, now I have a chance to put you in your place for always getting in the way of my budding romance with CJ." Claire stated.

Unbeknownst to you and everyone else, aside from wanting to rip each other apart there's another motive that's making these two so driven.

*a few minutes earlier*

"In the girls changing room right before practice Claire dragged Rebecca into a area where they could be alone.

"This better be important Claire." Rebecca said in a annoyed voice.

"It is." Claire replied. "During practice today, I'd like to make a little wager."

"What kind of wager?" Rebecca asked curiously.

"In the event that we face each other in the ring, the winner gets to take CJ on a romantic dinner date to Shaunty's." Claire stated. "It'll be paid by my mom, the dinner will in their private luxury booth, and no there be interruptions or disturbances from the fanclub and me if you win." "So do we have deal?"

"Your on." Rebecca said.

*back to present time*

Sensei Touya then waddled around the ring to the middle line ready to get started.

"Claire are you ready?'

"Yes!"

"Rebecca are you ready?"

"Yes!"

"Begin!!!" Then the two charged at each other and the audience was going nuts with applause (you weren't sure who to root for though). Their bellies were smacking against on another and their breasts were pressed against each other viciously. While Claire had the weight advantage on her side, Rebecca has more muscle than she does which makes them dead even with neither one of them giving way. Both of them were looking and waiting for an opportunity to tip the scale in their favor but can't find one yet. Who will come out on top?
1142311.title: Lets get it on

choices: Delphine Shuzumiya what’s she doing here? Isn’t she a little thin?
The meek and mild Kate…This is going to be awkward
11423111.content:
A minute or two later the match and both of the wrestlers, were still going strong. Rebecca was busy pushing forward with her leg and using her strong softball trained arms to find gain ground. Unfortunately as she pushed against the lake of pudding that was Claire’s stomach, she only re-affirmed what everyone in the school already knew: Claire was heavy! Claire, having never been so physical with others, was unsure of what else she could do other than stay standing and use the weight difference to a heavy advantage in her favor. So, as Claire struggled against Rebecca, Claire awkwardly made to push her over. The act had little effect on Rebecca as she only slid back a few inches, her arms remaining never leaving their grip on the blonde's beefy shoulders.

Rebecca could feel her muscles getting tired as they strained, and so she went for one last shove. She quickly slid her hands off Claire’s shoulders and charged full force against the mountain of pudge, pushing her hardest into the soft chest as a final attack. Claire cringed at impact, but surprisingly the blow hadn’t hurt as much as she’d expected.

Rebecca seemed equally surprised as her right hand hit slapped against Claire’s soft and squishy fat, but she immediately countered with a shove from her left hand. Again the blow seemed to bounce off of Claire’s blubber. It was no use; her might was no match against Claire and her gastronomic girth. Her hands were now actually sinking into the stomach rolls of the self professed 'large and in charge' girl; soon her forward progress had halted leaving her running in place, unable to propel the princess and the incredible weight she possessed. Trying with all her might, and now literally face to face with Claire’s weight, Rebecca realized grimly Claire wasn’t budging. In fact Claire was now looking somewhat amused by her futile effort.

Rebecca was a driven girl, Claire had to give her that…but this was a date with C.J on the line and the Masters never surrendered. Then using her incredible pile of pound she called her stomach, Claire heaved forward, surprising Rebecca with a massive belly bump. The sudden act and shift in weight caught Rebecca off-guard, toppling her over onto her bum like a bag of overstuffed marshmallows.

Defeated Rebecca gazed up as Claire’s belly entered her vision, her dimpled face beaming down in victory as it as it rested atop of a gigantic gut. Claire then offered a hand to her fallen foe, in a true noble sportsmanship manner. Rebecca ignored the offer electing to standup on her own accord.

“Very nice! Both of you will make fine additions to the team!”Commended sensei Toyua as the two returned to the bleachers.

“Good job” you say as you give a thumbs up to both of them, desperately trying not to show favoritism to either of the feuding female friends of yours.

“Why thank you C.J! Usually I’m not one for such physical fisticuffs but I rather enjoyed that!” Claire said as she took the spare seat on your left, forcing Rebecca to sit on the other side of Kate. Rebecca unhappily took her spot, not saying anything aloud to you, only grumbling something about a ‘rematch later.’ "Oh and by the way I've got a little surprise planned for my big sumo wrestler man tonight." teased Claire as she scooted her booty ever closer to yours.

"What?" you ask, looking to Rebbecca and Kate for an answer, but Kate merely shrugged, and Rebbecca only frowned and crossed her arms tighter, still angry .

"I'll explain later..." Claire assures you as she rested a long and heavy arm around your neck, in order to snuggle even closer to you.

Slightly puzzled by what Claire could possibly have planned, you turn your attention back to the ring and watch the next match. As the next wrestlers were announced for each match you would grow anxious hoping you wouldn’t be the one wrestling next. A couple of matches later and you were starting to breathe a sigh of relief; it was starting to look like you wouldn’t even be wrestling at all today.

“Finally our last wrestlers are…” Sensei Touya now checked her list for any names that had not been called, and she gave a slight smile as she stopped on your name, “CJ Dalton” The arena is filled with cheers and whistles once more as make your way to the ring, clearly the main event of the day.

“Now…let’s see your opponent shall be…” Your sensei trailed off once more as she struggled to read the last name on the list. You yourself had lost track of who had and hadn’t wrestled yet, but who could possibly be left?
11423111.title: When Push Comes to Chub

choices: Delphine knows her wrestling and she proves it too by toppling you!
Your skills actually surprise Delphine (and yourself) and you pull of a  win!
114231111.content:
“Del- Del?” she struggles with the name before skipping to the last name. “Shuzumia-chan!” The crowd looks puzzled and a murmur of confused voices surge throughout the crowd. That was until Delphine Shuzumiya herself slowly skipped towards the stage. Delphine Shuzumiya; those innocent blue eyes, her unbelievably beautiful blonde hair neatly tucked into a ponytail, and that body! When it came to a girls figure were a lover of all shapes and sizes, a bi-sizual if you will, but Delphine sure made a case for girls with a slim hourglass figure. You give a *le* sigh just at the sight of the French girls face, forgetting that in a few moments you two would be wrestling.

“Delphine!” shouts Claire

"Delphine..." Muttered Rebbeca

“Delphine…” you say a goofy smile already starting to spread on your face.

“Oui-er-hai-er-Hi!” she says greeting you in French, then Japanese, then finally English.

“Uh, Delphine you’re uh, joining the sumo team too?” you ask. That's when you notice that Delphine seemed to the only girl here other than Claire that was wearing a custom made sumo outfit. It was a two-tone blue and white bodysuit, with one big red circle placed directly in the center, slightly warped by the large breasts that were stretching the fabric below it. The unique design seemed to represent both the French flag's colors while incorporating the rising sun of the flag of Japan.

Delphine seems to notice your glares and assumes it was because of the dashing design and not just because of the jaw dropping figure that it tried to contain. “ "Oh, you like? I have spent many years with my mother in Tokyo, and I have always been fascinated by the sumo wrestling there. Now I’ll finally be able to try it. Fantastique, non?” she asks tilting her head cutely to the side.

“No! I mean yes! I-mean...aren’t you a little…thin for sumo?” you ask one of the few women left in the school who you could actually get both arms around them ig you hugged.

“That is true, but, as I explained to Mrs. Touya – I mean sensei Touya, at the heart of it, sumo is not just size, it is in the skills, smarts, and technique of the wrestlers. She was so moved, she agreed I could practice, but has instructed me to indeed, how you say? Put on the pounds?”

Excitedly, Mrs. Touya began to chat with Delphine in Japanese, a language Delphine seemed to be expertly fluent in as she began to converse back. Just another surprising ability the breathtaking Delphine possessed. Mid-conversation Delphine pauses and bats an eye towards you, then nods at whatever Mrs. Toyua had just instructed her. “Se, Manfique!” she says clapping her hands together as their talk finishes. Was Mrs. Touya giving the lightweight girl tips before the match? Was that cheating, or was it just coaching? Well, it didn't matter too much to you. You were feeling quite confident, that you could at least take down, Delphine. You had to have had at least 50lbs on the heart-stoppingly beautiful waif of a woman.

Soon, Mrs. Touya had blown her whistle again and Delphine took her spot in the center ring. She looking quit comical as she stared you down posing in a hunkered into a fist down stance ready to charge, she looked about as intimidating as a slightly angry kitten. You had to smile, thankful that if you were wrestling anyone, it was one of the few girls in the school who actually weighed less than you. Okay It was time to make your sensei proud!

"C.J are you ready?"

"Yes"

"Shuzumiya-chan are you ready?"

"Oui-er-ha-" Delphine didn't have time to correct her linguistics as Mrs. Touya had blown her whistle signaling the start of the match.

Who comes out on top?
114231111.title: Delphine Shuzumiya what’s she doing here?...

choices: After practice
Skip to tonight
1142311112.content:
As soon as Mrs. Touya blew the whistle you and Delphine charged right at each other and the crowd and the other girls were cheering louder than any other match before (mainly because you were competing and got to see you with your shirt off). At first it was dead even, both of you trying to push the other to the opposite sides of the ring (while that was happening Delphine's breasts were sort of pressing against your chest). But then Delphine broke grip that you had one her and she started to use Harite technique (striking someone with the palms of your hands) on you and would not let up and what worst she was striking you towards the edge of the ring. You stood your ground near the edge and just as she was about to delivery the final strike a sudden burst of energy come over you.

You quickly dodged the strike and started using the Harite technique as well on the surprised french girl until the you two were back at the center of the ring. Then completely out of no where you grabbed one of Delphine's arms and used your right leg to sweep Delphine's right leg causing her to lose her balance and fall over winning you the match. Being a former sumo champion Mrs. Touya instantly recognized the move as the kekaeshi (minor inner foot sweep) and was surprised that you pulled it off effortlessly.

"Very amazing match." Mrs. Touya said while clapping her. "With a little more weight you two will make great additions to the team.

Then being a good sport you offered your hand to Delphine to which she accepted and the still surprised girl back one her feet.

"Oh mon dieu (oh my gosh in french) CJ I had know idea you had that kind of energy in you." Delphine said in an admiring voice.

"Neither did I." You stated.

Then the both of you return to the bleachers where the rest of the girls(except Rebecca who's still upset over her match) congratulated the two of you.

"Congrats on winning CJ." Kate said smiling.

"Thanks Kate." You replied.

"Way to go my big sumo of a man." Claire said while smothering you in her belly fat. "Now your little surprise just got a whole lot bigger."

"Care to fill me in on that Claire." You replied muffling through her fat.

"I will tonight." Claire stated as she let you go.
1142311112.title: The underdog wins the day

choices: The around the world buffet
11423111122.content:
After practice everyone headed home as Mrs. Touya would post the results tomorrow. Claire still didn't say anything about what your surprise was, all she said was she'd pick you up at 6:30 pm and to wear something decent. You asked your friends but Kate had no idea about what's going on and Rebecca was still depressed about today. So when you got back to your dorm room, you basically watched a little tv and finished some homework. When it came close to 6:30 you went to your closet and put on a pair of cargo pants and a green and white stripped t-shirt. Then you heard the sound of a limousine pulling up and knew that it was Claire.

"Well I'd better get going." You said while taking a quick glance at the mirror.

Then you locked the door and headed to the limo where the hefty maid driver opened the door and saw Claire. She was wearing a fancy purple dress(which was showing some cleavage) with watching shoes and earrings. She was dressed up like she was going to a movie premier in L.A.

"You look wonderful Claire." You said in amazement.

"Why thank you CJ." Claire replied in an alluring voice. "Hop in and lets get going."

Then you quickly got in, closed the door and the limo drove off. While inside Claire was sitting close to you and you felt a bit awkward.

"So what's the surprise?" You asked.

"Oh not much, just a dinner date at Shaunty's." Claire replied in a nonchalant tone. "Mint?"

"Sure." You said.

Unbeknownst to you the mint you just popped in your mouth was a special mint made by Abida which increases a person's appetite.

"Oh and don't worry about picking something out CJ I know just the thing to satisfy us both." Claire said smiling.

Pretty soon limo pulled up towards Shaunty's where the two of you got out and entered the restaurant. As soon as you entered one of the waitresses escorted the two of you to a large private booth where in almost no time at all another waitress appeared with a pen and paper.

"Welcome to Shaunty's where are slogan is high quality food for less my I take your order." The waitress stated.

You weren't sure of what you were going to have but you had a feeling Claire did and Claire was going to order...
11423111122.title: The dinner date

choices: The next day at sumo practice.
All the way to the tournament against Silverfish Academy.
114231111221.content:
“We shall be having the around the world buffet. Both of us.” announced Claire giggling in anticipation of the feast ahead. You were a bit taken aback, a trip to Shaunty’s was special enough, but the around the world buffet was the restaurants trademark dinner. The around the world buffet was exactly like a buffet table, but instead of sampling trays full of mass produced meals of meat and produce, every single offering on the lengthy table held the quality of a full course meal and these dishes and desserts were from all over the world!

“C’mon we're sitting somewhere special” Claire practically commands as she takes you by the hand. Along with the world spanning spread, Shaunty’s also featured a number of private luxury booths, said booths were tables surrounded by a velvet curtain that diners could close if they wanted their dinner to be a little more private and a lot more romantic. Sliding your way into the spacious and secluded booth, you’re only partly surprised as Claire scoots her caboose closer to you, ending up at arm’s length away from your, rather than sitting all the way across the wide table.

“Claire, are you gonna make me slide all the way around every time I get up to go to the buffet?” You ask a few moments after your drinks had been brought to you.

“Why, feeling hungry~?” Claire teases, taking this as a sign that the appetite enhancing mint had gone into effect.

“Yeah, in fact I'm starving! It’s just usually when you go to a buffet -“

“Please! Mother’s taken care of it. Having the buffet brought to you is the only way we Masters dine.” Claire explains in her proudest of tones.

As if on cue, an inconspicuous waiter popped in from outside the private booth, carrying a steaming hot plate of food. He was soon followed by two more, each of them carrying plates piled high with food. You spend a second marveling at the food now crowding the table, unsure of where to start first.

“Well? Dig in!” Claire says as she hands you an empty plate.

Having plate after plate brought to you seemed to go against the spirit of a buffet, usually you’d meander about a bit and get a little of this and a little of that, but tonight was different, you were eating with Claire tonight, and she made sure your servings were a lot of this and even more of that! Having the food brought to you certainly didn’t taint the quality of the food as everything was still delicious. The dinner began with a ‘greatest hits’ of sorts, with a set list that included the most popular foods of Shaunty’s; Bourbon Chicken, Shrimp Fired Rice, and a warm platter of Beef Stroganoff. The hard day of wrestling you had done earlier must have really worked up an appetite as you found yourself quickly eating up a storm. Claire seemed to have noticed this too as she paused from her own eating to reset a soft dimpled cheek on one of her equally soft hands. “How the pepper steak?” She asked positively glowing.

“Mmmph good!” you say, mouth still full of food.

“And I take it the bourbon chicken is good too?”

“Mmmph” you add cheeks full and nodding.

“Oh I’m so happy to hear it!” she says practically giddy at your gluttony. “It’s a good thing too. You need to eat more! Claire insists as she scoops more Chicken satay onto your plate. “You just eat until your little belly is full! If you want to grow up and be a future sumo star you can’t skip out on seconds and thirds. Especially consider our first meet is in a month.”

You suddenly gulp hard on a mouthful of French bread “A...month?”

“Yes, next month is the first if our three annual competitions with Silverfish academy. The wrestlers there are such mean girls! And, they’re big and strong too! So if you want to stand a chance you’d better eat up.” She adds sliding another plate towards you, one which you immediately began to work through. Claire sighed lovingly; truly she was at her happiest watching you stuff yourself as she herself enjoyed a feast fit for a queen. Not only would you become her super sized sumo hero, but as every woman of the Masters family knew, the stomach was the quickest way to a man’s heart and right now she was as close as she'd ever been.

Claire’s pep talk seemed to win you over, as you quickly discovered no matter how much your tummy filled and swelled and stuffed to its limit, it only increased your appetite. As the meal went on the food became more exotic. Italian Creamy Chicken Alfredo, hearty Irish Corn Beef and Cabbage, Indian Punjab! All of it went warm and smoothly down the hatch. It was only after some Turkish Baklava when your hyper-digestion began to deteriorate. A heavy haze now swirled about you, as your mind attempted to catch up with how much you had actually stomached. .

“So my big sumo? Up for some Italian Ice?" Her royal ‘wideness asks noticing how flushed your cheeks were getting.

“Claire, …*bruraap* … uncontrollably a deep burp escapes your stomach relieving just the tiniest bit of pressure from the science experiment of digestive foods currently going on. "I don’t think I can eat anymore.” You moan gently pushing away the plate. “I…hurrg…just wanna go home.”

“Oh of course! Of course...” Claire says consoling you matronly. She knew that the sooner you slept the sooner all those calories would go straight to yours sumo in training body. You really had been quite the little trooper, shoveling down all that food like a real champ. She was so proud!

You however were not so excited. Curdled in the fetal positional in the backseat of her limo, you begin to feel dizzier and dizzier with every turn the car made. You close your eyes and clench your teeth until the limousine finally stops outside your place.“Thanks Claire *hic* I…had a real good time.” you mumble crawling out of the car.

"Any time my little-er big hunk"Claire says leaning in and quickly planting a wet kiss on your cheek. You're so full you don't even bother wiping the kiss of, and instead merely wave as the limo takes off.

Drowsily you stumble your way inside with your guts splashing about inside you as you finally limp into your bed. Crawling under the blankets you hoped that being a sumo in training wouldn’t always be this…painful. Soon enough the warm lull of food settling in your stomach slowly brings you to a peaceful sleep...

Cut to:
