“Argh, this sumo belt is starting to feel tight and I’ve only worn it once.” You said while looking at yourself in the mirror. “Did I really eat that much last night?”

“*Knock* *Knock* Hurry up CJ or the coach is going to have you do push-ups.” Rebecca said while knocking on the locker room door.

“I’ll be out in a second.” You replied.

Once you got the sumo belt issue dealt with you exited the boys(or boy rather) locker where you see Rebecca waiting outside the door and looking in a better mood than she was yesterday.

“You seem to be doing better.” You stated.

“Yeah, I just have to train harder to so I can kick that pampered princess’s butt.” Rebecca replied with confidence. “So…how was your date with Claire last night.”

“Um….we better get to the rest of the team it looks like the coach is going to give us a speech.” You replied avoiding the subject.

So the two of you walk over to where the rest of the team are gather in gym and noticed that there aren’t as many girls as there was yesterday. There were approximately 32 people (including you) at tryouts and today there’re only 16 people now but you did notice that Kate, Claire, Delphine where hear and even Suzuka was sticking around.

“Did the rest of the girls how tried out do that bad?” You asked Suzuka.

“My mom’s very picky on who she thinks is sumo material.” Susuka replied. “Besides that maximum number of people that each school can have on a sumo team is 16.”

Speaking of the devil herself the Mrs. Touya comes out of her office and the team quickly gets in line not wanting to get yelled at or having to do push-ups.

“Alright listen up everyone; we have about a month until our first sumo match against Silverfish Academy.” Mrs. Touya stated. “During that time I’m whip you pudgy marshmallows into big, mean sumo wrestling machines.” “Now some you of have already shown great potential during the tryouts (looking at Rebecca and Claire), some of made it by the skin of your teeth (looking at Kate and her daughter) while others show talent but lack the necessary weight to make it (looking at you and Delphine).” “ So from now until the tournament I’m putting you all an a chanko diet which all sumo wrestlers back home use to bulk up with and your portions will increase bit by bit each day.”

“What’s chanko?” You thought to yourself. “Meh I’ll look it up on the internet later.”

“Alright so today will be practicing the harite(palm thrust) technique on these dummies.” Mrs. Touya said. ”There are eight practice dummies so I’ll split you into eight groups of two, one person will hold the dummy in place while the other practices their thrusts.” “So Dalton you’ll be with Granden, Masters with Shuzumiya, Maglen with Lanchaster, Touya and Parks, Shineston and Bradford, Simmons with Nelson, Rivera and Hillston, and finally Ross with Summerfield.” “Let’s get moving.”

So the groups went to the dummies and started to practice. Kate volunteered to hold the dummy so you could go first but Kate had a worried look on her face like something was bugging her.

“Something on your mind Kate?” You asked while practicing your thrusts.

“No, not really it’s just that the coach looked at me when she said some of the students barely made it on to the team.” Kate replied. “I don’t really blame her since my match was kind of pathetic and the only reason I won was because of pure luck.”

“So you practice harder so you can into the swing of things.” You stated with confidence. “At least you don’t have to be 300lbs by the end of the month.”

Meanwhile on the other side of the gym Claire was holding the dummy for Delphine since she insisted on going first.

“Be sure to hold the dummy nice and steady mademoiselle Claire.” Delphine asked.

“Yeah, whatever frenchy just make you don’t get sent flying across the gym once it’s my turn.” Claire replied while looking in the direction you were at.

Claire was obviously disappointed that she didn’t get partnered with you but there were plenty of opportunities in the future for that. What was really on her mind was that the dinner last night didn’t put much weight on you as she hoped. She asked Abida calculate your weight after that pig-out and your just above 200 lbs. But she needs to get you up to 300 so you can stay on the team. Even with the sumo diet Claire was worried that you wouldn’t reach the goal in time. So once practice was over Claire decided to ask someone for help in order speed up your weight gain. Who was she going to ask?

11423111122112.content:
After a rather long practice Claire quickly got dressed, exited the girls locker room and went to her mother's office. Once she got there she noticed that her mom's door was closed (either she was in a meeting or she was pigging out with Ms. Telleri) and Abida was was doing some paperwork.

"Abida I need your help with something." Claire stated.

"What is it young mistress?" Abida asked.

"I need something that fatten up CJ over a period of time so he can stay on the sumo team." Claire replied.

"Come with me." Abida said while grabbing Claire's pudgy hand.

Abid dragged Claire to an area that was a few minutes away from her mother's office and realized that this was Abida's workshop. If there were two things that Claire learned about Abida's property it was don't enter her bedroom back at the mansion without her permission (because the last she went in there alone she wound up with green hair for a month). But most importantly don't enter her workshop...at all, it was of the few places that Claire kept her nose out of because who know what goes on in there.

"Wait here." Abida ordered.

So after ten minutes of waiting Abida comes out with a small bottle of liquid and an eyedropper that goes with it. The liquid inside is as clear as water but Claire couldn't make any of the words on the bottle.

"What is this?" Claire asked curiously.

"Secret chinese medicine." Abida stated. "This flavorless, odorless liquid when mixed with water will caused the drinker to slowly swell up over time." "All you need to do is go behind the dorms where the drinking water supply is put in CJ's water and he'll become the largest sumo the world has ever know."

Claire's eyes when she heard her mother's assistant told her (not to mention that was the longest time Abida talked outside of her short one sentences) and couldn't believe that such a medicine exists.

"However, I must warn you that this stuff is very potent." Abida stated. "Only put of a few drops in it if you don't want your beloved CJ to become an immobile blimp."

Later that evening Claire snuck into the dorm's water supply as instructed and looked for the pipe that had your name on it. She easily found it right next to Rebecca's. She opened the small hatch and got the medicine out of her pocket.

"Let's see how much should I put in?" Claire pondered. "I know two drops should do it."

So Claire took the eyedropper, squeezed a little of the liquid into the dropper and put two drops of it in your water.

"CJ your about to become the man of my dreams." Claire said to herself.

It was there that she noticed Delphine's water pipe and thought about today's practice and how she barely kept the dummy still when she was practicing.

"Can't let frenchy weigh down the team." Claire stated as she put a drop of the medicine into her water. "I know you'll thank me for this later."

*Switching over to you*

As you were watching TV with nothing better to do you here a knock at your door.

"Who is it." You asked.

"Its me..." the voice said

1142311112211211.content:
"Mmm..Let's practice now. I really don't like to work on a nice full stomach" decided Kate as she released you from her uncannily large valley of boob flesh.

"Okay then." you say happy to be able to breathe again. "Get your miwashi on and meet me at the sumo practice room." So, after one more breath squeezing hug, Kate waddled out of your room. The two of you then squeezed into your wrestling attire before finally reaching the soft mat padded sumo practice room. Getting into stance on one end of the practice ring, you noticed something odd about your opponent on the opposite end.

"Kate, don't you want to take your glasses off?"

"...But I can't see without them" explained the nearsighted girl sheepishly. "I mean we're just practicing right?"

"Hey if you want to train, you have to train for real. Plus, I really don't want to break your glasses."

"Alright..." bemoaned Kate, filling away getting contacts onto her mental to-do list. As she set them aside she was slightly dazed, quite unused to her un-equilibriated eyesight. Slowly stumbling to her spot in the ring, Kate hunched into position while squinting. At the sight you almost burst out laughing, hunched over and squinting like this Kate looked like a defenseless bunny. This was also going to make wrestling with Kate quite the problem. When you wrestled with Delphine, it had been different, she had been the aggressive one, but somehow during the match something inside of you had just 'clicked' as you were forced to defend yourself. Even if attacking Kate like this felt mean, maybe you could try something to spark her to start fighting back....

"Listen Kate, I'm gonna try and push you over. I just want you to try and stop me okay?" you explain cautiously to the ever so kind Kate. "Don't worry about hurting me, just push back with everything you've got!"

"Are you sure?" asked Kate still squinting as she was squatting.

"Sure, just put your hands out and stop me, without falling over."

"C.J I don't think-"

"Here I come!" you shout speeding at her. You watch as Kate immediate flinches and moved her hands to cover her face. You how ever make contact, pressing your shoulder deep into her chest. You begin to try and move your hands around Kate's wide stomach to get a better grip on your opponent but you only get your arms partway around her. Disappointingly Kate is showing zero resistance to your attack, but what was even worse was that you were still struggling to push her over! Sure you could sweep the leg and possibly take her out, or even give her an open hand slap to the chest to possible take her down, but the whole point of this extra training was to get Kate comfortable with wrestling if she wasn't fighting back with you then she definitely wasn't going to be ready against a bigger,stronger, and less friendly opponent. So, tightening your grip on her wide and jiggly waist and using your legs (which had grown strong from weeks of escaping from your fan club) you push against all of Kate's weight and finally overpower her. You could feel her as she toppled over, her butt tumbling backwards and hitting the padded floor with a resounding smack, which then was followed by you landing smack on top of her, her ginormous grape-fruit like boobs serving as the ultimate airbags.

"Kate you've got to push back!" you explain, (only after taking your sweet sweet time getting up from the compromising position.)

"Sorry..." said Kate, still lying flat on her back and looking like an overturned and overstuffed turtle plushie.

"Okay, change of plans. Why don't you try to attack me? Just come at me and I'll try to stop you.

"Ummm...if you say so..." Kate said dourly getting up from the floor. This time Kate started with some distance in between the two of you.

"Ready...Go!" you shout hoping to spur her fighting spirit. Kate took off charging at you as fast as she could. The sight of a squinting 250+ teenage beauty charging at you was not a sight you got to see every day and you simply had to laugh as she charged you wildly. It certainly didn't help Kate that she was so...bouncy, even with a tight miwashi on, her bra-less boobies had a delicious wild bounce to them while she was sprinting, maybe if she taped them up... Your face glows red and you begin to get lost in your thoughts forgetting that the wall of flesh in front of you was still aiming to bowl you over.

BAM!

The two of you collide and this time it was you who wasn't fighting back. As Kate's corpulence falls upon you, the two of you collapse into a squirming, sweaty, giggling heap. Still on top of you, Kate is wide eyed wondering what you thought of her performance. "How'd I do?" she asks looking at you for approval.

"...ugh. Good, very...huh...good." you manage to eek out between breaths. "Now, help me up please." you gasp your face now really getting red.

"Oops, sure." she said extending you a hand. "Want to go again?" she asks as you slowly catch your breath.

"No...uh...it's alright. Next time...I want to see you wrestle like that." you say gasping (and checking your body for any injuries.) "Come on let's go eat."

***


Back at your room you begin using the tainted tap water to brew a beefy chanko broth. The hot water came together with a mix of vegetables and meat, soon the stew started to smell real good. Over two very large bowls of chanko, you and Kate began making conversation once more.


"So, we can always practice more later okay?" you say finishing the fattening food.

"Okay, and I'll work on getting those contacts too I promise." Kate says stomach filled with the delicious dinned.


***


The next day at Sumo club, Ms. Touya had everyone pair up.

"Alright we'll be doing practice matches today. Now, don't worry no ones getting kicked off the team if they lose, just give it your all, and make sure you pay attention during every match." Ms. Touya had read off a list of names once more and soon it was just four of you; Rebbecca, Claire, Delphine and yourself. Waddling over to your group she explains what she had planned for you.

"C.J. Shuzumia-chan. I want you both to try and wrestle outside your weight class today. Delphine I'll let you pick you're opponent first."

You weren't exactly thrilled by either of the options in front of you.

Rebbecca was heavy and strong. Sure she had lost to Claire, but it was only due to Claire's immense heaviness (something you still currently working on.) And even with your great ability, Rebbecca was definitely the competitive type and probably could have her way with you if you got in the ring with her.

Meanwhile Claire was even heavier and just plain big. If you were only just able to take Kate down, how well could you possibly do if you went up against Claire?

As the opening moments of the match lingered on, you began to feel lost. You were as of yet unable to summon the 'sumo instinct' you had shown against Delphine. Not to mention Claire (whose muscles were by no mean "strong") was still certainly heavy enough to have her way with you the entire match.

As of right now she'd slung her warm fat laden arms around you, crunching you into the tightest of bear hugs. Ms. Touya looked on a bit puzzled, the move wasn't exactly illegal in sumo, but was certainly rarely seen.

Uselessly your arms struggled against Claire, pushing against her insurmountable weight. Tighter and tighter she snuggled your face in close against her, letting her hands explore your bare back. Now blinded by her boobies, you reached for something anything to push out against and push away from this death lock of a hug. Reaching,flailing, when suddenly....What was this soft, yet spongy, it was...you'd just grabbed...

"Oooh!" Claire shrieked sound more surprised then offended. You had just given Claire and inadvertent 'titty twister'. Her hands flung up into the air in wild surprise as a shocked and embarrassed cover your red face. Fortunately she'd dropped you and you'd landed on your feet, the match was still on, you had finally gotten some fresh air into your lungs, and there was still a chance you could win.

"I love it when you play naughty..." said Claire regaining her low centered balance and ready for another attack.

Wrestling instincts taking over once more, you realized that the best plan of attack was to sweep Claire's load bearing legs, perhaps the girls only weak point.You charged at her lowering yourself for the sneaky attack. Unfortunately for you there's a bit too much distance between you and Claire and she sees the attack coming. Slowly sidestepping, she turns and gives you a playful slap on your keester. "I can be naughty too..." she taunts clearly enjoying every minute of the match.

Remembering that this WAS an actual match Claire decided to at least make sure you looked good enough to stay on the team. So when you came back to give her an open palm slap, she over-exaggeratedly flailed backwards as if she'd been shot. "Oof!" she moaned tottering a bit before righting herself. Soon you were locking arms around her waist once more. Claire enjoying the wriggling sensation as you pseudo-massaged her ginormous gut. But clearly the time to end the match was now.

Claire gave a shake and then suddenly was slowly falling on top of you letting you hit the mat first and loosing the match. Bam! Well more like..SMOOSH! All 300+ belly-centric pounds of the blonde brit topple upon you, covering you in ever pound of her pudge. Claire gets up a few second later, again savoring the sensation of you squashed beneath her.

"Very...good" says Mrs. Touya after a short puzzled pause. "Claire is clearly the winner." Claire raises her hands in victory to a round of applause from the crowd. Then offering you a hand up asks. "You okay darling?"

"Yeah Claire..."you wheeze standing up. "Maybe a few broken bones but I'm fine.." you mutter walking back to your seat. With another wink and a blown kiss from Claire you return to your sport next to Kate ready to watch rather than participate in the next match.

Who Wins?

1142312.content:
“CJ Dalton!”

You. You're up.

As you mount the stairs to the stage you have mixed feelings about going up against Claire. Yes, pushing your body against hers would be... interesting, but this is supposed to be a competition. Not going to be that easy when you're combating your own hormones and Claire at the same time.

Best case scenario: you push her out of the ring quickly, before you have a chance to get too aroused. Against a smaller opponent you might try to throw them off their feet, but Claire is like a boulder of flesh. Rolling her is the only option.

You get to the circle and take your place, copying the footstomp routine you've seen before and hoping you're not accidentally disrespecting sumo tradition.

Sensei Touya takes her place between you and Claire, asking if you were each ready. After a pair of affirmatives she raises a hand, then throws it down.

“Begin!”

The two of you charge at one another, you a bit faster and more aggressive than her, and with an audible 'slap!' your potbelly smashes against Claire's washtub. You tense your legs and begin pushing, your arms trying to find a good grip on Claire's thick middle. For her part Claire plants her feet and resists, but it takes several seconds for you to realize she's not pushing back, not trying to throw you off your feet.

“Mmmmmmmmm, CJ.” You turn your head to get a look at her face. Her eyes are closed, she's blushing, and you see the widest, sloppiest grin. She throws her own arms around you and pulls you closer, one hand reaching down to grip your butt in a move you are sure is not part of some strategy relating to the contest.

You try pushing with your legs, but all you do is press harder against Claire. A full minute passes, the cheers of the audience dying down as the only thing that happens is the spreading realization that Claire isn't trying to win but rather using the 'match' as a chance to get closer to you than any other girl has before.

The mood in the audience is turning against Claire, but Sensei Touya was getting frustrated for a different reason:

“Masters!” She snaps. “If you won't take this seriously I'm cutting you from the team.”

All at once Claire gets serious, heaving you up and throwing you around so suddenly you don't react until you're pinned to the ground beneath the gargantuan girl.

“Well done, Masters,” Sensei Touya says, before adding “Though you could have won a lot sooner if you'd tried.”

Pause.

“You can get off him now.”

“Oh? Sorry.” Claire chuckles, waiting another beat before rolling off you. You take a deep breath of air, then struggle to your feet.

“Do you see why I told you to bulk up, Dalton? If you were heavier you wouldn't have been tossed around like a ragdoll.”

“Yes, sensei.”

“You don't have to worry about CJ getting in shape,” Claire says, throwing an arm around you and squeezing you tight. “I'll make it my personal mission to get him bigger.”

Claire doesn't let go of you for the rest of the practice, to Rebecca's consternation, and after you've changed back into your school clothes and are heading home for the day she's outside the locker room waiting for you.

“CJ!” she's grabbed an arm and is pulling you towards her waiting limo, “We need to get started right away if we're going to get you looking like a true sumo.” She pats your potbelly for emphasis, clearly imagining it swelling and getting rounder.

You give token resistance as you're pulled into the limo, more habit than anything; there's truth to her words, bulking up would require time and effort, so no time like the present.

“I've already called ahead to have my servants prepare a calorie-laden feast for you, and I promise you're not leaving until you've eaten every bite.” She's leaning on you now, getting comfortable, as the two of you sit back and feel the limo pull away from the school. “With my help, you'll be the biggest, strongest sumo in the ring.”

“Sounds like a plan,” a voice says from across the seating area. You and Claire look up to see
1142312.title: YOU vs. Claire!

Rebecca was sitting across from you and Claire, leaning back in the plush seats and looking very relaxed in contrast to her flagrant intrusion.

“What are you doing here?” Claire asked, her jubilant mood turning sour. Translation: I don't care why you're in my limo, but how dare you intrude on my private time with CJ?

“I'm doing my part to help the sumo team,” Rebecca answered, spreading her arms on the back of the seats and kicking her feet up. Translation: I'm making sure you don't get any alone time with my... friend.

“What do you mean?” Translation: What do you mean?

“I heard what the sensei said to CJ. He's got a start on strength, but he needs size to back it up. And while I wouldn't want to question your ability to pack on the pounds, I'm worried CJ won't reach his true potential with you hovering around him, always making him nervous. He needs to know he has the support of everyone on the team.” Translation: As if I'm going to sit back and let you manufacture your own daily binge sessions with CJ. Someone needs to keep you in line, princess.

“And perhaps you were hoping I could help you get to a respectable size at the same time? You don't have to be ashamed to admit it, not everyone has the gift for the sport that I do.” Translation: You forget your place. A backhanded compliment about my size only reinforces my natural talent and destiny to be the team's star (after CJ, of course), while also allowing me to remind you that you're not enough woman for CJ and your efforts in the club will be woefully lacking.

“Having a few more pounds might help, I suppose, though my natural athleticism shouldn't be ignored.” Translation: You're just a spoiled fatass who's too heavy to be moved. Just wait until you're in the ring with me. It'll be a treat to humiliate you at your own game.

The smiles on Claire and Rebecca's faces were hollow, their eyes speaking the truth to the venomous rancor infused in every exchanged word. It's so clear you can't fail to notice it, and as Claire's grip on you tightens you waffle between staying silent or jumping in and attempting to defuse the tension.

Perhaps a change of subject is needed.

“So, Claire. What's this special meal you promised me?”

“Yes, Claire. I'm interested in hearing about this.” Rebecca says.

“Why waste words,” Claire says,
11423121.title: Rebecca, inviting herself along to make sure Cl...

choices: You hear Claire sneaking into your room.
There's a knock at your door. It's Rebecca.
It's sunset. You've slept the afternoon away and it's dinnertime.
114231212.content:
“Why waste words when you can see for yourself?”

The limo was slowing down, pulling up in front of Masters Manor. An attendant opened the door for Claire, and you and Rebecca follow her into the mansion.

“Welcome home, Miss Masters,” various butlers and maids call out as Claire waddles in through the grand front doors.

“Is the meal ready as I instructed, Emily?” Claire asks a portly maid roughly her age.

“Yes, miss. And will your other friend be dining as well?”

“I suppose.” Claire says, putting an arm around you and leading you to the dining room. “She can use a proper meal, after all.”

Rebecca, who had been gaping at the sheer size of the mansion, now remembered Claire's presence and got irked.

“Oh, how generous of you,” she said sarcastically. Picking up her pace, she comes up alongside you, squeezing you between her oversized hip and Claire's oversized everything.

Inside the banquet hall (Rebecca failing to hide how impressed she was) the table had been set with a giant pasta feast. Bunnie, the school chef, was bringing in a couple last dishes.

“Ta dah!” Claire said theatrically, as if she had prepared the food herself.

“It's pasta.” You say, feeling underwhelmed after the build-up.

“High in carbohydrates, drowning in heavy sauces, an excellent source of quick poundage.” Claire said.

The three of you took your seats, you ending up hemmed in between the two girls. Bunnie had gone all out, which was doubly impressive given the short notice she was given to prepare all this.

“Bunnie, you have outdone yourself,” Claire said, scooping a plate of linguine alfredo.

“It all looks so good, I don't know where to start. But that's always a problem with your cooking.” Rebecca added.

You don't say anything, you just start getting some food (it was as delicious as it looked) for yourself while enjoying the respite from Claire and Rebecca's snarking at one another.

It doesn't last, though. After a couple courses Rebecca starts to slow down; she's reaching her limit, but she won't just concede so quickly. Claire, focused on her own food, doesn't notice it at first, but soon the porky princess reaches the point where she feels she can slow down and turn her attention toward you.

You're still eating heartily; you're sated, but the point of this is to get as much food into you as you can, so you keep eating.

“CJ, you have to try the ravioli.” Claire scoops some more food onto your plate, then notices Rebecca's languid chewing. “Did you enjoy your meal, Rebecca?”

“Don't talk like I'm already finished,” she answers, her irritation coming back to her. And with new resolve she took another massive bite of spaghetti, chewing forcefully.

Another period of silence, Rebecca's pace slowing down a little until she was nearing a clean plate; and then the promise of reaching an endpoint gave her the last necessary boost.

After the last bite she leaned back, content and fighting the urge to pull her shirt up over her belly in front of you.

“CJ, dear, could you pass the angel hair in pesto? I've still got so much room.” Claire said, her tone sweet but devious and her words being carried past you to their intended target.

Grumbling to herself, Rebecca reached out to add more food to her plate. The battle was already lost – as Claire loaded a new plate she continued eating without trouble, while Rebecca struggled to chew a single bite – but the pear-shaped girl would only concede defeat when forced to.

For your part you had cleaned four plates (and the plates at the Masters house were large, much larger than regular dinner plates) piled high with food, but you were reaching your own end point. Claire didn't notice, though, as she was looking through you at Rebecca. Rebecca's belly was swollen big and round, pain was clear on her face. The plate in front of her was still nearly full.

“I hope I'm not being presumptuous again,” Claire said, “but I don't think you can eat any more. It would be a waste to throw it all up before you can digest it.”

And then she wrapped her lips around a couple ravioli and continued eating with the same vigor as when she started, tipping her plate right to her mouth to shovel the food in faster.

But Rebecca's anger vanished immediately, for an idea had come to her.

“CJ? Could you rub my belly?”

She turned her chair around so she could face you, leaning back and lifting her shirt up. Not all the way, but just a peek. And here, a peek was a lot. Leaning back, her belly loomed in front her and looked even bigger than it was. And with a sliver of flesh winking at you? It wasn't easy to resist reaching out and stroking that big ball of fat.

And why resist it? She was asking you to!

Your hand was headed to her belly, but Claire spoke up.

“CJ needs to concentrate on eating. That's why we're here.”

She hadn't turned from her own food, but apparently her interest in you trumped even her interest in food and some sixth sense alerted her to what was going on.

“He can do both,” Rebecca said, “Eat with one hand and rub my belly with the other.”

Claire almost bit down on her tongue, but she didn't have a response to that. So as you switched your fork to your other hand she could only glare straight ahead and keep eating.

“Oooooooh, CJ. That feels soooooo good.” Rebecca moaned.

Claire had no more tricks up her sleeve, and tried to bury her frustration with food. If it were possible she was eating faster now, and by the time you hit the point of pain she was finishing her own gorge as well.

“BWARP! Oh, excuse me,” Claire said, putting her plate down and patting her belly. She was leaning back herself, but it was hard to tell since her belly was so big naturally. “Now the second part: a nap!”

“What?” Rebecca said.

“After a big meal you're supposed to take a nap and digest everything you eat.” Claire explained. “It's what sumos in training to do put on weight. Actually, they skip breakfast, eat a big lunch and then take a nap, but I think there's a fundamental flaw in that strategy. Namely, you're not eating at any opportunity. But a nice nap to follow a big meal is just a good idea.

“I already have a room ready for you, CJ,” and then, in a resigned tone, “And I guess you can take one of the guest rooms, Rebecca.”

Claire led you to your room, since it was 'right next to mine!' she said enthusiastically, while one of the maids showed Rebecca to a guest room. After turning down Claire's offer to share her bed ('It's quite large and really comfortable,' she argued) you shut the door and went to lay down.

It was a relief to get away from Claire and Rebecca. Even when they were silent there was a tension in the air just from their close proximity. Kicking your shoes off, you fell backwards onto the bed. Your belly was stuffed, sticking up into the air; even with a year of indulging at Chubbeso you couldn't remember the last time you had gone all out like this, and right now you didn't think you ever could again.

You shut your eyes and waited for sleep to take you, but before you knew it
114231212.title: “When you can see for yourself?” And they a...

choices: Let Claire be your gaining coach, come what may
Tell Claire you'll gain weight on your own
1142312121.content:
Your thoughts drifted in and out of lucidity, the still air of the room and the burden of food in your belly taking you to the line separating consciousness from sleep even as your conscious mind was still active and nimble. You thought of nothing in particular, unable to calm down and let sleep take you. The curtains were pulled and the room was dark, creating a sense of void; you had lost your sense of time or even where you were. What time was it? How long had you been lying there, trying to sleep?

The room was warm, light was peeking through the curtains, it was afternoon. You were drowsy. You got it in your head you were at your apartment, it was morning, and did you have school today? Then you realized no, you'd already gone to school.

A noise, the door opening. You turn over and look blearily, see the door is closed. Then you hear something to your side. There's a door in the wall, Claire is coming in.

Oh, right. You were at her house, taking a nap in the room next to hers. And it seems the rooms were connected.

Claire was attempting to walk lightly, but at her size stealth was not for her. You prop yourself on an elbow.

“Claire?”

“Oh!” Startled. “Thought you were still asleep.”

“Haven't had time to fall asleep yet. Wait.” You notice a clock on the wall. It's almost 4:30. “Guess I did. But why were you sneaking into m- this room?” You almost said 'my room,' but you're sure a slip like that wouldn't be missed by Claire. Give her the chance and all of your things would be moved into the bedroom next to hers before the day was done.

“I was just bringing a little snack,” and you see she's carrying a giant plate of brownies. You should be sick of food, but as the smell reaches you you decide you do have room.

“Thanks.” You sit up and take one, Claire inviting herself to sit down next to you. “I don't have much room, but I guess I can have one. You can take the rest.”

“Oh, that will never do. You gotta have more than one if you're going to follow Sensei Touya's command to get in shape.” Claire said, sitting up straight and becoming a bit authoritative. “I can see you need a true glutton's guiding hand if you want to get anywhere. Here's the rule: for every one I eat, you eat one.”

“Yes ma'am.” You say, sarcastically saluting her.

Claire picked up a brownie and practically inhaled it. Getting into her game, you hurry to finish the one you had taken a bite out of. While you were chewing the last bite, Claire picked up a second one, wolfing it down before you had even started a second one.

And so it went, Claire racing through a new brownie every time you were almost finished with one. The first couple went down easily, but soon you were feeling a fullness in your belly again. Claire either didn't know or didn't care, for she kept grabbing a new brownie and silently pushed you on to continue your own binge.

There were still the better part of a dozen brownies left when you started to have trouble breathing. You were getting full again, rapidly approaching the point of actual pain. But Claire had never left food on her plate before in her life, and she wasn't about to let you do so now.

“It might help you to loosen your pants,” Claire said. Figuring it was dark enough in the room with the curtains still drawn that it wouldn't be unseemly (or rather, that Claire wouldn't get too excited), you undid the button on your trousers and let your belly breathe.

It wasn't complete relief, but it was something. Enough to help carry you through the last few brownies (Claire grabbed the last one for herself, her willpower around food strained to the limit by giving up half the plate), though when it's done you have to fall back and lie down, your belly poking straight up into the air again.

“Not bad,” Claire said, reaching over to stroke your belly. In your state you weren't fit to fight her, and besides it felt good. “But we still have leagues to go. A little snack like that wouldn't suit me as a dessert after a proper meal, but here it's left you winded and almost at the point of getting sick. We've got our work cut out for us, don't we?”

“Who's this 'we,' Claire?” You wheeze.

“You and I. I told Sensei Touya I was going to make fattening you up my job, didn't I? Or do you think you can get to 300 on your own?”

You shut your eyes, hoping for a fleeting second that if you don't answer Claire will forget about the whole thing.

Of course that won't happen. A directive from a teacher that you gain weight? If you didn't know better you'd suspect Claire of being behind this, probably using her mother's influence to get Sensei Touya to tell you to gain weight. This had to be a dream come true for her, no way was she just going to drop the matter. Even if you told her you'd gain weight on your own (and how well do you think you would manage by yourself?) she'd try to find some way to play an active role in it.

But if you asked her to help you, how far would she run with this? What plans did she have for fattening you up? They would be effective, no doubt about that, but 'restraint' was not a word that came to mind when you saw Claire. You only needed to get to 300 pounds, not 500 or 600.

So which would it be: the efficient and risky path, or the reserved but perhaps unsuccessful one?
1142312121.title: You hear Claire sneaking into your room.

choices: Skip to dinnertime
Rebecca comes in (and the drama follows)
11423121211.content:
After a few minutes of thought, you figured either way Claire would find a way to get herself involved with your training so you gave her you answer.

“Alright Claire you can help me with training.” You said while giving a sigh.

Right after you said that, Claire’s face instantly lit up like a light bulb and you couldn’t help but predict what was coming next.

“Oh, thank you CJ you’re not going regret this decision.” Claire said while giving you a giant bear hug.

“Just promise me you won’t go overboard with the weight gain training.” You muffled through her arm fat.

“Alright I promise.” Claire said in slight joking tone while loosening her grip. “Anyway we can get started on your training tonight at dinnertime.”

“I guess I could stay for dinner since I don’t really have anything going on tonight and I got all of my homework done during free period.” You replied. “But you do know that Rebecca will probably stay for dinner as well right?”

“Yes, I am aware of that.” Claire replied in a slightly annoyed voice. “I guess she can stay as well, as long as she doesn’t interfere with your training or get on my nerves.”

After that Claire stopped hugging you and started to assume a different position. Claire began to shift one of her thick legs over your own and you felt her vast gut envelop your own body. Then Claire rests her enormous cleavage on your shoulders and you feel like she’s trying to hug the daylights out of you.

“Claire what are you doing.” You ask while your visions slowly shrinks.

“We still have plenty of time before dinnertime and I’m too full to move I figure I’ll take my nap here with you.” Claire replied with a hint of lust in her tone. “Hope you don’t mind that I use you as a body pillow.”

You then realize that it is going to be a long night.
11423121211.title: Let Claire be your gaining coach, come what may

1143.content:
As you, Rebecca and Kate roamed the halls (you in front of the two large girls so you wouldn’t get crushed if more girls roamed the hallway – Besides, it was a good way to make sure that your fan club couldn’t sneak up on you) towards the announcement board – Since that’s where most of the clubs that needed members usually advertised their clubs.

“So, w-w-what club d-do you think we should join?” Kate asked, her uniform getting a bit soaked from the sweet and walking she was doing.

“I dunno,” You replied, throwing your arms behind your head as you continued to walk down the hallways. Truth be told you weren’t really interested in clubs before, but heck, if you joined the right club, you might even be able to make some new friends and maybe even lose the fat that was accumulating on your body (and actually make you trim enough to escape your fan club without losing your breath). “What about you Rebecca? You got any clubs you got your eye on?”

“Hmm, well, I heard the swim team’s in need of some members,” Rebecca pointed out, placing her hands on her meaty hips, not noticing that that you just broke out in a cold sweat. “Heck, I hear that there’s only one member on the team and that’s the captain. Besides, with the warm weather starting to set in, it’d be perfect to just relax in a cool pool after school.”

“A-And its g-good exercise t-too!” Kate added, her face lighting up at the prospect of slimming down with the swim team.

That’s right, you never did tell Rebecca and Kate about what had happened between you and the swim team captain Chris – About how you accidentally, again ACCIDENTALLY, ran into her one morning and saw under her skirt (plus, there were other reasons, but it’d probably take about thirty pages to describe them all, so please bear with it). Even before that, the girl didn’t seem to like you at all either…

“CJ Dalton!”

You blink in surprise at the sudden calling of your name and immediately look back to see Rebecca and Kate just as surprised as you are. If the call didn’t come from behind, then you slowly look forward, thinking that the worst you could see was a group of your fan girls coming to abduct you and force you into their club based on you…

… However, when you turned around, you were now facing what appeared to be a large pair of sweater puppies that struggled to be contained in the school’s girl uniform top. A little surprised, you stagger back slightly to see that those huge knockers (which were on par with Claire’s!) belong to a rather interesting looking girl. She was quite a bit taller than you (at least half a head taller, so you had to look up and past her swollen mammary to look her in those oddly purple colored eyes of hers) and had a very over the top hourglass figure that had the tiny markings of a slightly swollen middle. Her skirt was up a little higher than most girls, but that that was obviously due to the large thighs and buns she sported on her body. Her face was a little chubby, but still really cute and was topped with long black hair (with dark purple highlights) that flowed past her shoulders and most likely reached to the hams that were her backside. The girl had her arms folded under her impressive bust and smiled at you, “Of course you’re CJ Dalton, correct? You are the only guy in this entire school of course…”

Your face was a little flushed, but you nodded in response to the curvy young woman before you.

“Good to know,” The curvy student replied as she sauntered a little closer to you, making your face turn a little bit redder. “Allow me to introduce myself, I am Suzuka Touya, the…”

“You’re the captain of the Kendo Team, right?” Rebecca questioned, making Suzuka blink her large eyes a few times in surprise.

“Ah, so you’ve heard of me,” Suzu stated with a warm smile. “And you know my title, that’ll save a lot of time then. So, I’ll get right to the point, CJ-kun…”

You gulp when Suzu added that little honorific to your name, from the girl’s name and accent, she was obviously Japanese, a rather exotic treat to this academy…

“As captain of the kendo team/club,” Suzu continued, immediately lifting one of her hands up to her face to brush out some hair away from her eyes. “I would like to extend an invitation to you and your two charming little friends here…”

‘Little?’ You thought to yourself.

“To join our fine group,” Suzu offered with a warm smile on her face.

“W-Wait, what?” You questioned as Suzu turned around, giving you a good look at the meaty legs and bubble butt the girl had.

“I don’t like repeating myself,” Suzu replied as she sauntered off slowly, swaying her hips. “But, if you and your friends wish to join the Kendo club, my offer still stands, and trust me… It’s a good offer…”

And just like that, with her making your heart beat like a fast paced engine and your face bright red, Suzu began to disappear into the halls…

… Now what were you going to do?
1143.title: An Issued Invitation

"I'm going to join." You announce to Kate and Rebecca. It seemed to you that it would be the most masculine club in a school for girls and you wouldn't have to worry about being forced into a womans one piece or a frilly apron like some of the other clubs you were considering.

You walk on down to the club room before your friends could try to change your mind, not looking to see if they were following or not. You arrive at a part of the academy you had never been to before. There was a sound proof door marked "kendo club." You wonder how Suzu managed to secure a largely unused part of the school for her club. That was the type of power that only Claire Masters the principle’s daughter and nicknamed princess seemed to wield. You attempt to open the door casually but it seems almost sealed shut. You tug and tug as hard as you can upon the door but to no avail. Your chubby arms shake and jiggle where you once remember only steely muscle was before you came to this school. This place really had drained you of all physical fitness to the point where you are scared of even one of your fan girls sneaking up on you and kidnapping you. A lot of them seem to be stronger (though not quite faster) than you from having to move around all their extra flab all the time.

You were just thinking this when a noise came from around the hallway. Fearing the worst, you tug upon the door one last time with all your miserable might and. . . !

You must be eager to join!"

You stand weakly before the infamous FA sisters. The biggest in terms of sheer enormity (though pound for pound they were beaten by many) due to their immense height, yet so fit that their belly fat looked almost firm and you could see faint lines of muscle bulging under their meaty chests and arms and fat laden thighs. 114312.content:
… Try as you might, you couldn’t open the door to the Kendo Club’s room. All you managed to do was tire yourself out and force yourself to slide to the ground with sweat rolling down your hair. “Damn it…”

To make matters worse, the sound of heavy footsteps (there was only one set from what you could tell, since it didn’t sound like a stampede) echoed through the hallway. Either it was Rebecca coming to smack you upside the head for ditching her and Kate, one of your fan girls, or whatever. If anything, it probably wouldn’t end well for you…

“Oh my, if it isn’t CJ-kun,” a familiar Japanese accented voice called your name, making you turn around…

… With you being met with a familiar pair of large breasts bouncing right over your head, it didn’t take a genius to recognize who the small potbelly and thunderous thighs belonged to. Quickly gathering your breath, you stand up in an attempt to look Suzuka (Suzu) in the eyes (although you were looking just at the top of her breasts at your full height).

Seeing that you were trying to look her in the eyes, Suzu leaned forward slightly to help accommodate you, letting her monstrous breasts hang downwards, struggling between the confines of her uniform top (and more than likely a triple XL bra). “You got here fast than I did. I didn’t think that you’d be so interested in the kendo club.”

“W-Well, I was always i-interested in this sort of stuff,” You huffed out a reply, not telling the over exaggerated hourglass figured girl that you were more interested in losing some weight and improving your strength, heck if you just tired out from trying to open those doors to the club room, then you’d have no chance from trying to break free from your rabid fan club.

“Hmm, hmm, hmm, interesting,” Suzu giggled, making her bust jiggle in rythem with her laughter. “It’s good to know that, well then, should we head in?”

“Uh, t-that’s what I was trying to do,” You replied with a blush on your face. “But…”

“Well, of course, CJ-Kun,” Suzu replied with a wag of a chubby finger at you. “The door’s locked!”

You mentally slapped yourself for not thinking of that.

Suzu on the other hand was standing up straight and had reached into the collar of her top, digging deeper into the expanse that was her cleavage. “I have the key to the room right here…”

To illustrate it, Suzu pulled her hand back out and revealed a key on a long chain link necklace. Not interested in keeping it up in the air, Suzu just released her hand and allowed the key fall in between her large breasts on the outside of her uniform. “Of course, we don’t normally enter in through these doors.”

“You don’t?” You question as Suzu threw her arm around your shoulders and immediately pulled you close to her large body (squishing your face against her left breast, making a large blush creep on your face). “URK!”

“Of course not, CJ-kun,” Suzu giggled, making you feel the motions in her jiggling breast flesh, the blush on your face growing deeper and deeper. “We enter through the locker rooms! Hmm, speaking of, since you’re interested in the kendo club, I might as well get you fitted for a kendo uniform. We’ve got some spares in the locker room, and I think we might have a bogu and hakama in your size.

“And if you want, I could give you a demonstration on how to put the clothes on…”

“W-W-WHAT?!” You yelped as Suzu began to pull you (as you suspected, her size indicated that she was a lot stronger than you) closer to the locker room door. “B-B-But, I… I can’t! I’m a g-g-guy and if there are any other g-g-girls in there…”

“Do you honestly think that any girls would mind you getting undressed in front of them?” Suzu pointed out, her strength and weight forcing you closer towards the door. “Besides, the club won’t be starting for a good while now, it’ll just be you and me in there, so you won’t have to worry, CJ-kun.”

“Ah, but, I, uh…” You stammer, just as Suzu began to open the door to the locker room.

1143121.content:
"...And that's how its done!" Suzuka finished explaining and giggled upon seeing the end result of her demonstration on how to robe for Kendo.

As promised, CJ was shown how to put it on, but it had turned out to be not quite the demonstration he had feared fifteen minutes ago, in fact it had been far more embarrassing on his part. After being stripped of his already tight fitting pants and shirt, Suzuka had gone to great lengths to dress him up in the largest hakama on hand. While CJ squirmed at the sensation of this busty Asian dressing her, Suzuka almost enjoyed herself too much as she applied the robes while teaching him how to do it himself in the future.

"So how does it feel?"

CJ tugged at the top of his the hakama slightly, adjusting the tightness of the robe around his girth.

"Feels kind of tight around here..." CJ gestured to where the top of the robe cut into his waistline before gesturing to his legs"...but down here it feels a lot looser than my pants!"

"That's great!" Suzuku chuckled at his reply, again sending her chest into a gravity fighting osculation "want to put on the bogu and see how it feels?"

"No! No!" CJ said at once "This will do for now!"

"Okay..." Suzuka said a little disappointed, but her mood rebounded at once upon deciding what to do next "then how about I teach you how to use a Shinai?"

"A what?"

"Silly CJ-kun...you know...the Bamboo sword"

"Oh...sure, I guess"

"Great, just let me get changed and I'll..." Suzuka spoke as she started to upon the shirt that could barely contain those two flesh lumps.

"He-Hey!" CJ at once panicked and made for the door.

As thought surprised for the reaction, Suzuka stopped undressing and looked up at CJ and asked "What's the matter?"

"What's the matter? I'm still in here!"

"Oh?" Suzuka looked genuinely puzzled, as thought she didn't mind CJ standing in her why she changed "You don't have to leave CJ-kun"

"I'll wait outside" CJ-kun said and opened the door to leave
________________________________________

"Ok! I'm ready" Suzuka said with the same genki energy that she seemed to have infinite amounts of "You know you didn't need to wait out here"

In one of his rare moment of defiance, and after having several minutes to think of his words, CJ explained in a breathless sentence his reason.

"I know what you said about me changing in front of you...but I wouldn't be able to say I respected your privacy if I forced you to do the same in front of me"

For only a second, the focus in Suzuka's eyes changed from the dominantly cheerful mode to something that CJ almost missed seeing.

"You're really the true gentlemen aren't you?" Suzuka said in a low, but admiring breath.

"Huh?" CJ barely caught the words.

"N.o.t.h.i.n.g~" Suzuka giggled, instantly returning to her regular genki personality. Her bust jiggled a bit, but in a Hakama, their movement was more restricted.

It was amazingly how similar, yet how different she looked in different clothing. Her chest did seem just a bit smaller under her top, just like her thighs which were easily concealed under the robes, but her otherwise chubby body looked at home in the Hakama.

"Because its tryout day, we've got all of the morning till lunch to practice, shall we start with the very basics?" Suzuka suggested.

"Sure"
