choices: CJ sits down again and Suzuka talks about the club's problem.
Never mind... Rebecca and Kate finally found you.
11431211.content:
CJ could tell just how excited Suzuka was getting as she radiated excitement from her entire body. She had almost sprinted to the racks where she picked up a pair of Shinai's from the only half dozen that were kept there. As she attended to that, CJ took his first good look around the Dojo was it was. It was nowhere near the same as a real one, and it was very clear to his eyes that the Kendo club had seen better days.

"Here you go!" Suzuka said, handing over one that had been wrapped in a velvet red cover.

"What's so special about this one?" CJ said as he pulled it out of its bag.

"Why that's mine CJ-kun!" Suzuka enthusiastically replied

"Wah?" CJ looked up in surprise, seeing her resting the other one she had picked up over her shoulder "If this is yours, shouldn't I have that one instead?"

"Not today" Suzuka replied gracefully before adding in an alluring tone "I want you to know what a really good Shinai feels like in your hands"

CJ's enthrallment at her words only seemed to add to his innate curiosity about holding a Shinai for the first time. Taking the bag off the end, he passed the bag over to the already outstretched hand of Suzuka and gripped the bamboo blade with both meaty, pudgy hands. Watching over CJ with her own engrossed interest, she took a safe step back and gave him his next instruction.

"Now, with all your might, show me how hard you can swing that Shinai"

CJ closed his eyes and flexed his fingers before following her next request and felt his arm muscles feel a bit fidgety as he brought it up like he had seen on television once. After a quick breathe - whether to compose himself or from lifting something up this long - CJ forcefully brought the Shinai down with all the force his since fattened muscles could exert, with a faint 'whoosh' noise, He felt his best effort was unimpressive, but Suzuka saw it another way.

"Despite your inexperience, you really have an excellent swing" Suzuka's lower, serious and admirable tone spoke, this time loud enough for him to hear.

"You really think so?" CJ said, automatically embarrassed at being praised for something he felt he had underachieved at.

"Of course...You're form is almost right, and despite your...size...you really got some force in that strike..." Suzuka explained, for the first time sounding like a genuine team captain to CJ's ears.

CJ's grin was from ear to ear when he said his thanks, Suzuka couldn't have missed it and knew then that she had found her fourth club member.

"How about I start with teaching you the proper timing?"

"Okay, I guess?" CJ replied, still not knowing much of the lexicon to Kendo.
________________________________________

"That's right! You're getting the hang of it now!" Suzuka applauded as she continued to mimic the most basic of exercises along side the newest member of the team.

But CJ felt like the compliment wasn't deserved. If one simple strike was a bit of an effort, he was sluggishly running himself into the ground just to keep up with Suzuka, who was only going at a very slow pace now to keep in tandem with him. CJ soon summarized that this was probably the most amount of exercise he had ever excreted - not counting running away from his fan-club - since coming to the academy. He couldn't imagine how badly he was sweating now and felt like the weight he had put on were dripping off him by the pound. It was a worrying thought and CJ turned to something to distract them.

"Can I ask you something?" CJ asked as casually as possible

"Sure?" Suzuka replied, enthusiastic to see that CJ was stating to get over the shy stage with her "What do you want to know, my chest size?"

"Wha? No! I wouldn't..." CJ choked on his reply at gasping too much air, the moment passed and he quickly resumed the strike practice before he worried Suzuka "I mean about the club"

"Oh...of course, go ahead..." Suzuka with the same amount of cheerful banter as when she offered to tell the magic number that represented her bust size. If CJ had just the slightest bit of intuition, he might've felt the pang of concern in the busty Japanese girl.

"You said there were 'girls' before, as in other members, how many members are there?"

"Including you, four...the others are looking for recruits right now"

"Then what about the supervising teacher, who is it?"

"We don't have one anymore"

"Then who is supporting the club? Where are you getting the bamboo sticks and clothes to wear?" CJ asked in surprise, his sync with Suzuka already coming undone.

"We don't have any"

It was inevitable, but CJ's out of sync action also distracted him from keeping track over the foot movements that she was teaching him at the same time and at he same time he had overexert the last of energy keeping his body standing in this most strenuous of exercises. His blubber ridden body fell like a bag full of marshmallows.

"Oh my...Are you alright CJ-kun?"

"Sorry..." CJ breathed loudly as his body finally gushed in pain, not at the fall that his body had cushioned him from, but at the relief of stopping his punishing exercise routine "...give me a minute"

CJ tried to raise his upper torso, but failed. he then tried to life his head which he could do, but was worthless in doing anything to lift himself up. Help from above came soon enough.

"Here, let me help you" Suzuka kindly offered.

CJ, without really thinking much at the embarrassment of getting a girl to help him up, was lifted up in stages, first upright, then in one might tug from Suzuka, he was standing again, if not quite so steadily yet.

"Thanks...I'm sorry you had to do that"

"That's alright...everyone needs helping up every now and then" Suzuka said, in a tone now halfway between her normally cheerful appearance, and the deeper meaningful one that CJ had so far experienced twice so far "how about we take a break for now"

"Sure"
11431211.title: His first practice session

choices: ...Club Members Jessica and Aoi return, with an additional recruit.
...Rebecca and Kate, who have finally caught up to you.
114312111.content:
"So where do we sit" CJ asked, Spying around for a chair he had missed before.

"Anywhere!" Suzuka cheerfully said "In Kendo, we sit on the floor!"

As to emphasis it, Suzuka dropped her mass down to the ground she was standing on, her breasts giving the most jiggle they had been able to in awhile. CJ, having wondered now why he had gotten up at all, followed suit, albeit in a clumsier fashion than Suzuka, who merely giggled at her male co-member's disposition.

Even after adjusting himself as so to not fall down again, he still found it hard to sit upright, the problem came from his Hakama now digging into his stomach. While he had gotten use to the strain while standing, sitting down pushed more pressure on his gut and made it impossible to sit.

"If your Hakama is making it hard to sit, you can loosen it up a bit" Suzuka commented and giggled, seeing the distressed look on his face.

CJ, feeling he had no choice, pull on the sash rope and freed it from its simple knot, loosening his robe and reliving the pressure, just to be sure it didnt fall off when he stood, CJ then quickly tied it back up at a more comfortable length.

"It takes getting use to...and I imagine you have never worn clothes like this before" Suzuka commented

"No...not really" CJ honestly replied "this is the first time I've worn Japanese clothing"


"So who are the other two?"

"Aoi Kamigishi...she is from my class...and is a real nerd and always likes to study, then there is Jessica Mathews, from your grade"

"Jessica..." CJ at once recalled the name from his very early days at the academy, because of his memory, fear crept into his veins, but then his recent memory caught up and his fear dissipated.

"You mean the girl who..."

"Yeah, that's the girl" Suzuka chuckled, seeing the embarrassment on his face "only girl to ever be expelled from the CJ Dalton Admirers club"

CJ thought mulled that one over. Jessica Mathews had been one of the founders of the club, also one of the few people in the club that CJ had grown to respect. When they had planned to raid CJ's house to steal all of his boxers and underwear, it had been Jessica who broke ranks with the other chubby followers to warn the still spry CJ about the impending raid. He managed to save all his clothing and his resulting dignity, but it had cost Jessica dearly. Her friends, her social status in the school and even her ability to talk to CJ without being harassed by the club. Absent any contact with Jessica, it was almost like she disappeared.

"So what's she doing here?"

"Learning to be stronger for herself...she gets bullied because of what she did"

"And what's your story then?" CJ asked with deep honesty "Why are you here?"

Suzuka smiled again, seeing the true concern in CJ that Jessica had spoken of many times, deciding that there wasn't much holding her back from telling him the story, she started.

"I've been practicing Kendo since I was a kid, but since coming here...it's become a little difficult"

"Difficult?"

"It's wasn't easy for me to adapt to this school at first...right now I'm 6 foot 4..I tower over the girls here...Jessica is barely as tall as you, and Aoi is a real short girl!" Suzuka chuckled again, but cracking past the cheerful composure to show CJ again the side of her that he realized people rarely saw "Plus I've got these massive F cups... its because I started developing early and by the time I started here, I had a D cup..."

CJ could tell at once what kind of story she was telling and went from amazed to stunned. He hadn't felt this guilty about himself since the days back when Kate and Rebecca were bullied about their weight.

"Suzuka...What did they do to you?"

"The other girls were jealous...I'm barely a half of their weight, but I'm the tallest girl by six inches and I have the second largest chest for my grade, add to the fact I'm Japanese...some of the really others really didn't like how I looked compared to them...especially a girl in my grade named Chris...her and her friends really didn't like me"

At hearing Chris's name, CJ's stomach became bitter, she was only person he really had problems with - for accidental reasons - and Suzuka's story only gave him a reason to now resent her.

"They also entered the kendo club at the same I did, but they were new to it all back then" Suzuka paused a beat, using the time to rest her head on a shoulder. "...for awhile, they refused to let me even practice...since she thought it was disgusting how big I was. But then they transferred to the swimming team and they simply ignored me"

It had never occurred to CJ until that moment that even in a school full of fatties, that there would still be people teasing a person about their appearance, it was almost astonishing to hear it come from Chris, who had very a well known dislike for even chubby people.

"You do realize though that Chris doesn't have any friends anymore right?" CJ replied, again mulling over the stories he had heard on that subject.

"I know" Suzuka smiled again and started to return to her 'normal' cheerful tone "In a way I feel sorry for her but...she bullied me, she bullied Aoi and she bullied a lot of people for a long time...when she stops hating everyone, then I can forgive her."

CJ nodded and felt it was time to change pace "So what about the club?"

Suzuka nodded and changed tone just as quickly as she turned to the new topic.

"As far as I can tell, the kendo club use to be a popular sport here years ago. Kathy, the captain before me, once told me about how the captain before her said they use to have a coach and everything. But then Mrs Masters the principal downsized the sports teams to improve the cafeteria and the grade average here"

CJ nodded, wondering himself in frank honesty if that reallocation of money also explained the chubby size of the student body, but he ignored it for the moment.

"The school doesn't mind that we practice, but the club numbers never rose and when the seniors graduated last year, I inherited the school's dojo became the sole member"

"that's pretty bad"

"It wasn't all that bad...having a club all to myself gives me the ability to pick who I want, so I started gathering other outsiders...first I recruited Aoi...then Jessica...and now today, I'm recruiting you"

"Me?" CJ pondered before realizing the hidden jibe "Hey wait! What's so outsider about me? Everyone loves me according to one club?!"

Suzuka laughed verbosity at seeing CJ double-take on her words.

"I don't mean it that way CJ-kun...gomen...what I meant by that was you're the only guy in this school...as far as gender goes, you are a real outsider..."

"There is that..." CJ said in surrender "but you realize that when word gets out that I'm joining you're club...a dozen of so scream fan-girls will try to join, right?"

"Only if I let them!" Suzuka chuckled again "Then again, I let Jessica join, but she really isn't like those psychos that chase you everywhere"

The two of them had their first laugh together, but it was interrupted by the sound of the door as...
114312111.title: The story of Suzuka and of the Kendo club

choices: Rebecca and Kate have finally caught up to you.
1143121111.content:
Before Suzuka could go on about the Kendo club's problems, the door leading to the hallway opened. At the same time, Suzuka and CJ turned to face the door and saw two new faces standing entering by the door escorting third person right behind them.

"Captain, we found our fourth member!" Jessica Mathews announced

"You mean our fifth member" Suzuka giggled

Jessica had been looking skywards upon her entry to the dojo and had failed to notice the almost 200 pound CJ sitting on the floor besides Suzuka, a minor correction in view corrected that and her multi-emotion reaction followed.

"CJ!" Jessica cheered as raised to another level of excitement.

"Hey Jessica, long time no see" CJ replied as he and Suzuka stood for their new arrival. It was almost a wasted effect as Jessica didnt wait a second longer to bearhug him again like she had done whenever she had the chance during her days in his fanclub.

But unlike the overwhelming majority of the club, CJ didn't mind Jessica one bit. Despite being one of the founders from his grade of the now almost school-wide CJ Dayton fan-club, she was also one of the few people in the club that had genuinely respected CJ, enough so that when other club members had planned to raid CJ's house to steal all of his boxers and underwear, she had broken ranks with the other rotund followers to warn the still spry CJ about the impending raid. It had cost her membership in the club and her association with the other girls in the club, but Jessica had moved on from them and found a far more stable friendship in Suzuka Touya and a club that she really could belong to.

Jessica was - as Suzuka had described to CJ a short time ago - around his height of 5 foot 8, but an inch short. Sporting a weight of around 250 pounds, she had the odd distinction, compared to most girls at the academy, of a very soft freely moving rotund roll of belly that jiggled about as much as her D cup chest. This was a somewhat rare attribute, but one with an easy explanation. Despite still weighing as much as everyone else, Jessica's exercise though the kendo club gave her fat cells the opportunity to break apart from their almost solid state to a almost semi-liquid state.

The result, CJ noted perversely, gave Jessica just much of a jiggle to her body as Suzuka had in her chest and thighs.

"I didn't know you joined the kendo club" CJ half-lied to Jessica.

Jessica released from CJ and faced him properly, showing him the dexterity of sanity that set her apart from the rest of the school.

"I did after those whackos in the club kicked me out...but then Suzuka offered me a place in her club"

"I see" CJ said, despite knowing this already. There were times were he felt life was just a little too canny.

"So who is this new member for the team?" Suzuka asked, turning attention to the girl standing by Aoi.

"I'm Natalie Chambers, ple-pleased to meet you!" Natalie bowed to the captain, only she had heard some where that in Japan, everyone bowed to everyone for some reason.

"Hey Natalie-chan, welcome to the team!" Suzuka welcomed her - and as she always did, appoint prefixes to people she liked - before bowing back out of courtesy to the newcomer's attempt to keep up with the traditions of Kendo.

CJ looked on, feeling slightly envious at the attention turning to Natalie, who he was familiar with as a girl who sat two rows back from him in classes. Short for her age - though not as short as Aoi - Natalie he could tell was use to sitting down at lot judging by her rounded thighs and rear and only partial belly. Her chest wasn't quite as impressive as Jessica who was the same age and otherwise Natalie retained a mildly chubby shape suffering from inactivity.

The girl standing next to her on the other hand was a different story. Shorter than CJ by a half foot, Aoi was by far one the shortest people at the academy for her age. As Suzuka had elaborated, she really contrasted well with the captain. Whereas Suzuka's fat was able to be buried in a much taller body, Aoi retained almost the same weight at a over a foot less in height. Big all over was the result and to top off the nerdy image Suzuka elaborated to, Aoi wore a pair of thin-rimmed glasses while sporting short brown black hair.

"CJ, come meet our newest member Natalie...and my vice captain Aoi" Suzuka gestured to each girl she referred to.

Natalie was almost shocked to meet CJ. Despite being in the same class, the fan-club had borderline threatened her more than once to stay away from their idol, to the point of rejecting an offer to work on an assignment with him. her decision to turn down a seat at Clair Master's Music appreciation club had all of a sudden paid dividends.

"ple-pleased to meet you CJ" Natalie stutter in a way that reminded him of Kate.

"What are you talking about, we see each other every day in homeroom" CJ laughed.

It was a joke that everyone found funny and soon he turned to Aoi, Suzuka's best freind and classmate.

"Aoi Kamagishi, pleased to meet you" She extended a hand to CJ, having the stone to be more formal than Natalie who was understandably shy.

"I look forward to practicing with you" CJ replied, returning the handshake, even if it was a little off the usual vertical action.

"This is amazing..." Suzuka said, building upon her excitement even faster than Jessica had on seeing CJ "...it's like we're becoming a real team again!"

"It certainly feels like it" Jessica agreed with a thoughtful nod as she stood next to Suzuka, arms crossed and resting on her gut "If we get another few members, maybe we can get a coach again...or even start to compete for real!"

"Now, now Jess..." Suzuka waved her finger in the air to make a point "we take this one step at a time...and we have two beginners to teach as well"

CJ couldn't quite describe the atmosphere in the dojo. Having taken a step to observe things from a persuado-distance, one thing that came to mind was that he couldn't compare this to anywhere else in the school. Sure the was friendly coexistence, but he had yet to see so many girls working towards a single goal...that didn't involve stealing his underwear.

"Hey CJ, what are doing over there, come on over"

"Sure" he replied, more confidence than he had felt since entering the dojo.

the discussion had turned to assignment of Shinai and what spare equipment was here on hand for the girls and one guy but before Suzuha could on any further, the door to the Dojo opened.
1143121111.title: The kendo team's fifth member

choices: CJ chooses to stay (Part II)
11431211111.content:
Before Suzuka could talk about the Kendo club's equipment shortage, the door leading to the hallway opened. At the same time, CJ and everyone turned to face the door and saw two familiar faces standing by the door. To CJ, they looked like they had been searching for awhile, but by the stain his crafty eyes instantly spotted on the uniform Kate wore, they had not exhausted themselves during their search for the dojo.

"Finally!" Rebecca announced as she entered through the door that CJ had entered before.

Before she any pretence of forgiving CJ for running off like he had almost an hour ago, Rebecca had only had to take one look at what he was dressed in now before her anger flared up again. Her reaction was textbook.

"Charles Jeffery Dalton, what the hell are you wearing?!"

From behind Rebecca, an equally, but much quietly, surprised Kate observed behind her friend the outfit CJ was in and how it was almost identical to the one that Kendo team captain was wearing. While both had different reactions to what they saw, both soon would have virtually identical reactions to what they smelled. While the other two seasoned kendo club members and the new member had managed to ignore it, the gradually workup had turned into a stench that neither could have noticed themselves, but the two newcomers became the second to notice and the first to feel putrid disgust at the smell.

"Holy..." Rebecca coughed "CJ, what were you sleeping in"

"huh?"

"you...ki-kinda...reek" Kate said, joining Rebecca in a coughing fit.

CJ gestured to his own armpit to attempt to smell for himself, but only caught a marginal percentage of what a complete stranger felt, Suzuka however, having contributed to some of that smell and stayed quiet for now, entered the conversation for the first time.

"Sorry for the smell!" Suzuka's charming, cheerful personality started "But we just finished pretty light workout awhile ago"

"What were you doing, playing in a mud pit?"

"Of course not!" Suzuka giggled "I was teaching CJ-kun how to swing a Shinai...he is very good you know?"

"Sing...hi?" Rebecca mispronounced, almost on purpose "what the hell is a Singhi?"

"She means one of these" CJ lifted the bamboo blade he had been given by Suzuka "its really tough work"

"It must be...you must be sweating more water than a broken dam by the looks of it" Rebecca gestured to the clearly soaked patches under his armpit that had long since seeped through the rather thick robes he was wearing "what are you going to do for the afternoon classes?

"Sorry Rebecca..." CJ replied honestly "I didn't think of that"

Kate almost tried to say something, but her better judgement decided to wait for a later time.

"So what happened to you?" CJ asked.

"We went looking for you after you ran off without us!" Rebecca simply stated, " but it took us over an hour to find this place!"

"Over an hour?" CJ asked "How hard could it be to find this room?"

"W-well we got...de-detoured checking out a few clubs on the way... " Kate honestly blushed when she said that.

CJ rolled his eyes as their explanation only went downhill from there.

"...first we got stopped by the cooking club for a taste sample..." Rebecca started

"...then we checked out the chess club..." Kate whispered

"...then we checked the cheese tasters club..."

"...then we stopped by the music club..."

"...then we visited the manga club..."

"...then we checked out the ice cream appreciation club..."

"...then we checked the tv-watching club to see if you were there...then we ran into Claire who wanted you to join the music appreciation club for some reason..."

"...then we went the ca-cake admiration club..." Kate added, finally explaining to CJ where Kate got the cake stain on her collar in the last hour.

"then we finally found where the kendo gym was and came here..." Rebecca finished before forcefully continuing on "Now come on, we have to pick a club for the three of us to join before lunch time"

"I know, that's why I'm joining this club"

The words almost hung in the like the bad stench radiating from CJ, which was still fumigating both of his friend's noses with bad memories of dirty socks and PE class in middle school.

"What?" Rebecca replied a split second later "You can't be serious!"

"I am!" CJ said "Despite how hard it is...this actually quite fun"

"But...didn't you-u say to join a club with us...together?" Kate stuttered

"Then join the club" CJ said simply "Rebecca, you were saying before you wanted join a team to get in shape...this is the one"

Rebecca quickly rewound her memory back to just after they left homeroom to look for a club, When the memory of her and Kate's words came back to haunt her, Rebecca only flustered as she started to speak

"...no...no...no...no way...Wa-wa-wait...a minute..., its Kate who talked about getting some exercise!" Rebecca started to move her hands in a wave off signal suitable for a airport runway "...and I said that if we were to join a team...it should be the swim club, not some kendo club"

"But why not?" CJ enquired before turning to Suzuka "These two can join too right?"

Until now, Suzuka and the others had kept their peace, wisely letting CJ try to sell the Kendo club for her. Suzuka didn't have any doubt CJ had been sold on joining the club and his words of confirmation made Suzuka jiggle with pink-warm joy inside at finding her fourth and fifth team member. Upon CJ's prompting, she spoke up.

"Of course, I'd be great if you could join as well"

"No way!" Rebecca replied instantly "I want to float around in the pool, not sweat enough to fill a waterbed!"

Suzuka hadn't been offended when Rebecca preference for the swim club, knowing all too well how hard work it was to sell a often sweaty environment over the fun of lapping about in a pool.

"The sweat is not all that bad Rebecca-chan..." Suzuka spoke cheefing, assigning a prefix on the spot to CJ's long time friend "...its actually quite fun and the sweat is just part of it, think of it a sign of how much work your putting in, its really quite refreshing when finish a practice session drenched from head to toe"

Rebecca paused a beat before replying in a low sardonic mutter "Wow...that's a really weird fetish you've got going there..."

"What about you Kate?" CJ asked "What do you want to do?"

Six sets of eyes at once turned their attention to the shy girl who had been standing behind Rebecca, almost using her best friend as a shield from getting involved in this - what she felt - hostile conversation.

"Well I..."

Inwardly, she was actually thriving at the idea of joining the kendo club. The idea of exercising off some pounds and spending some 'quality' time practicing with CJ at this most exotic of practitioner sports. But one look at Rebecca told her all she wanted to know about her friend's firm stance on joining something else. Kate and Rebecca had been friends all throughout their school years, they had worked on schooled projects together, played together, and though the years had fattened up together. Even if it was for her love for CJ, Kate just couldn't make the logical leap to even consider betraying Rebecca for what she wanted.

Kate knew she was fat, shy and stuttered sometimes when confronted, but she also knew that in this school at least, Rebecca was the lamppost that she could lean on in the troubled times. She also knew that CJ and Rebecca had fought it each other before on all manner of issues and always ended up resolving their differences in the end. With that miraculous long thought process, Kate came to her conclusion.

"...I think Rebecca is right...we should join a club all of us can do"

"See? Even Kate thinks this is a bad idea!" Rebecca argued "Come on CJ...lets join the swim club"

CJ felt himself stuck between a rock and hard place, he had two good reasons to stay here, first of which involved his on going feud with Chris, who hated his guts over an accident some time ago and he knew that she would reject all three of them for being too fat anyway...one of the reasons why the club had only one member. And the second reason was Suzuka who had just told him how desperate the club was and how she really needed his support to keep it running. On the other hand, he didn't feel like offending Rebecca and Kate by breaking an unspoken promise with her over their commitment to join a club as a group.

But in the end, even if it was just a little selfish, CJ came down on the side of the Kendo club and he started to carefully pick at his words to best convey his message.
11431211111.title: Rebecca and Kate FINALLY found you

choices: Skip to a week later...and Suzuka has a present for CJ
Skip to a fortnight later...and Kate wants to join the club?
114312111111.content:
"Rebecca...I really need this club...it's probably the best thing that's happened to me since I came here...and I really need the exercise"

Rebecca didn't reply or make any facial expressions whatsoever. If the stench, the thought of Suzuka's jiggle-physics body enticing CJ in the first place and the fact they had to even argue about this annoyed her, his intention to stay on put Rebecca over the edge. She didn't explode in anger - it just wasn't like her to - but she did feel very hurt right now...hurt at not only how a complete stranger had roped CJ into something she had no intention of doing herself, but at the implied message that CJ though he wasn't physically good enough anymore, even in a school full of fatties where it didn't matter.

Rebecca, though her anger, thought about it for a moment. She could still remember how CJ had been reasonably lighter than his current girth before he started at the academy and how his time at the academy had drained away at his ability to even outrun the annoying fan-club. With that in mind, was it no surprise that he wanted to try get in shape, at least a little bit? But if that was the case, then why did he want to join this in this club to get all sweaty, when he could just as easily he get in shape though the swim club?

Rebecca felt it took an hour to process all the thoughts for what she wanted and he wanted, but really took several seconds. It saved her from venting on CJ and making a worse mess of the situation than it already was, and she even began forgiving him for his otherwise selfish decision. but Rebecca didn't want to do Kendo, she didn't even really want to do Swimming Club, it had just been an idea in the back of her head to weight against the cooking club and the other clubs she had visited along the way here.

"Fine...do whatever you want Charles..." Rebecca simply replied, holding ground on her firm stance. "Come on Kate...Let's go ask the swim club before we run out of time.

"Wah?" Kate stuttered, seeing Rebecca seemingly call CJ's bluff to join the Kendo club. "But...but..."

"Its okay Kate..." CJ assured her, and feeling a pang of guilt for not really considering Kate in this equation "I'll catch up with you guys at lunch okay?"

"O-o-okay!"

With that, Rebecca turned to leave and almost dragged Kate out the door, leaving a stunned CJ and Suzuka behind.

It was only after Rebecca had left with Kate, that Suzuka had realized what she had done to CJ and their friendship. From what she knew of their relationship, all at once felt a pang of guilt for stealing CJ away from those two girls, just for the benefit of her club.

"Is it really okay to leave them like that?" Suzuka asked, speaking again in her low tone for serious during a moment of obvious guilt "You know if they wanted to join another club with you...its alright to leave..."

"It's okay..." CJ replied, sounding oddly okay with it "I actually know Rebecca and Kate pretty well...Rebecca will be mad at me for now, but she wont stay mad at me forever...she just needs to adjust to the idea"

"Are you sure?" Jessica asked

"I hope so...I know it sounds crazy, but we kind of fight every week on things like this...most of them involve Clair"

"The princess?"

"Yeah...it's a long story" CJ said turning to face the others "I'll tell you about it another time...but for meantime, I think we should be addressing the smell issue before lunch time"

Suzuka was quite surprised at the revelation from CJ, but never felt more prouder than now at how he proudly committed himself to helping her club out. If his bold defiance to sell Kendo to his two best friends was part of a test to join the club, his funny offhand remark about their sweat was the passing grade.

"Of course" Suzuka giggled "...so do you want me to teach you a few tricks on how to get rid of the sweaty smell?"

"Huh?" CJ was caught off guard

"Come on, I'll teach you some pointers" Suzuka grabbed his meaty hand and started to guide him to the change room again.

"Hey wait, we're not going to do this again are we?"

"Oh course CJ-kun..." Suzuka chuckled, finding the humour again that she had breathed at the start of his first lesson "...after all, its my responsibility to help out my newest members of the Kendo club"

Without much in the way of prompting, Suzuka pulled CJ into the changing room again, much to the enjoyment of the other members who watched on.________________________________________

Time seemed to pass a lot quicker after his morning session in the Kendo dojo. Upon a fairly extensive - and again rather hands on - lesson in freshening up after a practice session, CJ left the kendo club to find Rebecca and Kate. Surely enough, he had only to look in once place for them at lunch time, the cafeteria, which at this time of day was full of girls filling up on their midday meal. Rebecca had refused even utter a single word at CJ the entire time and it was left to Kate to explain the details on what went on after they left.

As CJ had feared - or expected - would happen, Chris had turned them down in a heartbeat. Despite the laden hypocrisy that laced Chris's rejection, neither bothered to argue against their senior and left ashamed, only to be rescued by Claire, who had almost dragooned them into her own 'Music appreciation club' which Kate summarized as '1 part music listening and 2 parts cake eating and 1 part Claire talking about important her and her club was'. CJ could've sworn he felt hints that Kate had intended to return to the Kendo Dojo with Rebecca, but this wasn't the time to even venture a enquiry.

Clair had joined them, as always taking up a special chair at the head of the table and munching down on a three course meal. Between courses, she attempted to persuade CJ to at the very least 'try out' her club instead of the outdated Kendo club. But like before, he didn't move on the subject, his fascination at the possibilities in what he could accomplish outweighed even his friendship to Clair, who at least didn't take offence like Rebecca did.

By the end of lunch, word had quickly gotten out about the club that CJ had picked and already a number of the enterprising members of his dedicated fan-club were trying to ask Suzuka, Aoi and even Jessica about signing on. True to Suzuka's word, knowing the effect it could have their club, all of them feigned to stick adherence to the rules and used the deadline of an hour ago as an excuse to not sign on any more members, despite how badly she needed them. It was in part painful for Suzuka reject people, but at the same time it wouldn't do if the Kendo club was suddenly swamped with uninterested club members.

The rest of the day was classes and despite CJ's adherent ability to focus on his class work, the feeling in his mind of holding that kendo stick in his hand just didn't go away. It was just like Suzuka had said about getting to know the feeling of a good Shinai in his hands. It hadn't helped make the class go faster, but it did certainly gave him something to look forward to afterwards.

By the end of the day, his determination to get a feel for that Shinai again and he couldn't wait for his next club session tomorrow. On his way out of the school, he had managed to run across Suzuka and the other members walking out as a group.

"Looking forward to tomorrow?" Suzuka said "Because from now on, its going to be hard work all the way"

"You bet!"

CJ and Suzuka were enjoying themselves everyday at the kendo club. More than that, the two of them were develloping quickly their friendship. CJ missed his two closest friends, and filled the gap with Suzuka.

Something else brought the two of them together. But, as Suzuka saw her new friend in danger, she promptly came to the rescue; the new bonds between the two were now forged in the fire from the fanclub.

The kendo practices were still on, and were hard on CJ. But CJ's passion for kendo grew each day, and he was feeling stronger after each session. That day, as CJ and Suzuka were on their way home, Suzuka wanted to ask something.

"CJ-kun, I have a surprise that you might enjoy for you"

"Would you like to come to my house this evening? I have something very special to... show you" she said grabbing his shoulder with her hand.

"What?"

"Nope... come, I am sure that you will be surprised"

And indeed; CJ was surprised. In the Touya household, Suzuka dragged CJ, who was now trying to stutter questions or protests to her room. CJ was surprised by what he saw: while he did expected something different than the regular teenage girl bedroom, he was still taken aback. The floor was extremely large, as was most of the house, and was covered by a tatami. On a wall, there were several kendo practice swords. Although he had only been interested (or knew about) kendo for a week, CJ could still tell that those were precious. Next to a wall was a rather large desk with a brand new computer. There were also several cupboards. Suzuka showed CJ around

"This is where I keep my regular clothes; this is where I keep my kendo outfits, this is where I keep my regular swords and what I need for practice as well as my old sumo gears"

"And in this one?"

"This is why I brought here today" As she said those words, she moved toward the mentionned piece of furniture

CJ then noticed two pieces of tatami of different colour in front of one another near the center of room

"CJ-kun, you are about to have your first tea ceremony"

"My what now?"

"Tea ceremony, my dear CJ"

As Suzu came back to the center of the room with the set needed for the ceremony, the two sat down. CJ, as usual when initiated to something by his friend, was trying more or less to do what she did when he could.

"We will drink twice tea, and in-between we will have dinner" She then proceeded to explain to CJ the traditionnal way of serving tea, as well as all the modernization she had decided to bring, mostly on the topics that were allowed to be discussed. She usually did this with her mother, and she had not often the occasion to enjoy the conversation as much.

After the first serving, Suzu left only to bring back the meal that they were to enjoy. CJ was surprised at the rather large servings that were served, but he nonetheless did his best to eat. He was also struggling with the two little sticks to eat his rice, and was progressing rather slowly. Suzu finished rather quickly, started to wait for CJ. She got impatient, and came across the floor to start to eat CJ's rice, which made both of them laugh.

"Out of my way, I am hungry!"

Suzu kept going though, and quickly finished the bowl of rice of her friend, before returning to her previous spot.

After this, the second cup of teas were served. CJ then noticed that the room was very warm. His clothes were already drenched in sweat, as were the one of Suzu. This meant that her cloths were hugging her forms tight; the position in which they were both sitting also put emphasis on her breasts; her huge boobs. The rest of the ceremony continued without any other incident of the sort. The two friends shared more tea, stories and laughs before CJ had to leave to his home. The two however agreed to make this a weekly habit. When they parted ways, the two hugged, and CJ couldn't help but enjoy the feeling of Suzu's breast pressed against his chest.

You chubby childhood friend smiles, "I knew that face would work with you." as she giggles, her cheeks grow increasingly red, "It's the puppy dog eyes, I know you can't resist them!" Not really miffed by being conned into letting your nemisis into your house, you just lightly punch her in the arm and say "Shut up" in a friendly tone.

"You just hit a girl!" she hollers, "I oughta sick the fanclub on you!"

You both let out a bemused laugh before Rebecca stumbles off in an excited hurry, "I'm gonna swing by my place and get changed!"

"Swell..." you roll your eyes as she waddles off as fast as her chubby legs can take her. You can't help but notice how big she was getting, even from a distance you could see those big blubbery calves of hers struggling to fit into her socks. From underneath her skirt (not that you were some kind of pervert or anything) didn't do her hamhock buttcheeks any dignity, with every step those meaty cushions of hers would lift the garment up and reveal a new pair of panties every day (this time decorated with four-leaf clovers, if you had to guess)

For some reason...

"Nah, I better text Kate." you say aloud, shaking those thoughts from your head, "Better make sure she knows what the plan is...
---


You look over the place, your cleaning job isn't half bad all things considered. Hardwood floors mopped, counters cleaned off, Xbox set up on the coffee table, a few bags of chips and a tub or two of dip. Kate was the first to arrive, always one to keep her appointments, and had settled herself on the couch. Your meek friend quietly helped herself to some chips as she read, the TV blaring in front of her to keep something going in the background.

As Rebecca insisted, uniforms weren't allowed on Game Night (or whatever this abomination was going to be called in the book you would surely write one day) and everyone had changed into some casual wear. Kate was no exception, having ditched the blazer and short skirt for a simple t-shirt and sweats. While never fashionable, it was pretty hard for her to find clothes that looked good and fit her heavy body, so no one (except for maybe Claire) gave her a hard time.

You too had changed. Deciding to wear a plain white t-shirt, some jeans, and an unbuttoned bowling shirt. Much to your dismay, the shirt was too small to be buttoned up comfortably. And rather than look like a stuffed sausage, you decided to leave it unbuttoned. But then your chubby belly peeked over the waistband. Either way, at least this way was comfortable, you weren't trying to impress anybody.

Then the doorbell rang, undoubtedly Rebecca with your new captain...
114322.title: Game Night... Yay...

choices: Rebecca Kate and Chris eager to start swimming
Claire and The C.J fan club? How'd they get here? Chris isn't going to like this
1143221.content:
You run to the door and there was Rebecca and Christina. Rebecca, like Kate, had the same t-shirt sweatpants combo, looking ready to let loose and have some fun. Christina however had elected to sport a sky blue tank top which proudly showed off her shapely swimmers arms, (but also revealed a hint of chub that was forming around her stomach.) Although she too had wrapped her, strong swimmer legs in a pair of tight fitting sweats as well. You notice as you sneak a glance at Chris that the mix of muscle and fat had been slowly swollen her thighs large enough that they almost touched.

“Ladies come in, come in.” You greet the pair in an amusingly suave tone. As you ushered them in, Chris looked about uneasily as she followed Rebecca in to your pad. They drifted towards your large couch and plop themselves down to join Kate. Rebecca begins helping herself to handfuls of the waiting chips and dip and you have a seat in the small space between Kate and Rebecca, sitting snugly against their two titanic tushies.

“CJ this dip is fantastic!” Rebecca compliments between mouthfuls.

“Help yourself!” you say laying back and getting comfortable. ”I’ve got plenty!”

“Try some Christina….” Kate suggests setting down the magazine to get ready for Game Night.

“Uh, no thanks I actually already ate.” Christina insists. The blue haired girl’s stomach gurgled as soon as she’d said this, and from the sounds of it she was starving!

“Well maybe just a few…”she says as she tries a chip. She found that the dip was indeed delicious and her face lighted up in delight at the amazing flavor. Her mood only brightened from there, and you smile thinking that maybe pool club with Chris tomorrow wasn’t going to be so bad.

“Let the party begin!” Rebecca shouts getting ready for some gaming and the party starts! That night seemed to fly by as the four of you play video games, and then switch to watching a movie. The four of you order two extra-large pizzas for delivery and you make short work of them as the pizza disappears slice after slice. Everyone was having a blast, and you couldn’t believe it but Christina was actually smiling at you. It made you happy to actually seeing the usual cold and serious Christina warming up to you and your plus sized pals, she was even laughing!
---

Kate yawned as she looked at her cellphones clock. Then her eyes lit up at the sight, “Wow! Well it’s been fun CJ, but I got to go. I’ll see you guys tomorrow at swim club!” Kate said getting up to leave. Her rounds perky behind orbits past your face as she makes for the door.

“You’re right, it is getting pretty late.” Rebecca adds removing her heft from beside you on the couch. “Got to be prepared for swim club tomorrow you know.” She jokes towards Chris.

“See ya CJ!” They both sing as their plump bodies squeeze through your doorway, leaving you and Chris alone.

Terrified, you panic as Christina’s semi-hefty figure limbered closer to you on the couch.

“Well um…thanks for having me CJ.” Chris begins softly now close enough you can see the. “Much as I hate to admit it, I actually had a good time tonight.” She’s close enough now that you can see the small freckles that cover her cheeks; and smell her blue hair that still has the refreshing cool scent of the pool.

“N…No problem.” you say amazed that there was warm and kind side to her, hidden beneath her cold facade.

“Just remember after the bell rings I’m your captain and I can’t be so buddy, buddy. Buddy.” she prods a finger into your doughy stomach and smiles. She gets up, then turns around remembering something important she had to mention. “Oh, and try not to let anyone else find out about you joining the swim club. I can’t be a swim captain and cow herder at the same time.”

You straighten up at her authoritative tone. “Yes, mam!” you say with a salute and a smile.

Chris grins back and says “That’s more like it!” and you watch as her bubbly booty bounces out your door.

The next thing you knew, school had already ended and you were at swim club. Ever since last night you’d been looking forward to swim club more and more and now standing poolside, in your swim trunks that felt a lot tighter than you remember, you were ready to start swimming. Your bad luck with Chris seemed to be over, but you were still hoping you wouldn’t do anything embarrassing in front of Chris and the girls.

Actually, now you can see more swimmers headed this way! Headed right towards you dressed in their swimsuits were…
1143221.title: A Fun Night & The First Day of Swim Club.

choices: Chris is actually able to get the fan club to listen to her!
Uh, how about no? The club takes over the swim team! Chris gets furious!
11432212.content:
Another sea was coming closer towards you, this one comprised mostly of jiggling flesh that was trying to escape from an almost countless number of form-fitting swimsuits and in front of the expansive sea of bellies and cleavage was none other than the full three hundred and twenty-one pounds of your biggest (lol) fan – Claire, who was dressed in a fancy two-piece white swimsuit that had several rose prints on it. How the swimsuit was staying on her impressive frame was a mystery to you. “CJ! There you are! Ah, what a marvelous swimsuit you have on there!”

“Uh, t-thanks,” You stuttered, standing up on the side of the pool, prepared to jump into the pool if the girls following Claire (It was a given that the girls were all on your fanclub, you recognized most of their bloated faces). “But, uh, why are they all here?”

You were answered with a flood of ‘To be with you!’, ‘To see you in a swimsuit!’ and some sprinkled lies such as ‘to enjoy the pool’. Claire just shrugged her meaty shoulders and didn’t even pay much heed to the rest of the girls. “I don’t really know, and don’t really care, after all, I got a call from Kate last night about how you three joined the swim club. I’m a little sad that you three couldn’t wait for me, but that’s alright now that I can be with you a bit longer during the day.”

That was all well and good, but there was the little matter of Chris.

You remember what she said last night, about your fan club taking over the swim club – Personally, since you had earned a shred of her trust, you’d rather not get your ass handed to you by the blue haired tomboy. But then again, it wasn’t your fault for the fan club to all appear before you in the swim club…

… And who knows? Maybe they’ll actually be serious with the swim club and listen to Chris.

Well, you were about to learn your answer, cause Chris was coming out of the locker rooms – Along with Rebecca and Kate…
11432212.title: Overflow!

choices: Let's get to practice.
After swim club.
114322121.content:
"What is going on here"? Chris asked. You turned around to see your captain and your friends in their swimsuits. Chris was wearing her usual aqua colored one-piece swimsuit which her lower half was rubbing against it. Kate was wearing a black and yellow striped, two-piece swimsuit. Which made her look like a bloated bee and was embarassed about wearing it. But it was the only swimsuit that still fits her other than the school swimsuit but that one makes her chafe. Rebecca was wearing an orange one-piece swimsuit with palm tree prints on it. She just bought it a few days ago and it already felt tight but she didn't seem to care.

"I thought I told you not to tell anyone CJ". Chris said. "I didn't tell anyone honest". You say defending yourself. "Actually Chris, last night I did tell Claire that we joined". Kate said with a guilty look on her face. Well that explains why the princess is here, but how did his fanclub find out"? Chris asked. You remember "that when it comes to you the girls of your fanclub are all seeing and all knowing.

After a few seconds Chris gathered herself and walked towards the mob recognizing a few familiar faces as some members were former members of the swim team. "Listen up, many of you joined the team or came back because of this guy over there". "I know that you fanclub members just go your own ways about doing stuff and think you can take over because you out number me, well think again"! "Here I'm in charge and you'll take me seriously or I'll personally drag all of fat hides out of here do you understand".

Then the girls started talking to each other about what they just heard while Chris turned her attention towards Claire."As for you princess, just because your the principal's daughter doesn't mean you can just walk and do whatever you want to do, either you play by rules or don't play at all". Clarie looked at her unphased by her glare. "As long I get to be with CJ we won't run into any problems sea cow". Claire said with a confident look on her face. Chris then turned her attention back to the fanclub. "And what's your answer"? She asked.

The fanclub all nodded their heads in agreement. You couldn't believe what you were seeing Chris actually had the fanclub under control and they didn't take over. She even got Claire to cooperate (to some extent). Chris then looked at you. "Its all good CJ, its all good". She said with a smile. Then you sighed a breath of relief that Chris wasn't going to bite your head off. "Alright everyone let's start swimming"! Chris said excitedly.
114322121.title: Taming the herd.

choices: “Hmmm, maybe I should…” seriously considering the idea.
“No way! Now get back in the pool!” and she punches you again. HARD!
1143221211.content:
You were quite happy to see everyone getting along, (and even happier at the fact they looked so good in their swimsuits.)
You swim a few laps back and forth still whirling along even with your new layer of pudge you’d grown since coming to Chubbeso. You climb the pool’s ladder and rest poolside letting your feet dangle in the water as you watch the others.

Wow! Chris certainly was fast! Using her wide defined arms she was tearing her way from the far side of the pool to right where you were siting. Whoa! Not too far behind her was Claire who despite her weight was surprisingly fast!

Chris pulled herself up and out from the pool, her wet beautiful blue hair matched the color of the water. “You know, CJ this wasn’t so bad.” Chris says and slaps a hand against your back (a little too hard) in a sign of her appreciation.

“Ow! He he Th-thanks Claire .” you say in return as you cringe.

“I know a lot of the girls here used to be on the swim team, but they seem to be doing even better now! You too Claire, I can’t believe how good you can swim.” Chris says sounding strange for giving Christina a compliment for once.

“Why thank you.” Claire says as she swims closer. “It’s no surprise though I am perfectly built for swimming.” She says matter-of-factly.

“What?” you and Claire ask confused.

“Just watch” she invites as she lies flat on her back, making sure the both of you are watching. Then inhaling which caused her stomach to swell even larger, she seems to effortlessly float on the water. “You see, fat floats!” True to her words her stomach as well as her two other fleshly fatty orbs raised to the water’s top.

Claire must have noticed how long you were staring at the curvaceous sight because she gives you a punch in the shoulder.

“Ow!” you say as you rub the spot where Chris hit you and you watch Claire wink at you before she swims away. Mindless thinking aloud you say “You know Chris, maybe you could use a little more weight…” Before you realize what you just said, it was too late to take back your remark.

That’s when Chris said…
1143221211.title: Pool Practice

choices: You make it to Chubbeso Academy and head to first period (behind schedule)
You're not that late and make it to breakfast with Rebecca!
You head to first period (before class) to meet Rebecca
Claire insists on picking up some food on the way...
Claire wants to take you by her mother's office...
12.content:
You stare anxiously at the unforgiving little red hand flashing before you on the sign, willing it to morph into the leniant little fellow who told you to walk. Getting antsy, you start checking your watch in ten second intervals, as if simply willing it to change would speed up the process of time. Your eyebrows crease slightly as you focus your innate frustration from your hectic school year (and slowly increasing girth over which) into your stare, hoping that the little hand would sympathize with you and make his job quick. However, it seemed that the flashing appendage on the sign actually started to blink slower. Jerk.

So focused on your staring contest with the walk/don't walk sign, you hardly seem to notice the slight tremors that accompanied your fanclub as they closed in on you (having studied your sleep habits the entire first semester). Slowly, their fat bodies waddled eagerly up to you, hoping to perhaps catch your gaze and steal your heart with their feminine wiles as their estrogen crazed bodies plodded closer and closer to the only boy in the school for them to pour their affections onto. If this was a fairer world, Chubbeso Academy would have been a co-ed school (or at least let you know they were coming with like, a neon sign or something) But unfortunately, this was a cruel and harsh world that had unfortunately granted your dream of being surrounded by women. Even now as they inched closer and closer to the object of affection, you remained clueless to their presence...

Until one of them reached out and touched your hair.

In a swift, jerking motion you turn around to face the first dread of the day: the CJ fanclub that had been established shortly after you enrolled; dedicated to studying, pampering, and above all loving CJ Dalton. Unfortunately, you were CJ Dalton. Eyes as wide as many of the dinner plates your heavyset fan girls have surely licked clean, your standing position quickly becomes a mad dash for school, a sanctuary that proved just a little bit safer than out in the rich neighborhood you had settled into. You jaywalk past the flashing sign, coincidentally only now flashing the okay for you to start walking, and run like a hysterical Kermit the Frog in your frantic dash for escape from the lovesick gaggle of lardos behind you!

Luckily, you were in much better shape than either of the ten-some-odd girls tailing you, ("How'd that big one even squeeze into her uniform?!") and escape was fairly easy. But, like a hoard of zombies, the fat girls followed you clutching their heaving chests in search of air to fill their lungs. And actually, that new paunch of yours is weighing you down somewhat! You feel tired and sluggish every morning, but only now are you starting to feel the effects of your lazy rich lifestyle as you yourself start hobbling down the sidewalk in a frantic dash for safety and adequate oxygen amounts. Finally, it happened; you couldn't run anymore.

Slowly, the chubby girls drew closer and closer to your gasping, wheezing body. You look around in a desperate attempt to find some thing blunt to start swinging (hey, act like animals, treat them like animals!) only to find that there was nothing. All you could do was lay back and accept that they had gotten you this morning... no telling what they would do to you now...

However, just as melodrama often was, the chase was shortlived as a black limo pulled up right beside you. Stepping out of the frontmost passenger seat was a rather plump woman in a chauffer's outfit. Without much hesitation, she easilly lifted your 185 pound frame and hoisted you into the back, heading back up to the front seat, sliding over to the driver's side, and immediately putting her pedal to the metal.

Dazed and confused, you look around the plushly apholstered limousine for signs of a definate answer. Not even 9 'o' clock in the morning and your day was already stranger than most people's. However as your coherency returns to you, you start to recognize the familiar purple decor around the limo and a strange wave of normality hits you; for while you had narrowly escaped the cruel faceless pan that was the CJ fanclub, you may have just been tossed into the familiar, though just as disturbing fire that was the Princess of Chubbeso academy, your absolute #1 fan girl.

You looked at her, seated directly across from your slack body laying down on her carpeted floor. Even at an astonishing 320 pounds, there was no denying that this princess had killer looks to match her killer curves. With round, rosy and appled cheeks that melded into her giblet so smoothly, resting on her huge breasts which in turn rested on a billowing belly. She was so wide that her doughy arms had been pushed out to the side, even as she sat down, in order to better acommodate her large lovehandles that hung from her waist. In her school uniform, altered of course, her chubby knees were on display as were her blubbery calves, since you were already thrown to her feet kneeling to the princess, you couldn't help but notice that she had kicked off her shoes in order to keep comfortable. Her strawberry blond hair rested upon her shoulders, frontmost layer draping all the way down to her breasts, and bunched up as she rose slightly to greet you. "Good morning CJ!" her tone was always informal towards you, considering just how highly she thought of both you and herself.

You can only smile gratefully, "Good morning Princess!" you say somewhat sarcastically, causing her to pout, "Oh CJ you know I hate that nickname, call me Claire, please call me Claire!" she giggled, causing her expanse to wobble about somewhat in her still-seated position. You slowly shift yourself to a more posture-friendly position to the seat across from Claire Masters, the daughter of your principal, and try to engage in non-awkward conversation with her; which was pretty hard with her. "Yeah, yeah, anyway thanks a lot for helping me out back there." she was always doing stuff like that, which was probably good. Whenever Rebecca and Kate weren't there to help you out with a hastily made disguise or pull you behind the counter, Claire always seemed to do a good job of fending off the hormone-crazed, man hungry blobs that inhabited Chubbeso Academy... though Claire may be more of a converted enemy than a friend like your other blobs.

"No problem, hey you wanna walk me to class today?" she asked eagerly, striking a small pose and winking at you; only for you to decline, like you always did. Every morning. Since Enrollment. Six Months ago. "Sorry, I'm meeting Rebecca and Kate outside their lockers..." you trail off slightly before realizing the inevitable, "Oh no! I'm late, they're gonna think I ditched them!!"

Claire huffed, "Hmph, Rebecca, I hate that snotty cow." she stuck out her lower lip and crossed her arms, "But since you're late, and we all so conveniently have the same home room, we can just show up together can't we!" she squealed. You could only laugh, having friends with connections really paid off sometimes. "Sounds like a plan, Princess."

"Claire, call me Claire!!"
12.title: Morning Royal Run-In

choices: The fanclub with breakfast
Rebecca and Kate with some snacks
Mrs. Kawasaki wanting to talk to you
121.content:
As soon as the limo pulled up in front of the school, you got out and closed the door.

"Thanks for the ride Clarie, but need to get to class." You said quickly.

"Okay, I need to talk to my mom anyway so I'll see you around CJ." Clarie said happily.

After that you bolted towards the entrance, made your way through halls and made it to your locker. But when you got there you quickly looked at the clock to see that its 7:23.

"Crap there's no way I'll make it to homeroom in time." You grunted. Then you gathered your things, closed your locker and walked as fast as you could to Mrs. Kawasaki's room. Unfortunately her room was on the other side of the school from where you are so you need to move it. As soon as you could see her room on the horizon the bell rang and you were late.

"Well I knew this was going to happen." You sigh. "Hope she's in a good mood today." You took a deep breath and opened the door and all eyes were on you. You saw the bulky and bubbly classmates and the behemoth of a teacher waddling towards you.

"Your late Mr Dalton." She said sternly.

"I know." You replied.

"Go and take your seat we'll talk later."

Then you went to your seat like you were told and sat down. Kate sat in front of you, Rebecca was to your left and Claire sat behind you.

"Let me guess fanclub trouble again?" Rebecca asked.

"Yeah, but Claire got me out of there before I was smothered." You replied.

"Don't get so comfy with that heffer, you let your guard around her and you might become even bigger than she is."

"I think your exaggerating a bit Rebecca."

"She's kinda right CJ." Kate whispered. "Ever since you started attending here, she's been all over you like a bad itch."

"Thank you Kate, in fact I wouldn't be surprised that she was secretly a member of your fanclub." Rebecca said chuckling a little. "Wait, make that the president of your fanclub."

"Alright, I'm going to stop this conversation right there." You said feeling a bit irritated.

After that class went on as usual. A bunch of girls staring at you with curiosity or love. Mrs Kawasaki snapping at the girls to pay attention. As well as an uneasy feeling that the fanclub would pull something. After what seemed to be a long homeroom, the bell rang and everyone started to leave. Just as you left the classroom you see...
121.title: You are late

choices: You want to try to improve
You agree and stay at her house
Need time to think about it
1213.content:
Just as every was leaving the classroom, tried to blend in with the crowd but then you felt that the iron eye was glaring at you.

"Mr Dalton we need to talk." Mrs Kawasaki said in a serious tone.

"I was afraid she'd say that." You said nervously.

"You gonna be alright." Rebecca asked.

"Yeah I'll be fine, you two go on ahead I'll catch up." You replied. Then Rebecca and Kate left the room and it was just you and Ms. Kawasaki. You were really worried about what she was going to say, but you were going to take it like a man.

"What did you want to talk about Ms. Kawasaki?" You asked.

"This is the fourth time you've been late to school this week, I can't keep letting this slide." She said sternly.

"But its not my fault its the fanclub's fault there the reason I'm always late." You stated.

"No excuses Mr Dalton, regardless of what happens its your responsibility to make it on class on time." Said Ms Kawasaki.

"Yes Ms Kawasaki." You said quietly.

"The way I see things you two options." She stated. "You could continue things the way they are and hope that you won't be late again." "Or option two you could stay with me for a while."

"What?!?" You say in shock."

"My house is only three blocks away from the school and not that far a walk from it." "If you choose to stay with me you'll have to live by my house rules and not complain about them." "If I see improvement in your attendance you can go back to living in the school dorms, but if you continue to be tardy you'll stay with me regardless of the options." She stated.

"I don't know about this." You stuttered.

"I'll give you time to think about this but I need an answer by the end of the day." "So are you going to decide now or later?"
1213.title: Talking with the iron gut teacher

choices: That night
Afterschool
12131.content:
"I'll try not being late again." You said after thinking a bit.

"Alright Mr. Dalton, but if your late again I'll either have to give you detention or you'll have to stay with me for the rest school year." Ms Kawasaki said sternly. After that you leave the classroom with a lot to worry about and eventually you catch up to Rebecca and Kate.

"How did it go?" Rebecca asked.

"Just fine." You replied.

"What did she say?" Kate asked.

"That if I'm late one more time she'll start giving me detention (you did not want to mention the other part she said to you cause it would just freak your friends out)." You replied again."

"Did you tell her that its not your fault its the fanclub's fault." Rebecca said.

"Yes, but you know she doesn't except excuses." You say in an annoyed tone.

"Oh yeah, well what are you going to do?" Kate said.

"Look I don't want to about this now, lets just go to are next class and we'll talk more after school." You said. With that being said the three of you head off to your next class and you know you've only got one more chance at being on time.
12131.title: Last chance

choices: The next day
Your fanclub was spying on you
121311.content:
Later that day you spent the entire evening preparing for tomorrow morning as you can't be late again or there will be consequences from Ms Kawaski. "Okay the main reason I'm usually late is because of the fanclub's ambushes and traps." You said. Unbeknowst to the fanclub, after every school day you write down on a diagram of the school district when and where the ambushes or traps occur.

"Okay for this to work I need to stay one step ahead of those girls and plan a whole new way to get to school." You said in deep thought. You constantly look at maps and diagrams of the area looking for shortcuts and the last place the fanclub would expect to see you. You were so busy making a route that your trash bin was full of crumbled up paper filled with failed plans and ridiculous ideas (one of them was moving in with Claire). It was about 10:45 pm when you finally came up with the perfect route in which to get to school on time and avoid the fanclub at the sametime. After you traced the route in red pen you heard grumbing noises coming from your stomach.

"Oh, looks like I've been spending so much time planning that I forgot to eat dinner." You stated. So you decided to put on some quick pizza rolls in the mini-microwave, ate them, showered and then you hit the sack. "Alright, I have to get up at 6:38 tomorrow that'll give me time to eat breakfast, get dressed and put my route into action." You said with confidence that your plan will work. Then you turned off the lights and fell asleep, for tomorrow failure is not an option.
121311.title: Planning and preparations

choices: The next day
The fanclub makes plans of their own
1213112.content:
While you were in deep sleep someone was watching you during the course of the entire evening.

"Okay we got all the info we need for tomorrow bring down the mini periscope." Said someone in the shadows.

"Alright, by the way where did we get the mini periscope again?" The other voice asked.

"We got it from a store in town plus its got night-vision." Then the two shadowy figures came out and of the bushes which reveal to be members of of your fanclub sent on recon.

"You know I'm starting to get the feeling that CJ doesn't like us or that were trying to fatten him up." Said the hefty brown haired girl.

"Don't be ridiculous, of course CJ wants to be fatten he just doesn't know it yet." Replied the large blonde. "Now come we were supposed to report back to HQ after getting all the info we need." After that the two spies left the dorms with all the info they need and you were sleeping peacefully unaware of what has happened or what will happen.
1213112.title: Plans compromised

choices: You fail to make it on time
You somehow make it on time
12131121.content:
*Ring,ring*

Your alarm clock goes off at 6:38 and you off and do your usual morning routine. Get dressed(while making sure the fanclub isn't trying take a peep), eat breakfast, brush teeth, gather your things and head out to school right after locking the door.

"Okay it now 6:53 so all that only took fifteen minutes so I'm good on time,now to put my new route into action." You said.

Then you lock your door and head out. Since distinction avenue is fastest route to the school its also where the most ambushes occur. So your plan is to take the long-way around at parks street and then cut through the alleyway(most of the girls of the fanclub are too big to fit through) and go on distinction avenue the rest of the way.

"Alright lets do it." You said with confidence.

So you take a left at the crosswalk and enter parks street. For the a little while everything was going smoothly, the fanclub was nowhere to seen and might make it on time. But at about halfway to the alley your leg pulls on a rope causing a cage to fall. But doge it just in time and realize that their on to you. You make a break for it and just as you can see the alley entrance your leg gets caught in a rope trap leaving you hanging on a tree branch.

"Oh come on!" You shouted.

You hang there for a while when you see the girls closing in fast. But thankfully you manage to untie the knot(with previous experience of being tied up before) and make into the alleyway and hide behind a dumpster. You also look at the time.

"7:35!!" You said in shock. "Was I really hanging there that long?" "Okay the first bell rings at 7:40 and the tardy bell rings at 7:47, I still have a little while to go but I think I can still make it."

You then dash as fast you can to make it to campus, as well as jumping over a pitfall on the other side of the alley. As you enter distinction avenue you that most of the fanclub was waiting for you and you start running like a mad man. Do you make it on time?
12131121.title: It all goes down hill

choices: To the principal's office
Having a chat with friends
121311211.content:
Once you make it to campus you jump behind a bush and loose the fanclub( thankfully the girls aren't the sharpest tools in the shed). Then you look at the time and were at what it was.

"7:38?" You said in shock. " Why is time working against me."

Afterwards you make a mad dash to your locker and at that time the first bell was ringing.

"I'm really cutting it close here." You said panicking.

Once your out of your locker, you close it and sprint for homeroom with less than a few minutes remaining. But just like last time just as you see Mrs. Kawasaki's door the tardy bell rang and once again you were late. Dealing with the burden of failure you open the door and see Mrs. Kawasaki with a somewhat disappointed look on her face as well as the rest of the class with their regular expressions towards you.

"I'll see you after school in the principal's office Mr.Dalton." Mrs. Kawasaki said in a stern voice.

"I know." You replied.

Then you quietly took your seat while Mrs. Kawasaki did role call.

"What's she going to talk to you about CJ?" Rebecca asked curiously.

"I'll tell you later." You replied.

You were frantic about what was coming up because once school's over your moving in with the iron gut teacher.

After three periods of your friends constantly bugging you to tell them what's up you said that you'll tell them at lunch. But apparently they can't wait that long, just then the bell ending fourth period ended and the three of you left for your next class.

"Come on CJ just tell us what's going on." Rebecca said pestering you.

But just before you could say anything a very familiar shaking sound came forth followed by being hugged into a very familiar chest. Which of course was Claire being her usual self, normally you wouldn't mind this but you just weren't in the mood right now.

"Hi there CJ." Claire said in a perky voice.

So you tell the three girls what Mrs. Kawasaki said to you yesterday and they took it rather well (sarcasm).

After that the four of you went in separate directions for your last few classes then school ended. You went the principal's office afterschool and signed some papers regarding your new living arrangements. When that was done you went to your apartment and gathered your things and headed off.

"I wonder what Mrs. Kawasaki's like after school hours?" You thought to yourself. Well you were about to find out.

With that you grabbed one of her pudgy hands and started pulling as hard as you could and pretty soon you got her out of there. After that Mrs. Kawasaki told you to put your stuff in the guest room down the hall and to meet her in the living room after that.
