12131121121.title: Same old same old

choices: You examine the photos on the table (Pre-Chubbeso Mrs. K and her ex-husband)
You try to make akward small talk. You both eat to fill in the silence...
121311211212.content:
The carpet in Mrs. Kawasaki's house was a little drab.

Stiff and unyielding, much like the Iron Gut herself, it wasn't very comfortable to step on. It had a strange color to it, almost a dirty tan color but with a hint of banana yellow. There was a single rug, an ugly long brown one at that, in the middle of the hallway which ran evenly between two other doors. One was a bathroom, as you had inquired earlier, and the other a study (as the door had been left ajar, as if used recently and forgotten to be fully shut.)

The guest room, your room, was down the hall.

Taking a deep breath and gripping the thick fabric that made up the handle of your luggage, you exhale listlessly as the situation sinks in. For the second time since leaving home, you were leaving home. While by all means not your actual home back in the States, the grandoise apartment that Headmistress Masters had set you up with had become very much a second home to you. Your friends would come over nigh constantly, a good majority of your stuff had to be scattered amidst their own abodes, and things were warm. As you opened the door to what would be your new room, your thoughts were but whispers of forboding misery to come.

Things weren't warm at all; as you found the room was an antithesis for the imagination, with offwhite walls and a dull ray of light across the carpet. A lonely wooden desk sat in the corner, next to a window, its only mates being the undersized dresser that matched the sullenly bland bed donned in equally abysmal gray sheets. Luckily you had packed some decorations of your own along with your computer, but you doubted that Mrs. Kawasaki would allow you to perform a total overhaul on the room itself.

Sliding the wheels across the thick floor fur, you let your luggage stand straight up as you collapsed into your matress. While it was far from pretty, you were pleasantly satisfied to find that your sleeping conditions might not have been as terrible as you'd have believed them to be. While it looked like a rock, the matress provided for you was actually quite soft. Two pillows on the bed, goosedown if you weren't mistaken, as well as a noggin-sized cushion made of memory foam. Not bad, all things considered.

You looked up, the still overhead light hovering over you like the snapshot of a helicopter. You hadn't bothered turning on the lights, you didn't plan on spending much time in here anyway. If at all possible, you wished you could be with your friends right now. Becca, Kate, Claire, hell even Beatrix if she'd have you.

You were going to miss having an awesome apartment where all your friends could come over whenever they wanted at any time they wanted, having grown quite accustomed to a lack of a suitable schedule during your enrollment at Chubbeso Academy. Somehow you didn't believe that the blubbery brick wall downstairs was going to allow you much leniancy when it came to matters regarding anything other than schoolwork.

"Mr. Dalton?" the wall bellowed from downstairs, "If you're finished unpacking, we could have dinner if you'd like?"

With a heavy sigh, you could only roll off of the bed. If the decoration of your room was a precursor to how Mrs. Kawasaki treated her meals, then you were in for a bland experience and an even more bland semester...

***


Or perhaps not.

Waiting for you in the dining room was not the simple bowl of porrige or bland steaks you had anticipated before coming down the steps, but something else entirely.

The dining table was a polished, tanned miniature majestry of surfaces. A heavy dark wood made up the entire frame as well as the head, and a pristine white cloth draped from atop it and down its sides. Fine china had been used in the serving of today's meal: which consisted of a pot roast cooked to absolute perfection as it sat there succulently on its plate steaming from the middle, a medley of vegetables, and even a basket of dinner rolls between the flowers and some pictures on the table.

"So, I trust by the drool emenating from the corner of your mouth that you're ready to get started?" Mrs. Kawasaki said with a wry tone to her voice, "If you're done washing up then we should dig in."

You hadn't washed your hands, but there was really no need to tell Mrs. K that.

That would only delay the intense gratification that your mouth was about to experience.

You took your seat at the seat opposite to Mrs. Kawasaki, being able to make out her bloated features between growing leaves and flowers. Her fat shoulders bulged from underneath her sleeveless top, her jacket having been removed upon entry of her humble home, and her entire upper half seemed hungry enough to try to get to the food itself by nibbling at the table. She looked up at you as you sat, the same cold stare she gave you in class, and heightened her eyebrows when she heard your chair scrape across the floor.

"Sorry." you quickly apologized as you grabbed the napkin set aside for you

"Just don't scuff up the floor, CJ." she chided as she grabbed her own, flabby arms jiggling slightly at their sudden movement, "I'd hate to leave trackmarks on the floor."

You reached for the roast, it being the first thing on your mind of course, before Mrs. K swatted your hand away. She grabbed your plate between her fat fingers, picked it up, and cut you off a sizable portion. You couldn't help but notice that her heavy breastline was absolutely crushing the flowers as she leaned over them, but you were torn between holding back your laughter and your intense hunger from the sight of that thick juicy slice of roast.

She placed the plate back in front of you and went back in for another piece, grabbing one about that and a half the size of yours before being satisfied with the amount of meat on her plate. You noticed that, as you went for the vegetables, she did the same. As with even the dinner rolls, she would just smack at your hand and get them for you...

"What, um," you hesitate, having never dared speak up to the Iron Gut before, "What are you doing?"

"Serving, Mr. Dalton." she said curtly as she cut into her own piece of roast expertly, "Good manners. Maybe in your time here, they'll rub off on you."

You sigh, defeated by the Iron Gut.

Suddenly that pot roast didn't look so good anymore.
121311211212.title: Abysmal Abode Abyss

choices: You and Mrs. K become very good friends and you don't want to leave anytime soon
The Masters' put a stop to this!
1213112112121.content:
The silence of the dinner was extremely awkward. You found yourself looking around at the decor. Pretty normal, nothing out of the ordinary, but I guess that's what you expect from a teacher. Your eyes land on a photo of some couple you didn't recognize. You do a double take and notice the woman in the photo looks a bit like Ms Kawasaki.... wait a second... that is Mrs. Kawasaki!!

"Dalton why are you looking at my photos?"

Damn! She caught me! How am I supposed to get out of this one?

"Uh... I was just looking a--"

"Mr. Dalton... it's time I got this off my chest; I've never told anyone other than Mrs. Masters this story. I think you need to know since you are now living here, please do not tell anyone else. I think I trust you enough that I know you won't tell."

Oh great! She was going to tell you her life story! This is going to be awful. You decide to pay attention so you don't seem disrespectful to your new host.

"Before I became who I am today, I was married to a man. His name was Hayato Kawasaki. We got married about two years before I came to Chubbeso. We soon moved to the UK where we settled down. As time went on, he became more and more disrespectful to me. It got so bad eventually... he beat me... At that point I decided it was over, and we divorced as soon as possible. I lived alone for months, I didn't have a job because my husband was an aerospace engineer and he made enough money for us already. I had a degree in Mathematics and Education, but all the schools denied me. One day I was reading the paper when I saw an advertisement in the paper. It said a school in the town of... what's the name? Oh well, anyways that school happened to be Chubbeso Academy, where I was accepted as a teacher. When I met with Mrs. Masters, I was shocked to see a woman of such... magnitude! I soon adapted to the Chubbeso lifestyle and put on all this weight, and here I am today."

"Mrs. K... I am so sorry." you say in shock

"You don't have to be sorry about CJ you didn't do anything."

You were so taken back by Mrs. K's story. You didn't expect something so tragic. You felt bad for Mrs. K now.

"It's in the past Mr. Dalton, don't worry about it." she says sounding like she wants you to ask her more about it.

"I have one question , though its not regarding your story. Why did you make me live with you when I was late. It goes against some of the schools policies?"

Mrs. K blushed a bit, not expecting you to ask such a question.

"Well you see CJ-- Mr. Dalton, in my eyes you're a good mannered young gentlemen, though a slacker sometimes, that is always there to help anyone. You have a heart of gold. In a sense-- I know this may sound weird-- but you had the traits of a husband I had always wanted, sorry for sounding so forward. I just wanted to get to know you a bit more so I could have seen what it could have been like to have a proper husband."

You're blushing very heavily. Surely she couldn't think that highly of you. To be her husband (Sort of) as a punishment for being late!?

"T-thanks Mrs. Kawasaki for saying I'm like that."

"Oh it's nothing CJ, all the teachers think so highly of you anyways."

"Mrs. K?"

"Yes CJ"

"Friends?"

"Yes CJ we can be friends, I'll try to serve you as best I can. I will do anything to my hus-- I mean to ensure my guest is happy."

Ever since that first conversation, you and Mrs. K have gotten to know each other a lot better. Every dinner time you shared embarrassing stories about your friends, while Mrs. K told you stories about the teachers in the school. As you get more and more comfortable living there, you notice that Mrs. K has given you more food, perhaps its just the Chubbeso talking.

You approached the door, he dreaded the thought of living with Mrs.Kawasaki. You approached the door and rang the doorbell. A loud "Come in." was all heard. You opened the door, as he walked in he triped over a box and fell straight first into a dirty laundry pile. Of course knowing your luck you fell face first into Mrs. Kawasaki's dirty underwear. It took you a second to realize the large smelly garmet wasn't a towel and threw it away in disgust. As you got up he noticed something that he thought he would never see from Mrs. Kawasaki... The house was a mess. Old pizza boxes were scattered everywhere, 2 liter coke bottles were almost in every room of the house.

Then you heard from the other room "Take that camper!" as he walked in. You could not believe his eyes there sitting between old pizza boxes and bottles of coke was Mrs. Kawasaki..... Playing Xbox! You sat there as Mrs.K dominated the game (while yelling a few obsenities at some teenagers while playing). The spread was rather nice, if you said so yourself. Rows of buffet lines stretched from wall to wall,sparkling clean and in pristine condition. You always found it shocking how clean they kept this place despite the hounding students who filled themselves with food every day, some sloppier than others. Due to the early hour of the day, however, the area was, for the most part, deserted. After all, it was homeroom. Claire smiled at you as she handed you a plate filled with heaping, steaming food. "Here, have some of this. I prepared it for you my--"

"C'mon, Claire, let him choose what to--are those mushrooms?" Rebecca swiped the plate from Claire's chubby hands, helping herself to a quick mushroom omelet.

Kate just had bowl of oatmeal, or perhaps it would be more accurate to say she had a heaping plate of sugar served with oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, and some donuts for good measure. Alas, you were left with food as well, but Claire insisted on feeding you herself. After stuffing you with pancakes, you felt bloated, if not close to the breaking point. Claire shoved twice that amount down her own throat, but she was also just short of twice your mass.

You excused yourself to puke out your food, finding it rather difficult to hold THAT much food down. How did these insane girls do it all the time? The school system had rows of private bathrooms, which, unlike public restrooms ordinarily, were all isolated. You could do your business, and no one could do anything. All locked from the inside, perfect for privacy. This came in handy when you were one of the few boys in an all-girls academy.

You tumbled into the bathroom, ready to purge yourself, only to find....

12411.content:
Probably one of the most beautiful girls you had ever seen. Ever.

No, seriously. Ever. She was pretty enough to stall your intentions of purging yourself long enough for the thought to be completely cut-and-pasted with the thought of just how lovely this one girl's face was. Even from your position (the fourth bathroom from the right) contrasted to her's (the first from the left- not so much a great distance but far from face-to-face) her good lucks were set to kill.

She had long, platinum blonde hair that fell down to her back. It looked so smooth and silky soft, like she could brush up against your face and not feel a thing. Her skin was pale, but not in a way that suggested she lacked any sort of sunlight. In the way a doll was pale, or the way that fine china was pale. And she was thin too! Hard to believe in this sort of institution, but yes, this girl had a perfectly sculpted body! Wrapped up in her Chubbeso uniform, the plaid green skirt hung just above those slender thighs that moved so seamlessly. It had been a long time since you'd seen such a cooperative, well adjusted thigh that didn't jiggle or wobble. Her slender figure, fully accentuated by her tight Chubbeso jacket, was a near perfect hourglass that kept her toned arms (presumably toned, you'd imagined that they were toned anyway) help high. Just from the back of her, your heart started with the standard Hannah-Barbara response of threatening to leap out of your chest. But then...

She turned around.

The soft blond locks of hair curled up at the front, dangling attractively in front of her face. Her big blue eyes looking innocently in your direction, yet they seemed to be looking past you. Fully turning around, you notice the moderately large pair of breasts that she'd been carrying. Nothing like you were used to now, but still quite nice. However while you were busy eyeballing her, the mysterious girl had started towards you. Instantly, you felt your brain go completely dead. You had been reduced to something completely lifeless and devoid of any thoughts. You had plenty of feelings though, mostly of lust and testosterone-driven fantasies of what you would like to do to this amazingly hot student; the only, save for you (kinda), thin attendant of Chubbeso Academy!

"Hello." she said innocently, those big blue eyes of hers remaining round and jovial. From her introduction, you guessed that she wasn't a local of Wales, her accent suggested that she didn't speak the native English. That explained it, she was a foreigner! "My name is Delphine Shuzumiya, and I am new here." from the expanded dialouge, you would have guessed something along the lines French controlled areas, maybe from the big Eiffel Tower itself- Paris! "Pardon me but, is Chubbeso Academy not a school for... girls?"

Oh crap. She was actually talking to you. Not only that, she was looking at you too! Stay calm, there was no need to panic. Just show the really hot girl that you can engage in normal conversation and she'll be sure to think you're normal. Just take a deep breath and let out a reasonable, intelligent response to her innocent query...

"Huh?" was all you could muster from your drooling lips.

"Chubbeso Academy, it is a school for girls, non?" she repeated, as if you were the one who didn't speak English. "Oh, uh, yeah it is!" you stammer, cursing yourself for seeming so brainless. Delphine tilted her adorably blonde head slightly and furrowed her eyebrow, "But aren't you... a boy?" she narrowed her eyes at you questioningly, causing you to panic somewhat. "Oh uh, yeah I'm a boy, and yeah this is a school for girls!" you start to sweat somewhat, "But you see, I uh, well, it's a uh... well, actually, I'm not too sure why I'm here either." you laugh slightly, as does she let out a slightly amused giggle. "Oh, are you that smart; to get into a school of all girls?" she ribs you, now that you are directly in front of her- the object of your affection stands a good three inches taller than you. "I guess some guys are just lucky." you lie. You were NOT lucky. Until now that is...

"A-Anyway, I'm CJ Dalton." you stutter, was that polite enough? Sure it was polite enough. Or was it a little wierd to throw your last name in there like that. How many CJ's were there in the school? Why did you just have to put in your last name?! Only LOSERS introduce themselves with their last name when not prompted to! How could you be so stu- "Oh, I had a friend back home with the name CJ." she says in a friendly manner, "Of course, her name was short for Chi Jikuro, and with my terrible accent I practically butchered the japanese language." Delphine giggled as she recounted. "Wait, you're Japanese?"

"Oui, on my mother's side." she stated matter-of-factly, "But I am French on my father's side, so I spend a few years with each of my parents." You let slip an excited "Wow!" before going completely otaku on her. The thought of having someone who spoke fluent (kinda) japanese and french was pretty cool! However, just because she was japanese (half no less) didn't mean she was just going to accept your animanga obbsession. But regardless of your excitable behavior, Delphine smiled warmly towards you, "Oui, ma mere sends me all kinds of things from home, perhaps you would like to see them sometime?"

You can only let out an excited squeak, real items from the orient?! COOL. "Oh, uh yeah sure!" you say a little too enthusiastically. Something had to be wrong with her, no one was this perfect! "Bon oui!" she said excitedly, "But first, I believe I should make my way to my first period, CJ Dalton, I have no idea where I'm going you see, and-"

"I could show you around you know." you slip, expecting her to back away slowly

"Oh how sweet of you, but I couldn't bother; you should be in class too, non?." she says, nearly crushing your dreams, "Besides, I'm sure to find Madmoiselle Kawasaki eventually."

You feel your heart race once again. She had your first period...

Epic Win.

"Oh hey, that's my first period!" you say excitedly

"Bon Oui!!" she cheers, "I guess we can walk to class together then!"

You feel your face turn beet red as she grabs your arm, "Lead the way, CJ Dalton!"

Epic-er Win.
12411.title: Tu parlez Francias? Delphine does.

choices: At lunch, Delphine eats daintly, but is coaxed into eating by Rebecca
You get to know Delphine more, and realize she loves seeing you eat...
124112.content:
The sensation of her delicate fingers pressing into your softer arms sent trembles up your spine. As you walked her into your classroom, you saw everyone's expressions change upon entering. The teacher glanced at you with a mildly off-handed look, the woman massive and wider than any of her students. "You two just avoided being late," she said, a sly grin adorning her face as the bell rang.

You took a seat by Rebecca and Kate, Delphine taking a seat behind you, leaning her head in her hands as she stared over at you. Her eyes seemed to be gazing off into a strange, foreign world, a world that happened to be right in front of you, a world she could only see by staring at the back of your head.

"Don't look now, but you have a new fan girl," Rebecca whispered in your ear.

"What?" you laughed her off. Truthfully, you wouldn't mind if she was a fan girl. She was, after all, quite the cutie.

After class ended, Delphine left to go to another room, waving as she walked off. "I'll see you later!" she called back, the two of you having exchanged phone numbers.

As you waved after her, Kate and Rebecca approached, looking at you with mild concern. "What's wrong?" you asked.

"How is that girl so skinny?" Kate asked, confused.

"Eh, metabolism maybe? What does it matter?"

"It matters a lot, actually," Rebecca said, resting her arms on her substantial belly, "How many skinny girls have you seen here since you came?"

"Well, point taken, but it's a rarity I--"

"Do you think she might be breaking in from another school?" Kate considered.

"Either that or she's bulimic," Rebecca replied, nodding.

"Or she's just an ordinary girl!" you defended.

"Ordinary for the outside world? Definitely. In here, though, she may as well have four heads."
124112.title: Paranoia

choices: digging in graciously, even going back for seconds! Oh no, what has Becca done?!
turning down the offer, she had a big breakfast. What? she's giving it to you?!
1241121.content:
"Ooh well lookie here, it's CJ Dalton: Big Man on Campus!" a hip young woman behind an oven off in the distance shouts. She has no problem leaving the large appliance unattended, and comes to greet you shortly after her outburst. And while she didn't notice it, several women rushed to take her place so the kitchen didn't catch on fire. Again. The busty woman struggles to shoulder past one of her extra large co-workers and nudges her way into your line of sight. She, very much like Delphine, had remained thin throughout her duration at Chubbeso Academy. Which in itself was shocking, considering how thanks to her no one else did. "How long's it been, two, three days?"

"It's been since lunch yesterday, Bunnie!" you go along with her little game and correct her, "But hey, it seems so much longer than it really has been doesn't it?" She giggles at your innocent banter, "Oh come on now CJ, I don't think you started holding up the line just for me to flirt with you, how 'bout some lunch?" And as always, your hearty appetite can't pass up one of Bunnie's dishes. You accept heartily and the line starts flowing behind you, having held it up a considerable amount of time ribbing with your lunchlady. The smell of your designated meal fills your nostrils as the steaming plate of meatloaf stews in it's own delicious juices on your plate. Just looking down at it now you notice the little bits of tomatoes and onions that someone, Bunnie no doubt, had painstakingly chopped up and sprinkled about the loaf. Without even tasting it, you knew what to expect. Perfection. And it made your mouth water.

"CJ?" Rebbecca's voice pipes up from behind, snapping you from your trance. "Oh, uh, Rebbecca!" you stutter, trying your best to keep the drool in your mouth as the soft images of meatloaf fled your mind, "Sorry, I uh, skipped breakfast this morning..." you chuckle meekly at the end of your weak defense, only for your tubby friend to give you a glance-over, "Yeah, and then the Royal Sow treated us all to a killer buffet, remember?" she balanced her own tray in one hand while placing the other one on the remains of her hip, long ago buried underneath her muffin top and other various folds. "Well yeah but, I..." you struggle to form words as you turn a bright red, "Hey, I'm a growing boy!" you finally manage after a long string of failed sentences. Rebecca giggles and playfully pokes your slowly expanding potbelly, "Yeah, but are you growing up or out is my question, Chunky." she teases.

"H-Hey!"

"Whatever." she says nonchalantly as she stabs your loaf with her fork, taking a large portion of your lunch and placing it into her mouth. "H-Hey!!" you shout again, louder this time, only for Rebbecca to chew her food while stifling laughter. As she swallows, she chokes out, "Hey look, it's that Delphine girl!" While initially you considered Rebbecca may have just been teasing, your gaze follows her finger and sure enough, there was Delphine. But amongst all the other round tables that accommodated equally round students, Delphine was seated in the far back with no one around her. The cream-colored tablecloth only bore Delphine's plate and five empty seats arranged in a circular pattern. "Hey, why's she sitting all by herself?" the blobby brunette girl asks aloud, "Think we should go sit with her?" you ask, only for her to scoff. "Of course we should, she seems nice!"

"I thought you said she was bulemic with four heads?" you quip back, narrowing your eyelids to emphasize your point, "I said she might as well have four heads, and either way it looks like all those heads are pointed at you." Rebecca points as inconspicuously as she can to reveal Delphine looking at you from across the cafeteria with those big blue eyes of hers. The sight of those crystalline orbs aimed directly at you makes your face burn a hot red. "Well I guess we don't have much of a choice now, do we?" you try to feign reluctance, try to seem like you're not excited, but Rebbecca knows you better than that, "Oh come on, you know I know you want to go sit with her." she says playfully. "A-And what's it to you if I do, huh?!" you combat rather sharply, sending a quiver down Rebbecca's expression. "Oh, no reason." she hints, "No reason at all... I'll just go tell Kate and Claire that we're all gonna sit with Delphine today." she says, seeming somewhat off hand as her mighty form waddles further down the dining area towards your usual table.

"Well that was wierd." you murmur, resuming your trek towards Delphine's lonesome table.
***

"Oh, CJ Dalton, I thought you were coming over to see me."

"Well I guess you thought right, can I take a seat?"

The smile on Delphine's face becomes much more noticeable as you inch closer to one of the plastic chairs that surrounded her, filling up the apparent emptiness with your company. "Of course, why would I turn you away, non?" she scoots over somewhat. Wait, did she think you were fat? Is that why you needed so much room? Because you were fat?! Wait, hold on, that's stupid. She just didn't want to touch you. That's it, she didn't want to come into contact with you! How terrible! You had already disgusted this hottie with your simple presence!

"Well take a seat!" she says, snapping you out of your worries, "I have heard wonderful things about the head chef inside, are the rumors true?" her gaze seems to numb you, but at the same time keep you nimble, "Oh, Bunnie?" you point towards where you guessed she might have been, "She's awesome, I mean really awesome. We play video games every chance we get, she's really cool." this brings you back to the meatloaf, which you still haven't got a chance to sink your literal nor proverbial teeth into. "Video games?" Delphine repeats in that cute accent of hers, "The headmistress allows le personnel to have video games?" You blush slightly as you prepare your answer, repeating it quickly in your head to make sure this comes out right, "No, she comes over to my place with my friends, she's really good at Tekken 6."

"Scandalous!" she teases you, "CJ Dalton having an affair with an older woman?"

Immediately you start to turn beet red, embarrassment levels reaching fatal stages. Great, now she thought you were some kind of pervert. "Well, I, uh, you see-" when both of you seemed to notice a sudden outbreak of tremors coming from behind you. "Why yes, yes he is." a familiar voice emanates from behind you. The vibrations caused by this particular speaker were immense, and very familiar to you now after a few dozen rounds of her sneaking up on you, covering your eyes and shouting "guess who". You didn't even have to turn around (and get a face full of her billowing jelly belly) to know that it was Claire Masters. Jealous fan girl numero uno (or rather nombre un, all nationalities considered)

She wraps her meaty arms around you and forces the back of your head between her mammaries, the engorged milk sacks deafening you with soft flab. "Oh CJ I missed you so much this morning!" she squealed, "Why'd you bail on us?" she asks in a normal tone of voice before Rebbecca succeeds her from behind and yanks her off of you, "He probably had to use the bathroom with all the crap you stuffed him with." she says satistically. Kate followed closely behind, waddling with even less grace than usual as she heaved around both her enormous belly and breasts along with a haul of her own, Claire's and Rebbecca's food. "G-Girls?" she peeped, her poor little head hidden behind a mountain of food so big even she couldn't devour it all.

"Ah, CJ Dalton, you are quite the ladies' man apparently!" Delphine giggles before Claire yanks the waify blond from her seat, "Outta my way, Frenchy." she snorts as she plops her sizable butin in Delphine's place, using her chubby fingers to both inch Delphine's plate closer to the nearest available seat (beside Kate) and the rest to get all up in your junk. Delphine was surprised, but somehow managed to keep her cool and took the seat graciously. "So, I am Delphine Shuzumiya, and I can guess that you are all CJ's friends?"

Rebbecca nodded, flicking Claire across the fat cheek from behind your neck, "Yeah, I've known CJ since we were little kids, Kate too. We go way back." it seemed a little odd for her to just blurt that out, especially now that she was grabbing at your shoulder. She never did that! Delphine was silent for a bit before continuing, "And you, Madmoiselle..." the Princess, a little offended that she had yet to learn her magnificent name, finished her sentence rather curtly, "Claire." she grunted through a bit of chewed up food. "Ah, excusez-moi, Claire', how do you know CJ?

"Lovers" she said in a breathy voice, whispering it into your ear loud enough for Delphine to get the picture. She just laughed and started pecking back at her food; seeming like she felt a little out of place with such good friends surrounding her. If you had to guess, she must have felt somewhat like a third wheel or a tag-along. "Delphine!" Rebbecca suddenly burst, "How have you not eaten your meal yet?!"

Everyone looked down to the french girl's plate, realizing that not only was it poorly portioned, but it was hardly touched! "No wonder you're so skinny!" Claire huffed, "Luckilly I'm more than enough woman for CJ to handle, riiiight?" she inched closer to you, struggling to lift up her massive hindquarters. "Please, don't sit in my lap again?" you beg. Delphine giggled before...
1241121.title: Quite the Lady's Man

choices: After class, Delphine helps you get away from your fan club...to talk...
After class, Rebecca talks to you personally, and is jealous of Delphine...
12411211.content:
Delphine smiled, forking food into her open mouth. She chewed, slowly, allowing the flavors to ooze over her tongue. There wasn't a distinct point where she became a ravenous beast, but rather the development was gradual, slow. The first plate of food she had she finished relatively slowly, though faster than before, each forkful returning to her mouth a little faster than the last time. No one took notice, but, on her second plate, she started to eat a little more heavily, hastily, until she reached a third plate, at which she shoveled the food into her mouth, a girl possessed.

Even Claire, a giant ball of flab herself, couldn't help but stare in awe at how the slender, lithe girl packed the food into her stomach. She burped loudly in the climax of her meal, covering her mouth, bashfully. "Excuse me," Delphine stammered, her cheeks filled with blush.

"That might just deserve a round of applause, actually," Rebecca replied, resting her pudgy arms on the table, laughing mildly, "Where do you put all that food?"

"Well, in my stomach?" Delphine replied, unsure how to answer the question as she placed her hands on her food baby belly.

"Damn, that's pretty impressive," you stammered, eyes wide and astounded. Delphine tucked her head into her shoulders, embarrassed yet blushing in just a way that made your body swoon. What was it about her? Those eyes? There was something so damn cute a bout her, but you couldn't place your finger on one physical attribute more beautiful than the rest...
12411211.title: digging in graciously, even going back for seco...

choices: Someone bumps into you!
Delphine shows up, asking if you could give her a tour of the school
124112112.content:
After a rather boring class filled with you getting busted by the professor for passing notes (it wasn’t your fault that so many girls in your fan club kept sending you so many love notes, although, it was rather embarrassing that you had to keep reading the notes aloud in front of the class) you were speeding out into the hallway to make sure that you wouldn’t get caught by any of your fans.

Although, it was a little bit easier, since most of the fan club had gotten stuck since a large number of them were trying to get out of the door at the same time. And considering that the doorframes for the academy were made for double doors, that’s saying something about the girls here.

With a sigh of relief, you begin to head to your locker, when all of a sudden you feel a hand grasp on your shoulder. “Hey, CJ!”

For a moment there, you had thought that the fanclub had got out when you weren’t looking, but the voice had crushed that threat, so you turned around to see your usually bloated friend, Rebecca standing behind you. How she managed to get behind you without you noticing her was a mystery to you. But another weird thing was that there seemed to be a weird look on Rebecca’s plump face, like it seemed a bit redder than usual…

“What’s going on?” You ask as you completely turn towards your big friend.

“Do you wanna hang out somewhere?” Rebecca asked back with a slightly uneasy smile on her face.

“Sure,” You replied rather quickly, knowing full well that there was probably no ulterior motive to this invitation. “Where are we meeting Kate?”

“Uh, actually, I wanted to talk to you personally,” Rebecca answered back, folding her arms behind her meaty backside. “Cause, uh, when was the last time that we…”

Before Rebecca could finish that sentence…
124112112.title: A Growing Concern

choices: You guide Delphine throughout the whole school; where you run into...
Skip to tonight, where everyone comes over to your house for some geeking out!
1241121122.content:
"CJ!!" A by-now familiar and welcomed accent fills the hallways (over the grunts and grumbles of all the fat girls trying to unwedge themselves from the doorways). It was Dephine, who while she had a different fourther period than you, had come to meet you outside of Algebra class. "Delphine!" you match her excitement as she eagerly bounces over to you. Literally; bounce, bounce, bounce, man she had a big chest for such a skinny girl! Said slender frame stopped as she met you and Rebecca in the hallway with a big smile on her face, "CJ, Rebecca, I have had the most wonderful time at this lycee!" she giggled

"Hey, that's great Delphine!" you cheer, "What's your fourth period?". Rebecca couldn't help but roll her eyes at the sight of you two, not that you would have noticed what with your eyes bulging out of their sockets and everything. "Cuisso- um, excusez-moi, cooking!" Delphine said merrilly, "I haven't gotten to touch a stove yet, but I got these wonderful cookies!" she gesticulated very oddly, not like before. Almost like she had been shot up with something between lunch and now.

Rebecca smiled, somewhat amused at the situation, "Yeah, I had cooking last semester." she said in a forced tone, "That's why you're so hyper, Ms. Telleri's cookies are loaded with sugar and crap." she let out a small chuckle before asking how many she had eaten. "N-Neuff..." Delphine said in an embarrased voice before holding up her fingers for the translation: Nine. Nine cookies?! Where did this girl put it all?! "A-Anyway!" you were plenty eager to change the subject off of Delphine's appetite. The thought that the skinniest girl in the academy's greedy belly getting the better of her was the last thing you wanted to think about right now! "S-So what's up Becca, you wanted to ask me something right?"

"Well yeah, I just wanted to know if, well, um..."

"Oh, CJ!" the overstimulated foreigner grabbed at your arm like a cat at yarn, "I left my purse in Madmoiselle Telleri's room!" Rebecca's speech fumbles, growing quieter as Delphine stole her spotlight once again. "Well that's no big deal, me and Becca can just walk you down there and-"

"Oh, hey, I'll get it!" Rebecca suddenly pipes back up, starting ahead of you and your sugar-fingered escort. "A-Are you sure, that's a long walk you know?" you ask, only for her to respond with a smile, "Hey, no big deal, I'll get it back to you when we all head over to CJ's for game night!" she said in a rather aloof tone of voice. Delphine suddenly decided to calm down a bit, "Oh, non non, it's not a problem, besides it would feel weird asking another girl to go hold my purse for me." before you step in, eager to get some alone time with this jolie fille, "Oh hey, come on, it's not like she's gonna go through it or anything!" you say eagerly, "Come on, I'll show you around!"

Delphine's sugar-raddled brain seemed to process this over and, deeming Rebecca trustworthy, decided to take you up on your offer. "Bon oui!" she said excitedly, "Thank you so much Rebecca, I will see you tonight at CJ's flat?"

"Sure thing, tonight. at CJ's..." she stuttered before waddling off down the hallway in search of her teacher's room. You turned your back without hesitation to take Delphine in the opposite direction, not noticing the exceedingly hurt expression on Rebecca's usually warm demeanor.

"Yeah... bun wee..."
1241121122.title: Not so "Bon Oui" after all?

choices: Chris then turns to Delphine... Asking her to join the swim team?
Delphine assumes Chris is a friend of yours... And invites her to game night?!?!
12411211221.content:
You couldn’t explain why you felt such an attraction to Delphine – Maybe it was thanks to her thin waist? Her exotic blood mixture of French and Japanese? Or heck, maybe you were just like any other guy and couldn’t help but feel attracted to two certain aspects on her?

Whatever the reason, you were giving this exceptional academy girl a tour of the academy, which had eventually led the two of you to the academy’s indoor pool…

“Magnifique!” Delphine gasped as the two of you entered the area. Yeah, that was the perfect word to describe it.

Indeed, the academy was known for healthy amount of funding for catering, school supplies, catering, professors, catering and property – And the indoor pool was no exception, the pool was comparable with that of those used in Olympic competitions surrounded by beautiful blue and white tiles that had fancy grooves in them. The entire room was basked in the sunlight that the very high glass ceiling provided and reflected on the cool, crisp waters of the vast pool. There was calm music playing the background (you thought it was something by Beethoven, but you weren’t a master of classical music).

More than likely, the most impressive feature of the pool, was the diving board that was near the edge of the pool – it was easily about twenty feet above the water with a lowered springboard to the right of it…

… That’s when you realized that someone was standing atop of the taller diving board, right at the edge of the board. But she didn’t stay there long, she immediately jumped off the board and spun through the air before she dove directly into the water – And to your surprise, she didn’t make much of a splash of the water.

“My, the students here sure are surprising,” the foreign student admitted with a warm smile on her face. “First a male student in an all girls’ school and an exceptional diver.”

As you were thinking to yourself how any girl could actually be a good diver, you figured that most girls here would create nothing short of a tidal wave, the girl who just dived was climbing out of the pool… And boy, were you surprised.

The first thing you saw, was her matted down dark blue (with several streaks of sky blue thrown into the mix) hair that was covering her face and onto her shoulders. As soon as she kept pulling herself from the pool, you could see that she was dressed in a black school swimsuit that covered her slightly chubby torso and small breasts (heck, they were the smallest that you saw here at the academy). At first, you thought that perhaps that there was another thin girl besides Delphine right in front of you…

… Then the rest of the girl climbed out of the pool, revealing that while from the waist up, she was only on the verge of getting big (the beginnings of that pot belly was evidence of that), it looked like most of the weight was focused on. Her flared out hips and thighs puffed from her swimsuit and it was likely the same case with her butt.

But, there was something in the back of your mind… Something yelling at you that you saw this girl before, you just couldn’t put your finger on it though. Surely you’d remember a girl this size (heck, she looked to be around your weight).

“I thought it was you,” The girl growled as she lifted her hands up to comb her hair out of her face. “CJ…”

At first, you thought that perhaps that maybe this girl was a part of your fan club, but when you saw the cold eyes that belonged to the pretty face that was uncovered, you realized that this was much, much, MUCH worse!

“Uh, h-hey! I… I…” you stammered.

“CJ? Is something wrong?” Delphine asked, either unaware that the girl in front of you was giving off a killer intent from her eyes or that she didn’t think anything of it.

Thoughts of your first day began to flood your memory… Oh, how it was an interesting day how you were late to classes and ended up bumping into this very same girl… While at the same time you managed to sneak a peak at the blue-and-white striped panties that she was wearing.

Of course, you also remember the black eye that this girl gave you… But, it didn’t stop there, you kept having bad luck with this girl, getting into similar predicaments that ended up with you embarrassing her and with you getting a new bruise…

… Heck, it wasn’t until the last incident (which involved you escaping from your fanclub and you accidentally pushing her into a nearby trashcan) that you learned her name.

“H-H-Hey, C-C-Chris,” You muttered with a cold sweat rolling down the side of your head. “I… I didn’t think you were here in the pool…”

“I’m the captain of the swim team,” Chris hissed, crossing her arms under her small chest. “And I’m practically the only member now…”

The glare that she was shooting at you was now lusting for blood…
12411211221.title: A Tour and A New (Yet Angry) Face

choices: Game Night! Woot! Everyone's having a blast! Except for Becca...
Bunnie insists on catering. Not so much "Game" Night as much as "Gain" Night...
124112112212.content:
The intense silence was broken by Delphine's amused laughing. It definately wasn't fake or forced, she actually had found something funny in this situation: the portly captain of the Swim Team's name! She giggled cutely as she repeated the name in her head over and over again after confirming that the bubble-butted shape in front of her was indeed female. "Heehee... 'Chris'... She is named after a boy in an all-girl school, et CJ is a boy in an all girl's school!" she said aloud, "This is so bizarre."

"YEAH, THAT'S MY NAME, WHAT OF IT?!" Chris snapped back at Delphine, still lost in her own little world as she continued to giggle immaturely at the blue-haired girl's handle. However, as she caught sight of Delphine's lovely shape, the icy aura around the swimmer melted into a cool gentle wave. "You know," she said with a refreshing amount of calm in her voice, "You look a lot like one of my old team mates, before she gained two extra chins and a buhdda belly and all that." she grabbed at Delphine's hand and shook it eagerly. "My name is Christina Walker, you can call me Chris, and would you mind if I asked yo-"

"My pleasure 'Chris', my name is Delphine Shuzumiya." the blonde foreigner said with a sense of forged familiarity, "And I'm sorry to hear about your team mate." the big-bootied captain shrugged it off, a luxury that must have been limited strictly to Delphine; had you mentioned anything like that to her, Chris may have left you with another black eye. "Don't worry about it!" the bottom-heavy student said in a relaxed tone, as if she hadn't been interrupted in the middle of a very important question, "It's not like you're the one who founded an entire sub-culture of lunatics with your average looks and no-doubt incredibly small-"

"CUT IT OUT!!" you shout from the sidelines of this little conversation, knowing exactly who she was referring to and exactly what would have followed that sentence. "Delphine, don't tell me you know this loser?" Chris said flatly, (admittedly) pretty face staring you down like a cockroach. "CJ?" Delphine pointed straight at you. The worst came to mind, like that she was going to denounce you in front of her new friend. Of course she'd rather be friends with a girl, not some freak who was stuck in an all girl's academy! She would probably turn on you like a dime, becoming Chris' friend instead of yours, slowly growing to resent you more and more just like Chris did (even tough you still had your doubts as to why)! Oh the shame, she'd probably get loads of girls to join the swim team too, get them all skinny and get them all to hate you! What then?! You'd live an unfulfilling life as a-

"Oui, CJ Dalton est tres magnifique!" Delphine says, stepping back over to your side and grabbing your hand, "He has been very nice to me and he has introduced me to a lot of new friends today!" She turned to look at you with those big blue eyes of hers, sending another wave of spine-melting woozines throughout your body, "And I happen to think he's very beau, if I do say so myself... but I wouldn't know about his-"

"DELPHINE!!"

"Désolé"

Chris didn't seem too impressed. She crossed her arms underneath her tiny breasts and let out a huff. "Really?" she said flatly, arching an eyebrow questionably, "He's got you brainwashed too?" she let out a sigh. "Well I was gonna ask you to join the swim team, but forget it. I don't need you going on and on about CJ Dalton all day long." she said, turning on her chubby toes to turn her back on the two of you, bubble butt shifting and swaying with her steps. While you sighed, relieved that you had ecaped this one unscarred, Delphine seemed to have a very different notion of how to deal with the scathing hatred that filled Christina Walker...

"Oh, why don't you come by CJ's flat with us?!" she hollered after her, "It will be very fun, and there will be lots of other girls to talk to besides CJ, who you despise for some reason..."

Chris turned around, her gaze narrowed and sharpened directly at the outspoken girl who held you by the hand. You gulped, this one was definately not going to be pretty. Namely for you, since you're likely the one to get injured. "What makes you think I want to go anywhere with Stupid and his gaggle of fat chicks?" she hypocritcally placed one hand on her enormous hip, pivoting her pelvis so that her chubby belly jutted out a little bit further.

"The lunchlady will be there..." she said, proposing a weak arguement to combat Chris' reluctance.

However, that seemed to work for some reason. Chris had once tasted something marvelous from Bunnie Blake's kitchen: a shrimp medley with light sauce and heavy basting. The thought of that dish made a little bit of drool come from the corners of her mouth as since then, she had never before had the equal to Bunnie's cooking...

1241122.content:
It was lunch time when you ran onto Delphine again, your protruding belly hitting her to the ground. Instead of being annoyed or anything like that, she just giggled and told you not to apologize.

"It's really okay" Delphine said as she got up, she then started rubbing your belly, "A nice, big man like you couldn't possible know this was going to happen"

Delphine giggled again before wrapping her arm around yours and started walking, you smiling dumbly as you were lead into the cafeteria. It wasn't until the both of you were sitting down that you got our of your stupor, and noticed your plate was significantly bigger than Delphine's small plate of chips. Your plate was large, it had two burgers on one side, a few hot dogs next to them, some dessert treats, and next to the plate were five large cups of thick-shakes.

"Is everything OK?" Delphine asked worryingly as she rubbed your arm and shoulder.

"I'm fine" you say with a lite smile, "It's just there's so much here"

"Of course!" Delphine said proudly, "A growing man like you should be eating like this every meal, and this 'Bunny' girl said she was so happy that you were going to eat more of her cooking"

You blushed slightly at those words, who were you to argue with her, and if it also made Bunny happy? You shoved down the food, so fast and messy but just shy of sending mess flying everywhere. You stopped when you noticed how fast you were eating and stopped.

"I'm sorry" you say meekly, "I must've seemed like a pig to you"

"Not at all!" Delphine said, loud enough to gain slight attention from people passing by, "A man like you should be able to eat however he wants, non?"

You smiled, how did Delphine even exist? You resumed back on your food, not as fast as before, as you looked at Delphine, who seemed to have a glaze look in her eye, what Claire gets when the two of you are alone and just look at each other.

"Such a handsome man" she said as she rubbed his back, easing the pressure, "I can get you another plate if you want?"

You couldn't give an answer before you walked of, returning with a plate that was more filled before, she smiled sweetly at you when she placed it in front of you, your old place immediately being picked up by a school assistant. Delphine stared sweetly at you as you ate, and normally all this attention would freak you out, but you kinda liked it.

"That was good" you say as you pat your belly that was starting to strain your clothes, "I don't think I've ever eaten that much"

That seemed to snap Delphine out of her stare, a look of worry appearing on her face.

"Why do you underfeed yourself so much?" she asked as she brought him into a hug, "Is there anything wrong that would stop you from eating normally?"

You relaxed into the hug as you thought of how to answer. Sure what you normally ate was normally a quarter of that first plat, which seemed like a huge gain compared to what you ate before you came here.

"I just didn't know I was being underfed" you said truthfully, "Before I cam to this school, what I ate could have been considered starving to what I normally eat"

"This is not good at all" Delphine said as she rubbed your shoulder, "Someone so underfed shouldn't be healthy, why didn't the nurse say anything, I know! We can..."

What does she say?

12411221.content:
Without another word, Delphine clasped your wrist, and dragged you off. Her thin legs were surprisingly strong, since she had no problem lugging your stuffed body out of the cafeteria, and out toward Mrs. Master's office. You could barely take this speed. You hadn't needed to run this fast since middle school. Just why was Delphine moving in such a hurry--?

Delphine stopped once she felt her companion's sweat on her palm. "Oh, I'm sorry. I got worried, so I didn't think--"

You wave off her concerns. "It's fine. I just--just--need a minute to catch my breath." Your belly and chest rose with each wheezing breath. You really had gotten out of shape.

Delphine waited for you to collect yourself before she brought you delicately to Mrs. Masters. She barely listened to the receptionist at the front desk, opening up the headmistress's door without bothering to knock. Mrs. Masters was in a conference with a parent, but Delphine remained undisturbed by this. Said parent now looked from Mrs. Masters to the incoming students, a look of surprise on her round face.

Mrs. Masters cheeks turned a muted shade of pink. "Can I help you--?"

"CJ has been underfed. His health might be at risk. We need to help him."

Delphine said it breathlessly, as though her own flesh and blood were being prosecuted and tortured. The parent glanced at your middle, then frowned. Mrs. Masters, however, gave the topic some thought.

"Have you talked to the nurse about this?"

Delphine furrowed her brow. "I assumed it would be better to bring this to your attention. I've seen people underfed, and all those nurses do is just blow off my concerns. CJ is a growing boy, and needs food."

Mrs. Masters stroked her chin one more time. "In that case, we need to see that he gets to eat enough."

Delphine took me by the hand. Her fingers were so soft, warm, and just made my belly flutter as she held it. My cheeks were red as she steered me down the hallways to the kitchen, where Bunny was eagerly concocting that night's feast.

"There you are!" Delphine pointed at Bunny, who froze in her tracks. "Do you know this boy?" She presented you.

Bunny laughed. "Hey CJ, what did you get yourself into this time?"

"So you do," Delphine confirmed, nodding to herself, "How can you let this boy eat so little?"

You half expected Bunny to reply with a "He eats normal amounts." Instead, she sadly nodded, arms crossed under her bust. "I have no idea why. He should be eating so much more. I can't force him to eat, though--"

Delphine drew up to Bunny, and handed her a wad of bills. She flipped through them, Bunny's eyes widening as she saw each face. "Now, make sure CJ eats like a normal person, even if you have to hand feed him."

Bunny nodded, eagerly. "Of course! Whatever you say, I will do it!" Glancing at you, she asked, lips curling, "Should we start now?"

"I'm not in trouble right"? You said nervously.

"Of course not we just want to talk about something". She said while laughing so hard her whole body was jiggling. "You won't have to worry about being late for class CJ my mom will right you a late pass, now lets get going".

Then began the walk to the principal's office. While walking you were a little embarrassed that Claire was clinging to you. In fact some of her body fat was rubbing against your pot belly. But she didn't mind, she actually enjoy every moment she was with you. After walking through the halls you both arrived at her mom's office.

"Come on in CJ my mom's waiting for both of us." Clarie said.

Then she opened the large doors which led to a gigantic office. Which consisted of usual things which you'd see in any principal's office and some family photos that layed on top of a wide desk in the center of the room and there the person sitting in the huge reinforced swivel chair was Jessica Masters, Claire's mom and principal of Chubbeso Academy. Despite being in her forty's she looks like time hasn't aged her a bit and looks like she has the skin of a teenager. Her long blonde hair rested on her super-sized breasts that layed on her blimp of a belly she has the largest body out of everyone in the entire school. Her belly was so big that her really flabby arms and legs were hardly visible.

"Hello Claire, son-in-law". She said with her bright red eyes staring at both of you.

"Mom"!! Clarie said loudly out embarrassment with her face beet red.

"Sorry sweetheart slip of the tongue sometimes I don't think before I say things".

"Um so what did you want to talk to me about"? You said breaking the awkward moment.

"Its about what happened this morning with the fanclub". Jessica said shifting to a somewhat more serious tone. "I know its not your fault and I'm not blaming you for any of it but you bearly manged to get away from them today with the help of my daughter". "If you keep gaining weight like you are now it will get harder and harder to get to school from your apartment without your fanclub ambushing you".

You realize that she made a good point when you first came to the school you could outrun them in a heartbeat, but now you barely have the energy to run as fast and eventually they'll catch up to you.

"Which is why me and my mom came up with one solution that will most likely help you". Claire said while said while holding both of your hands in hers. "CJ please move in with me".

Your eyes widened in shock that it came to this situation.

"Its for the best you'll be closer to the school so the fanclub won't get the drop on you". "Plus you'll be treated like a king and I'll be sure that everything will be to your liking". "So what do you say"? Claire asked with cute look on her face.

You were thinking deeply about this, on the one hand living in the lap of luxury with Claire and her mom sounds pretty alright with you. But on the other you don't know how Rebecca and Kate are going to take it especially Rebecca. Well you thought about and you give her your answer.

125111121.content:
“Mr. Dalton?” It was Emily, one of the two maids assigned to you. “Breakfast is ready.”

Your stomach purrs at the thought of food. In all the excitement yesterday you had only gotten one meal. You throw on the first outfit you find, not being too particular about your appearance, and step out of your room.

Only to realize you have no idea where to go. During the tour yesterday you were so taken by the size and opulence of the mansion you hadn't paid too close attention to where everything was. The hall you were in was two-stories tall and the damn near the length of a football field, typical dimensions for the gigantic abode. You spend what has to be at least fifteen minutes wandering around, trying to orient yourself.

By the time you'd made your way to the banquet hall (your sense of smell helped for the final part of the search) you were starving, which made the spread of food look even more delicious. It all looked so good you barely register Claire and her mother's presence there, the two obese women already well into their meals. It's only when Claire sees you and breathlessly exclaims “Good morning, CJ!” that you notice them.

“Good morning, Claire. Mrs. Masters.”

Claire's mother looks oddly reserved; she smiles and nods at you, but then quickly turns her attention back to her food, shoving another bacon strip into her mouth. You don't think anything of it as you load up your own plate (even the dishes are tailor-made for the Masters women; the one in front of you looks closer to a serving tray), but once you're eating you notice Claire seems a bit pensive and as the meal progresses you feel a distinct chill between mother and daughter.

If the food wasn't so good you might try to make a little conversation, but Bunnie's cooking was just as divine here as it was at the school and it was hard to tear yourself away from it even for a moment.

But all things must come to an end. Mrs. Masters was the first to leave the table, having to head to work early, leaving just you and Claire. By now you were pleasantly stuffed, and Claire seemed to be hanging back, nibbling on sausage rather than gorging herself properly.

“Did you sleep well?” She asked when it was just the two of you.

“Yeah. I have never felt a bed as comfortable as that.”

She started to warm up, but you could tell something was bothering her. It was a change of pace for the usually forthright and sometimes overbearing teen, and for once in your time knowing her you were in a situation where it seemed you had to lead.

“Something on your mind?” You ask her.

She says nothing for a second, but then

“I'm sorry about yesterday.”

“Yesterday?”

“In the bath.” She was blushing now. “The thing with my mom and I... smothering you.”

“Oh, yeah. Well, it's not the first time I've been overwhelmed like that.”

“I know, but the reason we invited you to live here was for your well-being and on the very first day that happens! At first I was angry at my mom for causing it, told her as much yesterday, but after a while I started thinking and I realized I'm... not entirely innocent myself. I can be a bit over-enthusiastic, especially when,” she was bright red now, “someone else is getting close to you. I get jealous.”

You weren't sure why Claire was suddenly embarrassed about this. It's not as if her feelings had ever been hidden. Perhaps she had thought of herself as just being really friendly before now. Or maybe she rationalized your keeping her at arm's length as obliviousness to her feelings.

“Because I like you CJ. Not just as friends, but in the way that makes me want us to be closer. It's why I was looking so forward to you moving in with us, but I guess we got off on the wrong foot there. And I don't want to keep repeating what happened yesterday, accidentally causing you problems and driving a wedge between us.”

You'd like to tell her not to worry, but she doesn't give you a chance before she continues.

“So I want to stop playing games and just ask you: would you like to go out with me? If you say no I'll understand, and I'll try to give you your space.”

She's staring straight at you, an intensity around her you haven't seen before.

It's sudden, but not out of left-field. You're just surprised she would be so direct.

And it is something you've thought about, wondering how you would respond if Claire ever wanted to take her usual antics to a more serious level. It wasn't an easy question to answer; there were other girls in your life such as Rebecca, and you knew about Claire's designs for you if she had her way (you looked down at your plate, where what had been a mountain of food was now just smears of syrup and assorted crumbs; even without her influence you were doing a good job fattening yourself up). A 'yes' answer was going to have repercussions in other parts of your life, but you can't say 'no' just because it was the path of least resistance.

“Claire...”

Skip to summer break
1251112121221.content:
"Okay now that the two annoyances are out of the picture, its time to make CJ all mine." Claire said as she waddled through the halls. "Hope you enjoy the show girls."

In almost no time at all Claire arrived at her room where you were waiting (because Claire wanted to talk to you about something). So she opened the door and saw you lounging on the bed while a group of maids wait on you hand and foot. One maid was feeding you a hot-fudge sundae, another maid was massaging your massive stomach, and the other maid was rubbing your shoulders. Claire couldn't help but smile at you, all those months seduction, showering you with gifts, convincing you to move in with her and fattening you up were about to pay off. Over the course of the four weeks that Rebecca and Kate were here, Claire managed to get you up to 317 lbs making you big enough to become part of the Master family, while Claire now weighs 342 lbs (why Claire didn't gain that much is because she wanted to wait until you and her became a couple that way the two of you could gain together).

"That will do it girls." Claire stated. "Let me and CJ have our privacy"

"Yes, mistress." The maids replied as they left.

Once the maids left, Claire waddled to the bed and sat right next you with her belly rubbing against yours.

"So what did you want to talk about this early in the morning." You yawned.

"Well CJ you've been living here for a while and we've been bonding for quite sometime now." Claire stated as she pressed her cleavage against your chest.

"Yes and in all honesty I've enjoyed living here." You replied.

"Glad to hear that, so I was wondering if well..." Claire paused as she reached into her cleavage and pulled out a box which had a gold wristband with your initials on it. "We could become a couple."

After a minute of thinking you realize that you and Claire have been spending a lot of time together, plus you haven't seen Rebecca and Kate at all lately, so you made up your mind and gave Claire your answer.

"Sure we could be a couple." You announced.

As soon as Claire heard those words a surge of overwhelming happiness overcame and hugged you causing you to fall over with Claire right on top of you with both your bellies pressed against each other.

"CJ Dalton you just made me the happiest girl alive." Claire as she started kissing you.

"Your welcome." You replied after there was break in the kissing.

For about an hour the two made out like there was no tomorrow with Claire squeezing the fat on your belly and having you feel her breasts. But you honestly didn't care about that anymore, all you cared about was Claire. Meanwhile back with Rebecca and Kate they were horrified to the fact the lost their best friend to a devious mastermind and they were powerless to do anything about it. They wanted to look away but if they did who knows what Abida would do to them, so they continue watching as all hope for the two continue to dwindle away into sadness and despair.
1251112121221.title: Master plan put in action

choices: Getting even with a pampered heffer (follow Rebecca and Kate)
Life as a ever growing couple (follow you and Claire)
12511121212211.content:
After a lengthy make out session you and Claire walk through the hallways to the living room where Mrs. Masters was watching TV. She then noticed the two of you and that you were holding hands which put a smile on her face.

"My, are you two kids going steady now?" Mrs. Masters asked in a playful voice as she got up.

"Yes we are mom, me and CJ are officially a couple. " Claire stated proudly. "Isn't that right handsome?":

"I guess so." You replied in a slightly embarrassed tone.

""Well this is just wonderful news." Mrs. Masters said while hugging the two of you. "Welcome to the family CJ, I just know you'll fit right in."

"But we're not even married." You said.

"Oh you know what I mean." Mrs. Masters replied in a nonchalant tone. "Now I believe this calls for a celebration, were going to Shaunty's to eat like there's no tomorrow."

"I don't think you have to make such a big deal out it." You said while scratching you head.

"Oh don't be so modest CJ, my mom is just happy that you and I are dating." Claire stated while pressing her cleavage against you. "Besides my family always goes to Shaunty's for celebration."

"*stomach growls* Well if you insist." You replied feeling a bit shy about your stomach's modesty.

"Excellent, you kids get ready while I get one of the maids to have car ready." Mrs. Masters said happily.

While all of this was going on the blob duo of Rebecca and Kate were at a loss for words by these unfolding events. Then Abida turned off the tv thinking that the they have seen enough.

"If you'll excuse me, I must attend to the mistress." Abida said in her usual stern voice.

With the Abida exited the room leaving the two girls to their lonesome. Kate was starting to shed tears down her pudgy cheek over everything that has happened while Rebecca just layed their not saying a word. In Rebecca's mind however...

"Why that side-winding, underhanded, pampered pig." Rebecca thought to herself. "She had this planned from the very beginning didn't she and now CJ is dating that butterball." "You better watch your back princess because this is far from over."
12511121212211.title: Celebration and loss of a friend

choices: Mrs. Masters wants to talk about vaction
Mrs. Telleri is there as well
125111212122112.content:
It had been about a week since you and Claire became an item and things have been a bit busy with finals. Despite her appearance Claire is actually one of the top students at the academy (being the daughter of the head mistress you expect no less) and helped you study. After a stressful few days, you passed all of your classes along with Claire. Mrs. Masters held a pizza party to celebrate, though you don’t remember much of it due a massive food coma. With the first day of summer vacation upon you things were about to get lively.

“Master Dalton its time to get up.” Said a maid.

“Uugh already.” You reply as you opened your eyes.

*gurgle* *gurgle*

“Man I think I had too much food last night.” You said while rubbing your massive stomach. “Claire stuffed me like a turkey.”

“You know how excitable Claire can get when she is in a good mood.” The maid stated.

“Believe me I know, this gut is a result of that happiness.” You remarked.

“Anyway breakfast is ready.” The maid stated. “Once I help you get dressed you can go down and eat.”

With that said another maid appeared before you and helped you out of bed while the other maid went into the closet to get some clothes and proceeded to take of your pajamas then put on your clothes.

“These clothes are feeling a little tight.” You said feeling a little pinch from the pants.

“This is just a sign that your growing nice and big.” The maid replied while struggling to button your pants.

After a few minutes the maid finished putting on your ensemble of a light gray shirt and khakis. With that, you thank the maids and proceed to leave your room. As you open the doors however you get ambushed by a pair of lips and fall to the ground. Then you realize that is Claire with her usual morning greeting.

“Morning handsome.” Claire said in a sexy voice.

“Do you really need to greet me like this every morning?” You asked.

“Just when I feel like it.” Claire replied.

After that short talk Claire gets off of you and the maids helped the two of you on your feet and then left the room.

“Hey, Claire maybe today we can see how Rebecca and Kate are doing, I haven’t seen them in weeks.” You stated.

“Oh I wouldn’t worry about those two I think they’re doing just fine.” Claire replied. “Anyway Bunnie has made a pancake breakfast, so lets get moving.”

With that, Claire held your hand and the two of you proceeded to the dining hall to enjoy breakfast and summer vacation.
125111212122112.title: First day of vacation

choices: Beach trip in Greece
Chocolate factory? Must go!
1251112121221121.content:
Mrs. Masters sat at the table, eating a large tray of pancakes. Upon seeing you enter, she gestured for the maids to prepare Claire and you some. You were hesitant at first, but then dug right in, filling your mouth with syrupy breakfast.

"I suppose you'll be wanting to go on a vacation after such a tough school year?"

"Hmmm?" You half weren't listening. The pancakes were too good to allow outside thoughts to distract you. After swallowing, you resisted the temptation of shoving the seventh pancake into your maw.

"Vacation. I figure we could arrange a trip to Greece, this year. Or maybe, if you want, England." Mrs. Masters' smile widened. "Or perhaps Holland. We have friends there who own a chocolate production company."

All these possibilities sounded amazing. Your mouth watered especially upon hearing about the factory. Still, you held back for just a little. "Well, yeah, but whatever you want is fine with me."

Claire smiled, after about twelve pancakes. "You're so cute when you're indecisive. But really, let us know. We choose all the time. You haven't had that freedom. The life of luxury is new. And I see it's having a good effect on you." She plunged a finger into your tummy, going two knuckles deep at least. She giggled.
1251112121221121.title: Mrs. Masters wants to talk about vaction

Your mom will be joining us.
12511121212211211.content:
After gives it some thought you came to a conclusion to where you would want to go.

“I’d like to go to Greece.” You stated.

“Good choice, I’ll have Abida arrange transportation for us.” Mrs. Masters stated.

“Eager to see me in a bikini are you CJ?” Claire asked jokingly. “Well you are going to help me; I want your opinion on the swimsuits I try.”

“Sure, but that can wait until after breakfast.” You replied.

With that the three of you continued to chow down on pancakes until they were all gone. Once breakfast was finished Mrs. Masters left with Abida to arrange the trip while the you went with Claire to her room for a bit of a fashion show.

“Hey Claire, I’ve been curious about something.” You said

“What is it CJ?” Claire replied.

“How did your family become so wealthy?” You asked.

“Well it all goes back to my great-great-grandfather trying to find some unclaimed land near the British mountains.” Claire explained.

“He discovered that the land was extremely fertile and decided to settle down here. Eventually other people heard about his good fortune they went up the mountains as well to get a piece of it and a town was established. It was four years later when my great-great-grandfather was tending his garden. He went to his tool shed when he noticed that the ground he stood on felt a bit loose. It was actually a sinkhole, but he found out too late and fell in. Thankfully he did not fall too far and was not injured, when came to he discovered that his property was underneath a large vein of silver. There was so much there that he wouldn’t have to work another day in his life and the rest is history.”

“You mean he and his children became lazy and fat.” You replied

“Pretty much.” Claire said nonchalantly. “But enough of the history lesson and back to what is important.”

After that the two of you arrived at Claire’s room where she was excited to do a little fashion show for you. Then you got comfy on her bed and Claire went into her walk in closet with two maids.

“Now no peaking CJ.” Claire said jokingly. “Actually I don’t mind if you do.”

Then Claire tried on an array of swimsuits raging from one piece to bikinis and in different colors. You preferred the two piece outfits and had mix feelings on them, ranging from good to bad.

“CJ this is my last one.” Claire said.

“Okay *much* Claire.” You replied while munching on an after breakfast snack.

Then Claire exited out of the closet revealing a neon green bikini with matching sandals and hat.

“So what do you think CJ?” Claire asked while shaking her belly around as if she was a belly dancer. “I know green is your favorite color and I bought this just for you.”

“You look beautiful in it.” You replied while blushing.

“Thank you handsome I knew you’d love it.” Claire stated.

Then Claire waddled right next to you and gave you a giant bear hug.

“We’re going to have the time of our lives in Greece.” Claire said while kissing you on the cheek.

“I don’t doubt it.” You replied.

Just then Mrs. Masters walked in with a big grin on her face.

"I have good news you two." Mrs. Masters said excitedly.

Skip to tomorrow
125111212122112111.content:
"Mrs. Telleri will be coming with us to Greece!" Mrs. Masters announced. Claire seemed to be as exited as her mother about the news.

"You've hired her to cook for us?" You asked.

"No, silly. Jen is a very good friend of mine and I've invited her to join us on the trip." Mrs. Masters replied. "Besides I'd like to have someone to talk to while I work on my tan. I doubt you two lovebirds will even notice me, especially if this daugher of mine will be wearing such a skimpy bikini."

"Oh stop it, mom. This one has more cloth than the one I wore last time, and you didn't say a thing about that one." Claire said while adjusting the top for better coverage.

"You've been growing faster than your selection of bikini, my dear." Mrs. Masters added, smiling. "I'm just teasing you, honey. You can wear as skimpy bikini as you want, dear. That's the best part about having a private island with nobody else on it. I know I'll be avoiding getting any tan lines if possible."

"You own a whole island?" You asked, hoping to shift the conversation before the women figure how exited you got from imagining them in skimpy bikinis. "No, we're just renting a mansion there." Mrs. Master replied. "Claire and I have been thinking about buying it for our own use, but we decided that we don't want to get chained down to one place."

"Oh, alright. I guess I should start packing for tomorrow." You replied

"You probably don't even know where half of your clothes are, dear. Let the maids worry about packing." Mrs. Masters responded.

"They'll also need to pick up more clothing for you, CJ." Claire added. "I gurantee that Ms. Telleri will make you grow out of your current ones halfway through the vacation. Besides, I want to see my hunk in some swimwear."

"I think CJ won't be the only one who'll need bigger clothing for the flight back." Mrs. Masters responded. "I'll try to get Jen relax, but keepng that girl out of kitchen is getting harder and harder every day."

Seems like your stomach heard the conversation and let out a loud gurgle, letting you know that it has mostly recovered from breakfast and your after-breakfast snack and was ready for more food. You blushed as both Masters women smiled at you, happy that you've adjusted to the Masters lifestyle so quickly.

"Stop teasing the poor boy and put on something decent, dear." Mrs. Masters said and playfully slapped his daughers jiggling belly. "Lunch should be ready in a few minutes, so start making your way to dining hall."
125111212122112111.title: Ms. Telleri will be joining us.

You explore the large mansion
1251112121221121112.content:
You were leaning back against the soft chair of Master's private plane, happy that you would never be squeezing yourself on the tiny seats of tourist class anymore. An in-flight movie was playing on the large screen in front of you and Claire was leaning against your side while watching it. The huge breakfast had made you far too groggy and sleepy to follow the plot, so you enjoyed the comfort and occasionally shoveled more popcorn in your mouth. Mrs. Masters and Ms. Telleri were sitting in front of the plane, both munching down some cakes while gossiping.

After the plane had landed your group took a limo to the harbor and switched to a yacht. After enjoying another large meal on the big deck of the luxury yacht you arrived on the island.

As you stepped on the pier you have to stop and admire the mansion in front of you. It was huge, big enough to house at least 3 families. The garden next to it was as amazing as one would expect and the ocean view was simply breathtaking. One side of the island even had a small beach. While you were busy looking at the view the three women were slowly but steadily waddling towards the mansion. You decided to slowly make your way to there too, admiring the garden on your way to there.

A maid was already waiting for you, offering you a large glass as you approached. "You must be feeling full after breakfast and the snack during boat trip, Master Dalton. Please drink this, it'll help you digest. Trust me, you'll need all the help you can get to make it through the meals Madame Masters has planned for you."

You thanked the maid and started sipping the drink as you entered the mansion.

I have wonderful news you two.” Mrs. Masters said happily.

“What is it?” You asked while Claire was massaging your vast gut.

“Well CJ , a few days ago I got a hold of your mom and told her she should come visit and see how you’re doing.” “She said yes so I had a plane ready to pick her up the day after exams were over.” “Then before breakfast she told me her plane had just landed so I asked her to join us on our vacation and she enthusiastically agreed to come along.”

After that Mrs. Masters left the room and Claire went back into the closest to some decent clothes, leaving you to your thoughts.
