Just then Claire came out of the closet wearing a red shirt with blue jeans and saw that you were lost in thought.

125111212122112112.title: Your mom will be joining us.

Claire stuffs herself to the limit in an effort to impress your mother and you
1251112121221121122.content:
It takes a few minutes for the passengers to filter through the exit gates, as you look eagerly for your mother.

You look in vain to find that you cannot locate her among the constant flow of departing passengers.

You began to panic slightly as the last passenger begins to exit.

This passenger is a short whale of a woman appearing no taller than 5'3 and is filling out a pair of yoga pants and a floral print dress tightly. The woman
couldn't be under 400 lbs, per your estimate, her short stature making her size more pronounced. Her back is facing you and the Master's as she struggles
to wheel out a few, familiar pieces of tacky luggage and bags.

You feel your second chin drop as she turns and the realization that she is your mother sets in. A smile crests her plump lips and she raises a hand to
wave at you, sending her pillow like upper arms into a jiggling frenzy. She waddles towards you, Claire, and Mrs. Masters as fast as she can stopping to
catch her breath before giving you a tight embrace.

"You look so healthy!" she chimes as you stand shell shocked "How have you been my little man?"

Your brain short circuits as you try in vain to piece together your mother's mysterious weight gain and the reasons why she neglected to tell you about it.
You stand dazed and confused as your mother releases her hug and turns to face Mrs. Masters.

"Thank you again for getting me that taste testing job for me! I couldn't afford to keep little CJ in school without it."

Mrs. Masters and Claire shoot you a sly wink and it suddenly begins to come together so clearly. A sudden chill shoots down your spine as the idea of this
all being planned reinforces itself in your mind.

"I hope CJ hasn't been a burden on you..."

"Far from it!" Mrs. Masters chuckled, sending her bulbous belly quivering "He is well behaved and it even seems that my Claire has taken an interest in him."

"That so?" Your mother's eyebrow cocks wryly as she eyes you and Claire closely.

"Very much so!" Claire boldly declared as she interlocked her flabby arm in yours.

Your mother chuckles at her directness before pulling a chocolate bar from her purse.

"Let's head back shall we?" Mrs. Masters asked with an approving nod "You must be exhausted and hungry."

You and Claire lumber slowly behind your waddling mother's as they chat like lost childhood friends, ignoring the stares of strangers as their bulbous bodies quiver madly with each movement.

You feel Claire's hand guide yours across her ample hips resting it on her dimpled surface. You blush deeply as you feel her nestle closer to you a feeling that you are starting to appreciate.

You, your mother, and the Master's enter the luxury SUV and make your way back to the mansion in time for dinner.

That night at dinner....
1251112121221121122.title: She's huge

choices: Talk to your mom about her new size...and yours...

12511121212211211222.content:
Dinner was massive, as you'd expect with so many large eaters in one spot. Sure, they went through multiple courses--you emptying many of them yourself, but Claire ate like a girl possessed. She shoveled food into her mouth, barely taking time to look up as everyone talked and laughed. Her eating was the only thing that could help you take your eyes off your mom and her new eating habits. And drinking habits, for that matter.

Claire held her plate out for a passing waiter. "More!"

He came back, with a heaping mound.

Five minutes later, her plate was clean. "More!"

Between plates six and seven, you leaned in. "Are you okay?"

Claire took a moment, and let out a soft little burp. "I am. I'm just--the skinniest girl here, and I feel kinda inferior." Claire blushed, and looked at her plate. "Like nothing special. So yeah, that won't last for the whole of this trip."

Next plate came. She dove in.

"Did you know my mom got that job?"

"Of course," Claire said, mouth full, "I saw her picture, and was like 'she's so skinny!' No boyfriend of mine can come from such an underfed house. So I helped you. i just didn't expect to look so...tiny here."

She ended up eating so much that her skirt split open. She patted her bloated tummy, cellulite wobbling as she sighed, content.
12511121212211211222.title: Claire stuffs herself to the limit in an effort...

Mrs. Masters wants to talk to your mom
125111212122112112221.content:
As Claire sat in her chair dazed in a food coma, you look to your mom who was scarfing down a plate of wings like she hasn’t eaten in days. You can’t help but wonder how she gained all the weight so fast and what was that job she was talking about.

“Hey mom, can I talk to you after dinner in my room?” You asked.

“Sure thing sweetie.” Your mom replied while licking wing sauce of her fingers.

Once dinner ended Mrs. Masters tended to her daughter’s bloated gut while Bunnie brought a stiff glass of ginger ale to soothe her stomach. While that was going on the two you headed to your room to talk and get some things off your chest (for both you and your mom). So the both you and your mom sat on your bed and began to talk

“Let me guess, you want to talk about the new me correct?” Your mom asked while patting her gut.

“You know me too well.” You replied giving an honest sigh.

“Well, I am your mother after all.” Your mom said giving a quick response. “Anyway, shortly after you got the scholarship to Chubbeso I received a call from Mrs. Masters who I didn’t know at the time offered me a position at a better paying job than the one I had previously.” “Eventually I discovered that the job was a taste testing job at Hans&Gretel Chocolates.” “While it was hard adjusting to the new environment at first, but eventually I started to enjoy tasting chocolate every day.” “I’m doing so well, that the head of the US division is promoting to head taste tester.” “The weirdest thing is that after eating so much chocolate I didn’t get a single zit from it.” “But, as you can guess it do number on my waistline.”

“Alright that makes things easier to comprehend.” You said having a better grasp of the situation.

“But it looks like I’m not the only one who’s been packing on the pounds.” Your mom said making an observation of her own. “Care to explain how you’ve gained so much weight in such a short amount of time.”

“Well let’s just say that Claire has been spoiling me rotten.” You replied giving a quick summarization of your stay at the mansion.

“I can tell from the way she clings to you like gum on the bottom of a shoe.” Your mom replied in a joking tone. “But in all seriousness, she’s a really nice girl.”

“So I guess we’re both fine with how things turned out in the end.” You said. “With me going to an all-girl school, you with your new job and the both of us gaining a massive amount of weight, we’re all okay with it.”

“I guess so.” Your mom said giving a quick reply. “By the way how are Rebecca and Kate doing I haven’t seen them since you all left?”

“Good question, come to think of it I haven’t seen them in a while.” You said while pondering on the thought.

Just then…

“Pardon the intrusion young master CJ, Mrs. Dalton.” The maid holding Claire’s left arm replied in calm tone. “The young mistress wanted to see you but was still a little out of it from dinner.”

12511121212211211222111.content:
The following day you, your mom and the Masters head to the airport and board the Master’s private plane. The flight to Greece mainly consisted of your mom catching up on her reading, Mrs. Master enjoying an inflight meal, Abida tinkering with who knows what and you enjoying an inflight movie with Claire clinging to your arm and while enjoying a snack of her own.

A few hours later, you arrive in Greece where your group immediately leaves the airport and make their way into the limo where, after a short drive the limo arrives at your destination. The villa was just as big as the mansion back home; the surrounding area was vast grasslands with trees. A little ways from the mansion was a cliff with a reinforced walkway downwards that overlooked a white, sandy beach

“So this is your vacation house.” You said while stepping out of the limo and taking in the scenery.

“You bet hot stuff.” Claire replied. “The vacation house has most of the accommodations as the manor back home, but with a few differences.” “For one the indoor pool is a bit bigger and the dining hall is a little wider.” “Also you’re sharing a room with me big boy.”

“Wait, what?!” You said is shock.

“Also there is something I would like to say CJ.” Mrs. Masters said, before you could give a response. “While we are here to relax and have fun, you’ll be also be tested to see if you’re worthy of holding the Master’s name.”

“I thought me putting on all this weight was the test.” You replied while patting your stomach.

“Correction, you putting on the weight was only the first part of the test.” Mrs. Masters explained. “There are three more trails that you’ll have to go through in order to show your worth.”

“Think of this like the labors that Hercules had to go through except without all the killing.” Claire stated while pressing her gut behind your back. “Don’t worry though; I know you’ll do wonderful.”

“Are you sure this is alright?” Your mom asked.

“Oh don’t worry Bianca; CJ won’t be doing anything dangerous.” Mrs. Masters replied. “Alright, CJ your next trial will be tomorrow and it will be overseen by Abida.”

“Oh, okay.” You replied hesitantly.

With Abida responsible for your second trial you have no idea with what to expect tomorrow. But it looks like your first few days here will have even more testing… just perfect.

Incorrect (time for a do over)
125111212122112112221111.content:
You were not sure what to expect the following morning. You got out of bed and for a short moment forgot where you were but then remembered that you were in Greece with the Masters and your mom. As soon as you got up, Claire got up as well and slowly made her way towards you.

“Zzzzz…CJ.” Claire said in a drowsy tone.

Judging by her appearance you could tell that she was still half asleep from the way she was leaning on your back. With no other choice you made your way down the hallway with a drowsy Claire on your back. About five minutes later you entered the dining hall where you see your mom digging in to tall stack of pancakes while Mrs. Master was eating a whole loaf of French toast. Abida was just standing by the hefty headmistress as usual and then two maids showed up to take Claire off your back.

“Morning CJ.” Your mom said while wiping syrup off of her face.

“How did you sleep?” Mrs. Master asked while munching on two slices of french toast.

“I slept alright.” You replied as you made your way to the table.

By alright you actually mean not really. You didn’t much sleep last night due to the uncertainty of the trials, but the main reason was because of Claire. She is a clinger of the highest of the order and for most of the night she couldn’t keep to herself. Sometimes she would have an arm and leg over your own, sometimes she would have her vast gut pressed against your back while lay one of her hands on your cheek. Sometimes she would have her cleavage pressed against your neck and sometimes it was a little bit of everything.

As you took your seat next to your mom the smells of breakfast woke Claire up in an instant and instantly start munching on a large stack of waffles that the maids gave her.

“Um...where’s my breakfast?” You asked curiously.

“This is actually part of your second trial CJ.” Mrs. Masters replied. “Abida will explain what it is.”

“Yes, Mrs. Masters.” Abida said obediently.

After she said that, Abida left Mrs. Masters side and her way to your side of the table with that same indifferent look on her face.

“CJ Dalton, current weight 335lbs.” Abida stated. “Your second will trial will be a blind taste test to see if you have the taste buds of a Master.” “A dish will be presented to you and you’ll taste it and describe what that food item is.” “Guess right and you can proceed to the next dish, guess wrong and you’ll have to eat the whole food item in question.” “You’ll have ten tries but you only need five to pass.” “If you take the blindfold off anytime during the taste test, you’ll automatically fail.” The only time that you can take off the blindfold is when you’re eating the item that you guessed wrong on.” “Do you understand the rules?”

“Yes I do.” You replied.

“Then let’s begin.” Abida replied.

Abida then put the blindfold over your eyes and one of the maids presented the first dish to you. While you are tasting it you notice that it is very small and flat.

“It’s a saltine cracker with crunchy peanut butter and strawberry jam.” You guessed.

“Correct.” Abida stated.

The second dish was also flat but it was a bit larger and had a sort of runniness to it.

“A fried quail egg with parsley and sea salt.” You guessed.

“Correct.” Abida stated.

You guessed wrong on the third and fourth dishes which were: bananas foster on top of Belgian waffles and spring rolls with sliced carrots, celery, leeks and onions so you had to eat all of it.

On the fifth dish the item had rich, buttery texture and had a thick sauce on it.

“Buttermilk biscuits with mushroom gravy.” You guessed.

“Correct.” Abida stated.

Then you guessed wrong on the sixth dish which was: a lobster tail with a pinch of garlic salt and kale which you ate pretty fast.

One the seventh dish the item had a very sweet and powdered flavor to it which felt like it had powdered sugar on it.

“Beignets with powdered sugar on top.” You guessed.

“Correct.” Abida stated.

As you made your way to the eighth dish you can’t help but notice that your time with the Masters has improved your taste buds a bit. You’ve never eaten a quail egg before or seen Belgian waffles yet this food is very common in the Master’s household. That being said your taste buds haven’t improved that much since you’ve only been living there for a few months and the Masters have been eating this kind of food for most of their lives.

This was shown as you guessed wrong on the eighth and ninth dishes which were: a turkey leg covered in a bourbon barbecue sauce with rosemary mashed potatoes and wagyu short rib with saffron and chives. Which you had a slower time eating due to all of the food you ate. You were down to your last try and you needed to guess right on it otherwise you’d have to do this all over again

As you tasted your final item you noticed it had some juiciness to it and tasted like it was from the sea but nothing you’ve ever tasted before.

“Sevruga caviar with egg yolks on top of a slice of brioche bread.” You guessed nervously.

You waited anxiously for what seemed like eternity for Abida’s response and you got it seconds later which was…
125111212122112112221111.title: Trial 2: Blind taste test

1251112121221121122211111.content:
Confirmation rang in the air, settling any nerves you might've had. You knew you had that in the bag. All that anxiety--seconds of it--for nothing. You relaxed your bulk into your seat, your entire body sagging as you rested your fingertips atop your bulging belly.

Claire wrapped her meaty arms around you, choking you just a little. "Never doubted you! Knew you'd get it! Knew it!" She screamed so loudly that, for a few moments, you couldn't interpret anything else around you other than the ring in your head.

Abida eyed you, expressionless, before nodding. "Very well. The Third Trial shall commence at midday. Relax until then."

You walked--or rather waddled--away from the table, Claire close behind. "You full? Need a belly rub for the third challenge?"

"I wouldn't be opposed to it." You grin as you fall onto the nearest sofa. You unbutton your pants, and let that soft, warm chub roll out, warm and stuffed enough for Claire to run her fingers over it, pressing, prodding, squeezing handfuls of it. You recline as she churned your middle, churned the food you had devoured, until warm, soothing easiness swept over you.

Before you knew it, it was midday. You woke from your nap, a little groggy. You noticed a pair of arms around your middle, leading to Claire, cheek against your shoulder, squeezed tight, as though she wanted to touch every inch of you. Her arms couldn't wrap around you. You had gotten kinda fat.

Abida was waiting for you in the kitchen. "Your third challenge. Are you ready?"

You could feel hunger pangs deep inside your tummy. You rubbed your gut, grinning. "As ready as I'll ever be."

A sliver of a grin crossed Abida's face. "Marvelous. Your third challenge..."

12511121212211211222111112.content:
“For your third trial CJ, you must defeat the mistress in a sumo match.” Abida stated while holding her grin.

“You mean I have to sumo wrestle Claire’s mom!?!” You said in shock.

“I will explain the rules after you get changed.” Abida said reverting to her usual expression.

After that Abida left to attend to Mrs. Masters which left you and Claire alone.

“Don’t worry CJ, you’ll do just fine.” Claire said in a reassuring voice. “Just keep in mind that my mom can be a little wily at times like this.”

Then two maids showed up and escorted you to the basement of the mansion where you were lead to a changing room. But when you got inside the only thing you saw to change into was some neon-green loincloth.

“What is that?” You asked in confusion.

“That is a mawashi.” One of the maids explained. “A traditional loincloth that sumo wrestlers wear in their matches.” “Now please hold still while we get you prepared.”

Then the maids began undressing you and put the mawashi around your waist. It looked kind of snug on you but it will have to do and the color was a nice choice as well. You then exited the door on the other side of the room and entered what looked like an authentic sumo ring (or dohyo for the correct term) as it had every little detail that the traditional rings do. On right side of the ring you saw Abida who was waiting for Mrs. Masters to come out and on the other side of the ring were your mom who was checking her hair and Claire who was also waiting but also giving you that lust filled look that you knew all too well.

After three minutes of waiting Mrs. Masters exited the dressing room on the other side of the room and she made the sumo look work for her. Mrs. Masters had her long hair done in a ponytail so it would not get in her way during the match. She was a wearing a rose colored leotard with cherry blossom prints on it and a ruby colored mawashi. As Mrs. Masters made her way on to the ring you were starting to get nervous. Not only did she have the weight advantage on you, but she’s anything like Claire, Mrs. Masters will probably use her body to distract you.

“Are you ready CJ?” Mrs. Masters asked in a playful tone.

“Ready as I’ll ever be.” You replied nervously.

“Good, because I’m not going easy on you.” Mrs. Masters stated.

Then Abida walks towards her position as referee.

“Here are the rules CJ.” Abida explained. “This is a single elimination round where the traditional rules of sumo wrestling apply here.” “Mrs. Masters wins if she manages to either pin you the ground or pushes you out of the ring.” “CJ you’ll win if you manage to either pin Mrs. Masters to the ground, push her out of the ring or survive two minutes in the ring.” “Now with that out of the way are you ready to begin CJ?”

“Y-yes I am.” You said hesitantly.

“Jessica Masters are you ready.” Abida asked.

“Then begin.” Abida said while getting out of the way.

Then right out of the starting gate Mrs. Masters came charging at you (which from your point of view was like watching an elephant sprint). Before you knew it you were getting a face full of cleavage as Mrs. Masters began to slowly push you out of the ring. With quick thinking you managed to break free from Mrs. Masters grip and side step to the left which caused her to lose her footing momentarily before regaining her balance.

“Quick thinking CJ.” Mrs. Masters commented. “Wouldn’t be much fun if I beat you that easily.”

“Okay, so she’s a lot faster than you thought she would be.” You thought to yourself. “I need to come up with a plan or I’m screwed.”

“Maybe I should…”

125111212122112112221111122.content:
“My best bet is to run out the clock.” You thought to yourself. “Mrs. Masters has me beat in both weight and strength.” “My only hope is to keep dodging her until time is up.”

You looked at the timer and only twelve seconds have passed since the match started and it looked like Mrs. Masters was trying to distract you by shaking her gut and cleavage from side to side.

“Alright just keep my focus on her face and nothing else.” You thought to yourself.

As the match continued Mrs. Masters made several charges towards you: whether it was from the front, the sides or even from behind she kept charging at like a raging bull. But you’ve manage to avoid most of them by the skin of your teeth thanks to some last minute dodging.

“What’s the matter CJ?” Mrs. Masters asked in a taunting voice. “Afraid of little old me?”

“Mrs. Masters is a lot of things, but little is not one of them.” You thought to yourself. “Not really, just have to keep away from you for just a little longer.”
You replied to Mrs. Masters.

The only question is how much longer can you keep this up? With only a minute and five seconds left you’re nearing your breaking point. But you also wondered how long Mrs. Masters could keep going as well. But the fatigue was finally catching up to you as Mrs. Masters finally got a grip on you and proceeded to push you out of the ring.

“There’s only forty seconds left.” You thought to yourself. “I have to give it everything I have.”

With the clock ticking away, you mustered what remaining strength you had and began to pushing against Mrs. Masters.

“Oh, so you finally decided to fight back CJ.” Mrs. Masters said in an excited tone. “Well bring it on then.”

Then Mrs. Masters proceeds to push even hard as her gut presses against yours, her thick legs rubbing against your legs and her large cleavage pushing against your chest. But, like you originally thought Mrs. Masters is still stronger than you and she’s slowly pushing you towards the end of the ring. But you can’t give in no matter how tried your legs were getting or how much your joints were aching, you had to endure. But just when it looked like you were about to be pushed out of the ring…

“Time’s up.” Abida stated. “CJ has passed the third trial.”

The instant Abida said time was up Mrs. Masters released her grip on you and fell back to the ground with a large thud.

“*pant* *pant* WOW, I have *pant* not moved like that *pant* in ages!” Mrs. Masters exclaimed while gasping for breath. “Abida get *pant* me some water *pant* please.”

“Yes, Mistress.” Abida quickly replied.

Shortly after Abida left, you fall to the ground due to exhaustion as well, but your quickly met with a hug from Claire much like last time.

“Way to go CJ I knew you had it in you.” Claire said happily.

“Thanks Claire, but it was a close one though.” You replied.

“Nice work sweetie.” Your mom said. “But that was a short match though.”

“Sumo matches don’t usually last that long anyway Bianca.” Mrs. Masters said after catching her breath. “Anyway, CJ you did very well against me.”

“Thank you, Mrs. Masters.” You replied.

Then Abida returned with water for Mrs. Masters which she promptly gulps down like she was dying of dehydration. Abida then looks at you the same way she did this morning.

“Your third trial will be during dinner.” Abida stated. “You can relax until then.

After that you went back to your changing room and were about to put on your usual clothes, but were stopped by the two maids from before.

“Apologies CJ, but you have to put this on first.” One of the maids said while showing what looked to be a corset.

“What is that?” You asked confused.

“This is the constrictor corset.” The maid explained. “Didn’t Abida explain this to you?”

“No, she did not.” You said while shaking your head.

“The constrictor corset had always been used for the final trial of being accepted into the Master’s family for generations.” The maid explained. “Final trial is eating so much food that it will cause the constrictor corset to burst right of you.” “Also, if Abida explains the trial to you, don’t tell her that we already explained it to you or she’ll have our hides.”

“I promise.” You said in a reassuring tone.

Pretty soon the two maids proceeded to put to the corset on you and you see why they call it the constrictor corset. The thing was squeezing your gut like a giant python and made you look like you lost 200 lbs (something Claire would never stand for). After making sure the corset was on nice and tight, you put on the rest of your clothes on and headed back to your room to watch TV and relax before the coming dinner storm.

1251112121221121122211111221.content:
It was about 6:30 pm when you left your room and headed for the dining hall once again. Just like before, you were filled with anxiety about what was going to happen. Also the corset was making you feel uncomfortable and it’s a little itchy. Before you knew it you were back at the dining hall where your mom and Mrs. Masters were already sitting down at the table and waiting for you patiently. Claire was also there but she looked displeased for some reason.

“Mom does CJ really have to wear that stupid corset?” Claire complained.

“Relax Claire.” Mrs. Masters replied. “I know you were not looking forward to this part, but just bare it for a little longer and it will all be over soon.”

“That corset makes you look like how you were before you went to Chubbeso sweetie.” Your mom said in a joking tone of voice.

“Thank you mom.” You replied as you took your seat by Claire.

“Now CJ for the final trial, we must see if you have the appetite of a Masters.” Abida explained. “I will be in charge of your portion sizes which will increase bit by bit as the dinner goes on and it will be over when the constrictor corset bursts off.” “Understand?”

“Yes mam.” You replied.

“Then let’s begin.” Abida stated.

The first dish that was brought out were deluxe cheese burgers that had two wagyu beef patties, fresh vegetables (lettuce, tomatoes, pickles and onions), bacon, three kinds of kinds of cheese (American, Swiss and Colby-jack), all on a toasted sesame seed bun. Beside them were large baskets of French fries and a tall glass of water. Abida handed gave you two burgers and a plate of fries and you started to chow down immediately.

As expected the food was amazing, the fries were well seasoned and crispy which were how you like them, and the ketchup brings out a nice sweetness to them. The burgers were nicely cooked with no pink in the meat, the vegetables added a nice crisp texture and the bacon adds the right amount of saltiness to the burger. Within fifteen minutes you finish the entire plate of burgers (and fire) and you’re starting to feel full already. This makes you wonder if all the food for dinner was specifically made for making you fatter.

“Does this food have empty calories Claire?” You asked curiously.

“Maybe.” Claire replied while wiping her and rolling her eyes to the left.

You know whenever Claire rolls her eyes to the left like that it means yes.

“On to the next course.” Abida stated.

While the first trial had more refined and high class food this one just simple food that you were familiar with. Each dish you devoured one after the other: pepperoni pizza, hot dogs, buffalo wings and fish tacos. As the dinner progressed the corset was growing tighter and tighter on you, but you so busy eating that you didn’t notice it. It was when you were eating a big plate of spaghetti and meatballs you realized how much staying with Claire and her mom affected you.

Before you would’ve been full after one meal, but now you feel like you could five or six more meals. You can’t remember the last time you did anything labor intensive since the maids do almost all of the work for you except for eating and very minor stuff like playing video games. Claire has made so many advances on you that you almost expect to see her sleeping in your bed, getting a face full of her cleavage or for her to smother your body with her own fat gut. Mrs. Masters acted more like mom towards you as each day passed that it almost felt like you were related to her. It truly felt like you were becoming part of their family: a Masters.

Once the pasta was finished, it was time for desert. Beginning with a giant slice of devil’s food cake with cookies and cream ice cream, a large stack of salted caramel covered brownies with a chocolate milkshake and a large bowl of butterscotch pudding. But when you were finishing a big piece of peanut brittle you heard a ripping sound followed by seeing something getting flung across the dining room. You look down at your gut and see that you shirt is ripped apart and that the constrictor corset is gone which means you completed the final trial. But just before you could celebrate with everyone else, you passed out due to the sheer quantity of food you just ate.

After what seemed like hours you began to regain consciousness and see your resting on someone’s pudgy lap.

“Glad to see your up sleepyhead.” The person said.

You look up to the person’s face and see that it is…

“*yawn* It look like Abida was right about the weather today.” Mrs. Masters said in a groggy tone.

Due to her sheer weight, Mrs. Masters needed help getting out of bed each morning due to her being too tired to do it herself. So two of the four maids each grabbed one of Mrs. Masters arms and started pulling. While the other two maids pushed on her back.

There were a few more things Mrs. Masters wanted to talk to you about, but that can wait for another time. Pretty soon, Mrs. Masters arrived in the dining hall where your mom is just finishing up a large bowl of fruit salad.

“Hey Bianca.” Mrs. Masters said.

Then just like that the two arrived at the spa and were greeted by the staff.

After putting on the spa robes your mom was ready for the massage, but Mrs. Masters looked like she was expecting something.

“Bring out the fountain.” Mrs. Masters said in a somewhat serious tone.

Then one of the maids flipped a switch and a hatch opened up in the middle of the floor. In a matter seconds the fountain had completely risen from the hatch and had was already pouring out chocolate.

"Ohhh my head... where am I"? You said. You take a glance of your surroundings and you soon figure out that your in the gym, more specifically the sumo ring. Chubbeseo academy while its sports aren't the greatest the sumo team is the best team in all of Europe. The sumo team has won many trophies and has even made it to nationals. Although they lost to the Japanese team and came in 2nd place but came really close to winning. The arena itself was custom built for the school and could hold over hundreds of people. Everything inside looked like a traditional Japanese sumo arena so it would feel more authentic. "How did I end up in the gy..ow". You said trying to stand up but you bumped your head. "What the"? You then see the metal bars that surrounded you and realize that your in a large cage. "Why I'm a in a cage"? You were thinking about it and just as soon as you figured it out you heard rumbling again. It was the fanclub coming out of the lockeroom wearing the traditional female sumo outfits. "Look girls he's finally up". Said one of the more larger girls. "So lets get this tournament started".

"Tournament"? You said confused. You remember from the school events board that the sumo team is not facing anyone for another two weeks. Then the largest girl of the group waddled towards you and informed you about what's going on. "You see CJ we were all talking in the lockeroom about who would be the perfect girl for you, but things got a little out of hand during the discussion and everyone started yelling and pushing each other". "In the end we decided that the only fair way to settle the matter is to have a competition and the winner gets to be your girlfriend". "Oh and we put you in that cage so you wouldn't run away but we'll let you out when its all over". You knew that the fanclub was crazy but you didn't think that they were this crazy. A sumo tournament and your the grand prize its just plain nuts. The large girl then turned around to the rest of the club. "So is everyone ready"? "Yeahhhh"!! They all shouted with fiery determination to win. "Then lets begin". She said.

"Not so fast you pack of love-hungry wolves". A voice shouted. The fanclub turned around to see that it was Rebecca, Kate and Claire. "Oh its CJ's bodyguards what brings you here"? She asked in sarcastic tone. "You know why were here as soon as CJ didn't show up for first period we knew something was up". Rebecca said in an aggravated voice. "At first I thought that the princess here finally went off the deep end and kidnapped CJ". "But when me and Kate talked to her she said that she hasn't seen him all mourning". "How many times do I have to tell you not to call me that nickname". Claire sad interrupting Rebecca's deduction. "Let me finish"! Rebecca said. "So anyway we all figured that only other group of people that would be crazy enough to pull a stunt like this just to get to CJ would be none other than his fanclub". "So let him go now before I break that stupid cage open and give you all a piece of my mind".

"I'm afraid that you won't be breaking anything". The girl said in a calm, confident tone. "The cage is made of reinforced titanium and completely blast proof, you won't be able to put a dent in it". "Plus I have the only key that opens the cage and only the winner of the tournament gets it, so if you want to save CJ you need to compete in our tournament and win". "I guess we have no choice but to enter". Rebecca said unwillingly. "Rebecca you can't be serious". Kate said with face bright red full of embarrassment. "I don't like the outfits they squeeze my body and are uncomfortable to move around in". "Plus I don't want CJ to see me in that outfit". "We don't have a choice in this situation". Claire said calmly. "Its the only way to fet CJ out of that cage". Her voice then changed from calm to anger. "Furthermore no one puts my CJ in a cage and walks scott free". "So what's it going to be are you in or out"? The girl said waiting impatiently for an answer. "Alright we'll compete in our little tournament". Rebecca said. "Alright then put the outfits on an we can get started". A few minutes later the three girls came out with sumo outfits on. "Okay now that everyone's ready we can begin".

144.content:
You could almost say it was too quiet of a morning – Heck, it was a rare morning that you weren’t mauled by your ravenous fan club (not that you’d complain about it). Making sure to keep an eye out for anything, you turn your head to the right and then to the left…

And you breath a sigh of relief, so far, nothing was out of the ordinary. Even if the fan club was up to something, in the hallowed halls of the academy, you could hear them stomping after you or even hear their tired panting. But you figure you’d rather not take your chances, you were proven wrong by the club when you thought you could outrun them.

So, you quickly grab your books, quietly close your locker, double lock it with the padlock you had on it before (you learned the hard way that there was at least one girl who knew how to break into lockers in your club, so you decided to do some double security when you realized that your gym clothes ‘mysteriously’ disappeared one day), and dash off and headed for the corner…

… Only for you to collide into something (or someone) that was almost the exact same size of you. The force sent both you and the other object tumbling to the ground with your books bouncing on the floor. “URK!”

“OOF!”

From the sound of it, you smacked into someone rather than something, and slowly you open your eyes in order to make sure that you didn’t seriously hurt someone…

… And the moment you do, all you can see is blue, a large amount of blue pointed straight at you. Could it be possible that you were looking at a vast sea? Or even the sky outside? Your eyes widen slightly and you realize what you’re looking at isn’t the sky or the sea, but rather a large pair of light blue colored panties that were covering a large and round butt (Not the largest you’ve seen, but certainly one of the shapeliest you’ve seen at this academy and it certainly wasn’t at regular size) with creamy flesh spilling out from the side of the fabric. At first you can feel your face getting red at the sight before you, but then you realize that the person you were looking at was starting to stand up.

The girl in front of you gasped loudly as she quickly stood up and pulled down the large skirt she had around her waist. And that’s when you finally got a good look at the girl who was spinning around to face you, her slightly long dark blue hair (with a few sky blue highlights in the front) whipping around her cute yet cold slightly chubby face glaring down at you. From the waist up, it looked as though the girl was only a little bit over weight with the beginnings of a pot belly and small breasts (certainly some of the smallest you’ve seen at the academy) that were wrapped up in the baggy uniform top. But from the waist down, you could easily see where this girl’s weight was distributed...

… Although, judging from the death look in her eyes, the large blush on her face, and the fact that she was cracking her knuckles – That might not be the best thing to bring up right now.

To make matters worse, you knew who this girl was – And unlike a majority of the school, she practically hated your guts! This incident more than likely just threw more fuel on the fire!

“Uh… G-G-Good morning, C-C-Chris,” You sheepishly chuckle as you slowly began to crawl backwards in hopes of getting away.

“CJ…” the girl named Chris growled loudly as she took a step forward, a dark aura slowly become visible around her entire body. “I see you’re still wandering the halls…”

“Y-Yeah,” You answer quickly with a nervous smile on your face. “L-Look Chris, it… It was an accident! I…”

WHAM!

And then your world went dark when Chris’s fist collided with your head…

14511.content:
By the time CJ and the others arrived at the gym, the facility was already overflowing with bulging bodies that were standing in long rows to be measured. They were divided by age, then by whichever line they chose to follow. They were fairly lenient here, and knew that students wanted to chat to their friends or avoid specific teachers. Naturally, CJ, Rebecca, Claire, and Kate went on the same line together, CJ bumping between Rebecca's butt and Claire's large belly. Kate, who wanted to be close to the action, would occasionally bump her hip into CJ's.

"So now we'll get you see you with your shirt off," Claire said, smiling, "and you'll get to see me almost naked too." This wasn't always so. While they did pull their shirts up to get their measurements, they never stripped students unless they wanted to be stripped, and CJ, knowing the sort of controversy it would cause, knowing how he'd be glomped and crushed under the masses of hundreds of horny girls, would never take his shirt off.

Eventually, the line waned until their quartet was up. CJ swallowed hard as they were measured...
14511.title: Go to the gym for the check up.

choices: So Kate and Rebecca were actually pretty thin this time last year, huh?
Nope, they were just less chubby.
145112.content:
So the four of you stood in one of the many lines formed by the voluptuous student bodies. Judging by headcount, you were in the seventh row down out of fifteen. Despite the ostentatious prosperity of the Master Family, which served direct funding for not only much of Chubbeso Academy but also for their own lavish lifestyle, there was not really a room designated for this type of event. So, rather than shell out a couple hundred thousand pounds for an add-on to the already heavily modified campus, it was decided that they would instead repurpose the gymnasium. Lets be honest, its students and faculty weren't using it to its full potential anyway. One day without gym wouldn't kill them; they'd survived plenty by the looks of them.

Anywho, so you're in line behind Rebecca and Claire with Kate behind you. Kat is visible as the third head behind Kate, and you even make out the dreadful blue locks of Christina Walker not too far from you. In front of Rebecca, there's one girl waiting to go after the one already getting examined. At your old school, checkups were a bit of a private matter; but this was something else entirely. The students, ranging from small to large to incredibly so, stood on a sort of platform with a drawn curtain that stood a good eight feet tall. Each station was manned with their own physician who had a small countertop to place his or her things. Obviously most of them were flown in, as your extended stay in the melting pot of a campus has graced you with the ability to pick out different accents. Amidst the clamoring voices of your classmates, you can hear some faint remarks of from the doctors: being either words of encouragement, comfort, or even flat-out lies to either console or subdue the overfed rich girls being examined.

"Hey, Claire?" you whisper as you lean into her earshot, "Whats up with these doctors, don't they find something... off about all the weight issues with our classmates?"

The heiress turned, "Oh that?" she says dismissively, "My mother flies these people from all corners of the world just like she does our classmates. She pays for their first class tickets and accommodations while they stay in-campus for the distinct purpose of keeping the girls here happy, since a lot of the school's money comes from investors who dote over their daughters." she crossed her thick arms under her heavy breasts and turned to face the crowd on her left. "Yep, my mother's a genius alright. She's made this place way better since she bought it." You can't help but think that outright lying to such young girls was a little underhanded of Ms. Masters, but seeing as how this entire school was just a little nuts, you decided to let it go unsaid.

Turning back to your left, you could see that the previously examined girl had stepped out from behind the curtain and was wobbling down the stairs as the next nameless student waddled up the stairs, careful not to fall. You could only sigh as your mind travels back to this morning, and several other mornings prior to that one. If you kept up this rate of gaining, it would be no time before you were as big as a house. The strain on your waist was only a harsh reminder that spending time in an academy that served to cater your every whim seemed to bring out the glutton in you. Well, the glutton in everybody by the looks of things...

"Psst!" a foreign, hushed voice beckons, "Psst, Mr. Dalton!"

You look around at the addressment of your name, highly doubting that you were in any danger. If it was anybody out to hurt you, they would have just punched you in the face. And if it was one of your fangirls, they'd have just squealed and suffocated you. Nope, this was new. Finesse. Eventually after several more signals, you see the hulking form of a familiar nurse. "Hey, I'll be back. Hold my spot." you say to Kate before stiff-legging it over to Nurse Young; a long time acquaintance whom had kept you nice and functional after the long hours of suffocation underneath overpowering amounts of lady-blubber. She was in uniform, as usual, though it wasn't her usual scrubs. She was dressed in a full-on doctor's robe similar to the ones that the physicians here were wearing. "Hey Ms. Young." you say nonchalantly, "Aren't you running Check-up day?"

Erika Young was a stout, well lots more than stout, half-Asian woman who had all but outgrown her office. She was taller than most women in her ethnicity, but still only placed about average to other women. For what she lacked in general height, Ms. Young made up for in overall girth. She was a portly woman whose overall dimensions alone were suffocating. Her stomach spilled outwards quite a bit from her actual waistline and dripped over non-existent belt line; almost completely censoring her from the waist down. Her large breasts sat atop this wobbling pagoda; a monument to her overindulgence, and shared very much the same consistency. Full and in excess, the heavy scrub-puppies in addition to her overall obesity were more than enough to keep everyone's favorite nurse in more than just occasional back pain. "Absolutely." she said excitedly, her prominent round face's movements echoed in her thick double chin, "And I thought, since last year your changing caused such a ruckus, that you'd have no problem with a private session under my care?"

Of course, since it was to be expected, you could only smile and turn a little red at her proposal.

"Don't get me wrong, CJ, you're probably the most constant man in my life right now, but I think you're a little young for me..."

While you were graced with privacy due to the curse of your gender, or perhaps the intensity of desperation that was deeply rooted in a good majority of the opposite one, your friends were left to go without your presence. Fortunate for two of them, they got along like peaches and cream while you weren't around. Claire, due to a harsh rivalry brewed quickly between herself and Rebecca, wasn't quite as lucky. Slowly, each member of your social clique took their place inside the physician counter and their weights were finally revealed to them...
145112.title: Check-up Day woes

choices: So you're just finishing up, you meet up with your friends and compare results!
Nope, you get distracted by a really pretty girl~
1451122.content:
***


"Alright, Miss Maglen, I'm going to ask you to strip your shirt and stand on this scale so that we can get an accurate measurement of your weight." The doctor, a slender woman of perhaps thirty, said as she lifted her glasses to get a better look at the previous doctor's notes. Nodding and making sure that the curtain was securely shut behind her, Rebecca removed her uniform jacket and started to unbutton her blouse. With her significantly portly fingers, unbuttoning and rebuttoning these days was starting to become a real challenge for the headstrong tsundere. She grunted slightly as she struggled with the tiny pearl colored buttons of her stark white uniform, managing to get one out of its slot in about a minute or so. After about three, her heavy sagging breasts were finally allowed to breath. For not being very big for a girl her size, her girls seemed to require a lot of ventilation. They spilled outwards, stretching the fabric a little, after their confinement slowly released. Soon, her stomach felt the same relief as its thick sloshy texture fought against the tight shaping uniform. Later rather than sooner, Rebecca was entirely naked from her bottom up; having forgone a nonexistent bra that fit this morning "by accident"

"Going commando, today Miss Maglen?" the doctor asked snarkily as she choked down her breakfast at the sight of Rebecca's round form. Breathing rather heavily and face flushed with embarrassment, Rebecca could only mumble incoherently as she struggled to remain composed. She waddled over to the scale and set her shape rather heavily onto the over-sensitive black mat- her entire upper body a quivering mound of unstable gelatin as her stomach swayed back and forth. After a few seconds of recalibration, the bright red numbers bore and even 250 pounds and Rebecca stepped off. The doctor took a gander at her chart from last year, "Miss Maglen... it says here that you started last year with a weight of 185... thats a gain of almost seventy pounds since last year started."

"...What of it?"

If she was ever going to get that fat Chubbeso bonus check from that overstuffed sow, Ms. Masters, she was going to have to play it nice with these girls... even if it killed her...

"However, standing at... um, 1.7 meters, I-I think it balances out quite nicely. Your BMI should be about a 38 s-so with a little diet and exercise you should be just fine the next time I see you. N-Now would you mind tying your hair back so that I can get your measurements?"

"Pssh, yeah, thanks." Rebecca said rather rudely as she deciphered the hidden comments about her weight

***


Claire, being much more "generous" in size than Rebecca was quite the sight for the practicing nurse who was forced to stare at this heaping hill of royal jelly. While the first girl had at least been rather tall and seemed to have some general shape about her sagging form, this next one was an absolute tub of goo. She was fat all over, like a little ball of blubber. It made her look rather young, with pink rosy cheeks that were so wide it squinted her eyes ever so slightly. Shirtless, she drooped everywhere. Like she was actually trying to make herself look fatter. Her long strawberry blonde hair fell over her shoulders and rested between the folds of her overstuffed arm fat and her enormous hooters. She smiled at the doctor, "So, how do I look?" she asked, seductively striking a pose for the knowingly-paid off doctor; who almost vomited as she watched Claire's body slosh by the way.

"W-Well at 321 pounds and 1.45 meters, you might have to consider a little exercise, Claire. You're getting pretty heavy for a girl your age." she thumbed through the charts after catching the dissatisfied look on her spoiled patient's face, "B-But with only a gain of fifty pounds since last year, I have to say that you must keep off the winter weight better than any of your classmates!" she feigned mockery. She lied, of course. "Did I mention," Claire said slyly, "That my mother, Principal Masters, is quite the heavy woman herself? Maybe I should be judged on a curb due to genetics?"

"Oh, w-why no you didn't!" the doctor said frantically as she tried to cover up her social boo-boo, "Wh-Why if thats the case than you're the epitome of health, young lady, surely your mother does a great job of raising you nutritiously and generously- tell her I said that- here, have a cookie!"
***


"So...Kate... Miss Granden..." the doctor said flatly as she failed to wrap her longest piece of pre-measured twine around the heavyset brunette, "I'm just going to go with "diet is prescribed" and move on, alright?"

Completely naked from bottom-up and with a huge rip across her bum, it was a miracle such a short, wide girl was still functional. She was incredibly large. But most importantly, she had enormous knockers. They limited her vision and got in her field of mobility. Entering her little check-up area alone, Clumsy Kate accidently knocked over everything on the counter! Of course, standing at only 5"1 would do that to a girl who weighed nearly three hundred pounds. Her BMI? 53.1, way beyond obese. It was almost kind of funny to watch her waddle around nervously. However, it was not funny to have groped such a fat girl only to find that her enormous breasts where too big to be measured by her tools at hand. Still, nice rack, even the cynical doctor had to admit.

Kate was horrified and humiliated. She was just so scared, she really just wanted to go back to her dorm and lock herself up and hide. But of course, that wasn't happening. So she just shrivelled up into the warm embrace of her own flab and meekly peeped every now and then as she shivered.

"So yeah... you're pretty fat." the doctor said confidently after seeing the special note made by the previous doctor noting that she did not come form a wealthy family. "So, go for a few jogs and eat a little less, you might just come out of your shell and surprise everyone."
1451122.title: Results of Lethargy and Overindulgence

choices: Kate is embarrassed about her weight, and actually wants to slim down!
Claire has some sort of surprise for you?
14511221.content:
After a few moments of undressing you stood on the cool tiled floor in your underwear. With your round stomach now flopping over the top of your waistband you felt a little awkward, and you were positively sure you’d put on more than just a few pounds since you were last weighed. You were a bit embarrassed, standing nearly naked in front of large Ms. Young, and her poking and measuring didn’t ease the awkwardness. In fact her stomach had frequently bumped into you while she was measuring, and once or twice her breasts had thumped into you accidentally.

“Have you noticed you've been getting a little rounder Mr. Dalton?” Ms. Young notes as she brings the measuring tape across your new begging of a pot belly.

“Well I guess…”

“Hmm, and at 187lbs you’ve put on some pounds too….35…. to be exact." She records on her paper, sounding more delighted than appalled. Noticing you turning red she adds, “Oh you’ve got nothing to worry about; in fact I think you look quite handsome. And from the way I’ve seen you running from your *big fans* your still quite healthy.” Smiling warmly she hands you your clothes. “So let’s just blame your gains on muscle weighing more than fat, and not Bunnies cooking. Sound good?"

“All right!” You shout, sliding back into your semi-tight uniform. Exiting as discreetly as you could, you began to sneak towards where Rebecca, Kate, and Claire were waiting. You see Delphine and Suzuka strolling by and chatting with each other, both equally happy with their weigh-in results despite their size differences and make your move. Using their bulk for cover you trod behind them and sneak towards a pair of large curtains.

“Well Ms. Walker you seem to be quite healthy…”

Oops one that was currently in use, AND BY CHRIS WALKER OF ALL PEOPLE. Oh man if she caught you here…she’d… she’d… probably think you were trying to sneak a peek, and then, then probably punch you hard enough to break your nose. Why did this keep happening! Before panicking further Chris shouts drown out your thoughts.

“WHAT’S THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN? HEALTHY! DON’T THINK I CAN’T TELL WHAT THAT MEANS!” you hear the angry voice that belonged to the blue haired bottom heavy swim star.

“No. What I meant was that-“

“YOU THINK YOU CAN JUST LUMP ME IN WITH THE REST OF THE CATTLE?”

“No! Not at All!” said the nurse speaking as quickly as she could in order to calm Chris down. “In fact there are plenty of successful swim stars who have a body…like yours.”

“THAT’S IT!” Chris said finished with re-dressing herself. “I’M OUT OF HERE! AND YOU BETTER GET THAT SCALE FIXED TOO! THERE’S ABSOLUTELY NO WAY I WEIGH THAT MUCH! THE NERVE!” Chris angrily stomped out from the curtains and past you. She was in such a huff she didn’t even notice you, or her sweat pants as they snagged on the edge of the curtain. You decide you'd better get that for her before she rips her pants completely.

You move to get the caught thread and watch as it begins to slowly unravel its parent pair of pants. Tracing the thread to the pants you watch helplessly as the small tear moves up and up until her booty hugging sweat pants had become a pair of revealing short shorts. Chris was clearly oblivious and had yet to realize what was going on, that was until a chorus of laughs erupted around the gym. Turning around she follows the thread to your guilty hand and you can only simply stand there shocked, mouth agate. Rather than pound you now she simply glares nastily at you, her full cheeks red with embarrassment. She points a single condemning stubby finger at you and pounds a fist into her hand, silently saying “Your dead meat…” before leaving the gym mortified. You feel an evil shiver up your spine as she walks away and your rub your left arm in anticipation of the bruise yet to come.

With a sigh you rejoin your trio of friends, noting each of them was wearing a different look on their face from the weigh-in results. Claire seemed positively ecstatic, but Rebecca looked bothered and Kate looked more withdrawn than usual. As you trod over there you find…
14511221.title: Weigh-In Round Up

choices: Offer to help exercise along with the sweet and chubby Kate.
Try and change the subject, you think Kate should stay the way she is.
145112211.content:
“C.J !” Claire shouts. “Done already? Where did you dress?” She pouts as if she missed a real treat. “More importantly how were you results?” she asks personally excited to hear how much you’d put on. Rebecca shot her a mean look but Claire was unfazed. “Well some of us take pride in our good health.” She said snobbishly. “I’ll have you known that my nurse informed me that for a girl of my height and refined upbringing I’m 100% perfect!” She added with a smile, sending an earthquake of dimples to ripple across her chubby face. “How about you Kate? Surely you got the same perfect bill of health?”

“Well…um…I already told Rebbecca...” Kate begins looking down to the floor, well more like looking at her humongous breasts, then her rotund belly, and then the tinest bit of floor she could see below that. “She kind of told me…I needed to…losesomeweight.

“What?” Claire shouted in shock.

"I know right?" Rebecca added visibly agitated by the weigh in and its insulting results. “How dare she! Mine was the same way, I mean she didn’t say it, but it was the way she said it. Lose some weight, please! That nurse would know a thing about healthy if she-” Rebeca continued clearly fired up.

“Uh, Becca-“ Kate began trying speak up.

“Well what do you think we should do?” Claire asked actually sharing a moment with Rebeca. “Maybe I could get my mom to fire her!”

“Uh, Claire really it’s-“ Kate again tried to make herself heard.

The trios continue to squabble when you see Kat strolling by smiling happily and your mood brightens. Her weird buttons and exotic attire shimmer and crackle as one of the few still skinny students of the academy heads toward your group. “Hello again CJ…”she says with a flick of her dark and pink striped hair. “Girls” she says with a nod three.

“Hey Cat” Rebecca said calming down a bit. “Um, how did things go for you?”

“Oh, fine…” she says twisting a strand of pink highlighted hair in her finger. “The nurse says I’m pretty good for a girl my size even though I put on twenty whole pounds since I got here. I guess that’s what I get for working on designs rather than going to gym. She did tell me to watch my diet and do some exercising though.” She admitted.

“Really…” Rebecca said cooking up an idea to invigorate her best gal pal. “Well Kate here was telling us how her inspector said she needs to lose some weight, what do you think?”

“Well duh!” Kat began, but caught herself in the reflection from Rebecca’s nasty glare. “Duh-there’s no way she does! Are you kidding me? She must have been crazy, quite unprofessional. Listen Kate," she now said placing a hand on one of the Kate’s meaty shoulders, “I would love to have curves like yours!” This wasn’t too far from the truth as Kat really would have loved to carry some of the curves the voluptuous Kate was carrying. Just some, not all. “It’s like they say in the fashion design industry. Some girls are a size three and some are a size thirteen, they make a dress looks good either way.” And at the saying the girls all nodded in agreement, all except Kate.

“Now that’s finally settled, did you get your checkup C.J.?” Kat asked

“Um,Yeah! Ms. Young took them right over there.” You say pointing to Ms. Young’s private booth.

“Perfect! Your measurements will finally be mine!” she says gleefully heading in that direction and quite happy to get her nimble fingers on your measurments magic numbers.

“You see Kate?” Rebecca said not missing a beat. “We’re all growing girls, and you’re still blossoming into a fine-”

“Beca!” Kate said now uncharacteristically shouting in order to be heard. “I was thinking maybe I should try to slim down. I kind of have been knocking a few things over accidentally, and the nurse did say that it might help with coming out of my shell…” Kate explained reverting back into her oh-so-shy fashion.

“Oh.” Rebbecca said flatly. Rebecca recalled how Kate had often talked of slimming down before…only to gain more weight. Plus too much exercise would disagree with Rebecca’s secret quest of bulking up for you. “Well Kate, I would love to maybe jog with you sometime, but with school and all well, you know, maybe Claire would be better partner?”

“Please, exercise is for those not blessed with noble bodies such as mine.” Claire commented haughtily, causing Rebecca to roll her eyes. “But if you feel like it, I suppose I could ask my mom to keep the gym open after school when the sumo club isn’t using it. All though if I do ask my mom, it might cost you something C.J.; maybe a kiss on the cheek or two?” She offered with a wink.

“Well...what about you C.J?” Kate asked suddenly turning to you and flinging you head first into the conversation. “You’re fast enough to dodge your fan club…most of the time. Would you want to be my workout buddy?” She asks you sweetly. Kate was one of your longtime friends and had always been very nice to you. You try to remember the last time you’d actually seen Kate in her gym uniform and faintly recall it looking rater tight, and that was a few months ago. Watching Kate (and possibly Rebecca) exercise in tight clothes or running a few laps behind them might be quite an interesting sight. Kate did sound set on trying to slim down, and the idea of seeing them sweating and bouncing and wobbling the whole time took the idea from good to great one. But on the other hand you weren’t really one to exercise when you didn’t have too, and you’ve always felt Kate looked fine no matter what “size” she was…Maybe you could change the topic?
145112211.title: Kate's Weight

choices: To the Headmistress' Office! Dun da da dun dun!
Ohp, no wait. There's something distracting.
1451122111.content:
What exactly was a boy to do?

You and Kate had known each other for more than half of your respective lives; if there was anybody that either of you could be completely honest with, it was between your three-way friendship with Becca. And, honestly, while Kate had never been exactly a skinny girl you felt that her weight had been hindering her slightly. Not that there was anything wrong with a little bit of extra weight, but poor Kate was to the point where she was finding it hard to find clothing... mostly bras. The teachers were really hard on her about indecency, obviously not taking into account her naturally introverted nature, and the more green faculty members sometimes even threatening a trip to the Headmistress' office in regards to her uncontainable breasts that bulged up and out of almost everything the poor girl tried to wear. Again, while it was really sort of hard to picture a trim fit Kate, it was a lot easier to picture the one who could at least fit into normal (well, junior miss plus) sizes. The one that walked through the doors of Chubbeso Academy on her first day...

On the other hand, you knew Kate Granden; and she was not one for dedication in the physical sense. Ever since junior high, when things started to get a little tough on Kate because of her reserved nature and expanding figure, Kate had occasionally experienced spells quite similar to this one: expressing an interest in dieting or exercise only to fall short of any execution. There were some times when she would put so much time and effort into researching an effective workout regimen that she forgot to exercise at all! That was Kate Granden; studious, forgetful, but passionate and kinda cute. However no matter how off the handle she usually got with her ambitions, you and Rebbecca were always there to help her no matter the costs. So why should this time be any different? She needed support because, even if she didn't manage to slim down at all, it was more important that she know that you were behind her all the way. At the very worst, keeping the gym open for you could help trim off those extra thirty-five pounds or so you'd gained since enrolling.

"Sure, I'll go talk to Claire's Mom about keeping the gym open for the both of us." you say kindly, attention turned fully to Kate who, now beaming, could only stammer red-faced and dumbly. "Th-That's great!" she stuttered, "Thank you so much CJ!"

She wrapped you into a deep hug, the lower portion of your torso being immediately enveloped in the soft breasts of Kate Granden. To emphasize a bit on their size, you could clearly feel them brushing against your slight muffin top and then some. Another couple stone or so on Kate's already overstacked frame and they could be pressed together with you inbetween them. "Hey, no problem." You pat her on the back of the head for support as her grip tightens around you, "I better go talk to her now while Physical Exams are still going." You say as you pry yourself away from Kate's embrace and Claire's notorious green eyes of envy. "Later guys!"

Between the remaining members of your social circle, there was a myriad of mixed responses. Kate, obviously, was simply ecstatic. Out of the three of them, she had never scored any face time with you since enrollment, being overshadowed by Rebbecca's superior physical prowess and Claire's suffocating affections. For her, a girl with a normal amount of attraction for a normal guy, this was a great chance to start looking better and start working her way back into your life. Rebbecca had a sort of mixed feeling about the arrangement. For starters, she was not one to enjoy change in schedule, scenery, or her friends. She loved both you and Kate to absolute death, but since her inkling on your preferences were just that -an inkling- and her significantly hedonistic habits developed since forming that suspicion, she was extremely wary about being wrong and becoming the "fat girl" of your group. Losing you to Kate was simply something that Big Becca couldn't handle. On the other hand, she was genuinely happy to help her friend in any way possible since she was so unhappy with her physical appearance. And if Kate was thinner, she might be able to branch out and be more social. That'd be great, considering that she had always been such a wallflower.

Claire, a total obesophile, was absolutely appalled that her darling CJ had been conned into losing that precious ring of blubber that hung so precariously over your belt line. She had spent all of last semester trying to spoil you fat, and that bespectacled poser wasn't going to dare undo all that work. However, under the assumption that Becca's assumption of your sexual preferences was correct, then she was in the lead by a good fifty pounds ahead of Kate. All she would have to do is go through the opposite direction that Kate was. This noble body shape wasn't for everybody, Claire was more than understanding of that... however some people were more deserving than others...
1451122111.title: Assitance in Ditching Adipose

choices: She agrees to do so; no strings attached! She even gives you the key!
She cons you into eating with her and Ms. Telleri until the subject is dropped
14511221111.content:
The Headmistress' office was more than a long walk away, especially considering that you weren't very much used to long walks these days. However it gave you time to think, something you didn't get to do very often in this crazy hamster wheel of an academy. Out of the gymnasium, which opened into the western courtyard, there was a large span of flat land where you were told that the team belonging to the school that stood before Chubbeso would play soccer and football. Now, in the ten years since its buyout, it had been polluted with the laziest, chubbiest of girls who seemed to treat it like a trash dump for old discarded treat wrappers. Of course there was always a team to come by and run maintenance so as to keep the campus looking beautiful, but the time inbetween said cleanups was simply atrocious. They lazed about, resting on their fat bums and patting their full bellies while they helped themselves to the many snack vendors that sat adjacent to the stone walls. They hung out in cliques, just like normal girls, friends with friends and whatnot, but each one was simply an overstuffed parody of what you had expected. And, no matter the social standing, all were simply lazy and slothful creatures that littered the beautiful fields. Actually kind of sad, really. At one time, these girls could have been (some were, during your time, as you had enrolled with or observed at least a few of them at one point) so much more outgoing instead of the complacent layabouts that sat in the grass... They looked to be having the time of their lives though, so why bother?

Coming to a stop at the halfway building between the Eastern and Western Courtyards, which contained (big surprise) a surplus of snack machines a row of water fountains, and a ladies restroom, and going through you found that it was almost a mirror image of the courtyard before. In fact, so was most of the campus. Now that classes weren't in session, any girl who had finished early was left to her individual whims which- except of course that said girl had somehow kept a strong head for fitness through the overwhelming first semester- usually had some sort of layabout activity entitled to it. Even the Headmistress' office, surrounded by individually shared offices that accommodated two educators at a time, was subject to the same laziness and sloth that its students were. Not disgusting, just disappointing. And, with a little hesitation on your part, you knocked on the door; knowing that while the same spirit was practically embodied by Ms. Masters, your arrival would at least put some spirit into her...

*knock knock*

There were no booming footsteps lumbering to the door as experience had taught you to expect. Only light tip-taps of sophisticated heels. Granted, Ms. Masters wore only the finest of footwear amongst everything else, but it was more of a clapping when the overstuffed principal decided to wear them instead of her usual flats. Much to your surprise and excitement, it was not in fact Jessica Masters coming to the door! If experience had taught you anything else since enrolling into Chubbeso Academy besides "don't eat the mysteriously placed cake on the ground" and "there's a good chance that I'm probably going to suffocate soon" it was when to recognize your favorite member of the faculty: Bunny Blake. Her silhouette made her appearance known not because of the messy-cutesy way she wore her hair, or because of her rare(around here) thin waist. No, you were not-so-sorry to say that the reason you knew it was her was because of her giant gazongas. Her breasts were absolutely ginormous. Not that you were complaining.

"CJ!" she answered as she swiftly opened the door, "What's up Kid?!"

"Bunnie!" you mimic her enthusiasm, giving her a quick knuckle bump as a customary greeting, "I just wanted to talk to Ms. Masters about something, is she in right now?"

Bunnie hesitated for a second with a troubled look on her face before responding, "Gimme a sec?" and turning her head back into the office. "Ms. Masters? Someone's at the door for you, are you in?" The sound of mastication was audible from behind Bunnie, with a little grunting and moaning indicating some hurried eating, "I'm in a meeting!" she shouted back. "She's in a meeting." Bunnie parroted woefully, "But its alright CJ, I'll tell her you stopped by and-

"CJ Dalton?!" she said excitedly from behind, "Gimme a second, let me make myself presentable."

Bunnie smiled and stepped aside, "She'll be right with you."

Cautiously, you step into the office only to find it a complete mess. The place was covered in dishes and utensils, the aroma not unlike that of the cafeteria. Seated in front of the desk, rubbing an absolutely engorged gut of epic proportions (but hey, that was normal) was Ms Jen Telleri, the Culinary Arts teacher. Short brown hair curled against a wide dinner-plate face, several chins bunching together as she giggled. She took up the entire bench that sat in front of the Headmistress' desk! And, of course, her heavyweight superior was no better. They were giddy like a bunch of overfed schoolgirls at your arrival! "Oh, Mr. Dalton." Ms. Masters said in a sultrily playful voice, "I wasn't expecting you to drop in."

"The sight of two beautiful women enjoying eachother's company get you a little excited?" Ms. Telleri joined in the game

"Will you two Cougars knock it off?" Bunnie said protectively, placing her hands on your shoulders and bringing you close into her chest, "Sorry CJ, these two get a little raunchy when they're together. I was only supposed to be feeding Ms. Masters, but then Jen decided to do one of her famous pop-ins and I went a little overboard. This place is such a wreck!"

"Its cool, actually I need to talk to Ms. Masters about something...
14511221111.title: All Dem Fat Girls

choices: Things start off slow and steady as you two jog a few laps together.
OH NO! Kate twists her ankle! So much for working out...
145112211111.content:
“Please have some pie Mr. Dalton” Ms. Masters offered, siting plump and proud behind her desk.*urp* “I think we have a small sliver left.”

“Uh no thanks Ms. Masters I just wanted to ask about-”

“It’s Ms.Blake’s ” Ms. Telleri said teasingly. Now that you looked at it the pie looked fantastic. You loved Bunnie’s apple pie with its thick and wonderfully warm fresh apple filling and its sugar sweet topping, and the crust OH THAT CRUST. Not a single student (yourself included) felt ashamed when they went up for thirds or fourths of that pie, especially with a crust like that. The urge to sneak a slice was tempting but with Kate depending on you, the choice was already made. “I’m good.” You say regretfully. “More for us then!” Ms. Masters jovial announces placing half of what was like a “sliver” of pie and more like a slab on both plates.

“Now *munch munch munch* what would our most manly student here at Chubbeso want to talk about?” she asks between bites.

“Well the weigh in was today and Kate, one of my friends, was kind of unhappy with her results.” You explain as you watch the both of them dig away at what had to be a pound of pie on each of their plates.

“What!” Ms. Masters shouts looking like she was about to choke. “Impossible! I paid them all to-“ she caught herself and set her fork down on her plate. “I mean that’s a terrible terrible thing to hear.” She says sympathetically.

“Anyways, she was wondering if I could maybe help her slim down in the gym after school, but the thing is it’s usually locked most of the time.” You explain.
Ms. Masters nods sympathetically bouncing her chins like a basketball. “Sure I don’t see the harm in it. Although I think if any student wants to adjust her figure and do some training then why not?” She slowly sticks a thick arm underneath her desk and retrieves a golden key. “Here” she says as she offers you the small key on her large hands.

“Thanks Mss. Masters!” You say politely as she entrusts you with the key. “See you around Ms.Telleri.” You say as you head out. “Bye Bunnie” Ms. Blake gives you a quick wave “Remember not to train too hard!” Bunnie adds with a wink. As you leave the office you glance at the golden gym key shiny from its under use.
You were excited that things had gone so smoothly and at the idea of getting another smushy hug from Kate. In no time at all your back in the gym and quietly reunite with Kate and Rebecca.

“So? How'd it go?” Kate asks quickly swarming over to you, her hands gripped together in anticipation only exaggerating her pronounced bust line. Smiling a valiant grin you take the key out from your pocket “She said it be fine after school. In fact if you want we could even start tod-oof!” You’re caught off guard as Kate hits you with another hip smothering hug. You almost drop the key in question as she wraps you up in a tight but soft and fleshy squeeze. “Thankyouthankyouthakyou!” she says rapidly, and then realizing how she was crushing her “crush” she stopped the hugging and wobbles back a few steps. “Um…sorry about that,” she says looking quite red. “I’d better get ready” and with that she went waddling off. You see Rebbecca looks quite shocked at the excitement Kate has for once again trying to slim her figure. You also notice that you’re minus two girls rather than just one.

“Hey where did Claire go?” you ask knowing you couldn’t possibly overlooked anyone with the body like the princesses.

“Well since there are no classes for today she decided to head home. Thank goodness.” Rebecca adds. “Although I did hear her muttering something about “fixing a surprise” for you so stay on our toes.” She adds with a laugh. Then she suddenly looks around her as if she didn’t want anyone to hear what she was going to say next. Then taking a step closer she asks “Listen C.J. I really appreciate what you’re doing for Kate I mean she’s getting all worked up about working out…again. But, do you think I should, go too?”

“Well of course! Why wouldn’t you?” You say immediately, not catching one the tom girls drift. She looks almost insulted by your response, maybe she was asking Do I have to go? “Oh-uh I mean I guess if you had something else to do Becca, I’m sure Kate wouldn’t mind.” She shakes her head and rolls her eyes, silently informing you that you still missed the point. “Do you think…” she held her breath before continuing “I look…okay? Or maybe I should try to slim down with Kate?”

Oh-Ohhh!” you say now understanding the odd question. “No way! I think you look awesome!” you quickly and honestly compliment her, not realizing the true weight of your praise. “I mean you were one of the best softball players in middle schools even!” Rebbeca’s eyes widened and gleamed like a pieces of hard candy. She looked happy-no-relived by your answer. “Oh um, good!” she said reverting back to her usual nature. “Because I was, umm, going to do some of Mrs. Kawasaki’s math homework.” It was sort of odd but she was practically humming the fact she had school work to do. “But, I’ll stop by later and see how you and Kate are doing. Cya’ CJ!” And with that she left the gym, unbeknownst to you she was off to do more snack munching rather than number crunching.Now alone, you felt quite defenseless surrounded by all dem fat girls and so you too scurried back to your room.

About an hour or so of channel surfing, internet browsing, and homework neglect, you get a text from Kate telling you that the gym was cleared out and locked up. She had everything ready if you wanted to work out now. So jumping into a t-shirt and a pair of shorts, both of which were a little tight but thankfully button free, you make your way through the air conditioned halls back to the gym where Kate awaits looking labored already from lugging her backpack around.

“Hey Kate. What’s with the bag?”

“Well I did some research and brought some stuff we might need with us.”

“Oh?”

“Yeah. Let’s see…”she slides the heavy pack down to the floor and unzips it. “I’ve got water, a stopwatch, my laptop in case we need to look up some exercises my mp3 for jogging music-”

“Okay, okay.” you say. Kate was obviously going to really try and make an effort today. As you slide the key in and re-open the gym doors Kate sets down her backpack again inside. “So…*huff* start with a jog?” she asks already sounding a little winded.

Well how do things go?
