145112211111.title: Key issues

choices: Claire! And she’s brought weight gain-oops Health bars/shakes for you  (both?)
Rebecca checking in on her two trying-to-get-fit friends.
1451122111111.content:
Locking the door behind you so any other unwanted guests (i.e. almost the entire school a.k.a your fan club) wouldn’t break in and really test how fast you two could run. Kate attempts to stretch in her makeshift gym outfit a simple pink t-shirt and a pair of grey cheek cradling sweats. Removing her glasses Kate began to touch her toes…or at least attempt to. Her stomach fat crumpled together as she began to crunch, her wide gelatinous end rose and trembled into the air prominently as she shifted her weight forward, her bulbous bosom and noticeably not concealed within a sports bra as well as her round dome of a stomach, drooped downwards as Kate stretched her hands lower and lower until…“One-oof” Kate said falling flat onto her well-padded front. You quickly help her up and find she’s fine, if not completely embarrassed to have fallen in front of her secret crush.

“Let’s just try jogging.” You suggest. Running was something you knew you were good at, and hopefully jogging would be a good start for Kate. Deciding to not try and run all out for speed you start slow and try to go for endurance. Letting Kate start in front of you, you “slow your roll” and meet Kate’s steady pace. Wobbling in her lane just slightly, you notice she has her eyes straight forward and focused listening to her mp3. Inaudible to her you hear a heavy smacking noise every few steps and look about you for the culprit of the sound. *Smack Smack Smack* You check her shoes thinking maybe they were making a heavy smack every time they made contact with the rubber tracks floor. *smack huff smack huff* Now Kate’s puffing breaths joined in rhythmically with the strange smacks. Looking upwards you see it wasn’t her feet but another part of her body, her two biggest parts. Hypnotically her chest was flopping wildly as she jogged in rhythm, her stomach joining in every now and then for a few jolly bounces. Up and down smack *smack huff smack huff* Now her already strained shirt grew tighter with every lap and the sweat that came with it clinging against mounds of belly and chest fat. After about 15 laps or so Kate’s wheezing but determined to finish one more, after which she slows down into a nice slow walk.

“There…” she says removing her headphones. “*huff*…that wasn’t so…bad…I feel better already!” She says taking a seat on the schools x-tra wide bleachers. You join her and rest your legs, realizing that even if that wasn’t the farthest or fastest you’ve ever run it was still quite an accomplishment for Kate. Taking a bottle of water from her bag, and handing you another, you both greedily gulp the water down. An act that seriously upsets your stomachs…Your stomach gurgles and you remember how you’ve missed lunch, and passed on a piece of delicious apple pie. Well maybe it was best that you didn’t have the pie but still, you were STARVING! Kate doesn’t look worried at all her red face having cooled down to her natural color.

“Hungry?” she asks with a sweet soft giggle. “Me too I mean after working out you’re gonna work up an appetite right? That’s why…” She trails of as she looks through her backpack. Her searching hastens as she apparently can’t find what she’s looking for. Kate’s red face returns as she looks disappointed. “How could I forget the workout snack bars?” she says accusing herself. “I’m such a scatterbrain… A backpack full of workout gear and all I have is bottled water.” She was clearly upset at not bringing an after workout snack for the two of you.

“Hey water’s better than nothing Kate. And it’s really no big deal.” You say hoping to make her feel better. That’s when there’s a knock at the gym doors.
Peeking in through the door’s small windows was none other than…
1451122111111.title: Slow and Steady / Streches and Sounds

choices: The next morning you're late and run into Delphine. Who looks... a little round?
Actuall, you're on time. But Kat ambushes you to show you her latest work
14511221111111.content:
There, in the window's polished-clear countenance, was Claire Masters. Odd, considering that the plump princess of Chubbeso hardly ever set foot within anything resembling an exercise facility. Seriously, like ever. Aside from the annual check-up days, Claire absolutely despised the very idea of a gymnasium or exercise in general. She had even decided to put off her mandatory Physical Education credit until her senior year so as to stay as ripe and plump as possible! Now what could she be doing there, standing outside the very double-doors of her antithesis, with the biggest smile on her face for? Well, Rebbecca did say that she had a surprise waiting for you, perhaps she was going to deliver it while you and Kate were working out? Of course, Rebbecca also said that he should probably watch your back. But what were you to do? Claire was right there; waving her hand eagerly and smiling at you though the window!

"Oh, um, hey Claire!" you stutter, opening the door to face your chubby would-be girlfriend like a man. "Oh CJ!" she wailed, grabbing ahold of you like the last slice of pie in the cafeteria, "I hope you're not overexerted, did that Kate girl make you work too hard?" Unfortunately, similar to her grip on said last slice of pie, Claire practically came with Kung-fu grip action when it came to hugs. That bulbous shape of hers and general avoidance of basic physical exertion hid a secret vice that seemed to only clamp around your waist. "Nah, I'm fine." You choke through labored breathing, the plump arms of your number one fan cutting off circulation to your diaphragm. "I knew you would be, but still, I don't like to see you working so hard." she said in an overfamiliar tone of voice. She released you, struggled to tilt her circular shape over slightly to grab the monogrammed tote bag sitting next to her. Once she had it firmly in her perfectly manicured hands, Claire immediately rushed past you and into the gym; namely towards the still recuperating Kate.

"Hi Katie Kate!" Claire said in that same friendly manner. Odd, not only had Claire never set foot in the gym while being used for its intended purpose, but she had also never called anyone by anything other than their name or an insulting adjective that described them. For the first half of last semester, Kate Granden was "glasses" or "four-eyes" if she wasn't just "hey you, get out of my way." But now she was Katie-Kate? What exactly did Claire Masters have up those stuffed sleeves of hers besides her flabby arms? Without giving the poor girl enough time to respond, Claire immediately plopped her plump buns down next to the sweaty heiffer. Between the two of them, despite an almost fifty pound weight difference, it seemed that Kate was actually the larger one. Probably due to standing height, her weight was all scrunched up on a littler body than Claire. Still, it could have also been her hooters.

"I just thought that you two were working out so hard, I should bring you both a little treat." Then, placing the monogrammed purple baggie on top of her neatly straight legs, Claire proceeded to pull out a triad of slender red wrappers. On them, you could make out the name "X-S MASS" written out in bold white letters. "Energy bars?" Kate said quizzically, having been handed one. She scrutinized the packaging studiously, rotating it with her chubby fingers. "Only the best kind for my best friends." Claire said, almost too chipper, "Well, they're not the best. The ones from Sweden work way better, but they're really for body builders and stuff. Plus Mom was against buying from Swedish after they delivered the wrong daybed to our mansion... she won't even go to IKEA anymore." Of course, Kate didn't really pay attention to the plumper princess' ranting about the Swedish people and their fabulous furnishings. You could clearly see it in her eyes, that Kate was about to devour that protein bar without a moment's hesitation of Claire's real intent. Rather nimbly, her chubby thumb and index finger tore the side of the package wide open to reveal a heart of oats and chocolate chips.

"Woah, wait a second!" you holler, interrupting both girls. Slowly, you walk over to Claire and her mysterious bag of goodies to get a better look at them. You had a right to be suspicious of course, given Claire's history of dirty dealings in the past. However these actually seemed to be legitimate protein bars meant for the purpose of slimming you down while filling you up nicely! "Something wrong, CJ?" Claire asked innocently. You glared slightly, "Why the sudden interest in helping us get into shape? You've spent the last six months trying to fatten me up!"

"I have done no such thing!" Claire said innocently, letting loose a coy smile to let you in on her falsities in a flirtatious manner, "I happen to like my men with a little bit of bulk on them CJ Dalton, and you trying to slim down with Kate is a great thing, so I figured that I would treat you both to a little muscle-builder!" she said cutely. Her hands traveled to her own bulbous gut, palming it with both hands and a mournful look in her eye, "I know that there are some girls out there who don't like being so well taken care of, so well-fed, as myself. Obviously Kate's one of them, so I thought that I would help out a little. These are supposed to be loaded with carbs- and if Kate sticks to her workout then she should start shedding her extra weight and putting on some genuine muscle."

Things were quiet.

All except for the unanimous rumblings of Kate, Claire's, and even your own stomach. Apparently, all things were forgotten in time as the three of you sat down to enjoy a heaping helping of X-S. The subject of suspicion was dropped entirely, and you and your two porker pals wound up having a great time in the empty gym just to the three of you. Kate still seemed a little winded even after so long had passed after her run, but she was laughing hysterically when Claire pushed you off of the bleachers playfully. Her enormous breasts bounced heartily with every bout of laughter, something you didn't get to see often; Kate laughing so openly instead of just covering her stifled mouth. Claire was actually pretty tolerable towards Kate, all things considered. Sure she was loud and a little obnoxious, but that was pretty much a given with her. And you! You had a wonderful time! You three actually spent more time recuperating on the bleachers than you and Kate did working out!

Of course, as you escorted Kate back to her apartment, leaving Claire at her doorstep, you didn't quite see the haughty smile behind Claire's chubby cheeks. For while she had genuinely enjoyed her time with the both of you, and told the absolute truth about those bars she had brought you; in that they were really for athletics hoping to slim down and build muscle, she had neglected to tell you one key matter. That one bar was loaded with so many carbs and calories that it would take a professional kickboxer an entire match to burn them off. You and Kate, having just gone through a brisk jog, were nowhere close to kickboxers. And, on top of that, the both of you had eaten at least five. Of course, so had she, but Claire was actually trying to bulk up, remember? The thought of growing fatter not only excited her in the mental sense, but her obesophilia was a serious contributing factor towards her actions. The thought of you growing fatter alongside her so that the both of you could be thrusted into a coddling hoggish obesity was her absolute dream... give or take Kate. Whatever.
14511221111111.title: The Bad Princess

choices: You talk to Kate, Delphine comes for the answer: she's with Suzu and... CHRIS?!
When you get to your locker, Rebecca walks up to you, wanting to talk
145112211111111.content:
It was almost amazing you returned to your apartment after dropping off Kate at her’s. It had been a while since you were tired enough to just fall asleep… Of course, you still had homework to deal with, so you had to use whatever energy you had left to complete the daunting mental task. And although you didn’t have much of a work out, you still felt rather tired as you brought the pencil over the papers you had to fill your homework on.

Still, the point of the matter was, as soon as the final question was answered to the best of your ability, you quickly dragged yourself to your bed and just fell face first into the mattress, not caring that there was still daylight to burn, or for the fact that you hadn’t had dinner (for some reason unbeknownst to you, those bars that Claire gave you were actually quite filling and managed to do a number with your stomach). The moment you hit the mattress, you fell into a deep trance of sleep…

~several hours later…~

… Which was interrupted when you realized that the sunlight was gleaming through your windows, making you open your eyes and squint in annoyance. “Damn it… Mr. Sun, why’d you have to ruin my sleep?”

Of course, if you were actually fully awake, you would’ve realized that the sun was actually a friendly reminder to you to wake up – Since according to your clock, you only had twenty five minutes to get to class.

“What?!” You yelped when your groggy eyes finally met with the alarm clock (which didn’t have its alarm set anyway. It was kinda broken due to the fact that you threw it against the wall a few times when you couldn’t find the snooze button) and the amount of time you had to get to class. “Oh damn it!”

So, leaping from your bed, you immediately rushed towards the bathroom to get a quick shower in… And maybe if you were quick you would be able to catch a quick breakfast…

TTTTTTTTT


No such luck on the breakfast that morning, heck breakfast was the last thing on your mind (although your stomach did voice its complaints) as you quickly did a mad dash towards the academy, less than fifteen minutes to get to your locker and first class. So, here you were dashing through the streets, aiming to quickly get to class while taking a different route (heck, you didn’t want to be caught by your fan club again).

However, when you turned the corner near the final stretch of the school, you saw a familiar slim (compared to the rest of the girls around here) hourglass figured girl with long platinum blonde hair walking only a couple of feet in front of you. Almost immediately you took a deep breath and tried to compose yourself to greet the girl – “Good morning Delphine!”

At the sound of her name, the girl quickly turned around and your suspicions were immediately answered – For standing and waiting for you to catch up was the same Japanese/French transfer student known as Delphine Shuzumiya, and as she waved for you to come closer, you couldn’t help but eye her.

That cute face with those large blue eyes…

The locks of long hair that curved around said face…

That awesome rack of hers that fought itself for space in her small uniform…

That belly of hers that was pressing against the bottom of her uniform jacket that had a bit of her tummy exposed…

… Wait, what?

As you got closer to Delphine, you took a second look at her, and indeed, the usually hourglass figured girl was sporting a noticeable belly on her (although, her hips and bust did a good job covering it up). But you just saw her yesterday during the health examinations talking with Suzu… Did she have it then?

Before you can think any further on the subject, you finally reach Delphine and smile brightly at her as she reaches into her bag. “Morning Dlephine, how’s the morning treating you today?”

“Bon oui, Monsieur Dalton,” Delphine replied as she pulled out a small bar (which was wrapped in an oddly familiar wrapper that you knew that you had seen it before) and tore it open. “It is a merveilleuse journée! Especially since I get to start it with you by my side.”

You couldn’t help but blush when Delphine said that, and you had to admit that getting a compliment by such a girl was rather flattering. While you were enjoying the compliment, Delphine quickly took a bite from the bar she had and you immediately raised an eyebrow. “Uh, Delphine? If you don’t mind me asking, what’s that?”

“Oh? This?” Delphine replied after she swallowed the chunk of energy bar she had in her mouth. “Mademoiselle Claire came up to me after the medical examination and told me that these bars were perfect for keeping in shape and said that I should help myself. She was so nice that she gave me a box of these and said that she’d be able to keep getting me a fresh supply.

“I love these things! They’re so tasty and low in fat, I couldn’t help myself to eat them as snacks when I was working on my homework last night.”

“I see,” You said as you rubbed your chin. In all honest, you thought that Delphine didn’t have to do much to keep her dynamite figure… Of course, that pot belly she was now sporting was evidence to the contrary now…

“Speaking of keeping in shape,” Delphine stated, breaking you from your train of thoughts. “I also heard that you’re now in charge of the gym now-a-days.”

Wow, word traveled fast, then again, this was high school, that kind of stuff was normal.

“I was wondering Monsieur Dalton,” Delphine stated with a little twinge of red on her cheeks. “If I… And a couple others, if it wouldn’t be an inconvenience you, if we could join you in your little workout session?”

You had to stop and think again. The workout session was between you and Kate, but she didn’t say that she wanted it to just be between you and here, if she had, then she wouldn’t have offered the same to Rebecca. Then again, you didn’t want to be mean to anyone…

“Let me talk it over with Kate this morning,” You said, buying yourself some time before you had to give Delphine an answer. “I’ll let you know by lunch…”

“Merci! Merci!” Delphine cheered after she finished that bar she was eating and immediately wrapped her arms around you, allowing her amazing bosom to mash into your body and her small belly squish into yours. After the quick hug, Delphine reached into her bag once again and pulled out two more bars. “Monsieur Dalton, merci. Please, take this as thanks for now and I shall see you in class!”

Handing you one of the bars, Delphine quickly trotted ahead while munching on the second one. With a smile you ripped off the wrapper and began to eat your makeshift breakfast while you made your way to class once again.
145112211111111.title: Le repulpée, pourtant rondeurs Delphine

choices: I’d like it to be just you and me…if thats ok with you…
I don’t mind. I had fun with Claire yesterday. The more the better right?
1451122111111112.content:
You enter the school cautiously alert. Sure your fan club hadn’t jumped you…yet, but maybe today would be a rather quite one. Shrugging off the lack of attack you headed towards your locker amazed that you might make it to class early for once.

At your locker you’re suddenly hit from behind by what feels like a big squishy wrecking ball. Oh No! The club must have snuck up on you! What good was all that jogging now?

“Ha got you!” came the unmistakable voice of Rebecca. Turning around you see it was Rebecca who had playfully hip pressed you into your own locker, a joking way she’d say hello from time to time. Backing off of you she greets you with her warm smile. Now standing a bit away from you something seemed different about Becca, almost as if her uniform didn’t fit right. For one thing it seemed stretched across her top, (well stretched further than usual.) You chalk it up as having shrunk in the wash, because Rebecca certainly hadn’t gotten bigger overnight…right? Although Delphine did have that small paunch this morning too… You push the thought from your head; it was too early to think about this and it was all probably a result of the previous days weigh-in and work out.

“Your actually on time for once!” Rebecca congratulates you. “Did you have to skip breakfast or what?” As if it had overheard the question itself your stomach gurgles in reply. Before you can react Rebecca was already on the move. “I’ll take that as a yes” she says with a laugh, and a knowing smile. Unzipping her backpack and she pulls out a familiar looking bar. Handing it to you, you don’t have to re-read the wrapper to know what it was.

“X-S Mass?" You ask, knowing it was indeed the ubiquitous bar. You did have one of those delicious snacks courtesy of Delphine this morning, but you decide on eating it anyways figuring another bar couldn’t hurt.

“Yeah, well,” Rebecca starts, sounding like she was looking for an excuse. “The princess was giving boxes of them out to everyone as if she owned the company.” Rebecca then stopped, picked out a bar for herself, (her third of the day,) and began opening the wrapper before continuing. “And even though I’m not really trying to lose weight…” she paused again to take a massive bite of the bar before her before continuing, “It’s just they do taste really good and since she was handing boxes of them out for free, I was all “Why not?” You nod in agreement as you finish your own bar which tasted just as crunchy and good as the first one Delphine handed you this morning.

“Anyways how did the workout go yesterday?” she asks after swallowing the last of her own calorie laden energy bar.

“Well-“ BZZzz The school bell signaling five minutes till class stars cuts you off before you can reply. As you both head to Mrs. Kawasaki class, you quickly explain the events of yesterday afternoon; the short jogging, Claire unexpectedly showed up with the X-S mass bars, and how Delphine’s interested in working out with you and Kate.

“So what do you think?” you ask as the both of you enter Mrs. Kawaski’s with a few minutes to spare.

“I think she did make her mom by the company or at least half the stock in it. I know she’s friggen loade-“

“No I meant about inviting more people.” You say trying to keep Rebecca on track.

“Oh well I’m not so sure. I would just ask Kate. She won’t mind if you ask her first.” She assures you. And she was right Kate was one of your best friends and wouldn’t mind if you at least asked if Delphinine could join. In class you take your seat between where Kate and Becca sat. The school uniform Kate had on was as ill-fitting as ever, but something about her was different. Sitting there she looked…well...perky!

“Hey, C.J!” she says in a happy tone.” You excited to work out again today?” You turn to Rebecca who looks equally flabbergasted at her friend’s new found poise.

“Uh..yeah Kate …” you begin, “they don’t call’em sweat pants for nothing…But I wanted to talk to you about that. Delphinine asked if she could come too today, but I thought I might as well ask you first. Would it be O.K. if she came too?”

“Well…umm…” Kate stammers in a whisper instantly turning into her shy self. You could tell she was conflicted with answering. Kate was never really the decider in your group, and was perfectly content to just go with the flow.

But now she had to decide, now she had to speak up, and raising her voice so you could just barely here it she said…
1451122111111112.title: The best bar, bar none

choices: Claire has once again invited herself to “coach” the two of you
Kate continues to attempt to work out: Cute and chubby shenanigans ensue.
14511221111111121.content:
"Umm...maybe she could workout some other time?" Kate suggests in a whisper voice. "I'd like it to be just you and me...if that's ok with you C.J. I'm not too good at working out and things might get...embarrassing" she notes turning red remembering how she fell on her flat on her front yesterday.

You too begin to turn red, remembering the sight of Kate's healthy breasts as they bounced in time with her jogging. It would be a shame to miss the sight of the tall and rather buxom Delphine as she too jogged, and sweated along with Kate. In the end though Kate was right, Delphine could work out at a later date, and maybe Kate would feel comfortable with workout around others in the future.

"Oh, o.k. Kate No big deal." you assure your stout yet shy schoolmate.

And that was the end of it. Classes started and Delphine understood when you told her after school that day.

"Kate, She is tres bashful. Non?" she asks her oh-so beautiful face looking disappointed for only a second. You nod admittedly, when she slowly tracing a finger around your chest in the shape of a heart. "But, she is quite lucky she has a friend like you C.J" she adds with a wink.

Puzzling over what she could have possibly meant by that, you glance at the clock and hurry to meet Kate outside the gym.

On that second day of working out...
14511221111111121.title: C.J.and Kate + Ate  (I mean Zero)

choices: Of course Claire's going easy on you. She stops you both at three laps with X-S!
You're interrupted half-way by a visitor...
145112211111111211.content:
It wasn't exactly an understatement to say that you were excited about your latest tumble into physical activity.

There was a certain chipper aura that seemed to flow from your every orifice, filling you with a honey-sweet sense of satisfaction as you merrily trod down the hallways that led to the underused gymnasium. Behind you, a roving trio of rather indiscriminate gals trail; all but floating on air as they basked in your confidence and delight. They swooned at the very sight of you, and as news travels fast around Chubbeso, these more docile (and, let's be honest, sane) admirers were more than willing to help you whip yourself into shape and get all smooth and muscly. So much so that they would happily donate their X-S bars in hopes of appeasing your appetite. As you smiled and took their scarlet-wrapped munchies, they all giggled and blushed as young girls tend to do before waving you goodbye in those suddenly adorable British accents.

So now, of course, you were double happy.

Unwrapping what must have been your tenth one today, you slowly peel the shiny wrapping paper off the bar like a banana and take small bites. These things were actually pretty good, considering that you must have eaten a box all to yourself and you weren't sick of them yet. All in different flavors too; you'd only had about three that were chocolate so far, but the rest were all really creative like sherbert or yogurt. There was also a pina colata, but that wasn't supposed to be very good...

Anyway, you were on top of the world now that you had your and everyone else's new favorite snack. Granted you were still pretty high up there before you got this... coconut flavored delicacy, but the granola bar really put things on Everest for you. With Kate no doubt waiting for you on the other side of these gym doors, flared up and raring to go on another one of your exercise adventures, you were psyched to finally have a work out buddy. A little shocking that said work out buddy would be Kate, but that's not the point (if anybody, you expected former right-fielder Becca). The point was that you two were going to have an awesome time running today. You had brought your ipod, taking on Kate's example from yesterday, and your personal water bottle just in case. Yep, things were gonna be smooth...

You confidently blast the doors open with your newfound energy, beaming the biggest smile that could possibly fit on your face. "Hey Kate!" you shout excitedly, "You ready for another round around the track?"

Perhaps you should have taken a better look to the newest fixture in the room before deciding that today's routine would be enjoyable.

There, plopped on the bleachers like her usual lump-on-a-log self, was Kate looking morose as ever. You couldn't tell why, she didn't look any different from yesterday. Illfitting white shirt that exposed just a hair's bit of blubber around her waist and a pair of overtaxed athletic shorts that all but choked on her generous lower half. She even had her tennis shoes on, tied and ready! But there, in front of the bleachers, was the problem. Or at least it's newest throne. Reinforced steel (painted gold) bent into a double-wide fold out chair with purple heavy duty rubber acting as the seat and back was enough to give it away. The color scheme was one you had grown to fear and fear even more during your time at Chubbeso. And sure enough, without saying a word to Kate, when you gandered at the back of the seat your heart sank.

There, written in pretty golden cursive, were the words "Coach Claire Masters".

How could she possibly have made this so fast?! Suddenly you understood why Kate was so down...

"Oh, CJ!" she chirped, emerging from the ladies' restroom, "Do you like my chair? I thought having me around acting like one of those coach-people would help give you and Katie-Kate some incentive!" she said perkily, waddling across the gym floor towards the two of you.

Sans any resemblance of physical fitness at all, she certainly looked the part for playing coach. Dressed in a purple tracksuit that looked soft to the tailored touch, her wide blubbery body no longer jiggled with every movement now that it was confined. Well, not as much anyway. It was more of a solid ripple. Underneath, her black tank top was clearly visible underneath, the hooded jacket was half-unzipped for style apparently, as was a little crown insignia on the corner of her right breast, stretched until it looked somewhat like an upside down jellyfish over Claire's generous upper mounds of flesh. Her pants, purple as well, looked like the drawstrings were about to find some way to pop. You weren't sure how that was even possible, but the poor things were drawn all the way into their holes to accommodate Claire's heavy rear. You wouldn't blame them if they did.

"You like?" she asked promiscuously as she did a clumsy little turn, "I think Ms. Touya's gym class would have a lot better attendance if she looked this good in sweats."

"Uh, yeah, I guess." You answer half-heartedly, still getting over the initial depression that came along with Claire forcing herself into yet another one of your hobbies, "Listen, I know you wanna help, but Kate kinda just wants me and her to work out in-

"Then no worries!" Claire said with enthusiasm, reaching into her surprisingly loose pants pocket to pull out a pair of Gucci sunglasses and a whistle. "I said I'd be your coach, not your workout buddy." she said flatly, slipping the sunglasses atop her chubby cheeks, "I'm not one for physical labor, you cute little naive thing you, I'm here to act as motivation! See my whistle?"

She then blew on said instrument. Loudly.

"This whistle means business!" she giggled as she waddled over to the big-boobied brunette sulking on the first bleacher, "Katie here said that she wanted to get in shape, that's what we're gonna do!" she giggled once more as she placed a hand on Kate's well-insulated shoulder.

Then, and you knew it was all over here, Claire waddled over to her chair and plopped herself inside it's ostentatious arms. In one giant wobbling sensation, Claire had fastened herself in using only her rolls. Her stomach weighed her down from the front, and her side blubber was caught under the arms. She was stuck fast, and there wasn't a damned thing you could do about it. With a look of pure haughty satisfaction on her face, she smiled one more time before slipping the whistle over her long strawberry blonde locks and giving it another good blow.

"Alrighty then, Mister Dalton and Miss... um... Kate." she said playfully, "You start running and I'll tell you when to stop! And, for every... um... let's say three laps each of you do, you can have an energy bar! Or maybe for every kiss in CJ's case... Oh, CJ, that reminds me, go grab my duffle bag; you can't miss it, it's purple and gold and I think I left it in the restroom. Then start. Actually, get a few out for me; I'm hungry. Then you can start."
145112211111111211.title: Coach Masters is not a Master Coach...

choices: Kate agrees; mass Claire-encouraged comfort stuffing ensues
Kate refuses and hurts herself further, but finishes; you should walk her home..
1451122111111112111.content:
"Good job you two!" Claire cheered from her seat, rightfully wedged into her throne by her royal posterior's considerable width, "I want you to do two more... um, times around the track and then you can both take a break!"

"You mean laps, right?"

"Yeah, two more laughs and then come and sit down!"

It wasn't a longshot to say that Claire had little ability to do much of anything other than boast, brag, or buy things; especially not motivate. Her life of self-centered hedonism that focused solely on food and cute boys encouraged by an equally food addicted boy-crazy narcissist of a mother had left her somewhat lacking in the social department. It wasn't really a riddle to be solved though, plainly obvious to all those who cared to see it.

However it was her undeterred attempts in tutoring anyone who she deemed worth the time of day in subjects that she knew almost nothing about that really got on most people's nerves. Yours included. Granted, she was a really sweet (sycophantic) girl who really just wanted everyone to be her friend (prima donna) and who just so happened to get her jollies through overeating and excess flesh around the waist (obesophile). And you just so happened to be the only boy in school, its only natural that she devote an unhealthy amount of attention towards doting over your well being and eating habits, right?

Well, that would be her justification for any other day.

Your assistance in Kate's exercise regime was a cornerstone in her physical activity, or at least her attitude regarding it. You remembered yesterday fondly; reminiscing about the short bout of running that seemed to go on forever, the quiet simplicity of the gymnasium and the deeply rhythmic thumping as Kate jogged heavily across the track. Sure there was lots of running and Kate's footsteps hadn't gotten any lighter, and while it sure did seem to go on forever the gym certainly wasn't quiet.

With Claire in the big echoing room, there was no hope for a peaceful respite from her incessant giggling awkward grunts as she repositioned herself. If it wasn't noises, it was flirtatious remarks to your "impressive" stamina (of course that single lap around the track must have seemed impressive to a girl like Claire) or how "if [you] wanted, you could come back early and sit on her lap."

'Yeah, like there's even a lap to sit on.' you snort sharply to yourself as you slow your pace, your gaze traveling clear over to the other side of the gym where poor Kate trod hopelessly forward. Her entire body was visibly aching, with one flabby arm craned to arch her poor overtaxed back as her heavy endowment pranced proudly a foot in front of her. Her short brown hair matted slightly with her increase in perspiration and her chubby red cheeks bouncing with every move. Earlier you heard her say something about her ipod being confiscated by a certain princess claiming that it "distracted her from her exercise." where upon it was promptly shoved within the confines of Claire's overstuffed bra. So obviously things weren't exactly going well for poor 'Katie-Kate'.

Not that you were faring all too splendidly yourself. Granted, all those energy bars certainly gave your energy levels a kickstart. But ten of them sloshing in your belly on top of one of Bunny's heavy meals was a little much. It didn't so much speed you up as much as it did slow you down. With a slightly swollen paunch bobbing out in front of you, your own steps were just a little bit more cumbersome than yesterday. And, while you weren't the least bit sore from yesterday's little dip into exercise, it seemed much harder than earlier to complete your lap. However you would certainly pull through...

so long as Kate didn't pass out.

Falling behind slightly so as to give the bespectacled girl a little boost in confidence, the familiar sounds of yesterday's run get closer and closer. They're slower this time without any rhythm to guide them, but all the same in your experience.

*smack* *smack* *smack*

Kate's plain white tee, already slightly discolored with sweat around the crevices of her womanly body, did little to withhold the massive blobs of flesh balloons that came so precariously close to knocking her in the mouth as she jogged. With every lackluster pull of the knee, up went her chest. And ever time her chest went up, so did her shirt. Slowly the somewhat tight garment found its way up onto Kate's round belly, resting on a fold until it either fell or she manually tugged it down.

Soon her breathing came into earshot, "*smack*...hoof....*smack*...huff..."

She was definitely slower than yesterday. Perhaps it was the lack of a positive beat to motivate her, or perhaps it was simply Claire's presence in your regime (that had certainly demotivated you more than any poster could). But for whatever the reason, Kate looked like she was ready to just fall over and die right then and there. Slowing down even more to let the awkwardly jogging plumper catch up... then slowing down considerably more, you finally met Kate's gaze.

"O-Oh..." she wheezed, "Cee...CJ..."

"Hey, how you holding up?" you ask with genuine concern for your desperate friend, "You don't look so good."

"O-Oh I'muh... I'm fine!" Kate said with a fake smile plastered across her chubby red cheeks, pumping her arms and flaring her hips in exaggeration, "I've... I've just gotta catch my second wind; you go on and finish so you can sit down!"

You raise an eyebrow critically as Kate's gait picks up a bit before falling behind once more. You decide not to go against her wishes, but still keep pretty close to her speed wise. The remaining lap is a relative breeze for you, having grown so used to running from your squad of psychotic admirers in the duration of your enrollment. Kate however seemed to grow slower and slower until her awkward jogging was her usual waddle, her poor back arched so badly she was stuck permanently gazing at the ceiling.

"Ugh! Come on guys!" Claire whined from her seat below, unwrapping yet another one of her special bars and stuffing it into her kraut, "You were both going, like, so fast! And now you're all slow!"

"Why don't you come up here and try?!" you bark down to Claire

"Oh silly CJ, if I did that, what would be your motivation for you to finish?" she giggled, "Unless you want to see me all hot and sweaty, this tracksuit clinging to my every womanly curve-

"E-Enough!!" Kate shouts somewhat uncharacteristically, she's doubled over now and sounds as if she's breathing through a coffee stirrer, "I-I've had it! I-I can't run anymore!" her tone lowered, but still quite audible, "I'm... I'm just gonna sit down for a while so my back will quit hurting!"

The poor girl then retreated down the stairs, waddle made even more awkward by her inability to even remotely tense her spine. Her breasts were stuck far up in the air, so much so that you could only make out her face from the nose up. Probably the reason she fell flat on her bum on one of the stairs. Luckily there was still lots of padding to break her fall.

"Kate!" you shout, making haste over to your fallen friend and helping hoist her up, "Are you alright?"

"N-No!" she whimpers, tears visible in the corners of her eyes, "My back really hurts, CJ! A-And ohhh... my feet are killing me, I-I think I need to sit down."

Claire, still situated in her own fat, pats the bleachers beside her blubber-enclosed seat, "There there Kate... sit there." she says softly, "You should really take it easy with this whole... um, "exercise" thing. Its a really dangerous process." she says with a mouthful of granola and chocolate, "First you lose weight and get colder easily, and then you don't fill out your bed as well so you get even colder, and then you catch pneumonia- which they won't let you eat ice cream in bed for like tonsils by the way- and..."

"Look, Claire, just get her some water, alright?" you can't help but cut her off from whatever nonsensical direction she was going with that, "Do you think you'll be okay? Think you can finish your laps?"

"Don't be silly!" Claire chidingly as she reached into her duffel bag and pulled out a Chubbeso-offbrand energy drink and several bars, "Poor Katie's chest nearly broke her back and you want her to run?"

"But she should be fine in a second after she runs and-

"Nonsense. Here Kate, eat these and you'll feel better." Claire said sternly, pushing the food towards Kate, "I've got more if you get hungry."
1451122111111112111.title: Chubby Chests equal Aching Backs

choices: You continue half-carrying Kate back to her room alone, and rest there
Rebbeca spots you struggling with Kate and comes to lends her muscle.
14511221111111121112.content:
“No….no more bars…” Kate said catching her breath on the bleachers. “Just some water…please…” She added between her long chest heaving breaths. Seeing how Claire looked like she wouldn’t be getting up anytime soon, you hurry across the gym to your bag and hand a bottle of water to Kate. Immediately she drinks wildly from it carelessly letting it soak both her beet red face and the near see-through sweat soaked shirt.

“Whew” she sighs after guzzling the last bit. The harsh redness had left her face and her cheeks returned to their natural fleshy pink hue. “Thanks CJ, I needed that.” Kate then gave a slight groan as she raised her arms upward stretching her achy back muscles. The unconsciously erogenous act enhanced how tight Kate’s shirt was, and only emphasized the trio of oversized pumpkins that were her bra straining breasts and belt unbuckling belly.

“Well…good.” Came a curt voice just to your right. You blink, realizing you must have been staring as Kate stretched, and glance towards the voice of Claire. “More for me then” said Claire, using one of her favorite phrases. Claire looked unmoved (literally) by Kate’s accident. Sure Claire was glad that Kate was safe, but Claire knew that accidents like this were one of the MANY risks that came with this loathsome exercise thing in the first place. Unable to decide if she’d rather keep coaching or just go home, she haughtily crossed her arms and frowned at the exhausted exerciser much like a royal Marquis would at a tired peasant (her purple throne and crown insignia only enhanced this effect.)

“So…one more lap?” Kate asked looking unperturbed and determined to reach her goal of three laps. You nod and help her up from the bleachers slowly. Back on the track (again literally) Kate looked much better. She still had a slight hitch from her achy back, but her spirit was still there. Soon the final lap was within reach, but of course just as things started looking up…”WHUMP!”

Kate’s foot looked like it had gone down wrong, and you could only watch helplessly as the rest of Kate came down with it.

“Oomph…Ow..Owieee!” Kate shouted, not crying like before but clearly still in pain. Gritting her teeth, she sat up gripping her ankle and lower left leg in pain.

“Kate! Kate?" You say hurrying to her side. "Did you break something!?”

“I think…” she whimpers as she rocks, “It’s a cramp…”

You start to panic not knowing how to help in a situation like this (Thanks in no small part to Chubbeso’s lack of a real PE class.) “Uh, don’t panic Kate! Should I massage it? Or let’s see, uh, keep it elevated! No wait.. Call Dr. Young!" You look towards Claire who looks equally frightened and confused in her chair. Masterfully she reaches for her bag and grabs it without having to give up her comfy throne.

“Actually….urgh…I think it’s easing up… I can make it home.” Kate says looking up from the injured muscle. “But…” she grunts, turning to you with pained eyes “I think you’re gonna have to help me walk home…”

“Ok!” You agree quickly, wanting to do anything you could to help. Kate drapes a plump arm around your neck and shoulder before trying to stand up. Jerkily using you for support, the two of your half sway half shuffle your way out of the gym.

Claire, who had been busy looking for her cell phone buried under a pile of bars and weight gain shakes energy drinks lifted her phone from her gym bag in victory. “Ha! Got it! Hang on Katey Kate I’ll…” Claire looked about the empty gym and realized the two of you must have already left. She went to catch up with you except…Except when she went to get up she found she was stuck in her new coaching throne. Her layers of lard had somehow wedged into the plush posh leather of the seat securing her into place. The" Royal Figure" Claire so prided herself on had once again slightly inconvenienced her. “Not a problem…” she said aloud and to no one in particular. Small problems like this (hips brushing against doorways, fridge doors hitting her boobs) came along with such a well figured frame. She’d simply phone for help and be out of this seat in no time. Suddenly, before she could even fat thumb a text, a new set of figures came into the gym.

“Bonjour Claire.” Came the unmistakable soft accented voice of Delphine. Claire could see that it Delphine wasn’t alone either, Chris Walker and Suzuka Touya also plodded their way into the gym. Claire was mortified at the thought that they might actually be here to work out too. “Now that CJ and the how-you-say “bashful” Kate have gone, we can exercise now, no?" Delphine announced confirming Claire’s suspicions. “Oh and what is zis? Claire! You’ve come dressed to be our coach and exercise with us? And more X-S Mass bars too? Se magnifique!” Delhpine added as she closed in on the “trapped” Claire.

“Wait! No!" Claire tired to explain. "I’m not here for you! Kate! CJ wait up! Nooo!” she shouted as the group of girls lovingly helped her out of the chair and onto the jogging track for some exercise. It would be a long afternoon for her.

Meanwhile...
14511221111111121112.title: Carrying Kate and a Caught Claire

choices: “Yes really CJ… My back is killing me! I'll shower and be right *giggle* back"
"No-haha..um…I was just kidding. I am really tired though, see you tomorrow CJ"
145112211111111211121.content:
As the two of you shambled out of the gym it seemed there was no else around to lend you a hand with the injured Kate. Even worse was the fact that Dr. Young, who would probably knew exactly how to handle injuries like this was all the way in her office at the other side of campus. Fortunately Kate’s dorm room wasn’t too far from the gym, so you decide to just go there. Kate was felling better, and was even able to put some of her tonnage back on the injured leg, but some was not all, and your back ending up taking the brunt of her bulk. With Kate shorter stature practically slumped on your shoulders and most of her expansive rack pressing against you, it felt like you were wearing a heavy plushy jacket, or a cumbersome squishy comforter. In fact, if her weight wasn’t giving your legs the workout of their lives you might have noticed being semi-squished like this actually felt kind of…

“I’m sorry CJ…” Kate suddenly says in a sad and apologetic voice. “It’s my own stupid fault you have to carry me fat ass home.” Kate, never one to swear, sounded on the edge of tears again, the sound of it was even harder for your to bare than her weight.

“Erugh” you grunt readjusting yourself before talking. “Kate, it’s not a big deal and it’s not your fault.”

“Yes it is!” she sobs louder and now definitely crying. “If I hadn’t wanted to do that stupid last lap…I…Look at me, I shouldn’t even have been jogging in the first place. I’m a fat stupid loser who can’t even run a few laps without falling down on my face or twisting my back.”

“Kate!” You say getting pissed. “You’re not a loser!” You’re just letting the words come out now, not exactly in control of what you were saying. “I think it’s great you found something you want to do. Just because this time wasn’t that great doesn’t mean you should stop. Even If you fall down and twist your ankle, or get a back spasm the next ten times I’ll be ready to uh, massage it out…or however you treat those things …”

“Really?” she whispered, sniffing back her tears.

“Of course! And even if I had to carry you back from the gym every time you’d still be my friend and Becca’s too.”

Kate seemed encouraged by your words. “Thank you so much CJ…” She said leaning even further onto your shoulder to wipe her tears. She tightened the half arm hug she had on you even tighter and almost tilted you off balance, steadying yourself, you smiled at the tender act. Kate was going to be just fine.

Finally the two of you reached Kate’s dorm room. Kate headed inside first, her tenderly pained leg only enhancing her usual waddle. Leaving your shoulder she hobbled as gingerly as she could to her couch where she flopped down having finally reaching relief. This sent her whole body a quiver: her sweaty sweater puppies bounced rhythmically, and her stomach shook underneath the restive fabric that was her clingy t-shirt. Her stomach had decided that it was quite happy to rest on top of her thighs bobbing up and down with every pant Kate gave.

You too decide to take a seat, even though they had been relieved of the weight on your shoulders, your legs still felt like they were on fire. You move your over-worked, but steadily thick legs towards a wide and relaxing chair, realizing how few times you’d been to Kate’s place. (Claire had made sure your dorm room was the biggest around and so it was often the place of choice to hang out.) Kate’s place wasn’t all that different from your own, it was a lot smaller, but it was also far cleaner.

Slumped on the couch Kate takes a few more deep breaths before perking up with a thought. “Hey CJ since you’re staying here…you know what’d be really good right now would be some nice cold ice-“

“I got it! Don’t get up!” you cut her off not wanting Kate to strain her already injury leg. How could have not thought of it. Ice! Putting some ice on her hurt leg would be exactly what it needed. In fact you could go for a glass of cold water yourself, considering all the “weight lifting” you did today along with your jogging. Walking into the kitchen your grab yourself a cup and pour a big glass of cold water, and then opening the freezer to get some ice you…

“Huh?” you say aloud. Kate’s freezer looked more like a miniature ice cream store! It was filled to the brim with what had to be a pint of every flavor of ice cream available. You and Rebecca had long know of Kate’s not so well hidden passion for ice-cream, (with Kate ordering the hugest split available whenever the three of you went out) but you never knew of this secret sweet stockpile Kate had at home!

“Um…I was going to say some ice cream would be good right now.” Kate said sheepishly as she read the confused look on your face from the couch and looking a little embarrassed to have a freezer so full of ice cream. “But I’ll take a pint of rocky road since you’re up. Oh, and feel free to have some yourself…”

You shrug and gulp down your glass of ice-less water, ice cream did sound really good right now…

You returned to the comfy chair two pints of ice cream and two spoons in hand. As Kate opens hers she immediately digs in, not getting enough in her mouth fast enough. As you sample some you agree the ice cream us delicious, but the way Kate was devouring hers, it was like she hadn’t eaten in days!

“Uh... I thought you weren’t hungry…” you say recalling how she turned down Claire’s offer of a X-S Mass bar smorgasbord. This seems enough to draw Kate’s attention away from the mutilated pint of ice-cream in front of her.

“Well, I kind of was…”she admits giving you a small smile. “It’s just…with Claire there I didn’t want to…Claire can be sort of…” her shy nature was showing as she held back from saying what was really on her mind.

“Annoying.” You suggest.

“…Yeah.” She says with a giggle sending her boobies a ‘bouncing once more. You were beginning to think that the dairy treat she love so much and her own swelling milk jugs weren’t unrelated. Regardless, they hardly get a chance to rest before she’s back face first into her ice cream. Your eyes widened as you realized Kate was almost done with her entire pint, while you’d barely scraped the top of your own.

Letting her finish you continued making conversation “Look Claire’s just doing the whole "coach" thing to get to me. Don’t let her annoy you, she can actually be pretty nice sometimes, I mean she did give everyone those delicious bars."

Already finished Kate set her empty container aside. “Don’t worry, Claire won’t stop me.” She said giving a flex that was peculiar as there was more flesh under the arm then over the bicep.

“..Oh my back!" She says suddenly arching her spine. “You know that massage you offered back there does sound really…nice-I mean it would *owie* really help. " She says getting up. “But I'm a sweaty mess right now, I’m going to shower up and be right back”

Somehow Kate had the energy to swing her top-heavy self backward and forward, this sent her bloated belly to jiggle and fold up on itself, hoisting herself up from the confines of the couch. Carefully nursing her left leg she made her way to way must have been her bathroom.

“Really?” you call after her, a little surprised that Kate mentioned or even remembered your offer from a few minutes ago (If you could even call it that. an offer it was more like a speech, but now you were just over thinking things..)
145112211111111211121.title: #Occupy Kate’s Place & Get some Ice for that ache

choices: The next morning, you're called to the principal's office for insurance reasons.
Some time passes, and no one is losing any weight. In fact....
1451122111111112111212.content:
Curiously you raise an eyebrow as the Kate hobbled rather awkwardly from her couch. A change in course was visible from her initial course towards the bathroom, she turned back and to the left, towards you and the couch. Her face, apparently still colored from lugging her cumbersome body around on a bum ankle, was a deep scarlet that shone brightly against the contrast of her usual somewhat pale self. Her lips twitched into a shaky smile and she waved one chubby hand for your dismissal.

"N-No, haha..." she puffed, "I was... um, just kidding about that whole massage thing; y-you don't have to stay and take care of me."

Again, rather strange behavior. But then again Kate was pretty strange. She probably just wasn't comfortable accepting a massage from you when she was all 'sweaty and gross'. Besides, you gave terrible massages. You could only smile and cock your head to the right playfully.

"Alright, fine fine." you jest, "Should I at least wait on you to get out of the shower... you know, in case you fall or something?"

Kate's face seemed to get even redder at your proposition. "U-Um no, that's not... that's not necessary CJ!" she said hurriedly, "I'll... I'll take a hot bath, just so I don't have to stand okay? You go home, I know Ms. Kawasaki assigned us homework... and you're terrible at math."

"Okay, fine I can take a hint." you smile before prying yourself from Kate's well-worn couch. In retrospect, the Chubbeso-Brand ice cream was probably not the best idea, especially after such a light workout; it left you feeling a little bloated in your stomach. "Just call me if you need anything, okay Kate? Don't do anything you think you can't handle." you offer politely, "If you need something from the store, just call me and I'll run and grab it for you. Sound like a deal?"

Kate gazes at you from across the room, sparklies in her eyes and an ecstatic expression on her cherubic face. "O-Oh CJ, you don't have to..."

"No sweat." you say kindly as you slip your arm into your uniform's jacket, "Just let me get my eight hours and we'll call it even. Sound like a deal?"

There is a slight pause between you. Kate's mind switches to hi-def slo-mo as her heartbeat jumps rapidly up and down. "D-D-Deal!" she manages to squeak before you smile and make your leave from the apartment.

"B-Bye... CJ..."

***


Luckily for you (by which I mean the reader, not CJ) Kate would not be the only one taking a bath tonight. As customary, Rebecca Maglen would end her long hard day of studying with one of her favorite past times- bathing.

Now when most people think of "bathing", what comes to mind is the general understanding of the word: you have hot water, soap, some shampoo, and a back scrubby with a washcloth. And all of these elements were of course present. The tub in her flat, not provided by the Masters Family but kept up at her own family's expense from the States, was not one of grand opulence; most assuredly unlike the one Claire Masters' bathroom held fixture.

No, this simple white (mostly plastic, even) tub had been transformed into one of Rebbecca's most personal attachments. Well worn by the soaks lasting an hour-or-two at a time nightly, the valiant bath had grown aged with hard water stains and even a slight ring where the water usually fell. But when she was in it, the tub took on a whole new life. One of candles and salts, a slight bubble mixture and lotion thrown into the mix to give it all that smell of lilac that wafted and gently filled her apartment... it was her heaven; her secret sin.

She would never be caught; being so girly as to enjoy a long relaxing soak in the tub for a frivolous amount of time like this. Certainly not with you (CJ this time) anyway. But behind closed doors, Rebecca was a habitual bather- one who could take the most unelegant fixtures and turn them into thorough masterpieces.

Claire might have had all the money in the world, but Rebbecca could most assuredly proclaim that she had never so vividly enjoyed a soak like she had.

And it showed. Whenever she emerged from her tub, she was at ease. She changed into whatever pajama pants still fit her round rump and grabbed a simple hoodie (a tee or tank when it was warmer) and plopped down on the couch for her favorite shows. And when she missed them? Let's just say no one wanted her to miss bath time.

So we gaze downward at Rebbecca Maglen's opulence, sitting stark naked in a tub of her own design. Filled with warm steaming water, which stills until one of her thick legs makes a movement. So small was the tub that lately her whole body seemed to fill it. Well, mostly her backside. While she was running the water, she had to clench her tremendous cheeks so as to avoid an uncomfortable slapping as she dragged them down to the cold porcelain. But regardless, she made it work. Her lovehandles, too, touched the sides of her beloved sanctuary. And while at first its touch was icy and her own withheld, as steam filled the room and water began to drip from the ceiling she managed to loosen up and allow herself, all of herself to come undone and fill the tub.

With both hands positioned queenly on the rim, flesh from the arm pooling as it sat in its own mass, Rebbecca took another spoonful of her yogurt and slowly lifted it to and eventually past her lips. This was another perk recently amended to the overall tradition of Bathing; food. Always something just a little sweet for hungry young Becca to snack on, her tastes usually revolved around anything that wouldn't crumble. Chocolate bars, ice cream, yogurt, all of which she had been known to sneak into the tub along with her in rather generous portions. She wasn't above bringing an entire Chips Ahoy! package into the bathroom with her and not leaving the tub until there were little crumbs of cookie floating in the water and down the drain.

Lazily, her eyes traversed the slight mist that had gathered in her time spent in the bathroom and settled on a particularly round, generous bulge that surged from the water and folded into two neat jelly rolls. It was her belly, growing bigger by the day it seemed sometimes.

Checking to make sure it was empty first, she gently dropped the packet of Yoplait and brought her chubby fingers to her stomach. Soft and delicate, sitting on the ample perch her suffocatingly thick thighs provided, it had always seemed so different than the rest of her body- especially since joining this pampering academy. In her youth (her younger days of youth) Rebbecca had played sports, namely Ladies' Softball. And while she still retained a mean pitching arm to this day, that was all that really remained of Pre-Academy Becca.

She had certainly always been big, but she had always been rather active too. With no sports teams to feed her need for activity though, Becca couldn't help but feel that she was being spoiled. Her hands had lost callus long ago and whatever muscle she retained was quickly piled over with fat and thensome. With these uncalloused hands, the heavy girl shook her gut, making light ripplings in the water. She regretted letting herself go soft at first, until she gained the sneaky suspicion that you (again, CJ) liked soft. However she still retained a twinge of guilt when she looked at her body. So out of shape. So round. So much like a certain princess...

Said tummy grumbled in a spoiled fashion, knowing that it would get what it so desperately desired.

"Mrmmm..." she grunted slightly to herself as she drooped one wet arm over the edge of her white porcelain paradise to grab another sweet; Oreos this time, a gift from Mom no less.

Without hesitation or sincere cognitive thought, Becca slowly peeled back the freshness flap on the bag and grabbed three at a time; popping them into her mouth with expert precision before sinking further into her own juices with a smile of wicked delight on her face; pleased at her own indulgences and more than happy to forget her guilt... even for tonight.

She would find that, twenty minutes later, her unflexed flaring thighs had made it difficult for her bodacious bod to leave the tub she, ironically, so desperately never wanted to leave. But it would be too late, as she would fall asleep before hand with cookie crumbs and frosting remaining on her plump lips (actually not an uncommon occurrence, especially not lately) and wake up at one with a frightful sneeze.

She would unwedge herself, slip on some pj's and go to bed after one more sinfully delicious cookie...
1451122111111112111212.title: tee-you-be

choices: Claire reveals a special clause she added to the contract you just signed…
You two attempt to resist seconds, but Rebecca pigging out isn’t helping…
14511221111111121112121.content:
The next morning you overslept and found that once again you were late and, once again you were also forced to rely on your new stockpile of energy bars as a replacement breakfast. Finishing the second bar as you entered Chubbeso’s main hallway, (mmmm blueberry) you were surprised to hear a small buzz as the school wide P.A. system clicked on.

“C.J. Dalton, may I see you in my office at once?” Headmistress Masters’ husky voice spills out from the speakers. An echo of giggles from the nearby classrooms surrounds you. Usually when you were called to the headmistress office it meant Claire had cooked up some crazy idea and asked her mom to help see it through. You make your way to Mrs. Masters’ office once again as you count off “the princesses” previous schemes; there was the time she had the whole school go to the beach for a field trip (which you soon realized was created just for a chance to see you in your swim trunks), or the time where she convinced her mom to cancel school on your birthday (which admittedly was pretty cool except that it meant the entire student body was chasing after you the whole afternoon.) Yep, sometimes you just had to wonder how Mrs. Masters got the job of being a headmistress in the first place. With that in mind you entered her office wondering what sort of craziness you were about to meet today.

As you entered the headmistress office (which still featured a few crumb laden dishes strew about) you were surprised to see that not only was Mrs. Masters out, but apparently you weren’t the only one who had been called here. Kate was already sitting in the long cushiony bench like chair that faced the headmistress desk. You sat next to her and realize she was looking rather gloomy. What could Mrs. Masters want with the both of you? And what could have made the usually cheerful Kate so down in the dumps?

“Hey Kate...what’s up?” You ask.

“Oh, hey… it's this” she says, her face perking up as it met with yours, but only for a moment. Her sad eyes look back down to the floor (or at least what would have been the floor had her squishy gut and monster titties not been in the way) following her gaze you see what they were gazing sulkily at. Kate’s injured ankle had been wrapped in a miniature cast, not of thick heavy duty plaster, but with enough gauze to insure the injured appendage would stay put.

Suddenly there was the sound of thunderous footsteps, sending the plates on the desk in front of you a jittering. The office door swings open and filling in the entire doorway is Mrs. Masters.“Hello Mr. Dalton.” She begins smiling at you like a piece of chocolate chip cheesecake. “Kate and I were just discussing how the whole exercise after school thing was going.” You frown getting a sense you knew exactly where this conversation was headed, regardless of your grimace Mrs. Masters’ gladly carries on. “You see C.J, Kate came in to see Dr. Young this morning, and Dr. Young informed me that Kate practically limped as she did. Turns out, Kate has a severely sprained ankle. Isn’t that right Ms. Granden?” Put on the spot Kate nods her head looking awful guilty. “Sooo…” the heavyset headmistress continues as she takes a seat, leaning backwards in her deluxe reclining lay-z-girl chair, “after much thinking and discussion with Claire, I’ve come to decide that using the gym unsupervised is much too dangerous. I’m going to have to ask for that key back please...” Leaning over her desk she extended her hand to you as if across a dinner table for seconds.

You stare at the hand for a second or two before answering. “But…that’s not fair. Just a few days ago you said it was fine. Kate and I were just jogging when she-“

“Injured her leg?” Mrs. Masters cuts you off. She eases back and her face loses its smile, her voice takes a more sincere protective and motherly tone. “Could you imagine if she broke it? On school property but with no adults around to help her?” She frowns and shakes her head to dismiss the thought, sending her upper half wobbling as she does so. “I’m sorry but I care too much about the students of Chubbeso to let something like that happen. So, until I do some further research and hire a professional physical education trainer, I’m afraid I’ll need that key back, and you and Kate will have to sign…this.”

She slides a piece of paper over to you one that is completely covered in small print. You eyes glance over it and you attempt to read a line “Dictates that herby litigation from both the undersigned parties will not “make use” of gym (see subsection c, clause b) and...” Your brain, still waking up, can barely make any sense of the legal jargon.

Mrs. Masters apparently senses your confusion and explains “It’s basically saying you won’t exercise, at least in our gym, until Claire-I mean, I give you my approval. Now please…”she hands you a pen and looks expectantly at you then at the paper.

You turn to Kate before signing, but she can only shrug as if to say “What choice did we have?” Sighing at this annoyance you sign the paper and hand the gym key over. Kate follows suit and as soon as she finishes signing her name Mrs. Masters scoops the paper off from the desk.

“There now” she glances at the slip for a second before tucking the paper away into a desk drawer. “Thank you Mrs. Granderson, and thank you C.J for being such a gentleman about this.” She slowly flops forward, up and out of her chair. She plods to the door and holds it open. Taking the hint, the two of you make your way out “I do hope your exercising goes well Mr. Dalton. Women like a man with a bit of beef to them…” she says laughing gutturally and causing you to blush on your way out.

As you headed to class Kate explained her morning’s ordeal.

“..so yeah it’s fine to walk on it. Dr. Young said I just can’t put too much strain on it. So I guess that means no more jogging for us for a while huh?” she adds with an uneasy laugh. You also laugh, nervously, and having to force it out. Kate really had her mind set on jogging with you, but now that she had an injured leg, and now that you two were both locked out of the gym, you had no idea what to do next. “Hey don’t look so worried C.J, exercising isn’t the only part of getting in shape right? Eating healthy is just as important. We could always try dieting…” she suggests.

Thinking about it, you had been eating a lot more since you got to Chubeso Academy. But it’s not like you could give up Bunnie Blake’s cooking. The sweet, chef of sweets, was probably humming to herself right now as she was cooking something up, her pink hair and breasts bobbing along all the while. Bunnie had always made the best most delicious food you had ever tasted! You didn’t think you were strong willed enough to pass up on any of her meals! On the other hand if Kate was going to try and skip out you wouldn’t want her to do it by herself either… Quickly you come up with the perfect excuse. “Sure a diet sounds great, but, it’s just...” and here you really tried your best at acting, “I wouldn’t want to hurt Bunnie’s feelings and not eat her food. She’s always been so nice...”

“Oh, of course not” Kate says starting to smile. “Bunnie’s cooking is way too good to miss. I’m just thinking maybe passing on seconds and thirds.” You nod, feeling that sounded a lot easier. “And hey,” she continues as she pulled a familiar looking shape from her pocket, “these bars are pretty filling anyways. Maybe we could have one or two before lunch and see if we eat a little less?”

“Sounds like a plan!” you agree heartily. On the inside however, you could only hope you’d be able to resist whatever delicious concoction Bunnie made today.

At lunch…
14511221111111121112121.title: Your working out is given the slip

choices: You can't take it. You have to excuse yourself from the table...
Apparently Kate feels the same. You both go to Ms. K's room for some fresh air..
145112211111111211121212.content:
Moderation and Chubbeso weren't two words that usually went together.

Even Bunnie was surprised when the both of you asked for a smaller helping of mashed potatoes to go with a downsized helping of everything else. Simply passing off the both of your plates to the next willing consumer of her fine cuisine, the Calamity Pink cook searched high and low for a modestly sized ladle to scoop out your servings, having been here so long she almost forgot what one looked like! With a disrupt look on her face, Bunnie could only raise her brow as she plopped the spuds into place. She searched the dish for two steaks of the requested smaller size to match some whole wheat dinner rolls. This had, meaning this quite literally in the entire span of her admittedly short career, never happened before!

As per her usual, Bunnie invited you over to her personal counter so as not to hold up the lunch lines with your idle conversation...

"Okay, what's up with you guys?" she asked sharply, "Is everything okay? I mean usually you two come through here and are more than happy to tear my line up, but today you're leaving with 'undersized steaks'? Seriously, what's up with that?!"

A mutual understanding of the situation ran through the both of you, your heads hung low in a shared disappointment in yourselves. Looking at each other mournfully, you could only express with sincerity that there was nothing wrong with either of you.

"I guess we're just not very hungry today..." Kate said sadly as she looked up at the young chef through the sneeze gaurd, "We're really sorry Ms. Blake..."

Bunnie frowned, "Don't be sorry..." she sighed, "I guess I can't make you guys eat. I mean, it's just... well, I feel like there's something that the both of you aren't telling me." she said sadly, "And I completely get that; but I just want to make sure the both of you are alright. You know how I worry about you guys sometimes..."

And there was the Look.

Like so many test-batches of cookies past, so many deformed muffins ago, the "funny tasting" turkey heroes from way back when or one of the many other countless food-related casualties inside your tummy, Bunnie Blake had brought out her Look. That strange look that seemed to be a mix of your typical pleading stare of a hungry puppy and the cornered glance of a scorned lover; you could never tell if Bunnie was aware of this powerful technique or not. You weren't the only one susceptible to its powers, as both Rebbecca and Kate had been subject to it in the past, And now here you and Kate were again, being forced to face the Look.

"W-We should really get going." you struggle, tugging at Kate's uniform coat to get her attention

"Y-Yeah, B-B-Becca and Claire are p-probably waiting for us outside..."

Bunnie huffed, resting her diamond chin in her palm as she propped her elbow against the countertop. "Oh alright fine. Go." she said scornfully, "I guess you guys just don't want to talk to me."

Removing herself from the countertop, Bunnie begrudgingly got back to work as she boredly continued to serve the feeding fatties that littered the lunch line. The two of you could only head out the door, a heavy burden weighing on both of your hearts.

"D-Do you think we hurt her feelings?" Kate asked meekly, looking down

"Of course we did..." you could only tell your bespectacled friend the truth, as there was no hiding it from either of you, "She loves to cook for us. I think we should have at least told her why we're trying to cut back." nervously you shuffle towards the usual table you and your round cohorts grazed at.

Kate could only plod along sadly, heartache the only thing slowing her down today...

***


"They made me run!" Claire huffed angrilly as she stuffed a spoonful of gravy-laden potato past her plump lips, dabbing at some stray topping dripping from the corner of her mouth, "Me, Claire Masters, waste my precious energy!"

"Uh-huh." Rebbecca answered condescendingly as she poked at her own plate absently

"Exactly!" Claire continued, heartily taking a big bite of steak from her fork and choking it down before continuing, "My metabolism is not used to such plethan tasks like jogging! The Masters women are meant to be prized and nurtured... not sweat!"

"You don't say..." Kate said meekly, nibbling at her bread

"And then, when I fell, that Walker girl had the audacity to suggest that I rise under my own power when she was the reason- well, one of three- that I was forced to 'jog' anyway!" she growled, stuffing her kraut with one tasty dessert cupcake prematurely, "Honestly, I never understood this whole fascination with exercise! But I showed them, I talked my Mother into closing down the gym so I could-" she caught herself, dropping her fork down to her plate, "D-Did any of you hear that?

"Yeah, I never liked her either..." you answer halfheartedly as you poke at your steak

The back and forth today was pretty much like this. Since neither you nor Kate felt much like giving imput, and Rebbecca never really paid her much mind anyway, Claire was allowed to run rampant with her own thoughts and feelings about whatever happened to pop into her empty little head. Luckily for her, none of you were quite up to dealing with her today. So her previously incriminating slip of the tongue went unnoticed.

Smirking to her haughty self, Claire lifted another large spoonful of miscellanious foodstuffs to her mouth and wrapped her plump lips around it. The act of swallowing long since invisible underneath Claire's mighty second chin, you could only have guessed (if you'd been paying attention) that she did so quickly enough to warrant an immidiate second bite. And then another. And then a fourth one after. She was glutting herself at a much quicker rate than usual today. Most likely trying to make up for the burnt calories from last night's horrible exertion of brisk jogging.

However she wouldn't be the only one stuffing herself for the simple joy of stuffing herself today.

Opposite to her, your longtime friend Rebecca Maglen seemed to have developed a bit of a tapeworm overnight. Or perhaps she had always been eating this much, and it only just now dawned on you due to your eating so scarcely.

Keeping nearly up to speed with the abhorred pampered princess of Chubbeso, Rebbecca's appetite was very impressive... if you were into that sort of thing. She managed to scarf down every bite on her plate and go back for seconds easily (so long as you didn't count getting her stomach caught under the table) and resume eating as if the refill never happened. She ate with something much less Gusto and more Moxie, leaning in hungrily as she devoured morsel after morsel...

Between her and Claire, you felt like you were going to crack.

Overly hungry when it wasn't necessary wasn't a feeling you'd ever liked to experience. And since coming to Chubbeso it was apparently a lot easier (not that you'd experienced that feeling much since enrolling.) And watching these two hogs- your best friends eat themselves so sinfully was almost too much to take!
145112211111111211121212.title: You two attempt to resist seconds, but Rebecca ...

choices: After classes you head to the school store then to Kate’s
Actually let’s see what Delphine, Suzu, Chris are up to first.
1451122111111112111212122.content:
“C.J., Kate, you (gmmph) hardly ate anything.” Claire said between cheekfulls. You couldn’t stand it, watching your two friends pig out (well pig out was a bad choice of words for it, eating with gusto sounded better,) whatever you called it, watching Rebecca and Claire help themselves to as much dessert as they could eat was getting to be too much for you two to watch. Maybe it was because this was your first day of dieting and your partly empty stomach was making you a little irritable, maybe it was the fact that you were missing out on Chocolate Cake-Ala-Blake another one of your favorite desserts that Bunnie made (weren’t they all,) but whatever it was, if you had to watch for another minute, you probably would’ve given in and gotten yourself the largest slice of cake you could find.

“Yeah, (mmph) are you guys feeling okay?” Rebecca asked as she bit into the warm and gooey molten chocolate center of her slice. She waved her forkless hand in front of Kate’s entranced staring eyes.

This seemed to garner a reaction as Kate spoke up and finally blinked. “No, I mean yeah.” She huffed obviously frustrated. “It’s just the gym was closed and now…we’re…” she trailed off sounding like she was receding back into her mind, back where she too was having a piece of that yummy cake.

“Uh… I’m going to go back to class.” You say, swiftly getting up from the table. “T-th-That sounds good!” Kate announced loudly as she got up from the table herself. And without a chance for anyone to question, you both left the cafeteria as quickly as you could.

Wordlessly you both knew you had to get your mind off of food. The bars may have been secretly calorie laden, but they had only faintly done their job of helping you feel full. What was worse is that you had actually run out of the initial crateful that had Claire had supplied you with. You were sure all you would have to do was ask and Claire would be over at your place with plenty more in an instant, but you weren’t really in the mood to talk with Claire right now.
