Suddenly, the smell of warm chocolate chip cookies baking in the oven passes over the two of you. In your rush you’d taken the route past Mrs. Telleri’s cooking class where there was always a teasing aroma of goods baking in the classrooms many ovens. You both hasten your paces and make it back to the empty Ms. Kawasaki’s room. Quickly you dashed to a window, opening it and letting the breeze of fresh air blow in, make the room feel about 20% cooler. You and Kate take a seat on the counter top windowsill, letting your pudgy legs dangle over the wide counters ledge like meat hanging in a deli.

For a moment you both silently enjoy the air and sunshine, a gust of wind came in from the window, blowing a few long strands of Kate’s hair over her face, but also bringing with it…the scent of sweet cherries? Was that perfume Kate was wearing? You hadn’t noticed it until just now, and closing your eyes you took another big whiff of the alluring aroma.

“Is that perfume new?” you ask making small talk.

“Yeah…” Kate says tucking the gusted strands of hair back behind her glasses. You noticed she was turning awfully red considering how cool the room felt.

“Well, it smells really nice.” And it really did, but you probably would have enjoyed the smell of garbage right now if it didn’t remind you of how hungry you were.

Kate felt this was good of time as any, her heartbeat was going anaerobic. This perfect moment had come suddenly, but she had been ready for it. She didn't want to be just another friend of yours, that’s why she was going to do it…she was going to finally confess her love! And sure it seemed sudden, but now was her big chance too. It felt like her breasts were about to burst…

“Um…C.J…” she began, looking down at the ground then at you forcing herself to make eye contact. “Do you remember that time in Elementary School where you stopped those bullies from picking on me?”

How could you not remember! You had just met Rebecca and Kate earlier that school year. One day at recess two older looking bullies had pushed Kate down off a swing and onto the wood-chip covered ground. You hadn’t heard exactly what they had said, but from across the playground you could tell it wasn’t anything nice. Kate was crying, and they began to pick up dirt and cover her in it. No one else had noticed yet that she was getting picked on and so, inspired by too many Saturday morning cartoon heroes, you started running as fast as you could, running as hard as you could into both of the bullies and knocking them both down with a satisfying tackle. Kate watched amazed for a moment, then took off. The two stronger bullies had given you a few good punches to your ribs, when a still sniveling Kate returned, not alone or with an adult, but with a furious Rebecca Maglen in tow. The bullies never stood a chance, each returning to school the next day with a black eye but neither revealing just exactly how they earned it. Unbeknownst to you, ever since that day Kate had quietly fallen for you, her hero, but she had never worked up the guts to finally say how she felt.

Now with your mind back in the present you thought about how well Kate had changed since then. She was still the bookish type, and she tended to keep to herself, but recently you felt like you were just meeting a newer side of Kate, one that was just opening up. Outgoing and friendly, always trying to look on the brighter side of things rather than cry over them. Kate looks rather stiff, her milky white complexion turning pinker by the second, making her large and shimmering eyes stand out behind her frames.

“Jeeze Kate, I haven’t thought about that in forever…What did you-”

BEEEEEEP The school bell rang signifying the end of lunch and breaking this magic moment between the two of you.

“Oh...I was just thinking about it…” she squeaks out before giving a warm smile. It was the first time you’d really seen her smile all day and you returned it. Inwardly Kate gave a short sigh, there was always later she supposed, not today, but when the time was right. For now she could stand being just a close friend with you, but not much longer...“Oh, I almost forgot…” she says quickly before she had to head to her next class. “C-could you pick up a few things from the school store for me?”

You’re puzzled for a split second at the request before remembering your offer yesterday and of course her injured leg. “Sure what do you need?”

“Well, uh, here.” She reaches into her pocket and hands you a neatly folded square of paper. “You’d really be helping me out, and uh…maybe… we could…I could...help you study for the math quiz on Friday?”

“Wow, that’d be great!” Gentleman that you were, you would have gone shopping for the handicapped Kate either way, but now that she would be helping you study for the nigh impossible math test Friday it was icing on the cake…

“Oh, thankyou thankyou thank you!” Kate hobbles over and with a force that almost topples you, wraps you into one of her pleasantly plush hug, and the warm feeling of that hug stayed with you for the rest of the school day.
1451122111111112111212122.title: Aromas, Agendas, Air, Action and Amore

choices: Your shopping trip is made a little awkward when followed by a certain club...
Actually it's rather nice. However being around so much good food is stressful
14511221111111121112121222.content:
After school, so much after that the collectively large student body had all but totally evacuated the main building to keep with their individual afternoon schedules, was the official time set for the officially unofficial trio of culturally diverse trio of aspiring athletes. Remembering that entering the gym while you and Kate were present would upset the latter, Delphine had taken it upon herself to instruct that the team meet sometime around four thirty in the afternoon; giving you plenty of time to finish up with Kate and giving them plenty of time to change. And after such a fantastic first meet yesterday, the members (well, at least two of them) had high hopes for today... had being the operative word.

"C'est tellement horrible!" Delphine exclaimed as she read the notification taped to the door—

'Closed until further notice. Anyone caught using this facility without permission and an approved supervisor will be dealt with accordingly.'
— Mrs. Masters


"How can she just close down our gym?!" the french girl raved, her loose workout clothing waving with her arms "We all used it just yesterday and nothing happened! Even Mademoiselle Claire took part in our little exercise regime, what could possibly have happened?!"

"I think Claire burning off her royal rump roast happened." Chris said flatly as she crossed her arms, pivoting tensly on her flaring hips that tested her gym shorts, "Betcha the Princess wasn't too happy about running with us and went home crying to the Queen Cow."

"She only ran one lap!" Delphine huffed

"That being said, Claire-domo seems to have a lot of control over what goes on in our school." Suzu, the largest of the three, piped up, "It might be wise not to upset her again... considering our tuition is non-refundable."

"If only your guts were less literal and more figurative." Chris barked to the towering asian girl, "We're never going to get our gym back if you don't woman up and slip your big girl panties on... assuming you can see them past those enormo-tits of yours."

"I'm sorry, I can't hear you all the way down there, you should really learn to speak up, Christina-chan." Suzu said curtly, much to the bottom heavy girl's chagrin, "However I can see your point, Mrs. Masters had no right to take away the gym."

"Do you think we should go talk to her?" Delphine asked, ignoring the fuming fatty's temper tantrum going on right next to her, "Perhaps she will lend us permission if we ask très poliment?"

"No, I don't really think that will help." Suzu said sadly, "Mrs. Masters is usually at home by now."

"And just how do you know that?!" Chris barked, interrupting her asianic opposite

"When I petition her to make a Kendo Club I had to make an appointment with her secretary." the busty Asian amazon responded in a sense of hostile politeness, "It took me weeks to get one, and even then she was very unreasonable."

"Bon renseignement, I was hoping to work off some winter weight in the gymnasium..." Delphine sighed sadly, "Is there another exercise center around campus?"

"Not a one." Chris said gruffly, "Trust me, every athletic girl looks for one around their second semester here. That's why I joined the swim team, and why little miss Wonderbra here worked so hard to play with her bamboo."

"It's kendo." Suzu growled, "You're very disrespectful."

"Point being, no." Chris said flatly.

"But do not worry, Suzumiya-chan." Suzu said warmly, "We can always go back to the dojo and practice swordplay together. It's great exercise and you grow strong. Or, perhaps if that isn't to your liking, we could always float around uselessly in a hole of chlorine water and our own filth like another bottom-heavy algae sucker I know."

"Okay that's crossing a line!"

"Mes amis—"

"I'm not your friend!"

"Erm... mes connaissances proches, please do not fight!" Delphine wailed, "I am aware that you two are not on good terms, but could you please at least try to get along? We all decided to work out together because our exercise regimes were lonely, non? S'il vous plaît, just while we are together?"

Both girls looked rather shocked by Delphine's emotional outburst. Suzu's loss for words was strong and Chris' red cheeks poorly disguised her embarrassment.

"Fine..." both girls said after some hesitation.

"Bon oui!" Delphine smiled, "Now, what should we do to fill our usual gap left in our schedule together?"

"Well, I would suggest going back to our usual routines." Suzu said solemnly, "It is rather obvious that my relationship with Christina-chan is tensed and it upsets you. And while the lonliness is rather crushing, I suppose that you could alternate between the two of our routines... otherwise I fear that being left to your Cooking Club may—"

"Blow you up like a parade float." Chris finished sadistically with a malicious chuckle

"Non non non!!" Delphine said hysterically, "Je ne vais pas! Suzuka, Chris, you must keep me company and help me keep my waistline trim!"

Suzu and Chris giggled, making their respectively overstuffed anatomies wobble slightly as they did so. "Do not worry, Suzumiya-chan." the enormous Asian said warmly, "Christina-chan and I will do our best to keep you nice and... um, how you say, petite?"

"Oui." Delphine embraced the heavyset girl like an overstuffed teddy bear, "Thank you both so much for being nice to me... the English girls here can be so mean to me just because I am French."

"Alright, alright." Chris said impatiently, "Now let's get down to business. I say we head to the pool today and tomorrow we fiddle with oriental fighting sticks."

"Shinai." Suzu correctly roughly

"Whatever you call them and whatever we do, would either of you mind if we stop by a vendor first?" Delphine asked kindly, wrapping an arm around each girl as she broke up their squabble, "I think they have been stocking those magnifique energy treats..."
14511221111111121112121222.title: Extra Chapter One: A Friendship Forged in Fire

choices: Rebecca had come to check on her BFF Kate you end up snacking more than studying
Rebecca had just left so It’s just you, Kate, and a pile of snacks
145112211111111211121212222.content:
After classes you headed straight to Chubbeso academy’s school store. While it was true that the store did contain rows of student living necessities, a whole aisle for beauty products, and a complete section for the latest books, the Chubbeso school store was primarily used for one thing… snack food. The store was one big vending machine to students who could splurge to their stomachs content, using the allotted amount of ‘Chubbeso Bucks’ on their ID card, (your own card had been loaded with plenty of ‘Chubeso Bucks’ courtesy of the Masters family.)

Unfolding Kate’s note for the first time you begin reading her neatly handwritten list. “Okay let’s see, glasses wipes, and some vitamin water…..Top Tarts? Kringles potato chips? Twonkies?” The fact that these were all name brand snack foods was not lost on you, and your stomach gurgled rather loudly as you read down the list. Kate must have written this shopping list before deciding on the whole dieting thing. Rebecca had mentioned once or twice about Kate’s stress snacking, and when the three of you studied together, you had often seen how Kate could absentmindedly finish a whole bag of chips by using her own patented study and snack system. Neither you nor Rebecca could argue with the results of said strange system either as Kate seemed to have earned an A on just about every test she’d taken with it.

Having to struggle down the various aisles lined with snacks and sweets was doing little for your diet. As you added a pack of Top Tarts (cinnamon frosted) to your cart your mouth was actually running a little dry, and by the time you made it up to the yellow cake crème filled delights that were Twonkies you felt yourself beginning to buckle as you craved for maybe just a bite of one. You paused, knowing this was a deciding moment for you, would you end up buying a pack of your own delicious snack cake goodness to munch on, or would you remain chaste in your quest for a slimmer stomach?

There in the store, surrounded by so much good food, the cosmic power of that possessed all cheaters of diets slowly set into you, you began to barter calories. Well, you reasoned, maybe a little snack after school was fine. Dieting didn’t mean starving yourself, and already today you were feeling like you were more on a guilt trip than on a diet. In fact, you figured that you both deserved a little reward for managing to make it through that strenuous lunch. And since you were here already here, you might as well get some snacks for tomorrow as well, in fact, all week if your were serious about this dieting and skimpier lunch thing. With a crazed look in your eye, and drool forming in your mouth, you through two pack of Twonkies in your basket, and made a dash back to where the Smore's flavored Top Tarts and Gummi Bears were located. Knowing your card had an almost unlimited balance here, you were quite literally a kid in a candy store.

One carrying cart of candy and junk food later you were making sure you had got everything on the list before you checked out of the store, and after getting a knowing wink from the student cashier as she saw your snack stockpile for two, you hefted your bag of treasures straight to Kate’s room where…
145112211111111211121212222.title: Snack Shopping Spree OR Super Market Weep

choices: Kate doesn't mind all the junk food. In fact, she teaches you how to 'study'...
Kate doesn't mind all the junk food. Though, she's a little TOO forgiving...
1451122111111112111212122222.content:
Red plastic material had never felt so heavy.

Contents were packed unto the basket; set so tightly within themselves that they resembled a well-played game of Tetris. Chips (crisps, that British girl called them) pushed neatly, though not tightly, into a niche between a package of to-be-devoured muffins and a row consisting of every assorted gummy organism in their respective Kingdoms. Boxes of creamy sponge cakes and miniature frosted chocolate cakes were no feat, until the space left by the latter's more compact size was filled with fried, glazed dunkin' sticks on either side. Delicious, malnutritious Top Tarts (let's just call these knock-offs) sat next to a variety of prepackaged donuts and a sixpack of off-brand cola; all beckoning into your little ears, "Ceeeee Jaaaay... oh Ceeee Jaaaay..."

And while it was certainly quite a haul, all in all it wasn't quite so heavy in the material sense.

What was heavy was your conscience.

In a moment of weakness, you had abused your near-unlimited funds for junk food with full intention of cheating on your diet. And what's worse; you were about to bring Kate in on it too. Knowing how badly that she wanted to stick to her new resolution of eating healthier (one that she made with you), you were going to wave all these goodies in her face like a cat and laser pointer.

However, those treats were rather tempting sitting so precariously on those shelves. Claire had let slip many times the secret of the Chubbeso sales plan, in where items of foodstuffs were placed at an angle so that walking down the aisle a certain direction made it seem as if they were staring whatever hapless customer happened to stroll by. And given Chubbeso's "understanding attitude towards a young girl'sstudent's needs" and the lax attitude that this attitude seemed to adhere to, they weren't likely to complain when some of the girls (or you, apparently) waddled on through with enough empty calories to send them into a deep food-induced coma.

And so, up chocolate river without a popsicle stick, you had all but skipped your way back to Kate's place; illprospered haul in hand like some sort of weakwilled Red Riding Hood. Now that you were at Kate's door, you couldn't help but feel waves of anguish pass over you like so many fizzy soft drinks.

Thinking to yourself that you just couldn't stand out in front of the door all night, you nervously took a step towards the door and gave a light rapping, only afterwords did you realize that there was a rather familiar sensation of slight trembling behind room 182B...

A slight mumbling, barely detectable. Probably Kate, who was ever quiet even behind her own closed doors.

"Oh don't get up, I got it."

The slight tremors continued, growing closer and closer before the door opened to reveal quite the friendly sight; dressed in her usual post-academia slacker chiq was Rebecca Maglen.

"Oh, hi CJ!" she greets you excitedly, "Kate, it's just CJ, you want me to let him in?"

"Y-Yeah!" Kate's raised voice is barely on par with the norm, "He's probably here with my groceries!"

At Kate's agreement, Becca smiled warmly and showed you in, closing the door behind you. "I've just been taking care of Kate's place while she rests her ankle." she said warmly, "There's not much to clean, but her heater works." She sped in front of you, giving you a generous glimpse of her heavy bottom. The words "Chubbeso Academy" printed around the waistband of her sweatpants were partially obscured by the rolling waves of Becca's mighty meat form, each lovehandle escaping her tank top (so called 'belly shirt') and covering the better half of the phrase and a large roll of bulging near-butt blubber creeping outside the sweats and leaving you with only the lower half of the school's namesake. "And besides, someone's gotta make sure she doesn't do anything stupid."

More thumping from another part of the apartment, much more awkward and off-step.

"I can hear you, you know!" came a whimperous whine from Kate's bedroom, "Leave me alone when I'm not there to defend myself!"

Both of you chuckle before Becca gets a good glance at your package. "Looks like Kate was a little behind on her shopping, huh?" Becca chuckled, reaching for the crate carrier, "I'll help you lay all this out, Kate'll know where it goes..."

In your guilt, your hand jerked the carrier away from Becca's touch, shielding it from her behind your leg. "O-Oh no problem, Bec. I got this one."

"You sure?" she asked, leaning in slightly, getting a better look at your haul, "Sure looks like a lot to put away by yourself..."

"Yeah, no problem!"

The silence between you seemed to go on forever before she finally let the conversation pass. "Alright, Big Guy, you can put all these up by yourself. Sheesh." she said, "Bunnie said you were acting weird. You sure you're not sick? Passing up some 'ala Blake isn't like you."

"Yeah... about that..."

The footsteps picked up again, booming closer and closer until Kate's bedroom door opened. Her brown locks coiled tightly together in their damp state as they draped over her shoulders, glasses fogged, and still covered in a thin layer of water. Black fabric clinging tightly to her overfilled mammaries, Kate had squeezed herself into an outfif very much in the same spirit as Rebbecca's, along with a generous wrapping of gauze around her injured ankle. Apparently she had just left the shower... getting used to the colder air of her apartment had some... erm, effects. You know.

This, fueled by your initial grief at dangling all that good food in front of her, was bound to make things just a little akward.

Trying to hide just how bad you were at diet shopping, you practically tried to shove the crate of goodies up any orifice it would fit- anything to just avoid the inevitable placating that Kate would most definitely deliver... if only it were Becca. She'd just smack you and get it over with. Of course she was never really one for diets, either. Point being, you suck.

Oh, and to make things even worse...

"C-CJ... why are you... staring?" Kate asked, round face growing bright red behind her glasses. She curled into herself slightly, trying to hide the anxiety that came with meeting your gaze...

"O-Oh, was I? I-I had no idea..."

And at the realization that you were, of course, staring all you could do was try not to stare. That was always offputting, when one of your friends thought you were staring at them. Because of course you weren't- at least until Kate said something about it. So now here you were, a big perv with chocolates and candy and crap who was going to cheat on his diet with one of his breast best! Best... you meant one of you best friends while you stared at her tits.

Fantastic.

"C-CJ... stop... hehe..." Kate giggled, turning incredibly red. She didn't sound all to offended at your gaze, though it did seem to put her off a bit.

"Y-Yeah, s-sorry." you stutter, "Oh, I, um, got you your... um, groceries!"

"Th-Thank you..."

And cue staring. Great. Now she thought you were a freak. Here you were yesterday in this exact spot feeling so at ease with Kate and feeling so confident about this whole 'diet' thing, and now all you could do was babble!

"Well... this is... just great." Becca said in a huff, bringing the attention back to her own portly self as she started towards the door. "I'll uh, just leave then." she says, obviously put off by the tension in the room. Or perhaps the staring you did towards Kate's gozangas upset her?

"Kate if you... you know, if you need me, just call me." she left for the door before turning back, "I guess I'll... just go upstairs..."

And then an awfully loud noise for such a delicate shut...

"What's with her?"

"I-I don't know... she was just fine..."

You and Kate had been left alone. Becca's sudden spell of antisocial behavior aside, things hadn't changed behind you- namely where you had gotten so much food for "Kate". Of course you two had such similar tastes in junk these days...

"O-Oh, are those my groceries?"
1451122111111112111212122222.title: Sans Company

choices: Kate’s silky smooth skin as she slowly places her hand on yours
Nothing but crumbs, does this mean the study session is over?
14511221111111121112121222221.content:
“A-Are these your groceries?” you nervously parrot Kate’s question by reflex. “Uh...well sort of” you admit guiltily as you bring the basket out before you and set it on a nearby counter top. “I got everything on your list...and...um...some snacks for me too.” Now it was Kate’s turn to stare, but this time at the basket. The cornucopia of calories caused her eyes to widen as she cataloged its contents. She marveled at every snack cake and cookie stack she pulled out from the basket, licking her lips quickly as she watched the snacks laid out like some sort of snack smorgasbord on the counter, that was before she quickly turned said lips into a small grimace at the remembrance of the diet. Before she can say anything you spurt out more, your voice strict on yourself because you knew the ever-forgiving Kate wouldn’t be.“I probably should have known you didn’t want any snacks, and I didn’t wanna cheat, but I didn’t have any bars, and I was craving just a little snack after school and-”

“CJ, it’s fine really!” she says reaching into the bag for her true goal that was the glasses cleaner. Using the included spray and rag she cleaned her still slightly steamy glasses, looking a lot more serious and a lot more mature without her glasses as she went on. “I probably would have done the same thing if I was there. I mean I was starving after school too, I had an X-S Mass bar which helped, but, but sometimes you just get cravings! Everyone does! Especially dieters like us.” You nod glad there was this side of Kate that could be direct with you, and not instantly forgiving. You also notice that it’d been forever since you’d seen Kate without her glasses, and right now with her wet hair she looked like a different much more wilder and forthright person. Kate placed her glasses back on, and they instantly went back to giving her a more naive look as well as compliment her round cheeks. “But, just because we’re both craving something sweet it doesn’t mean we’re going overboard on all this. Just maybe a few snacks after school so I-we don’t end up binging on ice cream later. Hey, I could even show you my snack and study system!” She says clearly excited by the idea.

“Sure!” you say feeling pretty excited too, and you knew it wasn’t the idea of studying for a math test no; it was the combination of getting your chocolate fix while watching Kate’s innocent yet seductive jiggling that had really got your blood pumping now.

"I guess I just remember more when I have something to munch on. P-Pretty weird huh?" Kate explains blushing for what must have been the tenth time today. “Uh, anyways bring a pack of cookies and follow me to the back” she says as she began to half walk-half hobble down the hall. Grabbing a pack of cookies, (a brand here at the academy called Biscuits Ahoy!) you follow the tottering brown haired bookworm as she heads to her dorms backroom. Once there you find a mostly empty room except for a large comfy looking bed, a full bookshelf, and a long table complete with two chairs where a math book was already splayed open surrounded by papers, pencils and a calculator. Kate places herself in a chair and you take the other, setting down the cookies between the two of you.

“Well now…” she sighs contently as she adjusts her chair so her wide front comfortably fit around the table. “Basically, how this works is you don’t get a cookie until you’ve got the question right."

“You mean like Claire giving us a par every three laps? Or that Padlock guy's dogs? You know, the guy with the conditioner, and the drool?” You suggest but getting no reaction. Kate keeps on staring until a light clicks behind her eyes and she cracks into a big hearty laugh sending her ballooning breasts bouncing once more. The laugh, warm and bubbly, was the kind was the kind you could just listen to (and watch) again and again.

“You mean Pavlov? It’s classical conditioning, not conditioner and this would be Operant conditioning rather than Classical, because we already um, really like junk food.” Kate said sounding like she had been swallowing textbooks rather than weight gain bars. "But, yeah it's just like that, and there's nothing wrong with rewarding some good behavior. Now let’s see…” she flips through the math book and picks out a problem from earlier in the semester. “Here try this one” she says pointing to a simple equation, one that you solve pretty quickly as you move a Y from one side to another.

“Good,” Kate says with a smile after checking your work, and as she expertly opened the package of goodies. “Have a cookie." she offers, sounding like a teacher to an elementary school student. You do help yourself to one, and a rush of chocolate chip goodness hits you for a brief moment until you swallow and the flash is gone.Your hand reaches for another before catching yourself, reminding yourself that you were going to have to get another practice answer right before having another.

Seeing you understood Kate went right to studding, flipping back to the outlined chapter and reading a problem, all the while looking like she was in a trance. It was her eyes and brains that were doing the exercising now both working faster than her legs ever had. Her fingers worked the calculator just as quickly as she dialed in a few digits, then checking her answer she found she was indeed correct. She gave a purr of delight as she made short work of her sweet reward.

The study system understood and underway, the room grew into a pleasant silence with Kate humming softly as she filled out her paper work, only stopping to chew on another cookie. She was already outpacing you, but not because you were just learning this stuff, every now and then out of the corner of your eye you would sneek a peek at Kate. Once, she was adjusting herself, tugging down on her ill-fitting shirt which only caused her breasts to mash upwards, an innocent act that was both crushingly cute and devastatingly sexy. Another time she was brushing cookie crumbs of off her chest, her fingers brushing all around her bosom almost as if she knew you would be secretly spying on her and she was guiding your eyes all over her body, purposely pointing out her newly enlarged aspects as she polished off a third cookie.

"C.J! Look at me! “ she says abruptly and you freeze like a kid who was caught with his hands in a cookie jar.You turn to Kate and the both of you looked into each others eyes for several seconds. Ready to apologize a trillion time, you could only think of the slap you were about to get for checking her out again, or worse how she could get Rebbecca to do it for her, and then you'd never be friends with them again...Oh no here it comes...Kate was slowly moving closer and closer to you, it was like she was about to… “C.J, I've eaten three cookies and you've only had one! What are you having trouble with?” she began to lean over to read your paper exposing you to even more bare flesh and cleavage “Um, are you having trouble?” she asks rotating on her perk bum to better face you. Immediately you turn your red and wide eyed face back to your notepaper and second problem which you must have been working on for at least the last five minutes, fortunately everything you had written down was correct.

“Uh, no, I guess I just work a little slower than you.Yeah!…umm…yeah” you admit, relived that your bust browsing hadn't been busted.

"Oh!" she says, "I guess you're right." Which was quickly followed up with "Don't worry it gets easier the more you do it” she consoles, sounding again much like a teacher as she reached for her fourth cookie.

"Yeah, got to keep on chugging along." You agree, eyes still completely locked on the book, and not on the jaw dropping, mouthwatering rack that was still hovering inches away from your face. "Eyes on the prize and everything." As you eyes settled in for further studying you're oblivious to Kate as she smiled to herself, now quite certain that these days you were more focused on another sort of prize, one far different from when you had began running laps together.

***


Time passes and you were now going over the outlined work. You found Kate had been right, the answers were coming quicker now! You had somehow formulated your own incredibly weird junk food based system of solving answers; Take this one for example; Solve for Sine your book reads. At the word "Sine" a picture of a chocolatey log with swirled crème filling flashed in your head the unmistakable image of a Hostess OH-OHs…so that meant S=O/H: Opposites over Hypotenuses! Smiling you type the equation out and write your answer, then the moment of truth…you check the back of the math book…and your answer is right! Delighted and only slightly weirded out that your thoughts were based on junk food, you reach for another cookie with satisfaction…except when you reach for one your hand doesn’t feel the bumpy chocolate chip specked surface of a cookie,

No what you felt was…
14511221111111121112121222221.title: Checking Your Figures/ I Did it All For the Cookie

choices: Some time passes- Claire's marvels at what a cute little potbelly you've grown!!
Game Night! you, Claire, Becca, Kate, and Bunnie are stoked!
145112211111111211121212222211.content:
the inhumanly smooth hands of your tutor and friend, gingerly being placed atop yours. Now, now, cool your jets. She hadn't been stroking the back of your palm. No, it's far too early in the story for any heavy petting.

It felt as if, like your own, Kate's squishy digits had too expected that there be something remaining in the clear plastic tray other than crumbs. Touching you with her thumb, fore and middle finger as if she were to pluck up your hand and pop it into her mouth like candy. She seemed to catch her innocent mistake at the same time you did, though it took a moment for her reaction.

Before jerking away, you could have sworn that there was another sort of movement. Almost a cupping, delicate and ginger in delivery. However you could definitely be wrong. Really, why would Kate fondle a cookie? Rebbecca and Claire? They'd totally fondle cookies. But Kate was never really one for such strange habits... unless she knew that there was no cookie there.

That would definitely have been awkward.

"O-Oh!" Kate whimpered as she jerked her hand away, resting it over her engorged mammary, "M-My fault, CJ!"

"No, it's cool." you respond as nonchalantly as possible, ignoring the elaborate chain reaction of cancerous thoughts spreading through your subconscious like lightning.

You saw as Kate looked down, struggling to see past her own generous valley of cleavage and get a glimpse at the empty container. Frowning somewhat at the crumbs and the uncomfortable neck position, Kate huffed slightly before removing her hand from the clear plastic.

"Looks like we're all out of cookies..." she said quietly, "I-I guess I-I must have eaten them all... I'm sorry!"

"Don't be, I ate plenty myself." you respond coolly as you chuckle slightly, "Guess that's just proof that you're an awesome teacher."

Kate smiles and thanks you bashfully while turning seven different shades of red. She looks down, however, with a sense of remorse and doubt. "N-No, we said we'd diet... and here I am teaching you with junk food." she whimpers, "I-I guess it really didn't cross my mind... that this was a little counter-productive."

"No way!" you respond with a gentle nudge to Kate's flabby arm, "I picked 'em up, the least you could do would be to make the best out of my screw-up."

The two of you smiled awkwardly to each other for a second or two. She seemed really off tonight. Or really on. Truth be told, Kate always seemed to be going through the motions whenever she was just hanging out with you and Rebbecca. But lately she just seemed so... different.

Well, she was always different. At least in the sense that she was a really nice, sweet girl who loved books and actually liked to study. Always a little heavier than most (weighing more than your somewhat waif of a fourth grade teacher while the three of you were in the fourth grade) and always a little too introverted. The two of you had never really hung out alone together, without Becca...

It was actually really nice.

She was incredibly smart, though you knew that already, and a lot of her methods and reasoning made sense. That is, after she explained them to you. For the longest time, not just before enrolling in Chubbeso Academy but your Sophomore year itself, you had always thought of Kate as somewhat of a wallflower. Though now it seemed that she was beginning to become... so much more of... well, a person...

"U-Um... C-CJ?"

"Oh, yeah?"

"Y-You've been staring at me for, like, two minutes... straight." Kate whimpered while red in the face, "It's... a little... d-do I have something on my face?"

Drat. Another one of those lost in contemplation moments. These things were really going to get you hurt one of these days.

"Oh no, ha ha... Just trying to see if I remembered everything from today... ha."

Kate looked down slightly, with a dim look in her eyes as if remembering something fondly. "Yeah..." she sighed to herself. Tugging for what seemed like the twentieth time at the hem of her shirt, she tugged the black fabric over her bulgingly girlish figure in hopes of hiding her milky white belly from your gaze. Oh how she loathed her belly; especially when if decided to puff up so much so as to restrict her wardrobe.

"C-CJ?" she asked again meekly, turning to you on her plush bum, "D-Do you remember when you had to call Becca to beat up those mean girls in Primary school? I think it was in the fifth grade?"

"Y-Yeah..." you answer unconvincingly, as Kate was always the type to get picked on back when you were kids. So it seemed that a lot of her stories began very similarly. Sometimes it just took a few more details than 'those mean kids who were picking on me'. "Maybe you could be a little more specific? I mean, no offense, but... that's a lot."

Kate giggled, "I mean, when I started to... um, develop?"

"How should I remember how old we were when you started to grow boobs?!"

"You know! When Jessica Southerland and Bonnie Fitzgerald tried to beat me up when I... when I started to... get these?" here, and I should note as it as possibly not an entirely innocent act, Kate motioned gently with her shoulders to emphasize said breasts. Not exactly shoving them in your face, but the gentle hand motions that followed weren't all too helpful to keep you from staring, "And you couldn't beat them up because they were girls? So you called Becca and she did? And you still got detention?"

"Becca still owes me her allowance from that week..." you mumble to yourself, finally remembering the event in question. "But yeah, I remember. What about it?"

"W-Well... they... Jessica and Bonnie were picking on me... and they said that I'd never... that I'd always be overweight. And that was the only reason I had boobs..."

"To be fair, Bonnie kinda puffed up a bit during eighth grade." you say, "But I get what you're saying, that was terrible of them. But we never really liked them anyway, why're you letting it bother you now?"

Here Kate inched a little farther away from you, seeming to try a self-shrinking exercise. "W-Well, a-all this dieting... or lack of it... has got me worried." she whimpers, "W-What if I never lose any weight and I'm always... this heavy? I don't like being so big, CJ. Even here, I just don't feel... pretty. And I'm worried that if I don't get my weight under control, I'm going to wind up really, really heavy and I'll never-

here she stopped herself one more time. She had hesitated after looking at you. Soft tears dabbed gently into the corners of her eyes, her lips quivering slightly as she looked you dead in the face. She started to finish her sentence, only to buckle down. Taking a heavy broken breath, Kate cleared her mind and resumed her story

"Some guys just don't like bigger women. No matter how big my chest is, most guys won't bother if everything else is just as huge. A-All I want to do is be thin... that way maybe I can get a certain..."-another pause as she corrects herself- "erm, type of guy to go out with me because... um, they might not like chubby girls..."

"Kate... you can do whatever you put your mind to." you say solemnly, "If you want to lose weight, go for it. And if you don't, then that's fine too. But you have to do it for you, not anyone else. If they don't like you for you, then they're not worth your time! But, again, no matter what the choice is, I'll be here to help you out along the way."

"O-Oh CJ... c'mere. Gimme a hug."

And so the night ended on a relatively sappy note. Kate's tight embrace forced you into her sea of soft, pliable flesh as she held you deep in her cushiony valley of breasts.

It was times like these you wished would never end...
145112211111111211121212222211.title: Heavy Petting

choices: So…GAME NIGHT!
1451122111111112111212122222112.content:
The hug did eventually end though, an awkward pause following immediately after it. “So…uh same time tomorrow?” you ask finally breaking the silence. There were only a few days till the test on Friday, and you still felt unprepared, and you wouldn’t mind spending some more time getting to really know Kate (and perhaps better know her rotund dimensions as well.)

“S-Sure!” Kate says without a second thought. The next two days flew by with the both of you cramming your brains while cramming your kraut full of food after school. Rebecca, still taking care of a few dorm room tasks for her partially handicapped BFF would answer the door, and then Kate would greet you in whatever ill-fitting attire she had on, you’d both pick a certain snack from your secret stash and from there the two of you would head to the back room, leaving a very flustered and confused Rebecca behind you as you started snacking and studying once more.

Soon it was Friday: Test Day.

Your fan club as well as your self-proclaimed number one fan Claire had all seemed equally as anxious about the test as you were because they hadn’t bothered you that entire morning. Ms. Kawasaki had a student pass out the test forms and you were still a little anxious but at least had your pencil and calculator at the ready. Kate gives you a wink and a thumbs up and you return the act. Finally, you’re handed a test sheet and your eyes drift over the first problem… Hey! You knew this one! Oh, and this one too! You’re amazed at how easy the answers are coming to you and thanks to your studying and snack food based thinking you’re done with the test in no time. Going over your answers you feel like you’ve gotten most of them correct and you hand the test in feeling very confident. It wasn’t till after another grueling lunch containing Bunnie Blake heartbreaking and X-S Mass bar munching that you could finally ask for your test back.

“Ms. Kawasaki?” you call out as you entered her empty classroom finding her still grading another class's tests in her room. “I was wondering…Could I get my test back today instead of Monday?” you ask smiling as you plead. To the rest of the school Mina Kawasaki appeared to be a piece of hard candy, but it seemed like when it was something you wanted and if you asked nice enough, Ms. Kawasaki was as soft and lenient as a marshmallow (and sometimes, like when she’d gotten herself stuck in the classroom doorway, you had found the marshmallow similarities were literal.)

“C.J! I thought you might have wanted your test back.” She pulls out a paper that was separated from the huge stack on her desk and hands it to you a giant red A+ shines back at you. “I don’t know what you’re doing but keep up the good work!”she says as you continue to stare and gape at the A and the neat little plus sign next to it.

“Th-thanks Ms. Kawasaki!” you shout and fly out of the classroom. Wow an A+ in math! This was a first for you and you knew you owed a big thanks to Kate for her help. Where was she? As soon as you found here you were going to give her the biggest hug. As you traversed the sizable academy in search of your plump pal Kate, you instead find Rebecca on her way to her next class looking a little irritated and strangely without her corpulent counterpart.

“Hey Becca seen Kate since lunch? I kinda have something I want to say to her.”

“Yeah, she’s on her way to art…" she says at just above a mutter. Her lower voice and tone is lost on you as you were more worried about thanking Kate before lunch was over and classes started."Oh okay, well-" you begin as you turn to leave, well before Rebbecca cuts you off.

"Not so fast! Listen...CJ...you’ve been coming to Kate’s a lot more often now, just tell me...Is-is something up?” she asks finally getting her accusing words out, her frustration reaching its peak and putting a slight crack in her voice.

“You bet there is!” You say enthusiastically as you turn around to dig into your backpack looking for your test.

Distracted, you didn’t see Rebecca’s face as it began to lose its color. A river of thoughts and emotions began to flood Rebecca’s mind. So there was something up between you and Kate, and you both had been keeping it a secret from her! She knew it! Ever since you showed up with all that junk food at Kate’s, she'd watched you as you practically undressed Kate with your eyes,and then you’d both just snuck off to Kate’s bedroom, thinking it was some sort of secret what you were both doing back there…

Rebecca’s imagination began to run wilder as she angrily fantasized what you both had been doing. You with your presumed “big girl” fetish alone with Kate on the bed. She could just imagine as you sensually stripped Kate to her undies, Kate’s stomach so large that it now sagged over her panties and her bra so overflowing with fat goose-bumped tit flesh that her skin would have lines from where her had bra cut into them. Then, the both of you would probably lie on her bed, Kate skin still a little wet from the shower, a pile of plastic wrappers standing by waiting to be sacrificed to Kate’s insatiable appetite. Her pale belly would rise and fall slightly with each breath, its immensity crowding her impressive chest till her breasts threatened to smother her where she lay. Then taking whatever sugary delight was closest in one hand you’d feed it to Kate, letting her suck on your fingers as you did so, your own tongue licking any spare crumbs that happen to land on Kate’s draping bosom, all the while letting your other hand explore, tease, and play with her weighty belly and breasts until finally…

Oooh! She couldn’t even stand thinking about it now! Knowing that she’d been in the room right above you as this went on Rebecca felt betrayed, then sad, and then ultimately PISSED! How could you guys go behind her back? She probably wouldn’t have minded if Kate had asked you out, they’d both known of each others feeling for you, but the fact that you and Kate were sneaking around her like she was some sort of idiot was what really made her furious! Well she was about to let you have it!

It had taken a lot more time to find your test than you planned (you really needed to clean your backpack out one of these days) so you repeated the joke to make sure Rebecca got it. “I’ll say something’s up! My GPA’s up! Now that I got this…AN A PLUS!” you can barely contain your excitement as you begin to show it off.

“Oh!” Rebbecca shouts, turning a fist that she'd for some reason made behind your back into a finger and pointing at the paper. A long pause followed. (You assumed it was probably because of how awesome this test and the joke was.) Life sprung back into Rebecca’s face and she must have really liked the joke, because she began to burst out laughing on the spot. “You-You guys were studying back there? Ha! Why didn’t you tell me, huh? I-I thought the two of you were-”*Psht-Hahaha *

“Yeah, you guessed it..." you admit, missing her last sentence as it was drowned out by her giggles. "It is kind of funny I really needed the help though. Rebecca, this stuff was hard and Kate really helped me out!" you explain. "Oh, and that reminds me, I was thinking maybe we could have Game Night at Kate’s tonight.”

“Really you want to have it at Kate’s?” Rebecca asked sounding a lot more relaxed after a good laugh.

“Yeah, you know since her leg and all. It’s a smaller dorm room than mine, but she’s got plenty of snacks and ice-cream too.”

“CJ that’s a great idea! I mean if Kate’s cool with it I’m cool with it.” Rebbecca says agreeably. *Bzzz* the alarm bell rings signaling lunch was over for the oh-so-many girls who were still busy eating. “Just call me and let me know what’s happening alright? Later CJ!” The naturally pear shaped girl adds taking off to avoid being trampled by the bulls girls leaving the lunch room. As she walks away she again gave you a marvelous view of her vast hips and bubble butt, bubble was a good analogy as Rebecca was practically floating as she left, feeling so relived.

After watching Rebecca walk away (for quite a few seconds) you hurry to the art room and found Kate alone. Gleefully, you proudly show her the A+ paper, and her face lights up.

“CJ that’s wonderful!” she shouts giddily and you're so caught up in the moment this time you wrap her into another warm and doughy embrace of thanks. Parting from the partially smothering hug, and thankful that the rest of Kate’s art class hadn’t arrived from lunch yet, you remember your second purpose for finding Kate; game night. You explain your plan to hold game night at Kate’s rather than your own dorm, Kate was indeed cool with it, especially since the party was a good chance to get rid of all the tempting goodies now laying around the house waiting to be eaten.

You make a few calls to the usual Game Night attendants (Rebbecca,Claire, and of course Bunnie Blake) and head to your last classes of the day, your head and stomach already anticipating the giant celebration planned tonight.
1451122111111112111212122222112.title: Party Prelude: Hot Hallucinations and Hugs

choices: continue...
14511221111111121112121222221121.content:
You rush home still full of excitement from this awesome day. Quickly taking off your Chubbeso uniform and throw on a pair of jeans and a plain t shirt, ready to just hang out and have some fun tonight. The t-shirt is a little smaller than you remember, as your potbelly stomach refused to remain covered. More excited about the party than how well your shirt fits (or if you had bothered to notice, how your little paunch wasn’t so little anymore) you grab your gaming system and dash back over to Kate’s for another famous Game Night; a long standing tradition and one of the few bearable things about this absurd academy.

“CJ!” Kate greets you at the door barely refraining from hugging once more. “Um, come in and make yourself at home!" She beamed as she gestured to the cabinets and countertops laden with the junk food you’d purchased earlier that week.

You see Rebecca, as per quo having already made herself quite at home in front of the TV with a box of top tarts and dressed in a bright yellow "Ba'Li" shirt, the name stretched out over the vast expanse that was her boobies, and her usual Chubbeso sweats. Clearly she had the courtesy to bring snacks, cookies from home (Mrs. Maglen was all too aware of her daughter's friends' appetites... namely Kate) and a few bag of chips. It appeared that she did not, however, have enough to refrain from taking it upon herself to christen the bag of cookies.

"Ohai!" Becca says nervously red, you having caught her with her mouth full, "I wub jusht... ub..." here she swallowed, "Want some?"

You politely decline as Kate motions for you to follow here into the kitchen.

“Okay so remember how I was freaking out a few days ago...” You nod instantly recalling Kate’s tears spotted face. “Well I was thinking about what you said and…Well…I figured maybe I could push the diet thing back for just one more night…You know since it’s a party and everything?” She sounds unsure of the idea, wanting to hear what you thought. And of course you wanted Kate to have a good time tonight so…

“Sure Kate, one day won’t hurt.” You declare as you pick a pile of foodstuffs smiling a voracious grin.
***


Claire was the next to arrive, bringing in a whole box of X-S MASS with her. She was wearing a relatively simple getup, despite her royal tastes. You had no idea that Halter tops were popular in England, let alone made in the plurally x'd size that Claire Masters must've required. Yet there was one wrapped around her doughy form, stretched graphic of a golden crown and all. Her skinny jeans (certainly only skinny to her) and Ugs all making her look very approachable... aside from the fact that one might suspect that she could eat you.

“That Kat girl's told me just what is "in" back in the States, so I decided to let her whip something up.” she says handing the box to you, "And these are for you. Since I -cough cough- can't coach you anymore, my Mother said she would stock these energy bars in the vending machines full-time now until we can get a proper gym teacher as... it's become simply too stressful for me."

Claire then took it upon herself to give herself access to the modest amount of junk food Kate had lain on the counter top before her royal rump roasts enveloped the couch cushion farthest away from Becca, putting them both on an arm.

Bunnie would be the last one to arrive this evening. Her attendence record at these little get togethers was less than admirable. And, opposed to her usual garb of a light fuschia lunch lady's uniform, she was allowed to dress loud and proud as Bunnie Blake... boy was it loud.

Being a State's girl only a few years older than yourself, her tastes were still understandably metropolitan. A bright pink top that wrapped around her midriff and spaghetti-strapped around her shoulders; the front of which was dominated by a lone though sizeable lime-greed star whose uppermost point adjusted drastically to accomodate Bunnie's impeccable hooters. Simple faded blue jeans as bottoms, ripped and torn from walking around bare feet in her own complex no doubt and marked upon in Sharpie from people you and your friends had never even heard of, and a pair of new black converse- strings replaced to match her hair color.

"I know it’s your favorite and I always make plenty... so I saved ya some leftovers, Ceej." Bunnie says warmly as she handed you the tuberware in her hands, a wishful smile on her face as you examine the box

"You don't mean..." you gasp as she opens the lid, struggling with the surprisingly heavy weight of the package, only to find-

"Yep, a few slices of my Chocolate Cake-ala-Blake!"

Everyone manages to help themselves to a slice or two before setting into their usual groove. That is of course before the obligatory moment in every Game Night...

"Hey whats a party cake without ice cream? ” Claire asked to no one in particular.

Rebbecca in one of the rare moments she agreed with the princess “Kate has plenty of ice cream don’t you Kate? You don’t mind do you?”

“I’ll have some!” you interject “I mean it’s a party after all.” You say

“Well of course we know you’ll have some Big Guy…” and on the last two remarks she sticks a finger straight into the center of your visible paunch.

“Becca stop-haha.” You can’t finish as Rebecca had given a direct hit to your ticklish area.

Not used to such attention (there was a reason these things are usually held at your house, and it wasn't space) she began to stammer slightly, as she always did when confronted, "Y-Yeah, there's plenty of ice cream in the freezer. Um, help yourselves." Kate added grimly realizing all to well what those words could mean for students with such big appetites.

Claire was first and forwent all formalities, when confronted with delicious food and around people she only half-respected anyway, simply grasped a pint straight from the freezer and a spoon. After which she merrily waddled back to her seat on the couch and resumed her tyrannical rule over the poor cushions underneath her heavy bum. “Okay time for gossip...Listen to this I heard that Delphine and Chris were at the pool but guess who else was there…” and like that your three friends slowly became three girls and began to glut themselves on ice cream after waddling up and about the kitchen, never wishing to miss a bit of gossip about the schools and the latest rumors they might pertain.

Not one for girl talk, you now found yourself alone with Bunnie Blake.

“I’m glad to see you got your appetites back!” she says serving you you're second piece of cake.

“Well, we were just a little bit nervous about the test.” You suggest.

“Yeah, she nods. “I remember getting the same way around test time too. Don’t worry just like my mom said ‘Sometimes the best thing for a stomach full of butterflies is to keep it full of food.’ But If you’re still not feeling to good I guess I can go easy on you later” she trails off.

“Hey even if I was sick I could still whoop you at some video games! “you say as a snarky grin creeps across your face.

“Oh. It. Is. ON!” she says riled up from your trash talking. She sets down her cake server and stomps past the gossiping trio right to the console picking up a controller. “Come here so I can make you eat those words!”

It proved to be another excellent game night, with Bunnie taking on all challengers at Mortal Kombat. Things seemed like they couldn’t get any better.
14511221111111121112121222221121.title: To reitterate, it is in fact GAME NIGHT!!!

choices: Two weeks later you and Kate relax, just a bit, and start to put on the pounds!
Two weeks later the time spent on your diet means you and Kate haven't gained!
145112211111111211121212222211211.content:
Soon…

"Oh yeah! Take that Raiden! Take that Kitana! And oh yes, suck on some of this Scorpion!!" Bunnie Blake hollers triumphantly as she delivers a Fatality to the afformentioned yellow-clad warrior, "Barakus wins... again!!"

'FATALITY!'

"Oh come on, Bunnie! Just pick another character!" you can't help but whine at this point. Those three were only the most recent of her onslaught, seeming to forget Smoke and Liu Kang due to a relatively hyperactive mindset, "You know what, just let me be Barakus just this once, you never pick anyone but him!"

"No way!" Bunnie gurgles as she looks up at her victorious "I could never even think of beating up Barry! He's so cute!"

"Cute?!"

"With a mouth like that, I'll be he could eat everything I put in front of him! Those rock-hard pecs wouldn't go unnoticed either..." she crinkles her nose excitedly, "Such a turn on." she says throatily before giggling at your expense

"He's like, part snake..."

Meanwhile, next to you in an "occupy Kate's couch" movement, somehow all three of your ponderously paunchy pals had managed to squeeze their fleshy forms in the same seat. At your house this would have been no problem, however that was due to your flat's luxurious furnishing; as in the anticipation that you and Claire would be spending much more time together than you actually do, all of your own furniture was reinforced to hold even the heaviest of girls.

However Kate and Rebbecca, due to not having penises and therefor not registering on Claire Master's radar, were to go without when it came to furniture until it broke, where it would be disposed of, dismantled, upsized, replaced and reinforced at the easy-easy cost of fifty pounds per. So putting carelessly calorie-carrying Kate, rotund in the buns Becca and Claire Masters (who ate the rhyme I provided for her) into one couch was no easy process. In fact...

"Move over, Kate, you're on my leg."

That's right. All three of these girls were so generously proportioned along all axis' that they had filled the couch. Not to the point of immobility while on it, but the doughy white balls of blubber had officially fused personal space bubbles. Kate had to keep her arms as close to eachother as humanly possible due to Becca's insistance on flopping out and about the armrest, which casued her to feel too contained in the breastial area. Claire kept her hands neat and folded where her belly met her lap, though she was terrible about the constant effort of crossing her plump little legs, constraining Kate from leg movement due to just how thick and immovable those obviously not interlocking logs of flub were.

And below were you and Bunnie, seated happily on the rug playing video games to your mutual heart's content. She hated video games with a passion... except the visual novel games from Japan that you had shown her so long ago. Those were pretty fun, like Higurashi. But not fighting games.

And she didn't really fit in with Becca and Claire either. Despite a lot of protest from either side, the two were a lot alike. Kate liked to think that Claire would have been very much like Rebbecca if she had grown up alongside her clique, and Rebbecca could easily have become Claire if she had lived as a 'Masters girl' her whole life. They both were rather obbsessive and stubborn, but would stand up for things that they believed in. And most importantly, they were both gossips; something that Becca wasn't before enrolling. Despite all this, when they weren't gossiping, they were usually trading insults.

"I thought they totally hated eachother!" Becca said from across Kate

"Nope. Total. Lesbos. I swear."

"Priya and Delilah?"

"Old news."

"Nuh-uh! No way!"

Kate couldn't help but feel just a little bit out of place...

However things had certainly been fun. No more different than things had been at your house. There was a little more courtesy, and things seemed a bit more cramped than usual (either due to size or, well, occupant size) There were a few things that would certainly have to change for the next few times... assuming that her ankle got better that quickly...

'I think I'll have CJ move that chair over here so we're not so squished on the couch' she thought maternally as she made a mental checklist of next week's improvements, 'Bunnie said my place was a little drab... maybe I could put up that framed poster of Einstein I have! Oh I hope they like it next week!'

Kate sighed inwardly as she thought fondly of what she could do. So lost in her mind she was that she didn't catch sight of the two of you on the floor rising to go.

"Thanks Kate, I had a blast!" Bunnie says happily as she delivers a quick hug and hops out the door, hollering back to them, "Chicken Alfredo with broccoli tomorrow, don't be late!" as she goes.

Claire sighed, "Yes, I have to be going to." wiping a bit of ice cream from her lips, she carelessly tossed the container behind her, "I have a dinner to attend to with Mother and her boring friends. And her boring friends' daughters. Yuck."

"Ah, I can stay a bit." Becca says faithfully, "CJ, why don't you help Princess Blubberbutt up off of her royal hiney so we can all have a moment alone."

"Yes CJ," Claire says seductively as she wobbles around on the couch in as sexual a position possible for a girl of her size and shape, "Come wrap your arms around me... don't worry, I'm sure you'll get the heavy lifting done once we're out the door together."

"On second thought, let her sit there." Becca says coldly, "She could afford to miss a few meals."

"Nooooo!!" Claire whined before you all burst out into laughter...
145112211111111211121212222211211.title: So, once more, the time is GAME NIIIIGHT!!!

choices: And onto the source of your tubby troubles: Claire, Kat, and Delphine!
1451122111111112111212122222112111.content:
...little less than two weeks pass by with little to no discernably special events taking place.

In the span of fourteen days, your appetite has been kept largely in check by the comforting notion that Kate always seemed to be right by your side, cheering you on despite the fact that she was going through the same dietary tribulations herself.

Every day, before school, the two of you always waited for one another in order to ensure that you both recieved a healthy breakfast with no fattening frivolities. During lunch, you both remained strong and avoided seconds, except for a granted system that allowed another helping; such as after a big test, or after a similarly worthy accomplishment. After school you were usually one to hang out with Kate along with Rebbecca and occassionally another drop-in companion of yours, usually around the plaza that Chubbeso's small community had gained over the course of it's founding.

Rebbecca, ever the extrovert and secretly suspicious of how quick you and Kate seemed to become even chummier than normal, was always one to suggest some kind of three-person friendly activity; such as going to the movies or taking a stroll around the mock neighborhood. While her innate jealousy was no doubt a slight motivator in her actions, she genuinely wished to spend more time with the two of you, feeling somewhat neglected as your friendship progressed further and further. Her favorite activities usually consisted of afformentioned moviegoings, spending time with ridiculous competitions between company present, or even just loitering in the park.

Kate, much more introverted than her bottomheavy blowhard of a companion, was actually rather enjoying the time that all three of you seemed to spend together lately. Now, again, you three had spent plenty of time together in the past, but ever since enrolling and the constant ambushings and the neverending gaggles of girls following you around, she had noticed an undeniable dip in time actually spent together with you. And while she wasn't nearly as "active" (per say) as Becca in her preferred activities, hers were none the less entertaining in their own rights. Going to the library, the quiant cafe run by a branch of the Chubbeso staff (interesting note: Bunnie highlights here on her weekends off, leaving the kitchen staff to do her dirty work) or even that quaint stroll in the park that Becca seemed to be so fond of.

And you were more than happy to oblige both young ladies in their flights of fancy. You weren't quite picky yourself, so you and your two compadres seemed to settle on whichever idea sounded like the best idea at the time. Leading to a usually hassle-free environment for your mutual friendship to blossom...

However, when you had company outside just the three of you, things tended to get a little hectic... which seemed to impede your dietary progress
1451122111111112111212122222112111.title: Progress Impeded

choices: Okay, Claire isn't a shocker. But why Kat? I thought she was rather slender!
14511221111111121112121222221121111.content:
Claire was always one for tea parties.

"Oh CJ, darling, you just have to try one of these scones!" she fawned, her plush bum squished into an undersized yet posh chair- the poor thing's purple padding completely obscured by a certain princess' royal rotundity, "Mother had them specially ordered by the box from some insignificant country in that hoity-toity country, France." she said with a slurp of her Earl Grey, "If there's one thing that those Frogs know how to do, it's bake their scones!"

You could hardly object, seeing as how the monumental middle that Claire Masters sported may have been a testament to such an aficionado status. Being squished so tightly as she was, her belly rolled outwards heavily, resting inconsiderately atop her flaring thighs. Her double chin, soft though unyeilding, was bunched up against her breasts, despite attempting to sit as a proper lady should. Her attempts at maintaining that status were only second to her attempts at stuffing you full of scones like a prized hog.

"Like you're one to talk about hoity-toity." Becca snarled from her own seat, one not quite so overloaded as the one the Princess' mightily meaty mass dominated upon, "Where we, CJ Kate and me, come from the only "special order" we put in with our mothers is whether or not we want Eskimo Pies from the grocery store!"

"That's true..." you concur quietly

"I-I do like Eskimo Pies..." Kate agreed meekly

Claire took another long sip of her tea, a bite of her scone between her thick fingers, and then another sip before dabbing her pouty lips with a napkin before her rebuttal. "It's CJ, Kate, and I Rebbecca." she said with her nose high in the air, "Honestly, you Americans. And secondly, shut up and enjoy the treats."

"Or what?" Becca sat the cup down hastily as she leaned forward slightly; a vein on her forehead appearing ominously, "Your royally rotund maids will rough me up?"

"You leave Bernice and Gretchen out of this, y-you overstuffed harpy!" Claire huffed as she attempted to lean forward against her own bulk

"Pampered Pig!"

"Dimwitted Sow!"

At last, Claire's shifting became too much for the poor overworked piece of furniture beneath her. At the constant movement of her royal buns, Claire noticed the legs buckling beneath her at the start of the meal, and while normally she would find pride in this fact, it was still quite the inconvenience considering that there was no time for a replacement to be ordered. The splintering lumber beneath her now would prove her wrong as her soft, heavy form was sent down to the ground!

"Ah!" Kate jumped slightly, her own bulk wiggling a bit in her surprise, "C-Claire, are you-

"MOTHERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!" she hollered at the top of her lungs...
14511221111111121112121222221121111.title: Rounding Out at the Masters Abode

choices: Alright, that's not so bad. But why Delphine? I thought she was working out!
145112211111111211121212222211211111.content:
And while tea parties were fun (they made you feel pretty classy actually) things like that tended to lean your company towards other, more slighted members of your circle. Namely Kat, however she wasn't exactly without her faults either...

"K-Kat, I r-really don't think... that this suits me..." Kate pleaded brokenly, her face absolutely burgundy with the amount of embarassment that this new outfit entailed (though it probably had something to do with the tight girdle that it entailed as well)

"No way, you look great!" Kat patronized the poor plump girl as she paced about, almost like a vulture as she circled around Kate's meaty form absolutley bursting out of her latest ensemble. Tentatively the pony-tailed girl knelt down and examined some of the more constricting areas of her outfit, which seemed to revolve around one certain area- this being a strapless and backless dress and only to be supported by Kate's enormous hooters...

"Kate your boobs are really spilling out of this thing, aren't they?!" she said abruptly after a minute or two of scrutinizing the reddened area, "I mean that's no surprise... your boobs spill out of everything you own... but seriously, ever look at breast reduction surgery? These monsters have gotta be murder on your back!" she said loudly, cupping them as best she could with her hands. "If you'd be interested, I'd be more than happy to take them off your hands... or even half would do me just fine if I split them between what I've already got."

"Kat!!" you couldn't help but to get a little red-faced yourself at the events taking place in front of you, "Please will you knock it off!"

"Oh come off it, CJ!" Kat chided you as she continued poking and prodding at her newest mannequin's flesh bulging from every open orifice of her dress, "I've got to see what areas are tight on Kate if I want to get this thing juuust right... hmm, are you sure you haven't had implants? These puppies are wild!"

"KAT!!" both you and Becca have to shout, catching her attention

"Sorry, sorry. Just a bit of breast envy between stylist and client." she said with a chuckle, "Here Kate, why don't you turn around so I can check you out from the back?"

Kate looks to you and Becca, her peanut gallery, for approval before complying with Kat's suggestion. She turns awkwardly, her expansive thighs tight in the tight white dress, before her back is turned to the three of you. Kat carefully attempts to pry the fabric from Kate's smooth cushion of backfat. She can't even get an inch off of the poor thing!

"Well with so much in the front, I guess I'll have to spin off a bit more fabric and adjust the size... again..." Kat said, not bitterly but with a professional's pain of having to readjust their work for the third time, "In the meantime, I guess we could all go see a movie or something, what's playing?" she asked, turning to Rebbecca as she reached for an all-too-familiar brand of energy bar...

"C-CJ?" Kate whimpered from atop the stage, "Do you think we keep dieting, I'll be able to fit into this dress?" she asked with a sparkle of hope in her eyes (though that could have also been the studio light from Kat's flat against her glasses)

"I'm sure you will!" you answer wholeheartedly, though squeezing into that dress wouldn't really be much of an accomplishment, "I'm sure that Kat's gonna have to make it a whole lot smaller before she has to make it any bigger for you to wear it!"

"C-CJAAAAAAAAAAAAY!!!" she hollers as she suddenly plummets from the top of the stage, landing on her front and forcing all of her flab atop itself, popping Kate out of the dress like a lobster too big for it's shell!

Luckily for her, she landed on her breasts, so the only casualty would be her glasses as the fell from her rounded face and shattered on the floor.

"Kate!" you holler, "What happened?!"

"I-I think I might know..." Kat said mournfully, seeming somewhat... wider than just a second ago

"I-I popped a button on m-my... m-my uniform..."

You're only moderatly heavy, since Kate seems to have taken the brunt...
1451122111111112111212122222112111111.content:
However while Claire was really no help to anybody but herself (more of a hindrance, to your diet and furniture) and Kat not really one to help everyone's shrinking self esteem towards their bulging figures, Delphine Shuzumiya was probably the least helpful, and least likely for you to hang with while unguarded. You learned that rather early on...

"Se Magnifique Madame!" the softly accented tone echoed throughout the cooking room, not that you had entirely noticed just how much it echoed with Delphine in front of you. "Madame Blake, she est tres gifted, non?" the blonde girl gushed as she helped herself to another forkful of Bunnie's latest confectionery concoction heartily, actually leaning in to lessen the time taken from fork to mouth.

"Well I'm glad you like it, Pheeny." Bunnie's voice rang from the back of the room as she sat, looking positively dwarfed in Ms. Telleri's custom built, oversized chair. "When CJ and Kate asked that I started cooking healthier from now on, I thought I had done something wrong, but knowing that my healthy food is just as good as my apparently "not up to some people's standards" food."

"B-Bunnie, we were only trying to-

"Yeah yeah, I'm just teasing, Kate." the calamity-pink cook grinned towards the topheavy girl beside Becca, "You too, Romeo."

You couldn't help but jump, considering you were used to male-oriented nicknames around here. Was she talking about you? No way, just because you happened to be trying to keep a conversation going around a really pretty girl while she ate away didn't make you some sort of player. Absolutely not! Seriously, you and Delphine were friends!

...she was just very pretty fun to talk to!

Your treason hadn't gone quiet unnoticed. There, sitting beside you as you stared, sat Becca and the aforementioned Kate; the former's countenance suggesting that she was trying to melt the contents of your skull with her mind and the latter looking positively devastated as she sunk in her plump cheek into her hand sullenly.

Delphine let out a slight burp as she pushed aside her plate, "This is tres wonderful, Madame Blake." she said graciously, brushing hair from her face as she caught your glance, "W-With you cooking all of these healthy meals for me, it is possible that I can relax about my figure!" she said happily, turning back to you slowly, "Perhaps this will leave me some free time to... maybe... um "hang out" with CJ, Rebbecca, and Kate?"

Before you could even open your mouth, no doubt to say something incriminatingly stupid, brash-as-ever Becca piped up from her seat, "Nuh-uh, no way, not gonna happen."

Kate too, turned from your interests, "C-CJ and I study a lot... s-so I don't really know how much fun that will be for you..."

Even Bunnie seemed to disagree with the two of you getting more face time together, no doubt with her ow, "Not a chance!" she said flatly before catching herself, "...that you'll wanna hang out with a slug like CJ when you've got... um, so much stuff to do in cooking club!"

"Oh..." innocent Delphine said, broken hearted, "Like what?"

"Cooking stuff."

"I'm not a slug!"

"Whatever"

***


So, trials and tribulations in check, it's easy to see why it's so, well, easy to put on weight at this academy now that you and Kate were thinking of dieting. However, judging by your choice in the story, it doesn't really seem to be working well. So, one week after the aformentioned two, just how has this whole "diet" thing worked out for the both of you?
1451122111111112111212122222112111111.title: Women just don't like the French

choices: How exactly HAD you got here?
14511221111111121112121222221121111111.content:
So another week had passed. You were in class and Mrs. Kawasaki was collecting your homework, she stops by your desk hand outstretched, and you move to hand your homework in only…only you didn’t have it? Oh that’s right it was still in your backpack. You and Kate had just worked on it together. You search your bag high and low and still couldn’t find it! Mrs. Kawasaki stares testily down at you as you search for the missing paper. Suddenly, a whistle came from across the classroom; someone stood up and was pointing at you. But why? Your shirtless that’s why! Oh great! You had come to school pants-less too. In nothing but your underwear you trembled in your seat. Frozen and red-faced the classroom you feel the classroom filling with giggles. But suddenly there was another sound, and something like an earthquake began to shake you at your desk! You were sinking into the ground! Only wait- it wasn’t the ground-it was butterscotch pudding? You will your arms and legs to move but no matter hard you try they remain stuck. You begin to sink lower and lower, apparently the only one who noticed that you were slowly sinking into this warm stuff. You legs go numb as they go under and you’re up to your waist in pudding when a grinning face appears from above. Not Kate’s as you for some strange reason had expected, or even Rebecca’s, but Claire’s, surrounded by what look to be the entire CJ Fan Club army behind her. The gigantic girls, who were now all in bathing suits, jump high into the air performing cannonballs into the new pudding pool. Claire was heading your way, but butt first…Your hands still stuck; the last image you see is the firm outline of Claire’s cheeks as they’re seconds away from your head when….

Your eyes flip themselves open in reaction at impact and you wake from the strange nightmare. You almost yelp as you’re greeted by the framed face of Albert Einstein, his disheveled hair and outstretched tongue making him look just as surprised to see you too. Your mind takes a second to take the image in and then it takes a few more blinks and few more seconds before you realize something…you weren’t waking up in your bed…you weren’t even in your own dorm room! This was Kate’s (recently redecorated) room! And this defiantly wasn’t your pillow. For one thing your pillow wasn’t pink like this one and your pillow certainly didn’t feel as nice as this one either, gently rising and falling…wait a minute…this wasn’t a pillow at all! You lightly raise you head and find that you were now, and apparently had been, lying gently upon Kate’s magnificent pillowy breasts.

At the realization that you had probably been motor boating one of your best friends as the both of you had slept, you immediately went to jerk away. *No not like that* Pulling and tugging yourself *hee* you found you couldn’t move at all! Getting a better hold on yourself *OK! I’ll stop* you realize that your arm had become trapped underneath your stout schoolmate’s tonnage, and that was why you couldn’t move from this very provocative looking situation.
