You attempted to piece together how exactly you had ended up in this situation but a pounding headache began to drum through your brain stopping any attempt you made to think. Well, first thing first, you needed to get your arm free.

From underneath your blankets you shift your body ever so slightly, trying to adjust yourself to better pull out your arm. As carefully as possible you moved just a tiny bit lower, taking utmost care not to wake the sleeping Kate. You tug again but still no effect, your arm is still asleep and quite immobile, unable to move from under Kate’s smothering weight.

You let yourself rest for a second and lay your head back down gently before you make another careful and stealthy attempt when-Hey! Instead of two pillows you were now laying on one big plushy one; Kate’s stomach. Her stomach, fully revealed by her pajamas inability to cover her girth seemed even bigger now that you were this close to it. As you began to find Kate was quite the literal body pillow your head comfortably sank into her stomach. Your muscles go lax as you feel Kate’s stomach rise and inflate with every one of her sleeping breaths, only to gently sink with every exhale. Lying here in the quiet and warm dorm room, laying on this big warm improvised pillow you realized that it was…it was…it was… nice.

Face to face (to face to face) with Kate's apparently still budding breasts and stomach you enjoy your situation for just a bit…Shifting your head back for just a moment you nuzzle against Kate’s chest, and it feels just like you imagined; they’re firm yet still giving like a water bed in their consistency. And her belly! Well words really couldn’t describe what it felt like. Soft, warm, squishy, none of those were the exact word why her stomach made such an awesome pillow! In fact it was just nice to have a belly that wasn’t coming at you at practically the speed of light looking to smother you. You pause for just one more moment longer enjoying the soft skin on skin feeling, basking in the warmth Kate’s stomach possessed, slowly letting your face sink cheek first into the chub that was just as tender and gentle as Kate was.

Suddenly there was a snore or snorts of sorts and you could just crane your neck to the side to see where it was coming from. Apparently you weren’t alone here! Rebecca had spent the night in Kate’s living room too, and she also looked to be in a deep sleep as well.

The few wild moments of uncontrollably pressing you luck are cut short as common sense and fear take over. If Kate, or even worse Rebecca, happened to wake up to this crazy scene you have some serious splaining’ to do! Almost as if she was sensing your urgency Kate began to shift, she raised a chubby arm and you swiftly dodge its grasp as Kate slowly began to turn in her sleep. As she began to roll over, your smushed hand is freed, and you manage to wedge yourself out of the plush prison. Head still throbbing, arm still tingling as more blood began to flow back into it, your carefully stand up to take in your surroundings.

Let’s see; Kate’s glasses on the table over there, empty pop cans and ice-cream pints, snack wrappers, blankets, it seemed like you’d been through one heck of a night! You yourself seemed to be in your pajamas/sweats. Your head still throbbing, you search your fuzzy memories to piece together the big question: How exactly had you got here?
14511221111111121112121222221121111111.title: The (Waist Line) Hangover

choices: Something about you and her (and maybe the diet too? You weren’t sure.)
You were supposed to wake her up! She had to get a check up on her leg today!
145112211111111211121212222211211111111.content:
Let’s see…It was three weeks ago now that you had gotten that A+ on the test. The awesome memory was still fresh in your mind because it was your first A+ in math and you were just so excited about it…and after that was…game night! You remember agreeing with Kate that night that splurging on snacks would be a game night only thing. But there was still something important in the back of your mind-what was it?

In the present day, you decide to get some water from Kate’ bathroom, so as quietly as you could, you make your way to get a glass of cool water.

The test had been three weeks ago, lately you remember getting to know Kate’s place very well. Almost any night when you two weren’t studying together, Kate had called you and Rebecca over to help do some small chores (she did still have an injured leg after all.) You had moved a few chairs, cleaned a few floors and overall made her place look a lot snazzier. One day at Kate’s in particular had really stood out in your mind. While you were hanging up a poster of Albert Einstein, you had turned to ask Kate how it looked, but in the one split second after you spoke up you were sure you has caught her staring at you. For once instead of you admiring Kate’s bountiful breasts, you had caught her apparently sneaking a peak at what you supposed was your butt, or maybe it had just been at the poster, either way she had turned absolutely red, and had taken a deep breath of air like she was just about to say something important…but all she did was peep a small “Yes” agreeing that the poster did look fine where you’d put it. Between then and now there had been the trips to Masters’ mansion for tea, the two times you’d gone to Kat’s place to hang with her, and Bunnies’ special lunches you’d shared with Delphine…so that left just a few days unaccounted for.

You reach Kate’s bathroom and flick a switch, the rooms bright lights flicker on and scorch you corneas at first, then things ease into view as your bleary eyes adjust. You take a glance into Kate’s bathroom mirror, mystified by what you saw. Was that you? Apparently the diet hadn’t been working so well for you as it had for Kate. Kate had maybe put on a few extra pounds only really noticeable because she seemed to gain in just two main areas…but you, you had really grown all over! Perhaps it was because Kate was a little bit more serious about the diet than you were, (always offering you the last few donuts or brownies of a pack when you were studying together) perhaps it was because Claire’s constant insistence that you remain “well fed” whenever you were around her, (making sure her big athletic man had plenty of X-S Mass bars at all times of the school day) or maybe it might have been the ‘special’ lunches with Delphine (which while still lower in calories, Bunnie now served in portions of what could only be considered ‘Chubbeso size’ which sometimes led both Kate and Delphine passing their uneaten leftovers onto you, quite possibly the #1 fan of Bunnies cooking.) Whatever the reason was you certainly looked a lot…larger then when you’d began this diet. Well, not that you looked bad; your small potbelly wasn’t so small now, and your arms fit just a tiny bit tighter into your pajama top, your face certainly looked a little more…round, but really, you weren’t complaining. Sure you had gained a pound or two on this diet, but you were actually on a “diet” because you hadn’t wanted Kate to go it alone as she had on her many diet attempts before. So, if taking a pound or two for Kate is what it took to finally slow her gaining, then so be it, you would gladly do that for your friend.

Out of sheer curiosity you went over to Kate’s bathroom scale. You step on it and (having to just slightly lean over your beginners belly) you were able read the digital display. The red numbers shuffle till eventually reaching 206lbs. The number sends a small shock in your mind as you realize you had now passed the 200lb mark. You pause to think back again…you were 187lbs on weigh in day…so that was about a 19lb gain in a little over three weeks! You’re given another small jolt as you calculate that to be almost a pound a day... You instantly begin to rationalize the numbers, comforting yourself with the fact that you would have probably gained more if you weren’t on this diet, and that fact seems to move the issue from your mind.

You head back to the bathroom’s sink and mirror, drinking down a few Dixie cups of cold water. That’s when you noticing the slight smear on your hand, was that…chocolate cake? You wash the chocolate smudge from your hand recognizing it as residue from the snack cake you enjoyed last night…last night…. THAT’S RIGHT! Yesterday has been Game Night at Kate’s, making it the third-no wait-fourth time now! And yet this revelation, while a step in the right direction, sill wasn’t the important thought that pervaded your grasp.

You recall attempting to hold back on what you snacked on during the week, (well when you weren’t studying, which seemed to be quite often now-a-days.) The abstaining of snacks had only increased your hunger and anticipation of game night; a night where diets were basically thrown in the garbage and buried under ice cream pints and whipped cream bottles. You remember splurging so much the other night, and well, you certainly looked like you had been too. Something had happened though…Something last night!

Your thirst quenched, you walk back into the main room, gazing at the two heavy heavy sleepers before you, and they seemed content to sleep their mornings away. Your head throbs once more as you take in Kate, donned in her pink fuzzy pajamas, apparently having crashed on the floor in a half opened sleeping bag beside you, mouth still open with just a hint of drool trickling out. Then just to the other side of what you guessed to be your sleeping spot and ‘original’ pillow was Rebecca, donned in red flannel PJ’s and also still snoozing away. It wasn’t hard to guess how you must have ended up in such a tight situation this morning. You assume that Kate must have rolled over towards your sleeping bag and more to the point your hand, and from there your head just assumed that Kate was your pillow. There, it was as simple as that, nothing naughty had gone on. But there was still the question of why had you been sleeping here at Kate’s?

Then it suddenly hits you, memories of last night rushing at you all at once; Game Night last night.

It had been one of the best nights ever; Claire had pouted all that week that she couldn’t come due to some family obligation, but Bunnie had still managed to make it over bringing tons of her award winning pasta with her. She had also been trashing your mercilessly at Tekken all night long (Bob being her “cute” weapon of choice last night.) You also remember Kate and Rebecca had been talking heatedly about something in the background, a few time Rebecca had even raised her voice but she never exactly sounded angry at Kate. In the end like most of their conversations it had ended in laughter. Whatever they were discussing you had been distracted to notice as you were too badly getting whooped at Tekken to make out the specifics, you weren’t sure but you might have heard your name dropped in the conversation two or three times. But still, that wasn’t the thing that was just escaping your thoughts.

You remember how you embarrassingly refused to let Bunnie leave until you had won at least one match, and you think it had taken till just around midnight before she’d finally given up and simply let you beat her. After that Bunnie had to go, but Rebecca had wanted to watch a movie, and so after that, you remember feeling really tired and on the cusp of a sugar shock sleep for the ages, that’s when Kate had suggested you sleep here for the night, citing it was already practically a pajama party. You agreed, and Rebecca had left to go get her sleeping bag, leaving just you and Kate alone for a moment.

That was it! You both were making a bed out of unused blankets and pillows when Kate had said something to you, something really important!

Now if only you could remember what it was…
145112211111111211121212222211211111111.title: The (Waist Line) Hangover PT2

choices: Becca talks a shameful you into some breakfast around the Chubbeso Plaza...
Why don't we follow Kate, feeling rather low herself, to the nurses' office?
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
"CJ?" she had asked you late last night

"Phmeh?"

Forget making sense. Being half asleep at the moment, it was a miracle that your response had any sort of recognizable consonants or vowels. Staring at a television screen all night was certainly a strange way to tucker one's self out, but you had definitely found a way to do it. Somehow watching those poor avatars onscreen fight to the death (mostly just get beat to death by a chunky blonde guy) had really taken the wind out of you. That and the cheering, constantly getting up for a drink or two, using the bathroom; on top of all the jokes, laughter, and that ten minutes where Bunny claimed you as her throne and used your back as the seat- Tekken still whirring inside the xbox. Things had certainly been interesting that night. Well, as interesting as most Game Nights wound out to be.

It was understandable that you'd be a little winded, right?

"CJ?" Kate asked again with a whisper as she poked your plopped form

"Ngughhh..." you whimpered, "...Ya? What's up Kate...?"

The topheavy girl knelt with noticeable difficulty, causing considerable strain on her bunched up tee as it rode up as her belly pressed up against inside it's confines. As she reached the ground, a smile on her chubby cheeked little face, she failed to notice the impeccable strain present on her pajama bottoms as her plush buns filled the seat to max capacity.

"Hey," she started off sweetly, "Could you... y'know, wake me up tomorrow?" she asked shyly, "I-I mean, Dr. Young told me that I should get my ankle checked out, a-and I made an appointment."

"S'great" your already slumbering brain answers for you with a grumble

Kate smiled again, "I know, right? Pretty soon we'll be able to work out together again!" she said in an excitedly hush tone, "I can't wait, but I need you to wake me up at 7:30 tomorrow morning. I-If it's not too much trouble, I mean."

There was a bout of silence before your light snoring came into play, filling the flat with your gentle inhales and exhales...

"CJ?" she asked again, nudging your shoulder

"I'mah wake." you stammer

"So... are you going to wake me up?"

"Yeayeah, sure... wake me up..." you murmured before finally losing it

***


Oh crap. You were totally supposed to wake up Kate!

"Kate, Kate!!" you holler, shaking your jiggly body pillow in attempts to rouse her, "You've got to wake up... now!"

At your shaking, your two friends slowly shook the sleep from their eyes

The first thing to grumble about being awake wasn't Rebbecca, that wouldn't come until later. The absolute first thing to come out of Becca's overstuffed body was a low gurgle that would emanate from the pit of her stomach; signifying that, like most other times lately, Becca was hungry.

It was after this that the audible groans of waking came into play. With a frown plastered on her chubby face, she proceeded to make her usual "don't wanna" sounds as she shifted about in her lumpy sleeping bag. Apparently fighting to find the zipper, she struggled and squirmed within its thick confines for a moment.

It was obviously apparent that Kate had left hers open from the beginning for a reason. You see, being quite used to her rather large front, Kate had long given up on sleeping comfortably in confined spaces. This meant that, as she only grew larger, she expected to give herself a little leeway. While Becca, stubborn as a mule, preferred to sleep tight. Unfortunately, she would be sleeping far too tight for her own tastes- her bodacious bod and considerable rump were two main features that had gotten her stuck in her sleeping bag!

"Wh-What's the matter, CJ?" Kate asked, blushing slightly at just how close your faces were so early in the morning. It wasn't but ten seconds later that realization hit her as well, her eyes darting open as she struggled to rise past her own swollen proportions. She searched around for her glasses frantically, her chubby face looking quite naked without them, "Oh no, I've got to get dressed!"

You and Becca could only watch, not feeling quite able to do much to help your struggling friend as she nervously hobbled around on her bum, chubby leg...

When there was a knock at the door, a light rapping that somehow seemed very prominent without being too overbearing. As the three of you looked to each other to see who would answer it, you decide to take charge and open the door. Noticing to some degree that the uppermost section of your thighs had begun to brush together as you walked, you managed yourself over to Kate's front door and opened it; revealing Abida Idhar, carrying herself in her usual soulless no-nonsense manner.

"Kate Granderson?" Abida asked flatly, ignoring you entirely

"E-Erm, Kate Granden, yes..." she responded meekly from her standing position, still nervously twiddling her fingers

"You have an appointment with Doctor Young." Miss Idhar hissed, "I was asked by the Headmistress to escort you to the premises."

"A-Ah..." Kate grimaced

Abida seemed to dead-eye all three of you behind her sunglasses. Her lips remained curving downwards in a stoic neutrality that scared the ever-living daylights out of just about everyone she came into contact with, yourself included. It was only natural that Kate be a little hesitant to go along with a woman that you had long ago concluded was a sociopath...

She turned back to you and Rebbecca before making her decision:

"I-I'm still in my pajamas...I-I didn't wake up in time..." she said sadly, "I'd imagine that, since my friends didn't wake me up, I don't have time to change do I?"

"No." Abida answered flatly

It was here that Kate turned back to the two of you, you specifically, with a look of betrayal clearly detectable without her glasses, intentional on her part or not. Her hands traveled down to her exposed midsection, plump hands running over your pliable body pillow of the night, and her head hung low in shame. "O-Okay... let me just get my glasses?" Kate pleaded with the stern woman, only to be met with a jerk in the opposite direction

"No."

There was an awkward silence between your remaining pair as the nurse-bound two left the apartment, you and Becca being the only ones left in an apartment that wasn't yours.

"Well... I feel like a jerk." she said aloud

You couldn't help but agree with her.
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Overslept!

choices: Continue
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
Kate, feeling rather dejected slowly slogged down the hallway trudging behind the swift figure of Abida. The dark shape was the only way she would be certain she was heading in the right direction, for, while she wasn’t completely blind without her glasses it was only if she squinted hard enough, sans-squinting she could hardly discern any of the blurry objects that surrounded her, let alone find her way to Dr. Young’s office.

Still fuming that a certain someone had forgotten their promise to wake her up, and unable to know how many of the blurry blobs in her vision were actually other students surely making fun of her as she plodded along in her teeny tiny pj’s. Kate was left feeling both angry and gloomy, but it was only a few moments of silent brooding later when the shadowy shape in front of her abruptly stopped. Even without her glasses Kate recognized that they were front of Dr. Young’s office. Kate then heard a quick plastic click as Abida pulled out a smart phone from her suits inner pocket and made a call.

“Yes. Student Kate Granden has been delivered. Yes Mrs. Masters.” said the monotone voice of Abida. Kate then heard another click, this time of the metallic variety as the door to the Dr.’s office swung open. Half blind Kate could recognize the blobby figure of the woman standing in the doorway as the shapely Dr. Young. Abida only gave a quick nod to the doctor as she ushered Kate forth towards the office, Abida then swiftly turned about on her heels and silently disappeared back into the Academy’s hallways.

“Terribly sorry about Ms.Idhar Kate, but headmistress Masters insisted that you be escorted to your check up. Chubbeso does care ever so much about all of their students.” Dr. Young proclaimed as she led Kate to the check up room. “More like ‘cares about not getting sued.’” Kate said sharply just under her breath, her foul mood seeping into her words.

Over the past few weeks Kate had turned to Dr. Young for some health and dieting guidanc,e and from those frequent visits a small bond had formed between the two. Kate with her love of science, particularly anatomy, found Dr. Young much more friendly and likable than the meanie who had humiliated her on weigh-in day. Kate, also welcomed the comfort of doctor patient confidentiality, finding Dr. Young a level headed and understanding adult she could talk to, although there were some days Dr. Young got a little too inquisitive.

“I’m glad you managed to get here either way, I was worried that you had-er. Is everything all right?” Dr. Young asked mid-waddle as she noticed the sluggish pace of the top heavy teen.

“No… it’s just-I just-forgot my glasses because I woke up so late, and in case you didn’t notice I’m still in my pajamas.” Kate answered in a rather sour tone.

“Oh- well I’m sure I could hook you up with some discount contacts if you want, we do have a vision test here and I could pull some strings so-“

“Uh that sounds great Dr. Young, but not today…I’d really just like to get back-” Kate just managed to hold off from mentioning that her friends had spent another game night at her place, knowing that the sentence would start Dr. Young on a gossiping binge, and Kate was definitely not in the mood for chit-chat after such a rude awakening.

Kate climbed her way onto the examination table and let Dr. Young begin testing her injured leg’s reflexes. A quick pound of a rubber hammer sent a rippling effect up and down Kate’s legs and thighs, but Kate’s leg had responded with a healthy jerk, and few tests later Dr. Young asked Kate to step down and try her leg out.

“Okay, a little more pressure on it, gently now. Wonderful! Now take some steps…Brilliant! I’d say your leg is good to go if you want to start exercising again!” Dr. Young announced happily seeing that Kate’s leg was back at full strength. Strangely, Kate herself didn’t seem as excited as she should have been now that her leg had healed. "Speaking of exercising, how’s the dieting going?” asked Dr. Young, leaning in closer to her plump patient. Dr. Young had seen a lot of herself in Kate, (and not just in the unbalanced, buxom, body shape they shared) Kate was a young, smart, girl with dreams, and while Dr. Young was upset Kate didn’t exactly share the 'positivity towards pudginess' that she did, she admired Kate’s resilience towards earning a trimmer waistline in a healthy manner.

“Oh? My dieting? Uh, okay I guess” Kate really didn’t feel like talking, she wanted to go back and just tell C.J. off while she was still angry! But, maybe talking for a bit and letting herself cool down for a while would be better.

“Just okay? Not over doing things are we?”

“Oh no of course not, in fact that might be part of the problem.”

“Problem? Kate, you’ve haven’t gained a thing since the last I saw you. What could be the problem?”

“Well I’m happy about that, but…well…C.J’s not doing so well, he’s getting kind of…husky”.

“Oh!” Dr. Young said, her plucked eyebrows flickering. “Tell me more” and with that she eased back into her three wheeled doctor’s chair, ready to enjoy off Kate’s schooldays gossip, which in Dr. Young’s opinion was far better than any of the soap operas or dramas she followed. Kate then went on to explain how she started feeling partly responsible for C.J’s growing waistline, how she had been teaching him a new study strategy that grew his G.P.A along with his waistline, all of this along with their agreed once a week snack binges, and frequent X-S Mass bars.

“So he’s looking a bit healthier he’s still a growing boy.” Dr. Young began. Kate looked unsatisfied with her answer. "What I mean is that...Kate your only 14 and C.J’s just 15… All I’m saying is that both of your bodies are still growing and changing and it can take a while till you find a weight your body’s naturally comfortable with. I mean look at me, I didn’t know what a comfortable weight was for me till I started here.” Dr. Young had been rather underweight before joining the Chubbeso lifestyle four years ago, and from there on she surely had GROWN well accustomed to the plush life the academy offered. And while Dr. Young had never explicitly ordered any of her patients to gain more weight, she was more than a little biased towards the heavier side of the scale when it came to her idea of a healthy body size.

Kate didn’t nod or shake her head at this answer, only feeling slightly better now that she got some of her troubles off her chest.

“Besides, I happen to think he looks a lot better now that he’s how did you put it…huskier. How about you~?” Dr. Young added with a catty grin, causing Kate's cheeks to burn bright red.

“Well….y-you promise you won’t tell?” Kate asked curling up into herself as she did whenever she felt nervous, or anxious, or any combination of the two.

“Dr.’s honor.” Dr. Young assured, knowing that she'd hit the nail right on the head.

“I do” Kate said quickly before following it up. “I-I feel so guilty and weird that I want to get thinner but I actually don’t mind that he’s getting… (she had to swallow a bit before she could say the taboo word) fatter. Is it weird?”

“No! Not at all! You like what you like.I happen to like my men hunky too if you know what I mean~.” Dr. Young said as she bounced a single eyebrow provocatively. Kate couldn't help but crack a smile, and Dr. Young was happy to see that the girl had brightened up. She decided to go on. “You know, I’m also a certified Love Dr.” she added, giggling from her chair. ‘Want some advice?”

Kate nodded studiously, forgetting that today had started out as one of her worst mornings ever.
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Ain't no cure for the not-on-time blues

choices: Rebecca can’t get over how 'round' you’re getting (Like she’s one to talk!
Something else happens!
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
“So from what I understand he forgot to wake you up. It was probably an accident but I suppose you’re understandably a little mad at him, right?” Asked Dr. Young. Kate nodded again ready for soaking up any tips on love. She had just finished explaining the disaster of the morning she had been through and was ready to learn from the 'Love.DR.' “Okay, so you could be angry with him the next time you see him, or you could mention that he owes you one.” Explained the doctor, her tone that of a chef who was revealing one of his secret recipes.

“What?”

“Just say he owes you a favor or something, like a trip to the movies,or to the ice cream place at the plaza, something small like that. Just make sure he’s doing it to make things up to you, and that your both going alone.”

“Oh, I don’t know...C.J’s done so much to help me already...I don’t know if I could…” Kate said shirking up into herself.

“Listen he’ll feel bad enough already, he’d gladly take the first chance he can to make things up to you.” Kate was amazed that the large doctor could sound so giddy, in fact she almost sounded like a school girl she was getting so bubbly. “So… let’s see…Then you dress up. I mean your absolute best outfit, understand? Something that will really wow him” Kate’s mind immediately traveled to the dress she had been modeling for Kat and her eyes lit up at the idea of it. This plan was certainly sounding better and better. Kate loved dressing up before she'd enrolled in the academy, but now thanks to the Academy's uniform policy there were so few chances to actually put something elegant on.

“Okay,” said Dr. Young as she hefted herself out of the chair and began swaggering around the room. “so, date…dress…uh…” she had hit a roadblock. Sure she had watched enough drama shows on television that she could fantasize plenty of dates out in her mind, but she had never thought past the first two parts. “Uh, then you...You just wrap your arms around him in a big hug, and lean in close, and then whisper something cheeky in his ear even if it’s something just like ‘I love you’ and then see what he does” The saucy idea sent both of them laughing once more.

“What!” Kate said finally. "No way! I'd probably die of embarrassment!” The idea wasn't all bad though, it did make for the perfect excuse for a 'date' with CJ. But then again she'd have to think it over before she'd actually do something as bold and romantic as that...

"Well, you'll think of something when the time is right I'm sure of it!" said Dr. Young giving her a hopeful thumbs up. "By the way Kate, I have a few more minutes left till my next patient is due, want me to walk you back?"

"T-that'd be great!" Kate squeaked as she half stumbled into Dr.Young forming what could have quite possibly been Chubbeso's fleshiest 'breastiest' hug ever.

***

Meanwhile way before Kate had even reached Dr. Young’s office; you were still feeling miserable over this morning’s events. While you were cleaning up your sleeping bag and beating yourself up for not waking up Kate, Rebecca was convincing you into some breakfast at Chubbeso plaza.

"Hey if she’s gonna be mad at us anyways, why let it be on an empty stomach right?" Rebecca explained her early morning hunger pains urging her to get something eat.

“Well…” you only faintly struggle with the idea. There really wasn’t any point of waiting here till Kate came back. If Abida hadn’t shown up and taken Kate so quickly you probably would have went with Kate to hear the good news. But now…now all you could do was wait.

“C’mon” Rebecca said thumping you hard on the back. “Bunnies at the café today. One of those Mocha-Frappa-iatto thingys is sure to pick you up.”

“...O-kay.” you concede, still sounding rather glum to your big bummed chum.

"Oh, and maybe some pancakes, I'm craving pancakes or-" continued Rebbecca as the two of you headed for breakfast.

Over breakfast at Chubbeso plaza…
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: They Call Me Dr. Love

choices: Becca steals, like, almost all your food! What's her deal?!
A familiar face, one who may or may not have a new chin, sees and joins you guys
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
"That'll be one Mochafrappeiato Thing and a cup of Thatsugarywhat'sitcalled for the Missus." Bunny giggled as she scribbled a bit on the order pad, "Anything else I can get two of my favorite customers?"

Shaunty's Restraunt had always been a favorite within your inner circle of friends. The food was wonderful, never over or under done, and there was always something new on the menu. Apparently, Mrs. Masters relocates the entire Lunchladys' Coilition to work here on the weekends. Luckily for your crew and all the other lucky customers this includes Ms. Bunnie Blake, who is more than happy to whip up culinary tastefulness sublime and serve it to all who ask for it in a timely, perky manner truly befitting a waitress.

"You're lucky Bunnie speaks Becca," you can't help but point this simple fact out as you roll your eyes at the girl from across the table, "Or we would have been here all morning trying to order."

"Shuff uph." Becca chuckles as she stuffs an entire complementary roll into her maw.

They're not complementary to everyone, mind you. Just you and your friends. Bunnie happens to have a lot of pull around Shaunty's, and it appears that she's far from afraid to use it. Every time you, accompanied usually by either Claire Rebbecca or Kate, she's more than happy to kick a customer out of their seat just to get you guys a table. With so much luxury towards your circle, it's really no wonder why you decide to eat here so often...

Becca swallows, a noticeable lump consisting of masticated dough slides down and bulges from her esophagus before disappearing behind her heavy chest. She was really never one for moderation, Becca. One day she'd more than likely choke- lets just hope that someone's around to keep her from dying blue in the face one day. N-Not that you ever imagined being the one to save her, or anything like that. However you had studied the Heimlich maneuver ever since she almost choked on an ice cube when you two were in the third grade together.

"Stop staring, I'm not gonna choke." she knows you a little too well for your own good

"Damn, here I thought I was just being a good person and watching out for my friend." you feign being hurt, considering that you're already a little achey inside it comes naturally to you, "Fine, I'll neeeeeeever worry about you again. I'm so sorry to have troubled you with my innocent worryings, Becca~"

"Ugh, you've really gotta stop sending me on those guilt trips... even if they are fake." Becca grumbles with a smile, "I think you've been spending too much time with her Holy Heifferness, she's starting to rub off on you."

"Nah, Claire's alright."

Of course, however, Rebbecca was actually referring to a much more different symptom than any sort of false melodrama that you would sling for entertainment and sarcastic purposes...

Becca can't help but stare at how large you've become in such a short time. Last year, you barely packed on thirty-five pounds since enrollment. In your brief duration as a Sophomore, however, you'd nearly reached that amount of poundage already. Granted, she's become a much bigger girl than the merely chubby Freshman who intially walked onto the campus herself, but something about you didn't seem quite... right.

You were lazier, and you tended to eat more. You barely mentioned working out and you were spending more and more time on couches at your friend's house than on your feet. And all this was swell and dandy, she did it herself. And at first it was fine, it gave her more opportunity to be with you over... well, no one considering all the women you seemed to hang out with were just as lazy.

But you were getting... dare she say it... fat.

Hypocritical as it may sound to the currently two hundred and sixty some-odd ball of bootycentric blubber that Becca may be, she wasn't really attracted to fat guys. She was attracted to you yes, and always had been since that fateful day in first grade. But something about you gaining weight didn't really... sit well with her.

As you reached for a roll, Becca acted on instinct and slapped your fuller hand away.

"Hey!" you whimper, "What was that for?!"

"No way, Ceej!" she barked playfully as she lifted up another roll to her lips, "These are mine!"

"But I'm hungry!"

Rebbecca swallows heartily, another large lump sliding down her throat as yet another doughy morsel meets its demise within the confines of Becca's ever-digesting gullet. She takes out another one and takes a large chunk out of it, "Well too bad." she says after swallowing much easier this time, "Too bad for you, anyway. You know I love bread."

"...you do." you admit weakly, "You do love bread..."

"And you would never deny me anything that I looooooove now would you?"

"No..." you whimper as your round tummy begins to growl, "Now who's starting to sound like Claire?" you muttered that last part under your breath, lest you tick off a girl of Becca's generous size and proven hostility streak.

"Wuzzat?" she asked through a mouth full of dough

"Nothin'." you whip, lips pursed...

As your meal arrives, shortly thereafter...
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Rebecca can’t get over how 'round'...

choices: Kate’s feeling forgiving, and wants to give her healed leg a workout.
Kate’s still sort of mad and in no mood to exercise today…
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
Eventually, Rebecca relinquished the rolls leaving you to sample just one of the baked biscuits. Not long after that a waitress appeared complete with a silver cart with the first part of your breakfasts. This was a hot and steaming platter of what was practically a Lincoln Log© fort of bacon, and not just any bacon either; expertly seasoned, smoked, and fried, and featuring the perfect ratio of pork to fat, the wholesome bacon served here was beyond compare. The both of you snacked away on the arrangement, chatting on how classes were going, how it was getting slightly colder out now, and news around the school. As the small talk went on you noted that you were in fact doing most of the talking today as Rebecca’s mouth seemed to be busy ravenously working its way through breakfast, mowing through three pieces of bacon for every one you could get your hands on.

The waitress then returned with both of your main courses on cart. “One bacon and mushroom omelet, and one Shaunty’s Saturday Special short stack.” She announced as she removed the respective lids covering the plates. A small wave of warmth and steam washed over you, along with the smell of the cooked delights. Rebecca’s six egg omelet looked to be cooked perfectly as did your own short stack. In fact ‘short stack’ was a bit of a misnomer, for this was a Chubbeso sized short stack; a five piece pile of plate sized blueberry pancakes (blueberries the ‘dieters’ alternative to chocolate chips in your view) all slathered with maple syrup, butter, and powdered sugar. Salivating you take fork and knife in hand, and were just about to bring cutlery to cakey goodness...

“Wait!” Rebecca suddenly says, spotting you were about to glut yourself on the calorie laden creation. “Uh, that looks really good, mind if I try a bit first?”

“Sure Rebecca…” you say as you slide the plate over. Sharing had always been a welcomed part of eating out with friends, but that sort of thing never happened at the beginning of meals. Rebecca then began to saw through not one but all five pancakes on the plate, and a large cut at that! Certainly more like half your breakfast than just the ‘bit’ she’d advertised. Sliding the preposterously large portion onto her already crowded plate, she then helped herself to a forkful of syrupy scrumptiousness. Your eyes widened as you puzzled over how hungry could Rebecca possibly be today?

“Rebecca!” you shout surprised at her pancake pilfering.

“What?” she asks, trying to look innocent as one could with cheeks full of flapjacks.

“That’s like half of my breakfast!” you say pointing out what should have been quite obvious to her.

“Oh it is not…” she lied. Rebecca had knowingly taken a large piece of your pancakes, but only because she was such a good friend and trying to cut some calories out of your diet. And while any other time Rebecca would have proudly stated you were doing something that was irking her, outright saying you were getting fat seemed a little mean. “Here, I’ll make it even...big baby” with a few more expert cuts with her fork and knife she placed a small sliver of golden yellow omelet back on to your plate. As she slid the plate back, you decided that rather than raise a fuss over how the trade was far from 'even', you'd just enjoy the meal.

The pancakes (or what was left of them) still tasted amazing; their melt in your mouth sensation, the syrup’s sweet thick flavor, and the overall yummy factor of your meal, all combined into one incredible flavor experience. Although you were unable to truly savor their flavor, as you were slightly bothered, thinking over what you would do next time you saw Kate, and what you had done to make Rebecca start stealing all your food. Rebecca sensing the frazzled looks on your face, finally spoke up.

“C.J…Look, I didn’t want to say this but…I think Kate’s making you...soft.” She accuses pointing a forkful of omelet in your direction before plopping it into her mouth.

“Soft?” you ask you wipe a bit of syrup and golden griddled goodness from your small hint of a double chin.

“Yeah, aren’t you being a little soft on her? …You know, too easy?” she continued hoping she could make her point without offending.

“Well...maybe.” You admit. “Really when we started off I was just there to support her. But…”

“But?” Retorted the round rumped Rebbeca.

“Well…at first things were fine.” You quickly explain. “But then Claire showed up to be our coach, and then Kate hurt her leg, and then Mrs. Master’s closed the gym…and…” And there was something more, too complicated to detail at the moment. There was Kate’s studying and snacking strategy, the tender moment when she had wrapped you in a tear stained hug, and the hardest thing of all to explain, how certain feelings between you and Kate were starting to grow. Somehow, after all that you had convinced yourself that putting on weight during a diet wasn’t such a bad thing, if it meant Kate was losing weight.

“Listen!” Rebecca says leaning in closer to regain your attention while cautiously remembering from to not put too much weight on the table as Claire had before. “If you keep this up do you think you’ll be able to outrun the fan club? I think you really owe it to Kate to take things more seriously.”

She had you on the ropes now. Now that you were seriously aware of your poundage predicament you felt a little torn. Sure, the pounds had been a bit of a…surprise, but your grades had gone up. Really, you were ambivalent to how big you were becoming, but Rebecca sure made a strong case for getting back to working out. Kate’s injured leg had been one of the real reason you’d stopped jogging, so maybe…maybe if Kate was okay to start exercising again today, you could turn things around. But it was true; Kate really wasn’t the strictest of coaches, well maybe on herself, but when it came to enforcing rules on others Kate was as Rebecca put it…soft. Yup, Rebbecca certainly knew just the way to put things, always ready to tell it like is and get strait to business...IN FACT!

“Well then…” you begin, spouting your idea as fast as soon as you thought of it… “Could you help Rebecca?”

At the sudden offer Rebecca swallowed her mouthful of half chewed omelet, hard, so hard in fact she’d almost begun to choke. Thankfully a few swigs from her tall sugarywhat'sitcalled helped clear the way for her a response.

“Ha…well…I don’t know….” She stammered, suddenly finding the already half empty plate in front her more interesting that you for the moment.

“But you’d be a better coach than Claire!” you insist. “And you had to have done tons of practice training from softball…”

“CJ, that was back in middle school, I don’t even know how much I remember from softball training…” Rebecca chewed the idea over as she chewed over another piece of bacon. If she did agree to help coach you, she specifically wouldn’t be the one dieting and exercising, plus it would be an easy way to keep an eye on your hopefully shrinking waistline, and another eye on how "close" things were getting between you and Kate…

“Okay I’ll give it a shot!” she concedes with a shrug of her plump shoulders.

“Really?”

“Sure, but just to try it out for a bit, no yearlong membership guarantees at club Becca. And remember; a good coach has to be strict sometimes, so no whining either!” She says already asserting herself with a commanding tone.

You nod approvingly, feeling a sense of strictness is what you needed. This new deal seemed to invigorate Rebecca as she finished her breakfast, including what was practically most of yours, with an even quicker pace. You too found yourself regaining your appetite, even after this morning’s incident.

Soon, Rebecca’s hands had moved from holding a fork and a knife and switched to massaging the stomach that they had just been continuously feeding. It had rounded out, distended further and tightening, as it had been filled to the brim from within, and the pokes and prods from her hands helped ease the ache. In fact if you hadn't known any better you would have thought she was practically playing with it right in front of you. Shaking it and wobbling this way and that, bouncing it between her hands this way and that in almost hypnotizing fashion. Finally, she seemed to forgo formalities all together and let her stomach surge free from under her shirts constraints. Smooth, stretchmarks-less skin came gushing forth, and Rebbeca's chubby fingers seem interested in learning every new inch of the wide world they walked upon. It finally took your own stomach to eventually break your gaze away from the sight. It gurgled and moaned for perhaps just a bit more food, but you today's pep talk had reset your own resolve. Rebecca gave a big sigh, inflating her gut to full "spare tire" size before asking. "So…when do we start…Today?”

“Well, maybe not right now.” You plead, knowing that exercising right after eating did not sit well in your case. “Can we at least see how Kate feels first?” You ask quickly avoiding anything to do with exercise after such a pleasing meal. “I still feel bad about what happened.”

“Your right...Oomph” Rebecca begins carefully sliding her booty out of the booth. “Let’s hope you didn’t screw things up too bad.” She jokes as she offers you a helping hand

“BECA!”

“Relax…I’m sure she’ll forgive you.”

So off you both trod, unsure just how you would find Kate when you returned to her dorm room. When you arrive…
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: A 2 for 1 Breakfast

choices: On another line...
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
"Ohhhh...I think I ate too much..."

At the rumbling of your own doughy tummy, you couldn't help but agree with her. Becca, only calling her that because 'Chick who Stole my Breakfast' was a bit more of a mouthful than what you had gotten to eat at breakfast, had almost eaten herself sick on what was to be your morning nourishment.

Her stomach, usually soft and rather malleable as far as stomachs go, had been stuffed to the very brim of comfort with all of her own as well as a good portion of your delicious breakfast food as it expanded inside of her. Becca's belly swelled outwards, singing a sweet song of digestion as the contents sloshed back and forth beneath the skin of the dome like structure. Rock hard and taut, her massive middle swayed back and forth with her every step as she fought gravity and her own lacking willpower to stay upright.

"I'll say you did." you grumble as your stomach growls some more, "I mean, I know you're trying to help, but you could have left me at least a little bit more of my own food than you did."

"Ohh... not now, CJ!" she whimpers as her stomach goes through a rather heavy Food Baby contraction, "My stomach really hurts!"

"Because you ate all my food!"

At that, the elevator dinged softly upon your arrival at Kate's door. The cold metal doors of the modest complext slowly slid open, graciously allowing the two of you exit of the confiningly cramped carrier. You take a brave step forward, your shoes brushing against the carpeting of Kate's hallway as you graciously act as doorman for the stallwart Becca; however your bulgy middle takes up a little more of the way provided than Becca would have liked. "You coming?" you ask in your halfhearted gruff, finding it rather hard to stay truly mad at Rebecca Maglen for anything, especially when she really had your best intentions at her clogged little heart.

"Noooo... I really don't feel like getting yelled at by Kate" she whimpered as her stomach groaned audibly, "I think I'm gonna go... sleep this off or something. Lemme know how it goes?"

***


"Go away!"

The words sounded so strange, especially coming from her own mouth. They were flat and uncaring, not a trace of her usual meekness within earshot. So bold and powerful, enough to send you away without so much as a second thought... She had to admit, she rather liked it.

Of course Kate felt terrible at being so mean to you, especially through the doorway like that. She had always been a really good friend to you in the past, and not only because of her so expertly hidden feelings for you either. You were always so sweet to her, you looked out for her, and you were always there for her when she needed it. The whole act seemed a little strange in retrospect, but she just told herself that it was for the best!

She giggled to herself as she pictured your face when she finally did it... asked you out!!!

Kate stifled as squeal by smothering her chubby cheeks with a pillow- she was so excited! Just the thought of working up the nerve to go out on an actual date with you was making her so giddy! Unable to contain herself, she plopped her rather heavy body onto her full bed, which made an audible creak of disapproval... diet or not, she was still quite the plumper.

But that really didn't matter right now.

Face still covered, she kicked her thick legs back and forth at a rapid pace as she continued her shrill cries of joy directly into either the poor cushion's face or back. She squeezed it against herself (finding that rather difficult due to her large hooters) one more good time before rising with a big smile on her face.

"Alright Katie, calm down." she told herself, unable to wipe that stupid grin off of her face, "You've got to get ready. Sunday's the last chance you get before school, and he needs to feel guilty."

Knowingly, she'd have slipped up at some point during the week. If this plan was to work, you had to remain completely in the dark regarding forgiveness. You had to be undoubtedly guildy, without a trace of redemption, so she could be the super-cool best friend and swoop in with this... this... date!!

Oh she was so excited!

But for now, she had to do some planning. She was going to follow Nurse Young's advice more or less to a tee. After all, Kate could only assume that a pretty woman like her had gone on plenty of dates before, she was so certain that she knew what Kate should do after all! And that meant that she needed something excellent to wear, something to really make you fall head over heels!

And she had just the girl in mind...

***


"Come... on... fit!"

Kat was currently experiencing her own difficulties with wardrobe at the moment.

As a fashionable young woman of today's age, Kat Anderson was always one to have a multitude of clothes that were currently "in" style, as well as a plethora more that had faded out of mainstream fashion but were still rather wearable. The problem was that, out of all styles colors and brands, nothing fit her.

Laying in her own bed, she lay face up and stressed as she attempted to bring the button into the appropriate hole of her black skinny jeans. Her arm muscles, made rather strong from rolling fabric and working with difficult models, proved useless against the laws of physics. Her hips were just too darn big to squeeze into these jeans. She let out a deep exhale, allowing her appearingly slender middle to pooch back out into the little potbelly it had become. It forced her top to ride up as it lost the battle of the bulge with Kat's soft, pale middle.

With all of this extra stress on poor Kitty-Kat, the sound of her electronica ringtone almost brought her to throwing her phone out the window. Thankfully she refrained and leaned onto her softer side, noticing that the biscuit dough that resided on her middle bunched over too, forming a small roll where the blubber met the bed.

"Hello?!" she growled into the speaker

She nod her head as Kate's request filled the earpiece, listening intently to her plea. Her instincts as a designer kicking in, she smiled (causing the faintest of dimples to appear on her somewhat rounder cheeks) and giggled a bit as the plan was explained to her. She already had a basic dress in mind, though Kate was too big for it then. However now that she had let it out just a bit, the poor busty girl might not suffocate in it.

"Yeah yeah, sure." she said as she played with one long strand of black hair, "Something saucy, I get'chu. Ceej isn't gonna know what hit him. I'll get down to the art room on campus and grab what I've already got. Security knows me, y'know. And I'll bring it back to my place. Come pick it up before curfew, I've just got a few things I've gotta do to it, 'kay?"

And with that she hung up with the biggest smile on her face, grunting slightly as she rose to her feet. Then her line of sight traveled to her inflated middle as it rose out and about from underneath her shirt. She grumbled before an idea hit her.

She grabbed the jeans, got a safety pin, and forced them uncomfortably together. Then an old pink-and-black flannel shirt, one from an old boyfriend pre-Chubbeso, and slid it over herself. Undoing the neck and making it wide enough for her breasts to fit through, she tied the two sleeves around and in the front.

Upon checking herself out in the mirror, she was more than satisfied.... but only because you couldn't see her stomach that well. Colon backslash...
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: the Love Connection (pt. 1)

choices: You head to So 21 Clothes, Delphine's there! Can she help you out of your rut?
You wind up in Masters&Masters Furniture, where you bump into Mrs. K. Great.
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
You sniffled, heartbroken.

Kate was being awfully mean today, though you couldn't really blame her. If you had been holed up in your apartment for the last month or so, were really looking forward to getting back on your feet to exercise, and your best friend had failed to wake you up, forcing you to head down to the nurse's office blind and in your pajamas, you didn't really know how you'd feel either. But you'd never heard her yell at you like that.

Actually, you'd never heard her yell period. It was more than a little terrifying to know that you had somehow managed to tick off the usually meek and demure Kate into actually yelling at you through a door; not to mention the aforementioned heartbreaking.

She was always so sweet, and so nice... and she smelled so good and gave the best hugs. You really, really didn't want to upset her that much...

"B-Becca?" you whimpered as you knocked on your other female companion's doorstep, "C-Can I come in? Kate was really snippy... I think she's still pretty upset. Becca?!"

***


"Go away!!"

Yelling came much more naturally to Rebecca Maglen than it did to her more reserved counterpart. It was painless, got the point across, and honestly really did a lot more good than just dancing around the subject with adorable little stutterings like "N-No, I-I don't think so CJ...". Cute, but not really effective when she really just wasn't in the mood to talk.

This was definitely one of those times.

Becca had actually planned on "sleeping things off" when she walked into her flat not but twenty ago (you had taken the stairs for some thinking time, and in hopes of burning some calories). She waddled in, still cradeling her swollen stomach, and plopped herself uselessly on ther couch like it was Nobody's business. And as she lay there, taking up the entire loveseat with her bodaciously bulging body, she couldn't help but feel a little cold. It was Februrary, so why shouldn't she have been in just a t-shirt and some sweats?

And since she had missed her bathtime last night, there was only one remedy that would satisfy both the need to be warm and the need to indulge her secret watery passion. So despite her uncomfortably taut middle, Becca decided to heave her flabby self up off of the couch, head into the bathroom, strip, and start running the water.

As she slid down into the still-cold porcelain, she couldn't help but notice some extreme difficulty getting settled in. As she sat down, forcing her rather large bottom down to the bottom of the tub, she noted with some desperation that she couldn't quite get back up to resituate herself. Panicking, she twisted and turned from within the tub, only to find that the extra fifteen pounds or so she'd gained over the last few weeks had effectively wedged her into her paradise!

As the water pooled at her feet, thick legs effectively clogging the gateway to the rest of the tub, was when you began knocking.

Rather than let you catch her in a compromising situation such as the one she currently found herself in, Becca decided to simply play it cool and come off as a total dirty word- if just to get you off of her case for a bit.

She reached over her own bulk for her phone, left by the tub. Unfortunately for her, Becca was well aware that she would soon outgrow her sinful paradise if her butt got any bigger... it really was a small tub. That meant that only one girl on campus had the authority to fix this little problem of hers...

***


"Ohohoho!!" first came the haughty laughter, as it was routine.

Next came several condescending remarks about how much greater she was than Becca, and how if she had been bathing in her tub at the Mansion, she would have never gotten stuck because "those with generous wallets and generous girths never must deal with the problems of those with skinny wallets but overgrown posteriors." She was getting really good at picking Rebecca's brain. The thesaurus her mother had bought her had really helped her.

Anywho, just another hobby of Claire Masters; cultivated and groomed like so much the pampered princess she was in every way. Picking on those who should know better than to get in the way of her romance with the oh-so-claimed CJ Dalton had to be punished somehow, and since Becca was certainly more brutish than she, Claire had deemed getting her beautiful face punched in not worth her time of the far-too long day.

Claire sighed as she clicked the pretty pink phone together softly, as if exhausted from the simple act of consorting with the lower class. Becca was always such a bother, having the nerve to call her such rude names and then requiem for her assistance. Of course she would get her help, but Claire would ultimately chalk this up to the scoreboard of the many ways why she was better than Rebecca Maglen- and ultimately the more suitable mate for you between the two of them.

Besides, if she didn't get her out, the poor girl would starve; and that isn't a fate that Claire would wish on anybody.

Speaking of which...

"Abida!" she hollered from her daybed, reclining lazily and allowing every inch of her accumulatory girth to hang whichever way it pleased, "Be a lamb and get me the rest of that chocolate cake that Gretchen was making?" She smirked to herself, popping a nearby chocolate into her mouth as she relished in her own affluence. Life was so good to her, and her body so very well reflected that.

She remembered the girths of Rebecca and Kate, wondering just how such underpriviliged girls had managed to work themselves up to such a high weight upon enrollment. And that Sighsoftly girl, well, woman now she supposed, was just another American. How could they have truly enjoyed a body such as hers? So round, so soft, so much like her warm comfortable bed or a big fluffy cake.

Her hands traveled downwards, rubbing her big creamy stomach as it jutted from underneath her pajamas. The pale purple ensemble had long failed to accomodate her growing body for quite some time, but she rather liked the fabric. The way her body bulged from it was also quite enjoyable, at least to Claire. It allowed her, or anyone else for that matter, to massage her all the easier.

She moaned, taken aback by her own plush touch as a cold hand dutifully brought her her plate of confectionary chocolate cake.

Hans and Gretel, she believed...

***


"This blows!"

All alone now, wandering about Lethargis town.

How quaint, except it seemed that everyone around you had friends that they were doing something with. And you, throughout these mysterious circumstances, had found yourself alone. Not but an hour ago you at least had Becca to talk to- if only for her to bug you about how fat you were getting....

To think, last night everything seemed to perfect...
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: the Love Connection (pt. 2)

choices: She shops some more and then has lunch (Her place? Food Court? Shaunty's again?)
She has workout planned with her new two friends and begs you to come
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
More unmotivated then lost, you wander about Lethargis town simply because it was better than remaining in your room. The cold bristles that were the winter winds of England had blasted you enough to eventually force you into the warmth of the Crownedge mall, although you had not really planned on purchasing anything today. As you mope your way through the large mall, you’re in a very sour mood and weren’t exactly taking in your surroundings. In the ultimate act of teenager ennui you go to shove your hands in your pants pockets, except…except they wouldn’t fit. Not checking if it was because your chubby hands would no longer fit the pockets or your bulging stomach had taken what little space was left in the last pair of jeans that fit, you grit your teeth and head into the nearest clothing store, So 21 Clothes.

Meandering about the clothing racks a stern frown cemented on your face, you passively glance through a rack of husky sized jeans. A fire of emotions was burning through your mind and you really didn’t feel like sorting through them all, so to distract yourself, you set yourself on not leaving the store till you have a new pair of pants that fit. Taking a pair off the rack you march yourself into the nearest dressing room, but in your irritated sate you fail to noticed this was the Women’s dressing room section. (Store layouts can be so confusing sometimes.) Into one of the numerous numbered dressing rooms you go, quickly undressing and easing into the new jeans. They fit…okay. You’re at least happy to have a pair of jeans you could actually get the button to button, and your waistline appreciates the relaxed fit the jeans offer, but you decide to take a look into the three sided mirror outside before making your purchase.

As you leave your private room you freeze, not only were the three mirrors currently in use, but they were in use by a girl, and not just any girl but the stunning Delphine Shuzumiya. Apparently she was in need of some new clothes too, well underclothes at least, as she was busily studying her reflection in nothing but a pair of white bra and panties. Her reflection in the full length glass mirrors startled you initially. Was that really her? You gaze entranced, as she did a half turn and thrust her hips towards the unfamiliar reflection. She then ran her hand curiously over her bubble of a tummy, a stomach that could be classified as chubby, but not enough to roll over her panties waistline. In that silent moment your eyes widen to take in the form of the foreign girl amazed that she had somehow kept this warm body hidden from public view.

With no coatings of clothing to conceal it, it was easy to tell Delphine’s body had gained a much rounder and softer center. From the reflection of her front her stomach had started to swell as it had begun taking up some space, and from behind, you could tell her hips had slightly stretched out, almost in anticipating of more weight to come. Not only that, but her bon-bon’s had done some more budding as well. One of the few things Delphine found she could not hide at school, even with a jacket over her school uniform, her body had decided her boobs weren't big enough already and that it was time for them to start growing again. Now, this wasn't too much of an issue for her, but as her breasts had gotten bigger, her bras had gotten bulkier and more uncomfortable, less stylish and increasingly industrial in design. She looked down at her chest guiltily and softly cupped the bra; thankfully she had now found a pair that didn’t pinch.

Overall, she was from the puffing up you and Kate had experienced, but she did in fact look a lot heavier as the difference between her thin figure and her new one, magnified the Parisian’s plumping. A marvel of genetics the blonde had the proportional measurements of any model (albeit one with the start of a tummy), and the weight she had gained seemed to only accentuate her womanly hourglass figure. You’re slightly shocked at the sight as you had assumed that ever positive Parisian’s diet had been going reasonably well but perhaps her weight gain rather than the weather was why she had begun sporting a new line of layered clothing?

“C-C.J.?” she suddenly squeaks spotting a familiar shape in the mirrors reflection. Cheeks reddening you pray she hadn’t seen you before you darted back to your dressing room, but her voice speaks to the contrary. “Ca alors!” shouts the calorie crunching Chubbeso student. In your room you can hear a door close as she retreats back into her dressing room. Unbelievably, you had somehow accidentally pissed off someone for the third time today; so you pray that Delphine would hopefully ignore you and leave rather than press charges. There was a shifting of fabric, a zip of a zipper and the sound of a door opening. Your prayers appeared to be answered as she sounded like she was on her way out, but this was not to be the case as she spoke up once again, still sounding confused but a bit more calm.“C..J?” she asks her voice bouncing off the other (fortunately empty) dressing rooms.

“Sorry! I’m sorry! Delphine I-I didn’t know…I’ll just stay in here and…die of embarrassment, while you leave…” you quickly apologize and explain your voice cracking and adding to the awkwardness.

“Non, non it is bien” she insists although her voice sounds strangely a bit sad. “I am feeling rather culpable myself…shall we have a tête-à-tête?”

Creeping out into the main dressing room you felt like quite the creep. “Ha-ha they really should label these dressing rooms better. I wa-was just trying on some pants and…” You let a hand sweep to your thigh and emphasis the tag on your pants supporting the case that you were honestly here to buy clothes and not to do any spying on girls who were au natural in the dressing room.

You find Delphine had gotten dressed rather quickly, even finding time to tuck her long blonde hair into a stereotypical French red beret letting it cascade out the back like some sort of waterfall made of wheat. Her fashion sense outside of school seemed unaffected by the weight gain and she had dressed herself in the latest in French haute couture. Today she wore a striped tunic that cut just a the swell of her shoulders, and as your eyes traveled lower you take in a low v-cut design the reveals her healthy cleavage and perfect pastel skin. Her top didn’t cling to her breasts as much as they sagged the fabric downward under their immense weight but the rest of the ensemble was baggy; it was loose around her arms, with a flowing and shapeless hem, shapeless apart from for the tented fabric that her stomach stubbornly strained against. In one hand she carried only a blue, heavy looking pea coat which she kept close by in case she needed an extra layer to ‘hide’ herself in it at a moment’s notice. The sight brings the first smile to your face in hours, as you were happy to know you weren’t the only one whose diet wasn’t going as intended. (Sure it was schadenfreude but what the heck; you had been in a lousy rut of a mood.) Again it wasn’t that the bit of weight didn’t look good on her either, it was just nice to know that someone was having the same problem that you and Kate were having.

“It seems we are both in need of some support.” She says her tone unaware of her underwear based pun. She turned her head downwards slightly discouraged before continuing. “I just don’t understand. I am eating a lot of chef bunnies’ delicious healthy food, I find time to exercise with mes amis, I am even eating more energy bars and yet.." She brought her hands to either side of the stomach. "Oh, I love cooking club so much, but I really hope that it's not why my belly has become quite the brioche…” Then, much like Rebecca did earlier, only on a smaller scale; Delphine pinched the paunch in front of her and gave it the tiniest bit of a shake.

“Well...actually that’s kinda why I’m here too. I guess I’ve been becoming a bit of a..‘crème puff.’” You admit, simply glad that you had someone to talk to and wasn’t mad with you at the moment

Delphine giggles at your analogy, instantly brightening her mood and seemingly the entire room. “I see. But a crème puff is better than a ‘slug’ non? I guess we both just have to have to work a little harder right?” Ever the optimist she ends the last sentence by pounding her fist into her open palm resolutely. Her eyes then dart about you, and were about to blush from the attractive girls attention until she spoke up once more. “Oh …It is not often I see you alone. Where is your clique?”

“What?” and you out of nervousness you do a double take behind you. “Oh right. It’s…nothing…” you blurt out, the sensitive subject now making things twice as hard to talk to the French fox in front of you. “I, messed up, and now Kate, and Rebecca I guess, are mad at me…So I’m just here…by myself…” you confess.

“Oh.” She says dismally at first, then “Oh!” in a much brighter tone. “Then this must be fate C.J that we meet like this! If you are not busy, then perhaps now we could finally ”hang out” together?”

“Sure!” you agree right away, your mood skyrocketing to unbelievable high levels in an incredible turnabout.

How exactly do you and Delphine plan to spend the afternoon?
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: The French Connection or I see London I see France

choices: Kate? What could she possibly want?
Rebecca, ready to start coaching but explaining Kate’s not coming today
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
Now usually the idea of an afternoon of clothes shopping was towards the bottom on the “Things you enjoyed to do list” but, shopping with Delphine you had no time to be bored. For one thing, even with all of her new found pounds, Delphine’s long legs and even longer strides meant you were playing catch up with her all across the mall; she’d dart into one store, try on a few clothes, buy what she liked, and be right on her way to the next one, and with you courteously carrying her increasingly heavier bags of clothes, the experience was practically a workout itself. Not that the exercise was the only thing that had gotten your blood pumping…

“Sava?” asked Delphine cocking her head to the side as she modeled this latest outfit for you. “Saaavaaa!” You nod back giving an appreciative thumbs up. You had no problem watching this would be model, try on a wide selection of clothes, and Delphine certainly didn’t mind the stares she was gaining from you. It had become a sort of silent mutual agreement between the two of you, Delphine never explicitly asking you to watch her as she modeled in the dressing room, but never actually barring you from entrance. Of course she never wore anything as risqué as before, but if you were to use a single word to describe her new attire it would be…clingy. Really the Frenchy was a bit of a fashonista seemingly able to pull off a variety of outfits while maintaining a casual precocious air about her. Plainly put, even with her new pounds Delphine really knew how to show off her stuff!

It was after either the six or seventh store that your stomach gave a gurgling lurch reminding you of your inadequate breakfast. A second set of gurgling comes immediately after and this one was strong enough to double you over in pain for a brief second. This was enough to draw Delphine’s attention.

“Oh, you are famished!” she says gliding her way to you. “And here am I without any of those bars…I know! Why don’t we get something to eat? I have just the place…” Delphine takes you by the hand and, rather than taking the load of the bags from you, she tugs your hand with surprising strength. Forcing yourself to rise to once more keep pace with the fast French female, you barely have the breath to point out she was headed in the wrong direction. “I think the food court is that way…” you say back at even pace with her.

“Nonsense! I know a place that is très spécial!” She insists. It was only after you had left the mall that you realized where this motivated mademoiselle was taking you: Shaunty’s.

“Hi! Welcome to Shaunty’s…” A certain pink haired chef began cheerily enough, but the cheery look on her face seemed to instantly disappear as she looked at her two latest patrons. You apparently had returned to her restaurant for lunch…only this time with Delphine practically crawling all over your arm.

“Allo’ Madame Bunnie. How are you this fine afternoon?” Delphine asks practically skipping to an open table.

“I’m fine Pheneie how are you?” Bunnie answers in her usual positive tone. Then in a switch from sweet to sour and barely above a whisper; “and nice to see you again…Romeo…” her words as icy as unthawed leftovers. Gently you take your seat, now no longer sharing Delphine’s energetic attitude. Mercifully, it appeared Bunnie would not be taking your orders for lunch. Breathing a sigh of relief Delphine chirps up from the other side of the table.

“I know just what to get.” She says laying a finger directly on one of the specials of the day. “The Roast beef sandwich with Au Jus sauce on the side.”
You peer over her finger to better read what she had her finger on. “You mean the French dip? Isn’t that a foot long?”

“Oui…” she says, fully insinuating she could handle the generously proportioned meal on her own. “Or...er...Would you like to split it with me?” Having second thoughts about scarfing an entire sub-sandwich by herself.

“Uh…Sure!” a hot sandwich really sounded good right now, and it was a lot easier than picking one of the various choices on Shaunty’s large menu. Soon the order was placed and the two of you are left to wait and talk.

“So, Kate and Rebecca they are…not so well?” asks Delphine the slightest of frowns forming on her face.

“Well…I kind of messed something up with Kate...and I guess I must have pissed off Rebecca somehow…” (And you supposed Bunnie too but you didn’t mention that.)

“Aww, too bad…Well, I have some exercises planned for the afternoon, it’s not jogging but I’m sure Chris and Suzu wouldn’t mind if you came.” Delphine’s voice more than hinted that she’d be more than a little happy if you joined her for an exercise excursion. Even if you couldn’t hear how much she’d like you to come in her voice her irresistible pouty lips made sure to get the point across. While the idea of seeing Delphine work herself into a French twist was exciting to say the least, the thought of more working out didn’t really sit with you.“Thanks, but no thanks Delphine, I think I’m just going to eat and head home for the rest of the day.”

“Hmmm…I see…” says Delphine looking a bit downtrodden now that you wouldn’t be joining her. “Well, maybe I can show you some of what I learned at cooking club sometime?”

“Sounds great!” It would be nice to see how much Delphine could have already picked up from Bunnie’s after school cooking club. Speaking of (sand)which. Out from the kitchen rolls a silver cart with a single sterling silver dome resting on top. As it’s wheeled to your table you realize Bunnie is in fact the one wheeling out the steaming hot foot long to your table. As she rolls closer you can get a better look at this beautifully toasted Roast Beef Sandwich, with its inches of stacked pink roast beef dripping in secret Au Jus sauce.

Bunnie began to makes small talk with you as she prepares your plates, “Oh, by the way C.J., how are Kate and Rebecca?” she asks in a coy totally nonchalant way.

“Oh! CJ says that they are feeling…how you say…Not so good for the day.” Delphine explains, blissfully unaware that you had seen Bunnie just a few hours earlier, with a completely healthy looking Rebbecca in tow.

“Oh, he did?” Bunnie volleys back, now no longer able to keep up her jolly attitude.

“Yes! So it is just us splitting lunch for today.”

“Well…How Nice (Kchung)!” says Bunnie bringing an absurdly long knife down to cut the foot long in half. The act is quite loud and yet very swift, almost as if she were reminding you that the as a chef she clearly knew how to handle a knife. Then she casts a heated stare down at you, one that said: “You just better watch yourself Mister Romeo; I’ve got my eyes on you.” It sent a shiver down your spine.

“Well, Bon Appétit you two” Bunnie says, before squinting her angry eyes with a large grin. With that she was off, pushing the cart before you could even begin to explain your apparent double date dealings.

Delphine meanwhile stared down the six inches of meat and bread before her like it was a sort of challenge. Then, she attacked, neatly enveloping a good portion of the meal with her lips before making a large clean bite. An onset of ‘MMMs’ begins to issue from somewhere on her side of the table. You too bite into your warm sandwich and it’s exactly what you needed. Good, warm, wholesome food. Soon you were off lost in the flavorful juices of the hot dish…

Eventually, like all good things, the sandwich had come to its end, and now you and Delphine both shared a look of satisfaction. One walk to Delphine’s dorm (clothing bags included,) and an au revoir later you arrive back at your room, feeling a bit better than you had earlier. Really, it was nice to know that you had other friends at the Academy, besides your usual group of best buds. And there was some solace in the fact that even if both Becca and Kate (and apparently to a degree Bunnie ) were a little peeved at your for the moment, you still had a few other friends to talk to. The rest of your night is quite uneventful turning into a blasé mix of internet, TV, and eventually homework. Nearing midnight you find yourself crawling into your bed, with the only thought on your mind of how you could make up for this morning’s mistake with Kate…..

Later the next morning you awake to the sound of your cell phone buzzing. Bleary eyed you fumble for the phone and see that it’s…
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Shopping and Sandwiches

choices: While you're stuck doing situps Becca gets cheeky again asking about you/Kate
Exercise is boring what's Kate (and possibly Kat too) up to?
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
"...Hello?" you mumble still half-asleep as you answer the phone.

"Hey C.J , I'm just outside of your place, come let me in!" Came the dulcet yet demanding tones of Rebbecca.

Becca? you mumbled bleary eyed. "What are you doing here, it's only..." you paused a bit to check your phone's clock and were a bit shocked to see it was already almost 11.

"Sleeping-in again are we?" Becca chides, audible glee in her voice.

"....Becca..." you say very testily and now seriously considering hanging up on her.

"All right, all right, I'm sorry and for what it's wort, I'm sorry about barking at you yesterday. Now please, can I come in? It's freezing in this hallway!"

"Okay...okay" you murmur before hanging up. Consciously deciding Becca could stand a few more seconds in the hallway you slowly lumber out of bed and out of your pajamas. Putting on an regular t-shirt and a pair of sweat pants you finally open the door for Rebbecca.

"Thank you!" said Rebbecca tilting her head upwards in relief as she entered your well heated flat. Rebbecca seemed to share the same idea as you were wardrobe wise, filling out the confines of her own Chubbeso emblazoned hoodie and sweatpants combo.

"So, just woke up huh?" she said turning accusingly to you. "Too bad Coach Maglen doesn't take excuses. You asked me for help with your exercising and you're gonna get it. Ooof." she grunted as she moved a chair, starting to clear some space in the center of your living room.
