"Come on over...grrr...and help me move this table." she asks her front fat folding over itself as she slightly squatted. Walking over, you help her lift the long table a few feet, that's when you notice something or specifically someone was missing.

"Hey...um where's Kate?" you ask your mind noting the missing space that was currently not being filled.

"I only got her answering machine, so I guess she still a little moody and I really didn't want to bother her" she says turning her face downcast for just a bit. "But just for today! Next time I fully expect both of you to be ready for some fitness." she says perking herself up.

"Okay...but why at my place?" you ask still frazzled from this early morning ruckus.

"Well, because the gym is closed and my place is...being fumigated." sounding to you as if that really wasn't the case at all. It wasn't the case at all. The truth was much more embarrassing. Currently Rebbecca's bathroom (well her special custom bathtub specifically) was having a bit of re-widening done by two members of the Chubbeso's maintenance crew, and that was definitely enough of an excuse for her to show up at your place. Fortunately you didn't seem to be pressing the issue. Instead, you were instinctively heading for your stock pile of Mass-Ex bars ready to devour two or three in place of breakfast.

As you picked one up and began eying it hungrily a separate hand snatches it right from in front of your smacking lips.

"I'll be taking that." Rebbecca says tearing into the bar. "Mmm blueberry" she moaned lightly, leaving a blue smudge around her lips. In between mouthfuls she explained her greedy action, "I know you like these but you've got to think even leaner. *Smack smack gulp* You can have your regular meals, but I'm limiting you to one of these a day, understand? You can have one after a nice long workout, but any other time I catch you with one I'm taking it from you got it mister?" she finished just as she finished the bar.

At first this seemed mighty unfair, but thinking about it you were the one that had asked for an instructor that wasn't so soft. A bar a day seemed like a fair compromise between starving and splurging yourself, and now that you had passed the big 200lb mark you were evermore committed to losing some weight. "Yes Coach Maglen!" you say in a militaristic tone straightening your shoulders.

"That's what I want to hear! Now why don't we starts with some stretches?" she asked ushering you to the new open space of the living room. Even if she wasn't playing softball Rebbecca had continued taking a couple of yoga classes during her days here at the academy to at least keep her limbs limber. Much like her yoga class instructor, Rebbecca stood on the soft carpet at the front of the room facing you in order to keep an eye on your form, (and to make sure you were hopefully keeping an eye on her form as well.)

"Okay let's start with Sun salutations." Carefully Rebbecca slowly began to raise her arms up high over her head, shrugging her shoulders so much so that her tight hoodie began to rise a bit over her stomach. This gave you a full on perfect view of Rebbeca's round full stomach. She certainly didn't seem to mind that her belly-button had been revealed, so you wisely decided to not to mention it. With a sound of a few joint popping into place you managed to mirror the rejuvenating pose.

"Downward facing dog..." Rebbeca announced a few more poses later. A killer grin flashed on her face as she slowly bent over into a incline toe-touch. Bending over and giving you a full view of her rotund rump, she knew you were doing more...inspecting than stretching right now, and she liked it.

Rebbecca's portly posterior seemed to be straining the pants to their threadbare, the pose she was holding seemed to be doubling the 3D effect each of her cheeks were already having on the Cubbeso logo. Watching her stretch, you noticed it was getting harder...er...harder to perform these odd poses. Quickly snapping back to stretching you found it a lot harder to bend over your own belly than you remembered and by the time the last bit of Yoga was over you were already a bit out of breath.

Rebbecca meanwhile was as virile as ever, in fact she was really getting slightly turned on by the sight of watching you sweat. "Alright now, how about 30 situps?" she announced standing up.

"...30?" is all you can incredulously get out between breaths.

"Yep,you heard me." she says her voice treading the line of commanding and just plain bossy. She waddled closer to you now, her strong thunder thighs and bountiful booty wobbling all the way, ready to lock cuddle you in place as you did some situps. Before you both assumed your positions...you couldn't help but notice a sweet scent that seemed to be quickly masking your own b.o. and deodorant.

"Hey Becca...Do you smell something...Lilac?" you guess at the mystery scent in between whiffs.

"N-No! I-It's probably just from the fumigators. Enough talking, I wanna see you sweat!"
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Working out takes Hardwork and Buts! I mean Guts!

choices: Let's get to work then, shall we?
Meh, hair and makeup? That's kinda girly... what else is going on around campus?
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
Chubbeso Academy’s state of the art Art Studio, noon.

The lights are off in this building of buildings, everything’s a bit dark. The only source of illumination comes from the high windows, the Sun fades in and out of the foggy English weather. A myriad of special projects litters the room, coming in all shapes and sizes. Paintings, sculptures, some furniture even is scattered in this arena of conflicting creativism. More importantly though, is the lone mannequin covered by an unflattering blue tarp.

When suddenly the door opens, filling the room with the ominous creak of well-worn hinges.

“Thanks again for doing this for me, Kat.” Came a sincere voice, “I swear I’ll find some way to make it up to you.”

A form enters the room belonging to that of Kate Granden, a girl far more suited to the library than this palace of blatant expressionism. She has dressed down in anticipation of this evening, high hopes of gussying up clearly shown by the unusual twinkle in her eyes. The corpulent kuudere may as well have been in her pajamas, stuffed into sweatpants and a plain black tank—her pudgy arms puffing out like stuffed sausages. Her face was round with joy and in shape, a warm smile permanently plastered between her appled cheeks.

“Don’t mention it, Kate.” A voice trailed from behind her, “You’ll just owe me one. Worse comes to worst, I’ll just ask you for a tittie transfer one day.”

Entering immediately after her client was Kat Anderson, fabulous fashionista soon-to-be. She fit in her much better than Kate, owing to her indulged creativity and keen sense of fashion. She dressed with simple flair as well, though only out of necessity. One never wore their best outfit to the Shop, after all… even if said outfit didn’t exactly “fit” these days. On something of a plaid-kick, her overshirt was buttoned up to her yet-to-blossom breasts and rolled up on her sleeves. Her nails had been taken off and her clothes were a little ratty—this was Kat Anderson on a mission, full-blown designer mode!

As Kat flipped the switch, the room suddenly came alive with colors of multiple projects of a variety of tastes (mostly clashing). Kate looked around, in much better mood to appreciate rather than analyze the interpretable intricacies of “art.” However as soon as her eyes caught sight of the big blue tarp tucked snugly away in the left corner of the room, everything else faded away. Now was the moment of truth, the ultimate reveal was upon her! Without this dress, there would be no date!

“Sooo…” Kat whistled wryly as she rolled her eyes over to her corpulent client, “You wanna see?”

“Y-Yes!” Kate responded with a fiery passion, her little fists vigorously clenched in front of her

“Alriiiiight…” Kat slinked over to the big blue thing, “But don’t say I didn’t warn you when your mind is blown!”

And with that Kat grabbed the edges of the protective sheet, pulling it away with all of her might. In a grand flourish the dress was revealed to the room, to Kate, in all of its magnificence. Her eyes widened behind her glasses, her pretty jaw dropping as her knuckles whitened. A slight tremble sounded throughout her entire quivering form, reducing her to an emotional pile of overstimulated bookworm. This. Was. Her. Dress!

Kat had lived up to every promise, the dress was every bit the “ultra chique” that she had promised her just yesterday. It was only strapless on the left side now, and there was differentiation between the breastline and the rest of the fabric. A matching pattern along the hem of the dress, as well as the strap, were black to go with the thick black belt that went just under her boobies (that MAY be a problem later…) A fake white flower went on the strap, surrounded by two or three of the smaller like, and Kate could clearly see a black jacket on the table next to the dress.

“Soooo… whaddaya think?” Kat asked knowingly before Kate forced all of her great weight upon her in the form of the most titty-tastic embrace that the girl had ever known

“Oh it’s PERFECT!” Kate squealed, “Thank you thank you THANK YOU, Kat!” she nuzzled the skinnier girl lovingly with her round cheeks, “Oh I KNEW that I could count on you, you’re so amazing!”

“Stop stop, you’re rustling my outfit.” Kat’s responded lovingly, “Now come on, we’ve gotta get you ready for tonight.”

“Right, right… oh this is going to be so much fun!”

“For me.” Kat said, taking off Kate’s glasses, “It’s not every day I get to play Extreme Makeover.”
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Kate and Kat's Fashiontastic Adventure

choices: So when Kate shows up at your doorstep... and you're all sweaty...
She calls you up and wants to meet at Shaunty's Restaurant. Surprise Date!
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
Little known fact: Kat Anderson is a little bit more than a clothing designer.

She takes her title as “fashionista” with the utmost severity, utilizing her natural passion for fashion with her knack for forming outifts that “go together” with a little good taste thrown into the mix. She is, without a doubt, destined for great things in the world of clothing construction and compilation. Tonight if anything only served as a little boost to that admirable accolade she held so closely to her heart. She had made the improbable possible…

Kate Granden was in a dress.

No frumpy sweats, no too-tight uniforms, Kate was all dolled up and ready to go out on the town—Kat never thought she’d see the day!

Of course the dress (and the battle of getting such a big girl into such a tight dress) was only part of it all. There were a lot of little things that went into a successful outfit that most people wouldn’t even consider, especially not those less “fashionably-fantastic” than Kat. There was a lot to do and not a lot of time to do it in. Hair, makeup, accessorizing… while Kat was only really an “expert” in that last one, she was certainly the girl that Kate needed on Operation: “Date Night”

To begin was her hair. Often only combed, Kate admitted openly that she was never one for teasing and curling and the like. Kat scoffed a little, not quite realizing her own hair was in a simple pony, and told the poor girl to shush as she worked her magic. Kate’s sensible style was transformed into something a little more modern. Less “librarian”, more “avid reader who’s really really cute.”

…okay, so she wasn’t really good at naming things. Shut up.

Her hair was parted to the left, actually cut (MUCH to Kate’s shock) to give her very flattering bangs. They swooped down to cover one of her eyebrows, which were plucked to perfection. Over her ears were little ringlets of hair, left loose on purpose so her bun-pony hybrid would look all the more playful. She still had her glasses on, Kat felt that her eyes were a little too beady without them (the poor girl really WAS blind…) but, rather than risk the solidarity of the outfit, Kat used white nail polish to paint the outside rim of her frames—NOW they matched!

Her nails were done, falsied painted and glossy, and even her pudgy little toes were pretty in pink! Kat had given her some shoes to wear with the outfit and a nice little clutch she had made specifically for the occasion.

Kate looked into the mirror, hardly able to believe that she was the girl looking back at her.

“Kat… I’m… I’m so…”

“You mean CJ is so lucky that a girl like YOU is gonna ask HIM out.” Kat ribbed her busty buddy lightly, “Honestly, with all this on? There’s no way he can resist you.”

Kate faltered, her eyes getting a little misty as she went back and forth between her reflection and the girl responsible for it all. She held onto the clutch tightly, her chubby fingers getting white around the knuckle as broken sniffles escaped her. She had never been so… pretty. Never, in her entire life…

“Th-Thank you, Kat.” Kate sniffed

“Woah woah, no tears in my studio!” the taller girl corrected gently, “I spent, like, thirty minutes on your makeup!”

“R-Right!” Kate huffed, “I’ll… I’ll just go right out and ask him!” she started getting dangerously red in the face, “T-There’s no way he’ll turn me down… right?”

“Well, he might turn KATE Granden down…” Kat sauntered over to her client and grabbed her from behind, “But tonight he’s going to meet KATIE Granden, who’s fun and confident and oh-so-very pretty if you don’t mind me saying so… Katie.”

“T-Thank you…” Kate whispered, "I'll do my best but... what if he-"

"He won't." Kat corrected, "Now go on and show my dress off before I pull it right off those tig ol' bitties of yours."
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Katie Granden

choices: The date is a success! (CJ gains a couple pounds in the process...)
The date is a total disaster! (Everything goes wrong)
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.content:
You're at your house doing Homework, struggling as usual, when your cell phone stops you. You're surprised to see Kate calling. Oh boy, she's probably going to yell at you, but it wouldn't be that bad, Kate doesn't seem like the yelling type.

"Hello?" you answer.

"Hi CJ" She says angrily.

"Kate listen, I'm so sorry about this morning. I'm sorry that I didn't wake you up. I just was a sleep y'know? I owe you so much for making that mistake. How can I--" you were interrupted by Kate.

"Yeah you do. And that's why you are treating us to a dinner at Shaunty's, and you are to arrive there at 7:00 sharp" Kate says, sounding a bit like Ms. Kawasaki

Taken back by this strange offer and Kate being so aggressive all the sudden, you are forced to accept out of guilt for not waking up on time.

"OK see you there~" Kate sounding very excited and happy suddenly.She hangs up, but before she does you can hear squeal of excitement.

You're relieved that you have redeemed yourself, but why such a strange offer? Thoughts are racing in your head... Does she want to go on a date? Do she like you? Dare even say she wants you fatter?... For now you dismiss those thoughts and look at the clock, 5:30, you have about an hour to get ready before you have to leave.

The whole time you are preparing, you think about the relationship between you and Kate. The way she had been looking at you lately, the incident, even that squeal that had been cut off at the end of the phone call. You also thought about you looking at Kate's knockers and about how you had feeling for her. Maybe this was actually a Date...

You soon are ready and begin traveling to Shaunty's

***
Kate was ecstatic.

She had you fall right into her trap, but it wasn't a bad trap. She had finally asked you out on a date! (sort of) Maybe you would gain to Kate's liking... She slapped her self in the face quickly stopped thinking about you gaining weight. She had everything under control, she had made sure that the fan club wouldn't be a distraction and told Claire that you were going to be at the soccer game tonight, Rebbeca was busy on a project so she wouldn't come and spoil the "aloneness", and she had even made a reservation for one of those fancy private booths! You and her would be alone, along with a bunch of food.

"OK I got this, don't screw up Kate." she says as she talks in her mirror.

She leaves as soon as the phone call is over because she was so excited.
1451122111111112111212122222112111111112.title: Date is Confirmed

choices: Claire and she…is…HUGE!
Kate and/or Rebecca, bigger than ever and happy to see you
14511221111111121112122.content:
About a month had passed since your monthly jogging sessions started. Kate, incapacitated by her ankle still showed up whenever you were working out, and would often cheer you on from a seat in the bleachers (keeping plenty of bars on hand for you and always helping herself to two or three while she watched.) Overall, you were pretty happy with the way the workouts were going, although the results hadn’t exactly shown yet.

Sure your legs seemed to be the only muscles that had some definition to them, but, man had they had really grown in size. Well, actually all of you had grown in size…but that had to be muscle, right? You did have more of a bouncing jiggle to your walk now, what with your belly skipping along over your waist band. Said belly was actually the main reason you began to suspect something was up.

After getting your measurements on weigh in day, Kat Anderson had begun preparing your new outfit. No more than a week or two from that day had passed when she asked you to stop by her place to model it for her. Truth be told, the way she redesigned your uniform looked awesome. The sleeves, and pant legs were covered in sharp blue stripes, and Kat had even put your initials in gold on each of the buttons. You really wanted to try it on but like a burrito with too much filling stuffed inside, you simply could not get the jacket to fit . Kat muttered as she tried to button the front for you, munching on her own X-S MASS bar that was locked between her teeth as she did so. As you sucked in your stomach, Kat managed to get the first three buttons before you exhaled, sending your stomach forward and launching the buttons from the cloth. This sent Kat into a minor fit of grumbling and curse words deciding that her measurements must have been off. Looking down you knew it wasn’t that the measurements were wrong; it was your stomach that had grown, slowly inching forward into this new full-blown paunch. Embarrassed you hurriedly thanked and apologized to Kat, leaving her to recalculate her designs.

You weren’t the only one who had also experienced a sort of wardrobe malfunction. Kate, had taken to snacking constantly on the fattening bars. Whether if it was when she was studying or just between her already generously portioned meals, Kate made sure to have always have a bar on hand to much on. Soon she found that the rest of her body had thickened and widened, catching up to support her once outrageously oversized breasts. One good thing was that her back aches came a lot less often, but her stomach had lost its squishiness turning into a much firmer and rounder state. And then there were her breasts too…yeah those…

If the bottom three buttons on your outfit were a sign that you were still gaining weight, then Kate’s sign was the top three buttons on her uniform. She just couldn’t seem to get them to stay buttoned. While all traditional Chubbeso uniforms were slightly wider hemmed on the bottom to accompany the heavyset girls that seemed to attend there (Kate’s stomach sill fit snugly underneath hers) the design had no way of accompanying room for a chest like Kate’s. Her boobs were mashed together and had to fight to stay contained inside of a shirt where there was so little room left for them. For a while the uniform could just barely stretch to cover each of her proudly pert sweater puppies, but now the material practically ripped as Kate tried to dress herself. What was even more frustrating for Kate was that even with their massive size and weight; they still retained most of their roundness and seemed to rebelliously wedge themselves outwards no matter what sort of outfit she wore. Yes, they were real attention getters, but they right smack in front of a girl who wasn’t exactly out for attention. (Well, attention from anyone other than you that is.)

It wasn’t long before you both took your literally growing complaints to Claire. “You have to remember muscle weighs more that fat and…this is uh...a long term program.” she replied lazily as she continued coaching from her (recently expanded) couch. Claire, frazzled from having to actually (ugh) sweat, decidedly doubled down on her food intake. Soon she was growing more and more towards the exact opposite of the ideal image of a fitness instructor. She was raptly watching her progress bite by delicious bite and was happy to see that you too were also coming along very nicely. But if there was one thing Claire wanted in her life it was MORE; more flab for herself and for you, and all she had to do was make sure you didn’t link her or the bars to you recent weight gain and things would be perfect.

You noticed the bars had grown too, grown in popularity that is. It’s not like you were going to stop eating those health bars, Claire had said that they were part of your training routine, but the fact they were so darn delicious helped spread their popularity around the school . One would think you could get tired of them after a while but with so many flavors it was hard to. In fact most of the academy seemed to share your sentiment, everywhere you looked now a days girls were still filling their faces up with bar after (secretly calorie laden) bar.

***


This morning you woke up feeling new and improved, energized even. The previous afternoon you had ran a few laps and like always you were famished afterwards, even a little achy, but after a good night’s sleep on a full stomach you felt wonderful. So what if you weren’t exactly slimming down yet? You were keeping fit and felt good about it. Yesterday, Kat (who now seemed to have growing a tiny potbelly of her own) had finish your new academy jacket. It fit nicely, your body appreciating clothes that didn't leave it feeling pinched. Even better, yesterday Kate had said that Dr. Young gave her the o.k. to start jogging again! Today was going to be a good day.

As you practically strutted into the academy you here a whistle coming from a group of girls huddled together and checking you out. “Wow C.J! You certainly look a lot…healthier.” This sent the group laughing and another girl called out. “Yeah nice buns, stud!” This sent another round of school girls giggling naughtily.

Before, you might have blushed at such hooting, but today you smiled at the compliments. You felt...different as you made your way down the hall, for some reason working out gave you…confidence. That was is it! With Kate being able to jog with you again, and your new threads and attitude, you felt confident. So confident in fact you actually turned your head to smile and wave back at the girls who were checking you out when…KA-SQUISH!

Distracted by the gaggle of giggling girls you immediately found yourself plowing into a wall of fleshy fat. Knocked onto your well padded bum, you look up to see who you’ve accidentally ran into…

It was…
14511221111111121112122.title: Student Body Builders

         Claire's chest pressed against her uniform, which had forced her to undo a button, and her thighs and butt were much larger. The bulk of her weight, however, was in her stomach, which was currently bloated due to her very large breakfast that consisted largely of the fattening X-S Mass bars.

         "Hey, CJ," Claire said moving her larger body even closer toward yours, "How are you doing? I haven't seen this past week."

         As usual, Claire would give you and Kate an energy bar every couple of laps while telling the both of you to run faster.Something, however, seemed different today. The difference was small and hardly noticeable, but still there. What that difference was you could not tell until about your fourth lap. Claire was not yelling nearly as much, and when she did it was hard to make out what she was saying due to the amount of food that was stuffed into Claire's mouth.

         You searched through the channels and settled on a comedy movie. "I think the spaghetti's ready." Rebecca said. As she was pulling it out of the oven there was a knock on the door. You got up and opened the door and saw...

"Oh by the way have you lost weight?"asked rebecca, comically, that last remark got both of them laughing "yea its the only good thing I've gotten out of this yet"

During lunch I was sent yet another high fat lunch from Claire. "Not again." You said, looking at the lunch as though it were something someone had pissed on.
"Hey Rebecca you want this?" i said, holding the lunch to her."oh sure, but why dont you want it?" asked Rebecca, taking the lunch. "Claire gave it to me" You said, taking an exasperated sigh. "I'm tired of her trying to fatten me up" I said, putting my head against my hand.
"Is that what shes doing?" asked Rebecca, through a mouth full of food. "Yea and I've gotta say its pissing me off." You said, looking around cautiously for any sign of Claire or anyone else for that matter.

what happens next?
15.title: You decide.

choices: Flashback to freshman initiation
The fanclub's back
Your called to the principal's office
151.content:
All of the sudden you and Rebecca hear loud footsteps closing in. At first you thought it was the fanclub but it was only on set of feet the you instantly recognized who it was. But before you could do anything you get pulled into a very familiar valley of cleavage and that belonged to one of the largest students in the whole school as well as having the biggest crush on you Claire Masters.

"Hi CJ." Claire said happily. "Did you enjoy the lunch I gave you?"

"Hello Claire." You muffled through boobs. Claire then sees that Rebecca was eating the lunch that she made for CJ.

"Hey, you little sneak that was made for CJ not you!" Claire shouted.

"CJ, gave it to me princess." Rebecca replied.

"Don't call me that!" Claire snapped. "No matter because I made CJ a second lunch just in case...by the way where's Kate?"

"She's helping Bunnie with inventory." You said freeing yourself from Claire's grasp.

Then Claire sits right next to you and enjoys her own lunch while watching you eat the one she gave you and of course you eat it. This was kind of a usual thing for you ever since you arrived at this school. Plus your still not sure how you even got into this crazy all girl school in the first place. Ever since freshman initiation its been one wild ride.
151.title: claire arrives

choices: who is, surprisingly, a slender preppy girl with endless pep!
or, not so shockingly, that same peppy prep with a severe weight problem...
or, perhaps she's rolling right in on her motorized scooter now, feast in hand?
1511.content:
The bell rang abruptly, signaling the beginning of your next class.

"Alright, everyone, let's get started."

Those words seemed to take you back so far now that your second year at the Academy had already started...

***


"Alright, everyone, let's get started."

A fitting beginning.

In the many weeks it took for preparations; obtaining a passport, housing arrangements, purchasing plane tickets, and etc; it was a relief to have such a formal occasion begin with such an informal statement.

'This place is so different than the school back home' is all that stuck out in your mind as you tugged at your unyielding starch uniform. The walls (rather than your usual setting of brick) had been engraved with fine sculptings of vines and leaves that grew skyward to reach the ceiling, a trio of chandeliers flowering the arrangement with what must have been fifty lit candles in harmony with several other electric lights. Heavy and strong, yet they remained perfectly still as they hung perilously over everyone's heads.

No carpet, you rather liked carpet, but instead a cold tile of off-white polished to perfection despite chairs, that must have cost a small fortune to provide, placed neatly in rows facing the back wall of the room; more specifically a podium at which the Headmistress was currently speaking.

'Just weird... so uncomfortable'

'Everyone's staring at me...'

'Just cut it out!'

Suddenly a familiarly steady hand grips your shaking knee, "Easy there, Killer." chuckles a friend, "We'll be graduating before you know it." Rebbecca was always there to help you out.

Turning slightly to your right, acknowledging her attempts with a (less than) reassuring nod, you smile slightly at the gesture. She seemed to be having troubles with her own uniform, namely keeping her skirt over her heavy bottom half. Being a bit of a 'Big Girl' as she so described herself when confronted with her weight, she was pretty used to it.

Another hand at your shoulder, "Yeah CJ... we should all relax, you know?" another friend meekly points out, "Getting sweat on that uniform will only shrink it, thus making it tighter..."

And to your left was Kate who, in her own bookish way, was just as good at helping you through these sorts of situations as Becca; even if she had just as terrible luck with her uniform's buttons. Poor girl had a chest the size of the States all to herself. But the scary part was that she had even more brains than she did boobs.

"Th-Thanks guys..." you mutter slightly, keeping under the radar of the speaking Headmistress (who appeared to be quite the 'Big Girl' herself), "I don't know what I'd do without you."

"Probably get beat up a lot." Becca jeered with a light jab at your arm

"Certainly not pass any of your math classes..." Kate added with a look of matronly concern

"I get it!" you whispered, only to be shushed by a cold-faced Asian women whom of which was of the same generous size as the woman speaking.

"Quiet." she hushed strictly

At the stage, three women had lined up around a podium. One, a large woman of maybe four-fifty, four-seventyfive stood in the center at the podium. Her long blonde hair cascaded downwards as it rested on a lavender suit no doubt tailor-made for an elephant. The podium was quite large, though not large enough to conceal the lardy lady lumps that the Headmistress sported, and took up a good bit of eye view.

Next to her, out of the spotlight, a young girl who looked remarkably similar to the Headmistress stood with her hands crossed over her tubby tummy as it strained against her Chubbeso uniform. Albeit being smaller in both vertical and horizontal axis, she still looked a great deal like the Headmistress. For some reason, she seemed to be looking at you anxiously... just as all the other girls had since your arrival. Wonderful.

And on the other side was a waify woman of dark complexion. Dressed in black business clothing with only a white undershirt for contrast, the seemingly arabian woman stood at perfect attention by the Headmistress' side. An odd one...

"Well ladies, erm, and CJ, I'm sure you're more than ready to get things started." the Headmistress began slowly, "So without further adieu, I present to you the former Valedictorian of the previous graduating class to give you a little insight as to how we live at Chubbeso Academy..."
1511.title: the Wayback Machine (pt1)

choices: Back to now, where you've been called to the Principal's Office
Or, maybe, continue reminicing a bit? What could it hurt?
15112.content:
There was a slight pause as everyone patiently anticipated the arrival of the apparently either absent or invisible valedictorian, confused mumblings as to whether or not the large woman had expected this slight misstep roused the girls present until a loud noised signaled that the proper chain of events had resumed

"Sorry I'm late!" said a chipper voice from the back of the room as the doors creaked behind her, "I just had to grab another mocha frappe from the teacher's lounge, they're just so good!"

All glanced, including yourself, turning to face the largest girl anyone had ever seen! Larger than the mini-mistress up above! Your eyes nearly bulged out of their sockets when you saw the enormous mound of quivering blubber as it slowly made its way towards the aisle, barely able to waddle about in her sorry shape. No doubt feminine, the Mound rather awkwardly jiggled and quivered underneath her suit and dress pants as it heaved its heavy thighs one after the other in a slow steady motion.

A heavy, pendulous belly sagged and swayed betwixt her swollen thighs, the fabric of her white blouse colliding audibly with the taut pattern of her bottoms, each movement still visible after the next had passed in it's wobbling, gelatinous mass as it surged forward. Her heavy breasts bobbed with the rest of her body as they forced her arms to the side, said arms coated in bingo wings heavy enough to fill out the sleeves and then some of her black jacket. As she waddled uncomfortably through the chairs, you could hear her pants and wheezes as she struggled to simply move about at such a high weight, her cheeks thick with fat and red as tomatoes as she heaved and hoed herself about. Clutched beneath her sausage fingers was aforementioned Mocha Frappe, loaded with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles. In fact, it appeared that there was little coffee at all in that cup!

And slowly, as she passed, one of her mighty meaty love handles brushed against one of the (then) lighter girls and pushed her to all fours. "Oops, sorry!" she puffed as she tottered past, not making an attempt at assisting the poor student as she continued her trek to the podium

"Gee, what a heifer." you heard a voice behind you

"Wow, she's really big..." said another

"Now that's a big'un!" even Becca proclaimed, "I mean, I know I'm not exactly skinny, but that's just unhealthy- right, CJ?"

Your eyes seemed glued to the massive, rising globs of blubber that ran aquifer inside her tight dress pants. As with her top, this valedictorian's bottom half was just as keen on keeping a record of her movements within it's fleshy banks. You weren't interested, per say, in her; however there seemed to be something keeping you from turning away...

"Right CJ?"

You could only watch with a strange fascination in her struggle as she stomped along, being completely out of breath by the time she finally reached the microphone. As Mrs. Masters was the one speaking before her, the podium had already been accommodated to fit one of more "generously proportioned" status. However even that in effect, the voluptuous valedictorian still had to take a step back so that her heavy breaths would not be heard in the microphone- Mocha Frappe still steady in hand as she sucked down the creamy, chocolate mix like a drug...

"CJ!!"

"Huh, what?"

"Her! That's totally unhealthy, right?"

"What's unhealthy now?" you stammer in an unintelligent fashion, being caught off-guard by one of such a... rounded figure.

"Her weight! She's huge!"

"O-Oh, now... c-come on Becca, that's not cool-" for some reason you are quick to defend this total(ly huge) stranger even against your dearest of friends, "she probably has a glandular problem or something. We shouldn't make fun of her."

"Well obviously it's contagious judging by our Headmistress and her roly-poly mini-her." Becca scoffed

"Sorry for the wait, guys" the large girl at the stand finally managed after a long pause filled with some wheezing, slurping, and apparent snacking at the front of the crowd, "There was a line in the teacher's lounge." she said, happily glutting herself on her cocoa-centric confections without a second thought, sweating slightly as she sinfully enjoyed herself. Next to her, the Headmistress seemed to be fidgeting uneasily as she watched her double-wide former student slurp and scarf. She beckoned her dark-skinned assistant closer to her, whereupon the larger woman whispered something into her subordinate's ear- dashing off with a quick nod of confirmation.

"So, I'm Ivy Sighsoftly and I was the Valedictorian and President of my graduating class last Summer." the speaker said, finally placing her cup down on the podium, "I know you're all really really excited to start school here at Chubbeso Academy. It's going to be a whole lot of fun!" her accent (or lack thereof) suggested that, like you, Miss Sighsoftly was American- which instilled you with a great amount of comfort.

"I remember when I was your age, most of you probably didn't come from England and that's perfectly fine." she says, grabbing her cup and lifting the green straw to her plump lips before taking a sip, "There's nothing wrong with being from another part of Europe, America, Asia, or anywhere else for that matter! Because Chubbeso Academy for Promising Young Girls is a wonderful place once you get used to it. I know that you'll all... phew, excuse me-" here she had grown winded from the pressures of remaining in a standing position and had to wipe her brow with one thick arm, causing an audible rip in her jacket. Ignoring the soft white bulge of blubber taking up her armpit, Sighsoftly continued unperturbed.

"-get to love and know one another and get to be just like sisters! (slurp) I never thought, when I was your age, that I would be where I was my Senior year, or where I am today! But all it took was a little time and effort to reach out of my shell and get reach out to my fellow girls; and soon enough we were all growing closer than real sisters!"

"Probably because you took up the most space, Chubs." Becca mumbled under her breath

"And I have to say that it's all worth it, going out and becoming an integral part of your student body. I was Class President from Sophomore year on and I got all sorts of perks- my lunches were free, my dorm room was upgraded, access to the Teachers Lounge... and it was all because I took initiative! (munch) And, let me just say, that (crunch) I've never (slurp) been so happy (munch) in my entire (slurp) life!"

A modest chorus of applause from her baffled audience fizzled as she took her things from the podium, allowing the Headmistress to return to her stand. Seconds after, the mysterious dark assistant returned to her employer with a Mocha Frappe of identical, though refilled, specifications as was Ivy Sighsoftly's. She took a big sip herself before doing so herself and continuing on.

"Now, as I'm sure you all know, there are... oh boy this is good... a few things that must be enforced. Namely, the respect of our new... special case... a Mister Charity Jaine Dalton."

Crap. They just said your full name.

A chorus of giggles and confused noises filled the speaking area as Becca nudged you to stand upright. In your uniform, you felt like such an outcast. Being the only boy, sure, but also being the only one to wear this ridiculous penguin suit. The Headmistress, straw between her lips, beckoned you closer to her with one plump finger... you could only do as instructed.

"Come on CJ, I won't bite." the Headmistress said jokingly, "And I'm sure Ivy won't either unless you ask her to." she crinkles her broad nose at the crass joke. "Now ladies, it is very important that we make CJ here feel comfortable. As the only red-blooded male in this academy, I'm sure he thinks himself plenty lucky to be surrounded by such young women as yourselves, but rest assured that nothing should happen between anyone while during school. So keep your hands to yourself and-

"mother!"

a whisper came from afar, from the Mini-Mistress. She raised her eyebrows and gestured towards you from her standing position longingly.

"Oh, erm, so as to say, without my permission!" the Headmistress corrected herself at the bequeath of her apparent daughter, "After all Mr. Dalton, you are a red blooded male, we can't exactly... limit your dating life." she said with a knowing smile between you and said puffball junior to her side

"Welcome to Chubbeso Academy, Mr. CJ Dalton!" Ivy Sighsoftly breathed, leaning towards you with her intimidatingly large doughy form and enveloping you inside of it. You sunk endlessly into her soft, squishy expanse of excess blubber; your face pressed right up against her left breast as she hugged you... before spilling Mocha Latte all over your jacket.

"Oops!" she squealed, recoiling the best her heavy body would allow, "I'm so sorry... here, let's get that off!" she said before helping you remove your coat. "Actually, I think it looks better that way."

"Y-Ya think?" for some reason, you can't help but stutter

"You betcha." she said with a slight peck on the cheek (unknowingly upsetting three girls whom of which will become very key in your survival at this hectic school)

"Welcome to the Academy, CJ Dalton! You're gonna love it!"
15112.title: the Wayback Machine (pt2)

choices: A neon-pink haired buxom chef, who is more than happy to meet you.
An aqua-blue haired, bottom heavy girl, who’s not too pleased to run into you.
151122.content:
The quick kiss on the cheek, along with the fact you were standing in front of an entire academy of school girls, helped confirm that you were indeed a red-blooded male. Your heartbeat grew faster and your cheeks fill with blood as your entire face begins to redden. What was worse there was another part of your body that was also letting you know it was working correctly, but mercifully that went unnoticed by the student body. However, your blushing was quite obvious, and a few small murmurs go up in reaction from the crowd. Most were girlish coos or sounds of small laughs at your embarrassment, but there were other discussions going on too. You weren’t able to hear exactly what they were saying, but Rebecca did pick up on one rumor spreading conversation going on directly behind her, just out of the hearing range of Kate.

“He’s a shy one isn’t he?” whispered a sophomore who possessed a thick cockney accent.

“Oh, I think he’s cute” said her corpulent compatriot.

“Yeah, blushing after a kiss is one thing, but from ‘er?”

“So she’s tubby…Maybe he’s got a thing for that?”

“What? You sayin’ he gets a chubby for the chubbies?” she asked British wit in full force.

“Sure, look at him blush. Considering the ‘size’ of most of the girls here It’s not like having a ‘thing’ for big girls would hurt him...well maybe a girl her size could" A quick burst of girlish laughter erupted between the two before Mrs. Masters returned to the podium.

“Well thank you again Ivy, I’m sure you all will absolutely love it here! Oh, and we’ll try to get this back to you before classes start tomorrow CJ.” The mysterious assistant had quickly taken your uniform and promptly disappeared off stage once more. Mrs. Masters’ motions for you to take your seat and you sheepishly step off stage, feeling the mob of eyes that were now focused on you and your still quite red face.

“So, you all are free to explore the campus here for the rest of the day. Please be sure to check your schedule for a list of special events we are holding today. and finally; Welcome everyone to Chubbeso academy! I know this will be the best school-year ever!” She concludes holding her arms outstretched as if to embrace the entire audience in a big warm hug. There were a few cheers and some applause at the conclusion of the speech, but the majority of the freshmen in the crowd were still a feeling too awkward here in this new high class academy to clap. The three of you began to file out of the elegant auditorium, and started to venture the academy’s labyrinth like hallways.

“So…what do we do now?” Rebecca asked a little awestruck as she was taking in the luxurious surroundings.

“Well the pamphlet says there’s something called The Foreign & Freshman Students Feast going on right now in the cafeteria. I guess we double qualify for that huh?” Kate answered, happy to have something new to read.

“Sure, that sounds cool," you add, feeling a bit of food would calm the butterflies still in your stomach, even if it was cafeteria food which up to this point in your life you'd always known to be a bit bland. "What do you think Rebecca? You hungry?”

“Huh-What?” she asks clearly lost in thoughts. Food had actually been what was on her mind, as she was begging to suspect you did have a thing for bigger girls. Though she had known you for practically your whole life, known that you’d always tried to be nice to everyone, you certainly had defended that enormous Ivy girl quickly, and you had definitely seemed to enjoy that hug she had given you...Maybe she’d ask you about it later…or maybe she could try…

“I said are you hungry?” you ask again cutting her once more from her weighty contemplations.

“Sure! Uh, where is the cafeteria here anyways?”

“Let me check…” you flip your own pamphlet over and open it up revealing the school sizable map. Then you draw a finger from your location just outside the grand auditorium to a large square marked Cafeteria. “Okay, so we should just have to go down this hallway and…” you begin, eyes glued squarely on the map as your legs continued walking forward. Unknowingly, you were about to commit one of the most cliche (and loved?) tropes of the genre, by literally bumping into/stumble upon one of the Academy’s attractive female residents who was just rounding the corner in front of you.

(Which is strange because the unusual hair color of the young woman should have grabbed your attention. In fact she was…)
151122.title: the Wayback Machine (pt3) Hair at the Academy

choices: The mini-mistress enters the area (Claire)
The cold serious retound women from before (Mina Kawasaki)
1511221.content:
While walking to the cafeteria you accidentally bump into someone as both the two of you fall over. As looked up it was a neon-pink haired buxom women who looked like something out of a fashion magazine and what's more surprising is that unlike all the other girls you've seen at this school so far this is thin not a beer belly to be seen.

"Oh you must be the new big man on campus I've been hearing so much about." Said the women in an energetic voice. "But where are my manners, my name is Bunnie Blake head chef of Chubbeso Academy and gourmet extraordinaire."

"I'm CJ but you probably knew that by now and these are my friends Rebecca Maglen and Kate Granden." You replied.

"Pleased to meet you, let me guess your on your way to the foreign and freshman feast right?" Bunnie asked.

"Yes we are." Kate replied.

"Good, I'll show you the rest if the way there." Bunnie said. "I was just coming back from washing up in the ladies room."

Then the three of you followed Bunnie as you entered the cafeteria and much to your surprise like the rest of the school is luxurious. You could also see the large buffet of food and the students surrounding it grabbing large amounts of it.

"As you can see my food is very delectable and hope its to liking CJ." Bunnie said in an alluring voice. "Well better get back to work see ya around."

With that Bunnie went into the kitchen leaving your group on a happy tune.

"How does she stay thin in a place like this?" Rebecca asked.

"Never mind that now, let's get something to eat." You stated.

"Just then the doors flung open (rather loudly I might add) which surprised everyone you turned around to see that its...
1511221.title: the Wayback Machine (pt4) meeting Bunnie

choices: The flashback is over back to the present
15112211.content:
The doors flew open and everyone in the cafeteria looked over by the entrance in shock. The one that caused the doors to fly was the same girl who sat next the headmistress during orientation.

“Sorry about that.” The girl apologized. “Didn’t mean to slam the doors open like that.”

After that the girl got in line for the cafeteria while the rest of girls continued their meals.

“Do you know who that girl is?” You asked curiously.

“Probably no one important.” Rebecca replied nonchalantly.

After lunch Rebecca and Kate went to look for their lockers while you went find your own locker which was in a different hall.

“Okay let’s see… locker number 212 where are you hiding.” You thought to yourself.

After ten minutes of searching you’ve finally found your locker and there was a letter attached to it.

“Meet me in room A7, come alone.” You said, reading the letters contents.

So then, you wander around the hallways for another ten minutes until you finally arrive at room A7 and enter the room only to see that the room is completely dark.

“Hello, is anyone here?” You asked in the dark.

Then all of a sudden the light turns on by the teacher’s desk and someone was sitting on the desk. It was a girl holding a hand fan, but after you got a better look at her it was the very same girl from orientation and the one who accidentally slammed the doors at lunch.

“Hello there CJ.” The girl said while turning the rest of the lights on.

“Uh… hi.” You replied awkwardly. “Do I know you?”

“Oh, where are my manners.” The girl said in remembrance. “My name is Claire Masters, daughter of the head mistress and owner of the academy Jessica Masters.”

“You’re the daughter if the head mistress!” You said in shock. “Actually I do have a question that I hope you can answer.” “On the application form I notice that there wasn’t a rent fee for the apartment that I’m living in why is that.”

“Simple my mom bought that complex so students don’t have to pay rent.” Claire replied in a confident tone.

“You don’t say.” You said lesser surprised tone.

“Yep, my family is quite wealthy." Claire stated with pride. “But you know CJ you don’t have to live in that apartment building you know.”


“I don’t?” You asked in confusion. “Where else would I live?”

Just then Claire got off the teachers desk and walked (or waddled) slowly towards you and when the edges of belly fat were touching your chest she gave you kiss right on the cheek. You were caught off guard by what had transpired that you lost your balance and fell on the floor which caused Claire to fall right on top of you. Your body was completely covered by Claire’s large body, her large gut engulfed your own, her thick arms and legs were larger than your own and her vast cleavage was resting on your neck. There was no way you were getting up anytime soon.

“You could live with me.” Claire said in a lustful tone.

“Wait, what?” You said in shock and confusion. “I hardly know you and I don’t feel comfortable living in some stranger’s house.”

“I know its sudden but trust me, you’ll be treated like a king and love it.” Claire said in an energetic tone.


Just then the door opened and you saw the last two people you wanted to see in the situation. It was Rebecca and Kate, and they looked really annoyed.

“Uh…hey guys.” You stammered.

“Can I help you with something?” Claire replied in annoyed tone.

“Yeah you can help by getting your fat-rear off of CJ.” Rebecca stated.

“If that it isn’t too much trouble.” Kate added in a silent tone.

“The reason we came here was because this room is our upcoming homeroom, ours and CJ and we weren’t expecting to see some arrogant cow lying on top off CJ.” Rebecca said in an annoyed tone.

“Arrogant cow?!” Claire said in an even more annoyed tone. “You have some nerve talking like that to the daughter of the head mistress.”

“Oh I’m sorry, how about arrogant princess.” Rebecca said correcting herself.

“I’ll show you how’s arrogant!!” Claire yelled.

Just then Claire started kissing you on the lips again making it as passionately as possible, but this with Rebecca and Kate watching in shock and anger.

“W-w-w-w-what.” Kate said in confusion.

“You fat sow, how dare you steal CJ’s first kiss.” Rebecca growled in anger.

“Correction that was his second time.” Claire said in a calm and confident tone.

After that Claire finally got off and proceeded to get up on her feet.

“I think that is enough for today.” Claire stated. “CJ, I’ll leave things the way they are for now, but my offer will still stand should you change your mind, but just leave the two annoyances behind.”

With that Claire left the room and left varying impressions on you, Rebecca and Kate.

“I swear, I’m going to get that heifer back or so help me.” Rebecca stated in anger.

“*Sigh* this is going to be a long year.” You thought to yourself while getting back up on your feet.
15112211.title: the Wayback Machine (pt5) enter the princess

choices: Hannah Gretel!
Wilma Ogelsvich!
A third different student? or possibly two students together?
1513.content:
“Mr. Dalton!” blared the unmistakable voice of Mrs. Masters over the school wide intercom. “I have a special surprise for you…” she hinted sultrily, causing the cafeteria to ‘Oooh!’ in naughty delight.

You stand up and quickly make your way out of the cafeteria, hoping none of the fan club members would spot you and cause a stampede. Thankfully you reached the Headmistress office without incident.

“You wanted to see me?” you ask making your way into the lavishly decorated office.

“Always happy to!” joked Mrs. Master from behind her wide and long desk. “Please, have a seat.” She offered much like a spider to its prey. “C.J…do you like it here at the academy?”

You were caught off guard by this question; usually Mrs. Masters was never this…serious. Recovering, you quickly answer. “Oh yeah it’s great!”

“Splendid!” she said with a smile, before steepling her fingers. She leaned forward her posh chair giving a lurch as she did so. “Now, the reason I asked you here is simple: C.J. I need your help. The staff and I were talking things over, and we think you’d be perfect for this big job.”

Uh oh, those were pretty vague words, better find out what she really had planned. “What’s the job?” you ask expecting some sort of slapstick response like; Helping Bunnie with a special project or babysit Claire at the mansion for the night (even though she was a year older than you and was surrounded by plenty of assistants)

That didn’t appear to be on the menu today as Mrs. Master’s face remained stern. “We here at Chubbeso are expecting a new student to transfer in and we’d like you to be her honorary escort.”

“What!” you shout clearly unprepared for the last line.

“Escort. You know, show her around, and let her get to know the academy, that sort of thing. Honestly such a cheeky boy…”she explains, enjoying any chance she could to see that cute face you make when you get embarrassed.

“Oh, well I don’t know...” You begin, ears twinged with red. “It’s just my second year here and if the fan club showed up…”

“You’ll get two excused days out of all your classes, and homework.” She teased with a smile; knowing full well this offer was too good for any student to pass up.

Your own brain thought the same and you didn’t think twice before answering. “Done!” you shout nearly leaping out of your seat.

“Marvelous! Now listen she's-”

Knock knock knock

Before Mrs. Master’s can brief you on this new transfer student, a knock erupted from behind her office door.

“Oh, that must be her,” she whispers to you from over the table. “Remember be a gentlemen!” she adds in a hushed shout.

Knock Knock Knock

Another set of knocks emanate from behind the doorway. “Er-Come in!” Mrs.Masters replies, just before sitting up astutely in her office chair, well as astutely as someone so large could.

The door swung open and standing in the door way was the girl who you’d be spending the next two days with.

“C.J Dalton I’d like you to meet...”
1513.title: International Affairs

choices: She kisses you?!? (Claire also saw it)
Mrs. Fracium needs help with something
15131.content:
"C.J this is Hannah Gretel transfer student from Germany and daughter of a very successful chocolate company." Mrs. Masters said while eating a chocolate bar.

Hannah's size was on par with Kate's except her breasts weren't that big but Hannah's gut was almost larger Kate's. Her arms were a bit doughy so were her legs and her face was a little plump (she also had a bit of chocolate near her lips but she wasn't aware of it). She had short red hair, chocolate brown eyes and was wearing a different variation of the chubbeso uniform. Usually the uniforms were tan-ish with a bit whie but Hannah's uniform was black with a bit of gold on it.

"Hannah this is CJ Dalton, the kind gentleman who show you around the campus." Mrs. Masters said happily.

"Bitte, sie kennen zu lernen JC Dalton (please to meet you JC Dalton in german)." Hannah said greeting you.

"Its CJ, Hannah." You said correcting her.

"My apologizes CJ, Hannah doesn't know english that well and when she does try to speak english it comes out a bit wrong, but she's learning." Mrs. Masters stated. "Know if you two will excuse me I need to talk to Ms. Blake about something.

Then Mrs. Masters left the office with Abida accompanying her leaving the two of you alone and Hannah was looking at you with a curious personality. Hannah then pulled a chocolate bar out of her pocket and shoved in your mouth for some bizarre reason.

"Yoru kidn fo cute JC." Hannah said while smiling a bit.

"Um..thanks." You muffled while finishing the chocolate that just put in your mouth. "So let me show you around Hannah."

Then the two of you left the principal's office (with Hannah clinging on to one of your arms) and started to show Hannah around the campus. You showed her the class rooms, the gym, the swimming pool (when Chris wasn't around) the cafeteria and dorms. You'd show her more of the school but Hannah was getting tried from walking.

"Well I think that will do it for today, any questions Hannah?" You asked.

"Nto realyl." Hannah replied while eating some chocolate.

"You really like to eat chocolate don't you." You stated.

"Yes, I do." Hannah said happily.

Then you escorted Hannah to her dorm room, gave her room key and just as you were about to leave...
15131.title: Daughter of a chocolate empire

choices: Introduce Hannah to your group of friends.
Don't see Hannah the whole day, but you do want to vist her after school...alone
151311.content:
"CJ...Danke" Hannah says coming in a step closer as she took her room key from you, her chocolate brown eyes welcoming the stares coming from your own.

"Danke?" you echo back, not understanding the strange sounding word was German for "Thank You." Her round cheeks were getting awfully close now, so close you can smell what must be the girls perfume. It's a refreshing mint chocolate scent, like opening up a fresh box of "Thin Mints" (product placement sponsored by the Girl Scouts Association. Have you bought your box yet?) And still she stepped in closer, leaning in now to give you-not one, but two sweet kisses one on each of your cheeks.

"Well, er danke?" you say again rubbing a newly wet cheek. Hannah seemed to really like this because she began to giggle. Leaning in even closer she brought her rosy chocolate laden lips to yours. The kiss came quick but you savored so many of the details, her lips were just so warm and moist...so plump...so sweet tasting. You unconsciously began to kneed her lower lip with your own, and were thinking about how nice it would be to just lick that bit of chocolate off her lips with your tongue...

Suddenly realizing what you and the German girl were doing you move to pull away but she ends up ending the kiss first. "Goobye C.J." she says a mischievous grin spreading across her face. You blink out of your daydream realizing the door in front of you had slowly been closed shut. The lingering taste of chocolate on your lips served as a melty memory of how the kiss had left you wanting, almost as if you'd just gotten a crumb of some extremely delicious dessert.

Awkwardly moving on, you realized that you had the rest of the afternoon free. Thinking about what you you might do tonight, you turn a corner you feel a hand suddenly grab your arm. Oh no! A member of your fan club had caught you by surprise! There went your afternoon! Now all you had to look forward to was a night of shirt ripping, grabbing, or even worse handcuffs. Taking in your assailants face, it wasn't a would be fan club captor, it was none other than Claire but she did not look happy.You found yourself wishing it had been a member of your fan club now.

"And what exactly was that all about?" she asks sandwiching you against the wall with her nigh-immovable stomach.

"What?"

"Don't play dumb. Who's the girl you were just kissing?"

"H-Hanna? She's a new student here. And I didn't kiss her she kiss me.

"Pardon me, but I hardly believe you." Claire then took a step closer increasing the squeeze her stomach had on you.

"R-Really your mom wanted me to show her around go ask her, her name's Hannah Gretel.

Claire audibly gasped at this reveal, taking a few steps back in surprise and releasing you from her poundage prison "D-did you say Hannah Gretel?"

Now it was your turn to be surprised, as there were few girls around who could shake Claire up like this. She quickly began talking a mile a minute sounding like a squealing fan girl. "You've got to introduce to me! No wait, I can't meet her dressed in just this....Did she give you any chocolate? No, first What's she like?" she finally asks.

"Oh...well..." Thinking back on it the girl didn't do a lot of talking, you had showed her around with her hugging your arm the entire time, only stopping to help herself to bar after various bar of chocolates. "She nice, but she's just starting to learn English." you finally say, carefully to leave out the whole arm hugging details.

Claire seemed satisfied but her eyes remained peeled as she glared at you. "Well then, very good...Just, make sure she stays happy. I'd simply die, if the daughter of the best chocolate maker in the whole universe left. Just let her know if she's get too close to you she's going to learn a whole lot of new words in English, and none of it will be nice.

"S-sure Claire."

"Good," Claire says a smile doubling the dimples on her face. "I can't wait to meet her." And keeping this jolly regal nature about her, Claire sauntered off feeling she'd taken care of her business for the day.

Walking back to your place the kiss was all you could think about. What had Claire meant by too close? You had just met Hannah.The two kisses on the cheek seemed playful, almost customary for the German girl; but that last one...that had been something...special.


Special, was not far from the truth. Hannah had been born and raised snacking on her fathers chocolates; chocolates which through chemicals and special tinkering had been created with an extremely high endorphin reactions. Now, as any choclophile can tell you one of the many benefits of Chocolate is that it can cause the brain to release endorphins which are tiny little chemicals that tell your brain when something is really good. Her father's chocolates though amplified this amount so much so that for some customers the chocolate were a pure addiction. That is was why in many countries today Hans&Gretel Chocolates are under strict investigations. This is also why such chocolates are extremely rare to find, but anyways back to Hannah, or more importantly Hannah's body.

Now, after a lifetime of eating such spiked sweets, Hannah's body had begun to process the chemicals differently. Unbeknownst to everyone, including Hannah herself, the endorphins inside her had simply begun to stockpile. This meant that anyone who received a kiss from the rotund redhead might find themselves feeling a lot happier than they had before. Now that was just for most people, but say for example a certain pubescent boy happened to receive an endorphin laden kiss...well we'll just have to see what happens next.

The next day you...

1513111.content:
The next morning you woke up with a bit more pep in you step than usual (maybe its because of the endorphins). Probably because its the weekend and you have no homework to do.

“Today’s going to be a good day.” You said.

So you went to do your usual Saturday routine of eating breakfast and watching TV while in your pajamas when you hear a knock at the door.

“Who could that be at this hour?” You ask.

So you went to the door and open it only to be greeted by a kiss to the lips followed by a chocolate bar in the mouth. Then you see that its Hannah who’s also in her pajamas(which are rather snug on her).

“Guten morgen CJ. (good morning CJ)." Hannah said.

“H-hello Hannah.” You replied while finishing off the chocolate. “Do you want me to show you the rest of the campus?”

“Eys I’d ovle to(Yes I’d love to).” Hannah said trying to speak English again.

Then just like that Hannah left with nothing more to say. You honestly did not know what was going through her head it’s like kissing you and giving you chocolate is her way of greeting someone (as far as you know anyway). So twenty minutes later you’re fully dressed and waiting near the main gate for Hannah but she was nowhere to be found. But you do see Rebecca and Kate waddling towards you.

“Hey CJ.” The two girls said simultaneously.

“Hey girls.” You replied.

“What are you doing around here lets go do something fun.” Rebecca said.

“Sorry I promised Mrs. Masters that I’d show a new student around the campus.” You stated.

“New student, who is it?” Kate asked curiously.

“That would be Hannah Gretel daughter of Augustus Gretel founder of Hans&Gretel Chocolate.” Claire said appearing out of nowhere hugging you.

“Hello Claire.” You muffled through her cleavage.

“Chocolate huh no wonder she got in her dad probably bribed the principal with a lifetime supply.” Rebecca said sarcastically.

“I’ll pretend I didn’t hear that blubber buns.” Claire scoffed knowing that the insult was at her mom. “So CJ where is she I’m dying to meet her.”

“I don’t know, she was supposed to meet me her about ten minutes ago but she’s not here.”

“CJ!!” Yelled a voice.
Just as your group was about to leave they turned to their left to see who was yelling. You then see that it was Hannah yelling while running as fast as she could. Which caused her body fat to bounce and shake like crazy. So ten seconds later she caught up your group and collapsed from exhaustion breathing very loud and heavy like.

“* Pant * * pant * Tut mir Leid, ich bin spät CJ. Ich war so beschäftigt, dass ich in der badewanne verloren.” Hannah said exhausted.

“What did she say?” Kate asked.

“She said that she’s sorry she’s late and that she so busy taking a bath that she lost track of time.” Rebecca said.

*Everyone stares at her in surprise and shock.”

“What, my grandma was German so my mom taught me how to speak it.” Rebecca stated.

While everyone was shocked at what they learned about Rebecca, Hannah was confused about the people around her and you noticed her look.

"Oh right, Hannah these are my friends Rebecca Maglen, Kate Granden and…” You said introducing your friends.

“Claire Masters, it’s such an honor to meet the daughter of the famous chocolate maker on all of Germany.” Claire interrupted while grabbing Hannah’s hands. “I know will get along wonderfully so if there’s anything you need just let me know.”

“Claire…” Hannah said in an awkward tone. “Uyo loko nice (you look nice).”

“Oh I should mention that she struggling to learn English so its kind of broken.” You stated.

*Speaker turns on.*

“Good morning Chubbeso Academy.” The speaker said. “Remember to turn in your fee and permission slip for our annual…”

15131111.content:
"For our ski trip to the snow cross resort in the alps." The speaker reminded. "If you don't pay the fee or have the admission slip signed out you'll have to stay behind and help with the teachers." "That is all have a great saturday."

*speaker turns off*

"Oh yeah I forgot about that trip." You said.

"But I've heard that the snow cross resort is one of the best ski resorts in all of the alps." Rebecca stated.

"Yes, but paying for it isn't exactly a stroll in the park." Kate replied.

"You've got a point Kate I don't have that kind of cash on me unless I rob a bank." You said. "So it looks like I'm staying behi..."

"Hush your mouth CJ." Claire interrupted by hugging your head in her cleavage. "To me that kind of money is pocket change, so I'm paying your admission fee."

"Thank you Claire" As you broke free from her grip."

"Of course you would princess." Rebecca stated. "Considering that you've had your mom pay off all his school fees so CJ wouldn't leave the school."

"I'm sorry I didn't hear that." Claire replied. "I was too busy thinking of how much of a good time me and CJ are going to have on the trip." "I'm even going to pay Hannah admission fee."

"Raelly." Hannah said trying to speak english again.

"Of course, heaven forbid that you miss your first Chubbeso Academy trip and that way we can get to know each other better." Claire said in a somewhat fangirl-ish tone.

"Of course you would do that, but I don't need your help to get the money." Rebecca stated. "Me and Kate can get the money by ourselves."

"That reminds me, Bunnie asked me to pick up something for her yesterday and I need to go get it before the shop closes." You said trying to break the tension. "Can you girls show Hannah the rest of the school?"

"Sure thing CJ." The girls replied.

With that said you quickly ran off on your delivery run while your friends showed Hannah around. Thing were going quite fine as Claire and Rebecca stopped arguing for awhile. But a few minutes into the tour...

151311111.content:
As the four portly girls waddled across campus, they noticed a large group of girls gathered around the outside of the admission's office.

"I wonder what's going on over there?" Rebecca asked curiously.

"Let's check it out." Claire stated.

So they quickly waddled towards the crowd and saw one of the girls had a ticket with numbers on it.

"What is that?" Rebeca asked.

"Its a lottery ticket." The bubbly blue-eyed girl replied.

"Lottery, what's the prize?" Rebecca asked.

"Sharing a room with CJ at the ski resort." Replied a hefty red-head.

"WHAT!!!" The group screamed.

"How come I wasn't informed about this!?." Claire yelled demanding answers.

"That's because we've been keeping it secret for days, especially from the eyes and ears of you and the principal." The girl at the table stated. "If you found out about this you'd just have the principal make you the winner automatically." "So if you want the prize you better hope that lady luck is on your side."

"Fine then, let's go Hannah." Claire said as she dragged the pudgy girl with her.

"We're going to Kate." Rebecca stated.

"Uhh right." Kate replied.

Then the group went to the table and each got their own ticket. Then they waited with the rest of the crowd.

"Alright ladies we're about ready to announce the winner of the share a room with CJ on the ski trip lottery." The girl at the table stated.

1513111112.content:
"Thanks for the frying pans." You said while leaving the cooking ware store.

"No problem kid." The burly store owner replied.

Apparently Bunnie asked you to get some new frying pans for the cafeteria since the old one were starting to lose their luster. As you carry the box of pans you watch the surroundings of Lethargis Town and everyone doing their own thing. The young kids waddling to the with their parents, fanclub members observing you from afar, you also see that boys school and wonder why you weren't sent there instead (some of the boys from the school give you dirty looks for obvious reasons). But anyway its was the same old thing as it is everyday.

"Hello there boy." Said a voice. "Can I show your fortune?"

You turn to your left and see a fortune-teller's booth with the voice belonging to a plump blonde women in her 30's wearing a fortune-teller robe.

"Sure." You replied as you approached the booth. "But I don't have any cash on me."

"Oh don't worry child, Madam Serena always customers their first fortune free." She said. "Now give me your hand."

Immediately you gave her one of your hands and she felt the palm with her own fat fingers.

"Hmmmm, interesting, very interesting indeed." Madam Serena stated as she finished.

"Well?" You asked in a curious voice.

"Well all I know is that big things will happen to you." Madam Serena replied. "Also beware of peepers and chocolate."

"Thank you." You said, leaving the booth.

"Anytime." Madam Service replied.

After that you went on your way back to the school to give Bunnie her frying pans. She thanked you for your help and gave a freshly baked cinnamon roll and you headed back to your dorm.

"I wonder how Hannah is doing with the girls?" You thought to yourself.

Just then you see two people waiting outside your dorm. Who was it?
1513111112.title: Fortune or misfortune

151311112.content:
The tour went throughout the campus until the group of girls had finally reached Hannah's new 'home' on the Chubbeso campus. Hannah had already moved most of her things into her new room and so had her key ready when the finally reached her door. She turned slowly before retiring to her room for the night, a beaming smile on her wide face. "Thank You~!" she said suddenly, spouting some of the few English words she knew.

The other girls returned her smile and thanks, and the watched as Hannah entered her dorm room. As the door opened wide all three of the Chubbeso veterans stood frozen....Hannah's room was practically stockpiled with box's of rich chocolates, all adorned with the Hans&Gretel Chocolates logo. Hannah turned around noticing her new buddies hadn't budged. Puzzled at first, Hannah's eyes lit up with understanding, no words were necessary. Hannah raised a finger in a sort of I'll-be-right back motion and waddled into her room, she returned moments later cradling an arm full of the usually very exclusive and very hard to come by chocolate bars. Still without speaking she held a bar or two out to each of the gaping girls, handing them out like it was Halloween. Hannah hummed in delight knowing that now she was able to give a special gift to the three, she was so happy that she was making so many new friends already!

Kate was the first to snap from the momentary shock. "Gee thanks Hannah! I've never had one of these before..." As she opened the wrapper Kate caught a whiff of the dark chocolate's smell, she slowly bit into a corner and was obviously just as delighted by the taste letting out a resounding "Mmmmm" much to Hannah's approval.

"Oh my gosh! My grandma use to bring me one of these every year as as special treat." said Rebbecca recognizing the bars logo and design. She tore into the wrapper taking biting off a chunk of the chocolate. She too gave a moan of approval nodding to Hannah as she sample the snack's smooth and creamy taste.

Claire stood still, and still slack jawed. Her greedy eyes scanned Hannah's room once more. There had to be at least 10 boxes in there, and 10 bar in every box meant....100 bars! She could have fainted at the sight. Claire much like her mother, savored any chance a bar happened to get smuggled out of Germany and into her pudgy hands, which was not very often, and even then she'd have to be content with splitting a single bar or two with her mother. Claire was practically drooling as she continued to peer into Hannah's room, almost forgetting about the bars currently in her hand. Almost. Claire instantly tore into her first one, sucking it up as quick as a vacuum cleaner and barely tasting the thing. The second one though she decided to truly savor, letting her lips slowly envelop it before biting. Claire seemed to moan loudest of the three, partly out of reflex and partly to make sure Hannah knew how much more she appreciated the gift than the other two.

Without another word Hannah waved goodbye as she politely shut the door to her room, leaving the three alone. Each one of the girls knowing that they would soon become good friends- no- very good friends with the Chocolate maker heiress.
***


The next morning you were very excited about the trip to the snow cross resort. Claire had even arranged for her Mother's personal assistant to pick you up in a private limo (rather than have you ride/torn apart by 20 or so fan girls on the Academy's bus.) It wasn't too long after you awoke when you saw a black limo arrive outside your dorm. It was early in the morning but it was still bright enough that you could see into the backseat of the car, inside was...
151311112.title: Hannah gives some chocolate to the girls
