Claire wants to make some side stops
1513111122.content:
When you opened the car door you saw both Hannah and Claire in the backseat with Claire trying to have a conversation with Hannah, but Hannah was more listening than talking.

"Hi there CJ." Claire said in a perky tone. "Come on in I saved you a seat right next to me."

While one of the maids put your luggage in the trunk, you noticed that the seat she pointed out was not only next to her but next to Hannah as well, meaning you'd be sitting between two of largest girls in the entire school.

“Why did I have a feeling this would happen.” You thought to yourself.

So you then entered the limo scooting past Hannah and saw down right between the two large girls feeling slightly uncomfortable. You looked over to Hannah and saw that she was still half asleep meaning that either Claire picked her up really early or she needs more sleep. Claire on the other hand looked like she was well rested and eager to spend time with both you and Hannah (though mostly you). Once you buckled up the limo drove off for the Snow Cross Resort.

“You know CJ, the temperature around the resort tends to drop below freezing at night so we might encounter some rough weather on the way there.” “But if that does happen your welcome to warm yourself against my big beautiful body.” Claire stated as she showed off her vast cleavage. “You can also lean against me if you feel tired.”

“Um…thanks Claire.” You replied in an unsure tone. “Is Hannah asleep?”

“Yes, she got earlier than she usually does so she may be out for a while.” Claire replied. “But never mind that you probably haven’t had anything to eat yet have you, so I asked Bunnie to make some meals for the road.”

Then Claire pointed to a mini-fridge and opened it (it has a lot more room on the inside than it does on the outside) and gave you a double chocolate-chip muffin and some milk. As soon as the muffin came out, the aroma of chocolate went across Hannah’s nose and she woke up without hesitation. You were a bit surprised to see that the scent of chocolate was enough to wake her up but then again the girls around here tend to have their stomach act like alarm clocks as well.

“Good see you up and about Hannah.” Claire said in a happy tone. “I had a feeling the smell of chocolate would wake you up, especially considering that the muffin is made out of the chocolate you gave us so.” “I also have more of them in the fridge want one?”

“Yes.” Hannah said in an eager tone.

With that Hannah reached over for the muffin and some milk while sandwiching you between Hannah’s broad gut and the side of Claire’s cleavage (you had the strange feeling that Claire planned this from the beginning). Then Claire grabbed a muffin for herself and the two girls started two devour the muffins.

“So Claire how long will it take for us to get to the resort?” You asked curiously.

“Oh we have a long while till we get to the resort.” Claire replied while still eating. “But that’s okay since I’ve got plenty of snacks to eat as wells as some activities to help pass the time and get closer to each other.”
With that response in mind you weren’t sure if you should be grateful or nervous given the princess’s nature when you are involved. Either way this trip was going to be interesting.

15131121.content:
You woke feeling surprisingly refreshed, probably from the rush of yesterdays events.

You get up quickly thinking that you could show Hannah around some more, and maybe even introduce her to your friends (Claire definitely), You walk into the kitchen and make your self some breakfast, surprisingly you are still hungry, not wanting to waste any more food here you decide to take Hannah out for some breakfast, showing her around town as you do.

You get dressed in a slightly tight pants and t-shit combination that looks formally-casual, heading out the door and quickly making your way to Hannah's room. You get there and knock on the door, a little too quickly. You're surprised when there is no answer, you find your answer as a slightly plump lady walks by and tells you "Ms. Gretel went out to a meeting with Mrs. Masters". Slightly downtrodden of hoping to meet again with a (possibly) friend, you make your way to the town to get a quick post-breakfast anyway.

You are stopped on the way as an all-too-familiar limo pulls up next to you. The door opens and you see Claire, dressed in a stunningly casually-formal dress. "CJ!" she calls, pulling you into a soft hug, squeezing you between her breasts as she does, "What are you doing today?"

"I was going to see Hannah today" you replied as you pulled yourself out of her soft embrace, "But since your mum took her to a meeting I decided to grab some breakfast"

"Let me take you!" Claire said while pulling you into the limo, sitting you next to her as you squish into her, her head snuggling itself into you soft shoulders.

You talk for a while, mostly about herself or about how cute and special you are (most of the talking from her), the the limo stops, you pull yourself out and courteously help Claire out, said person giggling seductively as you do. She leads you into Shaunty's Restaurant, where you both are quickly ushered into a high-class private room, where are large table of food, consisting of their specials, is already there. Claire leads you to the table and quickly starts to feed you, much to your annoyance.

"Are you feeling better now?" Claire asked in a light, concerned voice. The table had been emptied, with you (forced) eating just over a quarter. and Claire eating the rest.

"I'm fine" you answer while stifling a burp.

You both leave the restaurant, Claire, reluctantly, leaving with a kiss on your cheek. You make your way through town, occupying yourself for most of the day, most of it being you running from your club. You make your way back into your apartment, walking past the Academy's constructors as you do, to find that your room has, well... GROWN a room. You ran into said room to find a new bedroom, most of the room being covered by boxes of Hansel & Gretel's chocolates, you look around and find Hansel sitting on (presumably) her bed, with a smile on her face, sitting next to Mrs. Masters who was sitting on a reinforced-chair.

"Hello Mr. Dalton" Mrs. Masters said with a smile, "As I'm sure you know, Hannah had a meeting with me today" you nod in confirmation "Well we had a meeting about her schooling and living arrangements, as she told me how nice you were and how welcomed you made her feel, I decided to let her live with you, as well as her joining all you classes"

Your eyes bulge out slightly, enticing a giggle from Hannah, who was now eating, from what you could tell, her 10th chocolate bar, you sputter as you try to get your head around this.

How do you feel about this? Do you...
15131121.title: Missing Hannah

choices: Your less desirable side wins out: you accept Mrs. Master's offer!
No, this was too weird: you refuse her offer
151311212.content:
This wasn’t the first time something like this had happened. You coming into your room one day, finding Mrs. Masters grinning like the cat that caught the canary as she unveiled some new hair-brained scheme for you to take part in (usually one that worked in her favor sooner or later) wasn’t exactly an uncommon occurrence in this crazy campus. But this was new.

Even the girls on campus didn’t have roommates, unless they desired it of course. And they were… well, girls rooming with other girls. Mrs. Masters couldn’t possibly allow this, right? You rooming with a strange new girl who didn’t seem to speak very much English, a pretty cute one at that... why if you were a lesser man, she could be in serious danger! This was either a serious case of negligence on Mrs. Masters’ part as a headmistress… or her true, inner self turning the cogs of a diabolical scheme.

“Do you… uh…” the words stumble out of your mouth as you attempt to avoid watching Hannah nom adorably on her chocolate bar, “Mrs. Masters, do you think we can have a word?”

“Well of course, Mr. Dalton.” Mrs. Masters said warmly, crossing her mighty arms over her bloated torso innocently as she deflected your laser-sighted stares, “Several, if you would like.” She giggled like a girl many years her junior, not unlike an overgrown version of a certain pampered princess

Your eyes travel silently back to Hannah, who seemed unaware of the transgression before her. You look back to your Headmistress, then back to Hannah while raising your eyebrows. She only laughs in response, one so hearty and plentiful that it causes her entire body to shake

“Oh CJ, don’t worry about little Hannah.” She said with a gentle gesture towards the anything-but-little Hannah, “You remember darling, she doesn’t quite have the grasp on the English language that you and I do. Speak freely love, she probably won’t understand a word of it.” She purred here, “Of course if you’d like some privacy with your Headmistress, I’d be more than happy to oblige—“

“TH-This is fine!” you backpedal instinctively, much to the amusement of your somewhat sadistic schoolmarm , “It’s just… well, I’m not entirely sure if I’m—“

“Go on Mr. Dalton, do spit it out.” Mrs. Masters said in a huff, “It’s not polite to dance around the subject, now go on and get to the point.”

“W-Well, it’s just… Hannah’s really nice and all (from what I gather, anyway) but…” you choke, much to the chagrin of your rapidly less-flirtatious headmistress, “I don’t know if I want to… room with her. I’ve never had a roommate before. Let alone a girl. A-And… well, isn’t this a little sudden? I mean, I just met her yesterday.”

A pause between the two of you, interrupted only by the sounds of Hannah’s eager munching on her twelve candy bar. She seemed to be watching intently, with wide eyes and wearing her naiveté on her sleeves, despite being unable to understand most (if any) of what was going on at all.

“I mean, literally, I just met her yesterday.” You reiterate your point, though it may not have been the brightest of ideas at this point judging by the downright sour expression on Mrs. Masters’ doughy countenance, “A-And… um…”

“CJ, CJ, CJ…” Mrs. Masters corrected gently, shaking her head slowly from side to side in the act of, “You’ve spent so much time on your own, but you fail to understand the simplest of working relationships.”

“Working… relationships?” you parrot, unsure of the meaning behind this sudden turn of events

“The relationships one forges with their co-workers or business partners. Working Relationships, thus the title.” She says gently, taking your hand in hers, “Now, I’m doing Hannah’s father a large favor by enrolling her into my academy—with you, my daughter, and all your other ragtag friends you keep around for some reason—and in return he has… allowed me a large cache of his personal chocolates, to which you are privy to as well for that matter.” She pat the top of your hand in a matronly fashion before sitting back up in her reinforced chair, “Now, he has instructed me to do all that is within my power to ensure Hannah has an absolutely lovely time at school. I could only imagine if it was my Claire in the exact same position—I know I would want Mr. Gretel to accommodate my darling daughter as best he could for the duration of her stay.”

“I don’t understand,” you interject, “what does this have to do with me?”

Mrs. Masters chuckled into the back of her hand haughtily, “Oh my boy, no wonder it’s taken Claire so long to wrestle you over!” she coochy-cooed girlishly, “Hannah was very excited after you gave her the grand tour yesterday. I don’t speak much German, but what I could understand pertained very much to ‘the friendly American boy’, if you catch my drift.”

You gulped, the memory of Hannah’s juicy pink lips dripping from yours suddenly so very strong in your mind.

“S-So… you’re using me?”

“Oh my no, Mr. Dalton!” Mrs. Masters said dramatically, “Hannah wants to room with you, I wish to grow closer to her father, her father wants her to be happy, and… well, I suppose I am. Just a little though.” She winked devilishly, “But I promise I’ll make it worth your while.”

“M-MRS. MASTERS?!”

“No no, you silly boy!” her encompassing cheeks growing a healthy passionate red after your outburst, “I mean that, should you agree to rooming with Hannah, I’ll be sure to provide you with plenty of ‘extras’ around the Academy. A few late passes here or there, I’ll renew your sick days at the end of every month, plus all the chocolate that Hannah would be willing to give you—along with access to the supply that I and my dearest daughter will be afforded once a week.”

Here she placed her hand gently upon yours once more and looked at you dead in the eye. Her gaze was haunting, not malevolent but certainly far from benign. There was no hint of desperation, or any ill intent. Just a certain… sternness. One that you hadn’t ever seen in the big blue eyes of your seemingly unimposing headmistress.

“What do you say, love?” Mrs. Masters said in a surly tone, “Do it for the Academy. For Claire. For me… Hell, do it for yourself!”
151311212.title: An Odd Arrangement

choices: “You got any more of this stuff?!” you greedily ask, Hannah obliging happily...
Hannah leans over and gives you another one of those big, wet kisses!
1513112121.content:
“I’ll do it.” The words are almost a whisper as they fall from your lips, “Hannah can stay here.”

At once, the sternness dribbled down Mrs. Masters’ face and revealed a great big smile that she had been hiding all along. Her eyes lit up fabulously as her painted lips tucked the corners of her mouth into dimples. She turned to Hannah and muttered something to her quietly, something ending in “bleiben.” At once Hannah began smiling as well, her plump pink lips stretching as wide as her waistband.

“Well that’s all settled then, isn’t it?” Mrs. Masters said happily, “CJ be a dear and help up your headmistress.” She stretched out one giant arm, grabbing at the air in a not-so-subtle suggestion that you help pry her from her seat, “I believe that I do have a date with that ‘lifetime supply’ of chocolates that I was promised…”

***


And so that was that, Hannah Gretel was to be your new roommate. All of the paperwork was to be filed by Mrs. Masters herself once she got back to her office—which, she stressed would be very soon—but that the two of you were to begin immediately. After all, according to her, you were both “very special guests” and were to be treated with the “required amount of exclusivity”…whatever that meant.

After helping Mrs. Masters to her chubby little feet and guiding her out the door, you were to begin the arduous task of helping Hannah unpack. How could you not, with that cute face looking up at you. She seemed so quiet… probably because she didn’t know any English. But still the way she kicked her feet idly as she watched you walk around the apartment, she seemed very interested in you. She guided you silently through the unpacking process, unable to lift a finger due to her excessive chocolate indulgence.

But you didn’t mind a bit… well, not much of a bit.

“Danke, CJ!” She giggled at your misfortune, laughing into the wrist of her coat as you plopped down beside her: completely spent.

Your breathing was cut short by all this strenuous work, it having been quite some time since you’d actually done much of anything for yourself since enrolling in this palace of poshness. You had unpacked most of Hannah’s stuff for her by now, and at least moved most of the heavier items into her side of the still-not-entirely-painted wall that separated your “room” from hers.

“No…problem… Hannah” you pant, laying down on her full mattress with your arms stretched out, “Just… gimme a minute… ‘kay?”

“Ja, das ist in Ordnung”, Hannah mumbled slightly to herself, conjuring up the right words to fit this particular situation, “Zat iz fine.”

You exhale wildly, your stomach rising and falling erratically as your struggle to regain your lost breath is fought in vain. You uniform was already feeling a little tight around the middle, no doubt you’d have to see Kat about a resize soon. Or just splurge on a new one, courtesy of the Masters’ bottomless bank account.

Of course that was the tamest of your wild dreams, considering all the good things that were to come for housing Hannah. No more tardies, a lot more sick days, and maybe even a better GPA were in your future! Plus getting to room with someone—ie, someone who could keep an eye out for that pesky fanclub of yours. Score! No more waking up an hour early to sneak to school , Hannah got the window so they couldn’t watch you sleep anymore… oh man, this was gonna be great!

“CJ?” Hannah’s voice snapped you from your daydreams as you looked up over your pot to find her staring at you, “Do you like schokolade?”

“Do I like whatnow?”

“Schokolade. Mein Vater, he owns many Schokoladefabriken… erm, Schokolade factories.” She corrected herself lightly, “I vas vondering if you vould like some?”

“Oh right…” you remembered very vividly the many, many many instances in where Mrs. Masters had mentioned that Hannah was indeed the heiress to an apparently very important chocolatier, “Uh, sure, I would love some!”

Hannah smiled eagerly as she tucked into her little box of chocolates. It looked no bigger than a cigar box, but it apparently held many of the peculiar bars that she was always snacking on. She reached into it and pulled out two—about as wide as your palm and twice as long. The words “Hans&Gretel” curly-cued over the wrapper with the image of two chubby children with rosy red cheeks. She gave it to you with a smile, growing wider as you unwrapped your present.

“Mmmm…” you let a little grunt escape you after the first bite, “Thish ish…-gulp- really good, Hannah!” you voraciously bite into the bar again and again, “I can see why… Mrs. Masters… is so crazy about your Dad’s chocolate!”

“Danke!” Hannah squirms sheepishly in her seat, unwrapping her own packaging so that the two of you may enjoy a little snack together when suddenly…
1513112121.title: Schokolade and Suitcases

choices: Hannah breaks out the chocolate, and all (most) qualms are forgotten…
Hannah tries other methods of freund-machen… they don’t go so well…
15131121211.content:
“Oh man, these are so good!” you exclaim later in the night, crumbling up and tossing aside the latest addition to your carnivorous confectionary consumption, “Oh, hey, wanna try the dark chocolate ones next? With the caramel filling, right? You said you had some of those?”

Hannah paused to decipher the funny language you had thrown at her so rapidly, answering after a minute with a chipper little, “Ja, ve has die schockolade und karamell!” she eagerly reached into one of her many unzipped suitcases and pulled you out another box

You snatch it from her hands, ripping into a bar in advance as you hurry to finish your Milk Chocolate. As it turns out, these things were pretty good!

“Mmm…” Hannah grunts too as she bites into her own bar, snuggling into the couch cozily with her titanic tonnage. Not that you particularly noticed.

There may be other perks to having Hannah as a roommate after all…

***


Lunch time, the next day.

As per usual, your posse eats at one of the round tables that litter the cafeteria floor.

Kate Granden, one of two childhood friends that enrolled alongside you last year, sits at the table with book in hand. Her tray is actually quite modest, though you wouldn’t believe it by her impeccable size. She’s quite heavy, weighing at around two-eighty after a particularly indulgent first year. Standing at only 5’4”, it’s no shock to see that she’s quite the chubster—most of it going to her unbelievable bust.

“Um… where’s CJ?” she asks innocently, as if she actually had been reading her book instead of looking for you the entire time, “It’s not like him to miss lunch…”

Rebbecca Maglen, the second of your friends that followed you from the States, sits not far from the first. She and Kate have been friends since before either of them met you, and silently they’ve since competed for your affections. Becca’s a pretty big girl too, a bottom-heavy two-fifty but standing a little taller at 5’8”. She’s got the usual fanfare with her meal—as much as she claims to hate the Chubbeso lifestyle, it certainly hasn’t stopped her from indulging in it.

“Probably in the infirmary.” She snorts as she takes another bite of her hearty meal, clearly trying to hide her concern for you, “New semester, same Chickadees following him around and jumping all over him, eating her weight in chocolate right now.”

Here she paused to look at Claire Masters, the largest girl seated at the table. Weighing a bit more than the big three-double-donut, Claire Masters was every ounce her mother’s child. Being a roly-poly princess in her own right, she huffed slightly at the accusation and continued eating her lunch. However it was not the normal cuisine that was served so graciously to the “riff-raff”, as she called them. No, not just that. While it was there, more or less the same of what Becca and Kate were eating, it was smaller. And was accompanied by an unhealthy amount of gourmet chocolates.

“Oh you be quiet.” Claire huffed as she sandwiched her sandwich between two Hans&Gretel chocolate bars, “I’m certainly anything but a Chickadee.”

A rare fourth, to this table anyway, sat a somewhat older member of this clique. As it was her duty to monitor the cafeteria at all times, Bunnie Blake liked to abuse this duty so as to chill with her favorite students. Well, sans you. But that was fine. The Calamity Pink cook was more than willing to have a nice pow-wow with her good friends and favorite customers—both here and at Shaunty’s.

“Uuuuuuugh!!” Bunnie whined girlishly, “CJ NEVER misses one of my meals! He needs to get his butt down here right now so I can make him some food!!”

“Bunnie… shouldn’t you be, y’know, in the cafeteria?” Kate looked up from her book again

“I’m in the cafeteria.” Bunnie answered flatly before taking a sip of her coffee, “I’m getting creative criticism.”

“But we haven’t—“

Suddenly you make your entrance. Having quite literally just rolled out of bed and thrown on your uniform, it wasn’t until your walk over here that you realized that it wasn’t time for breakfast. Your hair was tossled, your clothes a little wrinkled, and your fly was down. Obviously you weren’t expecting to come to school this morning. Or afternoon. Whatever.

“CJ?” Becca asked, swinging her big bottom from underneath the table to stand, “Where have you been? It’s noon! You’ve missed, like, all of your classes!”

“Over…slept…” you wheeze, “Stayed up all night…”

“All night?” Kate asked worriedly, “That’s not very healthy, CJ…”

“With Hannah.”

“HANNAH?!”

For once, your entourage could all at least agree on something. The shock and awe was dripping from every which way, from Becca to Bunnie! It made so much sense now! The lateness, the unkempt appearance, why you were so out of breath…

“Cee-CJ?” Kate asked, getting all red-faced, “W-Who’s Hannah?”

“My new roommate.” You answer plainly in one puff of air, much to Becca’s chagrin. She grabs you by your uniform’s lapel and proceeds to throttle you

“ROOMMATE?!” she parrots back, “You’re LIVING with some girl that I DON’T EVEN KNOW?!”

“Y-Yeah, I...” you struggle to breath, “M-Mrs. Masters—“

“Relax, Rebbecca.” Claire daintily taps her mouth with her napkin, sitting elegantly across from her cool as a cucumber, “My Mother and future husband have made an agreement of sorts.” She says plainly in her delusions of arranged marriage, “Hannah is a very important aspect in an… agreement my Mother has with Hannah’s father. So she will get the very best of treatments… but since we already gave that room to CJ, they’ll just have to share… at least, that’s what my Mother told me.”

“Oh come on!” Becca drops you like a brick, “First I have to put up with this one—“here she points to the still-smug Claire, “—now some other pampered princess?! No dice!”

“V-Verzeihung bitte…” came Hannah’s voice over the uproar of your crowd, “I-I am Hannah… und I am zo zorry I keep CJ for so long—“

“Wow Ceej, nailing a foreigner huh?” Bunnie crinkles her nose, “She’s cute. German? Kinky.”

“N-Nailing?!” you exclaim

“K-K-K-Kinky…?” Kate whimpers, falling back into her book with a tomato-red face

“We were up all night, how you say… um, eating schockolade.” Hannah answers, completely missing Bunnie’s sexual remarks, “We made friends, I-I vould like to make friends with you all too…”
15131121211.title: Overzealous Silver and Overbearing Gold

choices: After a month of some serious nice-nice...
Free Choice
151311212111.content:
It honestly didn’t take all that much to make everyone friendly with one another.

Claire was the first one to go, but that really shouldn’t surprise anyone. The perfect way to her heart was with food, and food Hannah had in abundance. Once Hannah broke out her backpack full of chocolate bars, Claire already knew that she was going to like this girl. While she wasn’t too keen on her beloved boy toy rooming with another girl, her Mother had assured her that her involvement was crucial in keeping the steady flow of her beloved Hans&Gretel chocolates coming. So sacrifice she would, for the better of herself and her mother… but mostly for herself.

She and Hannah actually had a lot in common. Both were two heiresses to very wealthy families, spoiled rotten by their corpulent caregivers. From where they talked, they mostly discussed the hoity-toity business that the rest of you never quite understood. Balls, dances, galas, the works. It seemed blue-bloods could communicate despite the language barrier between them…

Next was Bunnie Blake, the big-boobied foodie. Although she admittedly wasn’t much of a big eater, nor a very big fan of sweets, Bunnie audibly exclaimed her immediate love of Hans&Gretel chocolate and went on long spiels at a time regarding just what recipes would go excellently with her new favorite ingredient. Big eater or not, it didn’t stop Bunnie from snacking heartily on the addictive little squares.

Bunnie liked to talk to Hannah about food, just like she liked to talk about everybody with food. Food was her life, and food was also Hannah’s life. So, in a word, they clicked. Bunnie attempted to limit herself into talking about only German recipes so Hannah would be able to follow the conversation, but when none of them included chocolate Hannah became a little lost. She was very gracious in offering to use the chocolate in recipes for the whole crew, “so long as I get a bite!”

Kate fell not too long after, being just as much a chocoholic as Hannah. She found the girl very endearing, and actually did her best to hold up a conversation with her. Something about her being unable to talk to people and Hannah being unable to talk to people (albeit for different reasons: shyness and poor tutelage respectively) just helped coax things along… in a really, really odd way. No one had ever really seen Kate be sociable before. It was a little off-putting.

As an exchange of friendship, Kate vowed to help Hannah learn English. And in return, Hannah promised Kate German. It was going to be an odd friendship, no one doubted. But it would probably both do them some good. Kate seemed to talk an awful lot about how much she needed a “study buddy” these days, so maybe the two of them could hang out together and do that? Yeah, that could work!

And Becca, poor tsundere that she was, never really quite fell to the charms of Hannah Gretel. There was just… something about her. Maybe it was the way she looked at you, or how close you two sat, or the way she got all red whenever you talked about her (or for her, you’d gotten quite good at that after your night-bonding over chocolate) but she just didn’t like her.

Of course that didn’t stop her from eating all that “schokolade.” She just stared daggers at the two of you while she stuffed herself silly. No doubt she and Claire tied for most chocolate eaten. And the way you two seemed so buddy-buddy already… ooh it steamed her up!

But still, so long as she didn’t try anything and kept up with the nice-nice, what could possibly happen?
151311212111.title: Alms for Qualms

choices: Comfortable with the situation, feeling that he liked Hannah in this way?
Surprised, thinking this was all happening quickly?
15131121212.content:
The kiss was as sweet as you remembered. Wrapping an arm around her, you held the kiss for as long as you could, stopping when the chocolate heir needed to breath, her cheeks blushing with every breath.

"T-thanks" you say, coming down from the high, not saying anymore as Hannah forced another bar into your hand that you ate quickly, moaning with every bite.

"Gut essen, Liebe" Hanna said quietly as she watched you sweetly, her blush becoming rosier and rosier ever second as a smile formed on her face, "
Ich werde auf dich aufpassen"

"Pardon?" you asked as you finished the bar, Hannah only shook her head and gave you another bar, giving you another whenever you finished the previous, not stopping until both of you fell asleep on her bed, Hannah nuzzling her head onto your neck.

What happened when CJ woke up?
15131121212.title: Hannah leans over and gives you another one of ...

choices: Despite all the chocolate weight, you catch the Paparazza!
Just missed her! You try to strike some sort of deal at the Daily Chub.
151311212122.content:
Between the various bits of the H&G wrapping graveyard piercing into your still exposed gut and the sharp intestinal dread that churned inside whenever you either tried to recall exactly when you apparently beached yourself on an unfamiliar bed last night; or worse, found that you sickeningly still craved “Schokolade” whenever Hannah cooed it out in her sleep, you began to wonder if this roommateship was going a little too far.

Besides the strange difficulty in getting out of an overly inviting Grand Kaiser-sized mattress, which had some of the warmest faux fur throw blankets and what you assumed were softest pillows, the measures taken to finally ensure sweet privacy had also seemed to have limited the ways for you to determine the time of day in your own co-opted room. Your learned sense of worry fired up with thoughts of how late you could be, the limitations of Mrs. Masters’ supposed generosity, and more importantly – wait, where was Hannah?

A drowsy delicate hand grasping at your softer middle nearly made you shriek in the most feminine stock horror scream you could muster.

You had slept in the same bed with a girl you hardly knew. YOU HAVE SLEPT WITH A GIRL IN THE ABSOLUTE MOST DANGERIOUS PLACE FOR THAT SORT OF INFORMATION TO HIT. The statistical nightmare of what Chaos Theory and your own brand of twisted luck could turn this incident into was enough to kickstart your first heart attack. A benevolent part of your subconscious had the decency to shield you from the thought of more physical involvement in this “working relationship”. That idea only came several minutes later when you started to admire the view of the husky girl lovingly draped around your body.

Sure, it was sort of adorable of how her chocolate stained lips smiled whenever you thought she uttered your name, b-but this was seriously just too much for your still sugar charged teenage mind to rationally compute! You needed to get away, clear your head, and maybe even take a cold shower or five – just anything to avoid the chance of the entire campus going thermonuclear.

Unfortunately, a familiar camera flash destroyed any hopes of keeping your nap with the chocolate scion quiet. The unmistakable cackle of the stalker, Cindy Scoop, echoed about the room as you hastily threw anything on to get her. You couldn’t afford to let even a rumor about this to get out!
151311212122.title: Surprised, thinking this was all happening quic...

choices: Take a photo of you with the fanclub (willingly).
Run some errands for the news club.
1513112121221.content:
Once you threw an ensemble together you ran out the door and chased after Cindy before she could do any harm. Despite being a little heavy on the weight side, the idea of this incident getting leaked out to the school drove you to run faster than you have ever ran before. After five minutes of chasing Scoop, you finally manage to pin her to the ground before she could get to the news room.

"Alright Cindy what is it going to take to keep you quiet about this whole mishap". You said while panting from exhaustion.

"Cutting right to the chase are we Mr. Dalton?" Cindy replied. "That's what I like about you, your so straight forward, anyway get off of me and tell you my terms."

With that you got off Cindy and the two of got back on your feet.

"I'm not asking for much, just three small favors that I want from you and I'll forget that this whole sleeping mishap ever happened." Cindy stated.

"Just three?" You replied curiously.

"Yes, and I'm not going to use them all right away." Cindy stated. "I will also text locations where we can meet in privacy and talk about them." "anyway for my first favor I'd like to..."
1513112121221.title: Negotiations

info.brief_description: Your a guy in an all-girl school where everyone is fat and your the center of attention.
info.description:
Before you get started please look at "Characters of chubbeso academy"  so you have an idea of the characters.

Here are the rules

1) You can add new characters as the story goes on but they have to be girls

2) no vore,death,gay/lesbian,shrinking or porno.

3) Keep weight gain natural no magic, a little science is allowed for ex: bloating pills and stuff to increase hunger anything around those lines.

4) no extreme weight gain for ex kate woke up to be 5000000000 lbs.

5) at least a paragraph for each add on, any one sentence additions will be deleted on the spot.

6) have fun.

Update: On 12/4/11 Chubbeso Academy got its 100th chapter. I'd like to thank everyone that contributed to the story and keep up the good work.
Bobo the Hobo, wowee, Da Games Elite, Evil Genius, Hobos_On_Fire, NHK_87, Joe, jaden, sesshomaru197, Cato, BAD92, too much free time and ironman758.
